links_reviews_title: Classy sequences. Beautiful design and cut
links_reviews_text: Beautiful design. Loved the slit on the right, making this sheath dress a bit more interesting. The finish at the bottom is also gorgeous. Fits very well.
Gorgeous fabric and colors. So many compliments. Very elegant, yet comfortable. This could be a black tie or cocktail so very versatile. I am athletic, 5'8, not curvy - the size 8 was perfect.

So if your under 45 this dress isn't really for you. It's all sequence and doesn't really have a shape. I actually liked it more once i threw a blazer on but overall it's my least favorite and goes to show sometimes retail value isn't everything.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. It was beautiful but gave me plenty of room to dance.
links_reviews_text: Great quality and details. I felt great wearing it.

For a head-to-toe sequin dress, this isn't over the top at all. Just the right amount of sparkle for a cocktail event but could also be dressed up a bit as well. Really well-structured and flattering! I'm 5'2" so the fit was a bit longer than the model but still looked great and was surprisingly comfortable. Would definitely rent again.
Great fitted sheath dress! The pattern is beautiful. I am 5'11" and 155 lbs and this dress was the perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Guy stopped car to compliment dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is elegant & conservative with just enough glitz. I received quite a few compliments. When I was leaving the art party, a guy stopped his car to tell me how beautiful dress was- I'll call that a win!
perfect for my age and the event

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress - gorgeous fabric, flattering, tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress, sparkles in the light. Easy to wear, comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fits well, a little large under arms. The sequin work is very detailed, nice, but not over the top. Easy to catch on any objects, corners, etc.
Didn't wear for event. Husband said I looked like a grandma
The sequins on this dress make it impossible to put your arms down without irritation.
Great dress! Form fitting and easy to walk and dance, got lots of compliments! Not to much difference between size 4 and size 6 other than the chest area, highly recommend!
I rented this for my mom and the size appeared perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a summer engagement party
links_reviews_text: Body hugging with a little bit of give. Looked very elegant

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful, husband said I looked stunning!
links_reviews_text: Many compliments. Wore to a black-tie event. Lovely detailing; good quality. Will rent again!
Rented as a back up and decided not to wear. I have an athletic body shape and was tight at the shoulders and therefore sequins were scratchy. Beautiful pattern though!
This dress was beautiful but it was a little too sparkly for my event so I didn't wear it. It was really a gorgeous dress.

links_reviews_title: Very cool dress, love the subtle sequins
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cool but was too dark for the occassion. As well, the lace overlay was a little strange around theh zipper (looked like it was sort of damaged but I don't think it is). The fit is fine - I'd say true to size, and because of the lace and dark color, it's a bit more forgiving. Ultimately an interesting, unique dress but just not what I was looking for this time around.

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful but too itchy. I could not wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fits well but too itchy
LOVED this dress!!!!

links_reviews_title: Conservative but elegant with subtle sequins
links_reviews_text: WOW! WOW! WOW! Such a sophisticated looking dress. It screams EXPENSIVE! It has very subtle sequins that are transparent and arranged on the petals of the flowers. Not too many, but just enough to ramp it up a couple of notches. I usually wear either a 6 or 8. The zipper was broken on the 6 so I wore the 8. The 6 probably would have had a little snugger fit, but I don't know for sure if it would have been too small without actually being able to try it on. I would definitely rent again. But as other reviewers have noted, the zipper is really hard to get up and down trying to navigate the thick material and sequins.
For perfectly, fun to dance in and easy to wear. Loved it!!
Love the dress and lots of complements but the sequins dug into my back and were scratchy. Still worth it. Fit well tho a teeny bit long for 5'2"
The dress looks very nice in person. And it looked amazing on my 4'11 figure. It looked like a long midi dress. My only concern was the zipper. It is very hard to zip it up. You will need help.
The fabric is extremely stretchy and comfortable. Great if you're going out dancing. My only complaint was that the black lining kept coming out of the bottom of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Sexy, slinky and rich looking fabric!
links_reviews_text: This dress looks even better on. Pics really don't do it justice. Wore it to my company Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an awards banquet where my uncle received an award.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great, it stayed in place and I didn‚Äôt have to any adjusting and it was very comfortable and stretchy. I was very happy with my choice for this event. The dress is true to size.

This dress was my backup dress but it was the one that fit the best! I was worried that it wouldn't be fancy enough but I got so many compliments. It was very elegant and comfortable to wear! The ruching gives you a slimmer look and the stretch it has helps it fit you correctly in the right places!
I wore this for an awards ceremony for work, and it was a great choice. It's pretty firm fitting but isn't I guess. The material is flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect cocktail dress for a formal night out!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a holiday rooftop gala. The dress was the perfect level of formality while being fun and chic. Received so many compliments. Also is very comfortable and hugs the body. It is not an overwhelming metallic if you are worried about being too shiny. Would recommend!
Very light and comfy but looking chic

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and would absolutely rent it again. Very comfortable and easy to wear. Lots of compliments. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Accentuating dress perfect for winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was worn to an elaborate winter wedding. The length was perfect. It never rode up on me. The bare shoulder side never slid down. The fabric is really good quality and it's thick so it doesn't look cheap. I got a ton of compliments on it! Highly recommend. I usually wear an 8 in tops and 10 in bottoms and the 8R dress fit me because it's stretchy material on the bottom.
Stayed on well for a one shoulder dress. Ruching can hide midsection a little too. Would probably fit best on someone with more curves but was a great option for me too. I got lots of compliments.
Sexy and vibrant! Fit perfectly!

I wear a size 8 in dresses and typically go up in size when it is form fitting. This dress had a lot of stretch. Although, I wore a size 10R for needed length, I could have easily worn a size 8 and still been very comfortable

Fit true to size. Flattering for an hourglass figure. Only complaint was the strap used to hang it kept coming out on the front. You can see it there in this photo. If it was mine, I would've just cut it off. Wore it to my work holiday party that was a Silver & Gold theme.
Dress was so pretty and fit great. Got lots of compliments. Only complaint was that the hanger cords kept creeping out while dancing.

Tried this for my company holiday party because I like the metallic look. It's mostly true to size although a bit tight around the bust and underarm on the sleeveless side. What I liked the least is that it shows all the imperfections of my gut- definitely need Spanx in order to look sleek.
I rented this for an embassy event - it was comfortable, classy, and a little sexy! I got tons of compliments and would definitely rent again!
Great fit all over

I loved how unique this dress felt (for me). The midsection and lower is super stretchy and I wish I had sized down. Wore a 6, but a 4 would've been been- note I'm normally a 6 or sometimes even 8 depending on the designer/fit. Only bummer was the hang tags kept wanting to stick out and were rather annoying. If you rent this just tape or pin them down inside. Also, this has clearly not been the dresses first rental as there were numerous "piling" spots on the back. I rocked it anyway.

links_reviews_title: Great for wedding or other special occasions
links_reviews_text: #wedding #weddingoutfit

So happy with this one. Hides stomach so if feeling a little big it will help cover your body perfect, very flattering. Love the shine, not too shiny though. Great quality and SO soft and comfortable. Can dance all night long in it
The material for this dress is so soft, and light! It was easy to wear, looked great, and even better - I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: LOVED this. Shiny and so flattering
links_reviews_text: SO flattering, stretchy, shiny, comfortable! So may compliments

I was worried that this material would show every nook and cranny but it was surprisingly flattering. The fabric is a fine pattern of metallic and black rather than a flat metallic, which would have been more likely to accentuate my insecurities. I thought i would have to wear shapewear but the ruching at the waist gave me a perfect waistline but hid my post-partum lower belly. I would have worn this if my second dress wasn't such a knockout.

links_reviews_title: I love the easiness of it all. I was glad the dress that I chose actually looked like I expected
links_reviews_text: This dress was awesome. It fit perfectly
Just an FYI to some people if they are not aware, designer clothes run small. The dress was nice, and I like it a lot, I received many compliments with the dress.

This dress is easy to wear and looks great. It's simple so you can add statement jewelry to glam it up. The length is also great. I am under 5 ft and did not have any issues walking in this with 4 in heels.

links_reviews_title: Heavy fabric that didn't flow as I hoped
links_reviews_text: I was very excited about this dress, but the fabric was heavy and didn't flow well for the style. It also ran quite large.

I'm 5'9" 145lbs Ds. This dress is beautiful. Well made. Comfy. Stretchy material. Amazing. I ordered the 2 and 4. I wore the 2. I probably could have warn the 4 cause of the stretchy material. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Complete elegance!! This dress draws attention from the way it flows when you walk, it was stunning!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress all evening. It is beautiful!! I'd definitely rent it again! The top of the dress fit slightly too large, and I'm busty on top (34DDD), so I was surprised by that. But the length was perfect with a 3.5 inch heel for me. When you sit, the slit rises quite high, so if you're wearing shape wear, take that into consideration. For an evening of sitting and dancing, it was VERY comfortable, the material is very giving and moves with you.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was semi-formal. I got tons of complements and I felt glamorous.
links_reviews_text: I am clearly a curvy woman but active. Wore strapless bra and support hose, no other shapewear (but that would have been better). This dress is flattering on a curvy body. I was comfortable, did not have to tug. I am short and I did need to wear a heel, 2" was OK, higher would have been better. Great quality fabric that drapes.
I wore this for a black tie summer affair and received tons of compliments on it. It's true to size and also pretty forgiving with some stretch to the fabric. I'd absolutely rent this dress again.

I did not want to wear this dress but my fianc√© insisted I wear this "so we match"...I got SO many compliments and a nice "I told you so" from the boy haha...So many people told me it was the prettiest dress at the wedding (aside from the brides, obvi) and I felt v comfortable and pretty in it. (A little big in the chest area so a padded strapless is sort of necessary if you're on the flatter side)

links_reviews_title: Great dress, just a little long!
links_reviews_text: I was into this dress! I wore it to officiate my best friend's wedding and it was perfect. I got tons of compliments and felt great. My only issue is that it was a little long. I'm 5' 2" and I wore heels but it was still too long for dancing, I had to change dresses for the reception. But overall I really liked it!!

links_reviews_title: This dress will make you look like a Greek Goddess.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress as the Mother of the Groom for an outdoor, summer wedding. I received lots of compliments. The dress of wonderfully comfortable, elegant, and photographed extremely well. The cape billowed lightly in the breeze which looked gorgeous in the photos. I loved wearing this dress. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô 5‚Äù, approx 220, larger chest.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress after another RTR dress did not work out. I was able to try it on in a store before renting it, and found that the 2R was TTS (I'm usually between a 2-4) and was the perfect length (it would probably be long for most women, though, as I'm 5'8" and wore 3" heels!). I loved the fit and style--the fabric was not too heavy (a requirement for a spring wedding in Houston) and the cape-like detail added the perfect touch of funk and style. I was able to wear sticky boobs and had no issues with the dress throughout the evening. Got tons of compliments and felt beautiful!
At 7 months pregnant, this dress was comfortable and attractive for my formal event. I received many compliments. I'd recommend.
Love this dress. I wore it for a fashionweek party. I received a lot of compliments on the color and the fit from many people.

links_reviews_title: Was to big in the upper chest for me
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress on, but needed a smaller size

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous cape, but does not work for pear-shaped petites
links_reviews_text: This is beautiful, but it is not designed for pear shapes. The cape is really stunning, and the 2P worked well length-wise (5'2"). However, this was big in the bust (32A), did not come in at the waist, and was snug in the rear. Pear shaped petite, skip this one. Lanky apple or athletic ladies may really enjoy this one!
It was really flattering bit I felt like it needed to be a less formal event to wear this.

links_reviews_title: The color was so gorgeous! It is a beautiful dress for someone over 60!
links_reviews_text: First of all, it is a spectacularly subtle looking gown. It was, however, too large in the bust and about 2 inches too long even with 3 inch heels. I tucked it in the bust area but it was a problem most of the night that I just dealt with. I did get a lot of compliments on it, it's gorgeous and the waterfall little addition to the back is a killer. I would definitely rent it again (in a smaller size) and I think it would be perfect. I'm 64 years old, 5'6 and 125 lbs. My normal size is a 6.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but runs big and doesn't feel expensive

links_reviews_text: This dress looked really beautiful on me. I normally wear a size too but after reading reviews I thought maybe I should order a size 4. However after trying on the dress it would have definitely looked more stunning in my normal size. I still got a lot of compliments even though it was a little looser.I'm 5'4" weight 114lbs and 34B.
The dress would have been perfect however it was too small in the hip area and I was not able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a wedding and tried both the 2 & 4 both were too big, especially around the middle
links_reviews_text: Poorly cut so it‚Äôs tight in the leg and tight enough in the bust but huge amounts of fabric around the middle, like a maternity dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful! The cape like flair on the back made it particularly noticeable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable. Maybe a little loose on the top left side (the shoulderless side), but also could have picked a better bra for underneath. Very nice material and fun to dance in.

I really like this dress! I was a little nervous after reading the other reviews thinking it would be too clingy, but it's not too clingy for me (and I don't have the type of body that looks good in clingy things usually). The dress is stretchy and fit me about like I expected. You likely will need spanx if you want to be completely smooth, but that's to be expected in most fitted gowns.
Color is more blue than gray. It looks like a costume.

links_reviews_title: The event is tonight. I am returning the dress before the event.
links_reviews_text: It is made of a clingy jersey. It is cut straight, runs small and hugs curves while gapping at the waist. It shows pantyhose seams, as well. The light blue tends to be more of a pale periwinkle. Order a size up.
Fits well but the material shows every lump, bump, and fabric wrinkle. Not for me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for Day or Night
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress wine tasting in Napa on cool 60 degree day. It was very comfortable and flattering. Could be easily paired with a jacket or belt. Loved!
Rented this dress for a work meeting and absolutely loved it. Great fit and fun print. Will definitely rent again for another event

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel beautiful.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful! It is so feminie and romantic. I would say it runs a little small, since I usually wear a 4 and the 6R fit me perfectly. It is a little low cut. I absolutely love this dress and would wear it again and again.
not too low cut, slimming

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Great fit, loved the way it flowed. It has a bit of cleavage but I used fashion tape. I wore it for my birthday and I felt gorgeous!

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner in December, so the sleeves, length, and color were perfect! I didn't care much for the frill around the waist and ended up tucking it in to the band to hide it. Still loved it and got lots of compliments!
I absolutely love this but it does run on the smaller side. The 14 was a snug fit, especially in the chest. I am heavy chested... it fit really well everywhere else though!
Dress arrived in great condition. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7 135lbs & wore a 6. Very flattering! Liked the ruffling around the waiste and interesting cut at the bottom. This dress looked great with boots too!

Very plungey! Safety pinned the back to adjust amount of cleavage. It fits the tightest at the chest, where the zipper is. Was a little work to zip it up. That said, roomy around the waist while still giving nice definition. The fit is imperfect but still looked great and was comfortable enough.

links_reviews_title: Fun for a low key baby shower
links_reviews_text: Winter florals with a+ cleavage. Just my style. LOTS of ruffles, but didn't make me feel like a cake.

The fit of this dress is definitely more forgiving that flattering. The ruffles below the bust obscure the waistline which is great if you want to have a big meal in it, but not so great if you want to appear to have a shape. Fabric feels really lovely and luxurious and the print is really beautiful. Length was somewhere between midi and maxi on me ( I'm a little over 5'5").
Very flattering fit, great dress for a tall 6

This dress is perfect for a dinner date because there is a slight overlay under the bust. It wasn't unflattering, though because it's got a built-in elastic. No Spanx needed in this dress! If you're busty, the dress will show lots of cleavage (as you can see), but I was still able to wear a plunge bra without it showing. I'm 5'7" and this was a midi length but worked with heels. Wouldn't recommend for flats.
perfect for dinner date to girls brunch

links_reviews_title: So pretty, fun and comfortable! Perfect winter date night dress!
links_reviews_text: Wort this to a company dinner on my husband's work trip. It was very comfortable and flattering and pretty, received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: It is such a lovely pattern and style. Very chic.
links_reviews_text: It is very beautiful and I enjoyed wearing it. It was very flattering for my figure.

I loved this dress soooo much I really want to keep it. I wore it a few different times - for going out with boots, date night with strappy heels, and casual hopping around town with white vans. All times looked and felt amazing and got a ton of compliments! I will definitely rent this baby again!

links_reviews_title: It was really sexy while being really pretty. It is very low cut - for me - so either flaunt or not.
links_reviews_text: The image was more drapey where i styled this more form fitting, which worked really well for my figure.
Dress is stunning and super flattering, but runs small. Zipper got up with help but was unable to zip up all the way by myself
Loved this dress. High quality. Fit my body perfectly.

I love this dress. It's got a dark boho vibe that went great with my tall gray Frye boots. The front is low cut, but easily pinned or taped if you're feeling semi-modest. The side zipper is a little tricky, but manageable. The best part is the feather peplum element, which is great if you're feeling self-conscious about your stomach.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so flattering and fit perfectly. Puff sleeve detail was another great addition.
links_reviews_text: Loved the criss cross at the front too. I got so many compliments

I had my engagement dinner in this and loved it. I am generally a 2 in other brands but always a 4 in ALC. I think you could totally wear this dress to a wedding! I loved the way everything hung and the plunge was not very deep!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a baby shower
links_reviews_text: Beautiful flowing dress. I should have taken a picture. So many compliments!

Loved this dress! Wore it to a friends engagement party and felt immediately done without much effort. Simple black pump and gold earrings is all you need + a little sticky tape to make sure the girls don't come out to party.
Ended up not wearing it as it was too low for what I was comfortable with for work.
Low cut, had to wear a cami underneath for work. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, great look for everyday or a low-key event
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! I wanted to get outside my comfort zone a bit, and this dress was perfect. It's VERY true to size, this is a 4 to the T, but definitely has room in the sleeves and skirt but the bodice zips RIGHT up nice and snug. I would recommend sizing up if you are unsure just because of how close the zipper zips up, and it's a loose fit anyway. It's definitely more low cut than I anticipated, I still wore it to work but my work environment is VERY casual. Perfect for a casual day at the office if you need to go somewhere after work. So cute!!!

This dress totally exceeded expectations and looks much better in person and on! I already really love this brand, so that helped in terms of knowing what size to get, but the length is great and the pattern is beautiful. The silhouette is very flattering and loved the flow and movement of the dress. Got a lot of compliments on it and would definitely recommend or rent again!
I didn't wind up wearing this because I thought it looked frumpy on me. The print and fabric are pretty, but the cut is a little mother of the bride.
The dress was great and could easily be dressed up or dressed down. The zipper though... be prepared to spend a few minutes zipping it up. Not the easiest thing to get on.

I usually love ALC, but between the pattern of this dress (it reminded me of curtains from the 90s), the low neckline, and the large waist, it just was a HUGE NO for me. If the pattern were different and the fit a bit more streamlined, I might like it better.

I'd say this dress was a generous true to size, slightly big/loose but not terribly so. Beautiful fabric but I didn't love the print. I wore it with knee high black boots and silver jewelry for a less dressy look. I would rent this again.
It fit fine I just thought the style was unappealing

Marchesa‚Äôs fabric is beautiful. I am usually a size 4 but this did run tight around the hips for those pear-shaped people like myself. As mentioned before the shoulders do you fall down a little bit if you‚Äôre not sitting up perfectly straight but they don‚Äôt fall down when you‚Äôre standing. It was a beautiful dress for a special occasion highly recommend it especially for a fall or winter event

I'm typically a size 8/10 so I ordered in both. The 8 was a little difficult to zip up past my rib cage, although it fit everywhere else. I ended up selecting the size 10 and LOVE IT! It fits perfectly!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this!
links_reviews_text: Like a glove!

This dress is absolutely beautiful. I got several compliments from other attendees of the SF Ballet production of the Nutcracker. Runs large and kind of long, ideal for special occasions where you don't want to be over the top or sexy but still feminine.
Great dress! Received lots of compliments! The subtle glitter in the pattern was a great touch.
Really liked this dress. Fit well. The back is beautiful.

4 stars only because the sleeves of the dress slipped down (a bit too big on top) and about an inch longer in length than I would have liked. Otherwise, a beautiful dress with enough room in the hips for my pear shape.
The detailing is beautiful and not truly shown in a photo. Compliments all night! Fit perfectly. Only thing to change is the skirt part ...it could benefit from a slit to make walking more natural.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Lots of compliments. Excellent quality.
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress. I have small shoulders so I needed to safety pin the dress to my bra straps to keep shoulder area of dress from falling down. Worked like a charm. No one noticed anything. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I felt really pretty in this dress. Formal but with a cabaret flair, yet comfortable.
links_reviews_text: As other renters have said the cap sleeves did fall down my arms a bit, but with a bit of fabric tape that problem was solved. I was able to dance and run around all night. Loved the dress and would rent it again.
The shape of this dress was lovely and form fitting (but not tight). The lace detail was gorgeous and the cut was just right. Loved this dress

Pretty dress. Flattering cut and comfortable. My biggest complaint and the reason I wouldn't rent this dress again is that because of the way the dress is cut the shoulders completely fall off and not in a sexy way... in a this dress isn't working I look sloppy kind of way. Shoulders falling off of me is not an issue I've had before so I'd say this is a design problem not a me problem.
Even though the color of the dress is beautiful I Didn't end up wearing this dress. The shoulder was tight and the hip area was a bit loose.

This would be perfect for someone taller. I'm 5'2" so this fell well below my knees and was a bit low cut fit the event I was going to so I wore something else. Gorgeous dress though and I would consider wearing in the future!

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments. Confortable and elegant!
links_reviews_text: True size and comfortable

The size 12 was a tight squeeze for me but did fit. The dress was beautifully made, but it was more modest than I wanted and just not the right fit for what I was going for. Also, the sleeves kept falling down which would have made it uncomfortable for an entire evening.

links_reviews_title: Stand out in the crowd dress
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress! Felt classy and sophisticated all night and my husband LOVED this dress on me!

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR dresses ever!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely gorgeous in person! I wore to a cocktail party fundraiser and got so many compliments! The only downside for me with the fit was it was a bit big in the shoulders but I do have more of a narrow frame but other than that it was perfect! I highly recommend!
Fit like a glove. Recommend sizing up. Dress is quite fitted and a bit uncomfortable, but looks beautiful!!!
As many of the reviews say, this dress is infinitely more beautiful in person! Fit perfectly, loved the classy length (not too short) and the pop of sparkle in the detailing. 10/10 will rent again!
I'm tall and this dress was the perfect length. I wore it to work on Valentine's Day and got so many compliments. It could get a little itchy around the neck at times, but it was totally worth it!

This is a lovely dress - a nice shade of red with a nude underlay. There are scattered sequins that give off a subtle gold sparkle. The neckline is pretty without being too revealing. The dress definitely hugs curves - I wore spanx underneath. On my dress, a bit of lace on the right arm had separated and a previous renter had tacked it down with a small safety pin - hopefully RTR will repair this! The lace on the shoulders/arms is a little scratchy, but after a few minutes, I didn't notice. The skirt doesn't have a slit so I had to vault myself into the Dodge Ram truck that was our Uber ride :) I am 9 weeks post-partum and between an 8 and a 10 depending on style. The 8 fit very nicely and the 10 was a little bigger but didn't look horribly baggy - my husband thought the 8 looked better so I went with it. I liked being able to wear a normal bra with it. I was able to stand, walk, sit, and eat (a lot!) in comfort. It wasn't too hot or too cold. Overall, a beautiful dress, perfect for the holidays. I recommend this dress!
I got so many compliments on this dress! It was so beautiful!
Pros: I received complements from everyone at the wedding. The lace and beading looks elegant. It looked great on my older mature body. Cons: Form fitted, so have a Spanx ready.
Delicate in its features, this dress was a show stopper! Want to stand out..? Rent this dress! True to size!

links_reviews_title: A lovely dress makes a special event even better!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress - it was a perfect dress for a holiday party- what made this dress special is the colors of the lace overlay and a hint of sequin for that subtle sparkle- loved it!
It was overall a beautiful dress, but I should have ordered 4.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a black tie gala and it stood out from the crowd!
links_reviews_text: This dress was truly stunning! It was formal enough for a black tie gala, and I got so many compliments. The lace floral details are beautiful. Would highly recommend this dress.
I got compliments on this dress all night. It fit true to size and looked amazing. I wish I could have kept it.

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect ! I rented it for a fall wedding . Loved it !
links_reviews_text: This dress fits pretty much true to size . ( a little snug in waist ) I normally wear a 10 and that was the size I wore in this dress. I loved this dress ! Lots of compliments on it!

The fabric and intricate pattern on this dress are beautiful. There is also a slight pop of shine from well-placed sequins throughout the dress. The only downside to this fabric is it is fairly itchy, especially around the arm area. My usual size fit OK, but was very tight in the waist. The shoulders were slightly big on me as well, so this may be better suited for more of an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Just right for a fall bridal shower
links_reviews_text: I was worried at first about a black and red dress formy wedding shower but I Loved this dress and got a million compliments. It fit like a glove and I could even wear a nude tone bra. I am 5'4 and 137 in this picture and the size 4 was just perfect!

I rented this dress for my brother's wedding which was at a distillery. I ordered a size 6 & 8. I wore the size 8 because it was more comfortable in the bust and hips area. I got many compliments! My only issue was that the sleeve area kept falling down. I pinned the sleeves up and no one could tell.

The dress is beautifully made. No give on the material, so it was extremely snug when sitting down & walking up & down stairs. The top has A LOT of room & the shoulders were large for me. I ended up pinning it to my bra straps to stop it from falling.

links_reviews_title: I felt so glamorous <3 Burgundy/wine not red, my moniter showed red for the flowers.
links_reviews_text: It was a beautiful dress! I did Love it. I am very busty so it was a touch risque for a church wedding, lol I did it anyway. I paired it with a restored vintage mink wrap, lots and lots and lots of compliments.
Fit perfect!

This dress fit snugly and works great with an hourglass figure. It was a little snug in the chest for me (I'm busty - 34F according to a proper fitting), so my boobs flattened more than they should have, but it was comfortable and I got lots of compliments from other wedding guests. This was also perfect for a chilly night, as it's a bit of a heavier material with the lining and lace topping, so it worked well with stockings and a wrap on a cool spring night. I would rent it again for the right occasion.

This dress is GORGEOUS. It was very flattering on my curves. I was a bit self-conscious that it was too low cut and revealing for the event (political fundraiser with two senators), but I got dozens of compliments. I will say the dress doesn't have a lot of give because of the applique and type of fabric. The top was a bit big on me, but the hips were the perfect size. I paired this dress with black pointy-toed heels, a tan clutch and black flower earrings. This was my favorite RTR rental so far!

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Runs true to size. Sleeves are little scratchy.
links_reviews_text: Stunning, flattering dress. Embroidery is more purple-pinkish rather than red. This dress runs true to size. I rented my usual size 10 and it fit like a glove (for reference, I am 5'8", 155 lbs, 36C). If my chest was any larger, I would have needed to go up one size. The only drawback is that the sleeves are a little scratchy, but the beauty of this dress more than makes up for that.
Absolutely adored this piece! I wore this to a charity gala and received so many compliments. A very elegant cocktail dress that's modest in length but still beautiful and classy. Highly recommend.
I just loved this dress. The fabric was so flowy. I wore it to dinner one night on vacation in Puerto Rico. Love it!!!
this dress is so striking! the draping is so beautiful. it's a very ethereal look. i paired with nude flats and a mary chain. i have a list of 'greatest hits' from RTR and this instantly won a spot.
This runs huge and is very sheer, even with the slip under it. Paired it with denim for a fun boho look.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bachelorette weekend in Asheville, NC. It was perfect, considering the weather!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, perfect sleeve size/length, cute for a mountain weekend bachelorette party, I did not go wrong with this one and everyone loved it. It was a different look, but overall did not disappoint.

This dress is so beautiful! The material is just polyester but it‚Äôs finished in really gorgeous gauze texture, and it‚Äôs just a puffy light dream. A tiny quibble is that the cuffs don‚Äôt have buttons so they are sort of needlessly loose and baggy. Also, even with the slip it‚Äôs still pretty sheer - I wore with dark tights and you could see the waistband through the slip and dress, especially in certain lights. Didn‚Äôt bother me but could be an issue for some. Fit is totally unstructured so I think most people could go up or down a size or two without too much of a problem.
You have to be very tall to pull this one off.

links_reviews_title: Nice, but a bit costume-y, and see through
links_reviews_text: If this is your style you'll probably love it. It's very nice! Just be sure to have the right undergarments on hand because it is very see through.
Flowy and light, so perfect for spring or summer. Really big but not dumpy at all. Looks great with high heeled cowboy boots or wedges. Will rent again for sure!
Dress is gorgeous but runs a bit large.

links_reviews_title: Not great for Apple bottom girls ;)
links_reviews_text: There is very little stretch to the fabric, causing a strange pocket of frantic to pooch out over the stomach and booty. To be fair, I have a man extreme Apple shape, probably wearing a 2 on top and 6 on bottom. It's a good thing I had a small chest as well, as the top fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Tiny and boxy at the same time
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress but don't think it matches my body type (straight/slim). Its also tight and the fabric is heavy as hell so not even sure how curvier girls could put this on either. I only wore it bc my backup dress was way too tight and they didn't have the bigger size available. It's a true mermaid style so super snug at the legs; just something to think about when considering it for events. I looked like an expensive candy cane and it made for nice pictures!

I received so many compliments with this dress. Perfect for the holidays! It's interesting some reviews said the top ran small because it was a bit large on me and I'm a C cup. I was super comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: Love it! Hugs your body like a glove
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! Shows your body in a good way! Hugs all curves showing an hourglass body! I definitely runs a bit small but it's not impossible to wear it

links_reviews_title: Amazing style and material. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I adored this dress. The cut, color, and material were amazing. It was tight around my ribcage for sure. Don't hold in a sneeze! But otherwise, looked great and I felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! It was so unique and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Strapless always gives me a hard time. I hard to keep pulling it up all night, but oh well.

Definitely size up in this dress. I wear a 4 or 6 typically and had to wear a size 8. I loved how unique this dress was and got a lot of compliments! The top of the bow kept flopping over so I got double sided tape to keep it up. Was able to dance in this and have fun. An elegant and sassy dress.
No disappointment

For a short person, obviously consider that it will look longer on you than the model! But not impossibly so. I wore short-ish strappy heels but could have worn flats without it brushing the ground. I rented this for a Fourth of July weekend black tie optional wedding, so the colors, small stripes, and the ribbon felt kind of right thematically, like being a fun pinwheel, but they're not loud or distracting (the red is a little more wine red and understated). A normal strapless bra and normal underwear both worked with it fine. It is pretty form-fitting if you choose your smallest size, but was comfortable for eating and dancing. One of my fave rentals so far.

links_reviews_title: Such a unique and fabulous dress ... slightly weird fit though
links_reviews_text: Definitely an odd fit on this, though it seemed to work ok for my body. It is slightly big in the hips/butt area, but narrow in the waist/rib cage. Was a tad big in the chest area, but I also have a lack of bust so that was expected. Definitely get a backup size with this. Still loved wearing it though
Absolutely adored this dress. It was a bit small and not stretchy so recommend sizing up. It was so comfortable and fun to wear. Endless compliments!

links_reviews_title: Love the quality and quickness of RTR.
links_reviews_text: This dress was extraordinary!! STUNNING. #elegant #classystyle

I'm 5'3, 125lbs and hippy. I'm typically between a 4-6, the 4 was a struggle to get over my hips/bootie, the 6 was comfortable with some wiggle room. The dress was perfect for the derby event...I received numerous compliments on it.

This is a beautiful dress with lovely material. I was worried it would be hot or uncomfortable for an Atlanta wedding but it was not at all. I also loved that it is a bit different for a black tie optional affair. I stood out in a good way! I was a bit worried about renting this due to reviews mentioning fit issues, and sadly they were correct. I am a true size 4, 5'7", and have never had to size up. The 4 fit reasonably well in the hips, but was way too tight in the ribcage. It was like I was trying to bind my chest. So I sized up to the 6, which was annoyingly loose around the hips (not showing off my figure), but fit up top. However once I started dancing in the reception, it felt like the dress was slipping down. It wasn't super comfortable to dance in. I didn't wear a strapless bra so that might have made it more snug. Also, I was somewhat happy that the 6 fit better because the tie fabric detail on the 4 was not sitting right, exposing the white lining underneath, and would have needed to be pressed. Overall, I'm happy I rented this dress and liked the look but wish it was made to fit better and probably wouldn't rent it again.
I could have worn the 4R but I went w the 6 so I could eat-lol! Great fit very flattering, more of a burgundy color than red, lots of compliments!

This dress is classy and sophisticated - I did have to use some double sided tape to hold up the twist - I almost bought it considering the great price now but since I plastered it all over my Instagram already - I decided against it! Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress but wore another instead because my hubby preferred the other dress I rented.
links_reviews_text: I'm pretty petite - 5'1 and worried the length would be weird but it wasn't. The hip area had a little extra room and the bust area was a bit tight and hard to zip (I'm small chested) but it woulda stayed in place all night. Color is more rust- almost brown, rather than red.
Love the dress but the zipper is no good . Run a lil small in the top .

Beautiful dress! I received so many compliments in it. The fabric is very high quality and looks great in pictures. However, it runs very small in the waist area. I have a wider rib cage and needed more give in that area. I am usually always a size 4 and can even fit a size 2 on some occasions, but it took 2 to 3 people to help zip the size 6 dress up. I found the biggest difference between the size 4 and 6 was in the hip area and not much difference in the waist, which is what I needed. Overall, it was a beautiful dress, but if you have a wider rib cage like me then you'll definitely have to go up in your usual size.

links_reviews_title: I loved looking like a candy cane as I attended the Nutcracker w/ my sisters
links_reviews_text: The dress fabric is of high quality, however it does not give at all. You will need to send this dress over your head, so don't do your hair prior to diving in. I also 100% sizing up. I needed TWO extra pairs of hands including my own to drive up the zipper. That all being said, the dress is stunning and playful at the same time. I wore the dress to a formal affair, the Seattle Nutcracker, and received compliments from perfect strangers. The bow in front was a fun embellishment. I do recommend this dress, just know you may need help getting into it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! It runs really small.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got tons of compliments! I will say that it runs really small. I am admittedly a large 2. I read other reviews so I would have ordered the 2 and the 4, but the 4 wasn't available so I ordered the 6. I think the 4 would have zipped but would have been pretty tight. The 2 was no where close to zipping. Even being a larger 2, I was surprised at how far off it was. Great dress!! Just size up, for sure.

All the reviews are right- it runs small. I'm a reliable 4 and went with the 6 and it fit my bust great. Unfortunately it bunches up right above the booty, so curvy girls rent with caution. It wasn't incredibly noticeable but I knew and that was enough. All else though it's a great material that's a bit thick so it smooths everything out. Great for the cocktail party.

links_reviews_title: Get Your Spanx Ready! Make it Double Spanx!
links_reviews_text: Very form-fitting, not what I ended up choosing because I wanted to have fun, relax, and breath normally without worrying about my tum hanging out. Pretty fabric, for as expected (true to size), great bow and cut in back. I just didn't feel like having to work that hard all night!
This dress was great! Fabric is awesome and was comfortable. I received compliments all night long! I probably could of sized down but the 10 wasn't available.

links_reviews_title: Felt festive at a holiday soir√©e!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear size 2, but the 2 was a bit tight. I went with the 4 so I could be more comfortable, but the dress wasn't super comfortable overall. I wouldn't buy it, but it was a great option for the purpose of the event. It didn't give me a huge range of motion, but it was great for photos and was a big hit as it matched my fianc√©es bow tie. We were the candy cane lane couple!
Stunning dress! DEFINITELY runs small! Size up! Received numerous compliments throughout the night...

The dress was stunning. Thick fabric, little to no wrinkles. The 6 felt great all over, just a little tight in the bust. I considered the 8 for this reason, but it was waaaay too big up top- so I went braless in the 6 and everything was fine! If you have a bigger chest, just go up for your back up size. Overall, I felt beautiful and comfortable. My husband said people were even going up to him to complement the dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing! Great color and fit!!!
links_reviews_text: Such an amazing dress! It runs small but thanks to RTR, I had the next size up! I hated to return it but RTR made that so easy!
Overall, it was a great dress. It was comfortable to dance in, and I received compliment all night.

Gorgeous dress! Very nice quality fabric. It does run small like other reviews say... I usually wear a 4 and the 6 was perfect. They didn't have any other sizes available for the day of my event so I just prayed it fit. Haha I couldn't imagine squeezing into a 4 if I had the option, and an 8 would have probably been a bit big. So I got lucky!! Got lots of compliments all night! I had to tape the fabric to my body at the top, or else it would have flapped down all night. But superb choice all around!
This dress was so pretty! Received so many compliments! It's tight around the chest, but that was perfect as I wasn't tugging on it all night!

This dress was very high quality fabric and traveled so well. It was a little tight in the stomach area but nothing terrible. This was a show stopper dress for a cocktail attire wedding and I loved wearing it! I also was 3 month post baby and it fit really flattering for my shape.

links_reviews_title: Compliments as soon as I got to the wedding!
links_reviews_text: Good fit!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for an amazing venue
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm between a 4 and 6 usually but I ordered a 6 and 8 due to all the reviews and the 6 fit perfectly other than a little squeezing of the girls (but I have a wide back. Dress was easy to walk and dance in. I received compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I got a million compliments from everybody at the wedding!
links_reviews_text: Was a little lose on the hips.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique and perfect for the occasion
links_reviews_text: I went out of my comfort zone with this dress for a wedding reception on a yacht. It was perfect for the occasion and I had many compliments on it. It‚Äôs well made and true to size.
Truly enjoyed this dress. It was comfortable and it had thick material. I received a ton of compliments as well. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was classy and fun!
links_reviews_text: I probably should have gone with the 8, since the 10 was a little bit big. The top kept sliding down despite the rubbery hem at the top. However, I was very comfortable eating and drinking all night!

I wore this dress to an awards dinner held by my husband's employers. My usual dress size is an 8. The dress was fitted up top, and tight in the hips. I had to opt for the 10, which was slightly larger in the bust, but was not tight in the hips. I received numerous compliments on the dress! No one else had a dress like this at the event. I felt very comfortable and elegant in the dress. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this fun dress!!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a black tie wedding! The for was pretty good... I just had a baby so was tight in the breast area but looked amazing!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for wine tasting and a beautiful outdoor lunch in Spain. It was perfect for the day.
links_reviews_text: I listened to the other reviewers and wore it with a cami so that I could enjoy the day without being worried about showing too much. I'm small chested, so not a big deal for me anyway. It was very comfortable and light. It definitely wrinkles, so if that bothers you, choose another dress. For the record I'm 5'9" and by this time in the trip was about 180lb.

I loved this dress. It was very flattering and comfortable. It was perfect for a summer wedding where I wanted to be a little more conservative. After renting another wrap dress, I did pin it at the bust and hips, just to ensure I didn't have a wardrobe malfunction when dancing. It was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Nice, comfortable, lightweight fabric, and classy!
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3‚Äù, 125lbs and I wore a size xs, because it fit better in the shoulders than the small. Material was light and cool. The dress length came to my mid-calf, which as perfect for an evening wedding. I would recommend wearing a cami for modesty purposes. Because this dress is a real wrap, you will definitely need a slip to wear underneath.
This dress is beautiful. Can be low cut; but easily pin-able. I wore this on a date night with the hubs & to my sons graduation. Got tons of compliments; :)

links_reviews_title: Great for the May wedding and flattering around my waist!
links_reviews_text: Since it is a wrap dress I had to watch for the skirt because it was windy out, but very comfortable to sit and dance in. The neckline was very low for me so I had to watch for my bra to pop out. I wore a regular bra and it worked but I would consider wearing some other type of bra to account for the low neckline.

This dress is super cute on! Fits really well too. 2 things to keep in mind. The front of the dress wrinkles really easy so just be careful and if you have young kids please be sure to wear something under. The dress folds over in the front so when sitting this dress can easily expose you. Over all I am very happy with this dress
This made a perfect Easter dress. It is extremely low cut. I pinned it. I got so many compliments. Love the material and length.

I rented this for a birthday and Easter. It was a nice wrap dress and flowed well. I like the pattern and got lots of compliments. I had to wear it with a tank top though as it showed too much otherwise. Would rent again.

Fits true to size, except maybe the length. It is longer than what it looks like on the model. I am 5'4'', 120 lbs, so I'm sure the model in the picture is just very tall. Overall, I loved this dress, and really considered buying it!
This dress felt amazing on & was very flattering. I did need fashion tape to keep "the girls" from popping out of the dress. I'd definitely rent again.
This dress was perfect for a church event and reception afterward. For was perfect on me, very classy style.

links_reviews_title: great dress, needed safety pins though
links_reviews_text: I had to pin the dress in the chest because the snap would keep opening up. I also pinned the bottom so that the wind wouldn't open up the dress.

links_reviews_title: The top was too big, but the wrap tie was too short so it wouldn‚Äôt wrap correctly.
links_reviews_text: The overall fit of this dress was off. I am a small 36D and even with a thin bra needed a cami. The dress didn‚Äôt fit well and I couldn‚Äôt get it to wrap properly. A pin in the top didn‚Äôt even help the fit. The snap wouldn‚Äôt stay snapped due to it‚Äôs location on the dress. I don‚Äôt know if I got a miss sized dress, but this felt small and did nothing for me.
Loved this dress. Style was very flattering. Silk fabric soft and perfectly draped. Chest is a bit wide, so needed fashion tape to keep from flashing people.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but bring a safety pin!
links_reviews_text: Super cute and flowy. True to size. Felt cute in it all day. The only complaint I had was that because it's a wrap dress, you had to be careful with it flipping open in the front. I wore this to a work event where I had to move around a lot so I had to constantly hold it closed. I also had to pin the top so that I didn't have too much cleavage.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress it was super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable but SUPER low cut. I had to pin the top to make it more appropriate. Runs small in the shoulder/bust area.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful outdoor wedding in a flowy, easy to move in dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a backyard September wedding. It was a little long, but because of the "high low" fit, it looked fine. I'm 5'1" with a larger chest and it fit great at the top. Just don't wear a super full coverage bra with it or it will show on the sides. I wore low heel sandals and it did not drag on the ground or anything. If it's really cold, this dress won't keep you too warm. I brought a scarf with me for later. Overall, really liked it!

links_reviews_title: Looked great and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, comfortable and sexy. I am really sorry I don't have a full length photo to share, but this is the best I could do for now. I would recommend wearing a cami underneath because the little button in front does come undone. So glad I thought to do this or I'd be showing off a little too much if you know what I mean.
The silk the dress is made of feels incredible. The print was gorgeous and the warp around fit flattering. I felt beautiful wearing this dress. I liked the length as well. Great dress.
Got loads of compliments in this dress. Really summery, light and flowey. Loved it and was perfect for vacation
Love the length & fit. Light & airy material. Cleavage was on display but not too much. I felt elegant & would rent it again.

I loved the pattern and the material - very soft and comfy. Even though this was an XL, there was no way my boobs were going to fit into this without an cami. It was a true wrap dress, so I had to wear a under skirt as well to prevent flashing people all night. Fun dress fro casual wedding, fit was a little too small.

I was surprised how perfect this dress fit me - I wore a deep V bra that fit the shape of the dress so nothing was hanging out. The snap button did unsnap a couple times but it wasn't a huge issue. I wore this while on vacation in Boston and the wind did pick up the skirt a few times so I was a bit self-conscious about flashing the world so I had to keep one hand down to the side to hold the skirt down. Next time, I'll try some fashion tape to hold it down (wouldn't want to ruin the dress with a pin). Still, I loved the dress - the print is beautiful and the fabric is so light-weight - perfect for summer!

Flattering on an athletic body type and especially with blondes. I have small hips, wide shoulders, and a small bust. A XS was comfortable on my frame. The only downside was that it's low cut and I had to pin the bust together. My husband and friends loved it... I might end up purchasing it...

Pretty dress, was low cut but not as bad as other wrap dresses I've worn. I did not need to safety pin. Light material (is prone to wrinkling) great for summer. Really loved the color and feminine pattern.
Wore this to a political event. Great summer dress
x
I loved this flirty wrap dress. I recommend having some fashion tape on hand for the cleavage area. Otherwise it fit perfectly.
This dress is so pretty and just feels great. Plan on wearing a cami underneath unless you are comfortable with letting it all hang out!!

I wore this to work and to a gradution event and it was stunning. I got so many compliments. The fabric was even ok on a very hot day. The length was perfect tea length on my 5'9" frame. I had to pin the front closed because I'm busty and the snap didn't work well. I will definitely rent this one again.

Rented this dress for my sister-in-law's bridal shower. It was a 100+ degree day and this silk was light a breezy. The v-neck was a bit low for my liking so I used a small safety pin to keep it shut. The navy lining sometimes hung lower than the actual dress... which was odd since they were sewn together. All in all, it was a beautiful dress and it fit the bill for what I needed. Would definitely rent it again!! LOVE Yumi Kim's designs.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric and print; I wanted to love this dress...
links_reviews_text: I rented it for a daytime bridal shower. There was zero way this dress was going to fit my chest and the little snap they have on it is laughable. I'm a 38C and ended up wearing the backup size of XL and still I had to wear a tank under and keep the front open. It also is a true wrap dress so ended up pinning the skirt to keep from flashing people with the breeze. It still was very pretty and I received multiple compliments, but I was annoyed that it was so slim through the bust. I loved the length and the fabric is dreamy though.
Great dress, easy to wear and very comfortable. Did easily wrinkle! All in all a great rental.
Material is ever so light but doesn't highlight flaws. Also doesn't blow open like many wrap dresses do

This dress was so comfortable, and I got several compliments on it. It's a bit longer than what the picture makes it seem (hit me mid calf, I'm 5'7"). My only complaint is that it was pretty wrinkled when I opened it up (it had been sitting in the bag overnight as I was out of town when it arrived), and the button to keep the top closed was broken. This was fixed with a safety pin, but could have been pretty bad if I didn't have one handy. Honestly, the button is pretty low as well, so safety pinning for some added modesty might have been a good idea anyway! But all around, it was a very fun dress to wear, felt good in it!

I don't mind showing some cleavage on occasion but 5 mins with this dress on and I knew I would be flashing everyone in hr room so decided not to chance it. The color and print is beautiful but way too low cut and fabric has no give at all.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and the length of this dress! I am 5'9" and finding dresses that fit and aren't too long or too short is a challenge. I wore this to a graduation and it was perfect! The only thing that I didn't like about the dress was the button at the chest. It was very tiny and useless and popped off both the Large and the Medium. I had changed into the L when the M button popped and within minutes the L had a popped button. It really needs a clasp or a sturdier snap that actually holds. In the picture I am wearing the L and it was a bit big on me and the material was bunched where it ties on the side.

I'd say the dress runs a little large It's a wrap dress so it fits all shapes It was a little low so I pinned it and wore a cami underneath to conceal the girls Light weight airy Very feminine dress Floral is usually not my style but I felt pretty and effortless

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous floral print on a silk dress!
links_reviews_text: Dress was true to size, I have a bigger bust so I definitely was showing cleavage, but it wasn't too much. I still felt like I had enough coverage. The dress hit me mid shin and looked great paired with a neutral kitty heel. I felt glamorous and received many compliments!

I was really happy when this dress arrived! It's more beautiful in person and feels high quality. It was slightly more formal in person than I had anticipated but the pattern made it work for a summer day. Only downside was it was a tad small. There was a tiny snap to secure the top that was pretty useless. I ended up wearing a stick on bra and it worked okay but I am not busty.

links_reviews_title: Very fun party dress that's sexy but comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: It's tight through the hips but otherwise fit perfectly. The cut and stiff fabric held me in and was flattering in the midsection. I normally don't do body con, but this was comfortable. The print felt fashionable but skews 80's, so I wouldn't have styled it as flamboyantly if it hadn't been New Year's Eve. It was a chic party dress and tons of fun to wear.
It's a beautiful dress. Mine arrived without button on back so I had to safety pin. I received many compliments! It was for a Miami Vice theme event.

This dress is extremely short, so short that I had to put my coat or a napkin across my lap when sitting down to avoid indecent exposure!! I wouldn't have worn it out at all, except I was away from home for the weekend and it's all I had to wear out to dinner. The top of the dress and everything else fit fine. Heavy fabric.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite but made it work
links_reviews_text: The print of this dress is on trend and cool. The material is stiff almost upholstery type. I first ordered the UK 10 which fit great on top but was tight in the hips. I wanted to wear it to dance so I reordered in the UK 12 but the top was big and gapped when sitting and the bottom was ok but still loser than I like. It's just very boxy cut and the fabric just doesn't stretch. Looked nice standing still.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, fun dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Tight fitting --- tighter in hips than expected but well tailored. Fabric is heavier than expected so a bit more structured and formal... more for an event vs a date or evening out
The fabric is very structured so if you have any curves or need to sit down I would suggest sizing up! Very cute overall and got so many compliments!
Not made for a busty woman.. I am a 8-10 size dress and rented this in a 14 and it still wouldn`t shut over my boobs.
Front of dress one side was higher than the other. Couldn't wear
It's cute but runs a little small and definitely a mini dress! But the material is nice and thick just not stretchy or giving

This was my 5th backup choice and was nervous but I loved it! The carotid ways to tie it was incredible, it is so comfortable, lightweight, and easy to dance in! I got compliments all night. Only complaint would be the edges of the top looked like someone had cut it and were noticeably frayed. Would rent again!

Such a sexy, classic black jumpsuit. Fabric is incredibly comfortable. Easy to twist and tie. The only downside is going to the bathroom! You have to take the whole thing off and tie it up again. I received tons of compliments. Highly recommend.

This was a really fun jumpsuit to wear! It took me awhile to figure out the straps but I received SO many compliments on it!! I have a longer torso so I was worried it wouldn't workout (like ALL rompers and jumpsuits) but this one worked out perfectly!!!!

links_reviews_title: The jumpsuit came early so I had plenty of time to play with it before the event
links_reviews_text: The night was amazing I got a lot of compliments- I loved the look working the top was a little hard and going to the bathroom was interesting

links_reviews_title: Flattering and can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Loved this!! Flattering for any body type! Slightly too short on my long legs. So I rented and bought the longer size.

I bought this one. Great material and could wear it without a bra. Great for a beach vacation. I'm 5'9" and I need heels to wear with it because the long is so long, a little too long actually. I'm a size 4 and the A is too large. I'll probably get it tailored to be smaller and for the first time ever, an inch shorter. I think it fits more like a size 8 or 10 would,

The jumpsuit actually fit a little bit large in the waist, but since you wrap it around itself it worked out fine. One thing I'll say is I didn't think about having to go to the bathroom. Having to completely unwrap yourself in order to use the ladies room is less than ideal, especially since it took me 20 min to wrap myself up to begin with!!!

I rented this jumpsuit for two events back that were a day apart! I needed something comfortable and fell in love with the versatility of this item! There's a ton of different ways to tie the straps so I was able to make each look different! Not to mention the endless compliments I received all night long! Definitely a self-confidence boost and would rent again!! It was true to size! I am 5,7 and 160 pounds and the AL fit perfectly!
Super comfortable and versatile. The long could've stood to be a touch longer--I have a 34" inseam and it didn't hit the ground when I was barefoot--but it's flowy so it still looked great.

This was a replacement for an piece that didn't fit. It was perfect. I went with the longer length size. I'm 5'8. It was perfect. The material is very comfortable. With several ways to wrap this jumpsuit it can certainly compliment any body type. I did not wear a bra and was totally comfortable. I loved it so much that I'm considering buying it!
I like that you can change the style to fit any occasion by wrapping it differently. I wore the regular length and should have gotten the long because I had to wear flats.

For my sister-in-law's bachelorette party, we were asked to wear black. This jumpsuit was perfect! Comfier than PJs and I got compliments all night. I'm 5'6" and the regular length was perfect for flats. I would recommend "breast petals" from Target in case of a wardrobe malfunction, but if you tie the straps nice and snug you won't have a problem (even pulling it down to use the ladies room and getting resituated--the fabric holds the tie well).

links_reviews_title: Sick of the LBD? Try this!
links_reviews_text: This was adorable, super comfortable and you can tie it in SO many different ways to suit your shape/style. Got tons of compliments all night long. My onlyyyy complaint is going to the bathroom in it.... not so easy. And you gotta be careful or the tails of the ties are gonna end up in the toilet. Even with that, highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Great once you figure it out!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a fun night out. It took me a while to figure out how I wanted to tie it... literally dozens of options. I watched a few different You Tube videos before settling for the easiest one because going to the bathroom is a hassle... so take that into consideration. But I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this jumpsuit to a charity auction/dance.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit! I liked that it was very versatile and you could style the top many different ways. The jumpsuit was very comfortable and easy to wear all night. I ordered the AL for extra leg length and it worked out great with heels. I originally ordered this as my back up outfit but when I tried it on I knew I had to wear it. I will definitely rent this jumpsuit again!
Love all the options to custom to your body type and personal style. This jumpsuit is light and flows well - perfect for dancing and photos!

links_reviews_title: Love this jumpsuit! So many options! Fit was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect!

I can't think of enough positive things to say about this piece! Beautiful, classic, sexy... but not too sexy! It is perfect. It was long enough and the plunging neckline was stunning! Also, I wore this on new years eve... After enjoying holiday food, I wasn't feeling too thin. This jumpsuit was perfect. Hides flaws and shows off beauty! Rent this one!

links_reviews_title: Playing craps and drinking bubbly at the casino was a blast for NYE, I felt like such a high roller!
links_reviews_text: I loved how versatile this jumpsuit was! I'm a 36DD and didn't need to wear a bra, and the deep neckline was sexy, but not too revealing. At 6'3" the BL (long) was just long enough, I paired it with heels so the pant wouldn't be dragging along the floor. My true size (12) was right between A and B, but I sized up so it wouldn't hug my hips as much, I preferred a looser fit with this jumpsuit. The different styles you can wear are actually pretty simple to do, there's many videos and Pinterest photos to give you inspiration.. I would suggest picking a style that accentuates your features. I simply twisted the straps, tied it in the back, and created a straight/twisted back line before cinching my waist. It was comfy, flattering, and super sophisticated. The only con for this outfit was using the restroom - you could wiggle out of it depending on how you tie it, but I wouldn't suggest being strategic with how you wrap it!
The straps were a bit difficult to tie and a bit too long, but once they were secure, I loved it. I received so many compliments and it was so comfortable.

I wore this for a holiday party. It was very comfortable and easy to tie different ways . I only gave it 4 stars because both the regular and long length sizes I received had some minor fraying at the bottom, which I guess is bound to happen given the flowy fabric. Would rent the style again!

While I received lots of compliments, this jumpsuit was not worth the trouble. The material is SO MUCH to work with and I agree with another review that it this rental should absolutely come with instructions on different ways to tie. I wasted so much time getting ready for my event trying to tie it in a flattering way that I would remember how to replicate after taking it off to use the bathroom. Expect to wear nothing underneath, as any bra or underwear would be visible. I ordered this jumpsuit because it seemed like a safe and flattering option on any body type, but in reality I personally didn‚Äôt think the fit was that flattering on my tummy area. It was an awkward cut that didn‚Äôt still didn‚Äôt quite conceal the bulge. Better luck next time...
It's true to size. I felt like a million bucks. Neckline looked great along with the sense of having tall legs.

This jumpsuit is amazing. It looks timeless and classy. Completely my style and fabulously long in the leg! It's always hard for me to find things long enough and this was great. I might be buying it!!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable yet stunning and perfect for a wedding
links_reviews_text: This outfit got tons of compliments. It was super comfortable and felt casual but actually was so stunning looking and I love that you can tie it in so many different ways. I chose over the shoulder because I could still wear a strapless bra with it. I liked a few other tie options but I felt slightly uncomfortable with possible side boob showing so I went with the one in the photo. I would definitely wear this again and recommend to everyone.

links_reviews_title: I wish I could buy this!
links_reviews_text: Never felt sexier and comfortable at the same time. 10/10 recommendation!

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and initially had tied it as a halter that wrapped around my waist (as seen in pic) - I thought it was super flattering and got many complements. However I felt a bit uncomfortable midway through because of how revealing it was, so I simply retied it more conservatively as a criss-cross on the chest and tied at the neck. Got even more complements the second half of the night! So comfortable, feels like you're wearing pajamas and loose enough in the legs to hide shapewear. Loved it!

I'm on the shorter side so I feel like the length was a bit long for me. The adjustable/customizable straps helped though! It took a little fiddling to get them to look how I wanted and feel secure. It stayed put all night though! I didn't wear a bra but am smaller chested. Was a great option for colder weather without having to sacrifice style. The options for this piece is endless!

links_reviews_title: When my daughter told me I looked like I should live in New York City
links_reviews_text: Loved this outfit...very comfortable and versatile.

Beyond obsessed with this jumpsuit. There are about 100 ways to wear it. I didn't get a good picture of the back but I twist braided it and then wrapped it around my body a bunch so i didn't have a tie. I also had no problem with the "girls" all night (I'm a DD) Kept me in and looking fly in the club in Vegas. Perfect for a night where you want to look a little extra sexy.
This piece can be worn in many different ways. It can be tied to look sexy or sophisticated for a more formal affair. Either way it's super comfortable and versatile.
I love that this is a convertible. I added a gold choker to creat a halter neckline without ties at the back. Fabric was thinner than I expected. Very few wrap options provide back coverage
As with all jumpsuits, beware of going to the bathroom. But otherwise I absolutely loooved this jumpsuit! You can try different ways to tie the straps which was a blast. Excellent dancing outfit :)

links_reviews_title: So many options in one outfit!
links_reviews_text: Make sure you google different ways to style/create the top. Was so much fun and super comfy. Received many compliments! short length! I'm 5'3" and could wear this with flats without dragging. It's a little saggy in butt area but overall great rental.

I sit at the higher range of sizes for this one size fits all ensemble- and I am going to be honest. It was a little big on me. Not sure how it works for much smaller girls (it's supposedly for all sizes 0-12???). But I was super pleased! It was striking, comfortable, and flattering! It's hard to wear a bra most ways you tie it- so I went with a bralette, and it was so cute! Pro tip: check out the company's website for ways to tie it complete with videos!

links_reviews_title: The jumpsuit arrived early and the fit was perfect. The dress was both elegant and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I wore the AL size. Both AR and AL fit but I thought the longer length with heels looked more formal. I have absolutely nothing bad to say about the jumpsuit. I would highly recommend it!

So im shocked there arent more amazing reviews of this romper. Its awesome! So theres many different ways to wear it- the top has two large pieces of fabric. You can pull them straight up for a tank look, or combine them (as i did) for a sexy one shoulder. This way has a super sexy back. I wore this for my 40th birthday party, and was ok w a little sexy! If you want other ideas about how to wear this, check out review photos of the dress version (same designer). Thats what i did. I think this wouldnt work well if you are large chested. Im a smaller 34 C.

The idea is neat that it's convertible, but for a plus size girl like me the thin/spandexy fabric was unforgiving to my lower belly. I thought the fabric would be a bit looser there but it clings to every little crevice.

Great piece! The length and cut are perfect for me. Very versatile - can be worn with a blazer for work or church; a kimono for brunch; or alone for a variety of sexy date/gala/party looks. The waistband in the one I got is a liiiiitle but worn or I'd definitely buy it. I still might, actually...

I was skeptical about this jumpsuit but ended up absolutely loving it. It is by far the best thing I have ever worn to a wedding. It looked very stylish and was impossible comfortable. Tons of compliments - highly recommend.
This dress fits amazing! I wish I would have bought it.
So flattering! Loved this tight black dress and would def rent again

Got it brand new with tags, it's perfect, bought it. Stretchy, comfy, sexy, great length. Can wear with a sweater over at work because it's definitely too much boob for my office. LOVE this one. M perfect for 6/8
Fit well and was comfy

links_reviews_title: Va-va-voom! Loved it so much, I bought it!
links_reviews_text: What a great LBD! I have worn it with bare legs and heels for a more classic look; I've also worn it with fishnets, military-style boots, and a motorcycle jacket for a more edgy look. But...don't eat too much before (or while) you wear it if you're on the upper end of an XL like I am. I find that I only feel like I can wear it if I've been doing a lot of yoga and not eating a lot. :-) Pros: Solid construction in a fabric heavy enough to suck you in without Spanx; flattering neckline; great length. Cons: Hard to get a bra under it; end of zipper is a little rough on your skin.

I liked this dress but my husband didn't. He thought it was weird. So, I passed on wearing it because I had other options. The dress is lined on the top but not under the black piece. In the back the red portion barely covers your bottom. It means you can't wear slip shorts or shapewear with shorts.
Fit like a glove! Angled lace does get high when sitting so be cautious.

Rented this little lady for a fundraiser event. It was a knock out! stood out against a sea of black cocktail dresses. It runs small- i am usually a 10 in everything but had to wear my backup size 12. the 12 fit perfectly. The black at the bottom is see through so it does add a bit of sexy. Great for a wedding, great for anything you'd need a cocktail dress for!
I wore this dress to church on Christmas Eve and then a party afterwards. I loved it! Felt so elegant and I received many compliments all night.
Would be great for a holiday party or winter wedding - great price point, fit like a true 6 and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a wedding before Christmas!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress! I received so many compliments and I felt so pretty wearing it. My only complaint is the slip was a tad bit short in the back for me. Other than that, it was a great dress!

This dress was PERFECT for a gala I went to with some coworkers! It didn't give, but I found that the 0 fit me better than the 2 (which just wasn't as flattering). I usually wear a 0, so I considered this true to size. I was also able to wear a regular comfortable bra with it, so I call that a win. I got so many compliments on the dress and I would rent again if I needed to! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great for something different for a formal affair
links_reviews_text: This runs true to size however the zip is tough to manage due to lace fabric and material under it so you do need a partner to help zip you in (the only reason I didn't give 5 stars!) ...it took a good few goes to zip up. It is a great dress; something a little different!

I really loved this dress. It was comfortable and fit really well. The only downside for me was that when I sat down, the sheer blue lace part of the dress rode up pretty high on my legs, which made me rather careful of how I sat. Otherwise the dress was great!

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this dress but I didn't end up wearing.
