links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress but I didn't end up wearing. It wasn't flattering on my body, I felt very wide. The 12 would have fit but been snug. 12 is my typical size. It has no give. I felt like a linebacker.

Wore this for a somewhat conservative weddingthat required sleeves and length to be long. Wanted to be a little rebel so chose this dress and it did not disappoint! Style is unique and so happy with the length not being too long for me (I'm 5'1)

This was my backup dress and it was the one I ended up wearing. I'm 5'5 and a 3-inch black strappy heel with it. It was a little long but it was totally appropriate for the baptism at a church. I got so many compliments on it. I wore a lightly lined bra with it to make my chest not so in your face. Overall, it was a great pick and I felt really pretty in it!
Tried a 6 but didn't end up wearing because I felt it looked a bit older / less fun than other options I had for the wedding. Fit well, though a bit large.

links_reviews_title: Fit great! Good for petite person too!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It fit great and was super flattering. I am petite and it hit my leg in the perfect spot. I wore with 3-4 inch heels. You don't need a bra for coverage but it was a little loose so a strapless bra worked perfectly. Also, the slip underneath is not super sheer which is great because you can't see your undies.

I wore this at my daughters communion and it was very appropriate for the church and party after. Pretty comfortable as well and I received many compliments. Would be a good dress for a cocktail party as well. My only comment was that because of the material the zipper was hard to get up, you'll need someone to do it for you.

Very comfortable and flattering. I received many compliments - most of which were from strangers that approached me just to tell me the dress was so unique and beautiful! I normally wear a 4, but sized up based on a reviewer with a similar body type as me. The 4 probably would've been okay, but I was happy to have a little extra room around the rib cage where the ribbon sits.
The fit is perfect. I wore this dress to church so I had to wear something to line the black lace on the bottom because it was a little too revealing for church. Other than that, beautiful dress

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, slimming, unique yet not over-the-top
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. I found the dress to run TTS, but I'm straight through the hips/thighs. I can see if you were curvy, you'd want to size up. I loved the dress and found it very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Classy with a bit of Sexiness
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress. It runs true to size and I felt good in it. It does not hide anything and doesn't have much stretch, hence take that in mind especially if you have a post baby belly like me. The short side is quite short so be mindful of that if you intend to wear "Spanx". I received compliments on the dress, and it shows that it's a very nice quality dress. However, it was not my favorite rental.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, great fit. It was very comfortable. I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Pros: Beautiful and well-made. It definitely looks "high end" in person. The color is lovely and rich. Con: It's hard to zip up yourself! You need a buddy to get it on. :)
I really like this one. True to size, but being a larger thigh type I might suggest two sizes up. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my company's annual awards banquet and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered a size 8 back up size 6, I wear dresses in both sizes. A few weeks after I ordered the dress I found out I was pregnant. I decided I should probably swap out my back up size for a bigger size, just in case. I was easily able to log into my account and change my back upsize to a 10 with no hassle. When the dresses arrived, the 8 fit but was a tad snug. I opted to wear the 10 because it gave me just a little extra wiggle room. I was 10 weeks pregnant at the time and I hadn't told anyone at work yet. The dress worked perfectly and I received tons of compliments! Even the following week at work I was still receiving compliments on how lovely my dress was. I'm 5'4 so the dress hit a little lower on my legs than in the picture, about mid-calf. I would totally use Rent the Runway again! The whole process was so easy, I've already been bragging about it to the girls at work that buy the one-time dress and never wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Wearing red when everyone else was in black! Stunning!!!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting. Great lines! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8 138 lb with athletic shoulders (swimmer)! Usually wear size 8 dress. This dress I wore a size 8 for a snug fit, but would recommend a size 10 for a dancing party!! More room to move!

The dress fit like a love, and I was super comfortable in it all all night. I got so many compliments, and I felt really good about myself the minute I put this dress on. It is super flattering, and although other users have said it runs a little small, I found my normal dress size fit me very well. If you are thinking about renting this dress, just do it! You won‚Äôt regret it.

Wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner for a family wedding and to a work event. The fit was great, offered some modest coverage, but was also very comfortable and fun to wear. I may even buy this one!
The dress fit like a glove. I got compliments all night and felt fantastic! I would definitely rent again.
Fit was great and I loved the length, felt comfortable but still felt a little sexy with the see thru bottom. I got so many compliments. This is definitely one of my favorite RTR pieces!
This dress fit perfectly, was so comfortable and very elegant, but fun at the same time! I received many compliments at my work holiday party! I highly recommend!

This dress was perfect! I ordered an 8 and a 10 as the backup and went with the 10 instead because it allowed for more movement. It was comfortable, I could dance in it, and the black belt that goes around the waist really helped show my curves and make my waist look smaller. I received compliments all night on this dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore for a casual wedding
links_reviews_text: Fitted in hips. Good quality. I would size up if you're unsure

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my husband's holiday party and the dress fit the dress code perfectly!
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 6 and the 8 because depending on fit of dresses, I could be either size. It was a little tight in the arms because the fabric is not flexible but the 6 fit perfectly otherwise and the 8 looked a little too big.

links_reviews_title: This dress was stunning, the quality alone made the dress. Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Always go a size up for comfort in this dress. The smaller size dress I received I could have worn but there was a small tear in the stiching. Always check the dress!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress slightly snug for size
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a formal occasion or wedding. My event was in March and was unseasonably warm, but this dress was both winter appropriate, but not too warm. It is a thicker material and sucks you in a little, so no need for spanx, wore a regular bra and was very comfortable all night. The lace can snag on things easily, but did not rip. So sturdy fabric. I would say it runs slightly small, so glad I sized up. There is just no give in the fabrics, but that's good also cause no need for spanx. Loved this dress for a winter formal event and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I needed a black, white & red dress for a formal event. This worked perfectly!
links_reviews_text: The quality was very good. I was surprised how short the short-side felt, but nothing was exposed and it looked good (IMHO). I usually wear a 6 or 8. The 8 just felt better.
Loved this dress so much! When I told people i rented it, multiple people told me I needed to purchase it. Super flattering and comfortable and hides imperfections :)

Lovely dress and easy to wear! The color and shape are so flattering. On me, the length was longer than the picture shows; came to lower calves/upper ankles instead. I didn't want to send this one back!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my brother's wedding and I felt glamorous and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I have a large bust with a petite frame so I was thrilled that I could wear this with a regular bra. I was also able to dance all night without wardrobe malfunctions and I got compliments all night (including at the hotel while I was on my way to the wedding). Love love love this dress!
I would recommend sizing up for your back up with this dress, but it was really a great dress and I received many compliments on it. The fit is also very flattering. Not really any stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for fall city wedding
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding in the city so I wanted something different. I received tons of compliments on this dress. I ordered an 8 and a 10 and ended up wearing the 10 for comfort. The dress doesn't have a lot of give so if you're in between sizes I'd size up or take the option for a free second size. Love it though and wish I owned it!
Dress up as perfect for fall wedding as it is lined and helps to keep you warm! No give in the waist but all else fits true to size!! Very pretty color!
Great for a tropical vacation, but the tag in the back keeps popping out

Fit true to size and not too short - I'm 5'9 and it fell an inch above my knee. I wore this twice (once on my birthday) and received so many compliments. Fun, summery skirt! Will definitely rent again.
I pulled it down on my waist so it was t too short. Super cute but a bit less transferable to work and other things. P

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for a tropical destination!
links_reviews_text: I decided to try Reserve for my honeymoon and I'm so glad I did! I got this shirt that paired great with one of my bathing suit tops and I wore it around the resort. I also paired it with a white tank top once on the trip and once again when I got home. It also paired well with brown sandals.

I absolutely loved this skirt. It is so comfortable, the stitch detailing is beautiful and the colors really pop. I feel like this is a skirt that can be worn so many different ways to get the exact look you desire. Will definitely rent this again...if I don't buy it!

This skirt is adorable! I absolutely loved it. You can wear it higher-waisted or pull it down. I had some trouble figuring out what top to wear with it, but in the end, honestly, the best bet is just to have a plain white tank and either wear it as a midriff or wear it so the skirt comes over it. (I went midriff route.) I got a lot of compliments on it. Also wore bright pink lipstick with it and it was a huge hit. Hope to rent again!
Love the colors and pattern! Much cuter in person. I plan on renting this again for vacation and wearing with a tied chambray shirt as pictured.

I adore this fun little skirt by Amur! Running true to size with a stretchy waistband, I recommend ordering your normal size. This style is roomy in the hips and hugs your waist but is very comfy. At 5'3 the length hit mid-thigh on me, but I was wearing it pretty high up and you can wear it lower on your hips if you are taller and need more length. The embroidery on this skirt is amazing and makes it such a stunner! Pair it with sandals for a beachy vibe!
Super cute and fun skirt!

Such a fun skirt. I'm usually a 10 or large and sometimes a medium if something runs a bit big. The large fit great and I'm thinking I could have gotten by with a medium since the waste band is stretchy and at 5'4 the large was plenty long.

links_reviews_title: The skirt was the perfect length for my 5'10" frame, comfortable, casual.
links_reviews_text: Top ruffle could potentially make your hips look bigger - it's poofy!
This skirt just made me happy. Beautiful fabric and embroidery. On the small side but it didn't really matter with the elastic waist. Pretty short but so am I, so it worked.

links_reviews_title: Top ruffle made my hips look wide
links_reviews_text: This fits well. I didn't think it was too short. The top ruffle made my hips look super wide though and so I chose to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for vacation in Florida.
links_reviews_text: Very cute, comfy skirt, the waistband is wide and I'm short so I actually folded it in to make it narrower. This skirt looks best with a tucked in shirt or something cropped.

links_reviews_title: Fun skirt just not my style
links_reviews_text: The skirt fit true to size and the colors and embroidery detail were beautiful. The length was also perfect. I did not like the material as it was stiff and the layers were bulky and uncomfortable. Too puffy and not really my style.
This skirt was perfect i rented twice. The elastic made it so that both a small and an extra small fit. Length was good for a casual vacation wear. Recommend this one!
Loved the fabric, colors and design but found the waist band fit and ruffles hard to pair with shirts
fits perfectly and so cute!
I liked this, but did not LOVE. there is a lot of volume in the skirt so if you have hips it can look a little boxy. great material and fun pattern though!
Cute skirt, lots of compliments. I wore with just a tank and really cute. Not too long not too short. I'm 5' 7 1/2"
too frilly.
It was adorable!
Rented for vacation but didn't arrive in time so didn't have a chance to wear this Runs true to size with a very stretchy waist.

I ordered this skirt to go with the matching Amur top and they looked fabulous together! It made it look like a dress and I received compliments constantly! The skirts sizing is flexible since it is almost like a smocked waistband. Very comfortable! The length hit above knee but was not too short (I'm 5'6").
Comfortable and elegant. Rented for a 70th birthday. So many compliments

links_reviews_title: Something about symmetry! It's a show stopper, Amy Winehouse inspired dress.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED THIS DRESS! I hated sending it back. I was going to a cocktail fundraiser with an invitation that read, "cocktail chic, with a pop of orange". I rented Oscar de la R. earrings too from RTR. They were orange, big, and beautiful. With a stunner of a dress and earrings, made several people stop to compliment my outfit. I'm 5'5 and 155. I'm athletically built.

links_reviews_title: My favorite dress I've ever worn!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for graduation and was absolutely obsessed! The sizing is a little different, so definitely read the comments and descriptions when choosing your size (I did that and got it right for my RTR Update order the first try). This is honestly the most flattering dress! So fun and unique-- I got so many compliments. It made for a really special graduation dress!!!
Overall, wow! Strange fit near the chest but not something anyone else will notice.

This dress. The fit, the fabric. I felt like a supermodel, and got more compliments than I can count. I didn't wear a bra with it, and that worked, however if I rent it again, I will try it with a strapless. The side without the draped shoulder lacked the structure I would have liked, and dropped a little.
The top strap was a bit too large and fell every now and then, but I LOVED this dress. Would rent again and again.

links_reviews_title: Sassy and sexy dress that will make you stand out at an event.
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 4 and I wore a 3 in this dress so the listed sizes don't really match up so definitely size up. The only reason that I didn't give this a perfect rating was because I had to constantly tuck the hanger straps down because they were showing a lot. I wish I had taped then down before the event. Other than that, this was a showstopper and EVERYONE loved it from the moment I walked in the door. Definitely get this dress if you want to stand out at an event.
You will turn heads in this number. Fit me well. Seemed true to size
I wore this dress to a charity event and received so many compliments! I love this dress!!

I'm 5'5", 34A...this dress fit perfectly with a great pair of Spanx underneath! I wore a size 1. I'm normally a 2 in dresses. I used fashion tape on inside the left chest area to hold down the hanger strap on the inside. There's no stretch and it's VERY short on the left leg. The Asymmetric detail and the line pattern on the dress are beautiful. It's very unique and fun, and will for sure turn heads. Highly recommend!!!

The size 2 is a size 4-6 in US and fits exactly as such . The angles and lines are absolutely stunning . It is the most perfect standout dress that's half business half pleasure . It was perfect for my grand opening : ribbon cutting ceremony for my office . I received compliments all night . It was perfection.
I wear a size 10 with a 36b bust and the biggest size in this dress didn't even come close to zipping you. Runs VERY VERY SMALL.

links_reviews_title: Was so excited to get this home but couldn't even put over my head or step into it - way too small!
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and knew it would be small but this was not even small it was un-wearable. It also can a little dull looking not bright white stripes as I had expected. Sent back without wearing. :(

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I rented it twice! I hope to own this someday!
links_reviews_text: I am large busted but small framed. This worked perfectly as long as I sized up.
Trust was much shorter than I expected and very tight. I was not able to wear it.
This dress was snug but looked fantastic and I FELT amazing in it. I got compliments all night from my fellow stunt performers, and I'd definitely buy this dress if I could.
The stress was way too small. I couldn't even get it over my hips size up by like four if you can

Rented for a formal event. First it wasn't dressy enough for what I needed it for. Second - it has potential but boy does this run small. Cute dress though. Will rent again in a larger size. I rejected the 4-6 size which I normally am (in this dress was a size 2) but definitely need a size 3.

links_reviews_title: So so so tight and small
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, really cool style. However, this dress has such an odd fit. I never got to wear it

links_reviews_title: This was a HIT! Runs small
links_reviews_text: I LOOOVED this dress!!! It definitely shows off your curves and hugs you in all the right places. It is an attention getter and you will get LOTS of compliments. Wore it to my 20th high school reunion and looked fabulous. Definitely get 2 sizes up! I'm usually an 8 and the size 4 (XL) just fit.
The largest size didn't fit me. Ridiculous!
but I didn't end up wearing it. I like the idea of it but for me the style didn't really work. I agree with others that sizing up is good for comfort and fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress was too small. I ordered a 4 and should fit a 3 but I could not get it on or zipped!
links_reviews_text: Did not fit the breast, hips or thighs. Made for extremely petite women.

I didn‚Äôt end up wearing it. I tried it on with and without a bra, but it was tight at the bust. Fit like a glove everywhere else, but even without a bra the girls were not comfortable. I read the reviews before renting and thought it would work. Size 3 would have been a better fit. Loved the dress, so unique, and would rent in size 3!
Perfect cocktail dress. Comfortable and effortless while being so glamorous and special. Worked for my 5' petite frame. Expect compliments!

I rented this for a party and thank goodness I ordered a back up dress. I ordered a 4, and though my size 10 self could zip it up, I could not move or breath. Don't try this dress unless you are a size 8 or below. Super great quality though.

links_reviews_title: Runs extremely small or they sent me wrong size. I wear a 6 and they sent me a 2. Sizing is unique
links_reviews_text: Sizing is different. Couldn't wear

links_reviews_title: did not have a chance to wear it as it did not fit
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress but runs very small!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a Black and White gala and it was a hit, so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The top part of the dress did feel slightly loose in the size 3 but the size 2 was just too small all around to be comfortable. I ended up not even noticing the looseness throughout the evening.

links_reviews_title: Great cocktail dress for a surprise birthday party
links_reviews_text: I was able to wear a strapless bra with this dress and it had some give to it. I received compliments from friends and strangers all night.
Order 2-3 sizes up. Beautiful dress, just runs extremely small.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could have worn the dress but my boobs were too big for it.
links_reviews_text: It runs REALLY small. So small that I couldn't wear it. I'm a size 10, 34 DD, 5ft 9inch tall and this didn't fit I got the size 4 which is supposed to be the correct size, oh well. Very disappointing.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear it because it was too small!
links_reviews_text: So small, I couldn't get it on! definitely more like a 10-12 than a 12-14.

Gorgeous dress - style and material - but it fits extremely small. The sizes are a bit different, size 4 (the largest) saying it's equal to an 8-10, but I was at least 4 inches from zipping it. So sad as I really wanted to love this!
Dress was not made to accommodate size 12. Dress is tiny, maybe size 8 and no stretch.

links_reviews_title: Ok they really need to re-list the sizes on here.
links_reviews_text: GO TWO SIZES UP. Nearly had an anxiety attack I got into this tiny tiny dress and thought I was stuck

links_reviews_title: No go. Busy was insanely small.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress... if I could fit in it. I have a large bust but normally fit a size 12, no problem. Pulled this on and there is no way it would have closed. Top of zipper was, not kidding, 6-8" apart. So sad I can't wear it.
Pretty dress but waaaaaay too small. May try to rent in a size (or 2 sizes) bigger for future event
Cut super small!!! Size like 2 sizes up! It is a nice sexy dress tho

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and wanted it to work so badly, but it runs so so small.
links_reviews_text: Wish I had listened to other reviews. It def runs at least two sizes smaller.

Amazing dress; stays in place really well; didnt even need tape! Received compliments all night. Danced for SEVERAL hours in it without issue- thick heavy material so it feels like a solidly constructed dress. Will be my new go to dress.

Rented this dress for a black tie event and got compliments all night!! I will say the larger size I received was a little tight around the back, so I would order up if you are on the line with a few sizes. It ended up working out great though and I really loved the dress!
This dress was lovely and sexy. It had side boob that I worked tirelessly to control with fashion tape!! That's why I give it a 4. I'm a 36 DDD and it was just not quite enough fabric to cover all.

I took a risk wearing such a low cut dress since my chest is on the smaller side, but with a little fashion tape the dress fit perfectly and stayed intact all night! The dress was very flattering and sliming and really made me feel beautiful and confident all night long.
It fit a little weird, but I think confidence is everything. Definitely would be difficult with breasts larger than mine (34D) looking classy. Doesn't need a bra.

This dress is the epitome of va va voom. I'm 5,8 ish so I went ahead and hot the long, abs with a medium heel, it's perfect. Very flattering. I wish my chest was a little bit bigger so the straps would be a bit more secure, but fabric tape helped. If I owned it, it'd be a simple alteration. Definitely would rent again.
I absolutely loved the dress and want to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect gown for women with curves/hourglass figures
links_reviews_text: This dress was simple and elegant and hugged my curves in all the right spots. The only negative was that the straps were too loose, but nothing that can't be fixed with double sided garment tape.

I loved the look of this dress, but it was barely long enough without any shoes on. I was surprised to have this issue since I don't consider myself particularly tall at 5'7". Long length wasn't available so went with another dress.

Perfect fit! No bra worn, great dress for breastfeeding! May require some fashion tape if you don't want to readjust for whichever breast is slightly smaller. No wardrobe mishaps otherwise, just a couple readjustments throughout the evening. Tons of compliments from guests! hubby even wanted to find out if we could buy and keep it ;) was able to wear heels and flats--though with flats, dress was a bit long but I'm 5'4". Would definitely rent again!!!

links_reviews_title: Felt like the sexiest woman alive!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove, like it was made for me. As a mom of two I was so glad that it was super flattering, it hugged all the right curves, and made me feel sexier than I have since before giving birth! I am so glad I rented this dress. I got a compliment right off the elevator before the wedding even started. It contained my large assets even though at times it seemed like there might be a slip, there wasn't! The length was perfect for me (5'3) with a slight heel or flats! I NEEDED this dress!
This dress fit like a glove. It was chic, sleek and beautiful and I got compliments all night. Was perfect for a black tie wedding in Paris.

This dress was so flattering. It complimented my body so well and was very comfortable. The plunging neckline requires some tape because the straps aren't designed to hug your shoulders in a way the keeps the dress in place near your chest, but that's not a big deal. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect!!! I wore this for a red carpet event for Bravo and I am so glad I did!!

links_reviews_text: It was a gorgeous gown however it ran a bit large so I'm glad I got the size down option as well because I ended up wearing the 10R as opposed to the 12. The only issue I had was anything that touched it left marks and any period of sitting left deep wrinkles that didn't smooth out upon standing.

I rented this for a September black tie wedding in Colombia. When I tried it on, I immediately texted the bride to be sure that ALL THE BOOBS would be ok. She begged me to wear it so I did. At the wedding, I saw I had nothing to worry about. Colombian women dress to kill and I was in great company. Anyway, I am a true dress size 14/38C cup and the dress fit well. I ordered the regular length and the long. At 5'5 with 3.5" heels, the regular was way too short and the long was perfect. It seemed that the longer length was more well made, somehow. The zipper was heavy duty as opposed to the flimsy one on the regular length. I had much less side boob in the Long and one cup had padding. The other didn't and that's why I couldn't give this dress five stars. The lack of padding had me checking and clutching my boob all night to be sure I didn't expose myself. The padded boob, perfect with no issues. That one rogue unpadded boob, though...WHEW! I wish RTR had made sure both dresses had the padding and I wish they included fashion tape like they used to. People loved my dress and my husband could not stop staring. I felt really pretty and the dress was comfortable (it has only the tiniest bit of stretch -- you will want to get your true size). P.S. In my review photo, I am not wearing my heels. In shoes, the hem of the dress still touched the floor. That is what I wanted.

Rented for a black tie wedding. I should've worn the 0, but only the 2L and 2R were available. I'm 5'7" and with 4 inch heels the 2L was dragging on the floor. The 2R was perfect length, but still a bit too big - I had to tape the straps to keep them from falling down. Also, the top is cut in such a way that you can't wear a sticky bra (even a plunge one) because it shows on either side no matter what. All that aside, this dress is amazing. The fabric is almost silky and hangs beautifully. Would rent again (but size down)!

I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äù, 140 lbs, 34D and wore a size 4L with a low heel. Fit great! A little low cut though... almost felt bad for wearing it to a wedding, but whatever! Be ready for some exposure. Otherwise it‚Äôs stretchy and flattering. I did have to wear spandx otherwise would have had an underwear line.
I loved this dress! It is a form fitting dress that is pretty low cut but the material was right enough that it without a bra it still offered good support, also the black color was very slimming

links_reviews_title: Lightweight option for Summer Black Tie Wedding!
links_reviews_text: I am typically a 4 and sometimes size up to a 6 but had to size down here. If you have a medium to small bust you likely will too. The dress does have room for you to add padding or more support if needed. Is a thinner material so was perfect for a black tie wedding in August. Very flexible fabric and easy to dance in!

So flattering! I was worried this was going to be too low cut but it was perfect and I have boobs! I'm usually a 6-8 (mostly 8) and the 8 worked perfectly. I'm also short and with heels the length was ideal.
I added some padding in the boob area to have a more snug fit when moving around. There are compartments to hold padding, which was a big help. Definitely a great rental!
Fits like a glove!
Very comfortable and elegant

links_reviews_title: Worked for 32 weeks pregnant black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I was in a pinch and couldn't actually get a maternity dress for a black tie wedding I had to go to at 32 weeks pregnant. I sized up 2 sizes (usually a 4 and rented an 8) and it worked great. Got tons of compliments. It's a little booby because the straps are longer than usual (due to hiking up the dress some above my belly) but I think worked fine. Highly recommend!
Beautiful dress that fit perfectly other than it was too long!

This is quite possibly my favorite dress I've ever worn. It was very flattering and I received a lot of complements! I wish I could keep it. I bought heels (which I never wear) because I thought it would be too long but I was able to wear flats and it was just about perfect. I'm 5'4.

links_reviews_title: Didn‚Äôt wear it since the plunge was a little too low for this Specific event.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me like a glove! I absolutely loved it and honestly I should have purchased it.

links_reviews_title: The dress was easy too wear and dance in.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, very comfortable and super sexy. I would buy this dress
The fit was amazing, true to size and I loved the dress overall but I ended up not wearing this as it was a family wedding and the plunging neckline was just a bit too much.

I recently had a baby and still have a bit of extra weight, so I ordered the 6 and the 8. I'm 5'7 and 145 lbs right now. The 8 was definitely too big and the 6 fit well. I may have been able to go down to a 4 as well since the dress stretched a bit throughout the night. I'm also currently DD and at times the top was a bit large, so you'll definitely need some tape if you are smaller chested. Overall this was a beautiful classy yet sexy dress.

links_reviews_title: Stunning. Sexy. Comfortable. All in one :$
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress. Would recommend. However the straps do become lose through the evening. And you will most definitely need fashion tap and cover ups for if you get cold! But 100% recommend. 100s of complements.

Wore this for a military reception, looked amazing! Did have a bit of trouble with the straps staying exactly where I wanted them to but used some body double stick tape worked fine. Generally easy to move in otherwise.

at first I was concerned the neckline would lend itself to a Janet Jackson wardrobe malfunction but it didn't at all. There are cups on each side that help keep the dress firmly in place. I felt completely comfortable dancing in it all night. Material is extremely soft, forgiving, and comfortable. Plenty of give to it. didn't wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, wish I could keep
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore a 4R and am 128lbs 5'4. It was a bit long but I wore heels.

The dress has more give than most form fitting dresses. I have a smaller bust and a petite frame and it worked perfectly on me. I got a ton of compliments. Use of nipple covers/boob tape is key to hold everything up!

Wore this to a black tie holiday party and couldn't have been happier. Being 5'9" I was worried the R length would be too short, but with my low heels it was the perfect length. Form fitting and so flattering. Very low cut but didn't gap with a small chest. Zipper was a little tricky at points but totally manageable.
Fit perfect! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô9‚Äù and the length was perfect. Would have preferred it a little tighter around the hips, but overall comfortable. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress and surprisingly comfortable. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am 5‚Äô6‚Äù with small bust and weigh around 135. I wore the 4 which is my true size and the fit was perfect. It was slightly loose in the straps, likely because I don‚Äôt have breast to completely fill the top. Loved the dress, comfortable material, very flattering!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a back-up for a wedding. I ended up not wearing it because of the fit.
links_reviews_text: Awkward dress for me. I ordered 0P (my go-to size) and the length was way off. Floor length, not ankle length. Not sure it would have worked if the length was right--the style did not fit my body type (petite hour glass).

I have a smaller chest and ended up having to wear the size up because the 2 was gapping strangely in the chest. Unfortunately with the 4 the straps were a little long. Otherwise though the dress felt great and I got lots of compliments!
Great color, 4 months pregnant and was comfortable for the evening.

This dress is so beautiful! The colour pops but the material is light and flowy so it does not feel over done. I received compliments all night on both the design and the colour of this dress. Size wise - I am definitely a pear shape- I usually am a size 4-6 on top and an 8-10 on the bottom. Reading other reviews I went with a size 8Long ( I am 5'9 and it just grazed the floor with 3" heels). This size fit perfect on top and grazed loosely over my hips. I would 100% rent this dress again!

I ordered this dress because I fell in love with the color, but I almost didn't wear it (I ordered a backup and even a replacement after receiving it). I'm glad I was convinced to wear it because I received SO many compliments! The one drawback is that there is no 4P option available, and being 5'0", it's kind of necessary (petite only available for sizes 0 and 2 and the 2P was too tight). I ended up wearing 6" heels with the 4R dress and was still barely able to walk without lifting the bottom up. I didn't wear a bra (I don't see how you would be able to wear even stickies) and it was a little revealing but I didn't mind. All this being said, it was a beautiful dress and very flattering!
This was my fave rent the runway dress so far !! So extremely cute and the color is so unique! I would highly recommend this!

I loved this dress! I was hesitant to try it because of the cutout and didn't believe I could get away with not wearing a bra (34DD) but it fit perfectly and I got a ton of compliments all night. I wore it with 4.5 inch heels and the length was perfect for me. Would absolutely order again if I don't end up buying it!

links_reviews_title: Jill Jill is my tall girl go to!
links_reviews_text: I own already a couple pieces from Jill Jill Stewart and know that they always fit my body shape. This was a game time decision to ship in right before this wedding and loved every minute of wearing it. No bra (need stickies as you will see nipple in this silk) and it's long enough for all 6 foot ladies! Could potentially be a good fit for maternity too as it doesn't pull on tummy area. This is so flattering and got complements all day! Plus added this cool purse from rent the runway and added bonus I wore all weekend

links_reviews_title: Not used to wearing such bold colors, but I felt beautiful and comfortable in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Maybe I'm just in denial that I wear a dress size 10, but it fit me perfectly. Typically, I wear a pant size 4-6 (sometimes 8 depending on the store), but my upper body is built really broad; I have wide shoulders and a wide back, so wearing dresses that have a zipper are usually really difficult for me. However, this dress felt comfortable on my ribcage and was even the perfect length on me. Yes, the cutout in the center does show a lot of cleavage, but I think that is to be expected and it was still classy enough that I didn't feel self conscious about it.

links_reviews_title: Pop of color for outdoor wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful! RTR actually sent me this dress after my original choice did not fit well at all and I was beyond pleased with this one. The fit is perfect. I sized down after reading other reviews. The top part was snug and secure. A size 2 would have been too big. As a 32D, the 0R was a perfect fit. The length was good with 3.5 inch heels. But my favorite thing about this dress was the color. It really popped in photos and looked beautiful in the outdoor wedding setting. Also, it gives you room to chow down during the wedding without worrying about the gut.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabric! Comfortable, sexy and flattering. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered 6L and it fitted perfectly. I am a bit flat in the bust, so it was a tad big. Very flattering and sexy dress.
Very pretty and flattering. I'm 5'10" and wore the 8L, and I could barely wear a 1.5/2 inch heel, wish it had been a bit longer. Overall, great color and great for the gala I attended.

Rented this dress for engagement photos and I was so pleased. I'm a 38DD and I didnt wear a bra. The dress is comfortable but my favorite characteristic is hands down the color. It photographed wonderfully. I would caution wearing it for a event just because of the cutout. It would probably be easier if I was little smaller up top. All in all it was a gorgeous dress and I didn't even have to wear spanx.

links_reviews_title: Stunning color but a lot of boob
links_reviews_text: My most favorite dress I've rented from RTR to date. The dress fit well, however, as a curvy/bottom heavy person the lining was way too tight on my hips. If you have a bigger chest, don't rent it. I'm a B and it squished my chest all night. I felt beautiful but a little too revealing at times for a wedding

links_reviews_title: Fun color - got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 10 but the top was WAY too big and the straps were really loose. The 8 fit nicely but the cutout opened a little more than I would have preferred. Overall I really loved the dress and color!

links_reviews_title: Great fit but needs an XLong option
links_reviews_text: This fit was perfect! Color is gorgeous! Got so many compliments! Very comfortable! Just wish it was longer so I could have worn heels! I had to wear flat sandals!

The dress was super comfortable and fun to wear. I have a smaller bust so the slit in front was no problem for me. The lining came very winkled and I did not have time to properly steam so it did not lay flat.
Gorgeous color Amazing fabric for any time of year. Fit true. Endless compliments!

links_reviews_title: First time using rent the runway
links_reviews_text: This was my first time using rent the runway, and I'll admit I was nervous about it. Turns out there was no need to be! The dress fit perfectly!!! I have broad shoulders and a wide rib cage so I was worried it may be too tight, but I didn't even need the larger back up size!
Got so many compliments on the dress. Fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Great color and drapes well for photographs.
links_reviews_text: Worn for a black tie event. Dress fit comfortably and loved the color. The dress forced me to have good posture for the evening so that the cutout didn't reveal too much.

The color is a beautiful magenta and the cut is great for a beach wedding. I wore a 0 and I have a 32A bust, 25" waist. The waist was perfect, and with a little fashion tape this fit very comfortably in the top. I am 5'6" and wore 3" heels, and the dress still touched the floor. A little too long for dancing. Many complements throughout the night. I only gave 4 stars, as I thought a typical size 0 should have been cut a bit tighter in the top and shorter in length, since we cannot alter these dresses.

Really loved this dress for an October black tie optional wedding.The color is a pretty fuchsia more on the purple side. You don't need to much to go with it, it's a very easy and elegant dress. Did not wrinkle throughout the night either! I found it true to size, and did not need a bra to wear with it. Was long on me, I'm 5'3 and had to wear my 4 inch heels, which was fine with the heels. I highly recommend this dress, looked great in photos!

The fit around the waist was very secure, however I am 5'2" and the straps were too long so it hung down too far. I cross the straps for it to hold up better and it worked! I was concerned with my chest popping out, but if I had a bigger set I don't think it'd be a problem! Overall, beautiful dress!

I really loved this dress for a black tie wedding. The color is a bright fuchsia and the silk material is loose enough to be extremely comfortable. The neckline and silhouette are very flattering. For the dress to work comfortably it does need to lie somewhat flat on your chest which as a B cup was fine for me with no bra. I could see it being trickier if you have a larger bust.

links_reviews_title: True to size, lots of compliments! More purple IRL than pink like the photo suggests.
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing, it fit very well and I received a ton of compliments! I did not really have to adjust it at all throughout the night and I didn't wear a bra. The only issue is if you slouch and turn at the same time it can kinda show more cleavage than you were planning. I have gained weight recently but the 6R still fit comfortably, really only fitted around the ribcage. The color is definitely more purple than pink but still a very rich lovely color. Would recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Pop of color for spring events
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress it fits true to size and is very comfortable. Very light weight so good for warmer weather. The color is amazing and I love the neckline

links_reviews_title: A fun dress for a fun Night! and, a little cheeky.
links_reviews_text: I don't have a waist ... hourglass is not a far term, but it's the only one I could pick really. This dress gave me a bit of a waist and helped me not seem as short (5'2") because of the long skirt. The keyhole maybe be be for everyone but with the right stick on bra - I loved it. The color is a pretty magenta, it might seem more pink in photos (it's Barbie-ish in photo). I fashion tapped the straps to my shoulders - cause they aren't so much for support. Very happy with dress - but check out Jill Stuart Sizing . I got a 10 - which was just right for me. The fabric was a high quality and I hemmed with fashion tape. (I am picture with my sister - her dress was also RTR).

I loved this dress. Its soft and striking, the color is much more purple in person than it appears online. I wore this to a holiday party and recieved so many compliments while comfortable, ideal situation.
Loved the fit around the bust, the fabric, the color but the length way too long for me. I'm 5'1, and even with the highest heels the dress dragged a considerable amount.

links_reviews_title: I attended a Christmas ball, and it was magical. I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress definitely runs true to size. I ordered a size that was too big. I like to say that I have size 6 shoulders and a size 8 waist. Size 8 usually fits well, but the structure around the bust and shoulders was definitely too big for me. Fit great on the waist. If I rent this again, I will definitely go with a 6!

links_reviews_title: The color really made me stand out and I felt so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The one thing I will say is that the top was a little looser than I would have liked so smaller chested people may want to be aware of that before deciding on a size.
Loved the dress. I dont normally wear clothes with a cut out but it was fun and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Beware if you are large chested
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautifully made, but beware if you have a large chest! I was nervous about renting this dress with the keyhole neckline, but after reading reviews from other large chested women, I decided to give it a try. It ended up showing a LOT of cleavage. I wore the larger size (that was big on me everywhere else) so that my chest was more covered. I am turned to the side in this photo, but the full-frontal is pretty graphic lol.

links_reviews_title: Fit like it was custom made!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very true to size and the A-line style was very slimming on the hips. However, make sure to be careful when you are sitting down because the center cut out expands when you slouch. Overall, this is a great dress and fits like it was custom made! I was so sad I had to return it!

links_reviews_title: The color is really vibrant and fun!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8, but sizing up to a 10 made the dress lay really nicely without being to big. I received so many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: The color is gorgeous, received compliments all night!!
links_reviews_text: Fits great, might even run a little big. I ordered the long and had to wear flats because it barely covered my ankles. The center cutout cuts super low, so I couldn't wear a bra. I am a 34DD and when I sat down the cutout gaped open and was much more revealing then standing. Overall, I would order this dress again and just go up a size so the fabric doesn't gape as much when seated.

This gown was comfortable, flattering, well-made and the color POPs. It's not too bright, but it's subtle and can work any season. I'm 5'4 and the length was perfect with my heels. It wasn't too much cleavage (and my boobs are DD so if can be tough.) I was getting compliments all night, I couldn't have been happier with this choice. I'd wear it again and again.

Wore this to an early fall black-tie wedding and received a TON of compliments! I loved that it was flattering and unique without being overly completely formfitting. Sizing was pretty true to size, though it was a bit tight in the waist seam- I ended up wearing a 4 over the 6 since the midriff cutout in the 6 gapped a lot. It was the perfect length at 5'7" in 3" heels, so I would go for a long if you are much taller!
This was so comfortable and looked great all night. Undergarments are a challenge but you don't need them. The color really pops.

Gorgeous pink gown with an interesting neckline. The shape of this dress is so beautiful and feels so elegant. Unfortunately with the cutouts below the bust it's impossible to wear a bra, even a strapless or NuBra. It's a great dress for women with smaller busts. The dress has no stretch and is fitted in the waist, so I would size up for backup.
I loved this dress! It was form fitting and a pretty gray color. Zipper detailing on the back. Note the side slits do go up a little high. Not a standout but good for a wedding!

This is the dress to take you from a church wedding to a fun dance-filled reception. The length and quality of the material was appropriate for a church. It was snug in all the right places, even after a full dinner, while having enough give to allow you to dance the night away.

Absolutely loved this for a wedding! I am typically a 0 in most dresses - sometimes 2 depending on brand and got the 0 in this. Definitely wore spanx and had to have my sister zip me up every time I went to the restroom but it was worth it. Just beware if you're by yourself! Would have like to try the 2 if I had the option just to see fit difference in fit but absolutely loved it! Unique color + classic style = WINNING

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, understated dress that stands out
links_reviews_text: Definitely a tight fitting dress. Top will roll over a little bit but can be fixed quickly. Love the fit and the feel of the dress. So comfy and didn't wrinkle at all when I packed it and brought it to this event. The dress is definitely on the tighter side so be prepared to break out the Spanx

I normally wear a 0 or 2, but having rented this brand before, I realize it usually runs small so I ordered a 2 and 4. I felt that I could have worn the 0 in this particular dress, but the 2 fit okay. It is a sleek and simple silhouette, so you can definitely up your accessory game. Overall I would recommend this dress.

Love the details on this dress -- it is raw-edged with all sorts of creative seaming. Also, the top basically has an interior corset -- I didn't need a bra, which is a major feat for me & the DDs. It felt secure the whole night. Lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again!

I got this dress for my graduation. I loved it! The material is great and very slimming. The top part has a built in bra thing so no need for a bra! It is a little tight fitting through the mid section but the 4 still fit.
simple chic dress. hugs the body but the material is stretchy so very comfortable.

I felt so chic in this dress! It's simple, but includes some really subtle details that make it feel expensive. It has a "deconstructed" look with the visible zipper, satin piping and raw hem. Comfortable, thicker stretchy (forgiving) material. Doesn't ride down as some strapless dresses do. I was able to go braless - always a win. I'm usually between a 4 and a 6 so I ordered a backup. I ended up wearing the 6 because it was less tight and more flattering. I'd describe the color as grey with lavender undertones. Did arrive slightly wrinkled (pictured straight out of the package in the second photo) but nothing a good steam can't fix.

The dress didn't look like much on the hanger, but it looked and felt elegant when worn. The fabric is thick and stretches easily, making it easy to move in while keeping a smooth appearance. I didn't need a bra with the built in bodice and felt comfortable all night- even after hitting the buffet.

links_reviews_title: This dress is simple and sexy
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 8 which is my regular size the after reading the reviews I ordered a 10 I'm so glad I did it fit so well I am 5 feet 145 pounds love this dress
Loved everything about this dress. The color really stood out in a sea of black dresses. Will definitely be renting again.
I love the way this dress fit my body. It felt great, and the piping details on the back and zipper attachment were also a nice touch and attractive. I really loved it, and felt great in it.

links_reviews_title: Unique, fun, versatile dress! I loved it!
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous - classy and sexy. It fits a bit tight in the middle but the fabric is slightly forgiving. I am usually between a 6 and 8 and wore the 8. A full size up would have been too big. I danced all night and received tons of compliments! You can have a lot of fun with the accessories too. Enjoy!
So many compliments, mature and flattering. Length was longer than anticipated but slit helps

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress looked great- material doesn't wrinkle at all so it was easy to pack. The fit is very slimming. The fit runs mostly true to size or slightly smaller. I would recommend this dress for someone tall with narrow hips as it is a bit more snug fitting around the stomach & hips.
Nice dress, need a 0 or 2. Normally wear a 4

links_reviews_title: Evening wedding at a performing arts venue. Lots of dancing and fun.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit beautifully; snug and very flattering. There is boning in the top to keep it straight, and it stops right at the waist. Because of that, sometimes the waist would scrunch. The fabric is stretchy, and I was able to dance all night and be super comfy. I received so many compliments on the fit, color, and details. Would highly recommend. Wish I could have kept it.

The color of the dress was fantastic. The fit is very unforgiving, of any imperfection. I wore my usual size, because the size size up was too big around the top. It was VERY form fitting. It was a bit longer than I had anticipated as well. Being one of the first to rent, all I had were the model pictures to look at. Definitely would not recommend for anyone under 5'5-5'6
I didn't end up wearing this. The material was cheap and worn. It would not have worked for the event I was looking at it for. I can see how it was a nice dress when it was not worn out though.
This was my back up for a wedding and I ended up not wearing it because it was too large. It was thinner material (would be a good warm weather material) and well made. No complaints!
Love the fit, color wasn't the best for my complexion but the fit was great!

links_reviews_title: fantastic dress. I should have ordered up though. Got a 4, usually works but not with E&J
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress, rented 3 times, order 1 up.

links_reviews_title: Too small through the chest, for me. It wasn't close to zipping.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it, unfortunately. I liked it but despite the style, the material made it seem casual.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress. I had so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect for my body type which is athletic and small chested.

I've been eyeing this dress for some time. It is unique and flattering. The one thing is that the fabric isn't as nice as I was expecting / interpreted from the description. It isn't as sateen as photos looks it's more of a heavier jersey knit. It's structured enough that it works but just didn't feel as elevated as I would have thought.

links_reviews_title: I wore another RTR dress that was more interesting.
links_reviews_text: Just too plain.

links_reviews_title: Not quite right for work party
links_reviews_text: I love a pretty, strapless dress and this one almost worked for me! I think this dress was runs a little small - I'm typically a 6, but the 8 fit well...I think the 6 would have been too tight in the hips. For reference, I'm 5'6", 140 pounds and 32DD chest. This dress was very pretty from the front, but the zipper makes it a little less formal and a little more strange, so I had to pass and didn't end up wearing the dress.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE the way this dress is made, but it was too tight unfortunately and didn't work with my curves
links_reviews_text: Too tight. Better for less curvy women.

I was really looking forward to wearing this dress, but I ended up wearing my back up style, since I thought this was too tight and not flattering in the right places. Even though I went up a size, it was still too small.

links_reviews_title: Amazing night, not the right dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was tricky to get into! There are many hook and eye clasps in back. I was unable to get into it myself. :) I ended up wearing a different RTR... I had rented 2 dresses.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I got as the backup for my daughters wedding, but ended up not wearing it.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I could have used a 2 just because the fabric is not forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, very trendy and different
links_reviews_text: It's tight around the midriff and don't think about wearing spanx because it's tight around the legs too and the slit is high, so spanx lines will show. If you have big boobs this might be a little much because it really emphasizes them though the built-in top part kept them firmly in place (along with a strapless bra). Overall, very sophisticated and cool, and I liked that it was different than the traditional date night dress. Definitely ideally will be in killer shape to wear it next time :)

links_reviews_title: This brand runs small- adorable dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this chic gunmetal grey dress for the formal summer wedding I was attending. This brand tends to run small so I wore the larger size,8 as opposed to my normal size 6. It was pretty close but the zipper was a little stiff on the 6 and I had to travel for the wedding so I went with the larger size. The details make this dress - so elegant.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: This Elizabeth & James dress is now one of my favorite rentals. I loved the grey color and form fitting style. The side slit added an extra hint of sexy without me having to worry about being too exposed. I wore it with big, chunky earrings and a delicate bracelet and that's all I needed for accessories. For undergarments, I wore gel pasties, but could have worn a strapless bra too. Also, I had length concerns and the dress was the perfect length for me. can't wait to rent again!
Beautiful dress! Little tight but with Spanx I was fine .

links_reviews_title: Classic dress with beautiful seam detail on the back!
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a bridesmaid and it was great. It stayed up all day with out incessant tugging. My one regret was not wearing spanx because it's definitely not very forgiving, but the seaming on the back is beautiful, and the defined waist helped me feel confident.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! It fit me perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9 and 120 lb so I don't think this dress would work length wise if you're on the shorter side. The dress fits snug and I got a ton of compliments. Highly recommend!
overall fit just didn't work for me so I never wore it. I didn't like how the chest area fit, and I felt like the strapless bra wire was digging into me.

links_reviews_title: I loved it! Just needed a size smaller
links_reviews_text: It runs big in the chest- I am 34B and size 4 was too big for me.

This dress was phenomenal! I will definitely rent it again. Fit was absolutely perfect. I am 7mos postpartum and I wasn't sure if I was going to like the fit around the midsection but I couldn't of been happier! I am 5'6" and was wearing 4" heels. The Long was a tad bit long but definitely manageable. I feel the regular length may have been too short for me.

Very elegant. Somewhat thin. A bra is definitely required with this dress. I didn‚Äôt end up wearing this gown because I liked my first choice better. This is more of a magenta color than red. I didn‚Äôt like how the black elastic around the top showed while wearing the dress. However, it‚Äôs still gorgeous. I would have definitely worn this had I not been in love with my first option.

links_reviews_title: Great fit immediately. No worries about what would have happened if it did not fit.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! I truly enjoyed it.
Great fit!!! Needed light shapewear but would totally wear again!

I've rented this dress a few times. I'm 5'8 and ordered the long. I wore 4" heels in the pic and the dress still fell just beautifully to the ground. So if you're not 5'8 or don't want to wear 4" heels, then don't rent the long. It's very comfortable and just hugged my form perfectly. Loads of compliments.

I loved this dress however I didn't receive my backup size. I have a d cup, but I'm not very curvy so I felt in the hip area this dress was the tiniest bit loose. It fit perfectly fine in the rib cage though. I received TONS of compliments despite how I felt! I do recommend it!!
5'8" 160 lbs - wore size 10L Favorite rental.... 10/10 recommend. Endless complements, fit like a glove, the material quality is fabulous, and the color is so vibrant (pinky red). LOVE!

I panicked when with only a few days notice my husband told me he bought tickets to a Children's Hospital Charity Gala- what was I going to wear?!?! Honestly, I rented this dress without much thought and just prayed it would fit. Well, I LOVED IT!! I felt like a celebrity in this dress, it was a beautiful red/pink color and very flattering fit. It was also comfortable for a long evening. My only wish is that it had been a little shorter, even with my heels it was a bit long.

links_reviews_title: Classy yet sexy, simple red dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, slipped right on! I adored the material on this gown, very stretchy breathable dress. Only downside were the pieces inside to hang the dress, they hung out so I had to safety pin them inside. Otherwise a perfect gown!

I'm 5'10", 140, and 34C. Tons of compliments. Black Halo dresses are so comfortable. Even tho this dress was "long," it didn't seem as long as other Black Halo "long" dresses. Fit well otherwise. Love it!

I wore this to my "dental prom". I got so many compliments and it hugged in all the right places. I am usually a size 2 but wore a 0 because that was all that was available but it fit perfectly still.
True to size. Snug fit. Good thick material.

I can‚Äôt say enough wonderful things about this dress! The color is amazing‚Äî a deep pink/ red. The fabric is incredible‚Äî thicker and stretchy almost like a favorite sweatshirt if that makes sense. I was a bit confused by previous women‚Äôs comments about fit. Some said it was forgiving, others said opposite. While the dress is form-fitting, it also has plenty of give to the fabric which made it super comfortable to wear all night. I wore the 8R (my usual size) but would have liked to try the 6R had it been available. If I could buy it, I would! I would absolutely rent this dress again. 5 stars!!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress it was just a tad bit to big for me in the bust area but an overall great dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Make sure the bust fits your body type!!!

This dress runs a little large. I usually wear a 4 and the 2 fit like a glove. Wore this to a black tie fund raiser. The red is more of a red-pink. The fabric is substantial and perfect for. Fall Or Winter event. It is not fully lined so be sure to pull the lining down so it doesn't bunch up around your hips. The fit is not forgiving so check your rear view in the mirror before walking out the door.

I absolutely loved this dress! The color is amazing; a bright, deep magenta color! So on trend right now. The dress itself is so comfortable, but like previous reviews state, it really does show everything. It's kind of that soft, silky, scuba material. I ended up getting the Spanx "Suit Your Fancy" bodysuit to go under it and it was perfect! I'm 5'5" and wore 4.5" heels and the 6R was just shy of touching the floor. 4" heels would have been perfect. I would definitely recommend this dress!

This dress is made of luxurious red fabric. The red is very rich with pink undertones. It hangs beautifully on the curves. I am 5'10" and wished I would have ordered the regular length. I had to hold it up to walk and dance. The fabric is heavy. I probably could have worn a 6 but was to scared to try it when previous reviews said it hugged the body. This dress made heads turn. I loved wearing it and would order it again.

This dress is amazing! Such a comfortable strapless gown, although I could have used a strapless bra to give more structure to the top, it stayed up all night. I will say the Long is extremely long, I am 5'9" and wore 4" heels and it was still about an inch or so on the ground. I would absolutely rent this again- it was actually my backup!

links_reviews_title: Dress was beautiful. Much better looking in person!
links_reviews_text: My daughter loved the dress and it fit her perfectly although she did not have a large bust size.
Beautiful dress, but too long, even in 4 inch heels. I received a ton of compliments though.

One of my favorite rentals so far! The color is a bit more pink than red in person, but it's deep, vibrant, and beautiful. The fabric is thick and stretchy with a soft finish, very comfortable. Long length was perfect for me at 5'8" with 3" heels. Best for athletic figures, as every bump and lump will show, as would the edge of any undergarment you wore to disguise them.
I took this dress out of the bag and immediately noticed it was dirty, so I couldn't wear it to the event. I love the dress. Bummed.
Loved loved loved this dress, beautiful stretch material. I would absolutely rent again. Compliments ask night at a vintage gala theme
This dress fit right in all the right places, the material was very stretchy and forgiving. Lots of compliments! I'd rent it again!

This dress fits a bit large an is completely unforgiving on lumps or bumps. However, it's beautiful and I just made sure to wear appropriate undergarments. I don't own spanx or similar but if I do I probably would have worn them.
Rented the gown for a black tie wedding and received so many compliments. The fit is true to size and the fabric is very forgiving.

I rented this dress for my husband's military ball we attend every year. I wore red last year and got so many compliments, I decided to go with red again this year. This wasn't my first choice, it was actually selected by one of the stylists at the Chicago store (they were wonderful!) The dress I originally ordered was too tight and would not have been comfortable for a night of eating, drinking and dancing. This dress was SO comfortable. The material is super stretchy which made it perfect for dancing. With that being said, the material being stretchy also makes it pretty unforgiving in certain areas. Because of that, I didn't give it 5 stars. My underwear was noticeable but I'm not one to not wear one, so I had to just be okay with that. I also didn't like that the dress has long and short straps for hanging (on the inside of the dress) that wouldn't stay in and kept coming out. Nothing major, but again, I did have to make several runs to the bathroom to fix this. I wore an 8L but I normally rent a size 10, I think it runs pretty true to size and the stretch helps as well. I always rent size "long" because I'm 5'10 without heels but always wear heels with my dresses. I got a lot of compliments on the color and it was truly perfect for this event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my cancer center's annual formal gala. (This was my backup backup dress! Third time was a charm I guess. Chase in customer service was awesome!!) The fabric was beautiful and the color was somewhere between a fuchsia and a red. I'm usually a solid 6, but the 8 just fell better on my hips. I wore a regular length and with my 4" heels it was perfect(I'm 5'3"). The top was a little loose and the black hanger ties kept popping out, so that was annoying. Overall I received tons of compliments on this dress and would rent it again!
This dress is really comfortable and the fabric has a nice stretch to it!
Beautiful color. So many compliments. Comfortable fabric. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Super soft fabric, neckline not my favorite
links_reviews_text: I loved the feel of the fabric of this dress, If the wearer is smaller chested, she can easily get by without a bra, I did feel like this would need shaping undergarments to make the dress look pulled together and classy. This dress ran slightly big, but I'm not sure I would've gone down a full size. The only thing I didn't love was how the neckline laid, it gave an illusion of lopsidedness. This was the gown I ordered as a backup and it would've definitely worked in a pinch!
So comfortable. Fit great!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me look 10 lbs thinner! Loved it.
links_reviews_text: The dress hid every imperfection on my body which I was shocked by. Stretchy material. Forgiving fabric. Amazing color. My only complaint was the black strings inside the dress popped out a bunch which was a pain to deal with but other than that the dress was amazing. I'm 5'5" 140 lbs and wore an 8L and the long was just barely too long with heels on. The 6R was too short with my heels or else I would have worn the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: LOVE!!! 5 Stars! It's stretchy, it stays in place, the material is thick and the color is gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Pros: material is stretchy and thick. There is an elastic band on the top of the dress that keeps it in place beautifully. I probably could have worn a 2 (usual size is 4 or 6) as the material gives quite a bit. If you like your dresses tight, go smaller. It looks very expensive. Classy, elegant and sophisticated. People told me I looked like Jessica Rabbit. Cons: the loops to help you keep it on a hanger need to be taped down. That's it. Otherwise this dress is perfection.

I rented this for a black tie gala in Washington, DC. I usually wear a 2R but it wasn‚Äôt available so I wore a 4R, which fit great. I even tried on the 2L but it was waaayyyy too long. The material is like that thick scuba material so it does not provide any support. The fabric is also not forgiving whatsoever, so every bump can be seen. Oh well. I received tons of compliments on it the same. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô1‚Äù, 117 lbs, 34B and wore huge 5 inch heels and a strapless bra. Overall a beautiful dress that turned heads.

links_reviews_title: Photographed beautifully, the color was unique in a sea a black dresses.
links_reviews_text: I gave this dress 3 stars because the overall fit and form of this weren't the best. It ran large, which others posted, so I ordered one size smaller that normal in Black Halo, I could've gone down another size. The dress kept sliding down, as the top was huge, I'm only a 34B, also, the hanger loops kept popping out and the top was folding over weird. Other than the issues with the top of the dress, the length was perfect, with or without heels, the waist was flattering, but the real standout was the color.

links_reviews_title: Amazing material but not too much structure
links_reviews_text: UGH. i wish this dress had some structure in the bodice, it was just too stretchy for it to look good. the material is gorgeous but it just didn't hold my top half up and in the way I would have liked it to.
So pretty! More of a deep pink than red. Only issue was the lining which ends slightly before the knee. Had to be a bit of tugging all night to keep it from riding up. Liked the dress.

links_reviews_title: The color was gorgeous. Was a knock out dress but not too flashy.
links_reviews_text: The top portion had a bit of black liner showing but not a big deal. Dress was comfortable and easy to wear. not too heavy but not lightweight. Nice sturdy fabric. Not a forgiving dress so you may want Spanx

links_reviews_title: Love this stretchy material! So comfortable and looked awesome.
links_reviews_text: Forgiving material, a little long for my 5'5" frame, but heels worked fine. very comfortable

This worked perfect for a work event I had. The black is see through so beware of that, and going without a bra might not work if you happen to get chilled because the top can be a bit more fitted in the bust. It's pretty difficult to zip upon your own and the sash for your waist is removable Incase you don't want to use it. But over all I really loved this!
Rented for a trade show in NYC. it was perfect. Comfortable. Professional but very chic. Glad I opted for this style as my original selections did not fit!

links_reviews_title: It‚Äôs just the cutest. I recommend if you‚Äôre not in the best shape but still loves to feel beautiful.
links_reviews_text: It‚Äôs the perfect outfit for fancy date night. Or for a wedding outside. It‚Äôs chic and it makes you look thinner.
I wanted something sleek for a work event and this was perfect. It's not too tight and gives a little room to breathe but just looks so professional! By far my favorite item I have rented so far.

This was a super comfortable jumpsuit but it will make you look like a million bucks! The materials is pretty thick and not ideal for the summer but for the awkward weather between winter and spring, it is perfect. I wore it for a wedding rehearsal dinner and I received so many compliments. I usually wear a 10 but I decided to size up to the 12. I'm glad I did because it did not make it hard to sit down which sometimes happens with jumpsuits.
I rented this jumpsuit for a party I hosted. It was perfect - comfortable, chic and classy! The fit is true to size.

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments this was a perfect choice for the Royal Luncheon Mardi Gras 2019
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit was true to size it was comfortable and cute. If you are taller than 5'9 it the regular may be too short at the bottom. Other than that I had a really classy look.

links_reviews_title: Worn to a NYC baby shower, perfect t!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this ‚Äî so comfy and fun. I went up a size (normally a 6) for length in the pant but it sinched perfectly at the waist with the belt so it was still super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great one piece that is professional!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a fundraising gala. It was easy and fun!

This black jumpsuit came out of the wardrobe bag looking frumpy and huge, but once on and the belt is on, it's definitely and glamorous, classic, and comfortable jumpsuit. The back and arms are shear, but not so much that you can't wear it to the office. The belt is soft and gorgeous, go right around your waist to cinch the suit and thins you right out. It did run a little large in the bottom, but the top was perfect for me! I would wear this for everyday! Loved it! Did not wear a bra with it, and it was comfortable!

I love this sleek and trendy jumpsuit by RACHEL ROY COLLECTION! Running true to size with no real stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted but not too tight throughout the midsection and hips. It works for cup sizes A-D. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is a very sheer back. At 5‚Äô4‚Äù, the length hit floor length on me. The deep black color is beautiful in person and the sheer back makes it unique and a little sexy! Pair with black or a pop of colorful heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

This jumpsuit was perfect for my NYE party in Manhattan. It was cocktail attire and felt like the jumpsuit was spot on for the event. The pants were too long because I am 5‚Äô2 and wore 1‚Äù heels. I used double sided tape to hem the bottoms up and my problem was fixed. I would rent this again because I felt fabulous in it.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and sexy, yet classy.
links_reviews_text: Would not recommend for larger busts. 36DD, no stretch in the bust area. I have an hourglass shape and the fit was amazing, aside from the bust area.
A lot of black but great with statement necklace and belt
Jumper was long in the torso, even for me (I have a long torso). Forgot to wear the belt, so that may have helped!
Fit like a glove.
Back is completely sheer and not appropriate for work but the fit was perfect and it's a very flattering jumpsuit.

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove! I LOVE this!
links_reviews_text: Best item i've rented from RTR yet! might just be the most flattering outfit I've ever worn! Lots of compliments - very comfy and very flattering. I'm keeping this one!
Worn this to a work event. Fit was excellent. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I actually just tried it on...
links_reviews_text: May be a tiny bit short but otherwise very classy. I want to rent for my holiday party this year!

Great Romper and fit perfect, except too long to wear. I'm 108lbs and 5'2". I just started RTR and trying to figure out my sizes. The reviews y'all have left have been helpful, so passing along my experience. It's darling!
Very comfortable --- didn't wear bra due to the sheer back, very classy look.

links_reviews_title: Way too long for a short person like me. Shame because I liked the style.
links_reviews_text: Way too long for a short person like me. Shame because I liked the style.
Kept me warm in an office environment. I'm petite and 4r was perfect with heels.

links_reviews_title: One of the most beautiful pieces I have rented.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fit and lots of compliments!!
Still cute
Way too short for me to wear. I'm 5'7.

I so wanted to love and rock the crap out of this jumpsuit for a Bridal Shower. This looked absolutely beautiful out of the bag. It felt almost brand new - the material felt luxurious and the zipper in the back looked so classy. And those sheer sleeves! Ugh! LOVE. LOVE. Beautiful all around! Unfortunately, I am 5'0ft and the torso measurements just didn't work for me -- Because I am so short, the zippered part bunched up and gave me a nice little bubble on my back since there was extra material and not enough of me. Nobody likes bubble back. This is no fault but my own. They tell you to measure yourself and consult measurements before ordering... I did not do that... Live and Learn! For those who are not 5'0ft tall, you will love this jumpsuit! The rating is based on the quality even though I didn't get to (sadly) wear it.

links_reviews_title: Fabric is very high quality. Looks very posh.
links_reviews_text: The size is perfect.
Beautiful piece. I'm 5'4" and the length was perfect. Ran a bit big so didn't choose to wear this one.
So comfortable! Has pockets! Only thing , need to wear nipple covers due to the shear back. Loved this!

I have broad shoulders and a long torso; the fit was a little tight across my shoulders and the band fell a little high on my waist. A longer length option would have avoided showing my ankles and wrists when I sat. Overall, very comfortable (if not the most flattering around the middle).
Loved it. Very comfortable.
Good fit, a little long for petite people. Beautiful details.

I loved this jumpsuit, it was the perfect length and fit. When hanging up without the belt, I was skeptical, I thought it was going to be shapeless/boxy, but with the belt tied it was structured and flattering. The sheer back makes it fun, but a little trickier with a bra!
Obsessed with this gorgeous jumpsuit! It was form fitting in all the right places and cinched at the waist. Perfect for a date, will rent again!

I loved these pants!! So comfortable and easy to combine with everything, very breathable. It could easily be mistaken for a skirt but has the practicality of pants. I'm considering buying because I could really see myself wearing these for any occasion!

Easy and breezy. Everyone was surprised that these were infact pants. True to size. I was thrown by the velvet tie...felt the pants were too light weight and summery for velvet. Rocked them to work as you see here and then changed to black tennies and a cross body bag for a beer festival. Wish they would have had pockets.
I love this skirt! It's so flowy and comfy and the pattern is so pretty. I really like how it looks like a skirt but you're able to move in them like pants.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Very comfy and cute!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about it, very high waist so ideal to pair with a crop top or really any basic shirt. Very light material, perfect for spring.
