Please note I took the pic at a bad angle so I look much shorter than I am, but I'm 5'7" and the pants fit great (the hem was about 6 inches above my ankles!).

links_reviews_title: Flow of a skirt, ease of pants!
links_reviews_text: Waist does not stretch too much but sits nicely on. Material is light and does not wrinkle making it ideal for travel. Dress it up or down... beautiful design, color and pattern. LOVE it
Fun to wear to work. Felt a little tight on the waist but other than that- I had so much fun wearing these pants to work.

links_reviews_title: Hesitated...then fell a little in love!
links_reviews_text: Wasn't sure about these when I first put them on, but while I was wearing them, I was like, "Wait. WHAT was my hesitation?" Wore them to a casual art opening, and they were perfect -- stylish and so comfortable that I didn't need to give them a second thought. Although they worked with heels, I dressed them down, because-- as one reviewer said -- they feel like wearing PJs, and heels would have defeated that. I'm 5'9", a solid 10-12; waist is tight going on, and I (with, admittedly, a bit of a belly) wished they'd been ever-so-slightly looser, but it didn't actively bother me, and overall they were more comfortable than most clothes. Looked best with black. I will rent again,
These pants look like a skirt which I love! The pattern is beautiful in person and not as loud as I expected. I wish they were a bit shorter but I'm short so what can you do.

Flows beautifully, looks like a skirt, very dark elegant and feminine, perfect for a moody spring day. Except since they are pants, you also have freedom of exuberant movement. I would buy this if I had the money..,

Love these unique floral pants by Mother of Pearl! Firstly, I love how it looks like you're wearing a skirt when you're standing especially because I am definitely not in the mood to deal with wearing a skirt every time. This style is extremely comfortable and can be dressed up or down depending on the top and shoes you wear. Even with the elastic band, the pants do run a bit small so I would recommend sizing up if you are curvier in the hips or if you are in between sizes. Can't wait to wear these to work and transition to night for drinks after!

links_reviews_title: Loved them even more in person!
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize until I received these how versatile they are! I originally rented them to wear with booties for walking around Paris, but ended up also wearing them to work and then dressed them up to go to dinner too. They are super comfortable and don't wrinkle (travel friendly!)

Ridiculously comfy! Feels like you aren't wearing pants. The waist band was a little snug I had to really shimmy my hips in! But once they were on they looked beautiful. Loved the structure and the waist synch.

I loved these pants except for the fact that I rented them in winter! The pattern is beautiful. The accordian pleats and fabric did not wrinkle. The detailed velvet ribbon was a great touch. I'd love to rent these again in warmer weather but they did look nice with booties.

From the front this looked nice. The legs are very full so it looks like a skirt which was the look I was going for. From the back and side, it was not flattering. The pleats and full was made my butt look huge.

These pants are super comfortable and really cute. There are so many colors in the print that matching a top to these pants is super easy. I've rented these twice already. Second time the pleats were a little flattened.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun but not flattering
links_reviews_text: When you're wearing wide pants with pleats you know they're not going to be the most flattering but the fabric was too cute to pass up!! Wore to work in the summer and loved them.

links_reviews_title: A vibrant fun twist on a skirt
links_reviews_text: Lovely fabric with vibrant colors--not as dark as pictured. Definitely gives off a summer vibe. The pleats hand nicely and aren't overwhelming at all. I wanted something dressy but fun for a work presentation. This fit the bill!
Fit true to size, comfortable and flowy. Just as pictured
Very unflattering. Material felt very cheap
Waist is tiny in a large and I have a small waist.

links_reviews_title: LOVE. Fabric feels flimsy, but it's comfy and looks stunning on!
links_reviews_text: I love this piece and wore it multiple times. The fabric is feels kinda cheap and flimsy (note: you will be cold) but it looks really lovely on. Flattering even on petite bodies, and SUPER comfortable to boot. Can also be styled multiple ways and across different seasons! 8/10 would rent again, minus a point for the weird fabric.

links_reviews_title: I didn't particularly love the print
links_reviews_text: Very roomy could be cute with a black crop top
Look like a skirt- but are a pant! Can't go wrong! Love the velvet detail in the tie

I loved the print and the vibe. The waist was just way too small and the view from behind was not flattering. I suspect this would look best on a person with a straight, slim figure or someone with a small waist and curvier bottom half who wants to emphasize their curves.

Pants have appearance of a skirt. However, it wasnt flattering for my body type. Actual print wasnt quite as bright as it looks in the photo, but still looked nice. Waist has velvet drawstring and elastic stretch.

I LOVED these on the hanger, and I loved them on too except the waist is so tight it was too uncomfortable to wear. I sized up based on other reviews, but it was still really tight. Couldn't wear them.
Cute fabric and accordion pleats. Warning! Makes a normally nice butt look flat and wide- eeeeek!
pants were in good condition but I feel like they ran large. I would try the M next time

links_reviews_title: These pants are super comfortable and the print is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The waist is a little hard to get over my hips but once they're on they are fantastic! The quality is very high. The fabric feels nice, not too thin, not too thick.
These made my legs look enormous. There is nothing flattering about the pants- the proportions are all off.
cute length even for short person (5'2")
The waist is tiny and the legs are cut gigantic. Overall an unflattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Super cute pants! A little tight on the waist!
links_reviews_text: While these fit everywhere but my waist, they were super cute! I am just picky and wanted to wear these all day for vacation, except the elastic waist was a little too snug for my comfort so I sent them back. They definitely look and flow like a skirt but I think would be perfect for summer or fall!

I LOVE these pants and would totally buy them if they were not $500. They were so easy to wear in winter with black tights underneath and a black shirt. The floral is perfect for fall and winter and the pants are comfortable while looking super fashionable.

I didnt get a pic to share but i want to recommend! Elastic waist, super cute velvet belt, pleats and beautiful print. I wore to party with black top and had compliments, especially when they realized they were pants. Wore next afternoon to BD party with coral shirt to accent flowers in the print and flats. I will rent again this spring for vacation.
very elegant but comfortable.

I am 5'5" and barefoot it just slightly dragged on the ground. I wore short heels, and picked it up in my hand when I was walking around outside just to avoid getting it dirty on the sidewalk. It has a fairly high slit, and a shorter lining underneath the longer outside layer so it's easy enough to do this. The keyhole neckline was fun. I really like it, but maybe would get the 2P next time if I wanted to wear flats.

Loved the length with a 1" heel, loved the pockets, loved the deep neckline (I'm an A cup, so I wore pasties), and I loved the lace sleeves and slits on the skirt! The only thing I didn't love is I had to return the dress. I will be renting this beauty again!

It's a pretty dress, but overall kind of "meh" the hips are pretty tight and the waist drops a little low. The open back is on odd touch on a conservative front and the dress is pretty long and needs to be worn with heels. It is still a cute dress, I just wouldn't wear it again
Use for Family pictures. Fit perfect and flowed nicely. I wore a tank top under it, with the open back, just because it was family pictures. Wonderful dress!
Fits a little small around waist area but very nice and flowy! Perfect for miami summer nights!
I wore this dress for a photo shoot with my daughter. The light material was great for the hot summer evening. Great color/design and the fit was very flattering.

Wore to a rehearsal dinner. Dress is tricky with a bra and too shear to go bra less. I opted for a light blue bra-let and let the back of the bra show through the open back and was safe it it showed in the front but I'm pretty certain it didnt. I'd recommend it.

wore this dress to a summer wedding in brooklyn and loved it. as the other reviews say, the front is pretty open as well as the back. i wore a backless bra though and it was fine. the band in the middle has no give so was a bit tight but not uncomfortable. the dress was a bit long for me though. i am 5'3" and wore 3 inch heels but there was still about 2 inches of the dress dragging on the ground so i had to hold the dress most of the night. would definitely recommend and rent again!
Great dress. Even though felt a bit too large, but still looked awesome.

This dress worked perfectly for a family photo shoot. The flowy short sleeves helped avoid any worry of accidentally creating big-looking arms and same with the bottom half. It's perfect for a photo shoot, a baby shower, a vineyard tasting, or out to dinner. It is not stretchy, but the fit was pretty true to size (for me, a 4 usually is okay but can be risky. This one worked). Loved it 100%!

I liked this dress a lot. I wasn't in love with it but I did love how I felt in it and that was largely due to the fabric. It felt almost decadent. The back is pretty open and there's a decent size opening in the front but I still wore a regular bra and just went with it. If the boobs weren't an issue I'd definitely rent again.

Beautiful dress. Darker pink than pictured. Back is totally open except for the button at the neck, so I wore a mint colored cami bra. LOVE the pockets. There is no give, so if you are bigger in the hips and waist, size up.

links_reviews_title: Unique and beautiful dress! Perfect for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Note that the dress has an open back--the back zipper goes to the waist and then the next closure is at the neck. There is also a slit on one side that goes to above the knee. It's a very whimsical dress--the lace accents on the front panel and the sleeves are a beautiful touch. You are sure to feel great in this dress!

This dress is beautiful, wore it to my sons graduation, but I don't think it suited my body type. I was comfortable, I just didn't feel great in it and my back up outfit had a noticeable hole in the seam.

I loved this dress! I would have been more comfortable going a size up- the waist was tight and slip was a bit short for my taste. I got so many compliments though! You probably can't find a bra for this one with a low front and open back, but with pasteys everything was fine for me. It was perfect for an outdoor wedding!

This was for an outdoor affair and it ended up raining. I didn't want to drag it through the mud all night so I skipped it. Great on.. mine was a little loose on top. And it would require a backless bra for no straps to show

Gorgeous and easy to wear dress! I got the medium which was ok but probably could have done with the small. The colors are more vibrant in person which was good for my complexion. The lining is pretty short and sheer especially in sunshine. I wore spanx shorts underneath just to be on the safe side. The length was just right for flats or wedges with no dragging in the ground. The front lace panel is quite sheer as well and there is a keyhole in the back. You could wear a low cut backless bra but I found a pretty lace nude bra to be perfectly fine for casual wear. This dress is super comfortable and looks beautiful day or night. I will definitely be renting this again.

I wore this wine tasting. It is much more detailed and beautiful in person than any picture could show. Fit is very comfortable but still fitted. Beautiful lace detail on the sleeves and flows when you walk. Loved wearing this dress all day!
Perfect for a summer fall or spring wedding. Had a shorter dress as the underskirt with a long sheer bottom. Very light and airy

The fabric was lighter than I thought but the fit was nice. I am 5'8" and the 8R just about cane to the floor in bare feet, but i would have liked for it to be a few inches longer. The back has an open drape detail that is very pretty.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED wearing this dress for my Daughter in Laws Baby Shower. It was comfortable and pretty!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, i really can't say anything negative about this dress!
Was long on me but I expect this with most everything as I am only 5'1" but made it work.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals to date.
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this flirty fun dress. It was so breezy and light. Perfect for a hot September day in nyc

I rented this for Hawaii and wore it to dinner and even to the beach! It was such a comfortable material, it was perfect for my incredibly painful sunburn. I love the design, I love the slit, I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing dress and every time I wear it I get stopped by people asking where I got it. I included a picture of the back of the dress with a slip underneath. I find with a nude slip it was just enough coverage with a little sexiness for every day use. If you don't wear a slip, there is one included in the dress but I find it the dress slip to be very see thru in sunlight. I can't recommend this dress enough - it is probably my favorite rental to date!

This dress is gorgeous! There is the absolute right blend of boho, sexy details, and effortless chic! Pair it with some cute sandals, sunglasses and clutch, and you're ready to go! The open back detail is also a beautiful extra touch!

links_reviews_title: Chic dress. It is see through in the front center and open back.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress. Material is beautiful. I wore this very casual and felt beautiful. It is see through so I tried a slip but it was visible in the open back so I opted for a earthy purple bra and just let it show.
I wore this for a get together in the Hampton's and it was perfect! Would size up if you have bigger hips/a butt because it's not super forgiving.
Great maci dress. Truly elegant. Tons of compliments. Can dress this one up or down, even create it into a work piece! Loved it

This dress is prettier once on. The colors are beautiful and the fabric is very light. I definitely recommend wearing a slip because it is very see-through. I went have dinner with my family, there was plenty of daylight and we were outside. I took it for vacation and forgot my slip, so I wore shorts underneath, but I tried no to separate my legs too much while standing because it shows your legs pretty well underneath the dress. Also, It would look better without a bra or a nubra because the back opens a little. I wore a regular nude bra and it showed the band a little bit in the back. Despite those little details, I enjoyed wearing it. I am about 5'6" and wore this dress with red flats. It was a bit long, but nothing too bad. Again, I was on vacation and I didn't really have many choices, but it was perfect for a family dinner and pictures!!

Great dress! So comfortable, easy to wear, and unique. Wore this to a semi-formal vineyard wedding, and got compliments all night. It is fitted narrowly at the waist, which was the limiting factor on size. But the loose fit of the rest of the dress is pretty forgiving, while still being flattering. The dress is fairly low cut in the front and opens in the back, so it may be difficult to find a bra that won't show. Not a problem if you're comfortable going without. The outer layer is a little sheer, and there is short slip underneath. Overall highly recommend for trying something fun and different but still comfortable!
I wore this while on vacation in Savannah, GA. It was not only beautifully made, but light weight and constructed with pockets!! BCBG gets bonus points for functionality!

links_reviews_title: Love this flowy and feminine dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my best friend's college graduation, and it was perfect! It was so flowy and comfortable to wear and I received a ton of compliments. I am 5' 4", and the length was perfect with flats. The fitted waist adds definition at the waist so that you do not look too boxy in the flowing material. It was very light material and perfect for warm summer weather. It showed a little bit more cleavage than I would've liked, but with a cute bralett underneath, it was perfect. In the back there is an opening, so you can see the bra that you wear. A rose pink bralett worked great. I would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this dress! It's super comfortable AND it has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Please note, you cannot wear a regular bra with this dress. The back is slit open so you have to wear a backless bra. I had to run out to Target to get one and it kept coming loose by the end of the night since I was dancing and sweating up a storm.
Loved this for my sister's college graduation! Lots of compliments. Will note that it is pretty sheer so I did have to wear a tank top and shorts underneath for coverage :)

I wore this to a baby shower brunch and received many compliments! I loved the print and lace detail on the sleeves. It was pretty long so I had to wear tall wedges. Not a dress a would normally wear, but I'm so glad I rented it!
I wish I could buy this! It's a gorgeous color and it flows beautifully. I felt ethereal. You can dress it up or down. It's awesome

Such a fun dress! Wore it to our wedding tasting at resort in Florida. Great vacation dress! Highly recommend a spray tan though, colors are light. Also recommend investing in a sticky cup bra. The lace detail in the front and back is beautiful, but wearing a regular bra or even a strapless bra would show. I'm 5'6" and could have worn it with flats, dress isn't super long- perfect fit. Dress fit was slightly larger to true size.
This dress is easy to pack for traveling! Great for outdoor event/ summer

wore this to an end of summer/early fall wedding - light airy fabric paired with a great design and cut. I had to wear an adhesive bra for this - a regular bra will show through. this was extremely comfortable to walk and dance in - highly recommend and would def rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress-I didn't want to return it!
links_reviews_text: The color was as expected, and so pretty. The fit was so true to size and I didn't have to fidget with adjusting anything throughout the night, it was so comfortable. The folded frill detail and and small train made me feel so glamorous and it was fun dancing in! I really did not want to return it and would rent it again in a heartbeat.

Pros- It fit like a glove, I didn't have to wear any undergarments to hide my roles because the dresses ruffles hid most of it. I truly felt beautiful Cons- The boning underneath was poking so I was happy I didn't have to wear the dress long. Would recommend using bandaids if wearing a long time.

links_reviews_title: Size down if you're small on top
links_reviews_text: Me: 5'8.5", 145 lbs, 32c, smaller on top than bottom, usually wears a 6L The 6L was too large for me on top, so I didn't wear (see two photos attached to my review - the second one really shows the top being too large if that's a concern for you). A beautiful color, though. Was a bit less bright than I thought it would be.

This dress is the absolutely most perfect dress for a black tie wedding. I'm 5'3, 135 with an hour glass figure (big boobs/butt smaller waist) and it was sooo flattering. I would say it runs large because I typically wear a 4 or a 6. I got the 4 first and I just felt like it would be more flattering if it was a bit more snug bc the top is corset like. They only had the "long" size available but I honestly thought it fit fine. Definitely a must rent.
I got so many compliments on this gown!!! If I had more formal things to go to, I would buy it. Love love love

Absolutely in love with this dress. I normally wear a size 10. RTR staff really bent over backwards to accommodate all my special requests. I eventually ended up ordering a backup size 12 and when I tried it on..it fit perfect. I didn't need to do anything but match my jewelry and heels. I'm 5'3" and my heels gave the right lift. I got compliments all night long and this dress was perfect for my mom's birthday celebration. Color looks different depending on lighting, but it's a beautiful color.

Beautiful color, perfect length and flattering!! Compliments galore. This beautiful gown is so figure flattering and hid my midsection insecurities just right. Was VERY comfortable to wear. Will rent again!

It has a built-in bra support but I still wore a strapless for added support. It was so pretty. I got a lot of compliments . I did have to keep pulling it up as it is heavy and well-made, so it tended to drop, as to be expected with either strapless or side sleeve- type dresses such as this. It runs mostly true to size, maybe a little on the larger side. Definitely a high-design gorgeous dress.
I loved this dress. It was amazing for the event. Very comfortable and uncommon no one else in the room had a similar dress!

links_reviews_title: The color is vibrant and the dress is gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Fitted and forgiving

links_reviews_title: Charity event for cancer research. RTR makes it super easy to attend formal events cost effectively.
links_reviews_text: Love the style, colour and fit of this dress. Received lots of compliments. The boning in the bodice was slightly uncomfortable but definitely needed for support and made wearing a bra un-necessary.
One of the dresses I chose was not available so this one was sent instead. The color was good for my skin tone, but I didn't love the ruffles.
Lovely creation, perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely adored this dress! I felt like a princess all night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a charity gala for work and received compliments all night! So gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: The material is very nice as is the built in bra
links_reviews_text: Im 5‚Äô6‚Äù and it seemed to bunch at the back as if i needed to be taller to wear it well. Also not as forgiving in the belly area as I had hoped.
Ran small, no stretch. Thick fabric. Probably would have been hot for a summer event, but didn't wear it.
Was complimented the entire evening
Little love cut. Great fit and fabric

links_reviews_title: The dress was beautiful, fit well, and gave me that retro look I wanted
links_reviews_text: First of all, the color was gorgeous. I felt it was true to the picture. I could have worn either size (6R or 8R). I wear an 8 in my everyday life, but I needed the 6R b/c my chest isn't so large. The material doesn't wrinkly and the ruffle and ruching hides the bumpy parts and makes it very flattering. CONS: Everyone was telling the truth about the boning sticking. Mine had the boning coming out of the top and I had to trim it a little. It was also coming out the bottom and was stabbing me if I moved in certain ways. Also, I used tape, but I felt like the inner lining in the chest area kept flipping out. I struggled to get it to lay flat. This was all superficial stuff though. I'm sure I'm the only one that noticed. 100% would recommend this dress if you love compliments and looking fabulous. I felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! An absolute show stopper!
links_reviews_text: Under the boobs there were these sharp edges that hurt and dug into my skin! I will say it was really uncomfortable but I loved the dress so much I didn't mind! I felt so sexy!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the color !
links_reviews_text: It fit wonderful and got so many compliments on it !!!
This dress was super elegant. Although it didn't hide my stomach as much as I wanted it to, it was very flattering. It was a head turner for sure.
This dress couldn't of been more perfect. It was super flattering and I got so many compliments. I truely never wanted to take it off! A must if you're going to a formal event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, elegant dress in unusual color
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable. I only had this one picture, which was when I tried it on. No need to wear a bra or shaping garments - the dress does all the work. I am 5'5" and the length in 8R was perfect with a 3" heel. The dress is very elegant, but I felt a little like a bridesmaid. That being said, I received compliments on the dress all evening.
It fit like a glove with a bit of stretch to the fabric in the back unlike a lot of BM' gowns.

links_reviews_title: This was my first time renting from RTR. I will definitely rent again!
links_reviews_text: I have a liver and kidney disease which causes my mid-section to appear as though I'm pregnant. This dress was amazing! I did not look pregnant! I had multiple people compliment on how beautiful the dress was and how perfect it looked. I wore this to a Masquerade Ball. I only knew a handful of people but was complimented by so many people. The back of the dress dragged on the floor in a train fashion with 3 inch heels. The front of the dress is open so it wasn't a problem.
The fabric is sturdy and was extremely comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, fit is perfect, has a corset for the top and the ruffles hide any post baby belly.
links_reviews_text: Had compliments all night.

It wasn't the dress I chose--my dress was damaged and I had to pick this one last minute. I was surprised but satisfied. It fit true to size. There was one small stain on the ruffle but it was well hidden and the boning on the inside was poking out a little but I made do. I had lots of compliments and loved the dress!
It accented my curves. So many compliments!!!

I loved this dress! It was great for our Hollywood themed auction. I particularly loved how it comes up in the front so you aren't kicking the dress like I (being short) often do. The only issue is that the boning pokes through and is sharp. I remedied by using sports tape to cover boning on dress and keep from poking my skin and it worked like a charm. Fun night!
Loved this dress- very flattering fit. Is more purple than it appears on RTR website

I loved the color of this dress! Not the usual black. I usually wear a size 4 but felt my bust area needed more room. The 6 looked perfect. The only discomfort was the plastic built in corset but it was manageable. I wore the stick on bra pads and it worked fine. I liked the weight of the fabric and was perfect for early spring event. I received many compliments and was happy with my choice!
Compliments all night !! I usually wear size 2 but 4R was perfect. Material stretches so perfect if you over eat :-) Everyone loved the dress.

I ordered a 2 but should have ordered a 0. The dress made me feel beautiful, but the top was was too big and kept slipping down! I was a bridesmaid in a wedding and super self-conscious that my bits would begin peeking out as I obviously couldn't keep yanking the dress up the whole time. You live and learn, right?
Loved this dress when I saw it and loved being able to wear it :) Fit perfect!
Fit like a glove, super flattering, very comfortable to wear, perfect color and material. Just an amazing dress.
Fab dress that is very forgiving. Just rent it. Trust me

links_reviews_title: I love this dress!!! The fit was perfect and I got sooo many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4 but the dress was only available in my size in a long. It was the perfect length with my high heels.

I got so many compliments. Quality was great. Heavy fabric that didn't wrinkle. Color was so pretty. I wore with shoes by same designer from amazon. Didn't want to take dress off! Bust fit well with no tape needed and would have fit smaller chest. If your chest is larger may need to measure carefully or use fabric tape. Recommend a smoother under if you have a tummy like me. I loved that my apple shape looked hourglass. Highly recommend.
It's a basic little black dress. The sheen and cut make it feel youthful. It wasn't as flattering as I'd hoped for. True to size. Shelter in place happened so I didn't get to wear it out.

links_reviews_title: Great night, great party, great dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great! Fabric was stretchy enough for my large bust, length was perfect, fabric wasn't clingy!

links_reviews_title: I got a million compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fits really well, you need a skinny bra otherwise it shows on the sides. Really elegant!

LOVE, LOVE, LOVED this dress. Fit perfectly and very flattering. Tapers in nicely at natural waist and flows out just enough. Thick fabric is also flattering. Just enough sparkle to make it a bit dressier. Felt comfortable and fabulous. Thank you!!

This dress still had tags on when it arrived! I wore this to the theater in December and wanted something a little festive. The shimmer made this basic dress feel more special. I did think it was a little boring on the hanger but my husband loved it, so I added a belt and a jacket to accessorize. Not the most flattering photo and my arm is covering the belt, but with a little effort, it worked. Size was slightly large and I definitely needed the belt.
I rented four dresses for a Christmas cruise and this was my favorite and most flattering. I'm normally a size 14 so size up ladies because even a 16 was tight with a shaper.
fits tight around the chest but was nice to dress up or down

Dress fit perfectly! I worried that the 16 would be too loose in the chest but it was fine. Length was just under my knees which was excellent for awards gala which was black tie. I had to pack this dress in a carryon and it traveled so well....no wrinkles across the country...I would buy it for that alone! I did dress it up with a fancy shawl and a fascination and some heels.
The fit was too big but I LOVED the dress. Ended up buying it from a local department store in the correct size and keeping it

links_reviews_title: Good black dress with some sparkle
links_reviews_text: The dress was good for a semi-formal wedding. There is a little bit of sparkle to the fabric. Good length, modest at the top, a little heavy in the fabric. Overall pretty good and would rent again.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and not flashy. Nothing really exciting. I would not rent again.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 12/14 and all of the 14s I rented were small. I went up to a 16 in this one and it was a bit large. Comfortable dress. Just kind of underwhelming.

I did not choose this dress for my event. I'm very short waisted and petite. The bodice ended at my hips instead of below my waist as expected, and it was much longer than it appears in the picture. I buy regular length dresses all the time without a problem, but this hit lower mid calf making me look very frumpy.
Loved the dress, but it was a little bit tight in the bust.

links_reviews_title: The subtle silver sparkle made my conference outfit a little more fun.
links_reviews_text: I am tall, and the hem still hit at the knee, which I liked. It was loose and comfortable. The fabric did not wrinkle in my luggage. I wore it with a cardigan.
Wore the 18R and it was perfect for the event I had to attend. It was flowy and comfortable, was the perfect length. Would definitely consider renting it again.
I loved this dress, it fit very well in the hips, slightly over sized in the busy, but not obvious. Very understated sparkle to it that added just the right amount of whimsy to the formal occasion.

links_reviews_title: Great for a Work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a work holiday party with a gold necklace. Flattering, probably could have gone down a size but needed it immediately.

links_reviews_title: I loved the look of this dress it looks classy but it has a fun sparkly to it!
links_reviews_text: It didn't zip past my chest so I was unable to wear it as I had planned.

links_reviews_title: Sparkle with a bit of stretch
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect, especially if you have a full(er) bust area! It has a bit of stretch in the fabric that allows for a comfortable and flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Backup style was almost a winner!
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a backup style for an upscale work holiday party. The material, feel, and length were all great! I am always wary of tea-length dresses being on the shorter side, but this one was just right. The material is shimmery but just when the light hits it so it's not over the top. I liked it so much that I instantly rented it again for an upcoming more formal party.

links_reviews_title: dress fit perfectly and was exactly what was needed for a work holiday party!
links_reviews_text: fit true to size, went right to the knee (I am 5'8").
I wore this dress for a broadway play on a trip to nyc. Pretty dress! It was a little snug in the shoulders because I have broad shoulders but otherwise a comfortable fit.

It fit nice and snug and showed my figure. The top of dress isn't really supportive of breast. I wouldn't dance too hard in it lol I had a slip up but I enjoyed wearing this dress so much! I would definitely wear again if I hadn't taken so many pics in it already.
Absolutely loved this dress. The color is so perfect and was an overall winner!
The dress was super cute and flattering. A little hard to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Great for a wedding. High quality fabric and a beautiful fit and color.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering but tight around the legs, so I had to take small steps. The dress straps were adjustable so the fit up top was great.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - hard to dance in!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments and loved this dress! The only downside is that its form-fitting shape makes it hard to move freely and dance in. Would be great for a rehearsal dinner or graduation!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for engagement pictures! I wanted to keep it, I loved it so much!!
links_reviews_text: Definitely take the sizing recommendations! I usually wear a 4 and ordered an 8 and it fit perfectly! The dress is definitely form fitting, but that made it easy to put little cups in without wearing a bra- they stay put since the dress is so tight! I loved the color, length and scallops! Fabulous dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the fit, the color, and the detail!
links_reviews_text: I'm curvy on the bottom and the 4 still fit perfect (I'm normally a 4 on the bottom and a bit smaller up top).
Such a fun dress for a summer wedding! Lots of compliments. I wore a size up because I'm not use to tight dresses. Overall I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit and pop of color!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It fit like a glove and the color really popped. Definitely stood out from the crowd (in a good way). This was actually my back up dress and I'm so glad it worked out as my first choice was super baggy in the hips. The cut was incredible as were the scalloped edges. Thankfully I was able to go braless as I don't think a strapless bra would work. The material was thick and high quality. I would definitely recommend this!
Was happy to be provided with the back-up size. The 6 was snug. Wearing the 8 gave me plenty of room to eat and dance. Runs small. Fabric is thick and stretchy. I am 140 lbs, 34D. Usually wear a 4/6.
Fits beautifully and got so many compliments on it. The color is a beautiful pink too.
I normally wear a 0 and opted for the 2..since I am short it was harder to walk/dance in as the fabric is tight. But I didn't care because I felt like a million bucks in it :)
Loved this rental. While it's super super tight the scalloping helps to give this a pretty look. This dress runs slightly small so if you're on the fence I would recommend ordering a size up.

This dress hugged every inch perfectly! Even kept everything in after eating our meal! Only downfall is that I needed to take small quick steps, no slit for leg movement. Held its shape all night, adjustable straps awesome for all different shapes and sizes! Would definitely rent again!

This will show every inch of what god gave you so be prepared. It's like you're zipped up in a sausage casing - in a good way. Spanx as a dress. Oh and don't plan on going to the bathroom anytime soon with this on. #worthit

links_reviews_title: July Wedding in upstate New York
links_reviews_text: I really loved the look and fit of this dress. It's a vibrant pink color and the fabric has stretch to it. The dress fit me tightly through the hips, so it was a little difficult to dance in, but--oh well.
This dress was amazing. The fit was perfect and it was very comfortable. I'm still getting compliments on this dress almost 6 months later!

I am usually not a hot pink girl, but I took a chance on this dress and did not regret it! I received so many compliments from people and felt like a million dollars! The one downside was how tight the dress was; while it was so flattering, it made dancing and moving a little difficult. I'd still rent again!

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner cocktail hour, and I absolutely loved it! I was really nervous about it running way too small, but I'm usually a 2 and the 4 fit perfectly. It is right around the thighs, so it was a little difficult to walk at my normal pace, but it wasn't a big deal. I am a 32DD and was also nervous about the bra situation, but I went no bra and it was totally comfortable. 100% would recommend.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a summer wedding in Texas - it was light and the perfect pop of color!
links_reviews_text: After reading reviews that the dress could run small, I sized up one to a Size 6 to ensure I had no issues - as we left the day after it arrived. I'm glad I did, the dress fit perfectly! If you have a larger chest, I'd definitely recommend sizing up - I'm not sure the Size 4 would've worked for me up top. I had to a little room in the back, but not enough to where others would've noticed or to take away from the look. Highly reco!
Felt like Barbie in this dress! It's definitely tight and not a lot of give but i loveddd it! Compliments all night. Was able to go bra-less which is always a plus in the summer. Highly recommend !
I wore this to an east coast wedding in June. It was perfect and obviously a popular summer wedding dress color. I didn't need a bra because it fit snuggly, was a little tight to zipper up.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but you can't hide anything!!
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress very comfortable definitely has some stretch to it but I would absolutely recommend sizing up one or two sizes. I am wore an 8 But I would have felt more comfortable in a 10

Loved this dress. Very fun bright color and flattering fit. I usually wear a 4 or 6 and ordered an 8 and 10. I wore the 8, but that was even a tad small. I would have liked a slightly looser fit but the 10 was too loose in hips. I recommend but be generous in your size up.

This dress is a show stopper- tight all over and not at all forgiving, but it hit perfectly at my knees to keep it classy. I was still able to dance as much as I wanted to, but getting up stairs was slightly challenging since it was so tight around the bottom. HOT HOT HOT dress. The worst part about it was having to send it back!

I loved wearing this dress as a fun, night on the town look. It was very tight but still really flattering and I got so many compliments from friends! I would definitely rent it again, and highly recommend it if you're looking for a bold statement outfit!!

This dress is fantastic! Super vibrant color and cute scallop details on the hem and neckline. Straps are adjustable. I would definitely recommend sizing up (in all Likely dresses, tbh)- the dress only has a little stretch and no slit.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It ran small, tight around the thighs. But so cute. I wore it for a rehearsal dinner in the DR.

This dress was very fitted and a bit long which made it hard to move around in but....I got so many compliments! I would order one size up next time for dancing purposes. Perfect dress for a Miami wedding!!!

links_reviews_title: Bright pink in a sea of light blue-so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'd def go for spanxs with this one
Super cute dress! Ran small as I usually wear a size 2 and needed the 4. Also, not super flexible when it comes to sitting down. Was great for dancing the night away at my cousin's wedding.
Fit like a glove.

I wore this to a wedding in a beach town- it's definitely a form fitting dress, but the fabric is thick and flattering. Definitely a dress you want to watch what you eat in. I ended up sizing up 1-2 sizes in this one just to be a little more comfortable. If you want it to be more "bodycon" I think you can size your normal size, but if going to a wedding or more conservative event I recommend sizing up. I thought the top was a little small but totally fine on medium to small chested person. Received tons of compliments and rented this same designer for another wedding.

This was not the original dress I had rented, but the one I did rent was too big. The stylist spent quite a bit of time figuring out what I was looking for and was so kind to overnight this dress to me which ended up being the winner! The color is vibrant pink, not hot pink and not red. It fits like a glove. I don't have a big chest so I was able to wear sticky boobs and no underwear bc I did not want underwear lines. I will say if you are well endowed in the chest area, you can have great cleavage in this dress, bc it gave the illusion I had something there, but also may want to size up to keep the girls in. Loved how I felt in this dress!
I didn't end up wearing this dress but the color and material were great!! I needed a small/4 so I would say it ran true too size. Nice stretchy material. Very comfortable.

Fit of this dress was extremely small. I rented both an 8 and a 10 and neither were comfortable enough to wear. Material does not have very much stretch and is extremely skin hugging. Might be better for slim figures. My curves did not appreciate the rigid structure of this dress. Interested in seeing what a 12 would be like. Definitely size up if you are a curvier girl!!

Beautiful color with adjustable straps which were awesome. Cut right at the knees and I'm 5'5. RUNS SMALL. I usually wear a 4-6 and I wore an 8! Size up 1 to 2 sizes. Material is thick enough to hide spanx!

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: It runs small and fits very tight, especially through the legs. I was going to a Bar Mitzvah and didn't end up wearing it because I wanted to be able to dance and move around. Also bunches in the back by the zipper. But the details are cute.

links_reviews_title: If you are curvy this dress isn't for you
links_reviews_text: Dress is super tight. If it had a little stretch it would be perfect

This is quite possibly one of my most favorite things I've ever rented, or even worn. The color is amazing and vibrant. I rented it for my birthday and it did not disappoint! I ordered the 6 and I would say it's true to size, as that's what I would usually wear, but if you're not looking for a skin tight look, you may want to size up. Would definitely describe as body con, will need seamless undergarments to avoid lines, but worth it for making your curves look amazing. Bonus points for adjustable straps! Order this dress, you can pull it off.
Cute top
This top was ok. Got very wrinkly as you can see and this was early on in the evening.

I wanted to love this shirt but found it just ok. It fit beautifully, with a lovely shape that flatters the figure. The fabric is nice, doesn't wrinkle, and the front is lined, which is great. I'm 5'9 and the length was fine on me. The sleeves were nice with the slits, but very short for my arms and with a pretty tight elastic, so they kept riding up and I kept tugging them down. Nothing super special about the shirt, but nice overall.

links_reviews_title: This top is sexy and elegant! Great for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. Long enough for partial but coverage. Good with skinny jeans or jeggings.
Gorgeous fabric , style and fit, heavy material. Runs a bit large so I wore a S instead of my usual M.

I love everything about this blouse. The fit was perfect even with a rather large chest. The v-neck was low but still conservative enough for work as a teacher. Sleeves and back are somewhat sheer but front is lined. This is a high quality and beautiful blouse that I would rent again and again. Oh, excuse the henna on my hands. I just went to my brother's wedding and it hasn't come off yet.

I needed a white top for family photos and it turned out great. I have also worn it to work but may show too much skin for some work places, I did wear a jacket over it and even though the sleeves are a little poofy at the ends it looked fine under the jacket. I would definitely consider buying

I put this on for my birthday dinner and my husband said, "Wow!" He wishes I didn't have to send it back! The cut is very elegant, the white fabric pristine but not sheer (I work a black bra underneath and you couldn't see it from the front). The sleeves have the perfect amount of bell to them. At 16 weeks, this hid my belly without being too baggy or shapeless. Highly recommend!

This is a pretty top and I really wanted to like it, but it was so big! The fabric is thick and good for cooler days. It's not sheer. It just seemed boxy on me. A medium would have been better. Love the way shoshanna clothing looks and fits.
This was super flattering, I wore it with leggings to a sporting event, just had to be careful it didn't shift and show my bra.

links_reviews_title: it's an unusual design, very understated yet surprising
links_reviews_text: flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Comfortable. Pretty. A little low for work so a camisole.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Pretty. A little low for work so a camisole.
Not a long as I would of liked it to be on this tall girl.
I received a lot of compliments. It was a perfect thing to rent but not buy as it was fun, but I don't think I'd want it long term.
This Shoshanna blouse was extremely flowy and hit at just the right place on my hips. The white color scared me (red wine or tomato sauce) but managed to steer clear of messes. Would rent this again!
It was bit tight in the bust but I am a 36C so that's probably why. I didn't care for the elastic on the arm bands but it did help the sleeves be billowy.

links_reviews_title: Super unflattering, thick material & surprisingly boxy.
links_reviews_text: Probably best for a pencil thin body vs woman w/ curves or athletic frame.
I loved this top and got lots of compliments on it. It ran a tad large but not overly so. Fabric was lined which is always nice with a white top. Will definitely rent again!
It fit well and the sleeves are so cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore this in Vegas for a fun evening out
links_reviews_text: A little snug through bust for me but very cute top!
Perfect fit. Very clean cut and just pretty. I felt so feminine in this shirt. I wore it twice, once for date night and once for work!
I wore this with skinny black pants and it was a hit. Very classy and simple, work appropriate, and good for after work dinner too!
This top was cute, but no on me. I did not wear this, it was more fitted on my than the model and I did not like the look fit on me. Too short and fitted on me.
great top to rent since don't want to invest in "slit sleeve" , darts at bust make very flattering
This is a beautiful top and not an everyday white shirt. It brings something special. I purchased this one!!
Sexy slit sleeves in a discreet white blouse that can be dressed up or down. The only thing I did not like is that the sleeves are short and elasticized at the cuff so not very comfortable.
The material was not what I was expecting. It was awesome because it does not wrinkle!! However, it was a little heavy for what I wanted. Like a crepe material.
Couldn't get this over my tatas.
na

links_reviews_title: Fit well. Flattering in all of the right places.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Versatile, fit nicely, easy to accessorize. Cons: Sleeves are a little short; seam around the bust makes a slight point but I think once it is pressed and with the right bra it won't be as noticable.
Looks like it would be loose, but instead is quite fitted and very flattering. Nicely cut and lined. Beautiful top, easy to wear over slacks because of the tapered cut.
Fits a little snug in chest. I did not wear as I felt the length was not ideal for me.
wore this to work with a simple blazer -- it was a huge hit!

links_reviews_title: Loved the tailoring of this blouse. It is classic yet trendy with the cold shoulders.
links_reviews_text: This blouse has a flowy fit but is tailored around the chest and waist to give you a nice shape. The material is nice as well. Shoshanna knows how to flatter a woman's body.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfy, dressy or casual
links_reviews_text: I wore an XS tucked in but would have needed a S to untuck and fit over my hips. Great shirt to wear to work and to an after work happy hour event.
Very easy to wear and beautiful

I felt so pretty in this shirt! It was on trend but felt fresh and timeless. I don't have the best looking upper arms but this split style was flattering to them. The front seams are unique and gave me great curves while having a comfortable fit. Not at all see through. Low cut enough to feel girly on a date but still was work appropriate (I wore it for both). High quality, not baggy or messy looking. Only qualm- the sleeve length was just shy of wrist length, rather than the nice bracelet length in the picture, so it felt like they were just a bit too short and I wanted to pull them down all day.
Runs a bit large, I will get a small next time.

links_reviews_title: Great top for work or play
links_reviews_text: The fit is nice on me especially since I have a large bust, I normally wear a medium or size 8 to 10. The sleeves are very cute, the fact that it is lined in the front is great since it is white, you cannot see through it, but if you wear it without a bra you will see every detail in your nipples. You would really need to wear a very smoothing shaper under this and something that will not show any hardware to your bra or camisole. I tried it with a camisole underneath and you can see the pattern of the lace. Keep in mind if you wear a jacket over this, you will crush the sleeves and they will be wrinkled. Try wearing it with a cape or poncho instead. I hope my size in details help you, I am frustrated with trying to figure out what clothing fits me. I guess I just have to figure it out with most designers on RTR.
Great for and lovely fabric that is thick enough your bra doesn't show through. I want to buy this.
Definite statement, but the colors allow for versatile styling. I wish I had ordered this when it was a little cooler so I could have worn this more often! Lots of compliments any time I wore this.

I wore this so much I bought it! I love the fit and the look. Arms are a little short but I think that's the look. The fur gets a little messy once and a while especially near the top of the back near the neck. It's also more cream than white on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a chilly night out
links_reviews_text: It's been so cold in Texas recently and we were going out for my boyfriend'a birthday. This was a great jacket that kept me warm but was still so stylish! Not to mention it's vegan! Unreal fur is a vegan fashion designer and as a vegan lifestyle blogger I was so happy to have found them!

I'm 5'7 and although I loved this jacket, I wished it would have been a little longer. I wore it with a black dress and over knee boots at a party and got ton of compliments. Comfortable and warm enough if you'd be mainly indoors in the winter

Wore this to multiple occasions. Perfect stage-effect and picturesque fur jacket! I wish the color was a little darker though but overall it's really high quality fur jacket and can literally be wore to different occasion.

I loved how interesting this jacket was! I had strangers stopping me to tell me they loved it. I was a little hesitant renting it but am so glad I did! The medium fit, I just wore the large because I liked how it looked better with my dress shirt and slacks underneath.
Love the look of class this jacket exudes, but it holds smells (maybe the fur?) and dry cleaning doesn't seem to eradicate them 100% -- really debating keeping as it's such a fun winter staple.
This sweater is sexy, one-of-kind, elegant and warm. I love it!

Loved this jacket!!! I wore it to a game and got so many compliments and to my surprise, it kept me quite warm in 30 degree weather! Love the gray and dusty white contrast. Only negatives - missing one clasp so i couldn't close it all the way and (ew) when it arrived there was a ball of used Kleenex inside. Do better, RTR! I'll rent this again (and I'm returning it with no Kleenex)
Loved this jacket... lots of compliments!!
Wore this to a formal work event and it worked great - also wore it out over a jumpsuit this weekend and got tons of compliments. Would rent again

Rented this for an NYC trip and absolutely loved it. Not something I would normally wear, but defintely fitting for the Big Apple. Received many compliments! Kept me warm in the cold. Only con: the white part on the jacket was a bit faded, you can tell the jacket has been used several times.

I ordered this as part of my Unlimited subscription with no real event in mind...it just kept popping up and I decided why not? I'd say it is light-to mid-weight and super fun! The grey part is kinda shaggy/loose fur and the white isn't, so the texture is really cool. It was a little boxy for me, but overall I liked it.
Threw it over everything. Dresses and just a tank. I like it better with a very casual outfit. Super edgy and rocknroll that way. :)))

I struggled finding a way to wear this coat but loved it with basic black. I wore it to a play and got multiple compliments from strangers that loved that it was different. It was comfortable and form fitting.
I loved this jacket. I received so many compliments and felt beautiful.

Let me honest, I rented this piece for my Halloween costume. It was warm, comfortable, great fit but it was a bit out of my comfort zone. However, I decided to at least try and make it work at the office, and out of all my pieces, this one was the most noticed. People loved it, and immediately after complimenting it, asked to touch it. The cut is a great fit, and it's dramatic enough to turn heads without being too much for the everyday. I loved this brand, and plan on renting one of their other faux fur jackets for the upcoming holiday season. - dressupbee

links_reviews_title: Looks like the photo and gave my all black outfit a pop!
links_reviews_text: I would rent this again. People gave me compliments..... I wore it with all black and it jazzed my outfit up. Not a lot to say other then I feel it runs true to size and looks like the photos. Kept me warm and looks good.
Didn't get a chance to wear this but tried it on and loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun, but narrow in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: see above

links_reviews_title: Perfect to amp up a simple dress or jumper
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an outdoor winter wedding. It was warm, cozy, and a show stopper. I got so many compliments and really felt like it made me stand out.

links_reviews_title: Cute, color was different than I expected
links_reviews_text: Overall this jacket was cute! I wore it draped over a black dress and it kept me warm while looking stylish. The color was a little more brown than I expected it to be, kind of clashes with my hair.
I really liked this jacket - only wore it for 30 seconds, but it was really cute for the look I was trying to achieve

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but too small for me to wear
links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear for my sister's bachelorette party in Vegas but it was too small and I couldn't wear it

I loved this jacket! The colors make it very versatile but it still stands out. I wore this to a friends 21st birthday. I didn't dress it up very much but it definitely could've been worn in a dressier manner. It was very comfortable and not too thick!
Every time I wear this beautiful jacket I get tons of compliments. I had a hard time giving it back!
Lots of compliments. Fit great. Super cute and soft. People couldn't stop petting the jacket.

Great accent coat for a fun evening out in LA - looked great with all black and this as the accent piece... great fit with a camisole underneath, but would've wanted a medium if wearing anything heavier... would rent again and consider buying it...
Awesome color and fine fur makes it move with you
This fit perfectly on me. It was fun and different but still pretty neutral if that makes sense. It can be dressed up or down...even to work. Fun if you want something out of the box.

I rented this to wear for a weekend trip skiing to wear out in the evening on a date. I had so many compliments that night! I had several ladies ask me where I got it...but its our secret! The two different types of faux fur are absolutely gorgeous! Rent this classy sassy coat! PS its warm too!

links_reviews_title: Expected to be warmer, not light
links_reviews_text: It looks like woukd be nice cold weather outware, but it was more like shrag- pretty, but very light, its more for spring, other wise very nice & fits good

links_reviews_title: The jacket was a little large and a little over the top for me.
links_reviews_text: The jacket was a little large and was a little over the top for me.
INCREDIBLE

IÔ∏è felt a little unsure about this jacket at first. Then IÔ∏è went for it and after wearing it for a short bit, IÔ∏è then decided it was very cool. Upon arriving to the restaurant two girls even commented what that it was "fabulous". IÔ∏è can't wait to rent and wear again!
I was amazed how nice this faux fur felt. the top part is longer hair and really soft and fluid am considering hanging onto this for a while.
I am a 10 dress size but my arms are long, so I ordered a Large. It worked out fine. I love wearing it an have people do a double take because it is so different.

I LOVED this dress. Made me feel so chic! The top IS VERY small. However it was perfect for me- I am narrow in the chest and have smaller boobs (34b). No bra needed. Loose and flowing on the bottom and not nearly as confusing to put on as I was thinking. There's a hint of sexy with the front slit. Paired with metallic strappy heels and my birthday was unforgettable!

links_reviews_title: Work event & worth the confusing top
links_reviews_text: Great dress once you can get it on. The pic shows the top wrapped twice, I only twisted it once and I think that's right. One side of the twist will be shiny fabric and the other will be matte, that's normal. I suggest sorting the top of the dress out on a hanger and then carefully slipping into it rather than doing it once it's on. The fit is great, I'm a 34a and didn't need a bra but wore one for shape. The dress is a little tight so if you have bigger boobs, definitely size up. The zipper is difficult but grab a friend and you'll get it on. The slit is sexy and shows leg but is still sophisticated and not too much, and I wore for a work event at a hotel in downtown Chicago. I also wore with matte black leather pumps (photo taken at the end of the night at home, sorry!)

links_reviews_title: A Chic Twist - Literally - On the LBD
links_reviews_text: I knew from the moment I saw it that I HAD to rent it. The draped and twisted fabric is so unique. As everyone else noted, it runs small in the chest and the fabric is thick with no stretch. It's also a little complicated to put on - but totally worth the effort. I loved it so much that I wore it to work too, even though I felt a little overdressed I had to wear it one more time before sending it back.

links_reviews_title: I really loved the look of this dress.
links_reviews_text: I was so excited to wear this dress but unfortunate I couldn't zip it all the way, so definitely order a size larger than normal. The panel in the middle around the hips is a little poofy though, so it looks a little odd there, but it's still balanced by the top details.

Couldn't get it zipped from the waist up. Laughably tiny in the chest. The dress is gorgeous and the hip area fit perfectly so I had very high hopes. I honestly think that getting the 8 might be the only way this could fit. Sent it back the same day.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this dress.
links_reviews_text: This was the most complicated dress to put on. It is especially generous in the hips and incredibly small in the top. The top is so small it looks like you are wearing an ill fitting sports bra under a dress. I really wanted to love this so much that I ordered both the 38 (6) and the 40 (8) and both were to tight in the bust and I'm a 36B. I'm a true 6 and the 38 was big in the hips (and I'm not small in the hips) but wouldn't even come close to zipping at the top. I needed an additional 4 inches. The 40 (8) would zip but it was sooo tight. The asymmetrical overlay looked great in the back but strange in the front.
I was not expecting the tank bodice to be made out of such heavy non-stretchable material . Size 40 fits like a store in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Chic and edgey - hard to get on!
links_reviews_text: Hard to maneuver in to dress was too tight didn't wear but edge and cool and great quality
It is a little hard to figure out howto get in and out, but its worth it! Compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: So sad it didn't fit, i could not even try on so tight
links_reviews_text: I couldn't fit this past my upper chest, it was so small. However the dress is made very nice and I could tell if I could fit my large self into it, it would be an eye catching design and comfortable.
Dress brighten the day. Cherry red and full of cheer. Lovely lace details
My bf said I looked like Olive Oil but I loved the look.
Fits like a glove, beautiful dress lots of compliments
The white detail was a cream color and fine silk that fluttered in wind. Well constructed. Not too short. 60s vibes. I sized up as I didn't want it too tight.

links_reviews_title: Finally got to wear a Red Valentino dress!
links_reviews_text: I wear a size 2, am 5''4". As you can see, the dress fits! Rented as a fun dress to wear to work, and it can definitely be worn for evenings out. While adorable, I felt too much like Santa's little helper in the dress, especially when I first tried it on with black heels and then black boots. So I put my leopard print heels on and that made me look less like I was going to a holiday party in the middle of springtime. I am an apple shape so beware as this is a tight dress. Spanx were in order for me. Threw on a gold cuff bracelet and layered 2 delicate gold necklaces and felt ready to tackle the day.
Love the fit of this dress and the feminine fluttery sleeve and waist detail.

LOVED this dress!! I wore it to an Alabama Football game and I got so many compliments!! The colors are perfect for the Crimson Tide! I usually wear a size 2 (my waist measurement is 31 inches) but I like to wear nike shorts under my dresses on game day so I got a size 40 and you can't even tell I'm wearing nike shorts!! It was perfect! I'm thinking about renting it again and buying it! It was comfortable, elegant, and very practical. Definitely recommend this dress!!
This was a perfect fit. I loved the ruffle details and it was super comfortable.
This was super sweet. I wore it with flat sandals for a dinner date and felt sweet and sexy. A little boxy, could have sized down, but was super pleased. More flattering than the photo reveals

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - I felt like Annie!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for work- cute dress and not too tight. Great color. It was fairly short so I paired it with black tights - I probably wouldn't of worn it to work otherwise
Statement dress, nice wrinkle free material with some stretch so fit me fine. Cut was comfortable for my curves.

I wore this dress on three separate occasions -- to a party, to work, and just a casual day out. The dress worked well everywhere. The colours are fantastic and the ruffles aren't over the top. I'm usually a 4/6, and the 40/4 worked well so this is fairly TTS. 4/5 stars because the waist could have been more fitted and the material thicker -- definitely need to wear a bra with this.
Adorable work dress. Fit perfectly. Runs true to size. Loved!
Comfortable and cute! The fabric is super nice. One weird thing is that it is sort of reminiscent of little orphan annie
This dress was true to size. It was so cute and fun!! The ruffles were perfect, not too much. And the color is incredible. I want to own it.
Very pretty. Sweet contrasting ruffles. Would be perfect for V-day. Not lined.
My husband told me I looked like a Charlie Brown character - I received several compliments from strangers for this look. Would absolutely rent again.
I usually wear a 6 but wore an 8 and it fit perfectly. Dress was perfect to wear to work and transition to a dinner out.
Runs very short.
Very Cute Dress!! Great for Every Day!!!

links_reviews_title: I was asked if I was in the fashion industry ?!
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. I wore the dress with natural nylons and flats and then transitioned to evening by changing to black fishnets and a black shrug. I got lots of compliments both at work and at the evening cocktail party. I have curly red hair so I did get a couple where is sandy comments but all in good fun !
Fit well, a little short but I'm short

links_reviews_title: Just okay. Ran large and didn't do anything for my shape but a pretty color...
links_reviews_text: Nothing to write home about. Sure it looks better on someone else...

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with a little flare
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. Was on the short side but not too short for work. The fit and fabric were good.
Can't go wrong with Red Valentino!! Every dress is adorable. Tons of compliments!
Rented this dress for work. Fit was comfortable and flattering. Nice quality material. Loved the red and white contrast. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: wore for Valentines day. Cute and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Good fit comfortable.

The dress runs a bit small in the bust, but is loose around the tummy and hips. If I had purchased this dress, I would have it taken in. Also, the dress is showing wear as one of the sleeves are fraying.
Perfect length for work to night type days!
It fit so well - was perfect for every occasion - I wore it with over the knee boots and a leather jacket for drinks, but then also with tights and flats for Church. It was ideal for both
Cute but seemed a little girly and the white sash across the waist cut off at a slightly awkward point. Seemed unsure of whether this was a sexy or childlike-cute dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work. Super cute for summer.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and lightweight.

The dress fit beautifully. It is a really cute size and length to be adorable and mini-skirt. I wore it to a concert and on a date. I got compliments everywhere I went :) I didn't want to return this and I will be renting more Red Valentino.

links_reviews_title: So cute - got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Super cute and flattering!

It's stretchy and I had extra inches on stomach before it started stretched material should have done a 12 or possibly a 10 for a good fit white around waist makes seem down the bottom half REALLY noticeable making it look weird
Cute dress, but definitely a babydoll dress. Normally a 6 and a 6 fit perfectly.
I loved this dress and the stretch is amazing, but it was not flattering for my mommy tummy and ultimately decided to not to wear it.
I am 5 feet and struggle with renting dresses that are not weirdly wrong! This was perfect for me and got me a lot of compliments.
I wore it for work and cocktails after. Dress is absolutely beautiful and perfect for every occasion. I wish I could buy it

links_reviews_title: Who needs a Valentine when you have Valentinoo
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!

This dress looks so good on. It has a built in bra which I thought wouldn't work for me (32DDD) but it was just the right amount of support. I wore it on "Chic Night" on the Celebrity Edge. It was very comfortable me too! Perfect for hour glass figures.

I wore this dress for a wedding. It's tea/knee length depending on how tall you are. The material is beautiful but the dress has a lot of boning in the bust that is uncomfortable. It also has a built in bra with hook and eye clasps.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! Perfect for the gala! Paired w/ navy pumps made the look!
links_reviews_text: The wires in the top half seem off, or distorted as if they need repair. Definitely can't put this on without help as there is a hook and eye corset underneath. Beauty is no bra was needed.
Very comfortable. Loved the built in bra.
Love it so much. All good, nothing bad about it. I keep getting it for my formal-ish events.
This dress was so amazing! I received so many compliments! The colors were perfect for a late fall wedding and the POCKETS! made the dress even better! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. The pockets were amazing, no need for a purse. I had so many complimemts
links_reviews_text: Best dress ever

I wore this fabulous dress to my daughter's bridal shower and felt special as the mother of the bride should feel. It is slimming and very chic and the fabrics is so pretty with the silvery shimmers. I rented the 10 but probably could have worn my usual 8 which was not available. It does take two to get into this dress because of the built in bra but was so comfortable all day. I didn't want to take it off and would consider buying it.

links_reviews_title: So pretty in person! Comfortable and has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It's even prettier in person. I wore it for an early fall weekend and it was perfect. Great structure and fabric. Loved the pockets too!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding for my cousin in South Carolina.
links_reviews_text: So many compliments on this dress all night long. The only issue I had was the wire on the inside of the dress was sticking through the fabric and stabbed me, but a little tape over it and I was good. It fit perfectly, and looked beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, perfect dress, perfectly flattering!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The fit was absolutely perfect! It cinched right at the bottom of my rib cage so it made me look tiny! I wore it on the fancy night for our cruise and the pictures turned out gorgeous. It was so comfortable thanks to the built in bra! The wire corset that is built in gives instant flattering shape and doesn't stick you at all! And HELLO Pockets!!!! I felt like a million bucks in it!

I loved this dress so much I had to find a reason to wear it. I decided to dress it down a little with a cardigan and also so I could wear to work and it was a hit! Very cute only a few complaints. I had a love/hate relationship with the built in bra. On one hand was so convenient that I didn't have to worry about that but was a bit uncomfortable. Also I love having the pockets but again made the material bunch up a little by the stomach area but my cardigan covered that!

Wore this dress to see O in Las Vegas. Very comfortable fit, but I recommend sizing up, especially if you are chesty. The boning was kind of sticking out and poking my sides, but t was easily tucked back in. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: This dress can be worn just about anywhere.
links_reviews_text: This dress has a built-in bra and pockets! It's a dark navy with silver accents so finding shoes to match was really easy. I ended up wearing shoes are already own. It was very comfortable and I got a lot of compliments on it.

This dress is perfect for a more conservative formal affair (I wore it to a law school graduation gala). My only complaint is that the dress runs very small on top. I am small chested and I could barely fit in the top of the dress of my normal size. The dress has a built in bra - if I were any bigger on top I would have needed to go a size up. Overall though, an amazing dress that is so different - I got compliments all night long!

The fabric's texture, weight, and pattern blend here, creating a perfect piece. The figure flattering cut and adjustable corset made the fit an absolute dream. Compliments rolled in throughout the evening, so I'd absolutely rent again.
Corset top was a bit tight so I had to size up for comfort. Great dress otherwise

This dress was so nice! It has a built in bra so you don't have to worry about undergarments. It flared nicely at the waist so I didn't even need any spanx! Pockets were a nice touch. Has a lot of boning so it stays put. It was a little snug but I think it was just me and my body shape - but I wasn't uncomfortable. The material is heavy enough to hold the shape and fit of the dress. I loved the detail of the print! A pair of silver heels and some silver jewelry and I was set! Would get it again!

links_reviews_title: Thanks for a great dress Tory Burch!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my holiday party for work at an extremely fancy restaurant and was dressed appropriately. The dress was the perfect fit for it and me! The zipper and boning was comfortable and easy to use. The length fell mid calf with pockets. The pattern is super fun and I would rent this dress again.

This Tory Burch was a last-minute impulse rental, but it was a solid choice for a December wedding. Very thick fabric and flattering fit. The boning in the top was a bit uncomfortable when sitting, but other than that I had no complaints. For reference I'm 5'4", and the dress came down a few inches above my ankles. Good for petite frames, not too overwhelming.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress will definitely rent again
links_reviews_text: This dress looks amazing! I received compliments all night and everyone wanted to know where I got it. I'm small on top and wider in the hips so I'm traditionally a size 4 but with strapless a size 2 fits my top better and there was plenty of room around my hips in this dress. It has a corset inside so you don't need a bra. Would totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. I usually wear a size 8 but the size 6 was actually a bit big.
links_reviews_text: So pretty in person. Got a lot of great compliments and it's the kind of dress you would love to own.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my office holiday party. Received lots of complements!
links_reviews_text: Had a built in bra that kept me from having to pull the dress up almighty, like you have to do with most strapless dresses. Overall very impressed with fit and quality.

links_reviews_title: Pretty & Unique for a November Wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - lots of compliments all night. I wore it to a November wedding in Virginia. The fit is great. It does have a corset, so you will need help getting it on, but it limits the need to keep pulling it up all night (as you often have to do with strapless dresses). The ribs in the corset were poking me a little bit in the stomach by the end of the night, but I didn't really care. The fabric is brocade so it's heavier, but not too heavy. Plus it has pockets!! I want to own this dress.

This dress really requires help getting into. I got ready alone and had quite a hard time with the corset and the back zipper. But once it is on, it is quite beautiful. I am small chested and the top was very fitted. The mid section was forgiving.

Great fit with built in corset / bra - did not have to pull up once throughout a full day of wear / dancing. I liked the length a bit below the knee. The fabric is rich-looking and the metallic is much brighter / shinier in person. Received a lot of compliments and would recommend for holiday cocktail party, fall wedding (non-black tie).

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks in this dress ! Really beautiful & flattering... plus Pockets!
links_reviews_text: My husband rented this for me - I probably would have never picked it for my self but I loved it ! Thick metallic fabric, more formal looking dress in person. Not the most flattering on your chest . Really great over all . Wore it to my birthday dinner , but suitable for a wedding. Loved the pockets & beautiful jewel tones

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fall wedding in the mountains
links_reviews_text: I loved being able to wear this dress. The tea length + colors were great for an evening wedding at a country club in October. You will need someone to help you into this dress- the inner "corset" is a bit tricky. I did not wear a bra with this- the fabric is very thick, and the boning ensures that everything stays put. I wore this with strappy black heels and a black clutch with gunmetal earrings and it was perfect.

I rented this for a black tie optional wedding in October. I loved the print and it is much more lovely in person - the metallic really comes through. This is a great alternative to wearing a solid color dress, and the tea length makes it look more formal.

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding in the mountains. The colors and detailing are beautiful and the dress is very well-constructed. Be mindful that there is no "give" so the dress was a little hard to sit in. Also, not the best for big busts--I wear a 36DD and felt like the dress really flattened me out. In the end though, I was happy with this choice.

links_reviews_title: Looked great, felt great, tons of compliments!!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel amazing!! I usually wear an 8/10 but because of my chest, the 12 fit me better. I received so many compliments and definitely cut a rug on the dance floor because of how fun and comfortable the dress was. If I wore the 10 I would have likely experiences the same problem as many of the reviewers by not being able to sit for long, breathe or eat. But, sizing up worked wonders. After all, it's about the fit and not the size! The Tory Burch sizing chart did nothing for me either- if it was true to that sizing, I would have been an 8 so I'm so glad I sized up!! As someone who is 5'3, it hit around my upper calf. Would definitely think of buying! Sad to return this one.
