I rented this for a date night with my hubby. I love this dress, it is so much fun, and so different from what anyone else will be wearing. The only con that I can see with this dress is that if you have a tummy, it is going to show it.

links_reviews_title: Nice for a summer evening wedding
links_reviews_text: I ordered my normal size 6 and then my backup was a size 8. Didn't even try on the 8. Wore it with minimal silver jewelry and then nude heels (silver would have looked nicer but I didn't have any). It was nice that you could adjust the top to three different fittings... though this made the dress a little difficult to get on and made me look pretty flat on top (I'm a 32DD... it helped to wear a bra but then there was just a lot of material up top). The material is well made, but the one I wore had 3/4 of the hem coming out (when the dress arrived, there was a really long thread trailing out from where the hem used to be sewn in), so I had to tape it so the bottom didn't flip out. It was also a little uncomfortable to sit in for a good amount of time (the boning and zipper kinda sticks into you), but nothing terrible. Overall, I think it was a nice dress and I'm glad I tried it but wouldn't rent this style again.

I rented this dress and absolutely loved it! It was very comfortable and the fabric was beautiful. The detail of the metallic embroidery is eye catching! Got so many compliments on the dress and rave reviews from photos on social media! Inside the dress there is a mesh lining and on top a "built in bra." No passing but extra lining with bra clasps. There were about 4 or 5 options to make the top a tighter fit! This dress hit me right below the knee.

links_reviews_title: I really felt great wearing this dress to a family wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and I received many compliments. The pictures of the dress online don't show how metallic the silver is - I was originally going to wear nude sandals, but when I saw the dress they just didn't match. I ended up getting silver sandals and they matched perfectly. I have a little bit of a belly. This dress is not forgiving in the middle! There were definitely spanx involved. I usually wear a size 6 dress, but I wore an 8 in this. I don't know if the dress is cut small in general or if it was just because of my body type.

The dress fit a little bunchy in the back, and I wished I'd ordered down a size so I could have seen if that took care of it. But I didn't, and the fit was perfect everywhere else. I'm 5'9", and the tea-length of the size 6 hit exactly where it should. The top was fitted enough that I didn't need a bra. The fabric was a bit thinner than I'd expected but it was still super forgiving and flattering. This dress is amazing, and I got compliments all night long.

This style is so fun. I love the bold pattern. As it is strapless I recommend a strapless bra. I also would keep in mind the material as there is no stretch. I therefore recommend going up a size for back up. For accessories add a fun statement necklace or bold shoe.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful the entire evening at my husband's holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments on this dress both in person and via social media (one was "that is a stunning dress"!). My only feedback is that the dress was longer than I was hoping for, but I am only 5'2'' (on the model it hits right at the knees and on my it hit half way down my shins). All in all, great experience!

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this dress! Great fit and very flattering. And it has pockets!!
links_reviews_text: This dress has just enough edge to stand out at a party. I loved wearing something that wasn't the typical LBD. It's very slimming and fits true to size. The only con is that the top can be a bit flattening, but I fixed that with a good bra that gave me some oomph. Loved it. My favorite dress I've ever worn by far.

This dress was suggested for me by Jenn and the RTR team when they didn't have the dress I originally requested. I'm so glad they did because I loved it! It's sophisticated and chic, and I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Stand out elegance in navy and white
links_reviews_text: I loved this top and wish I had rented it for a more special occasion..... wore it to dinner with white jeans and received a ton of compliments!! Would be so pretty with a white flare leg pant... Fit is tts and must be worn without a bra, loved the white draped ties.... super unique and beautiful top, another win for RTR!!!

links_reviews_title: Loved it enough that I bought it!
links_reviews_text: OMG I fell in LOVE with this top. Bought it to wear when I go to Vegas and I love it enough to keep it. Sexy but not trashy. I wear a size 10/12 and have 34DDD and it fits perfect

links_reviews_title: Super fun and flirty top, perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: A near perfect fit, but a slightly tight fit in the chest area so beware (no bra required!). I styled this with a long white skirt that paired well with the long white material on the sides, it was very feminine and flirty!
Concert

links_reviews_title: Quality item, unique but does nothing for boobs
links_reviews_text: I've been eyeing this forever and was SO bummed it's such a terrible fit for me. Cut doesn't really allow for a bra, and if you have some boobs it looks like it pushes them out to the sides - side boob - without any support. Prob fits better on someone w smaller/perkier breast's. Also may help if you're normal/tall. Bunches up bc I'm petite.

Such a unique and sexy top - I wore it multiple times. I got it from the RTR showroom where it had the ribbons tied in cute bows (rather than the straight ribbons from the model photo), which I thought was prettier and more flattering

links_reviews_title: From a toddler birthday party to a friends night out
links_reviews_text: Maybe a bit too sexy...but it was very nice the effect overall and I would recommend for any kind of event, depending on the trousers/skirt you choose to accompany

links_reviews_title: I wore this shirt out to dinner on vacation. It was so unique.
links_reviews_text: I wore an adhesive bra and still had some side boob.

I rented this top for a MISSIO concert/night out. I had my reservations at first, being a 32DDD. You can not wear a bra with this top at all. Not even the stick on because of those side wings. I attempted the chicken cutlet idea and it sat awkwardly. Then I went all free and it looks amazing. The front seams run strategically over the nips, hiding any signs of "chilliness". And the tasteful side boob was a hit. This piece is so versatile and comfortable. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
Fit was perfect
A bit snug for me pushing that size, but awesome fit to compliment body. No bra, so must be able to work with that.

Great top, very well made and high quality. Fit throughout the body is snug and tighter on the bust area. I am small up top so it fit, but if you are larger it may be an issue. Side boob was also not an issue due to the fit. Overall great top for a special and fun occasion.

Beautiful rich navy bodice. Shows a sexy-side boob. You could wear a navy camisole to hide. The only reason I have it 4 stars, is because it was tricky to find the right bottom to wear it with for semi-formal event. Jeans are cute but too causal. I found some dark navy pants to wear and heels. Tons of compliments.
Wore this out for an evening of dinner and dancing. Received so many complements. Fabulous fabric and construction. Extremely flattering. Will rent again!

Women were stopping me in the street! Multiple people told me "that shirt is everything!" A very unique top! Understated sexy! You will have a little side boob! I was totally comfortable all day in this outfit.
To small on chest

links_reviews_title: Liked it but didn‚Äôt love it.
links_reviews_text: No stretch but adorable on!
Runs a bit small, a lot of side boob. I'm a DD so I should have sized up. Will be renting in the correct size in the near future.

links_reviews_title: This top is a nice material and pretty BUT it runs small and fits awkwardly.
links_reviews_text: The top has a weird gap under the armpits that makes it look like it does not fit. I ended up not wearing the top because it did not fit properly.
Not into this shiny top but it was well made
Couldn't get on

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fancy happy hour.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, fits great. It's a statement piece.
I ordered this in 2 sizes. It's beautiful but not a good fit for a busty lady. I'm 34 DD and it couldn't make it work.

links_reviews_title: I've recently gained weight and didn't realize how much until I got this shipment.
links_reviews_text: It's a beautifully made top. I really wanted to wear it with dark jeans and booties of the same color and fabric but now it's a goal. Till we meet again!
I didn't realize the sides were just the straps so skin showed through. Enjoyed it though. Very cute.

links_reviews_title: If you have boobs, I do not recommend this
links_reviews_text: Major side-boob! No material on the sides. Super cute if you're flat chested!
So cute and I wish this worked but there isn't much coverage in the boob area even when I finally got a size big enough to zip. Barely there
It is well made, but thick material for a top, was a bit too small around my ribs. But was pretty when tied at the sides

So the top is very well made however it isn't a TRUE lace up so that was disappointing. The "straps" fit great around my rib cage but were big around the middle waist which made the shirt look weird and I couldn't wear it. There was an issue with the stitching also so RTR quickly offered to replace it but I still didn't end up wearing it. Ladies - definitely side boob regardless of how big or small you are. It's just the cut of the shirt. But fabric is thick and quality is top but straps on side didn't fit well like the picture unless you have that perfect hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Sadly did not get to wear it
links_reviews_text: I loved this top and tried for so many events to make it the right choice. I kept it for a while but just never found the right items to pair it with where I thought it looked great. And, I did not love the way the front scooped around my chest. So I loved the design but never wore it.

links_reviews_title: Great style but the white ties looked dingy to me.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. I didn't wear this becuase the white ties looked dingy to me, like a hwite shirt worn too many times. if you were going to a dim lit affair this would look great.

This design is cute but it's not for busty girls. Even with my shoulders pulled way back, there was still too much side boob for me. Should've paid attention to other reviews but had to see it for myself.

This is such a great top! The side lacing is so well done! Unfortunately I have a very balanced hourglass shape and the side ties there me out of balance and made my hips look too wide. Sadly...I couldn't wear it.
Beautiful top,fabric and design fantastic. I think you really need to be small chested to wear this top comfortably.
Fitted perfectly. Appears black, but true color is navy blue.
Luxe and beautiful, straps fall very long to the sides; runs a bit big imo.
Fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: Don't order if u have any kind of boobs or larger rib cage
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a medium in rtr tops and I ordered a 38 in this and couldn't even come close to zipping. Runs beyond small if you have a bra size bigger than an a
Too formal for event. Will rent again because it is gorgeous!!!

links_reviews_title: couldn't wear it. returned. didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: runs too small. usually wear a small and ordered a 6 and couldn't zip it up past half way up my back. didn't wear.
A nice sheath with some added excitement in the ruffles and slit. The slit is high so be careful when sitting if you have a long torso or legs!

links_reviews_title: Slit is a little high but I loved it
links_reviews_text: In my industry this was appropriate but I wouldn't recommend for work if you have a conservative culture. Fit perfect, very flattering. Loved it with white sneakers!

links_reviews_title: Front slit makes this more fun than professional
links_reviews_text: I love Back Halo bc they always fit. Tried this on and while the fit was perfect the front slit was extremely high. I wore it for about an hour while I got ready to see if the dress would relax or I would get over it, and ultimately took it off. I couldn't bring myself to wear it to the office. The distance between the top of the slit and where my hip creases is about 3 inches. Could be fun for a night out, but not for the office.

Love this dress, but BEWARE, the slit is alarmingly high!!!!! Very hard to tell from the pic of the model, but it his very very high on the thigh. Not really work appropriate despite me working in a startup. I was worried all day both walking and sitting down despite having safety pinned it. Otherwise, the dress was gorgeous, very comfortable, and I would love to own it. It does sit high on the neck, so if you don't like clothes touching your neck this is not the dress for you. Would rent again for a weekend!

links_reviews_title: Adds a little bulk to your body
links_reviews_text: I actually didn‚Äôt pick this dress out. RTR sent along with another backup dress because my original backup dress was either returned late or wasn‚Äôt in a good state for me to wear. This dress isn‚Äôt really my style but is cute. Although the dress fit, the fun ruffles adds a little bulk to your body which made me feel uncomfortable with how I looked in it.

links_reviews_title: Very cool dress, very high slit
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but the slot is VERY high, especially when sitting down, it rises to the VERY TOP of my thigh. Probably shouldn't have worn it to work, but hey.

links_reviews_title: Side slit was a nice touch!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! So comfortable and sexy with the slit up the side. I like the different color accents on the dress; I wore it with bright nails and lip. Definitely easy to dance in and can wear a regular bra. This designer runs small so go up a size or it could be tight in the hip or stomach. Highly recommend this dress!
Love the ruffles! They're an added feminine touch without being too in your face.

links_reviews_title: Classy but too understated for a holiday party.
links_reviews_text: I had a feeling the dress wouldn't have enough "wow" for me for the holiday party I ordered it for. Thankfully my backup dress was amazing and fit me like a glove. I ended up wearing this dress to an evening office event instead. This dress fit like a classic sheath. It's true to size but has little to no give and a little snug across the bust. The slit is very high; I wore nude stockings which made me less concerned about it, sitting or standing.

I did read the reviews and was forewarned about the slit, but it came right up to the pelvic area on me:) Somehow it still works, you just have to be careful how you position when sitting but it actually lends itself to looking really cute with knee high boots. Very comfortable and easy to wear.

I have been eyeing this dress for a while and read all the amazing reviews. As soon as I had an excuse to wear it, I ordered it. It is as advertised. Fit is perfect, colors pop, I love everything about this form fitting, true to size dress. Will definitely rent for another occasion.

links_reviews_title: Loved the high slit! The color was perfect and great fit for dancing.
links_reviews_text: Had to wear spanks because not forgiving in tummy area but overall a beautiful dress and I received so many compliments in it
Fits perfectly- the slit is high but a gorgeous dress.

Very comfortable, very stylish! I got tons of compliments all night. The slit IS high but not too high for an evening event. Would not recommend for daytime work. Fit nicely over my 3 month baby bump :)

links_reviews_title: I wore this in my job as a newscaster and it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great. The leg slit is fine when standing but shows a lot of thigh when sitting.

links_reviews_title: Rented for work but the slit is quite high so ended up wearing for weekend dinner and drinks.
links_reviews_text: Material is nice - the little bit of stretch made it comfortable all night. Be prepared to show most of your thigh when seated.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress but be warned of the high slit
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress but the slit was too high to wear to work so I wore it on a date with hubby. He loved it as well but I was constantly pulling down and conscious of how I sat all night.
Slit was a lot higher than expected. Too tight in ribcage. Cute dress.

I loved this dress. It was unexpectedly flattering and fit perfectly. It's a great dress for petite women and does a great job at hiding bumps and enhancing the good stuff. I would buy this dress. It's sophisticated but sexy because of the slit. LOVE. Will rent again.

Like many others, I didn't read the reviews and rented this for work. Thigh slit is quite high. I ended up wearing to a Friday evening wedding. I had to use my napkin to cover my upper thigh at dinner. Otherwise this dress is HOT but sophisticated looking.
The ruffles made this dress unforgettable. form fitting, wore this for a work presentation, the split is a bit high used a safety pin to close it up some. wonderful dress perfect for summer
I love the look and feel of this dress but found myself constantly watching the slit. I was careful how I sat and stood all day.

This dress has a flattering body fit. The side slit is very high on the thigh, so I was concerned. But it actually looks sexy while remaining classy enough. The dress color/style reminds me a little of a circus. But it looks GREAT on camera. Fiance opinion is most important. He didn't say anything, but when prompted, said "it's good...much better than last time."

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful; would be perfect if the slit weren't so high!
links_reviews_text: This dress is elegant, classy and absolutely perfect...except the slit, which on me goes up all the way to my upper thighs. I liked how sexy it is but it made it difficult to sit down (see pic) or walk up or down stairs confidently. The cut of dress is otherwise conservative enough for work or a formal party, but the slit kind of takes it out of either the formal or casual realm. That said, I wore it to work (with a long cardigan) and then to a party, pairing with primary colors--red heels and bag, yellow jewelry. FWIW, the slit might work better on shorter women or those who are less curvy around their hips and thighs.

Everyone said the slit is high but ohmygoodness the slit is high!! The slit went up almost to my hip! Not something I could wear to work and I don't know where else I would wear this. I thought it was cute otherwise but my husband was not impressed.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous and so unique, but beware if you are big on the bottom!
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this because I have wide hips and larger thighs. I didn't realize how incompatible that was with the slit - just because it goes so high up, the slit would have been permanently open exposing about 6 horizontal inches of my thighs. That's a lot in the first place, but since the slit goes to high, it was definitely impossible to wear. Just consider your shape before buying - I wish it could have worked for me because it was gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Awesome fun colored dress if you want to show some leg!
links_reviews_text: The fit was superb! The color and detail was fun and flirting. The slit in the picture was very misleading! I had to use paper clips for the office...date night not so much work attire
Runs small and the slit is too high to be work appropriate.
a bit big
Love this unique style.

links_reviews_title: The slit in this dress made it unwearable.
links_reviews_text: The color and fabric are awesome. But the slit on the side seemed the deal. I could no wear this dress because if I sat down I would have to cover my legs. It‚Äôs a high slit. I am 5‚Äô8 but it came way up my leg.

links_reviews_title: Fun and sexy, prepare for the slit
links_reviews_text: For a curvy girl, definitely size up (I‚Äôm normally a 14 in dresses and even a 16 was extremely form-fitting). Note slit is always there, not just when you walk or sit, and control-top pantyhose or spanx are not an option with slit being so high. That being said, I did get multiple compliments on the dress. Had to be careful sitting, but standing, felt good.

links_reviews_title: Should have read the reviews. Slit too high for work.
links_reviews_text: Like so many others, I wish the slit wasn't as high.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit great but couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great but I couldn't wear it because the slit was WAY too high on the thigh.
love this. dress is classy with a little sexy thrown in with the slit!
The slit was so high I couldn't wear it.
The slit was much higher than I expected. As I have wider hips, this made the slit almost up to my hip, which was too high to be able to be worn.
Pretty tight and split is very high. Too high for office or professional event.
Very elegant
The material is very heavy, like a thick canvas. and has zero stretch. It has lovely colors and presents well, but overall wasn't my favorite. Runs small.

I love a high hemline but this is short even for me. Tight in the bust (I wear a 38C and am usually a 12). Doesn't come in an XL, so I'm SOL. Really flattering and great color, however. I'll wear it to work and see if it makes it out to dinner.

I could wear this dress all day, it was super comfortable and I received a lot of compliments. It was a little on the shorter side especially when you sit down but otherwise standing up, super pretty.
Loved the thick Fabric, the cut and the fun colors but this dress was WAY too short to wear out of the house.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but a little too short!
links_reviews_text: Loved the thick material! This was for an outdoor lobster boil in Galveston, TX in August. So it was hot and the dress help up very well! I wanted to wear wedges but the dress was too short. So I wore my Tory's but got a lot of complements!

I really liked this dress. However, it was super short. I generally like short dresses. I'm short (5'2") and a mini-length is almost always the most flattering length on me. But this was a tunic, not a dress. I had to grab the bottom hem every time I sat down so I could make sure I was actually sitting on the dress and not bare-assed on the chair. I wore it for a casual work function for my husbands job and was a bit uncomfortable. You could try and size up for length, but I don't think it will help much. Fabric is great- thicker and stretchy. So at least it wasn't short and sheer. Just short.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and shapely dress for a tunic but heavy material & easily wrinkled
links_reviews_text: I apologize for the picture here, I know it does not give a great view of the dress but wanted to at least post something...I wore this dress just out in the hamptons to walk around and shop with my boyfriend and our friends, late afternoon to early evening. Luckily it wasn't super hot out because the material was noticeably heavy. When you moved a certain way, it would create a pouch (that you can sort of see above) and I do think that happens with tunic dresses in general but I think it was more prevalent because of the material. It also came in the mail wrinkled and i had to iron it for a solid 10mins or more and as soon as I put it on it was wrinkled again. I think I noticed the wrinkles more than other people but that was a big downside for me. All that being said however, the dress has beautiful colors - i was worried they would be neon, but they were more like bright pastels. I think it was definitely true to size, sometimes tunics can make you look frumpy but the way it was made, you zip up the side and it instantly gives you a shape. And although the material was heavy, it was not too much material that when I stood to the side it looked to big or wide.

I wore to a baby shower. Loved the color! I ordered a small and extra small. The small made would've worked, but it made me look a hit boxie. I went the x-small. Only con was that it seemed to be shorter than the other size in me. Also, the dress is easy to wrinkle. I was pleased with this order, but wouldn't rent again.
I rented this to wear for general summer activities and it is great for just that. Lovely colors, fabric is very heavy so it feels hot.
Fun colors. Loved the structure of this dress, but it's stiff and heavy like a sailcloth so might not be great for an outside event. Runs short, don't bend over.

I rented this dress for a Kentucky Derby themed bridal shower. The colors are bold and bright just like the screen. I got a S and M and wore the small. I'm 5'8'' and the S was shorter than I normally wear but because it wasn't for an all day event or something with a lot dancing I was comfortable with it. The medium also fit but it was not as form fitting so I didn't like it as much. Its super comfy because of the cut which I liked. Cons for me was that it was hard to get over my head and it wrinkled easily. It has a side zipper that doesn't even go all the way to the top. The medium was much easier to get on though. Just be careful not to do your make up first. And yes, other reviews said it wrinkled easily and they are right. I steamed it before the event but it wrinkled during the drive. Overall, I felt good and would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Last Day of Vacation and Travel Dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect colors for vacation!! I had rented the blue and white version of this in a medium but it was a bit tight in the chest and a little short (wore it anyway) so I went with the large with this one. Was a little too boxy for my taste but the extra room came in handy after a vacation of eating and cocktailing! Custom agent even commented on it:)

links_reviews_title: Great day dress, Tad bit short
links_reviews_text: Ordered this for brewery hopping on my birthday with friends. The colors are super cute and I like the shift cut. It is a tad on the short side, but I am glad I did not size up because it would have been too baggy and unflattering around the waist in a larger size. The fabric is very canvassy and a little rough. I read a lot of reviews about wrinkles, but I didn't have much of an issue. Solid day dress. Will consider renting again for sure.

Wore to dinner for my birthday, looks good, cute for a dinner out, forgiving in the stomach which is always a good thing when out for dinner. Did notice wrinkles after sitting down at dinner for about 2 hours. Other than that I really like it.
Beautiful summer ready dress
Great fit
Did wrinkle a bit as others pointed out but I loved the look. Neck is gorgeous
So happy RTR offered this dress!! Love the collar/neckline. Felt like it fit perfectly. Great for a casual night by the ocean!

I got so many compliments on this sweet little dress! It runs a little short, so while it was a tad big for a medium I'm not sure the small would have been safe for me to wear without flashing things I would prefer not to! Only drawback is that the fabric wrinkles SUPER easily and fast!

links_reviews_title: Worn to a bridal shower - during a hot and humid July day! Not my favorite RTR, but a solid dress.
links_reviews_text: Pros: The fit is TTS, and the colors are bright and vivid which is really fantastic on a bright day and in pictures. The color blocking and neck are very flattering and comfortable! The material is a very thick cotton -- for sweaty girls (like me) you may want to avoid this one for hotter months. Cons: Tall girls be warned; this is a short dress and a half inch shy of being a tunic (same length on the M)! Curvy ladies might have some issues with the fit as the material has no stretch and despite the tailoring through the waist, there was not much flare on the bottom. The dress should be considered a true shift -- while the M was better for me on the bottom, the top was way too big, so just wore the S and was careful sitting down!
Great colors and lots of compliments. Wrinkles easily and is a little shorter than I realized when I sit or walk.

I rented this dress for a friends bridal shower. The picture doesn't do it justice! It fit well, I usually have difficulty with shift dresses due to my larger chest but this dress looked great! I received tons of compliments. I also stayed relatively comfortable on a very hot humid day (hence the hair!). My only complaint would be that it wrinkles very easily.
This dress was lightweight and the colors were great. It wrinkles super easily which is a bummer, but other than that it's a fun, easy to wear dress!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a bridal shower! So many compliments. The color is gorgeous for summer
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit!

Love this dress and its 70's vibes! Super cute for everyday wear. This runs true to size, but is a bit looser in the midsection. Since there is no stretch in the fabric, we recommend that curvier women size up. This may be worn wit a standard bra! Pair this with a gold cuff!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but wrinkles too easily!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and cut of this dress but it wrinkled SUPER easily. I steamed it before work and it was so wrinkled in just the ride from my apartment to work :( Bummer because it's a great dress,especially with a tan but would not rent again for the wrinkle factor!

links_reviews_title: color looked great with my olive skin tone
links_reviews_text: material around shoulder area was completely faded. Beautiful color and design! Very flattering!

Thick material so it doesn't show any lumps or bumps. Super flattering and I love the length for my height. I am 5'1 so may be short on someone taller but overall I'm obsessed with the dress. Receiving so many compliments on it.
I wore it during a day out on vacation and to dinner. The colors pop but the moment you sit down, the wrinkles stay for the day.
Perfect fit even in the busy area. No complaints.
Cute dress, but the material is jean-like. very stiff dress.
Great summer colors, comfortable to wear and great fit.
This fits per the reviews, super cute and great colors. It is definitely short though. I would not bend over or even bend down to pick things up. Great dress though!

I rented this to wear home after a family wedding. I ended up having to pack something different as this was way too short even with flats and I'm only 5'6. I loved the way it fit and the colors though
Very cute with great fabric. Definitely more of a pastel color than a bold one. Very, very short. I am 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it was too short to wear.
The fabric of this dress was very stiff and was incredibly short! I didn't feel comfortable in it at all so I was not able to wear.
I might wear this as a tunic over pants, but it is not a dress. It's not even a mini dress. It's a long shirt.
Odd shape/fit. Really short and tight. I'm 5'1" and a small almost exposed my bottom. Did not wear.
Like a table cloth it's way to short so disappointed I had to send it back without wearing

Fun colors for summer. The fit was flattering even though it was not super fitted. The arm holes had a flattering cut as well. Not too tight to cut off circulation, not too loose to show side boob and the chest area was wide enough so no fat was popping out the sides.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, very warm. Perfect wrap for winter.
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear across your shoulders. Very pretty.
Upgraded my outfit to a new level! Such a fabulous piece !

links_reviews_title: This is my 5th time renting and I wasnt disappointed. Was worried the wrap may be too much.
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size so if you happen to run a little bigger than say, a 16, then you will need to leave open. Has three small hooks and loops for closure and isn't too heavy a fabric that you will sweat. I received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wrong style sent but good shawl
links_reviews_text: The style sent is not what was pictured on RTR...this was a not a cape, but a small shawl, not what i expected, hence the 3 stars. RTR was notified and making it right. Made this work, but was chilly in December Connecticut weather. The one pictured would have been more coverage.
Great shawl/cape for a black tie wedding in the cold. I looked like a diva which was the look I was expecting. Was so fun!

links_reviews_title: Awesome piece for a complete look!
links_reviews_text: This is a must have for a fall event. It definitely kept me cozy for a fall wedding. The cape adds a touch of elegance. So glad I decided to rent this!!!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect regal compliment to a formal gown
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a birthday gala celebration and it was the perfect compliment to my gown. I had no problem with the hook and eye fasteners located in the front of the shawl. Great quality faux fur coat.

I rented this to wear with a dress I rented from RTR (also pictured) for an opera gala I attended. I laughed when I first put it on because it was so over the top for my usual style, but I don't usually go to galas. I quickly fell in love with it, as you can see from the smirk on my face. I would definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a 1940 Glamour Party. So many compliments it was perfect!!! And warm
links_reviews_text: True to size very nice and in good condition
This wrap was perfect for keeping me warm walking to and from the car and during intermission. Would definitely recommend.
This wrap looked great around both shoulders as well as over one shoulder. It was very warm.
Love this gorgeous little coat! It's perfect over any kind of nice dress, especially with a sparkly necklace.
Great for a winter night out!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for black tie event in cold weather
links_reviews_text: Love have this to keep warm while waiting on the valet ‚Äì black tie event

links_reviews_title: Perfect accessory for a fancy evening!
links_reviews_text: Elegant and beautiful! It was the perfect fit - kept me warm walking a few blocks in the cold downtown, but still showed off the beautiful RTR gown underneath.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a regional VIP Dancing With The Stars event.
links_reviews_text: I was wearing a sleeveless dress and needed something easy to wear, easy to remove that would also keep me warm. This was perfect. I had read somewhere that someone had difficulty finding the fastened but it was easy enough for me, you just feel down the edge and you will find it. I was surprised how warm I was in this. LOVED it and will happily rent it again should I need one. It's not too heavy but also keeps you warm - win-win.
This fur shawl was perfect for a winter wedding. It surprised me how warm it was and looked great with the dress I rented.

I loved this shawl! It was super warm, elegant, and just perfect for the formal gala I attended. It's closed with a simple clasp at the neck which took a little finagling since I couldn't see it with the fur in the way. I was really surprised at the warmth. Really cozy and way too much to wear inside for long. Love this! I'll probably be renting it again!

I rented this to go with a red dress for a formal black tie wedding. It was beautiful! Fit great and actually provided a lot of warmth (which was greatly appreciated with a sleeveless/backless gown). Would definitely rent again for a formal event.
So comfortable, perfect fit, nice and warm for a chilly evening!

I'm a vegan and I was questioned as to if I was wearing real fur! It draped over my shoulders perfectly and having only one hook to secure it was so convenient! It was beautiful and extremely warm for my NYE party in NY. Will absolutely rent again
Perfect addition for a guest at a winter wedding! Obviously it's warm but did the trick over my dress for a wedding at the end of November in downtown Cleveland! Definitely felt very classy.
Wore this over a dress for a winter wedding. It was soooooooo cold out and this kept me very warm. I also got a ton of compliments on it.

It kept me warm at an outside wedding in around 50F. It was also comfortable enough that I didn't take it off when I was inside, which is a shame because I was wearing a pretty dress. The clasp wasn't what I expected but it worked well. The hair of the coat looks a bit like long cat hair, and it took me a moment to realize that it was the coat shedding onto me when I saw long hairs on my arms. It didn't shed a lot, just a little.
perfect for fall formal event - cropped so not too overwhelming but very warm

I rented for a black tie wedding in October. However it ended up being over 80 degrees on the day of, so I only wore it briefly at dinner once it was cooling down. It was so beautiful, and I got complemented left and right for the brief time I wore it. There are multiple hooks, so you can wear it a few ways (on your shoulders or more shrugged). It kept me very warm, and would be perfect for any winter events.
Worn on top of a lace dress in Chicago. Kept me warm and cozy, and looked elegant. Beautiful item.
Lovely fur! Felt elegant wearing it to a mountain wedding
Absolutely perfect for keeping me warm after the black-tie wedding (in VAIL!) we attended. Just lovely. I did comb out the 'fur' a bit before wearing... it can get a little matted in the suitcase.
nice material

This fur shawl was the perfect addition to my dress for my husband's military ball. I felt like a movie star in it and received so many compliments!! Will definitely rent again for the next formal event I attend.

links_reviews_title: Soft like a kitty and warm too!
links_reviews_text: I loved this shawl. Totally wanted to buy it. It was classy but comfy and warm.
Fun and warm I felt glamorous.
I got compliments all night for this cover. It was really warm which was nice for an outdoor wedding in Feb. It was super soft and looked amazing.
I wore this over a red strapless dress and it looked amazing, but I forgot to take a picture.

links_reviews_title: Kept me warm and was not bulky. Very chic.
links_reviews_text: Nice fit. I think mine was a petite. I didn't think it was bulky at all. Got plenty of complements. It was glamorous and warm. Perfect for wearing with a gown to a winter wedding.
Loved it! The faux fur was very clean and soft. Kept me warm all night. Would definitely rent again.
this is a one size fits all wrap but was not quite broad enough for my shoulders. I am a size 18 and would say it was better suited for size 0-12
I‚Äôm average size but it felt tight when I fastened it so I just draped it over my shoulders and it still looked great. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Glamorous addition to black tie affair
links_reviews_text: Rented this to go over a dress for a winter black tie wedding. It was fabulous and received so many compliments. I felt so glamorous wearing it. The only complaint i have is the hinge that holds it together comes apart very easily and was difficult for me to put together (could be user error though!). But overall loved the item.

Honestly it wasn't the most flattering look, big and fluffy and probably not my usual pick. BUT it was comfortable and made my shoulders feel tiny. Apologies that this is the only picture I could get, I was blacked out on mimosas (this shirt is perfect for brunch!!!).
Rented this for everyday wear, and I got SO many compliments. Wore with distressed denim and wedges. Will definitely rent again!

It was impossible to keep the shoulders down - they kept sliding up so I couldn't get that 'off the shoulders' look. The neck strap/tie was missing so there was just a piece of fabric peeking out where the strap was supposed to be. Really wanted to like this shirt but it just wasn't flattering and I had to keep messing with the shoulders.

I loved the way this looked in person and in photographs. Beware that if you have broad shoulders, you'll need to size up! The off the shoulder is not elastic. Also, I opted to not wear the neck strap, so the little hook kept popping out. The item came a little damaged, but not too noticeable. Overall, I would reccomend it.

links_reviews_title: Super fun top with some sass!
links_reviews_text: I loved this top! Very flowy and fun, but it came to me very wrinkled. I steamed it for a while, and it looked a lot better! I wore it without the neck tie and had no problems with it staying up! Overall I loved the top, and would definitely rent again!

Bold, flowing ruffles take center stage on this Tome top. Pull your hair back in a sleek bun to show off those shoulders. This top is everything!! Can be paired with jeans shorts for an easy brunch / day look or printed pants for a bold dinner look. Would recommend! Running true to size, I felt most comfortable in my true size.

This fun top is for adventurous ladies only! It's definitely not "flattering" but that's not the point with this style, it's supposed to be a bit oversized and voluminous. I wore it without the tie around the neck and it stayed up alright with some minor adjusting throughout the day. I paired it with cropped culottes and heels, and I loved the longer length (I'm 5'9"). It would look so cute with skinny jeans if that's your thing! The only thing that kept me from giving it 5 stars was the stiff cotton fabric, which was hard to keep wrinkle-free and was slightly fussy. That said, I still loved wearing this style and I found it be very modern and chic! If you're between sizes or have a smaller bust I would probably go with one size smaller since the shape is loose.

It's cotton so it's more of a casual top - I wore with jeans and sandals. It's very "fluffy" and long enough that it covered my rear which I appreciated. I think the tie around the neck is a bit superfluous as it would have stayed up fine on its own and then a necklace could be worn - if I owned it I would have removed it. I received a lot of compliments and enjoyed wearing!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bachlorette party and it was a perfect choice!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my bachlorette party, it was both comfortable and stylish!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVE this top!! It was perfect for a rehearsal dinner. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore the small and it fits perfectly. I did have to adjust the sleeves down but it was worth it. In fact, I still have this and have worn it a couple more times üòÅ

Such a fun top, great for a weekend event or vacation. Running true to size with no stretch to the fabric, the size small fit me perfectly (I'm a 34B with broader shoulder and typically wear a size 2). Looks awesome with casual jeans or dressed up for a night out. Wore this on vacation in Miami and loved it!

There were some stains and unpleasant dry clean odor when I received it. But this top fits me very well. It has cute flowy layers. I got a lot of compliments from friends and was even stopped by a local fashion magazine editor who wanted to take some photos of my outfit.
Very easy to wear and had such special detailing.
I love this look. If you have broad shoulders like i do it may run a little snug, tons of compliments. I love the ruffles and the shirt looks very sexy. It does wrinkle easily.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to happy hour. Fun, flirty and unique!
links_reviews_text: There were a few spots and pit stains (gross!) but not noticeable when on so didn't prevent me from wearing.

Great flowy fun flouncy top. Wore multiple times out with different friends and to work on a casual day. Was able to hide a small 4mo baby bump in this top. The only thing is the neck tie is a little awkward and felt like it didn't pull the top correctly to the center. It kept shifting and had to be adjusted regularly. Can be worn without the neck tie string.
Loved the idea of this shirt, but it was too much poof and fabric for my frame.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but not for the boobalicious
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous top but was skin tight over my boobs.

links_reviews_title: Does not go over large breasts
links_reviews_text: No give to the cotton fabric. Did not look like a high quality shirt and absolutely will not go over large breasts.
Very pretty
Loved this shirt and paired it with jeans. Would definitely recommend. Only negative was that it didn't come with the neck string.

links_reviews_title: This top was fun and sassy and I enjoyed wearing it.
links_reviews_text: While I loved the top; I was disappointed in the fact that it looked dingy and worn.
Rented for a night out with the girls. Really cute paired with jeans and suede sandals. Very flattering hiding the problem tummy area and showing off shoulders.
Even on short girls, super cute with jeans and wedges! Will rent again.
The top is pretty, but I'm petite and it was just too large for me. The ruffles were too latge and over powering for my small frame. I think it would be a pretty top on someone taller.
I received so many compliments with this shirt! It is very comfortable and flattering, and very easy to dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Possibly one layer two many for me.
links_reviews_text: And yet. Breezy cotton. Brilliant white. Fetching off the shoulder realness.
Felt like a marshmallow im in it and didn't cover my shorts up . I think runs on the smaller side
Could not fit over chest.
Fits great, very stylish and fun to wear

links_reviews_title: This dress was great! Super comfortable and classy. I was able to dance and sit comfortably.
links_reviews_text: I would size up by one size. The length and it were otherwise great. I would also wear a sticky bra or backless bra as the back is open.

links_reviews_title: Very elegant with a hint of sexy!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress, but it was very tight and I would have been more comfortable in the next size up. I am 5'3" and 138lbs and normally wear a 4, but it was VERY tight. I have a small bust, so it fit well without a bra and the length was good with 3" heels. However, I have fuller hips and thighs, and felt very constrained all night. If I were to rent it again, I would order the 6.

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments! Hugged all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly to size, fabric was thick enough that pasties weren't really necessary. Got so many compliments in this dress. Would definitely rent again!

This dress was exceptional! It fit like a glove and I was still able to dance the night away! I'm 5"5 about 125 lbs and wore the 4R. I could have squeezed into the 2R if I HAD to but I wouldn't have been very comfortable. Loved this so much!
Beautiful dress for a black tie wedding but needed to wear spanx to make it a little more flattering. Very snug, definitely should've sized up.
Fits TTS. Thick material so no bumps/lumps showing. Loved the neckline. Loved the open back!

Loved this dress overall. Great color and fit. I'm 6" and 155, the 8L was perfect length for 3inch heels. Open back fit well. My only small complaint was the darts on the bust line didn't hit me in the right spot. I'm usually a B cup, and would have preferred not to wear a bra with this so I wasn't worried about straps showing, but I needed the padding of a bra to fill out the darts. Otherwise they sort of became inverted and more obvious. But with a low back bra it was fine.

links_reviews_title: Conservative enough for a work event, but still sexy!
links_reviews_text: I had a formal event for work so I wanted something that made me feel sexy without showing too much skin. I ordered the 12R & 10R but the 10R was perfect. I only wore a sticky bra just to be sure there were no Rachel from Friends moments but the top was snug enough to be bra less altogether. Two notes: the seam at the zipper fits kind of weird and seems to pop out. Also, even if I had wanted to wear shapewear the cut in the back made it hard to find something that wouldn't be visible from behind
I loved this dress for my company holiday party. The fit was just right and the back out was just perfect

Overall the color and fit were gorgeous, I got compliments all night long! The regular length was perfect for me and it was snug enough up top to just wear pasties and feel supported - I wish I didn‚Äôt have to send it back!

I rented this for a winter military ball and received SO many compliments. It's definitely form fitting so if that's not your style, this isn't the dress for you. But I loved it! I'm 5'1 and 117 lbs. I wore stiletto heels because otherwise it would have been way too long.

links_reviews_title: Usually a 4, but the 6 was better for a Likely dress
links_reviews_text: Felt so elegant for a holiday wedding. Loved this dress and wish I'd gotten pics of the back
This dress was an excellent fit for a work party I attended. The dress hugs all the right places and was very comfortable. Loved the slit and open back!

I loved how it fit perfectly. It did run a little long even with my heels, but I made it work. It wasn't too tight that I couldn't breathe but I hugged all the right places. I would definitely rent this dress again.

This dress was great! Yet another home run from RTR. I was 14 weeks pregnant at the time of this event and was JUST starting to show/not just look chunky. This dress complimented my new to me and changing figure perfectly! The length was ideal for my height and my 3-4 inch heels. The open back was sexy and made me feel confident all night. The only drawback is that the shoulder/shoulder straps are not quite as true to size as the regular dress.
Dress fits snug for form fitting look. Beautiful color. Loved wearing it!

I chose this dress for the high neck and exposed shoulders style, which I feel looks best on me. I wore it for my sister's wedding in Napa and loved the color and slim bodycon fit. The exposed back and slit brings that classy sexiness to the dress. I weigh 138lbs, 5'6", 34B chest and have an athletic slim build. I chose a size 4R and 6R and wore the 4R, I did not have to wear a bra since I have a smaller bust. JUST CHOOSE THIS DRESS!!!

I really liked this dress- it was a standout dress but also simple at the same time. I'm 5'3" & with 4 inch heels it was the perfect length. If my heels were any shorter the dress would've been too long. I loved the open back, & I ended up wearing a backless bra, but only because of cold temperatures & not because I felt I needed support. It's heavy, good quality material. I feel like it borders on running small because the 2 was decently tight, but the 4 would probably have been too loose.
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Received a lot of complements on my dress, especially from my husband:)
links_reviews_text: Very flattering for curvy body type! I was worried about the length because of my height but it worked perfectly!
Besides long fit absolutely perfectly with 4 inch heels it was a wonderful dress for a wedding and loved the slit

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'10" but ended up wearing only 1 inch heels so probably didn't need the L version of the dress but it still worked. It was the perfect color and style for my husband's military ball.
Dress fit perfect!, could have worn the 6 but it gave my back a butt once zipped!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Paired it with statement shoes and earrings for a killer look
links_reviews_text: The collar was a bit large, so it didn't quite fit as snug as I needed, but this was easily fixed with some fashion tape! I'm 5'3'' and it was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. Loved the slit - sexy enough, but not afraid of a wardrobe malfunction!

links_reviews_title: Fit beautifully and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It was a very comfortable dress. The material didn't wrinkle and I never felt the need to adjust the dress at all. Very happy with it.
Fit was true to size! Was able to get away with not wearing a bra since fabric was thick and fit was tighter across the chest. Very pleased with rental so I would likely rent again!
The fit was body con. The material was very flattering . I love the neck. Very classy down. Back was sorta out . Love love this dress.

I wore this for a black tie wedding. It was perfect! fit like a glove, was comfortable and although it's somewhat simple, the cut of it is modern and fun and it got so many compliments !! I told everyone they need to Rent the Runway!!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million dollars in this dress, and it fit like a glove. Turned heads all night!
links_reviews_text: I've got a small waist and pretty wide hips, so it's tough to find dresses and jeans that fit all my curves. This dress did that no problem, and was sexy in all the right places, with an open back (not too open) and a slit (not too high) so I never felt like I was trying too hard. The color is amazing - lighter than a fire truck red, more like a "raspberry" color, so even as a blonde with winter skin, it didn't wash me out! Paired great with gold jewelry, nude heels, and bronze makeup.
Perfectly tight but not uncomfortable. Wore this for a work event. The slit was a nice touch but wasn't so high that it became inappropriate.

links_reviews_title: Understated and gorgeous this dress could not have been more perfect. Best red carpet look I've had.
links_reviews_text: It started a little loose at the beginning of the night but after eating and drinking it was perfect. The fabric is soft and stretchy while still giving the structure you need to look amazing
I liked this dress a lot. It fits very true to size. I was nervous about the color because I don't wear red tones but ended up liking it
Love Likely dresses! This one is a modern, sleek look. Conservative but also sexy with the back cut out and the slit. Fit like a glove!
Loved this dress. The color was great, a little different than bright red. I'm 5'10'' and it was long enough with 3 inch heels! Had to go bra-less but it worked okay.
This dress fit perfectly. I did not wear this dress for my event because i chose another dress. But the length, the fit, and the back are beautiful.

The dress fit great! I am 5'9" so I ordered the long. I wore maybe 3 inch heels and it was a tad too long, but I think the short would have been too short. I am about 157 lbs. the 8 fit, but was so tight. So I went with the 10. Tons of compliments.
As a small girl with height I was worried the dress wouldn't be flattering i was wrong! Felt classy and sexy.

I wear just between a 4 and 6 in Likely dresses. This 6 was a teensy bit big, but they didn't have the 4 in stock. The color is gorgeous, and the slit is sexy without showing too much leg. You definitely need a stick-on bra because of the back, and I'd recommend sizing down (I wish I had been able to) if you're between sizes. Lengthwise, I'm 5'6" and the it hit perfectly wearing 3in heels.

links_reviews_title: Fit was right. Elegant and chic
links_reviews_text: Fits well, beautiful fall color! Wore it to a gala for a charity event

I'm pretty short-- 5'1 so I expect long. This dress was definitely on the long size regardless of height but made it work! Really beautiful and sophisticated. Lots of compliments. Need to wear stick on bra since the back is fairly open.
got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Classic black with a little extra!
links_reviews_text: Well-made top, stayed in place for being strapless and fun with a little extra ruffle! It's wider on the bottom so it won't show off your waist if that's what you're going for but I loved it and wore a couple times!

Rented this for a date night to celebrate my 40th birthday. I was only able to get the 14 so I felt that it was a little poofy but honestly I am in LOVE with this top! Super comfy, the arms felt a little tight by the end of the night but it was definitely not a bother. Would absolutely rent and again and hoping I can purchase it in the future.

this off the shoulder top stayed in place all night long, was super comfortable & extremely flattering. I definitely could have sized down but no one could tell this top was a little big on me. I almost bought this top I loved it so much but will definitely rent again!! 100% recommend others to rent this.
Beautiful fabric. Does not wrinkle. I am keeping it for a bit longer!
Loved this top! Great quality and nice thick flattering fabric. Next time i will size down.

links_reviews_title: Not Best for a Boston Winter-Will Re-Rent This Summer!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I wear a size 0, and the size 0 was a perfect fit! My only problem is completely on me-I ordered this for a fun trip to Boston and knew as soon as I put it on that I couldn‚Äôt (and wouldn‚Äôt want to!) hide those cute sleeves under a sweater. I will definitely be re-renting this sometime this summer for a fun night out!
This top was perfect for Gasparilla in Tampa. Fit was flattering - not tight on my arms at all. Didnt send it back so i can wear it again!
This was a great top that was dressy enough for a nice dinner out without being too over top.
Easy and cool. Only had a large available, but it worked fine!
I loved the fabric - felt expensive and fit very true to size! I got so many compliments throughout the day. Loved that the shirt didn't slip down at all.

links_reviews_title: Warning: if you wear this top, you WILL have a good time!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a girl's night out!! I paired this ruffled number with shredded black jeans, hot pink shoes and a hot pink lip with a simple black clutch. I am a very consistent size two and this fit perfectly. The top is roomy, so I imagine it would flatter various busy sizes. Fabric is thick and held it's shape. Beautiful quality. The ruffles will step up your night, trust me!
Such a comfortable shirt! The fit was perfect and I received many compliments on it throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: Received my rental early and LOVED it!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is AMAZING! Very comfortable and flattering. I received compliments all night!

The little ruffles on this top were completely adorable and make it the perfect fun top for a night out! I thought it was overall a pretty loose fit, but the 10 was pretty comfortable. I would recommend it with dark or black jeans for a more polished look.
I wore this top to the a day at the city garden. It was beautiful and comfortable while also being fashionable. Highly recommend

Loved, loved, loved this top!!! I paired it with white skinny jeans but it's so versatile you could wear it with just about anything. Didn't really enjoy the plastic/rubber lining around the top of the shirt. I think it was intended to help keep the top in place but it just annoyed me.
Perfect black top for going out to dinner! Great material and easy to wear. True to size. The design was the perfect combo of sexy and cute.

I'm short waisted, small bust, and only 5'3" so this was a little long but overall great! The arms are stretchy which adds comfort and theres a silicone strip around the whole inside of the top (no the sleeves) to keep it in place while allowing free movement. The ruffles add volume in great places!

links_reviews_title: I loved this top it was super cute with jeans and heels.
links_reviews_text: It has rubber around the top to help keep it in place so I didn't have to worry about it falling down.

links_reviews_title: Super cute top. Wore it for a night out for a bachelorette trip!
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS. Goes a little wide at the bottom, but other than that really flattering!

links_reviews_title: I loved this top! I should have bought it!
links_reviews_text: No cons. Fit perfect. Hides large boobs. Doesn't hug tummy. LOVED THIS TOP!
Perfect fit in a 12. I usually wear a 14. But because this is flared, if you get it your true size, you may look pregnant. I recommend a size down if you are hourglass shaped like me. ES
Wide on the bottom. I Wore it out might be hard to keep tucked in.

Fits really well. The off the shoulder is really low but for some reason it stayed put. No tugging at all. Comfortable and fun. The bottom half is billowy though and not form fitting which I loved but beware. Wore with tight jeans one night and leather like leggings the next.
The top fit well around my chest but was extremely baggy everywhere else.
Loved this top, so cute! Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Nice top but not for me
links_reviews_text: I couldn't get this top to work for me, unfortunately. It flows out on the bottom which made me look bigger than I am. I tried tucking it but it just didn't look right.
Ran really big, size down
It doesn't lay well because of wear to the piece and if your shoulders are broad it can call attention too much
Didn't end up wearing it. Cute idea but only if you want to look pregnant from the side!! Not good for small waisted people. Will add 20 pounds to your frame

This top was fabulous! Flattering on a large chest, not revealing, and so comfortable - always stayed on my shoulders! It highlighted a really cool statement necklace or earrings. Loved it for a date look
I shiidm habe sized down but the 10 worked. Great material and fit. Woukd rent again.
Fit perfectly, comfortable, and the sticky strip on the inside keeps the top and sleeves in place

links_reviews_title: Wore this top to an event for work that was causal but still upscale.
links_reviews_text: I am the definition of a pear shape. I am small on the top wide at the hips. This was a great fit. I was able to dress up a pair of jeans and heals with this top. I was comfortable but not under dressed.

This is by far the best strapless top I've ever worn. Stays in place (there's a strapless-bra type lining that keeps it from slipping) and is so flattering. The material is also great quality. Wore it with white jeans, nude heels, and pink earrings. Will definitely rent again!
Love this top! Really flattering and it was a little longer in the back but still able to wear with shorts or jeans. Would rent again!

Loved this top, and paired it with white denim + hot pink ankle boots. The fabric has nice substance, body, and drapes well--my husband said it looks "casually expensive", which I guess is a good thing? I received non-stop compliments all night, from the valet, hostesses, our server, and even a table of ladies seated next to us! The rubberized trim inside the edge of the bodice kept it from slipping down, which was really nice (off-the-shoulder has never been a favorite for that reason). I wore it with sticky bra, but strapless bra might work. Even though the fabric wasn't too thin, with my bust size I don't think I could have gone without any coverage underneath. I'm keeping this one for a girls trip in Sonoma next weekend, and might consider purchasing eventually (husband was a big fan).

links_reviews_title: This blouse was sexy yet sophisticated and didn't slip one time!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! I actually wear a 6 but it wasn't available so I went with an 8. I can't imagine the fit being too different. The actual blouse portion was a little more billowy in the 8, but I loved the look of it. Will be on the look out to purchase this one!
Fit is perfect, extremely flattering, sexy, great detail and gorgeous black material.

I got compliments on this dress but it was fitted at my hips (almost seemed I could size up) and then very loose on the top. I am a h34B but I'd imagine even if you are larger than me up top it would still be loose. I'd estimate I was correcting (with an oh so reliable safety pin) at LEAST two dress sizes. Maybe I should have sized down? I'd imagine the 2 would have been too tight on my hips though. Overall I liked it but def. a fit that I needed to correct!
Straps are not adjustable, and the hips were tight.

links_reviews_title: Subtly sexy -- great for a standing event/date, but no good for sitting
links_reviews_text: Pros: unique psuedo snakeskin print, fit played up/created curves on my straight figure, combination of over-the-knee length, high center slit, and low back made for a subtly sexy look Cons: little to no stretch in the material, low cut front (I used fashion tape to keep the top in place), but most of all, *you need something on your lap if you're going to be sitting down* -- slit placement does NOT make for modest sitting
The only downfall was the straps couldn't be adjusted tight enough there was a lot of chest showing but it was manageable, the rest of the dress was so flattering and it's a fun print!

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful and very well fitted.
links_reviews_text: The dress length and cut was perfect. The straps were hurting bc I had it really tight so they left a red mark.
Love the subtle animal print and cut of this dress. The back is especially sexy. The front was a bit low cut for my taste, but nothing that a couple of safety pins couldn't fix.
It's very flattering while standing. It's just not a sitting dress. Once seated the slit is very high.
Very low In the chest area.

links_reviews_title: Runs a bit small if you have hips.
links_reviews_text: Unable to get this dress fully on to give more review details.

links_reviews_title: Tight in butt/hips but loose in chest
links_reviews_text: This ran small in the hips and big in the chest. Very pretty print and the back is to die for but fit was off

links_reviews_title: Had to double safety pin the chest area. Very, very open. That being said, this is a gorgeous dress.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous. Very open on top (nothing a safety pin can't fix). High center slit. Subtle snake print. Can dress up/down too because of the jersey-ish fabric, which is nice.

links_reviews_title: Pretty details but too large in the waist.
links_reviews_text: If you live in a warmer climate, know that this is 2 fairly thick layers of poly. Nice tailored details like the low cut back and the high center slit. The waist gather would also be nice if the waist wasn't way too big. Had to safety pin at each side and in the middle. Would rent again in a smaller size if the hips weren't fit perfectly with NO stretch.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but not for anyone with a booty
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, this dress is just not made for girls with a booty. I could barely get this over my butt, even though the bodice was a perfect fit. The print is fun, sexy, and more subtle than it sounds. I really loved the color. The fabric feels nice and airy. But it could not accommodate my hips! (For reference, my waist is about 26" and my hips are about 36".) I'm tempted to try a size up because it was so pretty, but I worry the top would be too big. If you're more straight and narrow, I think you'll look amazing in this.

This was such an odd fit. I'm straight and narrow and typically a 0/2 in dresses yet this size 2 was tight in the hips, but way too large in the chest. Not sure if it's just my body type or if the design would be a struggle for many. The front slit was also very high so if I did rent a smaller size I think the slit would possibly then pose a problem too. I liked the pattern and color but unfortunate that the fit is so off.

links_reviews_title: The neckline of this dress is sexy and the shape is flattering.
links_reviews_text: As the other reviews said, the dress runs small. I normally wear a 7 or 8 but the 10 fit and was snug. The sleeves impede raising arms too high. I needed to wear shapewear. It was a great dress for a party.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Tight in the bust but I'm a 32D, would have liked to wear a bra but no room for it.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a bombshell in this stunner dress
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous dress that runs a little small. I usually wear a 4 and was happy I sized up to 6. The cut of the sleeves is a little restrictive but so worth it. The hugged my curves in all the right ways but wasn't excessively tight. I rented it on my Unlimited account for a theater date but will be keeping it for a dinner I have later in the week. I'm in love.
A little snug, size up on the back-up size - amazing dress!
Loved the gold dots and the off the shoulder style! Very comfortable, no fuss dress to wear.

links_reviews_title: Runs small My friend was able to change her dress & wear it. Bummed because this dress is adorable!
links_reviews_text: Typically wear 6 Ordered 6 & 8 6 was like a 4 8 was like a 6 with zero give (material is not stretchy nor has any give) I‚Äôm athletic w flat tummy, bigger butt and although I could‚Äôve wore the 8...sitting & eating would've been a struggle. Super cute dress! I was able to wear the 6 of the other dress I ordered.
Very pretty dress. Fits a little small. Normally wear size 6 in dresses. Fabric doesn't have much stretch so it restricts arm movement.
Fun dress.
Very flattering and comfortable, i love this dress and have rented it twice. No bra needed

This was my first RTR purchase and the dresses arrived on time and did not even need to be steamed. The dots on this dress look gold in person but silver in photos, so it was kind of hard to accessorize. I loved the fit as no bra was necessary since top of the dress is pretty tight. Loved the length. Would rent again!!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a company gala and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I'm so glad I sized up for this dress! I normally order a size 2 & 4, but because of the reviews I ordered a 4 and a 6 in this dress. The 4 was quite snug around the hips and the 6 was snug but not too tight. I'm super small up top and this dress was not too loose and actually pretty flattering... loved it! Thx RTR!

So I usually always wear a 4, no matter what but this was right across my rib cage so I went with the 6. Not too much of a difference in the torso which was good. LOVED this dress. Felt so pretty/classy for a semi-formal/ cocktail attire summer evening wedding.

I got a size 8 because reviews said it runs small. I actually wish I got a 10 because the 8 was super tight, but it still looked great. I would recommend this dress because it makes your body look amazing, but your arms are very restricted and it does run small.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress with a retro feel!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. The neckline and cut-out were sexy but subtle enough for a family wedding, the shape and fit were super flattering, and it stayed put through a whole lot of dancing! Definitely form fitting (I had to size up from a 0 to the back-up 2 because the smaller one pulled a bit across my hips). Easy to dress up a bit with shoes and jewelry, and the polka dots were a standout! Would absolutely recommend!

This dress is amazing! It hugs all the right spots and accents your shoulders and neckline beautifully. In the pictures the dots looked white to me, but they are actually a good tone. Definitely a must if you want to show off your assets. :-)
This is not a dress that I would normally buy, so it was fun to rent. It had a little bit of stretch and hit right at the knee. The cut out under the chest was cute and flattering.
Worn to graduation. Hugs all the right curves. Very flattering. Amazing dress! Would rent again!

I loved this dress! It wasn't over the top, but was most definitely flirty and fun. I wore it to a graduation ceremony and party and received tons of compliments. I usually easily fit a 2 and sometimes have to downsize to a 0, but with this dress the 2 barely made it. I had to have someone help me zip it up because I couldn't do it by myself. It was a comfortable fit though... not too tight at all.

I rented this bad boy for New Years, post holiday weight got the best of me so I sized up to the 12 in order to breathe and move, I love it though and I didn't even wear a bra which was really fantastic considering I have a pretty large chest. I felt secure and it hugged every curve. Tons of compliments, I didn't want to send it back.
easy day to night wear
Very pretty dress, a little snug on the top, arms were restricted, hips fit perfectly, nice thick material, very flattering, the dress slides up even while your walking, a little bit annoying.

The dress was tight, but not too tight, and had great stretch. It made me feel like a pin-up, and I absolutely loved it. The only downfall was not being able to raise my arms when dancing, but I had expected that. I will 100% rent this dress again

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: Oh my god I love love love love this dress. It was such a perfect fit, such a cute retro look and we went to a retro club to celebrate my husband's birthday! I want to buy this dress so badly! And it was so comfortable! We went to dinner and then went dancing and there wasn't a moment that I wasn't uncomfortable. The sleeve obviously makes it a teeny bit difficult to raise your arms, but honestly who needs to dance that wildly anyway when you can look amazing in a dress like that!! Will rent it again unless it goes on sale first!

The dress was beautiful! First time using RTR. It would have been perfect if it was a 12 but the size was out of stock. I was surprised it fit my curves. Not a lot of movement in this dress. Great for pear shapes.

I wore this for my Birthday and fell in love with it from the moment I put it on! I received a ton of compliments throughout the night and I felt super stylish, not to mention I found it to be incredibly comfortable. It is very fitted, I'm glad I had a size 2 because a 0 might have been too snug, but it is truly a great dress that can be worn to a variety of functions.

The dress is amazing but is tight. I usually wear a 4 and sized up to a 6 but it was still a tight especially in the arm (which unusual for me.) I still wore it and got lots of compliments. The material is thick and well made. I loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Back up dress comes through again!
links_reviews_text: Once again I received a back up dress that I loved! Does run small but not uncomfortable. A fun dress that could be worn for many occassions.

Loved this dress! Nicole Miller dresses always work well for me. It was comfortable, stylish and I received lots of compliments. My only small complaint is that it had a slight flair at the bottom of the dress. All in all though, I wish I had this in my wardrobe.
Got so many compliments on this dress. I ordered a size 2 as I wanted it to be tight which it was but it wasn't unbearingly tight. The material is stretchy and comfortable to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have wide shoulders!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an early September wedding in Ohio. This dress has a little stretch to it, but not much. Thick fabrics allows you the ability to not wear a bra. I paired the dress with black round toe pumps. YOU MUST SIZE UP. I typically wear a 2, had to size up to a 4 which fit everywhere except the shoulders (I have very wide shoulders), so ended up wearing the 6. Love the little opening in the waist. Would rent again.

I usually don't do patterns but the polka dots on this dress were a fun but classic change! This dress runs small. I was able to squeeze into the 0 but the 2 probably would have been more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It's exactly what you want it to be!
links_reviews_text: Was nervous about renting based on other reviews but SO GLAD I did! I sized up and the dress fit perfectly, smoothing everything out and hugging every curve. Length was great for tall ladies. I didn't notice the lack of movement with my arms as others mentioned, it was comfortable and I received lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: People will stop you on the street!
links_reviews_text: Love this sexy little number! It's sexy, but not in your face sexy! Fits true to size and hits right above the knee. Great to show off sculpted shoulders. I got loads of complements. I wore this dress to a fancy restaurant in New Orleans.

The dress bunched a little and made me look like my tummy was sticking out. It felt a bit heavy like I was sweating an it wearing it. I wore a strapless bra but could have gotten away with not wearing one at all. The straps naturally fell to the side and it overall was a very classy dress. I dont know if I'd rent it again because it did nothing for my curves. Maybe consider wearing spanx. The gold dots are really nice. Exactly how it is pictured.
I'm short so the length is not my preferred one, but it's a beautiful dress.
Sized up based on other reviews, felt like a million bucks and so many compliments. Peep hole is pretty subtle but a fun touch. The black and gold is much cuties in person.

links_reviews_title: Took this on a dinner date for my birthday!
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small. I grabbed my usual size (6), my size-up-size (8), and the 8 JUST fit. If I rent this again, I'll definitely go up to a 10. The fit is very flattering though, and hugs the butt/hips in a good way. Also, I am a small-C cup and noticed my chest overhung the small cutout below the chest - unsure if this is the case for higher cup sizes. So overall - super cute, nice retro feel to it, but definitely size up, especially if you're a pear like me.

LOVED the fit of this dress. It hugged my body and showed off all curves. I wouldn't recommend a bra if you can get away with it because the tiny cutout under the bust is such a cute accent you wouldn't want to ruin it with a bra.I would wear a thong to not have any lines in the dress. It hit me right above the knee. The polka dots are gold if you couldn't tell. Fit true to size, I would size up for backup.

This is an adorable dress! I would recommend this for petite women because it has a slim fit, modest chest area, and isn't too long (I'm 5'0" and it hit me at the knee.) I was able to get away with wearing a nude strapless bra underneath even with the cut-out detail. It was very comfortable too! I loved it!

So I used this dress as an Amy Winehouse costume, super fun and a perfect vintage pinup look. I would size up if you're worried about the fit, it runs true to size but does not have a lot of wiggle room. Didn't require a bra.

Rented this for a beach destination wedding that unfortunately was canceled due to the world being sheltered at home. So in an effort to change up the days, got dressed to watch Palm Sunday mass from home. Very pretty dress, fits true to size. Only small thing is that the part around the arms/shoulders was pretty stretched out.

The dress was a little big. I normally wear a 14 and this was an 18. The 16 would have worked but this was more comfortable. The dress was very comfortable and flattering. I wore it to a Havana Nights party.

links_reviews_title: I mean just look at this dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect length. Perfect fit. Loved the inner boning in the bodice of the dress. The print and coloration was beautiful. I'm 5,9 and the length was spot on for me.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but the sizing is so off
links_reviews_text: Torso runs SMALL so I sized up to a 4 . Torso fit well, but then it was so loose on my chest (I have a somewhat large chest)- tried it with and without a bra and nothing worked. I was unable to wear it. But if I owned it I'd get it tailored bc the dress is stunning

links_reviews_title: In other dresses I'm a 14 but even the 16 was a bit tight in this dress. Still looked pretty though.
This dress made me feel flirty, sexy and almost comfortable.
