links_reviews_text: Besides the thin plastic wire like internal boning trying to poke through and stab me I had a fabulouse time in this dress. So much fun to wear and had a night full of compliments from complete strangers!

It's hard finding something stylish in a plus size. This dress was comfortable, didn't need special undergarments! All night got many compliments, it helps that my hair color worked well with this dress!!! Would highly recommend this dress. My first time using RTR would definitely do it again!!
I wore the 2, and it was a little big in the waist but still fit. Super comfortable, really light weight. Def would recommend

links_reviews_title: The dress cascades down the body like a waterfall of sumptuous fabric.
links_reviews_text: The dress is well designed. Inside a corset is sewn in smoothing out the middle yet comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Sexy ruffles and cool color tones
links_reviews_text: Fit was great , I am short so I wasn't sure how the ruffles would look on me but it actually was very flattering it was very comfortable and light weight. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and got lots of compliments !

I am absolutely in love with this dress!! If I thought I would get more regular wear out of it, I would have definitely purchased it. I sized up to a 2R because of other reviews about the bodice and it fit perfectly. HIGHLY recommend for summer events!
I loved the color, fabric, and fit. I received compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: This was great for The Oaks at Churchill Downs this year!
links_reviews_text: I went up one size because the top was really small.

I rented this for an outdoor wedding. Very fun, but does run small. I'm 5'8" without heels and I ordered this in a tall sizing. I usually can get by with a size 8 but had to wear a 12 instead. Very nice dress overall.

Loved this one. Wore to a springtime early-evening wedding on the shore. A guest came up to me and told me besides the bride I was the most beautiful girl in the room. Dress has boning at the top so everything stayed put, no slipping. Didn't wear a bra. I am 5'3" and it was a bit long on me even in heels, but it wasn't a dealbreaker. Easy to take on and off.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and fun to dance in at wedding in Tuscon.
links_reviews_text: Dress ran a little large. Overall the cut was faltering and forgiving. Would rent again.

I don't have any pictures that capture how beautiful this dress is. The ruffled layers are so light and pretty - and really flattering. I am 5'3" and I needed 4" heels (and the back still dragged a tiny bit.) it runs a tad small. I'm usually 4-6 and wore the 8. Very unique and summery. I'm so glad I rented this.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't have found a more perfect dress for a botanical garden wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is everything! The structure with the boning gave it a great shape, and I didn't notice it or find it uncomfortable at all. I'm 5'7" and the regular length was perfect with low heels. I got compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: The wedding took place in a secret garden.
links_reviews_text: The perfect dress for an outdoor Spring wedding in FL. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra because of the boning in the top of the dress. I was occasionally stabbed by a piece of the boning but it wasn't a big deal to me. Overall, I felt comfortable and beautiful.

I put on this dress and was instantly wowed by how it hugged my curves, flattered my body type, and didn't really even require a bra. I danced the night away on this dress (which is basically the dancing girl emoji in the flesh) and got so many compliments. I would 10/10 recommend if you're looking for a fun and flirty vibe to dance the night away in!
So gorgeous! Got a million compliments. Felt beautiful the whole night. No bra needed because bodice was tight.

links_reviews_title: Wore this at a Hawaiian wedding (I was a guest). Runs small but is beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress (saw the multi color version on someone else and much preferred the blue) but I will tell you it is tight. I'm usually a size 6 but I sized up based on reviews, but even the 8 felt tight around the stomach area at certain points. Regardless, so glad I wore this -- it was great!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect If You Don't Get Stabbed
links_reviews_text: I rented two, one as my backup. I couldn't even try in the backup because it had these sharp Needles (no other way to describe) poking through all through the circumference of the dress. The ends of the boning were all poking out. It was literally cutting me! I cannot believe they sent this dress. The size 8 was a little snug, but it was a fine fit, especially since the other was useless. I had a baby and didn't want anything too firm fitting, this gave the perfect illusion, especially from straight on for photos. The corset-type part is not thick, so no you won't need, but you may still need stand because it's not tucking anything in. The pattern was fun for this destination Florida wedding. It was flown and allowed ventilation. But in the sun (ceremony was 30 min in 90F direct sun) the poly material did have me sweating. Be careful when you put on or use restroom to make sure both layers are tugged down because the inner layer can be bunched up, leaving you rather naked in the chiffon. I would have liked the top to be a little lower, perhaps on a taller person, it would have looked a tad more sexy. But it looked great! I give the dress I wore 4/5 stars, but complete failure of RTR not to check their inventory. I am 5'1 and wore my tiny2 inch heels because I did not want to bother. It as fine, fragged a tiny bit in the back, but not enough to cause me any trouble or for me to notice.

links_reviews_title: Dramatic train and lots of movement!
links_reviews_text: The color is absolutely beautiful! The dress is the perfect length in the front and then full drama in the back. There is boning in the bodice that stuck me in the rib cage. It was so beautiful I just smiled through the pain. Would rent again!
The dress was true to size: I got a lot of compliments. It has a built in corset and bra which was awesome.

Fun to wear to a Riviera Dolce Party at the Pier! Cool and comfy with a feminine ruffled shape and modern cut. The shoulders stayed put and I was able to dance all night in this fun and flirty number.

links_reviews_title: Figure flattering dress & light enough for summer
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing & I received so many compliments. It definitely flattered my figure and the ruffles hid the trouble spots (my tummy) but accentuated the good spots (my waist and shoulders). I typically wear a 18, but luckily I decided to size up and then get the backup dress 2 sizes up since I had to wear the backup (size 22). The shoulders do slide up from time to time, but if youtube the hack for this it gives you no issues.

This was my pick for a friend's wedding! It was comfortable, and the different layers were quite flattering. I received compliments on the dress, too. My only 'complaint' is that the shoulders rode up a bit, so I had to keep pulling them down.
Tons of compliments! The dress was flattering but a tad long.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for fiesta date night
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress although the bodice is so tight that it makes wearing for long very uncomfortable. I would have like to of ripped it out.

Rented this dress for a summer wedding and got lots of compliments. The material was perfect for a hot day, but some of the boning in the bust got uncomfortable after awhile. The cut of the dress is flattering and lends itself to different types of accessories. All in all, a great first experience with RTR!

Beautiful dress. Definitely runs small. The first dress they sent had issues with the boning poking through the lining uncomfortably. RTR overnighted a new dress to me, and even changed the size at my request. Excellent service! I'm very busty, but I could still get away without a bra on this dress because the boning, while not totally supportive, conceals when coupled together with the front ruffle. I was very comfortable all evening.

I really loved how this dress was lightweight and had some stretch to it! It mostly stayed off the shoulder (although there was some damage on one of the shoulders that made it slip a bit). I got a ton of compliments! The only BAD thing about this dress was the uncomfortable boning! The boning has punctured through the fabric and hit my skin directly when sitting. It was fine while standing though. True to size, good length.

I am 6 months pregnant, so I went up 2 sizes on this dress to fit my bump. I was worried about the waist and boning, but it all worked perfectly and I didn't even need to wear a bra. The neckline is gorgeous and the ruffles hid and accentuated in tandem. The boning is a little pokey at the bottom when sitting, but otherwise a great, flattering dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a friend's birthday party.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous print. Layers and layers of luscious ruffles. The boning was a little uncomfortable at times, especially when sitting.

I felt beautiful in this lovely dress and it was even comfortable to wear. I've never worn an off-the-shoulder dress in my adult life and was surprised that it stayed up with ease and did not gap or feel exposed. The high-low hemline felt flattering and set it apart from other dresses. The color palate was a great match to the blue, sage and mint tones of our family member's wedding party. Would wear it again.

Badgley Mischka is one of my favorite designers! The dresses always fit me beautifully. I always feel so confident in this designer's pieces. The colors in this dress were sooo tranquil and refreshing. The floral pattern was gorgeous with pops of greens and blues throughout. The off the shoulder cut paired with the high/ low maxi and flattering ruffles were a perfect combination. I looked a size slimmer. It was just enough sexy, but classy. The only downside was one that of the bones in the waist (which I liked having in the dress ) was poking through the seam on the inside. It was a little uncomfortable when sitting at times, but ultimately...I was still in love with this dress! I got so many compliments and my husband thought it was absolutely breathtaking! LOVE!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to Belmont Stakes (day event), and dressed it down with flat sandals.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!! I got so many amazing compliments. I'm 5'7" and wore it with flat sandals. I was nervous about the length going into it but it ended up being perfect. The dress fell 1/2in off the ground. I wore 20R, which ran slightly roomy up in the bust but comfortable throughout. If I rented it again, I'd be interested in seeing if the 18R fit a bit tighter/better. Others on here commented they were able to wear it sans-bra -- that was definitely not the case for me.

I needed a dress for my son's rehearsal dinner. My husband loved this dress! I received so many compliments and I was comfortable all night long, even when dancing. I will rent this dress ( and others by same designer) again. #fashionista #wedding #rockedtherunway

I loved this dress. The only reason I didn't give it 4 stars is because when it arrived the seams were coming apart around the top. I called and got a replacement the next day. Unfortunately the second one had the same issue in the exact same places (so obviously something to do with how the dress was sewn). I didn't like my back up dress nearly as much so I just put some safety pins in it and wore it. My feedback to the people to get the dresses once they are returned is to do a better job of looking for rips and loose seams.

Super fun and flowy, but runs huge! The short side is definitely short, but I didn't have any problems with it. I'm a super consistent 4, rented this in a 2 based on reviews, and could have easily worn a 0.
Super cute piece. Loved the hemline. The belt was necessary, but I still enjoyed wearing it

I've rented this multiple times and I love it more each time! It's so easy and it's not boring. Wish I could buy it! I rented the 4 which was a little large. I could probably go down a size. I'm typically a 4.

links_reviews_title: Dress cut in a spiral shape
links_reviews_text: This dress was super cool! It's loose and the pattern is tiny flowers (not dots like it may appear in pictures), and the uneven hemline really does steal the show. Really fun for everyday wear!

I am wearing this right now - layered a turtleneck under it for winter in cold climates. Took a 4 hour flight in it and walked off the plane looking fresh because the fabric is light and doesn't show wrinkles due to the print. I belted this time but can see myself leaving it unbelted in summer months. Super versatile and eye catching, will rent again! So many compliments!
Cute pattern, and love the hemline. However it is a little large in the waist so if you have a small waist you will need a belt.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for dinner with my friends
links_reviews_text: A little big on the waist and chest. Belt made it work

The bottom of this dress is gorgeous - asymmetric, fun, and not too short for work. The top, however, was large and awkward due to the rouching. I ended up layering a short sleeve turtleneck on top and loved the look, but wouldn't enjoy wearing it solo.

links_reviews_title: The a-sym hem makes this dress
links_reviews_text: I will start this review saying I do not like this print. Far away it looks like dots, up close it reminds me of something you'd see printed on baby leggings. HOWEVER, the tailoring of this dress is incredible. It's ultra flattering and I love how light the material is. I want to own it.

The hemline is everything! I do suggest a belt, since the material is sewn together around the waist, it poofs here and there. I wore a long sleeve top under to keep warm since I rented this during cooler months. Would look really cute with booties or in the summer with some heeled sandals. You can't see the floral detail too much but it's adorable. An the hemline is really fun!
love the asymmetrical hemline. Nice print. Comfortable and easy to wear. Seems to run 1 size larger than standard.

links_reviews_title: Loved how flowy this dress was and how badass I felt in it!
links_reviews_text: The short end comes up above the knee but it didn't bother me too much.
Perfect thing for a wedding where the bride wanted things low key (while still being a step below black tie). Comfortable, fun for photos. Wish it was mine to keep.
Fits pretty loose but perfect for a relaxed weekend look!

links_reviews_title: Asymmetrical striped hem makes this a winner!
links_reviews_text: Am loving dark florals right now and the asymmetrical hem with the stripes on one side makes this stand out from the crowd. I thought it ran a little big in the waist but nothing a belt couldn't fix. I wore this more casually but you could definitely dress it up with heels and a fur jacket for a cocktail event. Can also wear a regular bra with it. One of my recent favorites for sure.

Lovely silk. Great hem. The finishes on this item, namely the inside seams, are poor quality for an $800 dress. One side of waist was a flattering cut but the other side is a bit baggy. This dress is sewn in sections. The short hem on one side of this dress came up high on my height so not for the office. I wore a padded bra as chest area a bit loose.
I love the way this dress moves when I walk. It's not a defined in the waist as I would like but a belt helped with that.

wore the size 2 because 0 wasn't available and it felt like a size 2: slightly loose on me, but tolerable because of the cut/style. loved the asymmetrical hem. fabric is lightweight and perfect for hot summer days. the stitching on the bodice is unique, instead of just straight up and down on the sides, the stitching forms a sort of patchwork, which i thought looked fine but not particularly flattering. may result in fabric bunching up more on someone with more curves.
I ordered my normal size and it was slightly larger on me! This dress doesn't have a zipper either so be aware, it just glides over you. It's fabulous and fun!
weird fit
I honestly can't imagine anyone would look great in this dress - it was large, stretchy & baggy in all the wrong places.

This dress is honestly just too cute for words. I love the fit, there's no real give in the fabric but the design offers enough coverage that it's not a big deal. The bottom is so fun and flouncy I felt like i was dancing around my office all day. I dressed it down for a casual office but you could totally rock this dress for a more dressy occasion

I loved this dress, although it definitely runs large - I wore a size down, but maybe could have even gone 2. I wore this for a summer wedding where I wanted to look formal, but summery and wanted something a bit different/unique. I loved the asymmetrical hem and the fact that I could wear a regular bra with this dress.

I love this dress! I didn't want to give it back! It's comfortable in a light silk fabric that feels sturdy yet breezy. It's tailored beautifully and moves gracefully when you walk. It's fun to dance in. It's loose at the waist but you can add a wide belt to give it more shape if you like. It looks good on its own, with a cardigan over it, or a long sleeved top under it. I wore it all of these ways. I wore it to work, on a date, and out barhopping. Seriously, I want to own it.

links_reviews_title: "Does the odd angle of that hem bother you" LOL
links_reviews_text: A woman in her 70's asked me that question as I walked by one day and I giggled telling her it's why I love the dress! It's a lot of fun to wear and so comfortable!
Didn't fit well and is super light
This dress would look great on anyone! simple, great fabric flow-love it

I didn't realized that this dress was cut on the bias which typically doesn't really work for a large bust. It fit well but the cut made me uncomfortable with the focus it brought to my top half so I didn't wear it.
The seams on the dress just weren't flattering to my body shape. I didn't end up wearing this but I got it for a rehearsal dinner.
Had to figure out how to hide the unflattering top of the dress but the bottom was a wow factor and I got lots of complements

links_reviews_title: Dumpy. Weird stitching around bodice. Not flattering at all. Very disappointing.
links_reviews_text: Looked much cuter online than in person.

links_reviews_title: Loved it and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The asymmetrical ham is very flattering

links_reviews_title: Adorable but couldn't make it work in the cold weather
links_reviews_text: So adorable but wasn't able to style this for winter dressing. Will re-rent when it's a little warmer.
Wore this with black Jason Wu blazer. Everyone at my office loved the dress
I didnt realize that the sections of fabric were gathered a little- super cute

links_reviews_title: If only the waist was as flattering as the hemline
links_reviews_text: I needed a belt and bc of my fuller bust, the top fit strangely. I wish I'd sized down. Ultimately, I think if you have a more athletic build and a small bust, this would look really good on you. Otherwise, you're going to need a belt to make it work. That hemline is EVERYTHING tho.

Cute dress, there is no zipper or button opening to get in this dress, it has to be put on over your head so please keep that in mind when renting this style. It was super comfortable and very cute though. :)

links_reviews_title: I'm in a temp role and HR gave me stellar compliments.
links_reviews_text: The hem line is really fun and feminine. The v neck is not too deep. I rented this a size up and it didnt look like a tent, it was just more whimsical in the wind. I think that makes this dress very feminine. I added a blazer and I am off and running for corporate world.

The fabric of the dress was cut just right. It drapes in a way that was flattering for my lower body. And when there's a little wind blowing, it picks up on the fabric beautifully (but doesn't cause any mini accidents)

links_reviews_title: Making my goth work-wear dreams come true
links_reviews_text: Love Derek Lam so much. This dress makes me feel like a work-appropriate goth princess. I highly recommend renting. The fabric is a thin knit, it's very comfortable and surprisingly breathable on the 80 degree day I wore it. It definitely runs large, wish I had sized down. I had to safety pin the straps up and the waist is baggy. Also the belt was missing, so I used one of my own. Otherwise a fabulous dress that I will rent again in a size down.

This was a cute dress but I picked it for everyday wear and it had a more formal feel. The length really needs to be worn with heels and the cut was a bit large for me. It would be great for a formal event, a dressier office vibe or wedding.

links_reviews_title: Hit in all the right spots
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments wearing this dress. Mostly everyone said how insanely flattering it was. It is beautiful and would rent again. I am a consistent 6 but listened to reviews and got the 4 - really glad I did. The straps are super long, and was pulling it up a lot so would suggest pinning them.
The fabric is way thicker than I imagined. Like a curtain almost. Still drapes great and looks nice.

Loved the fabric of this dress. It was very low cut so I put a tank under it. I also doubled the belt because I didn't want a bow. Great for winter and fall! Almost kept this one! Very unique and memorable
Intricate line an details were very nice

I am considering to buy it, its on a heavy side tweed fabric, (but fine for summer ), gives raw hem edge, its seems like great dress for vacation, office, dinner,0 fit me right, not tight, but look fitted, but for anybody with smaller size/ weight- it will be big.
Such a cute dress, BUT I need to order a smaller size. I'm in between 6 and 8, and definitely returning for a 4.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a not so formal dinner!
links_reviews_text: Rented this last minute when another dress I had ordered didn't fit with my unlimited subscription. I normally wear a size ten but sized down as others mentioned this dress does run big. The straps were still a bit long. The dress is a heavier material but that made it more forgiving and flattering I feel. Super easy to wear with a regular bra and easy to walk around in. Doesn't wrinkle either which is a plus! Definitely a good dress for taller ladies.
Loved this dress. Goes from office to evening. Only issue is that the straps are a bit long so it's a little low cut. I could wear my own bra with it. Somewhat heavy for very hot weather.

Loved this dress, so many compliments! The straps were a bit long so it made it very "cleavage forward" but i loved it (not a work dress). It didn't come with a belt and I had to use my own, that's the only thing that really bothered me.

I wore this with block heels to a nice dinner. I didn't see the belt at first and almost didn't wear it because without the belt it is very shapeless. However, with the belt, it was fabulous. The material is very thick. I used fabric tape to conceal the straps of my bra in the back. It is pretty low cut and the straps would probably be too long for anyone who wears an A- or B-cup or anyone who is petite.

links_reviews_title: Definitely runs big but great work dress
links_reviews_text: Loved the flattering cut and had to pin the straps back a bit because they were too long but overall really loving this dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful But Runs Big For Petite Ladies
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress from the NYC flagship store. It runs big, especially around the arms and torso. It looks reasonably cute with the help of the belt so I decided to go for it despite an imperfect fit.
I didn't end up wearing this one because the fabric felt too heavy for September. The straps are also very long. I felt like this made me look heavier and frumpy.

links_reviews_title: Wore with a blazer for work.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and work appropriate if paired with a blazer. Received many compliments.
Heavy material for the type of summery dress it is and too low cut to wear to work.

I normally wear a 6-8 in dresses. After looking at other reviews, I sized down to the 4. Well, I could've gotten away with the 2, this thing was so big! It was too long on me, the straps were too long, and the dress overall was shapeless, even with the belt. I didn't even bother wearing it. Thankfully this was a free 2nd look promo so I wasn't out any money.
I usually wear an 8, and this one ran large on me.
Wore this to an outdoor concert. It was extremely flattering and comfy. Felt a bit large for the size. The sides flair more than the pic indicates, but I liked it.

links_reviews_title: Looks better on than in the picture, espectially if you are a bit curvy.
links_reviews_text: This is a great dress. I got so many compliments. I ordered a 4R and I am normally a 4-6 and it was still a bit too large, but the belt sinched it in.
Fun dress to wear. Don't forget to wear belt that cones with it. Loved everything about this dress...comfortable, texture, patterns, cut, quality, and weight.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. So cute, but too big.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4/6 (usually 6), and the 4 was really big. A 2 would have worked.
Love the weight of the fabric on this dress! The stripes are super adorable, too. I'd definitely rent this one again.

I wore this with a thin black turtleneck for work and it was perfect. The material is very thick so I wouldn't recommend it for warmer months/climates even though it's sleeveless. Definitely size down!

links_reviews_title: I chose this because it looked casual enough for daytime and my fave colors - black and white!
links_reviews_text: This would look great on a TALL person! I am 5'6" and it drowned me. The stretchy fabric is nice and would make for a great fit if it didn't run big. Really wanted to love this one but didn't end up wearing it after trying on.
Looks great alone or with a leather Jacket! Never wore the belt, FYI
Didn't wear, was too big

Runs large. I sized down to a 4, based on previous reviews. I'm typically a 6. Fits great with the belt. Super stylish. Prefect for work or everyday wear. I'd keep it if it were a little less expensive. Love it.
Swimming in this dress- I should have sized down! The fabric is much thicker than expected. Got a lot of compliments though!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Was way to big
links_reviews_text: Didnt wear it. Way to big.
Love this dress. Great quality.

links_reviews_title: Bottom of skirt is fabulous, a little big on top.
links_reviews_text: Bottom of skirt is fabulous, a little big on top.

Too big. I usually wear a but can stand things being too tight around my waist or chest so decided on the small. It's a general loose fit --too big to wear without looking like a sack. Super cute and quality fabric so will eventually rent the XS.
straps too long
all great

links_reviews_title: This dress is phenomenal. 10/10 will rent again
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit and fabric. Exceptionally comfortable.
This dress is so cute but so not for the petite...it also runs very large!

links_reviews_title: Dress was admired by co workers
links_reviews_text: Not fitting. Great flow.
great dress but was too big for me in a 4 will exchange for the size 2
Absolutely LOVE! It fit perfectly and the color is stunning. I felt like a ballerina - so feminine and glam.

I love this dress! I should have kept it. I would definitely recommend and would rent again. It is fitted up too and at the waist but looks great for small waist and larger hips. The color was amazing. I don't usually wear purple but it went well. The bottom part is a flowing skirt that just felt right.
It's a beautiful dress, I just wish the straps were adjustable

links_reviews_title: Fun swing type dress for our Rainbow party!
links_reviews_text: It was a beautiful dress, great color but I had read some other reviews and ended up ordering a size bigger than normal because of them which was a mistake. The straps were too long so the dress hung down. Definitely order your true size. I think the dress may be a little snug in the bodice if you do but it‚Äôs better than being way too big.

This dress was super flattering and fit me true to size, but the straps made the dress awkward to wear. Without tying or pinning the straps, my bra was hanging out. I ended up putting little slip knots in the straps, but the weight of the dress pulled those out several times during the day. If I owned this, I'd have the straps taken in by about 2 inches and it would be perfect.
Fits really tight in the bust

links_reviews_title: Could barely zip this, runs small!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color with the right flowiness, just runs small!
The color of this dress is beautiful. It's a gorgeous purple color. It is fitted on top and the bottom of the dress flares out. The fit Is flattering and cute!
Straps are way too long. I couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Straps way too long, zipper gets stuck. Skip this dress!
links_reviews_text: The straps were really long. I easily had an extra two inches of strap material. The area around the rib cage is very snug. The zipper was hard to pull up despite having both sides lined up straight with room for a few fingers between the zipper and your side. I would skip this dress unless you have a long upper torso. Other than that, the color is lovely and the material is so nice and swirly. Wish I could've worn it!
Tight in the bust (38D) and did not wear. Loved the style and material

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, shape and movement. Shifted around a bit as I was wearing it
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress overall, it was a perfect fit all around, except that it was a little low and a little large in the bust, clever tape and a good strapless bra more or less sorted that out. Over the course of the night the under layer bunched up and would rotate around my body. All in all worth it for the look, but it was a bit more high-maintenance than I would have liked.
I couldn't even close this dress. the straps were way too long and really should be adjustable

links_reviews_title: The dress was a beautiful fabric and the way it moves with you is amazing.
links_reviews_text: I loved the fabric and movement of this dress. The weight was perfect. It was extremely flattering on me, and, to be honest, I was surprised. It has a long waist line, and stays fitted around your abdomen and begins to flow out around the hips. I am a mom that had a c-section and typically struggle with this type of fit/material, but it really was beautiful. I wore a light spanx to keep things smooth but I received a few compliments. PROBLEM: I had to safety pin the straps, they were extremely long, to the point wear they did nothing and would have just fallen down. I'm not sure if they were stretched out or if is was a design flaw, but that was extremely inconvenient. Due to the straps offering little to no support, the dress was very bust revealing, so make sure you're comfortable with that if you are over a C cup.
Tried this on but didn't wear it. The straps are long and the skirt has a ton of material. It didn't fit me well.
The straps fit me perfectly because I am 6'1". It was ok.

links_reviews_title: Super long straps you can not adjust
links_reviews_text: I am pretty average sized and no way these long straps could hv worked for me. Also more casual day dress looking than pictures lead one to expect.
The straps are super long and not adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear this one. Very pretty and well made but the straps were way too long.
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress and color but I couldn't wear it. The top was too tight and the straps were so long that I would have had to knot them. Everywhere else, fit was fine.

I read the reviews about the straps being long and figured it would be perfect for me since I'm 6'3". But the straps were way too long even for me. The whole cut of the dress is long. It was unwearable, even on me.
I am very pear shaped. I didn't realize this dress was still fitted in the hips. It couldn't zip it past my hips. The color and fabric were beautiful.
the straps were too long. don't need to wear a bra with this.
This dress is EVERYTHING. I'm a curvy woman and this dress did me every bit of justice a dress could possibly do. I wore it three times and had a really hard time sending it back.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful, easy dress you can wear for everyday OR glam it up.
links_reviews_text: Like other reviews say, the straps are very long. For me, as a 34B, the straps were perfect for a sexy date night. They let my breasts sit at their natural place and show a little cleavage. The cup size was just about perfect, as it left just enough room to add a sticky, backless silicone bra underneath. The cut was made for me, as a pear shape. The top fit very well all over, and the skirt has some movement to it because of the pleats. I really enjoyed wearing this dress would rent it again!
Runs small. Size up
Great color, easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, nice material, runs large
links_reviews_text: Straps are way too long and kept falling off my shoulders. Dress is also a bit too long, but I'm only 5'3". Beautiful color and material. Nice quality.

links_reviews_title: Straps way too long for petite
links_reviews_text: Too big and straps too long for petite. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Straps too long or neckline too low
links_reviews_text: I thought I could wear this to work with a blazer. Definitely not- with a bra it sat too high and the straps were all loose. Without a bra it seemed to sit where it should on my waist but the straps are so long and the cut along the neckline was so awkwardly low. I like low cut for non-work events, but this wasn't low cut it was just too low all around. So as other said straps are too long or maybe more importantly the material around the top of the dress was cut too low. So bummed bc the color is stunning as well as the flow
Bodice fits well but straps way too long
I wanted to wear this but I couldn't since the straps were to big.
Dress for great and was flattering but the steps were so long, I couldn't wear. If I owned it I would have had them altered but not a possibility with rental so it went right back.

I love this dress, it was perfect for a summer date night with my husband. The 4 fit well, just slightly tight across the chest for me (32DD); I wear a 4 in most brands. My only complaint is that the straps are just a tad too long, so slipped down some, and probably wouldn't work on someone short.

The dress fits nicely but the straps are too big. They kept hanging off and I did not feel like clipping them to make it stay put. I wanted to wear this for work but it was too dressy for me and too open for the chest area. I wasn't going to wear a light sweater to cover up since we had a major heat wave. Definitely would get this dress for a nice simple occasion.
Gorgeous color! Gorgeous fabric! Overall it was too tight. Not for pears!
Rented the 6 after reading the dress ran small. The body fit great but the straps were way too long and can't be adjusted. Sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Tiny in hips, huge in shoulders
links_reviews_text: The construction and fabric quality is fantastic. I've rented this designer before and last time in the same size, it was a bit big. This one was so tight in the hips, I could barely get it over them. The shoulders though were falling off. The color is so beautiful, but I couldn't make it work so back it went.

I've been a RTR unlimited member for awhile now and have figured out my sizing for most of the brands carried. This dress is TTS for Prabal/designer sizing but would recommend sizing up from your sizing from your everyday brands (like J Crew, Club Monaco, Vince). The dress itself is lovely, classic and the color is beautiful. I felt amazing in it.

What a beautiful dress that I couldn't wear! I rented this with no ratings in my regular size 0. It's well constructed and a beautiful color, but the top is so tight! I couldn't even zip it wearing no bra. It's not the waist though, which fit fine, but around the rib cage. I have a slightly wider rib cage for someone my size, but this felt like a full size too small, not just a little snug. If you have a full chest or a wider rib cage, I'd recommend sizing up. I'm going to re-rent the 2 when I can!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous top but not for tall girls
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this more but the fit wasn't right for me. I have a long torso so the tutu was 3 inches higher than my belly button. Just felt a little short for my body type. I had the size small and it was loose around my body but short in waist. I think a medium would just be too big. It's very beautiful I wish it fit right!

links_reviews_title: This top was such a talker in the restaurant! Had multiple compliments and felt like a queen in it.
links_reviews_text: The fit was exactly what a size 0 feels like. Snug to make it feel like it fits perfectly but room to breathe still. Tighter in the top part and the bandeau bra is slightly adjustable and super comfy! Bottom part flares out a bit and the whole top is sewed with perfection. I couldn't get over how beautiful this top is. 10/10 recommend. Will rent it again soon!

I wore this dressed up for a night on the town and dressed down for a daytime street fair. I loved it both ways. But wear sunscreen. If you forget and walk around a street fair for a few hours, you will get a burn that will look like floral lace. ;)

links_reviews_title: Perfect hint of gold to celebrate a Golden Birthday
links_reviews_text: I wore this top for a girls' dinner party to celebrate my golden birthday. I loved the colors and the embellishment. It fit perfectly (without a bra) and I didn't have any issues with the lining underneath. Loved the pop of pink on the roses and the gold of the leaves. The "tutu" part started exactly where I had my high waisted shorts which made the fit even better.
so cute! fit well, zipper was a tad wonky though. if i had someone to zip me up i think it would've been okay. Follow me on instagram for more style inspiration: @delearza

links_reviews_title: Was not a fan of how the bandeau looked
links_reviews_text: I thought this shirt had potential but didn't quite hit the mark in person.
Very weird fit. Too tight in the top but way too loose around my stomach.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it üòï Looks great in the photos but was not so fabulous in real life.
links_reviews_text: Sheer part too sheer & runs small.
Ran small. Really only works on small chested people unless you wear a cami with it

Loved this so much I bought it so I could actually wear it. I didn't wear it for the occasion I got it for. It's very girly and more of a day outfit but is see through so wouldn't recommend wearing it to certain events/places.
Love the subtle sexiness of this.

This shit is super cute. The bandeau underneath is a bit less fitted than you'd expect, which can cause a bit of bunching or scrunching. The bottom half of the shirt fit well but the issue came from the upper half. The arm and head holes are a bit snug. It cut into my arms and neck a bit and while that could be fixed with a size up, the bottom would then be too large. Still worth the rental for me as I love a good sheer/illusion garment and haven't found many so far.
Very pretty top but I didn't realize it was not lined at the waist. I have a tattoo on my stomach and showing it wearing this top would not be cute. Fit a bit tight with a tank underneath.

links_reviews_title: I wore this on my birthday night, cute but kept riding up.
links_reviews_text: Cute but riding up most of the night, you could see my bra a little. Wear without a bra if you can!
Fun and sexy, without appearing too revealing. Goes great with jeans
very cute but not for bigger bust women or size up

links_reviews_title: Loved it, but didn't know stomach part was sheer. Was wearing to work party, so it felt inappropria
links_reviews_text: Didn't know mid section was see-through, so couldn't wear to work party.

I'm super pale, even though this shirt was beautiful on it would look STUNNING on someone with darker skin because the bandeau underneath would stand out & it would make the details on the shirt stand out. It's really well made & just a masterpiece in my opinion. I am usually a size 2-4 & got a 4, a size 2 would have fit much better.

Rented this to wear for Easter. Loved it, but a bit to see through in spots. Didn't think it was appropriate for church with all the skin showing! Could have worn with a cardigan over it, but had a better option with another dress I rented from RTR!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, runs small, puffy in hips
links_reviews_text: The fabric only covers bust area like a band and was way too small for me, didn't even come down to bottom of bra.

I loved the style of this dress and the fabric is kind of linen-y, so it feels appropriate for a summer wedding. However, the sizing is pretty off: I usually wear size 0 (or UK 4 for this brand). I rented a UK 6 (US 2) and couldn't zip it up past one rib (and I have a small frame and chest). But I think if I went a size or two up, the bottom would be too big and the length too long. If you do give it a try, order at least two sizes up.

I rented for a black-tie optional wedding but decided to go with another dress because: - classy but a bit boring - it's part linen so needs ironing/wrinkles/not super formal - I sized up one, and although I probably needed to size up to get the side zip up, it didn't fit like a glove (bust area a bit big). I would say TTS overall though. - would probably look best with great heels/earrings, and big ponytail/updo to show off the shoulder design

links_reviews_title: for such a showstopper dress, it's very comfortable :)
links_reviews_text: runs small; stretchy/flexible material
I normally wear a size 4-6 and I could not even fit this dress even though it was a size 6. No idea how it looks on me.

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress to wear to a fancy cocktail wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I wore it 9 weeks pregnant and still trying to hide it, and this dress managed to hide the little bump while still looking super chic. Definitely order at least one size up though--it runs *very* small.

This dress is very comfortable and flattering. However, I normally wear a 6/8 and had to size up to a 14 (the biggest size offered) in order to make this work. That is insane!! It's not too short and I didn't wear a bra but you could wear a strapless bra without it being seen

Definitely runs small. I ordered an 8 based on other reviews and I am usually a 2. The 8 fits perfect though, so just adjust accordingly. I will also add that the waist ribbon (seen tied up in the model photos) actually is just hanging past my knee - not ideal. I intend to wear this to a wedding this weekend, but need to figure out how it ties. It's very unclear. Lastly, what looks like a shoulder strap is actually a cap sleeve...The model photos don't look like this though. I tucked the cap under to make it a wide shoulder strap. It would be nice if RTR had accurate depictions of the dresses, so there aren't surprises when they arrive home.
Going up 2 sizes wasn't enough. Runs very small and the material isn't forgiving

links_reviews_title: Material is coarse and the cut is super small
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing this - even though I went according to the size chart it was way too small. And I was surprised the material was more burlap than anything (is it a really heavy rough linen?) not what I was expecting. The style is super cute though.

I'm usually a 4/6. I ordered the 8 by mistake and thought I'd have to send it back right away for a smaller size. I couldn't even get it zipped half way. It's TINY! I don't even think a 10 would fit. Maybe a 12. Who knows. It's very pretty in person but tiny. Probably just like Victoria Beckham!

links_reviews_title: No No No! Cheap and cut for really really small torsos!!
links_reviews_text: The fabric blends sounded good but ended up just feeling and looking like a "high quality potato sack". I've worn almost all of the Victoria Victoria Beckham line, and have consistently been a UK 8/ US 4. However... **This fits is WAY OFF everything else in the line. The UK 8 fit like a UK 4/ US 0!!!** My average/narrow hips fit fine BUT I could not even get the dress zipped past my waist and was about 3 INCHES away from being able to hook the zipper eyelet or having the zipper even touch. I could only see this fitting if you have hourglass figure with a REALLY NARROW TORSO (US 0 or 00), size 4 hips, and no butt!!!
Sized up by 2 sizes and couldn't zip this one up.
Teeny Tiny. Couldn't get it over my hips 12R, and I wear an 8-10 usually. Yikes. I think I'd need a 16 in this! Gorgeous fabric.

links_reviews_title: Sizes small but forgiving cut and fabric
links_reviews_text: I am usually a small 6 but I'm glad I sized up for this one, the 8 fit like a glove. I don't think it would be very easy to zip it up by yourself. The fabric is lovely, definitely not one of the dresses that clings to your body. It drapes very nicely and is very forgiving of the midsection area. The loop of fabric on the left hip is a little weird particularly after being pressed - I may try to steam it to see if that helps.

Runs small, I had to tuck the hem under my bra to prevent any slippage. It was nice for a chill show, not great for if I wanted to dance or move my arms. This was surprising because I don't have much going in the chest area.
Was really cute but way too small.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing at all
links_reviews_text: Definitely way too small. The shirt was almost a bra or even less than a bra (my underboob was showing without wearing a bra). Recommend sizing up a lot

The way this top was sewn makes no sense. The bust part is tacked to the back of the top making it impossible to put your arms in to the sleeves. I could not even figure out how to put the top on so obviously I couldn't wear it...

links_reviews_title: Wore it to my sister's birthday celebration
links_reviews_text: Length wise, it fit true to size. However, when you raise your arms, the whole top lifts up so you HAVE to wear a bralette underneath to help from "exposing" yourself.
I didn't end up wearing this bc I thought it was just a little too tight, but it was very pretty and a great color.
Wow wow wow... Loved the dress and the color jaw dropping. Got this dress for HOCO and everyone including the teachers commented on the style and yes I am saying it again: THE COLOR!!!
Hugs you right in every way, no bra required

I typically wear a 0 but it was unavailable at the time. I'm happy I chose the 2. It fit my chest well and hugged me in all the right places. The waist was tight on my torso but loose in the waist, and long enough that the deep neckline wasn't so loud.
I LOVED this dress. Perfect color and perfect fit. Wore it for a Saturday night out with the girls and received tons of compliments.

This dress is a bombshell look - was a bit big but left me room to breathe. Pulled off wearing it without a bra which was amazing - my hubby couldn't keep his eyes off of me! :) super recommend this sexy number! Be aware that this is a orangey red and not a red red.
Perfect Vegas dress for dinner to a show to a club. It's fitted but flattering. I felt very on fire in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great color, fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! The color is vibrant, perfect length, I'm 4'11 so it wasn't too short on me. I'm usually a size 6 and wore the 6 in this dress. Straps were a little big, but overall perfect fit and accentuated all my curves.

This dress was a head turner and the color was amazing. It was just the right amount of sexy. It is pretty short and I would recommend a nubra underneath and the best area is a little looser and it helps fill it out. Great for a summer night out.

links_reviews_title: 20 weeks pregnant and still super comfortable. Great stretch and fit. Soft material.
links_reviews_text: 20 weeks pregnant and still super comfortable. Great stretch and fit. Soft material.

links_reviews_title: Sexy short vibrant dress for our get away.
links_reviews_text: My husband loved how flattering the dress was. There was room at the waist for what happens after dinner...fullness of the belly. I loved the bright color and slit at the front, and it was a nice length for my petite height (5'). Wearing it made me feel like a million dollars which is a sure sign that I liked it!

This dress is nice. It's very form fitting in a comfortable way. Not tight. I was able to dance the night away without it riding up. Only con is that the straps are a little long. I had to use fashion tape, so no big deal. Also, it's not the most flattering for a small chest. Nonetheless, great dress!!
The dress fit really well for the most part. The stomach section of the dress was a bit loose from some angles but still a show stopper.

I rented this dress for a destination bachelorette party in Malibu. It was perfect for the event and totally not my normal style. I ordered a size 2 and a size 6 - I thought the 4 would be the perfect fit for me but it was not available, so I ended up wearing the 2. This dress might fit better if the wearer has a larger chest than me - the straps kept sliding down. Also, it was tight around my butt but then did a little bubble/gap thing so it would ride up. This made the dress look shorter than it was but I didn't really mind, although in a more conservative setting I would want to be mindful of this. Overall - everyone loved this dress and I got a lot of compliments on it. Although it could have fit me better, I felt like a smoke-show wearing it.
This is a really cute dress but very form fitting. Since I wanted to dance and was in for the longhaul it didn't suit my event

I love this trendy dress by Jay Godfrey! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works forA-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra so you should not wear a bra with this kind of dress. At 5'3, the length hit mid-thigh on me.
Great color, quality fabric, so flattering
Fit perfect contemplating buying it

I love this feminine by Jay Godfrey! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are, are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress. (add if are not) so you should wear nubra or no bra since the back is low cut and the straps are thin. At 5‚Äô5, the length hit the mid to upper thigh area on me. I love the vibrant and eye-catching color of this dress. Pair with strappy heels and a jeweled bracelet to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Can dress it to be a winter or spring dress
links_reviews_text: Fit so well
This dress is a great color and fit well except the straps. My daughter wore this for a formal at school. I had to pin the straps in the back. They were too loose. she is a 34C.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not a good fit for my body
links_reviews_text: This dress has a lot of potential but unfortunately did not fit my body well. The bust was too loose and the straps were too long (despite the fact that I am quite tall). The dress was a bit snug on my hips and might be too short if you're on the taller side of things. The product is quite nice, just wasn't for me!
This was a little tight on my thighs but was comfortable for a night out!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress but too tight on my hips, I got the size 8 and probably needed a 10- typically wear 6
links_reviews_text: I would recommend it
I'm 5'10 and it was way too short to wear. Barely covered my butt.
Great for this 5ft 4 130 pound gal
Wore this out to a club in Miami and it was so comfortable and flattering
definitely a snug fit - but a great color and quality material!
very flirty and airy

links_reviews_title: Large in the bust and very short but rides up when walking
links_reviews_text: Not as dark of a red as I was hoping. Would be great dress for large breasts and narrow hips.
Heeey love it and so did my boo

links_reviews_title: Super short!! I'm 5'5 and this dress was tiny
links_reviews_text: Too short to wear

I wore a 4 which was a little too big for me. I should have worn a 2 but there weren't any available so I took a risk. The dress still looked amazing. The color is unique and it is insanely comfortable. The material is silky and soft. Highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: This is a super fun little red dress....sexy design but not too short.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight on me but I've been putting on the lbs....so my bad! Even so, I would say it runs small. Great fabric, fun design and well made. Will rent again one size bigger!
Definitely runs small. I comfortably wear an 8 but I got a 10 and it fit like an 8. Thinner fabric, not that scuba material, but not see through! Perfect for a summer night out
Rented this for a bachelorette party and it was perfect! Considering buying it because I got so many compliments.
Super sexy and fun for vacation or dates- love! So different
I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that it gapped out a bit around my stomach - that was the only place it didn't fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: The dress was just way too tight
Not really appropriate for a wedding or event - more of a bachelorette/vegas/miami type of dress
Super cute dress! Deep v so definitely has quite a bit of cleavage.
The perfect fit - extremely comfy. Was exactly what I was looking for!
Very comfortable & flattering dress. It runs a bit large and the front is super low, so definitely had to tape the girls in.
Really long on me so I had to pin the neck higher and leave my hair down. I love the flowyness of the material and it looks great in pictures.
Very forgiving fit! Perfect dress to be the main attraction! Got plenty of compliments and made my 40th extra special!

I rented this for a dinner but it came late so I wore it the next day out shopping. I felt very Blair Waldorf and glamorous. Tons of compliment! One of those dresses you never want to take off! It's rather baggy so I would definitely go down a size or two!

This dress is gorgeous. The color and draping is beautiful. It does run big so size down. I wore with pasties because it was chilly out. I also rented the red fur jacket for over it. I also wore a lariat for extra sparkles
Luxurious satin feel, very comfortable and sexy. If you don't have large breasts, size down or else you will be swimming in it.
Wore this to an office holiday party. I received a lot of compliments...but I had to pin the dress because the cut dropped too low.

links_reviews_title: Ran a bit big but was the perfect holiday party dress. Makes any set of shoulders look good!
links_reviews_text: I loved the neckline of this dress and the ribbon pieces that fall behind. It is not my favorite length as it hit my legs (personally) in a weird spot but the material is so majestic. I wore this without a bra and put bandaids over the nips because there is no way you can find one low enough that wouldn't take away from the deep neckline.

The dress is gorgeous! Many compliments. The fabric is high quality. The length is for R or L. I had to improvise to keep it sitting nicely on figure - the front top part is not for petite girls. Also stack on body tape.
Watch the deep V- will need fabric tape. Very comfortable and great color satin. Neck detail is nice. Only thing holding dress together is snap at neck
Tons of compliments. I used tape and pasties, but you have to be comfortable with being bra less and looking bra less.

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful but not for women with boobs
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous and I've always eyeballed it. Once I put it on I knew it just wasn't for me because I have larger boobs and a smaller waist and larger hips. I wish it could of worked but it's definitely meant for women that are sticks.

Fit is loose & forgiving. I wore while on vacation, it was very hot, so this dress was perfect. Extremely deep cut front you will need some pasties, or strapless/backesless bra, if you dont want to go braless.

Felt super sexy in this! When i tried it on without hair/makeup/heels it felt a bit like lingerie... but all done up it was great. Color is gorgeous. Material is thick enough to not see underwear. Wore stick on bra cups due to low cut and its also low on sides/armpits. Also wore a lariat that gave a little sparkle on the neckline. HubbyLOVED this dress. Would hughly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night long. Perfect dress for a Christmas, winter wedding in Central Park.
links_reviews_text: Let me start by saying this was my back up dress. I was disappointed for about all of 5 minutes when I realized my first choice wasn't coming. I probably could have sized down but the dress is a loose fitting dress so it didn't matter. This dress was completely out of my comfort zone since I never wear anything low cut. But it felt great. No bra necessary. I wore pasties and used some fashion tape to keep it in place. I had no problem dancing all night long. My only complain't is that I'm on the shorter side. I may have liked it an inch or two shorter, as it fell rigjt at my knee cap; however...I loved it anyway. It's the perfect dress as long as you don't mind getting compliments all night long!

Wore it in Napa for a birthday celebration and it was definitely a head turner! Got so many compliments and loved wearing it! I suggest getting pasties and double sided tap to keep things secure tho lol
Loved this dress. It was sexy and so comfortable. I had to tape it for obvious reasons. It is great for a cocktail party and something like I've never worn before. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, luxurious fabric, loose fitting so extremely comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress!

This dress was so pretty and very flirty! It dips very low in the front and on the sides, so you definitely can't wear a bra with this. I'd recommend getting some fashion tape to avoid any slips! It is very loose-fitting, so I'd say go with your regular dress size, or smaller if you don't want it to be as loose. I loved that the neck ties so you're able to adjust it yourself. Since the top is more scandalous, I'm glad it was a little bit longer on me than it was on the model.
Huge fit!! The flow and drape would have been great, 2 sizes smaller!

Invite this for a birthday dinner and it was a hit. Very comfortable and the material is high quality. It was wrinkled out of the bag but irons well. The back allows you to do different things bow or knot. Lots of complements I felt great.

I love this dress and received several compliments. I had to wear a back up size because the smaller size was damaged by a prior renter. I could still get away with it but I tied the back pieces in a bow to tighten it up a bit and the look was OK/it worked. I think the dress is best suited to women who can get away with no bra ‚Äì there's not much fabric on the boob area. I didn't need fashion tape but probably good to have on hand just in case!

This is a gorgeous dress! Rented it for a cruise and felt amazing all night. It's very plunging and dramatic. I was worried my girls would show but I'm small chested and they were fine all night. There is no bra option available for this dress. So be ready!

Wore this on Valentines Day with my boyfriend. I sized up to make sure it would fit and cover my boobs. Nice material and very comfortable and fun. Needed some dress tape though to minimize the side boob.
I bought this for a Christmas date night with my hubby. It was a little too light for the evening so I didn't end up wearing it but it was super sexy
This was flashy and fun, but I probably should've gotten a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Stunning and dramatic. Be prepared to turn heads.
links_reviews_text: Fit is a bit loose. I often size up for European designers. Do not do that for this dress. Consider sizing down. You will absolutely need fashion tape to keep the deep front plunge in place and prevent constant flashing of your breasts.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a fancy dinner in mexico city
links_reviews_text: Would be perfect if it was more fitted but very elegant
Too big

links_reviews_title: Very pretty but not right for occasion
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this, but it was silky and sexy.

links_reviews_title: Not made for petite women. Very plunge. If you are busty, I do not recommend
links_reviews_text: Very open in the front.

Swing style, easy to wear, flattering. Nice weight to the silk fabric, luxurious. Fabric weight helps it wear so well. Slit can be revealing, but you aren't wearing this to be cautious! You can size down with this dress if needed.

links_reviews_title: Bright red and lovely fabric, but not right for me
links_reviews_text: I thought the looseness would make it flattering, but it didn't in my case. It also just looks like lingerie, so I didn't feel appropriate wearing to the event I wanted to even with a cardigan.

While the dress does fit loosely, it's a real stunner. Instead of using the pin in the back that's built in, I tied the dress up around the neck and that helped prevent the deep V from exposing my belly button. Make sure you have some low beams as regular tape won't cut it for the silky draped front which WILL expose irregularities.

THIS DRESS IS GORGEOUS. However. I rented 2 sizes and it was still enormous and they didnt have a smaller size available. I am an 8/10 and needed like a 2/4. Runs VERY large. I will rent again sometime!
This dress is a little too big, but the deep V makes it sexy. Definitely NOT a "show off your body" kind of dress.
This was a little large, it was difficult to wear due to the fact that it is very low-cut. The color was beautiful
Beautiful color but runs big

links_reviews_title: Runs Big, Sleeves Came in Handy
links_reviews_text: Rented for trip to Hamptons but wore it to a rehearsal dinner in LA first. More of a day dress but worked ok for evening too. So comfy. Lots of compliments. Was nice to have sleeves when it got chilly and not need a wrap. Runs big. I normally wear a 6 and the Small/4 fit great.

Rented this for vacation but returned unworn because top half was ill-fitting on me. Neckline too low/open. Snap at bust too low...and too difficult to pin as thin fabric. Not good for long torso...high waist line/tie. Skirt part hung well. Stripes not black & white as described...they are gray & white. Crisp and light. Great sleeves.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely LOVED this dress and hated to send it back!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an elegant bridal shower. It has stretch to it, which was nice because I ate a lot at the shower. :) I couldn't wear a regular bra with it because of the cut, so I wore a strapless bra, and it worked very well. I wore linen-colored pointy Rothy's with it, and I dressed it up with a simple pearl necklace and earrings. I wore a size Small (S) Regular. I am just under 5'11", I weigh 140, I have broad shoulders, and a 36C bust, and it was a perfect fit! In fact, everything about this dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: A great way to "wrap up" any event!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to the second graduation event at my daughter's university. Based on reviews I read, I ordered an XL and the L was the back-up. I'm glad I did because the Large fit just fine (I'm a size 10 in most dresses). It was very comfortable. The snap to connect the top fit in kind of an awkward place so had to pin it at a little higher point. Overall I really liked it ... the bottom is beautiful and works well to spotlight some great shoes.
I'm 5'9", 145, D chest, I got the S and M. I wore both. Small was ok but tight with the chest. Medium was perfect with my chest. But both just fine.

Loved this true wrap dress! The dress shirt-feel material and the black stripes made this feel somewhat French-inspired; perfect for a weekend getaway in New Orleans! This is super flattering for hourglass figures. Beware that while this does have a snap closure at the bust, it is still a low neckline that exposes cleavage. I wore it to dinner and felt beautiful.

Loved this- such a light and comfortable fit with enough flair to be eye catching. My first wrap dress, so it took me a minute to figure out the ties, but I was seriously impressed with how well it stayed put. The front has a snap to close, but found it to be too low for my comfort. I wish it was a bit higher but didn't take away from how much I loved this. I'm 5' 2" and it was perfect with about a 2" heel.
Beautiful flow to it, very pretty. Runs very large - I'm usually a S but the XS was still a little loose on me. Only negative is that it was a little low on the chest for work
Such a a great dress. Wore it to a store opening and got so many compliments. Would absolutely recommend if you're bloated and on day one like I was /: RTR staff was super helpful in the shop.

Curvy / petite, 5ft 0‚Äù, 32DDD, 130 lbs, size small . Felt stunning in this gorgeous and flattering dress! The wrap around shows off my curves while being very forgiving to a not so flat tummy. Because I‚Äôm so short Love that with my 3.25‚Äù heels it did not drag on floor. Wore it in the peak heat of June and felt cool despite long sleeves because material is so light. Don‚Äôt skip the ironing! Makes a difference in the flow and fallof was he dress...has beautiful movement when you walk.

This dress was so awesome that I wore it despite the fact that it came with a big ol' stain in front. No one saw... I think? Whatever, this dress hugged me in all the right places and was super lightweight, perfect for NYC in August. Get it!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for a wedding brunch!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a more formal after wedding brunch. I felt great in it but it was comfortable enough to wear after a long night of dancing! It runs a bit big, I could have actually worn the medium but I made the large work with safety pins. I also shot photos for our blog @sassandsweetness in it!

The fabric was more like a men's shirt, which made this a fun twist on a normal shirt dress. It was thin, comfortable, has POCKETS and great sleeves. Nice snap closure at the top too if you're bigger up top
This dress is just a dream. Only thing that bothered me a little was the pocket lining was a little puffy which made my hips look a little wider.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress, was perfect for a work brunch
links_reviews_text: Really cute I could have done ordering a small but the medium worked just fine

links_reviews_title: Very light material, very Parisienne feel, lovely summer dress
links_reviews_text: Ample roomy with great movement, fun dress

This dress is so pretty and airy. The cut and the way it flows when I walk makes me feel like a flamenco dancer. It's a little low cut so I had to pin it, and it would probably be even prettier with heels, but I do a lot of walking.

Love this wrap dress! Wore it to brunch & felt like a summer day:) Light but not wrinkly, does not fly open when you walk. Low sheerness factor. Snap at chest is SUCH a great touch so there's no struggling with tape, safety pins etc. Wore with nude Spanx.
Loved this dress I wore it a few times before sending it back! The silhouette was stunning and made my shape look great. Perfect for work, dinner, or going out ! Beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for late spring wedding in Upper Peninsula of Michigan
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! It was so comfortable and fit great. I wore it with nude wedges which worked perfectly. Very flattering - made my butt look good while hiding my mid-section a bit. I wish I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Lightweight summer dress with interesting sleeves
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit and lightweight dress. I received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Feminine dress w a menswear twist
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly but I would recommend a nude shaper since the fabric is a shirting material and could be a little sheer in certain lighting. I got compliments from retail fashion buyers on this dress so that should tell you something!

This wrap dress is amazing. Definitely runs a bit big but it's okay because it's a wrap dress! I'm 5'6 and I wouldn't have been able to wear this with flats because it is long in the back but otherwise this is perfect!

This dress is MAGICAL. MAGICAL. I just loved it so very much! It was SO light and airy, SO comfortable, SO flattering, and SO pretty!!! Just pure perfection! I'd say it runs a tad large, as I ordered a small and felt I could've done XS. The wrap stays tied and closed very nicely, even in big wind gusts. I will say, I wasn't sure if it was too dressy for the office, but I took a chance and got so many compliments. It could easily be dressy for an afternoon wedding or a nice dinner out or an event at like a winery or something magical, but if you don't mind being a little fancy for work, it definitely can be worn there too!

Wore this dress to a professional conference. It makes such a gorgeous statement. I could barely walk 10 steps without someone stopping me to compliment the dress. It has a lovely cut, moves beautifully, fits tts, is comfortable and it has pockets! This is my favorite rental & I will probably buy it. Highly recommend!

This wrap dress is perfect for spring! Wore it for a birthday party near the beach and fabric was breathable and cool. Since it's a wrap dress you can tighten it or loosen it as you see fit. It runs slightly big but I fixed that with tightening the wrap and enjoyed the extra room in the arms. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: My FAVORITE item I have rented yet! It is sophisticated and casual.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adore this dress. It is a light dress with grey and white strips. I first rented the Small and then the XS. The XS fit me better in the arms and chest. My bust size is a 32 B and I am 118llbs. I wore this dress to work with pumps and switched to booties and a leather jacket at night. It can be dressed up or down. It is perfect for spring summer and will look great on any body type. The dress is flowy all around and you can adjust the waist as you please. I can't wait to rent it again, did I mention I love it?!

I love the traditional cut of the dress, the material and the high-low. The gathered sleeves at the bottom make it interesting and set it apart from the norm. So beautiful and comfortable! I wore it all day and around the house. I al 5'9" and it came about an inch above my heels. Great length for heels :)
Loved it so much I bought it! Super unique and flowy.

links_reviews_title: Easy and comfy for 21 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: Great dress, comfortable and floaty. The neckline is pretty low so not work appropriate for me. Otherwise fit was as expected. I usually wear a medium and sized up for my pregnancy, but probably could have done with medium given the wrap style.

The dress is lightweight and perfect for southern spring and summer days. It is a true wrap dress and is thoughtfully made with the exception of the pockets (which I usually love.) They just add bulk to the dress and you really can't use them. Otherwise, I love the styling, fit and structure. Great rental and I wore it several time - although I did have to iron it each time.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a hot day
links_reviews_text: Great dress for every day And work. True to size and very flattering. Fabric is Ultrasound and great for a very hot day.
I wore this around town running errands and got lots of compliments. It's easy, light, comfy, with pockets for phone and keys and lip balm.
The only con is that the string will not stay flat even after ironing.
Loved this dress! Wore it for my sons 1st communion. Got tons of compliments! It was big on top for me. I could have went with XS.
Size down! I can see how this would be attractive if it wasn't so puffy and frumpy on me due to the size.

This dress was cute and had potential, but the XS was too large and disproportionate for my frame. The material was a little to the stiffer side, so didn't fall nicely and looked frumpy. Probably would look great on a non-petite, taller person!
Great fit I'm a size 8 and ordered the large it was perfect .. does need a slip

links_reviews_title: Attended a Wedding in Vegas at the Elvis chapel!
links_reviews_text: This dress is PERFECT. ABSOLUTELY PERFECT! So comfortable, so flattering, I‚Äôm ordering it again for another wedding!
Flattering

Perfect for work. A little tight in the chest, I'm a 34F and felt slightly constricted but not enough to not be able to wear it. If I had gone up in size the rest of the dress would have been too large. Loved it and got lots of compliments! Even from strangers!
Tried-on in-store so I knew the 10 fitted me perfectly. Genius design that is super flattering to mid-section. Short but classy. Good quality. Thought of buying this staple.

links_reviews_title: True to UK sizing / sized up for bump
links_reviews_text: Size up for maternity-friendly fit. Super cute 80s vibes
Top is a conservative cut, but the short length is super fun! Hugged my curves perfectly and was so comfortable. Wore this to my birthday dinner and felt like a queen.
This is a very flattering dress, structured with a bit of stretch, which makes it so nice to wear.

The picture doesn't really do it justice - this is a very flattering and comfortable piece. A simple black dress, but some additional visual interest is added with a false tie front. I rented it for and wore it to work though it runs a little shorter than I'd typically wear at work. One of my favorite Unlimited dresses so far!

I love this fun dress by Cinq A Sept! It runs true to size so we suggest sizing up for your back up. This style is fitted at the waist and hips but is very comfortable . Its great for any cup size and can be worn with a standard bra. At 5ft, the length hitmid thigh length on me. Pair with black heels and accessories to complete this look!
Perfect LBD, wore to my work holiday party, so cute! The cinching at the waist is very flattering.
A perfect LBD with a literal twist! The fit is extremely flattering and it can easily go from Work to a night out.
Great date night dinner. Perfect dress if your midsection isn‚Äôt as flat as you‚Äôd like in spite of all of those crunches! Plan to wear again. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Cute and flirty, and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fabric has no stretch! I wish I had ordered a size up, very cute and great length for going out.
Great little black dress. Flattering peplum, scoop neck. Btw this dress is short (5‚Äô9‚Äù) hit me mid to high thigh. Great material.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, short so be careful.
links_reviews_text: Great black dress. If you can't or don't like wearing short dresses this may not be for you. Great snug fit.
Nice quality but too short for work. Might be better on a shorter person.

links_reviews_title: Short and sassy but conservative enough. Day to night dress black
links_reviews_text: Black dress fitted and short even for a petite. Nice quality fabric and zipper. A little snug to zip if you are large chested or waisted I would size up. Comfortable in the sleeves. Creates a nice hourglass figure. High neck to compensate for short length. I would rent again.
Super flattering. Classy yet sexy. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Ruffle not flattering on the tummy
links_reviews_text: Did not fit, runs small.
If you have even a slight chest beware!
Very beautiful summer dress, lightweight, gorgeous print, modest enough yet flattering. Only complaint is I wish there was backup fabric behind the buttons as my bra showed a little.
Beautiful print, great fabric. Nice and light weight, perfect for hot summer days. Adorable button detail.
Wore to work for a meeting to dress up a bit without worrying. The dress was a great fit all around - length and cut
Holy guacamole this dress is so comfortable and flattering. The material is versatile--dress down or up. I wore it half a dozen times before I sent it back, and now I miss it.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and cool for a hot summer day!
links_reviews_text: Flattering lines, great dress for casual or more formal occasions.
This dress is amazing for spring/Summer. It's flowy and comfortable. There is a drawstring at the waist, which give it more structure for being a looser fit item. Would def rent again

I got this dress to wear to Easter dinner and was very happy with it. It was lightweight, comfortable, and gorgeous. It does run a little bit large so error on the side of smaller if you aren't sure what size to get.
This dress is very pretty and super comfortable. I rented it for work. I'm coming back from maternity leave and this dress fits well and has buttons down the front for easy nursing/pumping access.
I'm typically between a 12 and 14, hourglass figure, and the 12 fit well! A pretty, nice dress that I felt really comfortable in for work and after work events!
Top is sheer so you need to wear a nude bra. Bottom has a slip.
Rented this for a rehearsal dinner/work, and LOVED it. Got so many compliments on the pattern. It's light and breathable, so perfect for spring and summer. The fit was great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress and perfect for warm weather
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a Christening in Savannah, GA in hot July!! It was actually sent to me as a back up because my original dress was unavailable, but I'm so happy I had this one instead! This dress was perfect for the weather and the occasion. Super flattering! The material is lightweight and beautiful. The top is sheer so make sure undergarments are nude, but the waist down has a built in slip. Slightly large on me and could have gone a size down, but the 2 was fine. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love the print but just ok overall
links_reviews_text: The material was nice but i thought it was just ok. I'm usually a 10-12 and I definitely think I could have sized down to a 10 for a more flattering fit.

Beautiful pattern, fit is forgiving with partial elastic and drawstring waistband. I am a 4/6 and a 4 fit well. Wore buttoned up with a cardigan for a more conservative look to work and then partly unbuttoned on my day off. I am 5'7' and hit me just above the knee so great for more conservative events. Skirt is lined, top is not but I did not find it sheer, wore with a regular nude bra.
Rented this for work and I pulled it out of the garment bag and noticed it was completely see through. There was no way to salvage the dress for an outfit. Returned it immediately.

links_reviews_title: Its a cute dress, just a tad big. I should have rented a 4.
links_reviews_text: Need to wear a tank top under the dress. It is not lined on top.
