Nice dress! It fit nicely, was very comfortable, and I got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: easy to throw on and look great
links_reviews_text: very comfortable and pretty

links_reviews_title: It beautiful! Very light, great for packing.
links_reviews_text: It beautiful! Very light, great for packing.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and flattering, can be dressed up with heels or down with sandals.
links_reviews_text: Good fit, very lightweight so good for summer, flattering, and feminine.

Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and holding onto it for work. It fit large; could have worn the 8 or even the 6. But it was actually nice how airy it was as a result and the cinch at the waist fixed most of the sizing issues. Super super cute dress with multiple potential uses; love it!

links_reviews_title: Cuter on than on the hanger.
links_reviews_text: This is a flowy feminine simple dress that is good for casual work environment or for every day.
This dress is comfortable and breezy, but too loose on top.

This is a gorgeous dress that I got as part of my unlimited subscription. I feel like the brand runs small so I usually get a 6 or an 8 and I should have gotten the 6 in this dress. There's another one from this same brand (Rebecca Taylor) that I rented that's navy with green leaves and smaller flowers and the 8 was just fine.
This dress was great - easy to dress up and down; material is good quality. It's been rented a lot but the one I got looked great.

links_reviews_title: This one was a love. A very pretty (and fancy) daytime dress.
links_reviews_text: I loved this daytime dress; I wore it to Sunday brunch and a dance recital and it was perfect. It's a very light, breezy fabric so perfect for some hotter days as well.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing because it was large.
links_reviews_text: The fit runs large for sure. I ended up not wearing this because just hung on me in a non-flattering way. I recommend sizing down.
It probably runs a little big, but it was super comfortable.
Great cut and fit. Absolutely loved this

links_reviews_title: It runs large so size down
links_reviews_text: Top is sheer
Absolutely loved. Very comfy, light and flowy fabric. Doesn't cling to body or show anything through. I loved the colors and the cut hit me right about the knee. Definitely recommend

LOVED this dress, it was extremely comfortable and I got many compliments at the rehearsal dinner I wore it to. The top has enough space for a busty figure while maintaining the looser style it is meant to have. The tie around the waist cinched it in nicely and did not come undone all night. I was so busy enjoying my evening I totally forgot to take a picture of it though, sorry!
Super cute dress. Loved the light, swingy material and the gorgeous print.

links_reviews_title: So Much Love for This Dress!!!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much. Not too much excess fabric to look frumpy. Fit perfect. Flowed perfect. Totally worth a rent. Great for any occasion where you want a beautiful dress that makes you feel like million bucks.
I didn't really like the fit of this dress. It cinches over the hips rather than the waist. The material seems to be a cheap quality.
I love everything about this beautiful dress...will rent again. Wore it for Easter and loved it. The material is dreamy.
Loved the feminine floral fabric which is light and perfect for spring/summer.
Loved this dress! Was a possible choice for Easter but wore something else. Has a very flattering waistline, super cute and comfy! Would rent again

links_reviews_title: Loved this for a day in the office!
links_reviews_text: Fit so well! Comfortable, not too short, and wore with riding boots and a cardigan.
Cute dress. Just didn't love it.

This dress is beautiful and elegant. It fit well and is great for an hour glass figure. It was also comfortable to wear and I felt beautiful in it! As soon as I tried it on, I knew it was the dress for me. I'm only 4'10 and the length was perfect for me.
Very glamorous. A slight stretch on the side fabric. I had to wear a push-up bra to really fill out the top. I would rent it again.

I rented this dress for "elegant " night on a cruise vacation. This dress fits true to size and hugs your curves in all the right places. I am short in the torso at 5'2" and wish the straps had been adjustable as they were a little long but not enough to keep me from loving this dress! Would consider purchasing.
Curve hugging, comfy to wear because the fabric has just enough stretch. The sequins are not sharp so it's gentle on your (or someone else's!) skin
Dress fit perfectly, didn't ride up didn't need to be picked up, held together perfectly for hours of dancing. Extremely comfortable and flattering

links_reviews_title: Eye catching and fancy, tasteful and classy
links_reviews_text: Very pretty dress I wore for a cocktail holiday party. It is a little low cut but the length of the dress helps balance that out. I wore a strapless bra and spandex to smooth out the lower body, as the style of the dress is very form fitting through the hips and stomach area. Was fairly tight when I first out it on but does have some stretch to it and was pretty comfortable to wear through the evening. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was soooo flattering and I received many compliments. I would love to buy it!
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size and not itchy at all. It's just the right amount of sequins for a formal dinner without being overly flashy.

links_reviews_title: Perfect amount of fun and flare
links_reviews_text: Dress was well-made and comfortable considering it was tight through the body. Easy to move in because of the quality. Would definitely recommend!

Tons of compliments on this dress - it hugged curves and was comfortable for the most part. Sequins scratched on my skin a bit but it wasn't annoying enough to register during the event. I did a stick on bra but could have skipped one as well.

This dress was beautiful and was great for a wedding (black tie optional). The fit was good and the material was thick enough to cover any lines/bumps of your spanks/underwear. The only complaint I would have is that the straps were a little loose, which made it a little too low cut for my liking. I had to readjust the top at times. Other than that, great dress with tons of compliments!
Hugs the curves with a little stretch. Low cut without showing too much.
This dress was a show stopper / head turner. This is the first dress I will rent again. And I never thought I would say this!

links_reviews_title: Working with RTR is always so simple and makes going to outings that much less stressful!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit absolutely perfect and I received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun and flattering dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a Gala and it was so fun to wear and very flattering! Thick material and stretch made it forgiving. Loved it

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on my dress!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. Fit like a glove. A little difficult to bend at the waist

I wore this for a black tie optional wedding, and the style and detailing were just perfect. I got so many compliments all night long! I normally have to go up a size for my hips, as I am much larger on the bottom than I am up top. What I will say is the sizing runs slightly different than other dress the population dresses. I tried similar styles on in the store of other dresses, and I fit into a medium (snugly) but the large was more comfortable. Because of the sequins, this dress has a lot less stretch. My only bit of issue I had with this dress is the way it was cut. I know it's the style but because it had a mermaid type cut that comes in towards the knees, I found it a little too restrictive in that area. Not overwhelmingly so, and it wasn't a deal breaker, it was just personal preference. It's also much longer than it looks on the model. It came to about mid/low calf on me (for reference, I'm 5'6"). Would rent this dress over and over though for the compliments I received, and how confident I felt wearing it!

This dress has potential but it's very tight and it's the type of dress you can barely walk in ... let alone dance in. I chose not to wear it because the fit wouldn't have allowed me to move around comfortably. If you have an event where all you need to do is stand straight all night this is better for that!

This dress - I would own it for sure if I could. It was spectacular. I ordered the small and the medium, which I'm glad I did, the medium fit like a glove. The material was thick, but not too heavy with just enough stretch to be comfortable and still keep things in place. We attended a friend's black tie optional wedding in Philadelphia and this dress was just perfect. The sequins and the style gave it just enough flair. It was so comfortable to dance in, especially with the ruffled bottom. HIGHLY recommend renting this one.

links_reviews_title: How confident I felt in the dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and it complimented my figure, hugged all the right places. I'm about 5'5 and 140-145 LBs. I have a smaller upper body and curvy lower body and in between sizes 6 and 8. I wore the 6, but just in case also ordered the 4. The size 4 fit but it was a little snug and I knew I wouldn't be comfortable for the entire night. I wore this to a soft opening of a new casino.

links_reviews_title: Sequins were the perfect amount of elegance!
links_reviews_text: I'm a bit curvier and was worried the dress was a little tight in the hips, but just the style of the dress! The wedding was black tie, so the sequins gave it enough pizazz so I didn't have to wear a floor length gown! Lots of compliments so I would defiantly suggest this dress to anyone who is interested!
Elegant and beautiful form fitting dress. True to size.
Fit like a glove, very cute, multiple comments on it. Great first experience

I'm 137lbs and 5'3". I wore the Small. It doesn't have a lot of stretch and my husband got a blister zipping it up but the Medium was too big and the extra material made me look bigger than I am. Also because this dress doesn't have a lot of stretch it's not a dress you can "get low get low" in. But the fabric is heavy and the dress is made extremely well. I wore it without a bra and everything stayed in place nicely. It's a very sexy neckline without being to revealing. The length is a little different - not really midi and not really a gown - but I liked the way it looked. I would definitely rent this dress again for an event.
I am a curvy size 12 and the xl fit me perfectly. Decolage looked good without being over the top. Beautifully made quality dress. Very comfortable. I am 5' 6 and the dress was almost to my ankles.

This dress ran true to size and I received many compliments. I'm 5'2" so it fit longer on me than the model, which was fine because it allowed me to teeter between cocktail and formal. This dress really flattered my shape and was also comfortable. I highly recommend this dress.

Fits true to size and comfortable. Chose the larger size that I ordered because i have a bit of a mid section and it was more flattering, but the large also fit. I was able to wear a normal bra which I always appreciate. A little tight around the legs for movement purposes but didn't restrict me from dancing.

This dress is well made! Super thick luxurious lining and heavier material. Although this wasn't the dress I ended up wearing for my wedding anniversary dinner, it was the true runner up! I'm in between as size 8&10 and I'd say this dress fit comfortably and hugged all the right curves.
The straps on the shoulder are too long. The rest fit fantastic.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and unique.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. The sequins weren't itchy and the fit allowed for great bending especially sitting for dinner. The skirt had a fun movement to it! Please note this isn't a dress you can finish zipping up yourself.

links_reviews_title: This was my emergency replacement dress and ended up being my favorite!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect, the fit, comfortable, very flattering, gave me curves in all the right places. I got so many compliments. Love, love this dress!!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress!! It gave me the illusion of an hourglass shape and the thick fabric made everything feel secure. I got compliments all night and who doesn't love that?! This dress is the perfect balance of classy and sexy. I would definitely rent it again. (My waist is 29", hips are 37", bust is 36B and the small fit like a glove!)

This dress really highlights an hourglass shape! It is definitely form fitting, but in a good way. I wear a 36DDD, and didn't need a bra! I don't think I've been able to go braless since I was a teenager! Haha I'm a dress size 12 and was worried that the XL might be too big, but they didn't have my back up size (L) available. However, the XL fit perfectly! I couldn't have asked for a better experience!

links_reviews_title: Wish I didn't have to send it back!!!
links_reviews_text: In love with this dress!!! It ended up being a bit longer than it looked in some of the other pictures (so short girls be warned) but it worked out with the weather being so cold. I got a TON of compliments! Very figure flattering, cleavage friendly and fit like a glove. The thicker material made the close fit look smooth and flawless and the heavier material kept me warm in the cold temps. I felt fantastic! Huge bonus that I could wear a regular bra with this! If it ever goes on clearance I'm buying it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a special occasion!
links_reviews_text: Dress is pretty. Not sure if I will wear it yet, or wear my replacement dress I just ordered. It fits VERY tight in the thighs (warning to girls with hips like me) but it doesn‚Äôt look terrible. Just real tight. Otherwise the dress fits nice. Great quality!

Loved this rental. I ordered this before any reviews or pictures were posted because I loved it. Had a black tie optional wedding and thought the shimmer was fancy and the length was perfect. When reviews started going up people were saying to size up because it has no stretch to it and could be tight. I ended up in the small when I would normally wear a medium and it fit like a glove. Very flattering. I wore one of those sticky cup bras with the clasp low in the front and it worked great My only issue were the sequins on the back. I wore my hair down and they got constantly got caught in the sequins. When I took the dress off at the end of the night, I had hair stuck in all the sequins. Other than that, loved it and got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for being the guest at a formal wedding. You can never go wrong with a black dress!!!
links_reviews_text: The dress fits very well. I carry my weight in my midsection and usually stay away from dress shapes like this. However the color block design gave me a waist. I also liked that I could wear a regular bra with this dress. Its a sexy yet elegant look. Go ahead and try it I don't think you will be disappointed.

I rented this for a formal Christmas party. It fit perfectly and was very flattering. I received a ton of compliments. I was able to wear a regular bra with the dress. I paired it with gold jewelry and black heels.
Fit true to size. The fabric is stretchy and hugged all the right spots. Received complements all night long!

links_reviews_title: I flt like a royal in tthe dresss.
links_reviews_text: The dress was nice except the detail on straps hurt my arms. The zippers on all, the dresses are very hard to use. I normally wear a small but had to ize up to a meduim.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments from fellow party guest about my dress.
links_reviews_text: I had weight loss surgery in July. Being only 4 months out from surgery I was not sure what size I would wear nor what kind of dress would look best now. I was receiving compliments left and right at the party. I did not know anyone there except my husband so these compliments about the dress were genuine! Go glad I tried Rent the Runway and this dress!

links_reviews_title: Fun cozy jacket for wedding and night out
links_reviews_text: Got this last minute as a replacement and I'm so glad I did. We had a cooler night than expected for an outside wedding in Florida "winter". I loved the hidden pockets. It was the perfect pink- mauve color that matches everything. I got tons of compliments, and a lot of people rubbing my arms! It's bulky but looked great with my sleek dress

Rented this to wear to a black tie optional wedding in New Orleans. I wanted something with a touch of flair that wouldn't be too casual. This was perfect! I also wore it out on a 40 degree night, and it was so warm. Got compliments all weekend!

links_reviews_title: Staying warm at an outdoor winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: Super warm, soft & stylish coat. Great color. Was a little boxy (especially since I have wide-ish shoulders) but I wore it off the shoulder for pictures. I also chose the smaller of the 2 sizes I ordered. Lots of compliments!!

I rented this to go over a RTR Dress the Population spaghetti strap dress for a fall wedding in philly! It was definitely super trendy and complimented the dress well. The jacket was a lot bulkier than I expected, even though I saw reviews that warned of bulkiness. I figured how bulky could it be?! It is pretty bulky and it's heavy, but sure as heck kept me warm on the cold windy rooftop- I'm glad I rented it but I would have liked to see how the medium fit. will def rent again!! Gorgeous color!

links_reviews_title: Told I was the "goddess" and "favorite look of the night!"
links_reviews_text: Wow!! So impressed with this gorgeous faux fur. Multiple people stopped to compliment me and many people stared. This coat was warm, cozy, and beautiful! The perfect complement to my Gatsby dress for a New Year's Eve party. Love it!! It was slightly too big, so next time I would get a medium.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out in chilly Detroit!
links_reviews_text: I wish I could buy this coat! It kept me warm all night and was perfect for celebrating my birthday bar-hopping Downtown.

links_reviews_title: Great faux fur to wear off the shoulder!
links_reviews_text: VERY warm faux fur with a boxy fit. I wore it off the shoulder with a form fitting gown. Looked great!! Has pockets and clips to close the jacket.
I wore this twice!! Dress jeans to dinner and Easter Brunch! Loved it BUT it does run big !!!
This was the perfect rental! I'd never buy something this bold, but I was so glad to have it on a weekend in DC. Was warm and fit well, matches pretty much anything. Wore during the day & night.

links_reviews_title: Stylist fur with a fun color
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an event and a wedding. Kept me warm and feeling fashionable!
It worked but made me look really wide

Felt fabulous, got so many compliments, and had a stellar rental experience. Loved that it had pockets and hooks to close it up. I am 5'2 and wear dress size 2-4 and the size small had the perfect length at the arms and waist. Fit was great for a coat; the size small was comfortable and had room for another layer if it would've been needed. That being said: this jacket is VERY WARM. I wore it for a winter formal in Chicago (pictured) on a night when the temperature was about 5-10 degrees Fahrenheit and I never felt cold! Can't recommend this coat enough, especially for winter events!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my 21st Birthday in NYC
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat! It was a great statement piece to go with a black jumpsuit. The color was a beautiful dark blush pink (the first pic was taken under fluorescent lighting and the second was taken in Times Square). It was super comfortable and kept me warm the whole night. The only downsides were that the sleeves were longer than I expected and the fit was a little bulky.
This coat was so fun!! My only complaint was the sleeves were a little long and I didn't like that they covered my hands. The dress in the photo is also from rent the runway.

links_reviews_title: This fur coat is very posh looking and is a great staple for a simple dress.
links_reviews_text: I am short, so the sleeves were a little long on me, even a small, but the fit was great and super comfy!
This jacket is PERFECT. kept me super warm during a cold February night and was the perfect accessory for my birthday outfit. And the color is the perfect blush.
My daughter wore it to her Winterball. Fit was as expected. True to size. It was a fun compliment to her sparkly dress. It's definitely a blush color. I recommend it if you like to stand out!

I rented this because I needed a glam coat for a winter gala. I loved the color, and the faux fur looked great and kept me very warm. My only regret was not sizing down to a medium -- I'm usually a 10-12, and the large was huge on me. A smaller coat would probably have been more flattering.

links_reviews_title: I've never gotten so many compliments on a coat
links_reviews_text: Men and women stopped me to tell me how amazing it was. I think I have to buy it.

links_reviews_title: This coat was the perfect addition to my dress for our winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: It has pockets and is actually really warm. What else would you need? ;)
Love this coat! It made my outfit and kept me warm.
Loved this jacket so much and got a ton of compliments. I found it ran a little long in the arms so would have ordered a small, otherwise fit was great!
I wore this for our family photos and also out to a few holiday parties. I got so many compliments. It's VERY warm too. On the model it looks cropped but it fit me like a regular sized jacket.

I loved wearing this faux fur. The pale pink color was a great conversation starter and it was just more fun to wear than your typical brown fur. The coat ran a little large but was perfectly cozy for an outdoor wedding in November.
This is probably my favorite rental from RTR. So warm and adorable! I love feeling chic while wearing this! Photo credit: Tiffany Saccente

links_reviews_title: Love this coat! So cute and warm
links_reviews_text: This coat is so cute!! It's so warm, and it has pockets! It's a HUGE coat, I felt a little like I had linebacker shoulders, but it's so fancy and pretty!

links_reviews_title: This coat put my ensemble over the top!
links_reviews_text: This faux fur coat is everything. The color is soft and muted, the faux fur feels expensive and it's comfortable to boot. A little boxy, so wear it with something form fitting. The sleeves are fully length not 3/4 length as shown in the picture. I wore it over a fitted emerald green dress. I recieved so many compliments. Perfect cover up for a church wedding and a chilly walk to the reception. Rent this coat!

Overall, very cute and I would keep except it's not cold enough yet :( I was hoping it would get colder but the weather in NYC has been back and forth. The small was too big for me. I wish it was more form fitting because it made me look LARGE. Last note, aren't these clothes supposed to be dry cleaned? 3/4 things I got including this faintly smelled like someone's perfume or just kind of muggy.
Great faux fur coat for the after party at my wedding! I want to purchase it for myself to keep. Loved it! The sleeves are long, not like in the model picture, but it was still great.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fall or winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this last minute for my wedding and I‚Äôm so glad I did! It was so cold that day so a coat was necessary. This was super stylish and had pockets! I absolutely love the way it turned out in photographs and I had lots of compliments from my guests. While the S would have worked, I felt better in the XS and not so overpowered. I would highly recommend getting this jacket as a fall or winter bride.
I rented this to go over a dress for an outdoor ceremony. It was perfect! It kept me so warm! I would have been freezing without it. Perfect accessory

links_reviews_title: So warm and so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Felt totally regal!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun jacket and so comfy! Keep in mind it is quite heavy and definitely made for winter.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a medium and my backup size, an XS, fit me. It does run big!

links_reviews_title: Perfect elegant topper for my wedding
links_reviews_text: I am so glad I rented this piece for my wedding, it ended up being a critical part of my outfit since it was raining and chilly. I was super surprised at the warmth of this jacket. Definitely not practical for everyday use, but wowed at my wedding!

links_reviews_title: Celebrating my cousin and her husband's love at their wedding!
links_reviews_text: I felt very Edie Sedgwick meets Marilyn Monroe in this shrug. It had that glam chic vibe going for it and was quite warm for the windy weather in San Francisco in April. Perfect to wear with both my above-the-knee rehearsal dinner dress and floor length bridesmaid dress. I plan on renting it again for another wedding!

links_reviews_title: such a hit and 70s vibe, Also nice and warm!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, actually pretty warm and so fun to wear!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect last minute addition for a snowy wedding weekend!
links_reviews_text: This jacket was perfect for an unexpectedly cold wedding weekend. The sleeves were full length on me in a size small. It's a pretty boxy fit, but ended up being perfect for the weather and was a great statement piece for the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Perfect last minute addition to our frigid engagement photo shoot
links_reviews_text: Cozy jacket with great color. Runs a little large. Overall happy to have had it for our sunny but frigid engagement photo shoot!

links_reviews_title: Loved it but didnt wear it
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a trip. Unfortunaly I was not able to take it with me, wouldnt fit in my suitcase. I got this pic while trying it on. Bummed will try to rent it again.
Super cute for winter wedding

links_reviews_title: Best wedding guest dress I've worn
links_reviews_text: Loved this gorgeous full length printed dress! Perfect for summer wedding. True to size. Photographed well. Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful, non-stop compliments, very flattering, easy to wear, easy to put on and take off
links_reviews_text: Felt beautiful, non-stop compliments, very flattering, easy to wear, easy to put on and take off! Felt like a million bucks! Only con, at 5'4" I was tripping over the dress at times even with the highest heals on. Had to hold the dress up with one hand while walking. Better fit for a taller person.

links_reviews_title: Chose another dress - still like this one.
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress for a wedding. I chose the other dress but still like this one.
Only needs pockets to be the prefect dress. Beautiful and confiable!
Lovely dress, received multiple compliments. I was able to wear a strapless bra, bra but I could have easily gone bra-less. This dress is super comfortable and was perfect for a spring wedding!
This was truly a gorgeous dress. I was a little nervous when I tried it on because of the way it hugged my belly but overall it fit wonderfully.
Fun dress for a hot night of outside dancing. It fit great and I was able to go braless with no issues :)

links_reviews_title: Stand out dress at California formal wedding! Fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: This was a fresh, fun dress for an outdoor California formal wedding. The print was fresh and vibrant! Beautiful flowing skirt with great movement when I waked or wind blew. Flattering neckline and modest back made me feel very confident in this dress. I wore 2" heels and petite size 6 fit perfectly, grazing the floor. Metallic shoes would have been a better choice but I didn't have any! Lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a summer formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: 5'5 1/2, 150lbs, 36D and I have a healthy butt. This dress fit great & was easy to dance in & easy to use the bathroom. It's fitted but not tight. Super comfy.

Honestly I'm not sure what my size is right now but larger than usual especially in bust size and this dress fit well. I was able to go without a (36DD+) bra and the lining covered any sign of that. I can't emphasize enough the comfort of this dress. And it just feels so lovely on. At 5'5" I wore 2" heals (and dress hem slightly brushed floor) as long as I could but switched to flat sandals because I have a broken toe. As you can see, and it's not a perfect solution, but I tucked one side slightly up under hip band of undergarment to keep dress hem off of floor while attempting :0) to dance. It was a hot and humid August evening and not many dresses or fabrics would have been cooler even though it's silk. The lining was made of a perfect fabric. This dress was just lovely. I thought it was conservative, feminine and pretty. My husband thought it was sexy and beautiful (evidenced by all the embarrassing dance pics ;). If you're curvy don't hesitate. One note: it arrived with the rolled hem slightly unraveling in one corner of slit with a 1" thread loose. Otherwise this dress was perfection. I sent a note back with dress requesting they repair for next lucky user.
Great for a summer wedding, comfortable for dancing and lots of compliments

I rented this for a barn wedding I attended in late summer. I received so many compliments! I usually wear a 2 and got that here; it fits well but was a little snug and could have probably gone up a size and been fine. The neck felt a little tight as the night wore on.

links_reviews_title: This was a backup I didn't wear but I liked the dress
links_reviews_text: I didn't need this dress but I liked it. I liked it better in person than I thought I would. It's fitted so I would say true to size. I love the top of it and the length is great I'm 5'9" and wouldn't need a long. It would be a great vacation dress or beach wedding dress. I didn't like it for the kind of outdoor wedding I was going to but that might be me. There is truly more to this dress(not as plain as I thought) in person than I was picturing and it worth the rental!
It was a little long in flats for an outdoor wedding for me at 5"6. I loved it and bought a lei to match it!
I loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it for my post-wedding brunch. It's very figure flattering and comfortable and fits true to size, no issues!

Loved, loved, loved!! Got sooo many compliments. Best part was the dress is just fitted enough (and waistline is positioned just right) to be able to tuck some fabric under to make this dress work for petites. Still needed a massively high heel & got some inserts off Instagram so I could wear them all night. But perfect dress all around!! Gorgeous cut, fit, color. Loved floral for a summer wedding. Will defo rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful rental, loved every moment of it
links_reviews_text: True to size fit, beautiful print, light fabric for a summer wedding, but thick enough not to be see-through. Lots of compliments and felt very womanly!

links_reviews_title: Colorful, fun, fit like a glove but comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - bright, colorful and fit perfectly. Length was perfect with 3" heels. Highlighted my shoulders and arms, and slit made it easy to dance in all night. Believe it runs slightly small as I usually rent 0 but wore a 2 for this one. Very easy to wear and would be perfect for a summer wedding or formal event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful neckline and the cut of the dress accentuates waist.
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Beautiful and flattering neckline, nicely tailored waist. Fully lined, very well made. I wore this to a wedding and received so many compliments. I wear a size 12 , and this fit me perfectly. I am heavy in the hip and thigh, and this dress camouflaged exactly where I needed. I would definitely wear it again.
Perfect fit, beautiful colors, very flattering and I got compliments all night. Wish I could buy it! Very comfortable on top of it all!
Very good for Spring and Summer wedding.

Absolutely beautiful print. Received so many compliments on the dress. If you're on the talk side, the regular length could be a bit short. I would have loved another 2" in length. Highly recommend renting.
This was a beautiful dress and very light which was perfect for a summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup but as soon as I tried it I knew it was the 1st choice!
links_reviews_text: Surprised by how much I loved the cut, color, and unique neckline of this dress. My only complaint is that it was really long. I'm 5'7" and even in 3" heels the size 8R dragged on the ground. I got tons of compliments on this dress while wearing it at a formal wedding- even from strangers!
I had to order a 10 so it would be long enough but it was still too short and baggy

links_reviews_title: Love love! Beautiful dress and made me feel great!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, was able to wear strapless bra with no problems.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous! The fabric is light and soft and the colors are stunning
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, easy to wear, I didn't wear a bra (34DDD). Length was perfect with 3 inch heels (I'm 5'6"). Got tons of compliments all night. Felt wonderful and comfortable.

This dress is AMAZING. It fit like a glove in all the right places, was comfortable up top, and the perfect length for 3 in heels (I'm 5'8"). I'm usually a solid size 4, but the 6R fit. I wore this to a wedding in Charleston and definitely stood out in a crowd of solid colors. I noticed people kept glancing at me as I walked by! The white and bright florals make your tan pop, too. Would definitely rent this dress again!

I really liked this dress and got a lot of compliments: the print was so bright and cheerful! I was worried that the skirt would be too much in person, but the layers added flow and interest without being too aggressively ruffly, and it was great for dancing. The 2 was a little snug on me through the hips (I wear size 28 jeans), but the 4 was too big in the bust (I wear 32C) so fortunately the 2 didn't end up being TOO tight--just very fitted. I have a shorter waist and there was some extra length in the back, making the zipper bunch up a bit, but it wasn't enough to bother me. I'm 5'4 and the length was fine in 2.5' heels.

Loved this dress! As someone who is 5'1" I was concerned about the length but it ended up working out perfectly with a pair of medium height heels! This dress may not fit best for someone with a long torso but that's my only complaint.

Rented for my Hawaiian themed bridal shower and I fell in love with this dress! I'm 5'10" and it was long enough!! I'm a 36a and it fit great up top- arm pits were not baggy and bust wasn't big! Loved the slit- not too high. I'm long and lean so the asymmetrical ruffles looked lovely. Very flowy material. If it wasn't so expensive, I would have bought it!

links_reviews_title: I loved that this dress was comfortable and made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I loved how this dress flowed as I walked. Extremely easy to move in and the material was very comfortable. A dress worth owning.

This dress was beautiful for an outdoor wedding. I was concerned it would be too long but the length was perfect on me even though I'm just under 5'5". You may need some help getting zipped up but it was elegant and low maintenance other than that. The slit made it easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Not my usual neck line but loved how this dress flowed! Very elegant + colorful!

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding in east hamptons - needed formal but fun. This dress was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable dress. Fun to wear. Didn't need a bra. Fun to dance in - the tiers are so feminine and swirly when you dance. Lots of compliments and even a request to borrow the dress in the future. Thank you rent the runway!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and fit for engagement shoot
links_reviews_text: This was my back-up dress, that I was originally very upset over, but ended up LOVING! My photo shoot was canceled for rain. I didn't end up wearing it for anything. The fit however was perfect, halter neckline was very flattering and the skirt ruffles and print were so fun. My fianc√© loved it on me, unlike the usual shapes I wear, loved it. I would rent again for an event that actually happens!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an end of summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I loved wearing it and dancing around in it all night. I decided to forego a bra and still felt comfortable and supported. Tons of compliments! There were a few snags in the dress, but I'm sure I'm the only person who noticed. The top clasp was slightly damaged and I was unable to hook it, but that also went unnoticed. I would 100% wear this dress again!
I wore this dress to a wedding in Spain and it was perfect for the occasion. The dress is beautiful, elegant. Good for a tall, thin body type.

links_reviews_title: My only niece's summer wedding. I was getting compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: The PERFECT dress for my niece's wedding. I normally wear an 8 so I ordered the 10 as a backup and glad I did since 2 days before delivery I got an email saying there was a problem with the 8 and it wouldn't ship as planned. Luckily the 10 fit, but was roomy on top, so I pinned it from the inside to make it fit better and stay put. It was a dream dress and exactly what I envisioned as a special dress for this occasion -- I wanted something memorable and this was it. The ruffles and slit made it easy and fun for dancing, and the material was light, which gave the cut of the dress great movement. I felt fabulous. Love, love, loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for an end of summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved everything about this dress! The gorgeous style, bright colors and comfy fit. I received several compliments throughout the evening. This was fun to wear and photographed great.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! I love the color and fit.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5 160lbs. 34D bra size. I could have fit the 10 but like to have a little room. I didn't mind that the top of the dress was a little loose.

The dress arrived the day before the gala I was to attend and it zipped up like a glove! The material feels like a neoprene but looks super expensive! It looked so flattering and fit me beautifully! I will say the only thing I hadn't taken into consideration was going to the bathroom...beware you may need to shimmy it up or have someone unzip you. Other than that I felt like Cinderella!
Wore this for a wedding and the color was a hit.

This dress is a show stopper. I wouldn't have rented it without trying it on first but I was at the Georgetown store with my daughter and the color pulled me in. I was ready for something other than a black dress. I did find myself tugging at my dress a bit because I wasn't sure I had enough to hold the top up. But it was really fine.

This is a really fun and beautiful dress. Very stretchy, very comfortable, and can even wear long underwear underneath for extra warmth (this is the most midwestern thing I've ever written). I'm 5'9 and would rent the long in the future; a little short for heels. I have an ample chest and never wear strapless as a result but the stretch plus ruffles on top meant no bubbling or spillage. Compliments all night!

I am 5'2 and was worried it would be too long. 3 inch heels did the trick and was the perfect length!! Got sooo many compliments throughout the night about the color and dress in general. It does not hide any imperfections so make sure to wear Spanx or some sort of undergarment. Only drawback I can think of, was the need to continue pulling it up through out the evening. Overall, an amazing evening in an amazing dress! My favorite rental so far from RTR!

links_reviews_title: So many complements on the color!
links_reviews_text: Grabbed this dress last minute after my initial order didn't work out. This dress worked out PERFECTLY and I just loved it! Complemented all night long on the color and the fit. Fabric is very stretchy and form fitting. True to size, length was good with a 3 inch wedge. Definitely not the easiest dress to bust a move in, but still able to dance comfortably. Super happy with this one.

Started off with 4 dresses that did fit and had this one rushed as a backup with fingers crossed it would arrive in time and would fit. Absolutely loved it for the formal wedding I was going to. The color and fit were such a nice blend of elegant but sexy! Form fitting but easy to move and dance the night away in.

links_reviews_title: Compliments all night long for standing out in a sea of black.
links_reviews_text: Jaime Diehl Style~ Compliments all night long for standing out in a sea of black. I absolutely loved this dress; the fit, the color, the sheen, everything. I am 5'4 118 lbs, sometimes a few more. 32 DD bra. The gown touched the floor in 2-3 inch heels. I could've worn the 0 or 2, I chose the 0 and wore with Spanx to smooth everything out. The color is best described as a cross between a peacock and almost bright azure/cerulean.

This dress fits like a glove, and the color is a knockout. Unlike the photos on RtR, it is more of a bright, peacock blue that really pops. The dress is a nice, thicker material that holds you in nicely, but it does show lines, so undergarments are tough. I am 5'7" and got the regular but wish I would've gone with the long so I could've worn taller heels; I wore 1/2" heels and the dress was still about an inch off the ground.

links_reviews_title: Stood out in a sea of black
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, lining offers some support but plenty of give to enjoy your dinner. felt a little bit mermaid like & I count that as a positive

This was my backup dress and I absolutely loved it. I received a lot of great compliments. I am 5'9" so I ordered a LONG, but it was pretty long. I had to wear 3 inch heels. The dress is tight in the midriff area, thank god for Spanx!!!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments and fit great!
links_reviews_text: Was a bit big in the bust, and had to be careful about undergarment lines showing

I had to make a last minute change so I ended up with this dress. If I had originally ordered I would‚Äôve gotten an regular but the store had a long. I made it work and received several compliments on the dress.
Gorgeous dress that stands out in the crowd! Flattering fit and beautiful color. 2R fit 34D very well. I used hem tape to shorten. You'll love this one!

links_reviews_title: I chose this color because it was one of the colors of the organization I was MCing for.
links_reviews_text: I was the MC for a gala event. I got this dress THE DAY OF! It fit like a glove without feeling restrictive at all. It never fell down and hugged all the right places.I got so many compliments. Definitely so worth it!

links_reviews_title: Loved my dress, couldn't be happier with RTR!
links_reviews_text: Awesome fit and made me look and feel fantastic!
Great color and neckline; seemed more flattering in person

links_reviews_title: I loved & felt great in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The 4 was a little roomy even around my bust (30F). I had to pull it up a few times throughout the night, making me wonder what the fit of the 2 would have been. But overall, a very comfortable and gorgeous dress.
The dress fit perfectly! - the color is stunning and overall has a decent amount of give. The material is also very thick and huge in all the right places!

I'm 5'10", 140lbs, and 34C chest. The dress is so stunning and fun! The only down side is that the long wasn't that long. I wish it was 1.5inches longer because I wore high heels. But it worked, and I was complimented all night. Comfortable fit, and it stays up/in place which is hard to find in a strapless dress. The color pops, and the material is so different. Love it!!!

Love the fit, if you have a large chest this dress is great for u! It grips on to you and holds u in beautifully ! Only thing I will say is it isn't very flattering in the stomach! It has the lines that make your stomach look more round ! I normally order size 12 in dresses on here but 6 was the right choice for me!
This dress was beautiful! The color, the fit, length... it was all just exactly what I expected. Most important I was so comfortable in it for a long night. High recommend!
Love this gown! It fit like a glove, and was super comfortable! It was a little hot when I sat for dinner, but totally worth it!
Rented this for a black tie gala. The color is stunning and non traditional. I'm 5'11 and it was perfect with a 1 inch kitten heel, but I preferred flats. I got compliments on it all night.

links_reviews_title: Best formal dress I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: This dress was the best formal dress ever. Gorgeous color and fitted mermaid style. I wore spanx but it still pooched a tiny bit in the belly, but it was still amazing. I could have sized down 1 size and been ok. It was long. I'm 5'8 and the long was still dragging a bit with my heels.

I actually didn't love this dress when I first tried it on, but didn't have time to find another. Once I added a strapless brat and dressed it up with earrings and shoes, I was in love! It was a hit all night long. Strangers kept approaching me to comment on it. It does run a little big and I needed to wear a bra to make the top tight enough to fit right.

links_reviews_title: Back up back up dress was a win win !
links_reviews_text: So my original style was very extra small and the M was unavailable but RTR customer saved the day! My second choice pictured was amazing! This was for a gala and the theme was under the seas so it was a showstopper. Whatever size you wear go down one size I'm 5'10" and a 4. It could've been a little snugger around the chest but it felt great and I received a ton of compliments. Easy return of all dresses for the week. Thanks RTR for another great save on a great event night !

Absolutely loved this dress!! Got lots of compliments on it! It fits true to size. Has a great liner and does stretch. Was very comfortable to wear! I was able to wear a pair of gold strappy heels I already had and I'm 5'4". The color is very pretty and you can wear a strapless bra. üôå
fit like a dream and you don't need a bra!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a knockout! The color was so vibrant and really elegant. The dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 14L and a 16L. I usually wear a 14L and had tried it on first and loved the way that it fit. It was just a tad short for my 6 foot frame. I tried on the 16L and it was long enough for me to wear 2‚Äù heels. The fabric was very beautiful and had a little give. It also had enough stretch to keep it up. I never worried that my dress would slide down. I decided to wear strapless bra with a low back just in case!! I would rent this dress again, but it would have to be out of town. So many people had such wonderful compliments. I have nothing negative to say about the dress, period!

links_reviews_title: Unique gown for a gala or special event!

links_reviews_text: This dress was actually my backup for a Mardi Gras ball and my first choice dress fit, so I didn't wear it to the event. However, I would LOVE the opportunity to rent this dress again - I thought the fit was beautiful and the ruffles at the neckline were so cute! The fit was very true to size, I feel. Loved the structure and the style of the fit through the waist into the train. Hope to rent this again someday for another event!

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for a wedding!!!
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie event
links_reviews_text: Loved the way this dress looked and felt, but wish it was a little smaller. The top and waist were a little large and there was a little bit of bunching in the back, but overall I loved the look. I got so many compliments on the color and the style and really enjoyed wearing the dress.

This style by Black Halo runs true to size so I would recommend getting your usual size as your primary and going one size up for the backup size. The dress is fitted throughout the midsection and curvier women should consider sizing up if they have fuller hips. It works best for A-C cups as it is more fitted in the bust area and we would recommend wearing a strapless bra. Since this is a floor length style, if you are around my height, I would recommend getting the regular for length. I definitely like the fun color of this dress and would pair this with a floral handbag and pretty pearl jewelry.
Fits true to size, flattering fit, fabric has a bit of stretch and there is a nice lining underneath that keeps the dress looking smooth.
The fabric is gorgeous, but also very soft which made it hard for me to keep this dress up it kept sliding down. It was also just a titch baggy bear the rib cage.

This dress was a dream AND long enough! At 5'10" I wore the 10L w 4 in heels and could have worn 100mm just fine. The color was fabulous...so many compliment but the fabric will pull easily. Mine still had the tags attached but by the end of a 4 hr evening, the hem had come undone and there was slight pilling (already!) just from wearing my coat! I loved the dress but probably wouldn't have loved it less than new...
The material is for a high school prom. The dress style is amazing, but the material made it a major no.

This top is a stunner. I agree with other reviews that is a bit difficult to put on. You have to look at picture. The top is not that cropped. I wore a high waisted skirt and you really couldn't tell that top is cropped.

I love this top! It was very cropped I paired with high waisted jeans. The front part was not as showy on me bc I'm smaller chested but I could see it being an issue for larger busts. I miss this top in my closet, will rent again!!
Runs large, I should've rented the XS. I'm a b cup and had to use a lot of tape. Very pretty and high end quality

This top was a little difficult to figure out, but after looking at the pics online, I got it. I rented a small, which worked, but I would have got better in an XS. It paired great with a black skirt. The edge showed some wear but I would rent again in an XS.
Wore this on a fancy date night and got lots of compliments. Runs a bit large but I still made it work

Once I figured out how to put the top on, it was perfect! Got so many compliments all night. Turned out so cute in pictures too. Back is adorable, a little cropped but I was expecting that based on previous comments. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for a holiday event
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to the John Legend holiday concert. The top fit really well and was very flattering. I considered pairing with a pencil skirt but opted for pants instead to keep it a bit casual. This was a fun piece to try out!
So different, so pretty. So many compliments. Zipper a little rough probably from wear but worked perfect for holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Too small for me but perfect for my bestie!
links_reviews_text: This top was a little too small for me. I had rented it with the intention of wearing it to my best friends birthday party, and she's smaller so it actually worked out perfectly for her to wear it instead! Super cute top with high waisted jeans, and she easily got away with going braless. I'm typically a 4 and she's typically a 0-2 so the small is definitely on the smaller side of small!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a photoshoot, looked awesome! Then again for a speech I gave
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! No need to wear a bra. Feels comfy and secure. Hard to put on though

links_reviews_title: Flirty top for a night out
links_reviews_text: This top is super cute and well made. It was great for going out in Vegas and for a date night in Panama City. It's a little funky to put on but well worth it. Its also cropped, so be sure to pair with something high if you want to cover your tummy. Received lots of compliments every time I wore it.
Super form fitting and comfortable

Cute shirt! Nice thicker material but not too hot. The back is crisscrossing and had a nice ruffle at the bottom, everyone loved the shirt! My issue was that the zipper on the side kept unzipping and there was no hook at the top of the zipper so the shirt just kept getting loose. Much more cropped than it looked in the picture. I'm nearly 5'2" so I wore with high waisted pants but on someone taller it will be really short. Overall I was satisfied but not thrilled. That's the price you pay with not being able to try something on first I guess.

This was definitely a crop top which doesn't show as that in the image provided by RTR. I loved the fabric and the fact that I didn't need to wear a bra but if you plan to wear this and don't want your midsection showing you will need a high wasted skirt/pants. The slight hole in the top didn't show on me at all unless a gust of wind lifted the ruffle. Super comfortable!
Great fit, dramatic red color, easily fancy or casual with jeans. Great rental!

This top was a hit at a wedding rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments on this top. Even the next day at the wedding, people were still approaching me to compliment that top. It's true to size. It is cropped, so if you want to show midriff, you can wear regular or low cut bottoms. I didn't want to show much, so I wore a high waisted skirt. It has cute cut - out detailing below the ruffle, but it doesn't really show. Good for small breasted women. I didn't have to wear a bra with this.

links_reviews_title: Rented for intimate birthday dinner with friends
links_reviews_text: Rented this top with my PRO $30 coupon...so it was free. Really cool shape but really confusing construction. Hit at a weird place on my short torso but wasn't tight around my bust. You insert one of the ruffles through the bust of the top which ends up creating a lop-sided silhouette. I wore this to a birthday dinner where I was sitting the whole time so no one really noticed what a weird shirt this was.

links_reviews_title: Huge on busy cuts small on waist
links_reviews_text: Very fun

I absolutely loved this Kendall and Kylie top! Super fashionable and can honestly be worn anywhere. It's a little tricky figuring out how to get it on at first but once you're past that it's even more amazing! I'm a 34DD and was able to go bra-less with this with no problem. If you're on the fence about this one, just get it! You won't regret it.
Thicker fabric do not great if you're going to be in humidity, but it's perfect for a cool summer night or fall in the south/socal.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but runs small. Doesn't work well with a large chest.
links_reviews_text: This top runs extremely small if you have a large chest. The placement of the zipper made it uncomfortable so I didn't get a picture in this top.
It's a nightmare to get on, but cute once you figure it out. Picture a bit misleading- top very cropped, showed my belly, which wasn't what I wanted for this event.

links_reviews_title: It was so short and looked really awkward
links_reviews_text: All cons. This was not my favorite rental. Even with my highest waisted pants it looked weird

links_reviews_title: Very unusual shirt but super chic and cute!
links_reviews_text: This shirt is tricky to put on; I had to lay it out on my bed and really think about it, which made me laugh. Honestly, I think it could be worn a few ways. It's definitely a crop top which I don't like, but I wore it with very high-waisted Jill Stuart pants. Only a stick-on bra would work with this... I never go bralass, but I did in this (the ruffles cover that part of your chest anyway so it's not a problem for someone with small boobs like me).
I think anyone wear bar @ B+ cup will be very tied on their chest.
I rented an S and M. Neither fy 34C for some reason

I wish I had a photo, but I'll be renting this one again! You have to practice putting it on, and make sure the back straps are crossed. I almost messed up and sent it back before referencing the picture. Once you get it on right, it is gorgeous! It really has to be paired with a high waisted pant. I did an off white palazzo pant. I am a 32D and the small fit perfectly.

great shirt for night out. I have a larger chest and there was room in that area, so might be big on someone with a smaller chest. the ruffles cover up any issues if the top is a bit big though so it still looked good
Was way too big maybe I ordered the wrong size

links_reviews_title: Flashy Red Top with Fun Cut
links_reviews_text: Love this top! The large bow type front detail is slimming on a small frame. Wore it with a pencil skirt, my husband loved it.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing the top. Did not fit
links_reviews_text: Straps were 4 inches too long, shirt much shorter than appears
Straps are hard to figure out. Once you do, it's still hit or miss. Bodice is tight, loose on the top.
Had a challenging time figuring out if it was on the correct way. Much more cropped than it appears in the photo
Suoer baggy. Way too big
The fit was great, it was a little too short for me to be comfortable in a crop top, but I have a long torso. The color and style are phenomenal though.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this.... it was huge for an XS
links_reviews_text: Not flattering at all. It was swimming on me! Couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Very cute top. It runs small. One you get it on it is very short.
links_reviews_text: Pretty color and very different.

links_reviews_title: not what the model is wearing
links_reviews_text: loved this on the model and wanted to wear it with high waisted wide leg pants. the top is more cropped than it is on the model and did not look right.
fits perfect, no bra, very bight.
I could zip on my body but not my chest. not designed for larger bust. It is a beautiful top, great quality but not for fuller bust.
Fun sheer neckline detail, heavy material. Wanted to love it, but returned without wearing, due to the weird fabric bunching just below the zipper/above my butt.
Loved everything about this dress. I would rent again for sure! Fits perfect. Sexy mesh areas but still fine for work! Very comfy and great fabric

links_reviews_title: Great dress for the work holiday party
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Super classy but a hint of sexiness. Great for work!!

links_reviews_title: Runs a little snug but pretty cute otherwise
links_reviews_text: The sleeves and bodice are a little snug but the sleeve length was great for me as someone who is 5'10". You'll either need to go without a bra or maybe a strapless or sticky bra won't show. The material is thick and heavy, not a breathable material. So that helps suck you in but I'm sure it could get too hot quickly.

This dress was STUNNING! I felt fabulous and the dress was perfect for a Vegas Award Ceremony! The fabric has a nice weight to it and the material looks expensive. I wish the sleeves would have been a bit tighter and the back tended to bulk up where I felt like I had to keep pulling it down but aside these the dress still looked great and I felt like a million bucks! I would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Perfect simple cocktail dress for a winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was the perfect combination of simple and stylish for a winter wedding. It was super comfortable (especially for dancing) and I loved the bell sleeves and detailed neckline. I'd rent it again!
did not wear a bra with this dress and it worked out just fine.

links_reviews_title: Great LBD - didn't want to return!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress. Wore it to my company's holiday party and received compliments all night. Fit perfectly with a little wiggle room and was super comfortable. So sad to return, but will definitely rent again in the future. You won't regret renting this dress. :)

This was a nice dress for a holiday party. Although I am true small i found I had to pull it down quite often. It fit just right but kept riding up. I chose to wear tights with it because of this reason. Overall I would wear again.

I'm between sizes M and L. Only wore the L because the M had a rip in the seam. Very nice quality dress. I'm 5'3 and it hit me right at knee length. The bell sleeves add a nice flair to the dress, but beyond the nice neckline, it's just another LBD. Got more compliments on my hair and makeup than I did the dress :/ It's definitely a nice change from the same go-to LBD, but nothing beyond that.
This dress was awesome! It was form fitting but still had room to move in. It gave a very sultry but elegant vibe. Definitely one to be remembered.

I was attending a wedding that I knew was going to be pretty cold, and the material of this dress helped so much. Fits pretty true to size, and can show a bit more in the mid-area than you want. I was planning on wearing spanx, figuring the mesh panels would just see the nude color, but the panels hit in a weird spot and you could see both the spanx and my bra. Ditched the spanx, and was pretty happy with that decision. Would definitely recommend this dress and would wear it again.

I wore this dress for NYE and loved it so much! It's equal parts cute, sexy, and trendy. I especially loved the sleeves and sheer upper chest area. The fit was great and the fabric has a little stretch so I was comfortable wearing it all night. Great rental choice!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a cold night in Minneapolis. Classy but warm with nice, stretchy fabric.
links_reviews_text: Size this one up. I'm a little pudgy in the middle but the large fit fine. My only issue was that it was ripped in two places on the left side seam. Luckily the hotel had a sewing kit so I stitched it up myself but, I think QC can be a little better before the dress gets sent out. It's a super comfortable dress and, while it covers you in cold weather, it is still classy and beautiful!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel classy and sexy all at the same time!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit me so well, my friends swore it was made for me. The length was perfect, and it flattered my body type. It was very comfortable as well. I‚Äôm normally a size 4/6, and the size small was perfect. I wish this dress was in my closet to wear everyday!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a New Years Eve party
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a New Years Eve party. Because I live in NYC and it was 8 degrees out that night, I wore it with black tights. It's a good dress for coverage if you're trying to stay warm. Also, the fit was great. It was slightly loose around the stomach area, which makes it more flattering once you've had a bit to eat/drink. Also, the material was thick and of a high quality. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Amazing for a New Year party in a chalet on the Italian Alps
links_reviews_text: Great

I rented this dress for my birthday dinner. I loved the fabric of the dress as it is on the thicker side but still has stretch. I also loved the bell sleeve and sheer details on the neckline and sides! The length was perfect for me being 5'8" , it wasn't too short. IÔ∏è usually wear a small or size 4 from RTR but this dress felt as if it ran on the smaller side. The small also had a tear in the seam on the hip so I had to wear the medium. The medium fit better in the hips on me but the upper arms and waist were loose. If the small didn't have the defect I would have worn that one, but it still looked great anyway. Definitely a great dress for the fall/ winter season
Nice material just didn't care for the overall fit. Love the quality and cute sheer cut outs. The material is tight and does show underlines if you look closely but not too noticeable.

links_reviews_title: great dress, thick material and a bit of stretch.
links_reviews_text: love the bell sleeves. wore it to a charity gala.

I loved this dress! I am glad that I got the M and L because the medium was very snug. The large was very comfortable. It had a good length making it more appropriate for my charity event than some other dresses. The bell sleeves added a nice detail. This dress looks great without any jewelry besides some earrings because of the interesting detail.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. So elegant yet very professional. I wore it to office annual party.
links_reviews_text: Go 1 size bigger. I always fit in all Medium size dresses, sometimes even Small size dresses. This one was Large and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit great, was comfortable and I got lots of compliments! 5'9 and the small fit great.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my birthday dinner with friends. Can dress it up or down. Very sleek.

links_reviews_title: LBD That Turned Heads on NYE!
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments - a little black dress taken up a notch! The cutouts were such a cute detail, but those sleeves... #swoon! The dress fit like a glove. The fabric is stretchy and thick. I didn't need Spanx or bra. The material held me in perfectly. Would totally rent again.
Cute dress but it was much too small for me so I didn't end up wearing it. The small fit snugly over my hips but I didn't even attempt to zip up the back.

This was my first experience with rtr. I wore this to a holiday party and received many compliments. The fit was true to size. I felt beautiful in this dress and will definitely use rtr again. # holiday glam

links_reviews_title: Cute black dress! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress! Love the lace details. Nice thick material. Kept me warm on a chilly night. Wore it to a work holiday party and received compliments all night!

I'm a huge fan of Parker and love all of the styles but this one is definitely one of my favorites with a beautiful lace neckline and long bell sleeves! This was my little black dress and I almost didn't want to take it off. I usually wear a size 4 and wore this in a Small. Running true to size with some stretch to the fabric we recommend sizing up for backup. The waist is fitted and meant to hug your body. It is fitted at bust and would work better for smaller cup sizes. I suggest wearing a NuBra or no bra because of the lace neckline. At 5'6, it hit me mid thigh and I loved the length. Pair it with minimal jewelry, maybe stud earrings and strappy heels.
The fit was tight but stretchy. I still felt good in it and loved the shear detail. This was sent to replace annoy so cute jumper. I got it by noon just as promised. So happy to have another option.
Super short but boyfriend loved it for our date night!

links_reviews_title: Runs small. Not for woman with hips
links_reviews_text: Didn't get to wear. Too tight in the hips and sleeves are a bit long
Wore this for NYE dinner, would be a great dress to wear to a wedding as well. Fit was perfect and the material laid very nice. Great winter dress for going out! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Just ok. Not a "wow" dress, but not a bad pick either.
links_reviews_text: Rented a small and medium for a work holiday party, ended up wearing the medium (small was a little too snug, especially in the arms). It was comfortable for the 3-4 hours I wore it, but the bell sleeves kept getting dipped into my food as I ate. I was able to stay warm but not too hot (winter in PA), and it had just enough sexiness (mesh cutouts, shorter length) to not be dull or frumpy - but still worked good for an nicer work party. It was overall an ok pick, nothing really made this a "wow" dress for me, but wasn't a bad pick either - it served its purpose, and I wouldn't rent again.
A little small through the busy

Lots of compliments. I love the thicker fabric on this dress, it lays well. I'm a 4/6 and the small was tight, but that's the style. The medium was too baggy. First rtr, and I'll definitely rent again.
Returned without wearing. Too tight in the busy/back to be comfortable. Cute otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but unfortunately missed the mark
links_reviews_text: Dress is a beautiful fabric and the mesh panel on the chest is pretty . The sleeves were my favorite part of the dress . Unfortunately I wont be wearing it due to the over all fit . I'm a lot larger on the bottom than waist up and bust so while the dress was snug on my hips it was loose in my waist and puckered in my bust. Think this dress may be better fit for someone with a straight body. Really wish this dress would have worked .
Fit on bottom but not on top. Too small and I am not a very big woman

links_reviews_title: This was for a work dinner event.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear the dress, it was too small.
Sleeve can get in the way but received lots of compliments!
5 months pregnant bump :)

Wore this to my wedding welcome party in San Miguel de Allende, Mexico and it was a total hit! Lots of compliments, and super comfortable all night. Sexy and on trend; really can't go wrong with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for the Coastal Country Jan in Huntington Beach, Ca-April, 2019-
links_reviews_text: Was a very flattering, comfortable & fun dress-My friends complimented me on how cute it was!

While it was a struggle having the correct size delivered, this dress was perfect for my friend's rehearsal dinner/party! I ordered the S and M, but Small was oddly too tight in the arms and chest. Sizing definitely runs small. Still, dress was the perfect choice and I felt amazing in it!

links_reviews_title: Very comfy. It‚Äôs knit so tons of give.
links_reviews_text: Definitely has stretch. Got tons of compliments. It was super comfortable.
Snug, stretchy, but comfortable.

Such a cute dress but showed every bit of your body. I wore Spanx but it still showed my pudge. Loved the dress though. Very funny and flirty. Keep in mind, the top stitching does not stretch, so it can get a little tight around your arms.

links_reviews_title: Lovely Dress, but Not My Favorite
links_reviews_text: I didn't love this dress like I thought I would, though it's lovely in person. It runs small (I'm a 6/8 and usually a medium) and so it wasn't as comfortable as I'd hoped. The shoulders were tight as well. The pattern made me look a bit wide, so I'm not sure it was the most flattering dress. My husband loved it, though, and it was perfect for a date night.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It‚Äôs a beautiful dress! Very form fitting, though. I almost wish I had worn Spanx underneath!
Loved wearing this on my 6 month bump! It was super stretchy which made it perfect for pregnancy, but I imagine it would be very flattering without the bump too!

links_reviews_title: Perfect very stretchy material for maternity dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect very stretchy material for maternity dress.

The dress is fun and playful and can be worn in many settings. I wore this to an evening industry work event. It has stretch so it can fit many body types. It was comfy for me all night and I don't usually like strapless type clothing.

links_reviews_title: Felt really fun and festive. Flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: Very fun and festive. I wore it in a casual manner but could be dressed up too. Very flattering on the body. I think it would look better with some shape from a strapless bra if you have a small chest like me though.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Las Vegas work party
links_reviews_text: The pattern on this is to die for! I loved the fit and feel of this well-made dress. It's flattering and easy to wear. Solid rental for a fun night.

links_reviews_title: A one-of-a-kind dress with flamenco flair.
links_reviews_text: I received tons of compliments on this truly unique dress I wore to a mountain wedding. The dress hugs all your curves and runs a bit small. The arm holes are rather tight, and I had to wear my back-up size (M) despite having pretty skinny arms. There were no issues with the straplessness and I wasn't pulling at the dress all night. This dress made me feel festive and feisty!

links_reviews_title: Wore this elegant dress for a fancier christening.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. The fabric is very stretchy and comfortable, a big pro if you're eating a lot during the day. It is tight, but it fits nicely to the body. Only con is the sleeves are extremely uncomfortable and that kind of ruined the dress for me.

links_reviews_title: The fit on this dress is amazing. It hugs your curves!!e
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress in Las Vegas for a dinner and show and I got stopped by strangers to compliment me. I will definitely rent this dress again.
I'm between sizes and should've gone with my larger size
This dress is very stretchy and fits well, has numerous details that I wanted to capture in the picture. Looked great on my curves, loved the beading and beautiful detailed highly recommend to rent

There was a side zipper that I didn't even notice. The dress is fitted but not uncomfortable. You do have to be on the slim feeling side, as in don't eat a whole lot before you're going to wear it, especially if you're not going to wear the supporting undergarments. I personally do not like to wear uncomfortable undergarments so I just made sure I was not feeling pudgy when I was going to be wearing this dress. I wore a strapless bra. Fun rental.
Form fitting and stiff material but wonderful cut that is quite flattering
This dress runs a little small, but I still loved it! It's perfect for vacation. I liked this dress so much, I kept it longer than most of my other rentals.
The fabric of this dress is thick and great for a no bra night! The details are amazing and I got so many compliments. A great option for a fancier date, or cocktail party!

This dress caught my eye because of the detail in the photos on RTR and the off the shoulder. When receiving the dress I was surprised to see the detail and the body of the dress is all embroidered. The only flaw of this dress was the arm holes- they're really small and tight pulling under the arms once the dress is on. The body of the dress is stretchy and roomy.

I wore this out to dinner on a vacation in Mexico. The embroidery reminded me of some of the designs we saw on tiles and pottery there. The stretchy fabric was slimming, but forgiving. Only complaints were that I couldn't lift my arms up and the top kept rolling over a little.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves are a little tight but very flattering
links_reviews_text: Sleeves are a little tight but very flattering

links_reviews_title: It was worn to a Bridal Shower
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and is made from quality material.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress but way too big
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but it was huge on me. I'll rent it again in a smaller size.
Love the fit, easy and has great stretch.
Fits well right in the arms
This dress is cute and super stretchy but wasn't the look I was going for on my vacation. Will rent again for another location or occasion

links_reviews_title: It was a star-studded affair - this dress would have been amazing - it it fit!
links_reviews_text: The shoulders and sleeve were narrow. Even though the dress was stretchy, it would not go past my shoulders. Loved it though! This size would most likely fit a woman either a size 8 or 10.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but odd fit on arms.
links_reviews_text: The bodice is stretch, but if your back or arms are larger, this might be an odd fit. I have a smaller middle, but my back, breast, and arms are wider. So this fit was not good on me. I felt restricted around the top.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric, flattering cut, fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, but I'm 5'8 and the dress was much shorter on me than on the model photo.

links_reviews_title: Slimming, curvy, and an off-shoulder look that stayed put!
links_reviews_text: I HIGHLY recommend this dress. I fully agree with other reviewers that it runs very small. The XSR fit me beautifully and I normally wear a 00P. There was very strong no-slip grip lining around the top off the dress. The fabric was extremely stretchy so I didn't feel like I couldn't raise my arms without having to readjust the entire dress (my biggest pet peeve with off-shoulder dresses). The dress was very slimming and really emphasized my curves. Even at 5'1", the length felt perfect with strappy heels. I'm glad I didn't take any pictures in the dress because I 100% plan to rent it again.
Not right for my body

links_reviews_title: Not the most flattering for me
links_reviews_text: Super cute - rented for a bridal luncheon but the elastic and ruffles at the bottom did not do me any favors
Comfy and flattering

links_reviews_title: Great but lots of delicate beads sewed in and some were missing
links_reviews_text: N/a
It's definitely shorter than the picture led on, but I was fine with it. The dress fits perfectly, it doesn't feel too tight and highlights your curves.
Super easy to dance in and fit my body like a glove!

I got this dress as one of the replacement and it ended up working out great! It fit my chest snugly (34C) If you have a larger chest this will not fit you. It is curve hugging in a good way since it has thicker fabric. It was easy to dance in and the length was good (5'4" with 3" heels). The back cut outs don't allow for shape wear. Major con: I have broad shoulders and the zipper in the back came undone twice when I was reaching for something! Good thing I had a friend to help fix it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a wedding. The dress fit great. It was easy to move and dance in.
links_reviews_text: I wore the size 2 and it fit great. I don't have a large bust but didn't need a bra. I had 3 inch heals and the length was perfect. The overall experience was great and very easy and I would use Rent the Runway again!
It was very comfortable. I did wear a petite but it was still a little long with 3 inch heels, I'm 5'2. However, with the slit the length wasn't a big deal. Perfect for a formal wedding
Dress fit great perfect fit the event

This dress was SO flattering! I got so many compliments, all night. It tucks in your curves in all the right places. The back is amazing, I just wish I had a good picture of it. Definitely runs true to size - the zero fit me perfectly, although was a little long (as you can see from the pic - I am 5'3 and wearing 3" heels). I didn't mind the length, since the slit in front meant I wasn't tripping over the hem, and honestly it looked like a mini train on the dress. But if you want something that hits ankle or floor length and doesn't drag, just check the length compared to your height. But my goodness I LOVED this dress and would love to wear it again!
Fit was perfect, and tight enough up top to wear sans bra (I'm a 34C/D). Wore with a red lip and felt glamorous!

I loved it!! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3 and about 115 pounds and the 2R fit great. It was a little long but I expected that and used temporary hemming tape which worked really well. It was great quality and I got lots of compliments. Thanks RTR!
