This dress was one of the best ones that I have ever worn. It is stunning and fights in all the right places. I loved the back because it was so different. I rented the 4L and it was WAY too long for me, but I was able to hem it with some tape luckily. Besides that, it was amazing. The slit also adds a nice touch. Really can't complain!

This dress was nice and simple but with just enough detail between the neckline and back cutout. There is a good amount of stretch to this dress, I sized up as everyone else suggested but would say it was between running small and true to size -Usually an 8 and wore the 10 for comfort -34D and think the 8 would have been more supportive but wanted tummy room for food and drinks -I wish I had planned on having nipple covers bc you can't wear a bra and I wore it in February -you will have to have someone else help you zip the back so plan accordingly if you live alone -5'6" and the regular length for 8&10 was about an inch off the ground with 3" heels, I think the long might have looked better/skimmed the ground Overall a great dress, would rent again

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in the dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely phenomenal - the fabric was thick and it has been well made. It fit me like a glove. I ordered the regular length and it was fine with 3inch heels. The only thing I would advise is that this dress is very tight in the bust. I wore a 2R and typically am a 34 c-d and it was a very snug fit - otherwise I loved every single thing about this dress.
The beautiful dress runs small for someone with curves. Heavy material was added benefit for a winter affair.
Fabric is thick and sturdy and hangs perfectly. I am 5' 7" and wore 3 inch heels and the dress hit just above the ground. Strapless bra worked ok. Was able to dance it in all night with no problems.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! 3rd one I tried for this event!!
links_reviews_text: I usually am a 0-2 on the bottom and a 4-6 on top. This was the 3rd dress I ordered since the others from RTR didn't fit great. It fit like a glove. I wanted something fitted and classy. It really was great! Zipping was a tad tight, but only because of my chest. Would rent again
Great fit. A little bit long but I wore 4" heels. I got tons of compliments and was very comfortable in the dress.
Very pretty dress, great fit up top and through the waist but very long even with 3 inch heels. Dress was comfortable to wear all night!

Beautiful dresss - elegant and the back makes it modern. I was worried about the slit in the front but it was classy and made it wasy to dance. As much as I loved this dreas i had a major problem with the zipper (on the top half/back of dress) which was broken and would come undone feequently. I'm very small chested and this was the first time I've ever busted out of a dress! Would recommend a shawl as back up in case that is a common problem. Hoping its not because ita a great LBD!

links_reviews_title: Easy to Wear, Great Material, and Sexy
links_reviews_text: Formal, Flexible and Sexy

The dress seems to run small, I'm usually a size 0 but wore size 2 this time. Size 2R fit like a glove. The material is thick but still stretchy, it was very comfortable. It is a tad long but I wore 3 1/2 inch heels and it worked out great. The only thing I was disappointed about were the dingy looking white sections in the back. Maybe as a result of frequent cleaning. I felt amazing in this dress and got lots of compliments.

A crossed neckline and slit make this Elizabeth and James gown elegant. We love the look with black pumps. I rented the dress for my boyfriend's sister (see pictured) for the White House Correspondence Dinner. Her height is around 5 '3 with her typical size running between a 0-2. She rented the 0 and completely fell in love! The pop of white detail in the back was her ideal amount of added sparkle. Overall would recommend for any woman looking for the perfect Little Black Gown.

links_reviews_title: The dress came on time and I didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little tight in the chest but overall fit like a glove.
This dress fit well and I loved the cutout detail on the back! The long length was perfect with heels.

This was my third (yikes!) dress that I had as a backup. I felt it bunched up in certain places (like on the back and sides), but overall great fit and very flattering! Does a good job of hiding little tummy pooch.

I normally wear a 6 but needed the 8 because the dress runs small. It fit perfectly! I'm tall so having the option to order my size in a long was very exciting! I got tons of compliments! I was able to wear a normal strapless nude bra. The fabric was very thick so it was perfect for a colder spring evening.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. Wore it for my works fundraising gala.
links_reviews_text: Great thick material that hugs in all the right places and hides any flaws!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a fraternity formal in Miami, FL. Amazing night.
links_reviews_text: Dress was super comfy. Fit really well and I was able to dance in it.
I rented this for a Gala . It was slimming and very comfortable! I got a ton of compliments on it.

Rented for my prom. Sizing is really weird. I'm normally a 2-4, I looked up a size chart for the designer and it said to go up a size. I'm 33 in bust, 27 in the waist and 35 in the hip. I ordered a size 4 and couldn't even begin to zip it, thankfully I ordered a size 6 as a back up and it fit like a glove! Read some negative reviews on being uncomfortable and not being able to move, but that's so far from the truth. I felt as if I could've done gymnastics in the dress. It was simply perfect! 100% would suggest the dress to everyone for any type of formal event!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a holiday "ball" and received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 4R and found it to be a bit too tight for a night of dancing so I wore the 6R. The dress was too long even with 5 inch heels but I'm very short. I am quite curvy and found it very flattering. Felt totally comfortable not wearing a bra.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable dress, great length for someone who is short. Received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: I was nervous about the length because I am so short but the length was great! I wore 3 in. heels and it grazed the ground. The fit was tight but not too tight, it looked very classy and very comfortable dress. I didn't wear a bra because the back was open and I was able to keep my boobs from moving around. The middle slit added a sexy detail to the dress. It was the perfect dress for a black tie wedding and I received a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, simple, but still sexy in an understated way
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove - I'm 115 lbs and 5'3" and I went with the 0R. It was definitely tight, but not uncomfortable. I did need to wear very high heels to avoid the bottom dragging. Overall, it was a really elegant dress, but still form fitting and sexy. The only down side was that the white sections in the back were not stark white, which made it look a little dingy. But it was otherwise so perfect, I didn't mind.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Accentuates in all the right places and feels great on!
links_reviews_text: I am short (5'3'') so I was worried about the length but with 3 inch heels on the regular just barely brushed the ground!

This fit me perfectly!! Wore for a gala. I could have probably worn the 2. But the 4 was comfortable and still fit like a glove. A simple black dress that got me tons of compliments! Absolutely stunning, modest but sexy. I loved!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and flattering. The criss-cross on the front laid well and didn't cause any unflattering lumps! I would recommend this dress.
Loved this dress. So many complements. Great fit. Was a little long but I wore high heels (3-4") and I was fine. Great fabric.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a tux wedding!!
links_reviews_text: Runs small so the size 4 fit like a glove

links_reviews_title: Classic, elegant and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I wore this gown to my daughters wedding...loved it!!! I have broad shoulders and a fuller bust, I didn't need to wear a bra due to the snug top fit....I'm 52 5'8" and wear 6-8 in street clothes, the 10R fit perfectly....

This dress fits like a glove. The only thing important to know is that heels are necessary because it definitely drags to the floor and one needs height to avoid the dragging. I am 5'4" and I wore heels that gave me about 3 inches in height so it helped tremendously. Got many compliments on this dress and would definitely rent again for a formal wedding occasion.

The reviews of this dress were spot on! I normally wear a 4L or 6L but because reviewers were saying it runs small I decided to rent the 8L and the 10L. Thank goodness I did! I panicked at first bc the day before my event RTR called and said the 8L was not available. Turns out it was fine bc the 10L fit like a glove! I am very tall and the length worked perfectly with 3 inch heels. Would rent this again in a heartbeat! Also had a good laugh bc my Mom showed up in a dress very similar to my rental!
Felt fab in my post-baby body

links_reviews_title: Cute, bubblegum pink, easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Wore to a formal wedding. Easy to wear, pretty Barbie bubblegum pink color

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and beautiful! Many complaints!!!
links_reviews_text: Hides tummy area, dress is flowy texture is soft.. very different unique dress! Very sexy yet classy! Loved it! Will rent again!!! There wasn't a petite available for me on this ocasi√≥n but still wore it with a pair of heels!!!

I wore this to my brother's wedding. It was an outdoor wedding in late October so it could have been cold or hot. Luckily, it was on the warmer side but I think this dress is thick enough to have worked in colder weather also. I got so many compliments on it, the color is very bright but not too distracting in photos. As many other reviews mention, there is a bit of a slippage problem on the side without the shoulder. I have slightly smaller breasts for my size so I think going down a size was really helpful for me to help this. I am also taller (5'9") but knew that I was going to be dancing in flats all night. I ordered both the long and regular, I think the regular was perfect with heels and still didn't touch the ground when dancing in flats. Overall, great dress!

This dress fit well, I didn't wear a bra (my fave). In general pink is not my favorite so it felt a little bit like I was wearing a bridesmaid dress. Not my favorite rental but it did fit great! I love the slit in the leg, and it took me a while to figure out that the folds in this dress need to be puckered in. Unless they don't, in which case whatever.

I really liked this dress. So comfortable and enough room to not make me feel any larger than I already was. The only thing I had trouble with was that I needed fashion tape for each side up top, as there was a little extra room in the shoulder strap.
Gorgeous dress, so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, awesome color, comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a benefit gala and it was the perfect hit! Got so tired of wearing black it was a nice change

links_reviews_title: Pink color was beautiful and unique.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and would buy it if I could! Super comfortable, easy to dance in and the color is gorgeous. The pink was outstanding and unique while being classy too. I loved the way the slit flowed to easily and the slightly blouses waist was very flattering. The fabric was light and fluid. Super pretty.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a princess all night!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was awesome!! Perfect to dance in and such a pretty color! My only issue was that the side without the strap was a little looser than I would have liked it and I kept wanting to pull it up!

links_reviews_title: It‚Äôs a beautiful color, soft fabric!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, fits true to size.. the only negative is it showed my bra on the side, so I was constantly fixing it. If you have a larger chest (D+) you will prob run into this issue!

links_reviews_title: Nicely fit and worked for the wedding
links_reviews_text: nothing too wrong with it. the boob part without the sleeve fell a little.
Rented this dress for formal and it turned out so perfect. A comfortable fit and so flattering!

links_reviews_title: Stood out at a wedding in a sea of black
links_reviews_text: Had a lot of fun in this dress! Very comfortable overall, easy to move in, and a lot of unique touches which made the dress fun! The only negative is that I needed some fashion tape to hold up the strapless side - might not be a problem for those with bigger chests but without the tape, it was just a bit too baggy.

links_reviews_title: It was sexy and sophisticated. The color really stood out!
links_reviews_text: I sized up and probably could have worn the 2 because it was a little big on me in the chest and waist.

This gown was really beautiful, unique, and comfortable. I chose to wear another because I got it as a replacement at the last minute and didn't have the proper undergarments, but would definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for dinner and dancing!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly, which was great since it was shipped as a backup when the original dress I had rented was too long. So many compliments from this dress! It looked great and the dress worked well for the entire evening - including dancing.

My only complaint is that the side of the gown without a strap comes half way down your boob. I had to use tons of tape and still was very self conscious all night that my boob/bra was going to pop out. Runs a little tight in the hips. I'm 5'4 and wore 3" heels. Would have worn taller if I had them.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a cotillion.
links_reviews_text: Perfect length, Perfect fit and TONS of compliments.
Wore this to a wedding and it never restricted in my movements! I loved the style and color. The fabric on the shoulder added an extra element which made the dress special.
Loved the slit in the dress Con: smelled funny, more bubblegum pink than I expected Snug around the hips, big on top

links_reviews_title: Received several compliments! This dress was an absolute hit
links_reviews_text: This dress saved the day! It fit well and I loved the color.
Fit was slightly tight at the waist but overall felt confident in it. Loved the slit, it added a little spice to the overall outfit !

Runs true to size. I wear 14 pants and fortunately this fit since it is not an A line. I felt amazing in it but what it gets knocked down a point is for two reasons. First, neither size I ordered had the bow around the top of the should strap. Second, it kept twisting so slit was more on the side than on front of left thigh. I was annoyed at first but no one commented so I stopped trying to straighten it. Also as a side note, The 14R was perfect length for my 5'3" height with short heels only. I don't know if it had been altered before so if you are much taller you may need to order the long.

Beautiful and very flattering dress! I received compliments all night! The pink is definitely like a bubble gum pink. I'm 5'7 and wore the long with 3 inch heels and the dress was 1-2inches from the ground.

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and very comfortable for a night on the dance floor
links_reviews_text: I am typically between a 6 and 8. RTR only had an 8 available as I rented a few days before my event. Only issue was the strapless side hung low and showed my strapless bra but easily fixed with double sided fabric tape. The color was really pretty and length was perfect with 3 inch heel. Many compliments and highly recommend.
Got a lot of compliments, just wish I would've ordered a 4 instead of a 6!
I loved this dress! The color is a bubblegum pink. It's beautiful, fun, easy to dance and move in, and very comfortable.
All in all the dress fit well and looked great on me. My only complaint is the top portion- I recommend NOT wearing a bra with this dress as the top consistently slid down and revealed my bra.
Tons of compliments...worked well on the dance floor and created the perfect look for being around colleagues and clients.

I don‚Äôt usually go for a bright pink color so this was different for me, but so glad I did it! It was very comfortable to dance in all night long. It does run slightly large so I suggest going down a size for your back up. Otherwise a very unique, fun dress.

links_reviews_title: This was a perfect dress for a formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: I am typically an 8 and it fit beautifully! The top strap was a little bit long so my husband was on bra patrol for the night but it only slipped down maybe twice (and only a tiny bit), and that was even with some extreme dancing :). The pink was so pretty, received some compliment on it, and I felt great the whole night. Definitely recommend this dress to others!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the bubblegum pink color!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering and you will receive lots of compliments! I typically wear a 4L by the 2L fit better.

This dress was super comfy and cute. The color is much brighter than it seems in pictures. I ended up not wearing this dress, because it seemed to wrinkle somewhat easily and I was going to a long event in super hot weather. The color is beautiful and it fit true to size. The way it drapes is really flattering and it definitely seems like it would be easy to dance in! I would consider renting this dress again for the next event I attend. The length on the 2R worked well with 4" heels (I'm 5'3").
Definitely a fun dress. Loved the bubble gum pink. Needed more a chest to hold the side up with no sleeve but wasnt too bad.
The style and fit of this dress was perfect for a summer wedding. I got so many compliments all night long.

I ordered two dresses and chose this as it was cool and comfortable. It does run big. I had to pin the shoulder strap, as I have read in other reviews, but it was not a problem and easily hidden. I could have worn a twelve with no problem. Length was great; I was able to wear a lower heel and it didn't drag the ground.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Wore it to a Kentucky derby party and was complimented a lot!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Beautiful dress

I liked this dress a lot, but I ended up going with a more formal option. The slit makes this otherwise bubbly dress sexy and the fit is very flattering. I wish I had another event to wear it to. It was comfortable and light. I am bigger chested and the top fit very well, and was even a bit large on me- which never happens.

links_reviews_title: Pop of color and fun fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear! The color was great; definitely not as muted as the pictures on the RTR website. I wore 4 inch heels and the length was great for me. The pleats were a little wonky, but they didn't bother me once I was at the event. Fun dress! Would rent again!

I loved this dress. It was very comfortable - fit in all the right places (although it runs big and I could have sized down I think), sexy but classy and the color is lovely for spring. One of my favorite RTR rentals!

Originally, this gown was not my selection for this particular event but due to unforeseen circumstances I had to choose additional styles. This gown was one of my second choices and worked out better than I expected. The style was flattering and very comfortable. I'm 5'7" and weight 170 lbs with 36" bust. I generally wear a size 10 in dresses and pants but the 12R fit comfortably.

I didn't end up wearing this, but it is beautiful. I am wearing a 6L in this picture. I run between a 6/8. I did have to stand up straight and suck it in. It is form fitting, but I think an 8 would be too big. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a wedding in DR. The ruffles are like waves and the color was like the ocean. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering for my apple figure. Bust size 44DD. Held me in nicely and my straps didn‚Äôt show. It wasn‚Äôt too warm, and was easy to dance in! Highly recommend.

I rented 2 styles for my event. Neither worked. I called RTR Customer Service 2 nights before the event and they graciously sent me 2 more styles with no additional charge! This dress was not one I selected but ended up being perfect-- fit me well and no need for strapless bra which is always a plus! Lots of compliments on the color and ruffle detail at bottom. Colorful jewelry added and extra pop of color to the top.

links_reviews_title: Wore this beautiful dress to a spectacular wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very easy to wear. No Spanx needed! Very comfortable, fitted but not tight. Loved the beautiful color which is more turquoise than blue. My usual size is a 12 which is what I wore and it fit well. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Color, easy to wear, not too long, & not revealing! Absolutely perfect modest dress!
links_reviews_text: I can't think of any negative feedback! It is such a easy dress to wear and excellent for second and third trimester bumps! I'm 5.2" and with modest heals and a bump the size 6 wasn't too long! Most other dresses wouldn't fit me well with the bump as they didn't have a comfortable stretch in the waist.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color and the ruffle, the dress was stunning and very comfortable to wear.
links_reviews_text: It was long enough. I'm 6 feet tall and wore 3 inch heels. The only disappointing thing was that both dresses, size 12 and 14 were packed in the same garment bag, due to this error one of the dresses, unfortunately the size I opted to wear, was quit wrinkled. I had to get it steamed by the wedding planner but still you could see wrinkles on the dress. Outside of this the dress is beautiful, heavy material, lovely color and comfortable to wear and dance in.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for this formal event! The color makes a statement!
After a few hiccups with dates. Finally figured out I did need this and it was beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Perfect! Beautiful! Having multiple sizes to choose between was even better! Thank you so much for offering this service!!

This dress had a little bit of stretch to it, so it was a nice dress to wear. I wore this onstage to perform in the St. Louis Symphony gala. I am probably in between a 2 and 4, so i decided to go with the 2.
I am 5'8", 185lbs and 38g bra size. This dress just hit the floor with flats on. It was perfect for an outside wedding where heels would have sunk into the grass. I would rent this again

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit dress for a black tie optional wedding. All night long I got compliments from everyone.
links_reviews_text: Good dress, I have a large bust and was able to wear a bra with this dress so it was a huge plus

links_reviews_title: LOTS of compliments - the color pops, great lines.
links_reviews_text: Fits my torso perfectly through the waist and hips. The ruffle and flare happen from the hip down, very flattering. A little opening for your toe to peek out - it was in fact a little long for me but I wore heels and just lifted the hem going up stairs. Its a stunner. Just enough stretch to be snug but not uncomfortable.
Wish I could have stood up straight for a better picture. I felt great in this dress. Fit was good. I could have used better spanx

IN LOVE WITH THIS GOWN! Cannot say enough positive things about it! My favorite part are the fabric tiers - they look so beautiful when you're moving or... doing a little spin (: Of note - dress clings to every lump, bump, line, whatever on your body. Dress wasn't too long with my 6" heels. For Reference I'm: 5'1" - 32D- Chest 36" - Waist 25" - Hips 37"
The dress fit perfectly! The beautiful blue color really popped and stood out! So many compliments. Wore to a black tie wedding in Italy.

links_reviews_title: Mother of the groom - and I felt fantastic in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was my first RTR experience and it was nerve wracking to be the mother of the groom and flying to the wedding venue without a dress as it shipped directly to the hotel - but somehow I just knew it would work out and it was perfect. The fabric was a bit heavy when I took it off the hanger but the dress was very giving, comfortable and once on didn't feel heavy. Color was fabulous, length perfect with 3" heels and overall fit like a glove. I absolutely loved this dress!

Loved this dress, wore it to a black tie wedding. The color was bright and fun and the dress looks much better on than I expected. The fabric is slightly stretchy making it super comfortable. Looking forward to renting again

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! This was comfortable and I got a lot of complements!
links_reviews_text: I can't say how much I loved this dress! I wore this for an Indian style wedding in July. The only down side to this is that the fabric was a little heavy and hot. If the wedding is inside with ac, I would still recommending wearing the dress because it was amazing! It was a little on the big side but I do not thing getting a smaller size would have helped. If I had known how I fit in these dresses, I would have chosen the petite size. The dress is much more of a bright blue than it appears on the website and pictures, which is something I was thankful for.

Wore the 8L with 3" heels and it worked just right for my 5'11" height. Happy to have ordered a shaper to wear underneath. Even with thick fabric, every ripple showed up in photos without the right undergarments. Great first experience with RTR.

Perfect dress and perfect fit.. I normally wear a size 6, but the size 4 fit better. I was able to wear a regular bra (I'm a 32G so it's hard to wear strapless). The color is extremely flattering! I received so many compliments and would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Lots of fun for Long Island wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm athletic with muscular arms and a boxy waist, so the dress left room through the hips and waist. Length was perfect and I wore 3.5-inch heels. Fabric is weighty, so it is not recommended for a hot, humid climate, but the material is flattering. The ruffle made it a ton of fun for dancing. Would recommend, though it wasn't the *perfect* fit for my athletic build.
Loved everything about this dress. Super comfy. Sexy, and stylish. No fuss dress. Beautiful color! Very true to size

The fit was perfect. The material was quality. It hid imperfections and the weight was a little heavier which was perfect for a colder day wedding in Ireland. It barely wrinkled. I wish that I could afford to buy it and wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but need a chest!
links_reviews_text: The color and style of this dress were phenomenal! The length was perfect on the long (which is hard to find at 5‚Äô10!), but the only reason I ended up not wearing it was I do not have a big enough chest to completely fill it out, so it puckered and bunched up a bit around the armpits, making for weird lines/shapes. It wasn‚Äôt a huge gap, but I didn‚Äôt want to worry about adjusting it all night so it didn‚Äôt look weird. The rest of the dress fit perfectly to size.

I Loved wearing this dress and received tons of compliments! The color is gorgeous and the swishy ruffle makes it very elegant and fun. The fabric has good stretch to make it comfortable without feeling restrictive. It is lined but despite that, any seam on your shapewear/undergarments shows through! I'm 5'9" and in 2.5-3" heels the hem of the 16L was just grazing the floor. I could have worn another inch of heel.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding that was super comfortable and beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fabric was a really great thickness- thick enough to smooth down tummy/thighs, but also not too thick. The color was gorgeous and it was really comfortable. I was able to move, dance, and sit so comfortably. The ruffle on the side was a great touch and I got a lot of compliments!
Perfect fit!!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to the Heart Association Gala Fundraiser. So so comfy! Received endless complements!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy and comfy! Perfect dress for sitting and eating in.

I loved everything about this dress! It's a heavy fabric so it hides lumps and bumps. It ran true to size. I was able to wear a regular bra with the straps cinched in to make it a racerback. The ruffle detail is gorgeous and it was just perfect for the black tie event I attended. I would absolutely rent this again.

I loved the color, which is why I chose to wear it over my first option. It was a little too loose in some place. The thick fabric is forgiving. It was pretty, but the one I rented a few weeks ago was spectacular, so that might be why it was harder for me to love this one.

Runs large. Size down at least 1 size. I normally wear an 8 with this designer but the 6 fit with some room to spare. Fabric has some stretch and is forgiving. Had to wear strapless bra due to the straps but worked well the whole night. Leno was good with 3 inch heels. Fun ruffles and color. Rent this dress!

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding at the NY public library
links_reviews_text: This dress feels like a hug. The fabric is thick, so it's very flattering, showing off curves without highlighting lumps and bumps.

links_reviews_title: Gala dress -Year 2. This one was even better.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great; comfortable, beautiful color, and nice fit. I would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: This dress has beautiful fabric and fit really well. I got so many compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Hugs the curves. Hard to zip up by yourself because it is high backed.
Definitely a Show Stopper
This dress fit like a glove. I got compliments all night from strangers at the gala my husband and I attended. The beautiful blue color stood out in a sea of black. I love this dress so much!!

I rented this for a black tie dinner for work. I'm 5'8 and about 150 pounds. I almost ran away when I heard this dress had 'ruffles' but this dress is a stunner. Works perfect with my hourglass shape and received numerous compliments. Would absolutely rent this dress again!! Thank you RTR!!

links_reviews_title: got so many compliments on the color
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a wedding that i went to. it was absolutely beautiful... sadly, i forgot a strapless bra and had to wear a sports bra so it looked loose on top, but i guess that was my fault.
Classic look and pretty color/style with ruffle for 50+
Really cute statement piece. Looks really nice when the fabric of a shirt or sweater shows through. Comfortable not itchy, and easy to move in.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top but not the most comfortable
links_reviews_text: I loved this top and work it to work one day paired with jeans. It definitely is a beautiful top that looks and feels expensive. My only complaint is that the material was not the most comfortable and poked me in a few places. I ended up putting band-aids on my arms in the few areas it was jabbing me because it bothered me that much. I loved the style though and paired with a black cami since it's a bit cropped. Picture I took was at home without a cami and you can obviously see my black bra right through it. Depends on what occasion you are wearing it to-I layered since I wore it to work.

I picked this out after trying on in-store. I may not have chosen just seeing online as it looks kind of "old lady". But I loved this statement top!! Felt very expensive and dramatic. I wore it with jeans as my work place is causal but would have loved to wear it dressed up. Side note: got lots of complements from female coworkers but my husband did not like.
Could have sized down probably but cute still I did a half tuck

Wore this as a jacket over RTR black satin cropped shirt for a semi formal masquerade ball. RTR said the L was a size 8. I found the fit loose, which was fine for a jacket but would have been too big for a shirt. Loved the extravagant sleeves for the ball.
This was so fun to wear and felt expensive. Just the right amount of sexy for a Friday night date.

Loved wearing this top to the bar with black denim and a colorful bra underneath. The material and finishing/ hardware are beautiful and the fit is flattering through the chest and playful elsewhere. Loved this piece!
Love this. Unique. So many compliments. Thinking about buying.

Rented for Honeymoon; perfect topper to dress up and diversify many outfits! Wore buttoned all the way up, buttoned just the top button, and fully unbuttoned depending on the overall outfit. Felt sophisticated in this top!
I don't know that I've ever worn an XL but I found this in the store and loved it and it definitely fit but a medium probably would have been more flattering. Overall a very cute piece

I really loved this top. I wore a black tank under and buttoned all the way up. I wore it to work with black skinny pants and then out to dinner.. I would recommend if your looking for a fun fashionable piece.
Wore with flared long pants and a thin turtleneck. Looked great

links_reviews_title: I loved this top and wore it every chance I could. It was easy to wear over black trousers.
links_reviews_text: This is a spectacular top that was easy to wear over a pair of black trousers. I wore it multiple times from Thanksgiving through the New Year. The closer you look the more you'll like. The sleeves are the so fun to wear. I did pin the bow with a broach because it was a little on the floppy/sloppy side.
Fit was perfect for me. I loved the design and it looked very classy on.

links_reviews_title: A Christmas event at a local library gardens
links_reviews_text: It‚Äôs itchy, and looks more ‚Äúgrandma‚Äù then current. Disappointed!!!
Sadly I didn't get to wear this piece because it was to tight in the chest. Sad.
This material is not comfortable. It is itchy. The top was cropped on me and sleeves shorter than expected. May be a better fit in XL for my body. A good looking top.
no

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but too small and too short on me.
links_reviews_text: I'm tall so everything I order was a risk and this was just too short. The material also has zero stretch so I barely got it zipped and it was too tight. A 12 might have been better? The straps were adjustable but it still looked a little wonky in the chest area. Had a lot of potential but was just a miss for me.

The only reason I didn't rate this dress 5/5 was because the top was stretched out from a previous RTR'er with bigger breast than me lol ( I have a B cup) the dress was so flattering. I have a big but and it was hard to bend over because it got a little tight (no stretch) but overall loved the dress

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 6 and 8, I am usually a 6 but thought I should get an 8 just in case. I am glad I did because it ran a little small. I had so many compliments when we were out on the town! I felt great in it!
I wore this to a white party and it was so comfortable!! I highly recommend this dress!!

It's a very pretty dress with a drop waist, I wore it to a white linen party in new Orleans. There is a band across the rib cage area that felt very tight, but it fit fine everywhere else. Needed help with the zipper (it kept getting stuck on that band area) but once zipped no issues! Could be dressed up or down, I wore it very casually but could see it as a rehearsal dinner dress or something like that too!

links_reviews_title: Flattering summery dress - fancy or casual!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a dinner at my bachelorette party in Charleston. It can definitely be dressed up or down. I received many compliments and it looks great with a tan. The chest area was a bit snug on me - size up if you are busty!

I got this dress to wear to work and then casually on weekend. It works perfect for both occasions. I'm generally a smaller size so I'd say it runs a tad big. But I'm also busty so it was sorta perfect.

links_reviews_title: Ok dress, not what I expected
links_reviews_text: The dress is nice, but I did not see the ruffle at the bottom in the pictures and it wasn't very flattering on me. The top is very cute and fit me well even with a small bust. I ended up not wearing it to my graduation because I didn't like the bottom of the dress

Didn't expect the shape - the skirt starts mid hip, which I didn't love, but otherwise was exactly what I wanted. Thin straps meant no bra, but they were adjustable so I made do. Otherwise, super cute and exactly what I was looking for for my college graduation.
Very cute. Perfect for an afternoon date. The lace is pretty and the shape is flattering
I needed a white dress for a sorority event, and this fit the bill perfectly, though it was January. Very summery, it looks very cute in pictures. I received many compliments throughout the night.
It fits pretty well around the waist but it's a bit wide under the armpits...easy to adjust and make it look great.

I rented this for a tailgate party, but ended up not wearing it because I felt like it was way too dressy. It is actually dressier than it looks, and would probably make a great bachelorette party or rehearsal dinner dress. I found the dress very flattering and the 4 fit perfectly.
Too tight

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this dress. Cute design and nice length without being too short.
links_reviews_text: The dress is super cute. But you need to be proportional on the top and bottom. I'm a 34A/B and 38" at the widest area of my butt. Even with the adjustable straps, the top was too large. It also gaps by the armpit. Considered taping the armpit, but it would have been too obvious.
feminine, too small
I'm usually a XS/0 but given my booty, I should've sized up!
The dress was super cute but too big, my size was unavailable :(. If its ever available I will try it again!
Usually wear a 6, ordered a 6 and could not zip up.
Gorgeous, but fits more like a size 6 than a 10.

links_reviews_title: Great for petites but big in the bust area
links_reviews_text: I am a petite, pear shaped lady, XS on top and larger on the lower part of my body. The dress did fit well on the torso but had a weird extra room on the sides of bust area. This will be great on a busty petite female. Better for petites, might be too short and narrow on the waist for regular sized women.

I didn‚Äôt see a drop waist in the pictures, however this dress has a very unflattering drop waist that highlights the lower belly. It also fit very small so I would suggest ordering a size larger than usual. I did not wear this for my party and ordered replacement dresses.
I should have sized up
I should have listened to the other reviewers; the waistline on this dress is super weird. It's almost an a-line with a drop waist - not flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bachelorette party and loved it! Super fun and cute. Fit well and true to size.
links_reviews_text: On the shorter side but too short.
LOVED this dress. A little tight/on the smaller side but it worked out great! Really, a beautiful summer dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my high school graduation.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit mostly true to size. I usually wear a size 4 and wore the 4. The dress fit a little big on top, but I have a smaller chest and the adjustable straps helped. Overall, I wasn‚Äôt that impressed with this dress. It was very see-through and felt cheap, especially compared to other dresses I have rented from RTR in the past. It was also very short on me, although most dresses are short due to my height. The dress fit me well however, and was flattering.
I wore this dress multiple times. Easy to dress up or make more casual.

The zipper got stuck on the track and I spent a great deal of time trying to free it to remove the dress from my body. Also, as is the case with many dresses from RTR, my backup size was worn and stretched out. The arm pits were gaping.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Perfect for outdoor summer events.
links_reviews_text: Fit great in the waist, but was really roomy in the bust. (I was able to work around it by wearing a blazer on top.) But if you have a smaller chest, this may not be the best option for you.

The dress worked perfectly for a holiday party on a cold night. It was very comfortable! It's a great length, it hits just above the ankles (I'm 5'7). The sleeves were a little short, but the fit was great! I got a ton of compliments and it looks amazing in person!

I rented this for an outdoor November wedding at 33 weeks -- the invite encouraged "drama," so I appreciated how glittery this is! The empire waist and stretch are great for maternity. I actually sized down one, based on the reviews, and I'm glad I did. Used a safety pin to secure the v-neck.
The fabric felt itchy and there were safety pins in the dress from the previous renter!

I just can't say enough good things about this dress! I wore it multiple times for Christmas events. The dress is very comfortable, so it has longevity throughout the night. I love the sparkly blue. I think it's a very versatile party dress and really works for most occasions.
I loved this dress! The color is amazing and the sparkle is wonderful. I thought it was very flattering. A bit revealing in the chest, but I actually thought it was fine with a cute bra.
Love this dress!!! Not the most flattering but whatever. Super fun and so glittery! Very flowy and fun to move in.
Beautiful dress and can't wait to rent similar styles in other colors
This dress definitely shows a lot of cleavage if you have a fuller chest and if you have big hips, it tends to make you look pregnant, ha. Still, it's a fun dress that moves and sparkles.

True to size, midi length, sleeves fit perfectly. The sapphire color and the movement of the dress were beautiful, the picture doesn't do it justice unfortunately! It's not so low cut to be vulgar, shows just a bit of cleavage to make it less matronly. If you're looking for something that shows off your body, this is not the dress for you, but for this chilly family wedding in the mountains it worked perfectly!
Loved this dress so much! Lots of cleavage if you are busty...fit nicely, and received many compliments- would rent again!

Followed the advice of other renters and sized down. It would have worked but it was too low cut. The fabric and construction are not supportive enough for someone 36 D to go braless, but it showed the entire front of my bra it was so low cut.

links_reviews_title: Agree with reviews that point out makes you look like you gained 15 Lbs!
links_reviews_text: Returned unworn
Wore this 36wks pregnant to a Christmas party. Beautiful shimmer and style. The dress was not overwhelming and very elegant.

Couldn't have loved wearing this dress more to a winter wedding! With the sparkle and blue color, I was nervous it would look cheap but it looked so beautiful! I was comfortable to sit, eat, dance without any worries. But in pictures, I look pregnant or round-shape when I'm more shaped like a pencil. If you are fuller cheat, it might help balance out the flow throughout the mid-section. Size down and maybe it will be more flattering so you can love the dress completely.
It made me look pregnant but also 50.

links_reviews_title: Would be a great maternity dress!
links_reviews_text: Pretty shimmery blue color. VERY stretchy, looks more like a nightgown, wasn't very flattering on.
I wore this dress to a black tie event at 28 weeks and it was perfect! It does run large but worked with my bump!

links_reviews_title: Had planned to wear this for a black tie benefit in the winter.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, but huge. I read the prior reviews about it running large, so sized down. I was still swimming in it, and I don't lack for curves so dresses rarely run big on me. I ended up wearing my backup dress.
Runs larger than expected
Gorgeous fun dress. It was Mrs Roper chic.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Picture doesn't do it justice.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little large, probably safe to size down. Color is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Maybe not great for larger breasts...
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this but the cut was so deep I felt like my breasts could fall out of the dress-they were on FULL display. A smaller size would have been too tight and a larger size would have been way too flown at the midsection. The fabric was beautiful and I loved the color but it didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a holiday party 7m pregnant.
links_reviews_text: Fit well.
With a big bust this was not flattering at all, and I did not end up wearing it. It was too revealing for me, but otherwise would have been a beautiful formal option for a wedding.
This is a pretty dress. I ordered it to wear to Thanksgiving Dinner but it turned out to be more formal than I needed so I opted not to wear it.
Too Shakespearean. Didn't wear
Beautiful color
The color of this dress is amazing. Its very comfortable and flowy but not the most flattering cut.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fabric but made me look 8 months pregnant. Also very low cut.
links_reviews_text: Size down!
I went to the SFO store - and this was the only dress I could find I did like - they only had this size. I had to live with it. I am sure the dress w be amazing if smaller size available
Wish it knew it was so big, couldn't use it

links_reviews_title: Great Preppy Dress - Pockets Didn't Lay Flat
links_reviews_text: Generally liked this dress - flattering halter cut, length was perfect, and fab preppy striped pattern. However, the pockets wouldn't lay flat making me look bigger in the hips. Plus, it seemed like this had been worn a decent amount. Still looked good, just not a homerun.

links_reviews_title: Pictures do this dress no justice
links_reviews_text: This dress is so much prettier in person than in pictures. The fabric is heavy, with this gorgeous metallic shiny thread throughout. It drapes beautifully. And it has pockets - kind of a huge plus. The top was a little too big on my 32B bust. I think I could have worn a size 2 and been happier with the fit.

links_reviews_title: The fabric and cut of the dress exceeded my expectations!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a nautical theme Gala. It was absolutely perfect for the event, and I received lots of compliments. A few complaints though-The halter straps were too long, so I tied them instead of buttoning. The pockets didn't sit flush on my hips-kind of stuck out. Also, one of the strips of plastic boning in the back of the dress slipped out a lot and was digging into my side- I read another review that also mentioned that. All in all i would rent it again.
Loved this gown! Perfect fit, style, length, it had pockets and compliments galore!

links_reviews_title: This Gown made me feel like the Queen of the Ocean...
links_reviews_text: Received so many compliments on this dress. Rented it for a wedding on a boat on the 4th of July. It was beyond comfortable, gorgeous and shimmery and HAD POCKETS! Fits true to size. I'm 5'8, 125lbs and a 38DD. I was able to go without a bra and no one could tell. The material was thick enough to cover any weather issues and keep the girls snug and held up all night. Highly recommended this dress!

links_reviews_title: What's not to love....this dress has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a work event and received a ton of compliments. Loved the fabric, draped well, and it actually has sparkles (think sparkle nail polish). True to size and will totally rent again!
Fit well especially for smaller chested women. The sparkle did. It show as much as I thought, which was fine. Appropriate length with heels

This is a cute dress. It's definitely different from the normal wedding guest dress. I did t realize it was sparkly from the pictures when I ordered it. I'm giving it 4 stars because it was a little bit dirty and the lining was sticking out of the bottom so I had to pin it. The length was good, and it gives you a nice shape

links_reviews_title: The dress was great. I love the pockets. It was very flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I tried the 8L on in the showroom and it was a bit tight around my rib cage. I ordered the 10L so I could breathe a little more comfortably the night of the event. The dress was great and fit perfectly. I was happy with my choice and got many compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: The pattern of this dress is uniquely eye-catching, and numerous people commented on my dress!
links_reviews_text: For me, the halter part of the dress was too loose, which made the inner lining and the stays protrude. I tried to fix it with dress tape, but that was not successful. Also, the pockets on this dress were not pressed flat, so from time-to-time, they were sticking out awkwardly.
This dress has a beautiful, elegant sparkle to it that you can't see in the photos. It is a little fitted around the hips for a pear shape - no stretch at all, so recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, nice thick fabric! I received so many compliments! Perfect for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Perfect for my body type

links_reviews_title: Fun and Formal, all in one
links_reviews_text: The dress is blue and silver and I wore it to a yacht club for a NYE event, so it looked so nautical, yet still seasonal. Of course the pockets are great because I kept a tube of lip gloss and even my phone so I did not need a bag. Fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for my nephew's wedding in Orange County. The dress was a hit!
links_reviews_text: The dress is silver and metallic blue, which does not show up in photos but is beautiful in person. I wore the 4 and it was loose in the bust area (I am a 36 B) and tighter across the belly, which pulled the pockets up, making them stick out a bit. Fit great everywhere else and was comfortable all night. I am 5'4" and wore 4" heels and it was the perfect length. Had I more occasions to wear it, I would have bought this dress.
This dress was perfection. So comfy, for perfect and I got tons of compliments!

As other reviews mention, the fabric is stunning. The white is actually silver. Pulled a little across my stomach/hip area so I may have been a little more comfortable sizing up. Not sure if that would help the pockets lie flat. Overall a winner!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress! I wore it for my bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: The fit was large. I had to go a size smaller than normal, typically a 10. I'm wearing an 8 in the picture. The pockets stuck out a little, but I have large hips so they probably caused it.
So many compliments! Was heavy and hot on bottom but open back and shoulders made it bearable. Pockets stuck out a little. All in all, great experience. Wish I owned this dress!

links_reviews_title: Lovely gown for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was true to size and super comfortable. This was actually one of my backup dresses because I originally ordered a red off the shoulder dress. My original dress was sold out and RTR offered a replacement. This dress was absolutely stunning! It is a tad long so heels are definitely a must if you are on the shorter side like myself. This dress is a definite standout!
Rented this dress for a party I host every year. Perfection!! Great fit. It was classy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Awesome Dress, has pockets, super comfy, compliments all night
links_reviews_text: fit is true to size, a little big up top overall great fit

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Can't tell from pics but it is sparkly. The dress was comfortable and easy to wear. Love the pockets!
Beautiful cut. Material is sparkly, which wasn't evident in the RTR picture. No pockets :(

Loved this dress more than any other rental. It is extremely forgiving and hides flaws. Hard not to look gorgeous. Wear high heels...It's a long dress. And it was very hard to wear a bra but you don't need one. I felt so amazing and loved this one!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outside June wedding !
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding and received lots of complements. It is long but I wore 3.5 inch heels and it fell perfectly to the floor. It was super comfy, easy to move around and dance in. I didn't have to wear a bra which was a plus! The pockets were awesome too! Loved this dress ! Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a wedding and for our engagement pictures
links_reviews_text: Love it! The pockets bulk a little bit but it's so striking

links_reviews_title: Very elegant look for a Gala. Got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful gown. At first I thought the stripes would be too much but they really compliment the dress. I received lots of compliments at the event I attended. I am a little broad around my waist so it did fit a bit snug but someone who doesn't have that issue would be fine. I agree with everyone else who has reviewed this dress... The pockets stick out. I believe it is because of the cut of the skirt portion of the dress. If you have hips it will cause the pockets to gap but I was the only one who really noticed it. Overall I give this dress 2 thumbs up...

links_reviews_title: Bold pattern & great fit made this dress memorable!
links_reviews_text: The size 4 was a bit too large in the bust, so I wore the 2. The 2 was a little narrow across my hips , but I usually wear a 4 so this makes sense. I decided that being a smidge snug at the hips was better than too much side boob. Overall, I got so many compliments on the dress. It was great for an early Spring event. The fabric is substantial, so this isn't a summer weight gown. I would highly recommend this dress because you will stand out in the very best way possible.

links_reviews_title: Who doesn't love a dress with pockets??
links_reviews_text: This dress has a sparkle to it that's hard to capture with a photo. It's a beautiful and comfortable dress. Thicker material and boning on the side made it easier to not wear a bra. I got compliments all night long!!

I received SO many compliments about this dress! It is a little stiff, not flowy but I prefer the structure. It's not quite a pure white but pearly. I ordered the 6R but really needed an 8R or 10R, was tight in the waist and kind of pulled on my neck. Loved it overall.

links_reviews_title: I met Gordon Ramsay in this dress and it fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Perfect!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was very comfortable I am 5'7" and 125 lbs. and I wore a size 0. I thought that it ran large (the 2 was too big in the top). I am a 32C. Loved the dress!

The first dress I ordered came in on time like stated, but it came it looking like a worn dress. IT had snags, stains, and the color was off. The zipper did not work and the button on top of the dress was holding on by a thread. After with speaking with customer services, they over night me the same dress free of charge and that dress was AMAZING!! The pockets, the color, the dress over all stole the show.
Dress runs small at the waist! Overall a beautiful rental. It is also veryyyyy heavy and long but I made it work.
Fit was great , love the sparkle Tons of compliments Stunning dress easy to wear

links_reviews_title: All the compliments on this gorg dress of course!
links_reviews_text: Fit is TTS!

links_reviews_title: The dress fit me so perfect I loved it so much! Form fitting and danceable
links_reviews_text: Only thing negative was that the strap on the neck was a tad to big and I wish I knew about the pockets bc at first I didn't like them bc it make me look wider but once I wore it for the wedding I loved it

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite gala's for a great cause KIDS!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! The only thing I would mention, like many others did, was the pockets they stuck out a little funny. But who doesn't love a dress with pockets so I was willing to over look it! I would highly recommend this dress. I received so many compliments, I would rent it again in a heart beat!
This dress is gorgeous in person. Heavy material which flows nicely and gives it a glamorous feel. It has pockets! Wore platform heels and it was the right length for my 5'5" frame. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper! I got compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a show stopper. I got compliments all night. The material is pretty heavy so it got a little warm despite the halter top. The dress has a silver sparkle to it that isn't captured in the picture.

I was torn from previous reviewers on which size to wear. I'm usually between 4/6 and some reviews said to size up. The 6 was the only one available so I went for it. I think it was the right choice in the waist but too big in the busy (I'm a full B cup). My bf went to dip me and my whole boob was exposed! Except for that, I did find it comfortable and loved the sexy back. Going to the bathroom was rough though- as other reviews said the zip is extremely hard to zip up!

I rented this for a bachelorette party! It was really cute and comfortable, but it didn't fit me as well as other pieces I've rented in the past. I didn't quite have the chest to fill this out, so it bunched a little weird in that area. Also, the neck strap hooks in the front so there's a small gap on one side that sort of drove me crazy, but I put a long necklace on so that helped. The band across the rib area has absolutely no give, so if this isn't the smallest part of your body, you might want to consider sizing up! If this area had some stretch I would have gone with the 6 and that would have solved my chest area problem!! Overall, I did really like this romper and I felt great in it even though it didn't fit my body perfectly! I probably wouldn't rent it again, but I'd recommend it to someone with a bigger chest and a small waist!

The back is hot, and it definitely runs small. I'm a 2/4 and got a 6 based on reviews- thankful for that. Great fabric, hot lines, but can't wear a bra. I used the boob stick things. Not ideal for lift/hold, but worked for vacation!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, well-constructed, yet simple. Perfect for petite figures.
links_reviews_text: Rented for everyday/weekend wear. I pretty much ended up wearing this every day for a week straight. Very well constructed. Thick enough material to wear without a bra (if you're smaller in the chest like me). On the shorter side, as it was the perfect length for someone petite. I did have to rig the straps a bit with knotting, since it was not adjustable, but incredibly easy to do and stayed put all day. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and chic. I love that it is simple but not boring.
links_reviews_text: I am an 8 but the 10 was ok (a bit big). I love the cut and length and found it flattering. I am somewhere between a pear and an hourglass with a very long torso and that length is PERFECT. If you are petite it may be a bit long in the torso, but if you are tall this may be worth a shot!

True to size and yes it's hard to zip down to go to the bathroom. I ended up wearing the 6 just so I had some slack and could zip it down easier but could have worn the 4. This could easily be dressed up or down. I loved the sexy back. I'm a breastfeeding mom so I liked that the top easily came off to feed and clip back on without having to zip the whole thing off. My original jumpsuit did not fit and the RTR did amazing to accommodate me with this back up overnight. It got to me in time and I am happy I wore this. Thank you.

Loved this romper. It ran pretty true to size but the zipper is extremely difficult to get up! The 2 was a little snug and the 6 was a little to loose in the chest area. The 4 was not available but that probably would have been the perfect size! Overall really comfortable and looked awesome in pics. Would rent again!

I lived this romper! It's comfortable, very sexy in the back, not too tight on the butt, has pockets! I wore it out in Miami for a friends bday and it was perfect. I'm usually either a 10 or 12 but usually go up on rompers so not too tight... the 12 was a little tough to zip but it also has a very tricky zipper even on the hanger. Also loved the little pleating in the shorts

This jumper is super cute and made well. I am 6 feet tall and was super excited with some precious reviews. For me, a natural size 6, a sliver of booty was visible. Therefore, I wore the 8 which was barely enough cover although the fit on top was a little big. Overall, it was cute and fun to wear. Tall friends, just be careful and order up.

Perfect for our honeymoon in St Croix! Wore the first night out and felt like a runway model! Beautiful fabric and fit, would definitely rent again! Its a little baggy in chest area since I have a very small chest, but not very noticeable. Overall, I absolutely loved it!!!

I rented this romper for my friends bachelorette party. It was perfect for a night out in Miami! Flattering and comfortable and the back detail was a nice touch. The only negatives are: the top is huge! I taped it down on the sides to avoid any mishaps. Also, the zipper is extremely hard to pull up. This was the case for the size I wore and the backup size...it had nothing to do with the fit of the romper, just seemed like a cheap zipper. Overall would recommend for an easy and fun black romper!

links_reviews_title: It was great to have fun new clothes to wear for vacation.
links_reviews_text: It for great, ride a bike for 10 miles in it. The zipper was extremely hard to zip however, and I mean hard.
This romper is perfect for a night out. Not too short and fits well. The back is extra sexy!

I ordered this for an all night bus party in NOLA. It was perfect! The zipper is a challenge though, you'll need to make sure you have a good friend on hand to help zip it back up in the bathroom. Even with that design flaw, I would rent it again and again. It's super comfortable, flattering and way better for dancing than a cocktail dress or jeans. The size 0 fit, but the closure for the zipper was broken, so I opted to wear the size 2, so it exposed a little more of my back and I actually liked it better.

links_reviews_title: This romper was great for New Years! It was so comfortable and versatile!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was stretchy and forgiving and the shorts weren't too short, which can sometimes be a problem for me since I have a long torso. The neckline was so flattering! It fits true to size and is extremely flattering. The pockets were perfect too!! Absolutely going to rent this again!

The pictures do not do this romper justice. It was so flattering and set the right vibe for a night out in Dallas. The fit is a bit tight in the waist, I am somewhat curvy so this worked out for me but just be warned. If you like highlighting your shoulders this one's for you. This is probably my favorite romper rental to date! Wish I could justify purchasing it!

I liked this romper, and great to take from a day to night look. It doesn't have any give, so when I sat down as the night went on the waist band started to feel a little tight. It also had a lot of extra room in the chest area for me, which was okay. I wore a sticky backless bra with this outfit. Tried to snap a pic of the back of this romper :-)

I rented this for a football game and it couldn't have been a better choice! I originally got a size 4 without renting a backup..I'm typically a true four but this was way too small- RTR was kind enough to overnight me a size 6 and that worked much better, so definitely size up. The zipper is tough to get up no matter what size you get, but it's really comfortable and flattering. I didn't wear a bra at all and it worked out perfectly! Tons of compliments about this one!

links_reviews_title: I'm tall and normally can't wear rompers! This was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Material is wonderful! It holds its shape, giving it a modern, clean look! I wore it out with heels and also with sneakers! Fits true to size!

links_reviews_title: Super cute romper, wore it for a bachelorette party. Loved the tstrap back and pockets.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 4 but wore the 6 due to the band at the waist, had issues zipping it up. I recommend a size up for your back up size. It's fun and flirty and great change from the LBD. Would rent again!
I'm 5'9" and this is one of the few rompers that actually fit! It was perfect for a rehearsal dinner at a bowling alley. I paired it with gold jewelry and black heels
Loved this romper! It fit great. My only complaint was the zipper on the side was very hard to get over the waist, even though I had plenty of room to zip it. I needed another person to help me.

Lovely little black -- romper! The high neck was a good contrast to the shorter length, making it fun but still appropriate for a nice beach dinner. I am a little over 5'8" and didn't have an issue with the torso being too short, or the length being inappropriate. I got the zero (am always a zero) and it fit perfectly, if not a tiny bit too big up top - but nothing noticeable. Great quality, great piece.
Really liked his romper. It wasn't too short at all which was great, because rompers tend to me too short for my height.

THE best jumper! Wore it for a night out and it worked perfectly for both upscale and laid back bars. Fits true to size, I was worried the top would emphasize that weird armpit fat area but it wasn't an issue. Zipper is tricky other than that it has been my favorite rental so far! Can't wait to rent again in another color!

This is an adorable romper that will get tons of compliments , but does run small! The side zipper was a challenge to zip. Fits really small around the waist, I'm normally a 10, not for this however the 12 was a better fit, Definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: I am a romper fan, and this one is my FAVORITE.
links_reviews_text: This runs generally true to size - maybe a wee bit snug. Overall, I loved it. It made me feel sexy and chic.

links_reviews_title: fit like a glove and was so comfy!
links_reviews_text: I usually have a problem with rompers being too short for my long legs but it fit so well and was perfect for Vegas!

links_reviews_title: Extralegal black romper could be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Extralegal black romper could be dressed up or down. I went to show houses and then to a baseball game and was able to dress it down with a button down shirt and flats. Would be gorgeous dressed up too.

The only problem was the zipper, getting t past the waist and was a struggle. I had to have a bathroom buddy all night. But it's great, has pockets, I went braless and was comfortable the whole night. The open back drew a lot of attention but I never felt over exposed.

This romper is definitely sexy and I felt great. At first I thought the top was damaged. It did not lay quite right but it too bad that I could not wear it. It was very short but okay for a night out.
Loved this romper- being a side zip, it's a little difficult. Was very small on my bust, just wore a jacket over it and was able to hide imperfections. Size up!
Perfect for a night out but zipper was hard to zip and there was a small rip. I wore it anyway - you couldn't see it.

The waist to bust ratio on this romper is way off. It fit my waist in the 4 but I would have needed 8 inches up top go fill it out. Small busted ladies beware. I also thought the hook and eye closure for the neck strap, right in the front on the left, looked weird and cheap.
It was short in the length and just small all over!
Good.
I wanted to love this so badly but unfortunately it was way too big. I would recommend ordering but I think sizing down would be beneficial!
this romper ran a little snug. The zipper was the biggest issue. I couldnt get it up it was so sticky.

I've worn rompers like this before and this one was very awkwardly sized. The waist was very tight and the chest area was way too big. Not flattering at all of you have the slightest "mommy pouch". Would recommend to someone who has a small waist, large chest and flat stomach.
I didn't end up wearing this. It ran small and wasn't flattering. Size up.
Loved this dress for work! It's a *bit* low cut with the boobage, so I had to wear a black tank underneath just in case. The fabric is super unique and feels luxurious.

links_reviews_title: Prettiest dress I have ever worn! Perfect colors.
links_reviews_text: Wore a size up to 14 for more room in the arms. The silk is very thin so spanx required. Was able to wear a regular bra.
Love the way this dress looked and felt. Beware of static. Had to reapply static guard multiple times. But I received so many compliments! Wood rent again.

This dress is so stunning. I have rented multiple times now and have received so many compliments each time. The dress runs small. And if you have a large chest, I advise sizing up two dress sizes to make sure you don't spill out of the dress. The dress was extremely clingy when it arrived, but if you place the dress in your freezer for a few hours it actually gets rid of the static cling!!

links_reviews_title: I felt so glamorous in this dress!
links_reviews_text: It fit extremely well; I usually range from a 4-6 size. The fabric felt soft and slippery, and skimmed but didn't fit my curves too tightly. The colors felt bold and glamorous. I felt like a 70s queen.
This dress is so luxurious! Real silk and the print is so beautiful and sophisticated. Love the wrap style.
Love this dress it's so beautiful Fits true to size maybe a little big in the bust and I am DD So silky and soft to the skin feels luxurious Very comfortable feels like you're wearing a Chinese robe
This dress is much prettier in person...the satin material is gorgeous! It fit as expected and since it's a wrap dress I was able to adjust the neckline to fit the occasion.

I absolutely loved this dress. The fabric and fit was perfect. I got many compliments on it. I have always wanted to try a DVF wrap dress and I was not disappointed. I will rent this again and immediately came home and added more wraps to my favorites list!
The fabric and fit of this dress are tough to beat- gorgeous for a special occasion

Loved this dress as did everyone else. Took a chance on size 6. Generally a size 8 fits better, but this was perfect. The cons are that you will need double sided tape to keep the wrap top closed. At 5'7 with most of my height in my legs it was still a midi length but not as long as appears on the model.
Fit nice and the material is very flattering. Am worried because of here is not a lot of overlap and I'm afraid of accidental flashing someone.

Adored this dress. Wore for work in the summer but want to buy it because it could be great year round (I want to wear with boots!) True wrap dress but did not find it low cut like other DVF dresses. No special under garments required. The tie stayed put all day and overall was very comfortable. LOVE it!
It was a little tight in the armholes which made the top not fit very well. I made it work and it is definitely a cool dress.
Very cute, fun dress for work. Wrinkles easily, but other than that I'd say I enjoyed wearing it for the day.

links_reviews_title: Great fabric but usual wrap dress issues
links_reviews_text: When you choose a wrap dress you accept the fact that you will probably accidentally expose too much boob and too much leg. This dress is no exception, but again, that's a risk you accept to wear such a beautiful garment. The fabric is stunning and the silhouette is flattering. I added a bandeau bra for extra coverage.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for post baby body
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my husband's graduation from residency. I was so happy with the fit as I am a few pounds away from my pre-baby weight. It fit perfectly (5'6, 148 lbs and size DD) and I received a lot of compliments. Very pleased with this dress and would definitely rent again or buy it.
I loved this dress! It was so flattering. I got so many compliments! The silk fabric is comfy and soft.
Felt secure even though it's a true wrap dress. The tea length is lovely and was perfect for a nonprofit gala in nyc.
I wish I ordered it in a 6. The 8 was definitely too big so I had to wear it with a denim jacket.
Na
Fit perfectly and material was formal yet lightweight and forgiving. Got lots of compliments!
I was very happy with this dress but could have sized down. It is longer than midi and flowy versus fitted. The color and print is a standout and would reccomend for more dressy daytime events.

links_reviews_title: Slippery material - may be better for small busts
links_reviews_text: Since it's a wrap dress the knot has the be perfect - not too tight and not too loose. The silky material made this difficult to maintain. I only wore to church and then lunch. Got compliments and felt very appropriate for early April in chilly New England.

This dress was so comfortable and sexy. I wore it to a Caribbean theme party on a very cold day and loved the long sleeves. It kept me warm. The material is beautiful and the pattern was super sophisticated. The length was also perfect. I did use tape around the bust area so I didn't expose too much. Highly recommend that.
Looks expensive. Many compliments. Fits perfectly.
I absolutely loved this. Fit great! wasn't too low cut which is always risky when you're looking at a wrap dress
But the front kept opening. The dress wouldn't close fully across. I loved the material and design but it was so uncomfortable holding my dress all day.

I've worn this to multiple special church services (in UK and USA) and it is a truly special dress. I love the colors and the feel of the silk but literally need three strategically placed safety pins to live in peace when wearing it. Beware of the high risk of upper thigh exposure f

So luxe and glam, I don't like satin but this had a very minimal sheen. It felt so luxurious and the drape and fit were flattery from every angle. I didn't have to wear any shapewear because it honestly was not necessary. I cannot say enough about how great it fit, and the print is so DVF great summer dress.
If I could have afforded to but this dress I would have. Gorgeous fit and compliments every where I went. I will rent again .
Beautiful
Fits well, gorgeous fabric. The dark color is more navy than black. I had trouble figuring out what to wear with it in the way of shoes, but it fit well and it's a gorgeous dress.
Didnt fit ... arms tight
The fit was just right, but beware of a windy day. The material is soft and flows to easily.

I love this dress. The wrap style is super flattering. Some fashion tape or safety pins are helpful for the busy and skirt portion. I think a size up would have been a bit more comfortable for me but the fit was true to size.

links_reviews_title: Our event was "A Night In Havana" and this dress was perfect for a Cuban theme.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs true to size for the most part but the sleeves were a little snug. Also, I had to pin several areas as to not flash anyone. But overall, I loved the dress!
This dress is beautiful and feels like you have nothing on! Only downfall of this dress is that the wrap part comes open when you walk if you are not careful! The material is satiny and slips around!
However if you have a large bust you may need a cami or something underneath. The dress feels wonderful on and the fit was nice but very sexy (my bust are 34HH)

It took me four times tying this to like it. The soft, satiny print was just too beautiful to pass up. The sleeves are way too long (and can't be cuffed), but I'll figure something out. I'm usually a 4-6, and it's a small-ish 6, but sizing up would not have worked.

I really enjoyed this top. The fit was true to size. It was flattering and I felt very pretty in it. I liked the substantial feeling of the fabric as well- not too heavy or too flimsy. The only minor issue is that some of the lace trim wants to bunch rather than staying upright. I steamed it before wearing and then it wasn't a problem.
Wore this for a pirate outfit- fits well, flattering... will order again!

I were this top to a family get together with skinny jeans and booties. It looked very put together. The top fits true to size, but the bottom of the shirt was tight on me. I would definitely rent again.
Great thick fabric and fit . Sexy and classy .
This shirt is so cute & comfortable. I wish I could have kept it. It runs true to size. The material is much thicker than you would expect though. I will rent this again.
Love this top! Felt a little sexy with the fit and style. I'm a 34C/32D, 29" waist and the size 8 fit perfectly. Great material and design.
It's comfortable , fun , can be worn with jeans or anything , sexy off shoulder top
Loved this top and wore it with black jeans. No need for a bar. Super comfy.
The lace at the top would not straighten even after ironing so it looked very unpolished. It would roll down in the middle of the shirt.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, I didn't wear it because I didn't have time to press the lace so it would lay flat
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and very flattering, just be sure to allow time to press the lace trim before you plan to wear it.
This is cute and easy to match. The only issue I had was the lace kept curling down.
This runs very small, I'd order 2 sizes larger.

links_reviews_title: Arrived in less than ideal condition
links_reviews_text: Top had a lace trim that came crumpled. It looked like it had been laundered when it should've been dry cleaned and pressed.

links_reviews_title: Didn't work for me. Tight and fitted in waist
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it
Wore this for a night out and loved it. SO flattering the way the shoulders fall. Fabric has little stretch so size up if you want it loose. Would rent again.
It was too difficult for me to zip on my own and it runs on the small side. I like how it fits, it there was a way that I could zip without help. I‚Äôm sad I couldn‚Äôt wear it.

Not crazy about how this piece fit- form-fitting in the bodice and too loose around my shoulders (which are admittedly narrow). The lace looked nice in photos in a dark party, and did need significant ironing beforehand. The material of the shirt otherwise is wrinkle-proof, so nice for packing.

links_reviews_title: not a style i would usually wear but i loved it
links_reviews_text: snug but comfortable!
Perfect fit. People complimented me
Nice material and very pretty. Seemed to be snug-could zip, but did not wear as it felt too tight.
Runs small. The "body" part of the dress is very fitted.
Nothing really wrong with this I just found it to not be very comfortable and did not end up wearing it.
Nice material, but it was a little too small :( I'm usually a 10/12 and this couldn't zip up

Sadly I don't have a picture of me wearing this one but I really enjoyed it!! The fabric is thick and stretchy and I love where the peplum (or whatever you call it) falls. I'd probably rent this one again!
