flattering and comfy
Beautiful top! Lace does not lay flat in the Frontüòû
Loved it

The cut and style of this pushed my comfort zone but the class black color kept me feeling confident. It's very flattering. My only complaint is that the top scalloped part across the chest would fold down no matter how many times I tried to iron the crease out.

Beautiful material. I did not need to wear a bra, as the top was quite snug. The "apron" part kept wanting to get into my food. But its a super cute top and very nice material. It has a back zip, so it requires some yoga to get on.
I wore this during a night out to bars on vacation. It's a cute top and seems a little 90s inspired, so I paired it with a choker. Nothing too special but I thought it was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but lace needed to be ironed.
links_reviews_text: Cute top but the lace needed to be ironed. Didn't end up wearing it, I was worried my stomach wouldn't look good with jeans and didnt want to mess with lace.
Material was great and very comfortable

This was a fun piece to wear and I got multiple compliments. As others have mentioned, it was a heavier fabric than you might expect it and it was easy to wear without a bra. As someone with a small bust and waist, I found it to be a flattering silhouette that showed off my assets instead of being too big.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top! I wore it at a bridal shower and felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: The lace will likely need to be ironed to make it nice and flat, but it doesn't take long. I have rented this top again!

This top made my shoulders look tones and my neck look long. Yay! It is also good for balancing out the hips if you are the kind of person who feels a little bottom heavy. You will look more hourglass and balanced. I could have gone up perhaps one size to drape over my hips a little nicer, but it would have made a difference only I would have noticed. I wore this for pre-wedding drinks in Mexico and again for just a casual night out with friends. Versatile top, well made, fantastic fabric.

links_reviews_title: Fun, easy to wear top for a date or office-to-hh
links_reviews_text: Great top that is appropriate for both the office and the happy hour after.
Wonderful fit

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a chic addition to your every day 'mom uniform.'
links_reviews_text: I rented this as part of my postpartum clothing options. It's extremely forgiving, flattering and easy to wear.
Ve comfortable top.

I love this top. It's form fitting through the waist but flowy around the shoulders. Unlike a lot of cold shoulder tops, this one stays in place. The fabric drapes nicely around the shoulders which works well if you want to dress it up. Love this one.

Dress was so nice and would have been perfect for a California baby shower I was going to but RTR sent me the wrong size and it didn't fit!! :o( I ordered a 6 & 8 but was sent a 6 and a 4 (8 in other skinnier countries) The 8 would prob have been perfect bc the 6 was just a tad too small around my hips. Unfortunately I didn't open the bag until I flew to Cali from PA so I couldn't do anything about it. I've used RTR many times and never had this occur, I learned my lesson if I use again!
The top is so gaping I even tried it on backwards to see if that would work better. You definitely need a camisole under this dress or a hidden snap to be installed up top.

links_reviews_title: Pretty But Not a Great Fit
links_reviews_text: Pretty material, feminine and beautiful. If you have any curves on top, you need a camisole layer. It is also very short (I am in 5'4) so you will need a layer as the front part of the bottom rises to crotch length. Overall worth an unlimited rental for a summer day or night if you have layers prepared (white, green, blue, gray, navy and even tan or black work for the layers). Back is comfortable because it is much longer, perfect for playing billiards.

links_reviews_title: A little too big for me, definitely need a safety pin to keep the chest closed
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress
Top too revealing

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but very short and low cut
links_reviews_text: Needed safety pin and tape for the top and had to be careful whenever the breeze blew because it is very short in the front. But overall loved this dress. It is thin but not see through.
Beautiful print, fun and free fabric! The only problem is where the wrap comes together in the front - it's REALLY short. When I walked you could definitely see too much.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress - love the pattern and colors.
links_reviews_text: It is a bit short in the front, and the top is completely open - I ended up safety pinning it and wearing a white cami under it. Did receive lots of compliments on it.
I did have to safety pin the wrap at my bust just for sense of security. Belt tie did wrap very well.
Such a nice, sexy dress! Sexy - but it doesn't feel "too much" if you guys know what I mean. Love it so much!

links_reviews_title: Loved the flirty and fun dress
links_reviews_text: Super cute and fun summer dress. Had to pin the chest and bottom to keep from too much showing, but loved it!
This dress is see through. I wore a full slip under it but was worried about being exposed throughout the day when the wind blew. It's flowy and romantic but not easy to wear

Dress was great, awesome fit. I did end up pinning the top in the bust area because my chest would have been exposed. Outside of that really fun dress. It is short in the front so I would not attempt for a work event or family affair but is totally good for a date night or girls night out.
Super flattering dress.! I was perfect for summer because it was so light and airy. However, it is a super sheer dress. So I did wear a white slip under it and it worked perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Great dress - runs big in the chest - size down 1 size
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a spring party. Flowy with nice colors. However, the top runs very big and I pinned the dress on the inside and am also wearing a camisole under the dress. As other mentioned, it's also very sheer so requires a nude slip under it. Unlike other Nicolas dresses though, I recommend sizing down. But very comfortable and pretty for a spring event.

Very sexy dress, compliments all figures. The top is very low cut. Nothing a safety pin couldn't fix! The flowy edges disguised the pin well. Versatile dress, could be a great Sunday brunch dress or respectable work attire.

The dress is beautiful and sheer. I wore an under slip and tape along my cleavage to leave more to the imagination. The front is pretty short, I am tall with a long torso, it is definitely a sexy dress.

links_reviews_title: Unable to wear... I should have sized up at least 2 sizes.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'1". I was ridiculously short in the front. The only way it could possibly worn was with leggings. SIZE UP!
I couldn't wear it. I should have gotten a Medium. Also, too short for comfort
This dress was really pretty but a little too formal for what I had rented it for so I ended up not wearing it.
The dress unfortunagely was very revealing. My entire chest was out so much that I couldn't wear it.
Too low cut, have to use safety pin in order to wear it
Loved the fit and comfort. Super flattering fit as well!
Runs small

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress, amazing quality, I will order again but will get a bigger size so I can act
links_reviews_text: My chest was WAYYYY OUT. I don't mind showing cleavage but the four didn't even cover my bra. I am a 34D and usually am a size small/medium, should have sized up. It's a beautiful dress, amazing quality, I will order again but will get a bigger size so I can actually wear it :)
See-through, way too small ( I wear size 2 and 4), tight on the arms.

links_reviews_title: A little bit short and a little bit seethrough...
links_reviews_text: I was really bummed as this is a super cute dress but it had wayyy too much exposure at the chest and the front hem was a bit too high for a tall-ish girl (5'8.5")

links_reviews_title: I wanted this to work but it just didnt
links_reviews_text: Full disclosure this all might be me not knowing how to work a wrap dress, but I could not get the chest to come close to being appropriate for work. There's no hook to close and I was much too exposed - adding a cami would not have really helped as the top part was so loose and sort of frumpy
I sized up for this since my chest is larger. It was such an odd fit. Even when I got it kind of closed, it was still very short and I'm 5ft tall.

Dress is completely see through and I do not own a slip that would work. I would have also needed to pin in the bust because it was a lot of fabric. It was actually a beautiful fabric and silhouette. Disappointed it was so see through!
Did not wear as it was too small.
I wasn't able to wear this. The wrap was confusing and left my whole bust exposed. Would not recommend
Too small and too low cut

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric - just a beautiful dress
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this, because it didn't fit and it was shorter in the front that I was comfortable with. However, the dress is honestly stunning and the fabric is so soft you feel like a million dollars in it.

I got the 8 based on other reviews about the length and it worked, but if I rent it again I'd probably go for the 6. It was loose in the chest, but I was never concerned about the length and I wore it to a family party.
I didn't wear it bd size it was too short and low cut

links_reviews_title: Dress is beautiful. Soft. Sadly, I have way too much boobs for this dress
links_reviews_text: The colors on the dress are gorgeous. I couldnt get the wrap over my boobies.
Would not cover my chest whatsoever
Confusing to figure out because it wrapped around but once I got it was great
i thought the print was really pretty, however the tie and the ruffles were awkward.
I got so many compliments!
I didn't even have a dress on for a full hour and I received at least five compliments into head turns. I felt so pretty!

Beautiful dress. Fabric was wonderfully smooth & was very comfortable. Dress was true to size, it looks a little short on me, but still was fingertip length (I don't do any shorter). Would definitely consider renting again! Perfect for cocktail, wedding, events, or simply date night!
I felt so incredibly good in this dress. It fit perfectly and was super comfortable. Perfect for a special daytime occasion in cooler weather. I'm tempted to buy this one!
Did not love but did not hate. Ran a little big but not to bad considering it had a cinched waist

links_reviews_title: This Dress Fits Like a Glove!
links_reviews_text: I was filming in LA and was proud to wear this dress! It fit me as if it was tailored made for my body type! I'm preventing child abuse in teen programs and this is the perfect combination of sexy conservative! It was perfect for filming!

Adorable dress, quality fabric, and fabulous color. However, even with black tights, I felt this dress was too short for work. I keep my trench coat on all day. I am 5'5'' and would wear this for a date night out maybe...however, I still would be conscious of the length.
Rented for a concert but hung on to it for another party as well, such a great dress and totally better than expected! Fit and color are so fun!
Beautiful color and detailing. Great fit. Tons of compliments all day. Will definitely wear this again, and am thinking about buying it!
Such a fun cute dress for work

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work or play!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful skater dress with bell sleeves! Bold teal color and it felt amazing on. Parker is one of my favorite designers and this did not disappoint. Fit is TTS
This dress is super flattering but it felt a little short - I had to wear tights. I ordered a size 4 and it fit well, true to size. I got lots of compliments though- also the color is gorgeous!
This was a great dress for a night out in December. I ended up wearing it with black tights because it runs a Little short. The material is great quality though and it pretty flattering.

links_reviews_title: Perfect transition dress from work to party!
links_reviews_text: Great and comfortable fit

I ordered size 8 and 10, wore the 8. Fit perfectly. I'm 5'5" and roughly 140lbs. and currently 36D. I was a little nervous ordering without reviews and I am 5 months postpartum, so wasn't entirely sure about what size to order - but it fit great. I still wore spanx underneath, probably not necessary but I felt more comfortable wearing them. I think the dress felt shorter than it was due to the flared skirt, but I really loved the volume and the slimming effect. Pros: love the style, very slimming. The dress was lined so it had a nice silky inside. The color was gorgeous, my photo in poor lighting doesn't to it justice. Cons: Zipper a little tricky, especially over the waist seam, but not bad. Probably felt more tricky for me since I had to unzip to pump during the wedding. Only other negative was I wasn't used to the bell sleeves and knocked some of my silverware off the table. Overall I thought this dress was super comfortable and cute! It was great for dancing and was perfect for a winter wedding!

Material is neither too heavy or too light. The color is lighter than it looks in the picture. The photo does not die it justice. The sleeves are fun and so are the cutout like details throughout. It's really easy to get in/out of (compared to other dresses). A little on the shorter side, but still very professional with tights.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, love the flare in the skirt!
links_reviews_text: Cute dress with an interesting flare in the skirt. It might be too short for you if you're tall. On my 5'2" body it was the perfect length for my taste. I wore it to work with black tights and black booties. Lots of compliments! I always size up with this brand and was glad I did.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beautiful charleston wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, got tons of compliments
Cute dress and got plenty of compliments. I didn't wear it to work since it was too short (a few inches above the knee).
This pretty dark turquoise dress is shortish with floppy cuffs and a flirty skirt. Fine for work with boots but best for a fall date.

I'm a true 16 for most brands but clearly not for Parker. Lesson learned. It didn't even go over my chest, the arms were WAY too tight. It's a shame because the material is lovely, feels expensive and it's lined, which is why I'm giving it 2 stars instead of 1. But renter beware: don't get this if you're a plus size girl that wanders between sizes 14 and 16

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, too small for me
links_reviews_text: Fit too tightly so I did not wear. May order again in a larger size.
So cute but too short.
Something about it was off on me. Couldn't put my finger on it. Lovely dress, not on me...
Second time renting this dress for work. Love the details, flare and bell sleeves. Gorgeous color. A bit short - but works with tights and OTK boots.
nice fabric and beautiful color
I couldn't wear this because it was so big but it was super nice quality and very cute. Loved the color too.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress, but it's a bit short for work.
links_reviews_text: Pretty color, flattering fit.. but short.

links_reviews_title: Its so cute! Perfect for work
links_reviews_text: n/a

The dress falls beautifully. The color is unique and stands out. I wore this with white tights. I got several compliments at work and everyone said I looked dressed up. So, it is good for dressing up a bit. I found the shoulder a tad loose but not too much to become annoying.
Love the color, bell sleeves, and subtle cut outs on the dress. Great dress for date night!
I wore this a few weeks after giving birth to a wedding. It was stretchy and forgiving. It was super flattering and fit well!
Beautiful dress. Fabric's weight was substantial and expensive looking.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress - color and style!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly - not too short and it was slimming.

Great dress! I wore this to a work event and I got so many compliments and hooked up RTR with some new customers from wearing this dress. Super flattering and easy. Lovely color. Classic with unique details. Highly recommend. For me it was true to size. I wore this with leggings as it's been way too cold in LA this winter and it still looked fabulous.

links_reviews_title: Didnt wear. Too short on me.
links_reviews_text: Short
Runs small and skirt ends up being pretty short and poofs out a bit so it's not that flattering

I really wanted to like this dress; it's a great color. Overall the fit was ok, but wasn't as flattering as I thought it would be. The biggest problem was that the sleeves actually went about an inch passed my fingers so I really wasn't able to wear it.
this fit perfectly and shows off your legs nicely! loved it!
Awesome dress to wear to work, excellent quality.

I didn't wear this dress as it was unflattering; gathering below my natural waist. This was surprising to me as I have a relatively long torso. I would suggest renting this only if you have a larger chest and a long torso

I loved the fabric of this dress! It was thick enough to feel secure and cover flaws, but didn't feel heavy. It is a bit longer on me (I'm 5' 6") when I was expecting more of a tea length. But it ended up being perfect for a super casual backyard wedding and I wore little baby heels (basically flats) and I didn't have to worry about the dress dragging on the ground. Tons of compliments!
The arms and bodice were roomy but not too big. Waist fit perfectly. Loved the pockets and all the layers in the skirt! Perfect for our 1-month wedding anniversary!

The fit is true to size, but keep in mind that the black waist band thingy is not stretchy. I would do this a size up next time. I like how the dress is tight in the top and flowy on the bottom. Also the overlay skirt thing is so different and fun.

I rented this dress for the mother/son sweetheart dance at his elementary school. I received so many compliments on the look. It was perfect color for Valentine's Day. The top is a stretchy material, and the bottom is a cool layered look with a beautiful pattern and lace overlay. The dress is stunning! The only thing I would say is that it accentuates a small waist with the tight waistline, then it may not flatter larger hips with the flare it creates from the waistline. Overall, this is a great pick!
LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress, would have fit better one size up. Super tight around my shoulders and arms, I could not raise my arms but I loved the dress and still wanted to wear it

I didn't actually get to wear this dress but would have loved to and will probably order for another event in a larger size. The fit was great everywhere else but very tight around the smallest part of my waist. I told my husband if I didn't eat anything and stood very tall the whole time I could probably wear it but if I slouched at all it did a weird muffin top thing in an area that doesn't usually have that problem. Such a gorgeous dress though!
Nice fall dress, loved the burgundy color. Dress is heavy and warm for cooler weather. Skirt is very full and top is form fitting. I normally wear sizes 2-4 and wore the 4.

This dress is really special! The four layer skirt has a beautiful weight to it and the top makes it almost like separates. I have a short torso and high waste so didn't find the band too tight. It's definitely very long for someone at 5'4. I had a bit of a hard time figuring out where to wear this but it's gorgeous.

This dress wasn‚Äôt what I expected and I ended up sending it back. Material was much thicker than I anticipated and dress was heavy! It was a weird in between on me, funky length and too nice for the office but not nice enough for an event. I felt like the top made me look like a sausage. The color was pretty but other than that a bomb for me.

... in the best way possible. The band around my ribs was a little tight, so I might try a size up if I rent it again. I loved it! Plus, POCKETS! Deep wonderful pockets!! So necessary when working. LOVE!

I rented this dress for a family photo session. The fabric of the dress was incredible. Pockets a huge plus. The waistband has absolutely zero give and was about a size smaller (in my opinion) then the rest of the dress. Several other reviewers mentioned this and I wish I would have taken it more seriously. I have serious muffin top in a few pictures because of it. Not good! Would love to give this dress a 5 Star, but only gets 3 because of that unforgiving waistband.
Loved this dress! It was heavy as the skirt is about 5 different layers. It is beautiful! The top fit well in the bust and arms and the length hit mid shin.
Fit was okay, there was no stretch in the middle section but plenty in the top. It is also very long and kept catching on my heel.

I wore this dress to church and fell in love. The skirt is four layers, each different, and intricate. The material was high-quality and VERY comfortable. The elastic waist band is tight so you have to be a true 6 to wear it. I think I 'm on the boarder of 6 and 8 and it was tight! Rent this dress- it is worth it!

links_reviews_title: A great dress for a day time event !
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my bridal shower. I felt gorgeous in this dress and got a ton of compliments. I felt comfortable in this dress. Would rent again.

Wore this dress for a wedding shower and received so many compliments! Material is thick and heavy, so this dress is perfect for cooler weather. Only downside was that I occasionally got caught on handles, bracelets, etc because of the "netting" overlay. Still, this dress was totally worth it!
This dress would probably be too warm for the summer but was perfect for fall. It does look fairly formal.
Loved this dress. Heavy material. Easy back zipper. Great color. Highly recommended
I rented this dress to wear to work on my birthday. It was perfect! I felt like a princess.. even with my lab coat over it!

What a beautiful dress!! Received many compliments. I wore this to church for a Christening-- the dress definitely feels a little heavy-- but the colors are light enough that I was still able to wear in August. Only minor complaint.. the skirt is netting with holes just the right size to randomly grab something. Would definitely rent again--

links_reviews_title: Great dress with tons of interesting texture
links_reviews_text: Awesome dress. Perfect for church. Made of heavy fabrics so nothing showed through. Cinches at the waist then some volume on the hips. Would not recommend if you have big hips Only con is stuff kept getting stuck in my the fabric of the dress

I'm in the sales and clothing industry and wore this for work. I got tons of complements from my colleagues and clients. Only complaint is that the mesh got caught on anything I brushed against while walking by.
I'm 5-11" and this was a lot of dress even for me. Wore it to a Christmas party, and I don't think it would be right for any other season. Very unique and got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my graduation
links_reviews_text: This dress fits very well. The only bad part is the dress is too heavy. I love everything else about it. I got many compliments on it.
Just wanted a new dress to wear to church. Tired of the clothes in my closet....lol. It's a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Has a very put together feel without even having to add accessories.
links_reviews_text: Fit is beautiful, hugs the bust but flattering to the bottom half. Fabric is a bit heavy and the fabric at the top can be slightly see through (like a sweater) if you are going to be taking a lot of photographs with flash.

I wore this for the fianc√©'s birthday celebration. I wanted something was timeless yet modern since the restaurant tends to lean more on the conservative spectrum (think old cherry wood and spiral staircases). I am usually a size 6 in dresses but read the reviews and opted to order up for my back-up (size 8). And thank God I did order up! The size 6 would not zip up past the black belt. The black belt has NOOOOOOO give. The size 8 fit perfectly. The dress is somewhat long and might be overwhelming for the petite. The fianc√© lit up when he saw me ready and I received sooooo many compliments from random strangers during the evening. The skirt portion has such lovely detailing. This picture doesn't do it justice. There is no need to over accessorize-- I wore black booties (we are still in the dead of winter); minimal jewelry and a bold burgundy matte lip. I plan on renting again for our holiday pictures towards the end of the year. If you are on the fence--- RENT IT!

Wore this dress to a banquet/silent auction with a more elderly crowd so I wanted something a little more on the conservative side but nothing that made me feel too old. This dress served exactly that purpose! As the other reviews state the fabric of this dress is quiet heavy and definitely more of a cool weather dress. Also, it's fairly long so it might be a little overwhelming on a more petite frame. Pictures don't quiet do it justice how it looks in person and loved it even more once I was all styled up for my event. Fit true to size and as other reviews state the black waistband does not stretch, though did loosen slightly over the course of the night. I have wide hips and was slightly concerned the skirt might be too poofy but it wasn't at all. The top was a little looser in spots than I would have liked it to be but mainly I attribute that to having a more narrow rib cage. Overall I was pleased with how it looked, it fit comfortably, and I got multiple complements throughout the night about what a lovely dress this was!

links_reviews_title: I had a charity luncheon and graduation event within hours of each other. This dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress is extremely flattering...I received many compliments! The top and waistband run a little small so definitely order one size up as a "back up".

links_reviews_title: Wore to an awards ceremony. Loved it!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to an awards ceremony last weekend for work. Wasn't sure what attire everyone was going to be wearing. So I rented this dress so I didn't look overdressed or underdressed. I felt so comfortable all night! I ordered the 10R as well but the black band in the middle doesn't stretch. The red top stretches quite a bit. If you've got a thick waist I'd recommend sizing up. Hour glass or pear same size as you normally wear. I am also 5'10 and it was pretty dang long! If you are under 5'7 definitely wear heels!
The dress is really comfy. If not for the black belt I could have worn the 6. Received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: All I did was wear this dress out for lunch and coffee, and I got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: Measurements: 5‚Äô5‚Äù, 115 lbs, 36C, hourglass, 3-inch heels PROS: Thick material, so I could wear it in fall. I felt like the top was very flattering. The detail in the bottom was very pretty. CONS: The bottom is quite thick, so I feel like it added some girth to me. It was also pretty long, even in heels. As previously mentioned, the waist doesn‚Äôt give, so I made sure to pick a size that I wouldn‚Äôt have to squeeze into.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect for a winter date
links_reviews_text: This great fit perfectly. The fabric is a bit weighted, which I thought was great for a nice winter date. You could easily dress this up for a nice event.

I rented this dress for an out of town wedding I was attending and I had them ship my dress to my hotel in that town! It was so easy, I just called the hotel and told them I was expecting the dress, then I picked it up at check in! I got the size 10 and 12 and I didn't even bother with the 10 bc I'm typically a 12/14. The top was a little big so I put on a better bra, which was ok but just made me feel more full figured than my typical pear shape. It was comfy everywhere except the middle ribbon or dividing part didn't have any give and I felt a little like a sausage haha! It was very pretty though and I got lots of compliments. I'm married and I didn't know practically anyone there so I didn't mind looking pretty and plump but I might choose a different dress (or maybe not have indulged so much at Thanksgiving!) if I was going to an event with lots of pictures or something! Overall LOVED this dress and the whole experience. I dropped it of at UPS on my way out of town. Couldn't be easier!

The fit was great!!! The dress was a lot of fun and had pockets which was a great bonus!!! Just and FYI the skirt part has a fish net type fabric so when I walked by Kids and the Christmas tree I'd have to be careful not to get caught up on it! Other than that I absolutely loved it!

Loved this dress. Perfect for a casual party. Gorgeous dress but didn't feel overdressed. The only complaint is that the black band does not have any stretch. This required me to size up to the 4 for comfort. Would definitely rent again!

I felt awesome in this dress, and I got to wear it twice in one weekend- once to a performance of the Nutcracker, and once to a Christmas party. At both events, I was one of the most formally dressed, but I didn't care. The top layer of the skirt is gold and shimmery, and pretty much floor length. It was comfy, fancy, stretchy, sturdy, and overall easy to wear. AND POCKETS- It has pockets. I didn't even carry a purse when I wore this dress- I just dropped my phone, lipstick, and vital cards into the pockets. It's a winner.

I am 6'2" and received compliments on this dress ALL evening! It was fantastic (and as close as I get to a floor length dress, ha). The bottom layers (3) are very unique with the top layer being an open netting. The top of the dress has a beautiful ribbed texture. I could've worn the 10 but I went with the 8 (my hips are typically a 10 but my waist is an 8, with the extra room in the hips it made the 8 a perfect fit). I wore it with some metallic mottled bronze pumps and it was perfection. You could easily dress this way up or wear understated accessories for a semi casual/business attire work party which is what I did. Just rent it already!

This dress is so perfect, so gorgeous. The crochet detail is really special and the color is amazing too. It is lined in all the right places, and even though it has a high neckline and a longer hemline, it's still really sexy. There is no stretch and no give at all to this fabric. And the dress does run small, as others have commented. I am normally a 6, and wore the Large in this dress. Tons of compliments all night long!

Dress runs small. I never wear a large in anything and I am so glad I ordered the large as my backup. It was a but snug in my arms, which I was expecting since I do workout. It is a very flattering dress. Perfect for my engagement party. Endless compliments!
Loved the detail and style of this dress. I would size up as it is a fitted dress. Very flattering and looks great on.

This dress is so form fitting I got nonstop compliments and it really is classy and sexy at the same time without showing so much skin love it had no stretch but it's true to size I would totally rent it again love it so much

Great fit! Beautiful design! Love everything about it! This is a great fit and super exquisite design. Recommend it for someone in their late 20s or early 30s. It's a bit too mature for me at the end and I didn't wear it. But I totally love the way I look in it. Maybe I'll find another party for it next time. Highly recommend!
It was a perfect fit. I wore it with black shoes and black earrings to a birthday party at a restaurant. It looked elegant and chic. I got a lot of compliments!

LOVED this dress! Tons of compliments and true to size- I was worried about the fit around the hips but the small worked great (B34/W25/H36). The length was nice too, I'm 5'7" for reference. I wore this to a black tie optional wedding and I was worried about the cutout in the middle- but I didn't feel overly exposed at all due to the style of the lace, I think your skin shows through more in pictures than in person. Been waiting for an occasion to rent this dress and SO happy I did!

This dress was gorgeous! But I def could have sized up. The lace sleeves have no stretch and were very very tight. Also be careful sitting down, as the liner can ride up. I had to sit with a purse in my lap thru the ceremony lol. But it was beautiful and I received a lot of compliments. Would definitely rent again.
I really liked this dress, but had to go up to the large. I'm typically a size 6. I would rent again.
Loved this dress and got lots of compliments. It's a unique color. Runs a little small because I usually wear a 6 in dresses. I didn't have to wear a bra or spanx which was great.
Modest and flirty, soft and comfortable! Loved!

links_reviews_title: this was for a formal engagement party. made me feel very sexy & sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: felt sexy but sophisticated. the dress does have invisible zipper so might need help getting into and out of the dress. I wear a size 6/8 (m) typically depending on the store. this fit was spot on. the fabric is not stretchy. but fit like a glove :) and can still dance in. I got lots of compliments.. length is a couple inches below the knee. quarter length sleeve. gorgeous!

Beautiful dress! As all the other reviews say!! I wore the small and it barely covered my booty (the underneath part) though the rest of the fit was perfect and didn't need a bra. The lace is a different pattern than what I'm used to and I loved it. I felt very pretty in it and husband loved it. I am 5'4" about 128 pounds 34b chest 28 inch waist 36 inch hips. Worevthis tI watch my niece play lead in Alice in Wonderland and it was perfect.
Loved it! Fit perfect and comfortable too!
I just loved wearing this dress for a fancy dinner. My date loved it as well! High quality material with a little bit of stretch. Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my son‚Äôs wedding and it was perfect. I rented the MR and LR, wore the LR .
links_reviews_text: The dress is sexy and sophisticated. The sheer elements make it special. It was a tad big in the hips but not enough to make that much of a difference.
Ran a little small..I normally wear a size 6 but I ended up wearing the 8.

links_reviews_title: A combination of elegance and sexiness
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my Godson's baptism and this dress was a hit. Everyone complimented me. I absolutely loved the elegance and sexiness of this dress. Another successful RTR
Overall nice dress. I wish it was lined with a thicker fabric bc trying to wear spanx underneath was an issue bc of the lace in the mid section. I did receive a lot of compliments tho.
The dress is really elegant, but maybe I wouldn't wear it if I was shorter than 5'7. It looks the same as in the picture.

beautiful color and detail, felt very elegant; however, I am a few months post-partum and this dress hugged me in all the wrong places - so lucky I ordered the larger back-up bc I wore that. I've lost most of the weight, but am a little "soft" and this dress didn't do me any favors. It was also pretty heavy. I had planned on wearing this to my son's christening the next day and just didn't feel like dealing with it. overall, beautiful dress, but probably wouldn't have picked it if I had a chance to try it on beforehand.

I would recommend getting the additional size up because the dress is definitely very form fitting and does not have much stretch. However it was a great option. It was curve hugging yet the knee length and neck line kept it modest enough for me to wear to a formal occasion:) also my dress arrived several days early, will definitely use this service again
Fit like a glove. Very comfortable. Tons of compliments. Just an overall simple and classy dress. I am 5'3 110 pounds.
Definitely no bra since the back is all lace...Insert bra cups would have been a good idea. Super comfy.

I felt amazing in this dress! It hugged my curves and had a gorgeous sheer lace pattern (solid panels where needed for coverage). Conservative length and neckline. Soothing icy blue color looked nice on my pale winter skin. I liked how I felt both sexy and ladylike at the same time. Wore it on a date to House of Cards in Nashville.

I wore this to the ceremony of a winter wedding. It is a gorgeous dress and I felt very elegant but not frumpy, I have an athletic figure and found the arms a bit tight and couldn't move super well in the dress but I knew what I was getting in to and had a second dress for the reception and dancing. I wore spanks but even then I found there were some weird lumps from where the liner bunched under the lace.

This dress was not my first option but I'm glad I rented this. Wore this to my work holiday party and received endless compliments. I did need help with the zipper: both putting it on and taking it off. I wore a regular bra with straps; the lace is pretty thick that it was not noticeable.

links_reviews_title: My little sister‚Äôs best friend got married to her high school sweetheart!
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm absolutely in love with this dress and am contemplating buying it! I typically wear a dress size of 4-6, so I thought I would prefer the fit of a medium, but ordered the large just in case! I‚Äôm so glad I did because the dress runs a little small. The medium fit as well but was just a little too snug for the wiggle room I required for dancing. I received countless compliments on this dress and inquiries about where I bought it! It‚Äôs the perfect blend of conservative and sexy. The fabric of the dress was comfortable and I had no problem busting some moves on the dance floor in it! The rental process was super easy! I‚Äôll rent again for sure!

This was by far my favorite RTR dress, I want to rent this again (they also have it in white!) the fit was great, there is no give with the lace overlay so definitely try to get the back up size if you're unsure. LOVE LOVE LOVE.. also I wore a nude shoe with this dress, not the black one that's pictured.
Perfect maid of honor dress. Don't expect to lift your arms though. Covered all my tattoos and was a perfect color match for the "dusty blue" the bride requested.

This dress was perfect for a December wedding. The grey blue color was lovely this time of year. The thick lace and cut/shape of the dress felt classic and vintage. I'm 5'6" and about 135 with an athletic build. The small would zip shut but didn't feel comfortable because there is zero stretch. (I live in athletic clothes so I'm used to lots of room to stretch.) The medium felt perfect. I'm usually a small, but so glad I had the medium because it felt better.

The long sleeves and high collar could might have looked matronly if it weren't for the cutouts that made the dress subtly sexy. My only complaint is that the dress runs a little large. The tends to bunch up giving a bit of a tummy look, which probably wouldn't happen if it were a bit more fitted. Also, the zipper gets stuck, so it is difficult to get up or down.
Great fit, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Dress! Perfect for Winter Daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments, fit great. Arms were a little tight at first but did give. Loved color!

So there were a lot of reviews on this dress running a small so i ordered my normal size which is small and a medium for back up. Both dresses fit. I ended up wearing the small because i liked the way it hugged my curves better but knew if i planned to do tons of moving and dancing it would be a bit tight. The lining was a little short and i had to pay attention to make sure it didn't ride up too much. But this dress was sexy and elegant and i felt comfortable and beautiful in it. Definitely more grey than blue but worth every penny a must rent!

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing an elegant but comfortable dress ‚Ä¶ and the renting experience was so easy!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit was perfect and true to size. The lace was a little see-through but in a classy way. The length was great for the event - late afternoon wedding reception in a restaurant ‚Ä¶ I didn't want floor length or anything above the knee. The fabric was slightly heavy so it was perfect for a winter event - I think it would probably be too heavy for summer. Sad to be sending it back!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments from other guests.
links_reviews_text: Curves hugging!! Very tight!! I am size 4. 125 lbs 5'4. I am more comfortable in size medium. Dress I a bit long. This is my second time getting this dress. The first time I got a small and it was hard to sit down and enjoy the night. It is still an awesome dress and I would get it again.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I felt like a movie star! It fit like a glove and it was perfect for a November wedding since it was a bit chilly! It was so flattering and unique. I got so many compliments!
So many compliments! Great color!
This dress size XS fit me perfect!! Size S also fit me good & feel more comfortable on the arms area. I end up wearing size XS because I like the way it fit me better. I'm 5'3" & 112 lbs.

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much for my anniversary dinner.I'm 5'2 my only complaint was that it was a little long
Just right for a night out
links_reviews_text: Was a little snug if you have wider hips but otherwise good!!

links_reviews_title: Great color, decent fit - ultimately did not wear
links_reviews_text: I love the idea of a formal romper - the color and quality were both great; it fit nicely up top. It was a bit long (to be expected as I'm 5'1) but from the waist down, it runs REALLY big. I couldn't have gone smaller because the top fit perfectly, but the midsection area into the thighs was just really big. It made it look less formal, so it wasn't right for my event. Would probably work better if you're petite up top and curvier in your hips.

links_reviews_title: Wore it twice! A RTR must rent!
links_reviews_text: Wore it twice and loved it! Once on Christmas and once out to dinner. Color was gorgeous during the holidays and got tons of compliments! Thought the waist was a smidge roomy for me and would have been interested to see how the medium fits. It's a must rent and could be perfect for a wedding, holiday party or fancy night out!

I wore this jumpsuit to a sisterhood luncheon (annual) with over 100 women. I got so many compliments that I used the refer a friend link several times and found myself explaining how RTR works. I'm short so it wasn't cropped on me. Snug in the bust area so I didn't need a bra. I have a small chest so might possibly be hard for large busted women. Only slight annoyance were the little hanging straps that were continuously popping out. If I owned it, I would have snipped them out! Will try to pin

I wore this to welcome drinks for a wedding and received many compliments. I'm 5'4" and the pant hem hit a touch below my ankles but the length was much better than some other jumpsuits I've tried. I love this jumpsuit so much I bought it a day after returning it. I would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Petite hack: Roll up the pant legs to look like joggers. I wore this for multiple casual events!
links_reviews_text: I'm a pear shaped petite size (5 ft tall, around 100ish lbs) so finding a jumpsuit that fits is often difficult. The length of this jumpsuit was still a little too long, but I fixed that by rolling up the pant legs so that it looked like joggers. (See picture.) The crotch area could look a little weird at times, but I didn't mind. I especially liked the off-the-shoulder top (although I sometimes had to adjust it), the color (it matched my hair!), and the pockets (it could fit my phone well). It made my butt and shoulders look great. I wore this with sandals and flats for fairly casual events (a nice brunch, a picnic in the park where it was perfect for when it got chilly, and a work party). Since the fit wasn't perfect, this kind of jumpsuit was perfect for those casual events. However, it could also work for more formal events if it fits you better!

Wore this jumpsuit for the rehearsal dinner for a wedding I was in. I loved it! The fit was perfect and I felt confident the whole evening. I did have to adjust the shoulders down a couple of times, but it wasn't too bad. I wish I owned this!
This jumpsuit is perfection. It fit like a glove and I received compliments all night. It was comfortable the entire night.
Rented this for a nice dinner date. It was cute but nothing unforgettable. The color was nice and the material was good quality
The romper was really comfortable but definitely was a bit big, especially in the lower half. It got a big baggy in the crotch and the legs were very wide. Still got a lot of compliments!
Wore to a wedding and it was perfect! Tape the hanger strings in thought!! Only downside is that it limits your arm range of motion but it was worth it
This was really cute and trendy. I don't think it cut me in the right places but I still liked it!
Wore this jumpsuit for a rehearsal dinner and couldn't have been happier. I ended up wearing the xs, length was great and I was completely comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Great time with great friends while feeling both comfortable and stylish!
links_reviews_text: I wore this romper to a cocktail attire charity event and loved the fit and look. I was 27 weeks pregnant in this so I went with the larger size, but otherwise would have fit into my regular size. My only issue was the sleeves portion was smaller on me because I went with the size up (smaller chest) but easily remedied this for the evening with a couple of safety pins.
Such a cute fit! Loved the color and really comfortable.

I wore this to a TV taping in LA. The fit was slightly large, I usually wear an 8 but have been losing weight so am in between sizes. I had to pop a hip to keep the legs/waist area from feeling slouchy. The underarm area isn't super flattering if you raise your arms because the shoulder pieces rise above your shoulders. But really cute and comfy- I was worried it would be too small but it ended up being a bit big. I got so many compliments- I would have kept it if I ordered one size down.

links_reviews_title: I want to own this jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a wedding I went to! So many compliments, fit almost perfectly! The medium that I wore was a little tight, but not suffocating but the large was just a little too big and baggy and I would‚Äôve had to keep pulling it up. If only there was a size in between! I absolutely loved it and would highly recommend it to anyone who wants to try a jumpsuit!

Beautiful color and fit! I had SOOO many compliments! Wore to a Bachelorette party. I usually wear a dress size 4, but sometimes a 6. I am a size 2 on top and a 6 on bottom and was able to fit in the small. The medium gave me more room in the hips but was a little big on top. I wore some thin spanks to smooth me out and was ready to go! Only con was I forgot to tape in the hanger strings like other reviews suggested, but not a biggy.

links_reviews_title: Immediately felt confident in this! Wore it to a rehearsal dinner. so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am curvy, small up top, thick on the bottom (and proud of it haha). This fit just fine, there is just enough room in the hip and butt area. I wear a 6/8 in pants, 2/4 in tops, this fit fine. I wore a strapless bra but ended up taking it off after the church and it was totally fine, couldnt tell at all. There was enough support.
I got the M and L. Ended up wearing the L but it was a little big but the M was too small. Very comfy and the jumpsuit has pockets!!!!! The zipper tends to get stuck halfway so keep that it mind.

links_reviews_title: Classic, elegant, and the perfect color to subtly stand out.
links_reviews_text: The reviews said this ran small so I sized up and the large was perfect. The hanger loops (there are four) kept peeking out so I would recommend taping them down. Otherwise it was comfortable and I felt like a million bucks. I received compliments from strangers all night.
This fits great and I got so many compliments on it - very comfortable and doesn't fall down
LOVE this jumpsuit. Material has a great amount of stretch. I have a very short torso and found the overall fit to be the best of any form-fitting jumpsuit I've worn. Will probably keep.
I am a true size 4/small this fit strange. Was too short and the pockets pulled. I am only 5'4 and narrow in my hips so that's strange for me. I liked the color and the top though.
Great length-especially for someone who is petite. Great overall fit.

links_reviews_title: Jumpsuit to ring in the New Year
links_reviews_text: So the jumpsuit is pretty reliable! I can't say that I loved it to be honest, but I think it has more to do with my torso and how it falls in the front. It actually worked out well for the NYE party we were at and it was fun. I would just advise to be careful and if you aren't crazy about jumpsuits to begin with don't do it. I absolutely love jumpsuits and wear a lot, but this one just wasn't my fave!

I loved this jumper and got compliments on it literally all night! It was so comfortable! I wore it to a rehearsal dinner, followed by a night out and it looked effortlessly chic the whole time! I do wish I would've tried the small as a backup just to see how it fit, but I'm happy I stuck with the medium. I'm 5'5 and wore shorter heels and it was just a tad long-nothing major though. I'm in between sizes so it seemed pretty TTS. #rehersaldinner #jumper #winter
This jumpsuit fit perfectly and made me feel super confident and sexy on my birthday.

I wanted something I could be fancy and warm in for my winter birthday celebration. When I saw this, I read the reviews and knew I had to try it. I wore the Large and it worked perfect - I'm 5'7" and currently 165lbs. The material has a bit of stretch and was so comfortable. I received so many compliments; I want to wear it again!

This was a great option for a work holiday party. Received compliments all night long. More on the plum side than burgundy/wine color. It felt great, didn't have any issues with it sliding or moving out of place. Felt comfortable all night long. The tabs for hanging did constantly come out in the front and back. That is my only (and very small) negative to this beautiful jumpsuit.

Happy to standout in a jumpsuit, but the fit was not great for my body. It was baggy in the crotch and tight in the waist. I wore 3" heels and the height was great for the leg length. I did receive many compliments on it, but would not rent again.

I loved the feeling I got in this romper when everyone else was wearing dresses! Rented S and XS for work holiday party, ended up wearing the S because I felt bloated that week AND the XS left nothing to the imagination. I have a small chest so I did readjust the top a few times but the rest of the fit was so flattering, including room in the stomach so when I sat it wasn't too tight or bulging in awkward spots. Landed right above the ankles, perfect to admire some cute heels (I chose black, but nude looked great as well). Color is more cranberry than model, but it worked better for my holiday party. Rented "two tone tassle earrings" from RTR too, perfect combo with an open neck. Would TOTALLY do this again.

The fit on this jumpsuit is great for dates particularly because it is on the longer side in the torso so sitting down is actually pretty comfortable. It is a very pretty maroon color with off shoulder detail. Highly recommend for something classy and different!!
This jumper was really cute and perfect for a fall wedding, however, it's not made for short women! It was much longer than expected and saggy in the crotch area.
Just had a baby and this was incredibly comfortable and forgiving. Loved it!

This jumpsuit was perfect for my sorority dinner in the mountains! I needed something super stylish but yo keep me warm! Everyone loved it and I wish I had just got an XS because I'm short haha. It was a little long so it would bunch up a bit but super comfy, flattering and had some stretch! I would rent it again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Perfect for a dressy event, but not too dressy either.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! True to size. Comfortable & great style.

The color is true to that shown in the RFR photo.Pant legs hit right at ankle as shown on model; wore the jumpsuit with nude sandal heels (Michael Kors) and used wardrobe tape to secure bodice perfectly (Scotch). Felt happy & sexy wearing this. My style-conscious nieces (early 20s) all loved it.

links_reviews_title: Great for big boobs and broad shoulders!!!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable fit, didn't wear a bra and felt supported and confident. Got tons of compliments on the maroon color and fit. Took a buddy to the bathroom for the night due to the long zipper down the back but was breathable and durable the entire night of dancing. I usually have a hard time finding dresses that can make me feel covered in the chest (36DDD) but still give me a waistline but this jumper was great. My waist felt slim and still had ample coverage in the bust. The off the shoulders felt so romantic and flirty but with pockets of a powerful jumper. Love love love! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND.
Fit perfectly! Got so many compliments. I love that it wasn‚Äôt super red, but still a very flattering shade.

I wore this dress for a winter wedding where the attire was Cocktail. I wanted to wear a longer dress because of the weather but didn't want to feel too dressy! Because of the color and material this dress can be dressed up or down! I'm normally an XS but wore the S because the XS was a little too snug in the right arm and hips. The S was a little roomier but worked in my favor and felt more comfortable dancing the night away! Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, but would not recommend if you sweat a lot like me!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great and flattering on me, but shows everything! The major problem that I had with this dress is that it very easily shows sweat. If you are like me and have to be careful with what you wear because you sweat a lot, I would not recommend this dress. I had major pit stains all night before the wedding even started, and then especially after dancing.
I received so many compliments on this dress. It fit just right! A little hard to figure out when you're putting it on but once you get it...it looks great!

links_reviews_title: I got plenty of compliments about this dress! It was perfect for a January wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. I wasn't sure how it was going to fit, especially because of the length and the bust (which is normally my challenge - small bust), but it ended up being perfect. I loved the material: it wasn't too thick or too thin. The slit was just high enough to make it appropriate. The shoulder was a little tricky at times because if it doesn't sit on the upper arm, you will see creases on the drape-over, so you will know where it should sit on your arm. I was so impressed by the number of "Oohs" and "Aahs." I highly recommend this dress and this experience.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and flattering, no bra needed!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. Super thick and stretchy fabric so very comfy and flattering. My boobs always make finding a dress difficult but this was perfect. The fabric was thick enough to hold them in so I didn‚Äôt even need a bra. I wore stick on petals but it probably wasn‚Äôt necessary. I wore a thong but in retrospect you could kinda see it so no underwear or spanx might be better. I wore 2in sandals with it. My only concern is that there‚Äôs only a couple stitches holding the fabric over the chest in place and in my alternate size they were loose and it looked terrible. But the one I actually wore didn‚Äôt have that problem. I could almost get the SR on but couldn‚Äôt quite zip it so I went with the MR. I got so many compliments and felt amazing, definitely get this dress!!

Beautiful and stretchy dress. So fun and comfortable to wear and received many compliments! I do recommend getting a smooth undergarment (like spanx) to go underneath because it does pick up all underwear lines. The slit is also fairly high so most under-shorts will be too long.
The dress was a perfect fit and great for a black tie wedding.

Beautiful rust colored gown for a formal wedding. Thick structured fabric, the slit makes it Va Va Voom, wore a strapless bra and no need for spanx. Easy to move and dance in, and the cut at the top adds an avant-garde feel to the silhouette.

This dress is memorable and beautiful without being loud or promiscuous. I wore it to a fundraising gala that I attended with my boss and our Board Chair and it was perfect. The material is very thick so you don't need Spanx or anything to hide your bumps and keep everything looking tight. The only annoying thing about this dress is that the shoulders need to be properly positioned for it to look right. But it wasn't too hard to keep them in place. I just had to make an adjustment here or there.
This is a beautiful dress but I'm not sure about the sizing. I followed the reviews and got a larger size and unfortunately it was big on me. But I made it work.
This dress was comfortable, amazing color and I felt so chic in it. Lots of compliments!

I am a 4/6 and go back and forth between a small/medium. I went with the medium because the small was too snug across the hips and stomach. There is a leg slit on the side that's pretty high, but wasn't exposing to the point where I felt uncomfortable. The shoulder part was a bit lose, but all in all I was happy with it. Wore this to an August black tie wedding.
Gorgeous copper color, thick material, super comfy. Love the leg slit!!

links_reviews_title: Someone else wearing the same dress at the same table! Not happy with Rent the Runway!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly. I picked it, due to its simplicty and elegance. Rent the Runway, should have a better way of tracking that it sent this dress to two people in HI in the same general reason for the same night. What are the odds that two people are going to the same ball, the same night and sit at the same table!? This is frustrating. Everyone wants to look spectacular for their significant other and make these moments special. Not achieved here! RTR should have options asking each person a little more details and have an alert system, warning, that someone else is renting for the same period in the same area (i.e. shipping address or zip code), when renting, to prevent these types of mishaps. I cannot imagine any female having issues taking the time to answer a couple questions of what type of an event, where is the event and the date. This information doesn't need to be public, but give a warning of the possibility of having a twin. I intend to contact RTR and send pics, as it is not lady like to put the other person's picture on here, without her consent, but I'm going out on a limb, that she was probably not pleased either, as she was in good spirits about it.
Runs small.

I felt like such a WOMAN in this dress! Such a beautiful and flattering design. I wore it to my college formal and I got nothing but compliments the entire night. I really wanted something special because it is also my 1 year with my boyfriend, and he loved how it was so simple but elegant! And dang it looks SO CLASSY with pearls. The slit made it very easy to walk and dance around in without any issues, and I loved the off-the-shoulder sleeve. The one thing I didn't like is that I really couldn't put my right arm up (the one with the off-the-shoulder sleeve) because it would have caused a wardrobe malfunction. It is also really tight, especially around the tummy area (spandex for sure!) Overall though, an excellent and beautiful dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Went to a beautiful gala for the Queen Elizabeth II garden in NYC commemorating 9/11.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. The material is very thick which makes it forgiving in the stomach region lol. The part that hangs off the shoulder stayed put, for the most part. I'd have to adjust occasionally but that wasn't a big deal. I'm pretty busty so that probably helped the off-the-shoulder part stay up. The red was slightly darker than the photos which I preferred. The slit is truly on the side - not in the front whatsoever. Overall great dress! Do it!

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress! It was comfortable, flattering, and I felt amazing in it.
links_reviews_text: Between the tiny bit of stretch to the fabric, the slit on the side, and the way the neckline hung, this dress was super comfortable. Other than the hanger straps which popped out a couple of times during the night, I never felt like I had to adjust the dress at all. I ended up wearing the MR and felt great in it. Got tons of compliments, but before I left the house, I said to my husband, "Even if I get zero compliments tonight, I love this dress and I think it looks so good." :) Nothing beats an outfit that gives you that kind of confidence! Also, I had read other reviews about the "rust" color and was really happy with it, especially for an event where at least 100 other women were wearing red. I would definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments! The dress is extremely comfortable!!!
links_reviews_text: The Medium was too big overall, but the Small was tight across my large bust. The weight of the dress allowed the Medium to hang nicely while still skimming, rather than hugging, my curves. This dress was a pleasure to wear as it was comfortable from dinner all the way thru the after party. Very pleased!!!

Wore this dress to a fundraising event. It was very heavy material and a beautiful rust color. It's a snug fit and I have a not exactly a fat stomach so I was conscious of this. I would have preferred if there was a bit of a scrunch across the belly.
I wore this piece to an Oscars viewing party and received so many compliments! Stretchy fabric made this so comfortable. The side slit gave it that extra pizazz without being too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress but more importantly it was so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Thanks for the ease of getting ready for events.

I ordered the large and x-large in this style. Both dresses were a bit worn, but the x-large was in pretty poor shape. The seams were out of place, perhaps overstretched, so that the inside lining showed. Also the neckline had lost its structure. Thankfully, the large fit better, though the zipper was a bit tough to navigate with the thicker fabric. Each night before the event, I zipped and unzipped the dress to hopefully ease it for the big day. On the day of the event, the zipper worked beautifully and the dress was a hit! I had many compliments on the shade of this dress- it is a brick red. I was comfortable all night. The thick fabric was snug and supportive but I recommend wearing shape-wear underneath. The length was perfect with my 3-in heels.

I loved everything about this dress. It made me feel so glamorous and beautiful, and sexy because of the open leg and off the shoulder touches. It fit me like a glove, the zipper was easy to get up (unlike the first SR that I had tried on in the same dress and color) and did not drag on the floor with my 3.75in heels. I also really loved the color. It's rust, not red, and it really differentiates you from other people who are wearing red in a way that I enjoyed. I attended an event with a 'This Is Passion' theme, so many people wore red, but I didn't feel lost in the crowd. I would highly recommend renting this for a fancy occasion. That being said, the plastic hangers are extremely obnoxious. I was pulling them in and down the entire dress. I tried everything to hold them down, including two different kinds of clothing tape, but nothing worked. They kept popping out! I honestly considered buying the dress just so I could cut the one off the shoulder off because it really ruined the look to have a plastic string hanging out on the back of my arm. Make sure to have a plan or just honestly, use duct tape? otherwise it will drive you crazy too.

links_reviews_title: Very dramatic and unique in a sea of red!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5 and weigh 150. Usually wear a large but some mediums. Definitely had to wear the XL. Couldn't even zip the L. The zipper was extremely hard to get up. My husband was about to get the pliers (no joke) but somehow got it. There was also a rip in the seam below the zipper but wasn't too noticeable. The dress was exquisite and very unique in a sea of red dresses. Very comfortable and easy to dance in. Would rent again. Wore it to a military ball.

links_reviews_title: The great dark red color stood out in a sea of black dresses and suits.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small and a medium and they both fit very similarly. The fabric is really nice and thick and supportive. I went with the small size for the event and it worked well. The dress was a little longer than on the model, which was great for me. It skimmed the top of my shoes.

links_reviews_title: This dress was my backup dress
links_reviews_text: This is a true rust color. It‚Äôs very simple and comfortable and easy to walk in. The fabric is thick and has some stretch to it. I was a bit self conscious about the height of the slit but it‚Äôs on the side so that helped. I‚Äôm usually a size 2 and this was the SR. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and wore 2 inch heels and it was the perfect length.

I liked this dress and got it as a back up for a wedding. It fit wonderfully, but I felt the arm would restrict dancing so I went with the other dress. Would definitely get again knowing it fits well and was a good length with my 2 inch heels. Not a dress you can wear a bra or underwear that would show any lines.

Very snug, comfortable. Fabric is nice and heavy. I'm 5'5" and wore 3-inch heels and the length was fine. The off-shoulder sleeve seemed like it kept wanting to slip so I wore it on my shoulder part of the night. Got lots of compliments. Agree it has a rusty tone to it, but was still red enough for a holiday event.

Loved this dress! The shoulders take the dress up a notch so it's not too plain. I'm heavier chested and it covered everything perfectly and with no bra. The material is super flattering! Only down side that is off the shoulder is the right one so dancing and/or lifting your arm up is difficult- regardless would still recommend!

links_reviews_title: Dress has a nice stretch to it and was perfect for the holiday party I attended.
links_reviews_text: Pros: -Dress length of regular was great for me (I am 5'4") -Beautiful cut-received lots of compliments-classy! -This was originally my backup dress and I loved it more than my first choice. Cons: -Dress looks more orange-red than red in the daylight. For my evening event, the lighting was dim so it did appear red in pictures. When I first got the dress though I almost returned it because it wasn't a true red.

links_reviews_title: This dress was awesome. Great quality and hugged in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'5" with an athletic build and I usually wear size 6. This dress fit perfectly with high heels. It was the star of the holiday party.

This dress was a hit. It fits beautifully and hugs curves nicely (goes in at the waist). The fabric is heavier and was very flattering. It's a simple design, but very elegant and shows just enough skin with the slit and shoulder peek. I received so many compliments on it. The red is not too loud - like a rusted, deep red, but enough to stand out in the sea of black and the black tie to which I wore it. It comes in black too, but I didnt regret going for the red!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It was very tight and the top was a little weird so I just wore it how it felt more comfortable. It worked out! All in all, great dress that I felt sexy in!
Perfect!

I was skeptical about wearing this dress, but the stylist in the store convinced me that it might be worth try. I had a backup dress at home so there was no harm in giving the outfit a shot. I wore this with long mainly teal earrings and gold pumps. I am bottom heavy and was worried that I should size up in this dress, but it turned out great. It depends on the look you are going for. As a person who wears between a size 6 and a size 8, I personally do not like when there is a gap and loose fabric between the small of my back and my bottom. I want the dress to hug my curves and this dress did that. However, when I was a 0-2 I loved the column type of look with loose fabric at my back. If you are one of those people who enjoys that look and you are between sizes, size up.

The material was super heavy, which was nice with the chilly fall temperatures. I felt very classy and sexy with the slit. Form fitting around the waist, so keep in mind when sizing. The little clear loops on the inside that are used to hang it up kept popping out at the shoulder and were a bit of a pain. Over all, awesome fall dress!
Great fit! I'm petite so I had to order the extra small. I'm 5'1 around 105. The dress was long so had to also make sure I wore high heels. I got so many compliments on the dress.

links_reviews_title: The cut of the dress made it stand out and make a statement!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was thick and forgiving, top stayed in place and was very comfortable. I highly recommend it.
Ran slightly large but i liked that look more than I thought!
Great quality and dressed up my tshirt and jeans!
I wore this for a party in Vegas and I got so many compliments. Not only was it super cute, but the inside was lined and very comfortable (not itchy like I expected)!
#glamorous

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an Elton John Concert!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket! It was super comfortable and looked great for the concert I attended.

links_reviews_title: Great to add to any outfit
links_reviews_text: I would size down, it's pretty baggy!
Very comfortable (with stretch) blazer. Not over done looking, fun to wear. Versatile to dress up or not. The stretch makes it feel larger than TTS but it might be just right.

Randomly decided to try this and happy I did. You can easily dress this up or down. I wore with a black tank and also with a white tee to change up the look. Fit me great, but I have broad shoulders/large chest, so may actually run a little on the large side.

links_reviews_title: Classic, with flair! Wore out to dinner on NYE.
links_reviews_text: Sequins were in great shape. Fit is a bit swingy - not super structured like other blazers. Very fun way to wear sequins, conservatively. Wore size S.
I'm usually a medium but ended up wearing the small. It wasn't too big or tight in my broad shoulders or chest. Paired with simple white tee because it was fancy enough for my company work dinner!

I LOVE this jacket - it‚Äôs versatile and fun which is what I‚Äôm all about! Can wear for formal occasions, but could totally wear casually with jeans and sneakers too. Best of all it sparkles and the looser fit is great. 10/10 would rent again.

Wore this in Vegas for going out after the National Rodeo finals. Fun, casual look. I have broad shoulders from lifting and it fit great - not too snug - didn't need to size up. Almost bought it but couldn't think of enough places to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Nice add to my black strapless jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: The length was fine but it ran a little small.

links_reviews_title: Great piece for my birthday outfit
links_reviews_text: True to size and you can cuff the sleeves without the sequins sticking together/catching and pulling. I wore it over a pink feather top for my birthday but I also wore it with a white top to work (I don't work in an office) and it's pretty versatile! So fun and would definitely rent again!
It fits well and a little more casual than it looks.

Originally rented for an upcoming bachelorette party but the cut was really odd. Sleeves were long, and when buttoned it was tight over the lower part of my hips. It also didn't lay right with the lapels--which kinda curled up instead of laying flat and when buttoned the top part gathered weird. Sent back

links_reviews_title: So cute! The sequins were just the right amount of flair!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable; loose fitting, but still flattering

links_reviews_title: Perfect accent piece to ANY outfit. Whether dressing it up or down, it makes a statement!
links_reviews_text: Love, love and LOVE this blazer!

I am 5'2iiisshh and this was wayyy to long on my body - boo! The sequins are light, inside is soooo soft. Overall the jacket is great...on anyone else! Ordered a large (post baby boobies are out of control) and it was still to big size wise.

links_reviews_title: Fun jacket to dress up any evening outfit. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Oversized blazer, fits true to size. Material is thick and stays wrinkle free. Great addition to any evening outfit.

links_reviews_title: My son said I looked like Michael Jackson
links_reviews_text: Not at all what I was going for. Wanted something unique for a work event but this was not it. Boxy, swingy, well made, but somehow a sequin blazer manages to be kind of boring. Maybe it's the thin lapels? Perhaps it needed a contrasting texture and wider width for the lapels.
Fits on the larger size. Wore to an event and to work. Will order again
Perfect fit! Wore with black leggings.
Fit perfectly and my favorite piece to date. The sequins lay nicely not too garish. Can't wait for another occasion to rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Great blazer that can be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: A little on the large side, I should have selected a medium. I wore it to after-work drinks with jeans and heels and received many compliments. Great statement piece!

links_reviews_title: Love the sequins!!! Good looser fit
links_reviews_text: It was a nice length hit below waist couldn't quite button but was good loose too

I wore this a few times for end of year holiday events and it was a fun addition. I'm not usually into black or sequins but still liked it so if you are, then this is a nice one! It's a good fit on the shoulders but it is roomy inside aside from that.
This blazer is a looser fitting style. I wore it with a white tee, jeans, black pumps and chandelier earrings.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this jacket.
links_reviews_text: The jacket was boxier than I expected and didn't suit my body.
This jacket is fun for a party, but it runs large. I got a medium, but should have gotten a small, it's a little long too.
More slimming than you would think.

I've worn it a few times: it fits great and is very comfortable (not scratchy at all!). Also surprisingly warm (which is good in winter!). Sleeves are a bit long but I pushed them up on my arms, 80s style, and it worked great. Received sooooo many compliments. I wish it came in red! Or silver! It's a very slimming and flattering cut (I'm petite so I thought it might be long but it was perfect)

I wore it twice - first, for my company holiday cocktail party (with black trousers, a black silk Anine Bing camisole, and some fun burgundy holiday heels). I wore it again for a more casual cocktail party - pairing it with jeans, a fun t-shirt, and a pair of black mules. It was the perfect topper for any party outfit. Heads up the sleeves run a bit long - I just folded them up my arms a bit and it looked great with the satin lining showing.
large
Comfortable eye-catching dress. True to size.

I received this as an emergency backup and it turned out so well! I was worried about the fit, because my top and bottom half are very disproportionate, but I went with the 2 to fit me on top, and the rest worked out, too! It was not the easiest to move freely in, so I wore this dress for the ceremony and changed into a different one (also RTR) for the reception. Got lots of compliments! It photographs very well.
Really cute dress, a bit formal for work. Got tons of compliments throughout the day! I'm 5'4" and the dress was almost at my ankles, which was fine but made it a bit hard to take steps

links_reviews_title: Wish I could buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8" and about 140 lbs. In nicer brands of clothing I typically wear a size 6. After reading the reviews of this particular style I ordered a size 8 and it fit like a glove. The dress is fully lined and was very warm - especially for an August day in Texas. I would rethink wearing it in this heat! The zipper is a little tricky due to the beautiful embroidery and I definitely needed a helper to manage it. The back slit in the dress wasn't quite long enough to allow for easy maneuverability in and out of cars. But it is a beautiful dress, well-made and I received many compliments.
Didn't end up wearing this but wish I had. It's beautiful, just worried about being too heavy for an early summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Cool fabric design nice and slimming
links_reviews_text: This wasn‚Äôt my first choice but it ended up being perfect. The floral design was cool and more artsy in person than I expected. I‚Äôm tall 5‚Äô9‚Äù and bust 34DD and the 10 fit perfect just a bit snug when getting in and out of cars. Very classy look wore it t a wedding and got lots of compliments.

I chose this dress To wear to a work function for my husband. I did not want to look too flashy but didn't want to look too plain and I know that this particular designer makes dresses that look great on me. It was beautiful and did not need to be accessorized or overly adorned. Women I did not even know came up to me to tell me how beautiful the dress was. The only issue I had was that the lining hung down beyond the hem of the dress making it look a little cheap. It was also difficult to zipper and has absolutely no give, but is beautifully made!
I didn't want to do the normal pastel and frilly Easter dress so I went with this beauty and man am I glad I did! It's so cute. And actually really really comfortable. I got a ton of compliments!

Rented this for dinner out of town with my husband and another event in town. Very happy with how this fit, zipper was a little tough. Got compliments from the hostess as soon as I walked into the restaurant. I liked the length, very comfortable for the evening. Since I have a long torso, wish the waist seam was a little lower, but overall a great dress. Will wear it once more for a chef's table dinner, would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Have not gone to the event yet and still deciding which dress to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful and fit like a glove.

This is a great dress. It's long enough to cut it at a formal affair but very comfortable. No need for special underwear so that's a bonus. It fits perfectly and brought lots of compliments. Definitely stands out in a sea of basic black

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments all day! Perfect for my brother's summery, outdoor wedding.
