links_reviews_text: The embroidery is so beautiful and even more vibrant than it looks like in the picture. It fits absolutely true to size on me, and I have wide hips and a big bust. the length hits at a tea length. Super flattering, I can't recommend it highly enough!
This sheath was classy and stood out in a good way!

I loved this dress so much! The length was perfect even though I'm 6 ft. I got so many compliments on this throughout the event. I usually wear 18 but that wasn't available so got the 18w instead. It was nice for it to be a bit roomy in the bodice. Very comfortable for dancing!
Lovely dress. My mom might rent again.

Runs small, normally a 6 - wore a 10-keeping in mind I am also 14 weeks pregnant so assuming at least one size up regardless. The attached slip underneath is poorly hemmed so I had to safety pin it or else it is longer than the dress. Overall beautiful and a stand out dress without being too much!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with very details flowers!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. Comfortable and easy to get on and off. The flower details are beautiful! Do not have to wear a bra.

As much as I loved it it run small on the chest. I normally wear size 6 but couldn‚Äôt fit. I was very happy having the 8 to wear but definitely you need help to zipper up!! A dress to wear in different ocassions . Got many compliments.

The embroidery and colors are fab. I got a separate compliment from literally everyone in my office, and all my friends at dinner after work gushed over it. It fit so well that I decided to keep it! I usually wear a 2, but I'm glad I got the 4 because it fit like a glove. I think I will hem the bottom so that it stops below the print -- I think this will give me more options for footwear!

links_reviews_title: Classic reinvented The pattern is pretty and feminine. Needed to wear a blouse given cut
links_reviews_text: True to size. Cut in arms was not flattering

I've rented this dress twice I love it so much. The colors in the embroidery are gorgeous - the photo doesn't do them full justice - and make it something a little out of the ordinary, while the overall line is simple, classic and elegant. I am short and loved how the dress hit just above the ankle. Very flattering to a curvy figure - just enough hold to give shape, just enough stretch to forgive and be comfortable. Very happy!
Fit perfectly. Wore this to a charity event with a floral theme. I felt great all night - fancy, yet classic and the floral embroidery was gorgeous. Definitely recommend!
Debating buying this one! The photos don't do it justice! I am short and this is definitely on the longer side.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering if you have an hour glass figure
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for a mid-day wedding. It didn't cause head turns (which you never want at a wedding), but it did get quick glances (which is okay!). I would wear this again. I have a small waist and rather large hips, so I thought it was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Runs small and difficult to zip alone!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It runs small -- I generally wear a 6, and this is a very fitted 8. The details are extraordinary and received tons of compliments. The embroidery makes this dress so difficult to zip by yourself! I did the soap trick (rubbed bar soap on the zipper) and held the tiny zipper with a wash cloth for "traction"! Finally got it after quite an effort. If I wasn't as flexible or determined, I may not have worn it!!
The curve hugging style is complementary and the colorful embroidery is eye catching to others. Expect loads of comments asking "where did you get that?"
Got lots of compliments! It fits snug

links_reviews_title: Rented for a trip to Oaxaca during Guelaguetza. This dress helped me fit right in perfectly.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5". At that moment weighing in at around 130. Fit a little snug in the waistline from eating so much while on vacay but otherwise very comfortable. Used for walking around town in the evening .

links_reviews_title: Loved but didn't wear to wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and wearing it but didn't end up wearing to wedding I rented for. The upcoming wedding I have is not very formal and the cut felt too conservative. Beautiful dress with beautiful colors which fit great. Too dressed up for my very business conservative office so I dressed down with denim jacket and heels for a baby shower. PS long for the shorter person. Came down to my ankles.

links_reviews_title: The pictures don't do this dress justice!
links_reviews_text: Like others said it's really hard to zip up due to the heavy embroidery but it's so worth it! This is a beautifully made dress. Compliments all night and pretty enough to frame it! Only reason for 4 stars is that the inner layer lays lower than the outer layer and looks a little sloppy. Otherwise an amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with bright embroidery. Fits one size small and is quite long.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and flattering dress, but fits one size small. I love the bright colors of the embroidery (pink, turquoise, apple green, etc) on the black background. I am usually a size 10 with RTR (5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and rented this dress in size 10. It felt tight everywhere (chest, waist, hips), so I would recommend going up one size. Can be worn with regular bra, which is always a plus. The reason for giving this dress just 4 stars (instead of 5) is the length of this dress, which I don't find flattering. At my height of 5'8", this dress ends at an odd part of my legs.

BEAUTIFULLY authentic! The attention to detail is amazing. The embroidery is very rich in color. The fit is very slimming and form fitting with just enough room in just the right places. I paired it with a blazer to wear to a funeral on a chilly day. The length of the dress is what makes it stand out as well.

links_reviews_title: Wore to an afternoon Wedding. Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The 6 was a little tight in places, like under the arms. Also fabric has no give at all. But overall it's a georgeous dress and I got lots of compliments. Should have ordered an 8 as well.

The color of the stitching is bright and beautiful. The dress is structured but not too stiff where you can't dance...it does hug pretty close to the body. Definitely makes an otherwise basic black dress pop amongst an event. Great length for fellow tall ladies as well! Only reason I didnt give 5 stars was that the dress hem was shorter in length/strunken from dry cleaning compared to the the underslip which was longer.

Be prepared to be stopped a lot by people complimenting and wanting know about the dress. Beautiful detail. No need for accessories. Even without sleeves, the fabric is warm. It was great for a night in the 40s. You'll want to size up if you have larger hips/thighs.

links_reviews_title: Unlike the ordinary little black dress, this one made me stand out distinguished among all the black
links_reviews_text: This dress runs true to its size. It fits like a glove, but roomy a bit enough for me to wear a thin, sheer, black long sleeved blouse underneath for my sense of modesty. The dress is thick material, but only one thing is the zipper is tricky to zip up, so you might want to have a person to help zip you up in the back as I had one who did for me :) I would rent this again!

Glad I read the other reviews! Does fit a little small, the dress is beautiful and different, I got lots of compliments on it! Great length even for a formal wedding. The fabric is not stretchy which makes it a little hard to dance, but makes the dress very flattering!

links_reviews_title: We went to a wedding at a unique setting so I needed something fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect, even for my apple shape as a column style. There is nice sheath with embroidery over over a heavier material. I could have worn the 16W, as it fit fine, but decided on the bigger size in order to add a belt and a little volume up to better define my waist a bit. I got compliments all night. It did smell a little weird, unfortunately.

links_reviews_title: This dress caught so much attention at work! I wanted to keep it so badly!
links_reviews_text: A bit large in the waist with no room in the bust. No give in tye fabric

links_reviews_title: Great fit and great compliments came my direction all night!
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly on me! There's no give or stretch, but it totally works. It was longer than I expected--I'm pretty tall and it fell below my calves.
I planned to wear this for a work event but it ran extremely small on the top half of the dress.
Loved this dress! Great waist! Would have sized down.
Very flowy. Wore to work then to a boat dinner. Sand+red color combo was alright. Would look better on my skin tone (Asian, medium ) if it's white + red.

links_reviews_title: Wearing a fun designer expensive dress not normally in my budget
links_reviews_text: Great patriotic dress. I wore For the 4th of July!

I ordered a size 0 in this dress and ultimately didn't wear it. It fit perfectly at the waist, but nowhere else, unfortunately. The top was too big at the shoulders (which was so bizarre to me), and you can see the way it folds in on itself in the photo. It was also very very long. If you're under 5'6" you'll have the same problem I did - you'll look kind of like a circus tent... it's a pretty dress and the fabric is lovely, but definitely NOT for short gals.

Loved the color combo (red & sand) and the way the skirt twirled - felt like I should be on the French Riviera. I deducted a star because the top was so big and because the elastic waist seemed to ride up.
I wore this dress for a big family dinner and got a few compliments. It was cute and comfortable. I chose to dress it down with tennis shoes, but heels would have really made it much cuter.
2nd time renting. Perfect for a hot date on a hot night. True to size and love the comfort.

links_reviews_title: Easy fit but seemed a bit like a circus tent
links_reviews_text: Paired it with a navy cardigan. I like the dress and the fit but the pattern was a little loud.
This dress fits well. Light and great for vacation. I wore a slip under so it didn't stick to my legs. Very light fabric.

This was the perfect dress to pack for vacation to Mexico - packed well, fit nicely with an elastic waistband for heavy eating and was super comfortable. Think you could dress up or down with shoes. I'm tall and very thin right now so the size 0 worked for me but was a little short-waisted. Not a big problem as the blousy nature of the top gave extra flexibility. I would rent again for vacation.

I rented this for a beach party in Mexico. I thought it was breezy and easy to wear - the only issue I had was with the "creamy/peach" stripe....it wasn't the best for my skin tone. Also there was ample room in the chest so this would work well for a fuller top.
Really nice material. I have wide shoulders so it was slightly tight in that area but still overall great dress.

This fit my hourglass figure to a T. I loved the elastic waist, V-neck, and flowy skirt. The skirt is not lined so I wore a slip with it. Paired it with nude pumps and a denim jacket on October but this would be super sweet with espadrilles in the summer too!
Silky, beautifully made dress. Very easy to wear. Can easily be dressed up with heels, or paired with suit jacket for business, or just flip flops!! Love this dress and the red is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Just ok. Weird fit on top
links_reviews_text: Fits tts but odd around the bust. It pulls a bit and I do not have a large chest, but zipped up fine so if you do have a larger chest, I'd size up. Kind of matronly on top and nothing special. Nice silky material and comfortable though.
Fit great. True to size. Very light and comfortable. Longer than expected but flowed beautifully.

I wore this to work on a very hot day in New York and although it's a long dress, the material was light and stretchy enough that it was not too hot. One review indicated they wore a slip to prevent the dress from going between her legs which would have been a good idea had a owned a slip. I didn't find it to be see through. I felt the fit was accurate and slightly forgiving given the stretch. Have a steamer ready.

This was a nice enough dress. It was pretty but nothing super special. The waistband was elastic which was comfy but the top was snug on me with a 32DD chest. A 6 probably would have fit up top, but it already felt like there was a lot of extra fabric on the bottom
Wore to work with a jean jacket, a broadway play with a black scarf and to brunch as is. Perfect for any occasion.

links_reviews_title: Fabulously flattering dress but better on a tall person
links_reviews_text: The Dre's was very comfortable and flattering. I loved the deep V neck that didn't expose too much. I could have gone down a size but this was all that was available. Also- being so short it was longer on me than I would have liked.
This dress feels like wearing a silk nightgown. Easy to wear - just throw on shoes and necklace and viola! You are ready for errands, dinner or a summer night out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, conservative silk dress. Runs true to size. Comfortable due to stretch waist.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful, conservative silk dress. Five stars. Fits true to size and is extremely comfortable to wear due to the stretch waist. I rented my usual RTR dress size 10 (for reference, I am 5'8", 155 lbs, 36C). Can be worn with regular bra. Note that the "white" stripes are actually a sand/beige color. I wore it with nude sandals and nude handbag. The top part is lined, while the skirt is not lined. I added a slip to prevent the full skirt from getting caught in between my legs when walking and to make the skirt not see-through against the sun. This dress reminds me a bit of a candy striper dress or the carnival, but not in a bad way :-). The only (very minor) negatives are that the zipper pull underneath the left armpit is a bit scratchy and that the skirt has no pockets.

links_reviews_title: Omg it's my favorite so far
links_reviews_text: Love this dress
Wore to work then a happy hour. I received many compliments. Super comfortable and beautiful

I'm usually between a 12 and 14 with a 36G chest and although the fit across the bust was a tiiiiny bit tight, it was a comfortable dress to wear all day going to various picnics and parties. As you can see, the skirt is very flowy and fun! (It happened to be ideal for the 4th of July :) ) I might have wanted to size up if I were to get it again--the waist was pretty snug so I think would work a size larger. The length was good on me (I'm 5'9") but might feel a little long on shorter ladies.
Yet another fave! Great dress!
This dress was light, flowy, and great for a hot day! I wore this both to the office and to 4th of July. The top runs a little large but only slightly. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fit was good not sure how flattering though
links_reviews_text: This was an easy to wear a dress to bring on a vacation. However I really liked it on my first try on but later I wasn't sure how flattering it really was. It was flowing open easy to wear easy to get on and off. The band was stretchy and very forgiving. Boyfriend that it looked a bit circusy. It is made of pure silk which unfortunately means in my opinion it gets stinky faster in the summer. Length was good on my frame, like a midi for 5'3".

This dress is lovely Fits true to size a little tight in the bust but I am a DD Very airy the skirt swings easily and flows Reminded me a bit of the circus with the colors Was a little low cut for the modest event I was attending so I wore a camisole Zipper is a little hard to zip up but what else is new I loved this dress perfect for summer and warmer temps

I loved the vertical stripes and colors on this L.K. Bennett dress! You are able to wear a standard bra with this which is great and works best for A-C cups sizes. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips.
Love this dress! Flattering and very comfortable !
I am between sizes and this was too big at the top for me. Gaped around the arms and chest. The waist and skirt were fine. It's a lovely dress. I would rent it again but I would get the 14

Fits really tight on top so if you're larger than a C this is not the dress for you. The beige color is kind of a wash out. I would have loved this dress if it were a but more drapey/flowy on top because from the waist down its heavenly. Did not wear it :(
fits as expected
I LOVED this dress! The colors were beautiful, the cut was flattering, and the dress is really comfortable and easy to wear.
A little loose in the upper body (I'm a 34B) but it hangs well and it is perfect for a hot day.
Great idea but top not flattering

links_reviews_title: Light and airy - lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed wearing this! very flattering fit.

Love the full skirt, hate the fit on top. If you are proportionally more narrow on top, order a size down. The 12 was unavailable, and I had to wear a denim jacket over the top of this dress, buttoned to disguise the ill-fit on top. The draw is very light and easy making it great for summer outings.
This dress was way more flattering than I expected, and for hot summer days was great in the office or for after work. The fabric was breezy and the fit ideal.

The brocade fabric of this dress is everything! So gorgeous and rich. The cut is nice, although the bust was a little odd - the cups were a little higher than my chest. The long length was perfect for my height + 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: The dress was comfortable and beautiful but unfortunately our event was cancelled! I'll rent again!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, especially the pockets and the weight of the material.
I wore this to a black tie gala. I was barely 2 months postpartum and this dress was so comfortable.

I wore this gown to a Mardi Gras ball. It fit comfortably, no special bra required, and I'm 5'10" and the gown still skimmed the floor. The gown is dark gray/black with silvery navy details. It is gorgeous. And the pocket was the perfect size to discreetly fit my iPhone 10s. I knocked off a star because I did a one time rental and the shipping fee was exorbitant.
The fit was perfect and I felt like a princess all night.

links_reviews_title: There customer service is outstanding I was not sure what my size was and they shipped me 7 dresses
links_reviews_text: As I found out designer dresses run small! I was so impressed with the help RTR gave me our event was great and I felt beautiful I got a lot of complements on my dress!

This dress runs a little large in the neckline and shoulders. I had to pin up almost 2" on both straps so it didn't gap on my chest. It's pretty low cut so it is supposed to be plunging but I needed it a little more snug. I purchased a black velvet tuxedo jacket to wear over it and was a perfect complement to the dress. If you've got a tummy, hips or booty, this dress covers it no matter what size you wear. IT HAS POCKETS! Lovely ball gown silhouette and I received compliments all night.

This dress was very comfortable and easy to forget about during the event. My chest was not big enough to really fill out the top, so it was a little big on top, but it was no bother. I really loved being able to wear a bra and know that the straps weren't showing. The pockets were a huge hit so I didn't take a purse with me. It was the perfect dress for a formal affair. I really enjoyed descending the giant staircase at the event!

The dress fits true to size. It is a beautiful fabric that stays sleek looking all night long. The pockets are a real game changer! Absolutely beautiful dress, easy/fun to wear, received many compliments.

Felt beautiful in this dress. Not like any other at our New Years Gala. I'm really happy I ordered the 8 versus 6 bc i have a larger rib cage and it didn't have much give in that area. The fit was perfect. I didn't order the long but regular length would've been fine.

links_reviews_title: Dress up, or dress up more! Fit for a queen.
links_reviews_text: This dress I rented to have some formalish/nice dinner attire options if I did that during the wedding week with my parents, which this dress would have been great for if I ordered it smaller, on me it was large. However when we never made it to dinner, but came in perfect with a corset when we ran away to Halloweentown after the wedding. I also added a tie on Elizabethan whisk and with the dress it was a quick and beautiful queenly look for an impromptu Halloween newlywed-date

Agree with most reviewers, runs large. Usually a true 4 and the 2R worked great. Still a little long with 3 in heels (I'm 5'4") but was still able to wear and dance at the wedding without issues. Many compliments, very photogenic dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous winter ballgown with endless compliments
links_reviews_text: The biggest shock factor of this dress is the ease- one of the lightest ball gowns I've ever worn with an easy zipper and pockets deep enough to option out a clutch ! The detailed embroidery was stunning and caught the light of Christmas decorations perfectly
Great dress. People I didn't know stopped to compliment 'this outfit. It was comfortable fit well and has pockets. Perfect with 2" heals.
Rented this for a formal wedding and received a lot of complements on it! Fit great and was really comfortable to wear for the night.
Got compliments all night. The fit is super flattering and the fabric is sturdy without being stiff.

links_reviews_title: Beware if you don't like attention
links_reviews_text: Stunning! If you rent thus you will get complimented all night....it actually got a bit tiring since I heard it from everyone... literally...and some multiple times... This dress is stunning.. I Agree with others , runs larger, I am 5ft 7 and usually wear 20w with a 42DD bra... The 18 long was comfortable, but straps were long. But easy fix, , I pinned it temporarily. The length was perfect... In my heels it did not touch the floor. The worst part was sending it back... Three words: Just rent it!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, better colors in person!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, and a great fabric with perfect colors. It has deep pockets which is a perk! Being 5'8 I'm glad I ordered the long length - perfect with 2.5 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely beautiful, I cannot rave enough about this dress. Pretty, practical, & POCKETS!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size, the length was perfect for about a 2" heel which is about as tall as I go. The pockets were amazing, who doesn't love pockets?! The only SLIGHT drawback would be the bust, I have boobs and lots of them and it was a little large on me.

links_reviews_title: Worst customer service I have ever experienced
links_reviews_text: Dress was nice. If you have a problem no one picks up the phone or responds to emails ever. If your dress doesn't fit you will literally never be able to get help. One of the dresses fit fine thankfully but they forgot to include a return label. I was stuck paying out of pocket to return because no one ever responded to me. For this reason I would encourage everyone to use another company despite the fact that the dress was pretty. There has to be a better option.

links_reviews_title: This mother of the bride felt like royalty all night long!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is perfect. The fabric is stunning and light -- worked perfectly for an indoor wedding and an outdoor September reception. It is comfortable and easy to wear. No special bra required (although I did opt to wear a strapless body suit underneath). The pockets are deep and amazing -- plenty of room for my phone and lipstick without it being obvious that anything was stashed away. I would wear this dress every day if I could. Rent it. Now.

I received SO MANY compliments on this gown!! For one, it has POCKETS. 2, the heavy material is hot but it‚Äôs very comfortable to move around in. 3, I had to wear our sisterhood of the traveling strapless bra to fill out the chest bc it was big around my breasts and ribs. 4, 6L was obviously long so I wore three inch heels and thankfully the gown doesn‚Äôt have a slip or extra material underneath, so that made it so much easier to walk around in and won‚Äôt snag your stiletto. 5, the color is gorgeous, just look for snags because my gown had a few pulls on the front. 6, it‚Äôs low cut in the front and back so make sure your bra is low cut too. 7, the straps tend to slip to the sides but I think it‚Äôs just the cut of the gown. 8, Rent this gown. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Very royal and regal gown! Loved it AND it has POCKETS!!
This dress was great for dancing. I received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight in the top but once you had it on for awhile it was comfortable.

Beautiful dress! Extremely comfortable. Had to order a size up to fit my chest. My 36D breasts were too smashed in the 8R. It was long for me; but, was easy to hem using safety pins, which were unnoticeable because of the silver threading in the fabric. I didn‚Äôt take a handbag since the 2 deep pockets were all that I needed for my phone and lipstick!
A little bit big in the chest area but overall a gorgeous gown!
This dress was very big. I sized down once, should have sized down twice. I did get many complanents. Overall, I am happy with the rent!
I'm 5'9" and ordered the long. I found it a little too long so would recommend the regular for my height. The dress fit great and I got tons of compliments on it.
Beautiful dress wore it for a formal wedding. The made me feel like a princess. I received complaints all night . Dress does run a little bit bigger from the top.
It was just too big.

This dress was a last minute back up dress since my original back up dress was unavailable for shipment the day before it was supposed to arrive. RTR handled the whole situation so well though with giving me proper notification and allowing me to pick another dress. I'm sooooo glad I got this one!! It was for a black tie wedding and I felt gorgeous the whole night!! The top was perfectly snug and the length didn't need any shortening with heels on. I wore a strapless bra with it for extra security but I imagine I would've been able to get away without one. The best part were the pockets!!!!

I felt like this dress was made for me. The fabric was gorgeous and caught the light without being over the top. The regular length was great for me at 5'7" with 2" heels. It moved very nicely and was fun to dance in. I wound up going with one size up so that I had some room to breath in the bust, but found it to be true to size.

This dress was beautiful. However I normally wear a size 18 and the 18 was just falling off of me. Luckily I read the other reviews and also ordered a 16R. It was a little snug in the waist and was too big in the bust and shoulders. My 38Ds didn't fill it out. So, I ended up having to buy a bigger size bra and doubling them up so that I could fill out the top of the dress and not have it falling off. The arm holes were extra wide and my bra showed quite a bit. I had to keep my arms down and to the front all night. I was also constantly pulling up the straps and front to stay covered up. That being said . . . the dress was stunning and I received tons of compliments the entire night. I would say that almost 10% of the adult female attendees complimented me on this dress at some point during the evening. Pictures really don't do it justice. It is gorgeous! Even ill fitting, it was a show stopper. Women with wider shoulders or a larger bust should definitely get this gown!

Everyone adored this dress, and I felt like an absolute queen. It was super well made, so I wasn't worried about someone accidentally ripping it on the dance floor. The floral detailing and sparkles were so unique and intricate. This dress was absolutely perfect, but I will say I did have to size down.

This dress was my second choice and turned out to be the best one. I got so many compliments. I'm athletic built but also busty. I wore a size 4 which fit me perfectly. If you want more room around the bust area go one size up. I'm 5'2" and wore 3-inch heels. The dress was dragging a bit, but I was able to adjust by lifting it during dancing/walking. I felt like Cinderella going to the ball. This is definitely a must-rent dress!

Overall it fit great! I had to get the 20L but probably could have done an 18R or L. The straps kept coming down and exposing my bra straps but that's because I was in a slightly bigger dress. I'm bust but i didn't feel like the girls were going to fall out. Overall it was classy, gorgeous and comfortable! AND POCKETS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed the style of the dress as well as the fact that it had pockets.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs large. I normally wear a 20, 22. I chose the 20 because people stated it ran large. I believe and 18 would have fit better. It looks large around the midsection. I would have preferred a more tailored look. However, I still received dozens of compliments on this dress. I do suggest safety pins or wardrobe tape for the straps.
This dress was so comfortable and so stunning at the same time! I got compliments all night and the best part? Pockets!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous gown! Light weight and so comfortable! Pockets were amazing!!
links_reviews_text: In love with this dress!!! Fit great...and I felt amazing!....a little tight on my bust but I made it work by buying a thin cup bra (most of the bras I have are padded and push up, and it was just too tight with it). If you are lucky enough to NOT need the 'lift' you 100% could go with out wearing a bra at all. So elegant and I felt like a princess and was sad to send it back!!!! Worth every penny!

I wore this dress for my wedding. Second marriage so I did not want to wear white (heck, I didn't want to wear white the first time, either!) and saw this dress and thought it was perfect! And it WAS! I am 5'2 and weigh 180- I just lost 30lbs so I'm finally a size 14. This dress is flattering! And I love the pockets! All the ladies at my wedding loved the pockets! Note to designers: we want pockets! I added a rhinestone belt to add bling, but the dress itself shimmers. The photo looks gray but it's a beautiful SILVER! I fell in love with this dress so hard that I bought it. Which is good because all that was left was the long and I'm short, so I had to hem it up a bit. This dress is one you can rent without worrying.

This dress is stunning! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô-11‚Äù, 155 lbs. The medium fit great. I couldn‚Äôt tell from the photos online of the dress if silver or gold accessories would be better, but gold ended up being the winner.
I got lots of compliments on this dress! I liked how it fell below my knees and had long sleeves for a winter event.
The fit was amazing! I was able to drop it like it was hot, it moved with me perfectly. I received a ton of compliments. it's definitely more of a rose gold color.
It's cute and comfy

The dress fit great (I sized down to an XS, usually would wear a small, size 4) and was comfortable. Came just below the knees and I was able to wear a regular bra with it - just make sure it's low enough in the back not to show. The dress made a big splash but was also not over-the-top at a wedding, with the long sleeves to temper it. Fit like a glove, but was thick fabric. Recommend!

In a very unoriginal twist, I wore sequins for NYE! This dress was comfortable and there was no rubbing at all from the sequins. I run between a 4 and a 6 and the 4 fit perfectly. Really enjoyed wearing this dress!
This dress was amazing. I wore it for a NYE wedding and it was perfect. So flattering, beautiful, and flirty. I got so many compliments and felt great in it.

The silhouette is so sexy and I love a good long sleeve dress. It was so flattering, I just ended up wearing something else. The dress has a good amount of stretch so you're comfortable to dance the night away. Tons of different metallics so you can style it a ton of different ways!
I rented this dress for my birthday dinner and it was definitely a winner! Tons of sparkle and extremely comfortable! Don't think twice about renting this dress!
Loved the dress for perfect and really nice for a winter event I though It was going to be thin but wasn't ... sequins was in that night
I rented this for the nutcracker and it was absolutely perfect for a holiday or special event

This dress was great! I received many compliments and I felt amazing! There's stretch, so your able to move around comfortable and it hugs the curves in all the right places. I definitely recommend renting this dress!
Great fit. Tons of compliments.
Never would typically wear a small but based on reviews glad I sized down. Fit perfectly. Love the v down in the back. I had tons of compliments all night. Perfect length for tall girls.
I loved wearing this dress!! The material is stretchy so it is form fitting but doesn't feel too tight. Loved going to a Holiday work party in this, and getting compliments all night!
Stretchy, not to heavy and such a beautiful sequin pattern on the dress.

I wore this to a Lawrence Welk themed party. Wasn't sure what to wear and went with back up singer. Comfortable dress and lots of compliments. The photographer insisted on getting a picture of me because she loved the dress so much.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and shape. Would wear spanx next time for best look.
links_reviews_text: Dress was very stretchy and easy to walk and dance in. Got tons of compliments and people raving over the dress. There's a fair number of sequins missing and plastic strands hanging off though FYI

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress! Lots of compliments, and it was totally unique.

links_reviews_text: Fit well and was perfect for a Casino Themed Party

It was so perfect! Compliments all night, I even got a message asking where I got it. Is kind of thick so I was warm (in a good way). It has an open back and i was still able to wear a normal bra! IF anything, I would size down.
Def sported spandex under. It was perfect for this fashion event I DJ'ed for. Glamorous. Great length as I am short. It was stretchy so it fit well.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Very comfortable. Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great for curvy women who have issues with the bottom fitting too snug and the top too loose. Fabric is clingy so it accommodates all shapes. I wore silver shoes, but gold or bronze works well too.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper for sure. The colors are so unique.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a bit heavy and quality. I wore it in december so it was perfect. The back is low and required a low back bra. It is not all that forgiving so get the right size (it runs true to size). The color is copper and gray. I got LOTS of compliments. Loved this. Will rent from this designer again!
This dress was great and fit like a glove. I didn't love the length but everything else about it was superb. Slightly low v in the back. Easy to wear without a bra.
I received a ton of compliments all evening! I loved this dress. It was too big...may not look like it but it was, especially in top half of the dress, but it was still pretty. It is a little heavy.

links_reviews_title: This was a Masquerade Ball 40th Birthday Party - this dress was PERFECT - I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This fit a little loose, but nothing to worry about. I am in between sizes so I was glad I went safe rather than sorry. Despite this being a fully sequined dress, the stretchy inner layer of the dress made this SO comfortable and SO easy to move in. I danced for 2+ hours straight with no issues. Can't say enough good things about it & my 1st RTR experience.
Amazing amazing amazing!

It was a great dress. A LOT of give, so the sizing was pretty easy. It was a fun dress to wear without incurring the possible buyers remorse of a highly sequined dress. Lots of compliments-- both from men and women.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super sexy and fun for a festive party!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It is sexy with the fit, low back, and fun pattern. However it is thick enough to hide flaws and is not too revealing with the long sleeves and below the knee. I am 5'8, 130 lb, normally size small/ 26.
I usually wear a Medium but decided to size down after reading the prior reviews. The dress hugged my curves nicely without being too sexy. I received many compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: I received compliments on this dress the entire night!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was very comfortable, I was able to have dinner and still feel like I had plenty of room to move. The back was low but not too low, I was still able to wear a bra without it being seen. People were coming up to me all night asking to rub the sequence because it was sparkly and fun. You can not go wrong with this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Received TONS of compliments on this dress. Definitely a show stopper. Super comfortable and warm!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly for a form fitting dress. Obviously wore spanx underneath to keep everything smooth. My regular strapless bra was low enough in the back- did not need anything special.
Fit was amazing, quality of material was very nice!
Sequins is having a moment. It was fun to be part of that trend.

links_reviews_title: This dress is GREAT for maternity wear
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! It fits great, true to size. Gives enough space for movement and the sequins does not rub against the skin, that's VERY important

links_reviews_title: Best dressed for Work Cocktail party!
links_reviews_text: gorgeous dress! Fit beautifully. Sexy, but modest enough for a work cocktail party. Everyone was raving about it and commenting on it. I really stood out

This dress was a showstopper! I wore it to the magic castle in la on a cool winter night in a cold venue. I ate a huge dinner, watched a lot of magic and was comfortable the entire night. It does run a little big. I usually rent an can with small as back up. The small was very flattering and draped well, but due to the modest cut could have been a little more body hugging. Order a size smaller than usual. Will definitely rent again! Don't need many accessories as this dress is a one and done!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for my girlfriends 30th birthday party and it was a complete HIT!!!! So comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about it!! It was a stretchy material and fit amazing! I literally felt so comfortable in it!!

This dress was gorgeous and very comfortable. I got non-stop compliments from men and women. I felt like the belle of the ball. I wore this to two different events (in two cites with different people so no one knew I wore the same thing twice). The back is low so I went without a bra. Since the dress is body-hugging I didn't need a bra. The sequins tend to flip up and don't all easily flip down so it can look like some are missing. You have to individually flip them back. Not a big issue though. It's warm so great for cooler weather.

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of hot for a work gala
links_reviews_text: Really elegant and made me feel great. It is very tight, so I swapped out the slip for one with some compression.

links_reviews_title: Versatile dress that catches all the lights in the best way
links_reviews_text: Would have been a 5 star review if the dress would have come with the slip dress underneath as shown, but all I received was the beaded outer layer. Still, not even a less than functional dress could make me leave a bad review bc the dress is just that great. I put a lot of different options that I already owned underneath and had a hard time choosing. Ultimately went with a pencil skirt and bralette and gots tons of compliments. The beads/sequins photograph exceptionally well!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a NYE party!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress!!! Whoever wore it before me unfortunately did not return the black slip that it comes with. However I saw pictures in the reviews of someone else that wore it with a bra and biker shorts instead, so that's what I did and I LOVED it! I got so many compliments all night. It is so flattering - it totally made it look like I have a flat stomach and I definitely don't! Rent this dress!!!

Loved this!! Appears more black than silver like the model's photo. I wore a silver and black shoe but a nude or black would be fine as well. I felt gorgeous in this and was able to wear preferred shape wear without lines. My only area of caution would be that the garment is thin despite being long. I would advise a coat or full toed shoe if wearing in a colder climate.
I rented this for my friend's black tie wedding. It felt great and leaves you free to move around. I love this dress!

I ordered this dress for a Gala I attended last Friday and I was not disappointed! The dress fit perfectly. I'm a size 12 and ordered this dress in a large based on other reviews. The dress was super comfortable and stretchy and I received tons of compliments on it.
I wore this to a lady Gaga concert so I opted out of the black slip that came with it and just wore it over my bra and biker shorts. It was flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Afterparty dress while in LA at the 50th NAACP Image Awards
links_reviews_text: The dress was absolutely amazing! I was expecting it to be tight and uncomfortable. It had great give and was perfect for dancing! I'd definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and durable party dress
links_reviews_text: I actually ordered this dress from Nordstrom for my 40th birthday, but when looking for fit reviews I found it on RTR and decided that I would return the one I purchased and rent instead since I wasn't sure if I would ever wear again. I loved this dress so much I'm thinking of reordering the Nordstrom one. It's a easy fit throughout (plenty of arm room) and some spanx tights kept everything smooth under.
Got fabulous comments

This dress is beautiful BUT you will only receive the mesh piece. I missed this in the previous reviews. You will need your own dress liner or under garment. I wore a black liner and it looked beautiful. The dress catches the light and the color is perfect to dress up. It's a little long as I am 5'1 but when heels it worked.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to an event and I loved it! I got quite a few compliments on it as well.
links_reviews_text: It fit well, plenty of room in the arms and looks like the picture.
It was highly complimented and because the slip is sheer it kept me cool all night at the hot party.

I wore this dress to a formal x-mas party and it was a total hit! I received so many complaints and it was super comfortable. I think the overall fit was a little large. I ordered and medium and a large for back up because I'm 6.5 months pregnant and wasn't sure how much "give" the dress would have - I definitely could have worn a small (I typically wear size 2-6 depending on the brand and style).

Just for clarity, my sister actually wore this dress, not me. She is about 5'0", 100lbs soaking wet, and wears a 34B or C. We were debating between the XS and the S, and I am glad she wore the S. It fit perfectly! It comes in two pieces, the black slip and the metallic/sequin shell. It was comfortable and cute for our trip to Vegas. It definitely was longer on her than on the model since she barely clears 5 feet tall, so if you are on the shorter side, just know it will just be a little closer to ankle length or a tea length instead of just-past-knee-length like it looks in the photo.
Great, dress just runs small

links_reviews_title: Perfect fun dress for a birthday party
links_reviews_text: I am 118 lb, 5‚Äô3‚Äù, usually a size 2 (waist 26). The dress fitted well. I was expecting it to be more silver color but it was darker. The sequin outer layer did not really fall around the slip but rather adhered to the slip due to static. I was happy how light the dress was. Many sequin dresses tend to be heavy.

This dress fits true to form. Hugs in the right places; however, it is a two piece and rises when you walk because of the first piece. The sequins also gets stuck to the first piece so you have to be mindful of that. Nice dress overall.
Really cute dress made of high quality material. It unfortunately ran much larger than I expected. If you want a bodycon style fit I would recommend picking a size at least one size lower than usual.

This was my backup dress and ended up being perfect for my fundraiser event. I received lots of compliments and loved everything about it! The dress itself was soft and very movable - stretchy but didn't stretch out (also doesn't hold you in) for climbing up and down stage stairs, dancing and sitting through dinner. I wore a spanx slip instead of the slip dress that came with it - kept things in place much better and didn't move around like the slip dress did when I was wandering around my house while trying it on. Bonus - limited jewelry needed! I always forget to take pictures. But it was about midi-length on my 5'10" frame.

links_reviews_title: Super lightweight so great for a humid-af Florida wedding
links_reviews_text: There are two separate dresses - the sparkle overlay and the slip liner, just FYI. Fit well, had some stretch. I am a tall L-XL and the large was plenty big.

This dress is lovely, but it just isn't practical. It is 2 pieces, the slip and the sequin overlay. If the 2 dresses were attached, it would be SO much better. The sequins kept getting caught on the slip dress and it kept riding up and the chest kept moving over and getting twisted. I was always pulling or adjusting all night.
I received many compliments on the dress and also felt very comfortable. The slip dress underneath is stretchy and soft. I was able to wear a standard black bra with it.

This dress looked different in person than it photographs. I thought it would be more shimmery, but the sequins are much bolder than they look in photos. It's clearly pretty well made but it's scratchy and just wasn't the look I was hoping for.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a Gatsby themed auction and it was great!
links_reviews_text: So comfortable, so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress was very fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great!! It has stretch which made it comfortable and very flattering.
Not at all uncomfortable like the others said, but it's not pajamas either.

This dress was so itchy, the sequin is on on a very thin material so you can completely feel the sewing and the bottom of the sequin scrape against your skin. I tried it on and could stand being in it for a minute...needless to say I did not wear it for NYE and had to wear something I already owned. What a waste!
Not the most attesting first my body type s the ruffles didn't hang off me like they do the model. This was my second time renting it. I think it's just not for my busty body type. It was okay.
I loved this romper such a statement piece. If you're tall do not expect it to fall To your ankle. And I didn't like what it did on the scrotch. Overhall nice fit.

This jumpsuit was Boss!! It hugged the right curves just enough. I felt confident and comfortable but also loved that it was a little EXTRA with the couture-ish ruffles. However, not over the top. PERFECTION!

links_reviews_title: I love this jumpsuit!! I will rent again and maybe buy!
links_reviews_text: Wow! This was an awesome jumpsuit. Compliments from everyone. I loved that it was a thick and substantial fabric- White it was snug it didn't feel thin or too clingy. I'm a 4 - 125 lbs and 5'4"- and this was completely true to size. I wore to a charity lunch and was comfy and confident.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the night you *can't* wear a dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this. The top was a little overwhelming with my smaller upper Body frame, but pulling my hair into an up-do really balanced it out. Length was still crop but a little longer on me than the model at 5"4'. Modest enough for a work gala but edgy enough to turn heads. Comfortable. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Formal Elegance with a Bit of Sass to Standout
links_reviews_text: I'm big busted, straight waisted and small hipped and I loved how slender and fashion forward this jumpsuit was. My sister also tried on and she's small waisted with an ample booty and it looked hot on her as well. I don't think you can go wrong with this stunner. I post on my @lemon_and_gold about the awards event I wore it to, as well.

Love the frilly ruffles on the front!! Such a girly touch to an ordinary black romper. I wore it to a baby shower reveal party and got several compliments from the moms. Love the pockets too! The zipper on the back was ok, but I definitely needed help zipping/unzipping but nbd! I will definitely rent this one again!!

links_reviews_title: Fun twist added to a traditional black jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: The details on the sleeves and shoulders make this anything but your average jumpsuit. Fit true to size and, unlike a lot of jumpsuits, this was fairly easy to zip up on your own. I wore this out to dinner with friends, and paired it leopard kitten heels, because it's cold right now. However, you could also easily turn this into an outfit for any season, with a change of heels and different jewelry.

links_reviews_title: Sophisticated, sexy, warm and not too revealing
links_reviews_text: I really liked this jumpsuit. Thick comfortable fabric, great for a party in winter. Very easy to wear, not revealing but still sexy. Thumbs up
Easy to wear jumpsuit. Thick material that is very flattering. Had so many complements.

LOVED this jumpsuit! I got lots of compliments -- it's unique and fashion-forward. It's relatively well-constructed, and the fabric is thick and stretchy. This particular jumpsuit had a small hole on the waist above the pocket, but no one noticed. My torso is long, so suit was a little uncomfortable when sitting for long periods of time, but standing was totally fine. Would definitely rent again!
Fits small, but some stretch

Wore to a cocktail attire wedding and it was a hit. The shape was very flattering and the ruffles added a little fun! It was very comfortable and easy to move and dance in! The zipper would sometimes stick but nothing my 8 year old niece couldn't manage. Will absolutely rent this jumpsuit again!
Very comfortable and flattering, even for us busty girls.

links_reviews_title: This is the first holiday outfit I've worn that looks amazing, is comfortable, and has pockets!
links_reviews_text: The material is very soft and moves well. Love the pockets!
Perfect. Was a little thick, but good in cold weather. I wore a cape coat that worked well.
I wore this out for a night in Vegas. It fit like a glove and was extremely flattering. I would absolutely rent again!

Rent this jumpsuit. You will not regret it. It is thick, luxe material that doesn't wrinkle and looks super elegant. I just rented it for the second time and all my friends say I need to buy it because it's so flattering.

The fit is definitely true to size but it is a heavy fabric the stretches and holds you in in the right places. Of course as a jumper you may need help zipping and unzipping in order to use the bathroom but besides that this is so flattering to wear. I would definitely rent again.

This jumpsuit looks amazing!! I felt like a rockstar wearing it! But a zipper on the back was very hard to close. I had my husband close for me and there is no way I could do it on my own in public bathroom. This made the jumpsuit extremely not practical, which is a shame because it's beautiful

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable - Dress up or Down!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my political fundraiser and received compliments. I sized up due to the reviews. I have an hourglass shape and it fit well. May be difficult to to to the bathroom by yourself since the zipper is in the back and hard to do yourself. This was cute enough to dress up or down. Thick material (my husband and I dubbed it the "scuba suit") but it hides lumps and bumps with having to wear undergarments like spanx.

This jumper fit like a dream! I wore to a formal wedding and it was nice to stand out in a sea of dresses. It was super comfortable, I wore my regular undergarments (regular bra and no-line panties); no need for Spanx. It was comfortable to dance in. The butt area was a little tight when I sat in but I have ample bootie (shaped me really nice in the back). Hubby loved it & kept telling me so all night!! My only complaints are that it smelled of perfume and the back of the jumper (at the top area where the zipper ended) was very worn. The designer tag fell off the jumper when I took it out the garment bag. Going to the bathroom was no easy task but I asked hubby to wait outside ladies room so he could unzip and zip me up afterwards. Other than that, it was a HUGE hit! So much so, I‚Äôd purchase if I could find it new.

This jumpsuit fits like a dream! Thicker material, very flattering and comfortable. I dress up for work but this may be a bit too much for every day; the ruffles at the neckline are definitely a statement piece! I will wear this with an updo and an outrageous heel to a formal event, party or date night. One odd comment, when I received the garment it smelled very heavily of perfume; usually I smell only a faint dry-cleaning aroma but this was too much to even put in my closet without filling my whole bedroom with a strong scent. Just thought I would mention because I've had multiple rentals and this is the first I've experienced that...not suggesting that it's the jumpsuit itself (obviously:))

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and I felt amazing in this!
links_reviews_text: I went with the reviews and sized up one size and it fit perfect! I'm 5'3 and 115 pounds.

I love jumpers and this look is one of my absolute favorites! Rented to attend a fashion show. Comfortable material with some stretch. I would say it runs about a size small so rent a size up; however that makes the pants long.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my birthday and felt like a million bucks.
links_reviews_text: Good qualty, form fitting piece that was forgiving after my meal : )

I love a good jumpsuit & this one did not disappoint!! The ruffles are very fun, unique & do not overwhelm your face. The fit is flattering & the fabric is heavy but has a nice stretch to it. Love the pockets & tapered leg!! Its a bit of a challenge to zip up alone in ghe restroom, but with a few twists it can be done. Overall I HIGHLY recommend and would very likey rent again!! One thing.... not for a larger chest, it runs just a bit small in the top!
this was a hit! so cute and chic. very comfortable and versatile.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous ruffle jumper and it's COMFORTABLE!
links_reviews_text: This one ran small as i recall but i ordered according to what the other reviews suggested and it was perfect even in the rise. Now i am not very large in tbe bottom and it was NOT form fitted in this size, but i thought it looked perfect on my waist without looking baggy in the butt and plenty of room to move and breath throughout. My bust is 36C and the top fit great. I love the ankle crop--helps show off the shoe too :) you really HAVE TO rent this!
This would've gotten 5 stars if it didn't take 20 min for me to pull up the zipper. Ugh. Otherwise, I got plenty of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Can wear a real bra...enough said
links_reviews_text: So this fit really well - nipped in at the waist but not too tight, substantial fabric that kept it's shape, and flattering cut. Only thing I'd say is that the ruffles were floppier/not as fluffy as the picture, and obviously any time you have to pee you're practically getting naked. However, the zipper on this thing also has a pretty good tab thingie so that wasn't as tragic as it could be.
Cool jumpsuit, but runs very small. I sized up by two sizes and it still wasn't the most comfortable.

Wore this ditty to a woman's brunch to honor professionals. It was a hit! This jumpsuit was a great funky twist amidst the sea of skirts, dresses, and suits. Fits a little snug but not too tight. Another size would have been too big. It worked! Material was heavy enough to hide body ripples. I wore a tummy minimizer just for good measure.

This was such a fun outfit to wear to my formal event! It fit just right, with a little help from shape wear. The fit from the crotch to shoulders was stretched to the max. I can imagine if one has a longer torso, that it would be very uncomfortable. I am currently 140lbs and 5' 3/4in tall. I usually wear a size 6, so I ordered the 6 (42) and 8 (44). The 44 was really gaping in the lower abdomen region. I would definitely order your normal size and then one size up! I rolled the cuffs up once to get the look that I saw on the model, plus I wanted my shoes to show more since they initially looked blended together. I ran out of time to put my hair up, since it competed for space with the ruffles. Overall, I got a lot of compliments and it was a fun change up from a LBD!

Fashion-forward jumpsuit; super fun to wear. Runs a bit on the small side; it will depend on your body type and height...I am 5'3", curvy with a small waist. Was able to fit into my regular size 4 with no room left. If you are tall you may also need to size up due to the torso length. Overall a different piece that will make you standout for the day!

Definite statement piece! This jumpsuit is nothing like I‚Äôve ever seen before. I honestly love ruffles and over the top pieces; and this is entirely that. If you want to turn heads, please turn to this awesome jumpsuit. It runs small, so definitely size up. The jumpsuit is super stretchy, but overall a fitted garment. It works best for cups A through C and is perfect for all body types. Since the ruffles are the main focus for this jumpsuit, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend over accessorizing with it. A necklace isn‚Äôt needed obviously, but it would look super cute with a choker; or you can make either your earrings or your bracelet a statement piece with a dash of color and you're all set. I definitely recommend this for a formal affair!
I was disappointed the sizing was too small and tight around legs and etc. I recommend going up a size or two.
This jumpsuit travels well, and gives an instant polished look when in a hurry.

Beautiful outfit. The fit was perfect and the ruffles make a beautiful statement. The material is a thick woven fabric so there is no need to added under garments. Since the material is so thick, I would not recommend wearing this outfit in extreme heat during the day. I will be renting this outfit again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the ruffles and the fit!
links_reviews_text: A great fit, classic look, love this!
I think this top is the perfect amount of sheer. Can be worn with an undershirt but is also cute with a nice bra/Bralette underneath. Great cropped length too, not too short and super flattering.

Absolutely beautiful, holding onto this one for awhile. Ordered an 8 because they didn't have a 6 available and it fit fine. It is a bit cropped so definitely need to wear with high waisted pants. Love this designer! Great for a date night or a night out. It is a bit sheer so you can wear with a black cami under but I didn't feel it was necessary.

Loved this top. Perfect for a date night. I ended up putting on a black bodysuit underneath as it is completely see through. Ran true to size. Can ride up some but with high waisted pants and the body suit I wasn't concerned.

links_reviews_title: Good either in warm or breezy climate
links_reviews_text: I wore it in San Antonio TX, and i didnt have any sweats in it. It's flattering and cute. It will be prettier with bigger boobs but wouldnt matter anyway. Try to wear with some high waisted because this shirt is semi short
I wore this too multiple times before I sent it back and I would rent again. It's beautiful!
Receive lots of compliments... from friends, strangers and even from photos posted in social media.
Beautiful blouse.. Love this designer.
I love this top. It is so comfortable and I wore it out with black shorts and I also wore it to work with black pants. Def will rent again
I wore this a few times, but it wasn't my fave. It was a by too short and I wasn't really a fan of the front bow
Super comfortable, slightly see through. Overall it's great for every day, office or date night .

I loved this top. I rented it for either going out to dinner or work, I ended up wearing to work. The fit is so flattering and the top is so comfy. I chose to wear a tank underneath because i wore it to work but just a black bra would be really cute!
This shirt is gorgeous, wore it to a birthday party and received a ton of compliments, plus it fit like a glove!!! Love love love it!

links_reviews_title: So fun for a date night!
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun shirt to wear... Wore on a date and to work with a high waisted skirt. I'm a size 6 and it fit perfectly

This came to me with new tags on it! So great when that happens. I had so much fun with this blouse. It is sheer but not completely see through. I went with only a black bra if going out to dinner but would wear a cami for daytime or when I wanted to be more conservative. It is short in front so your middle will show unless you wear a high waisted pant or skirt. I liked the sleeves for cooler temps but didn't feel frumpy.
Loved this shirt, wore it twice and received numerous compliments. Super cute!

links_reviews_title: Wore it 3 Days in a Row LOL
links_reviews_text: Although I'm 6 ft tall and this was a smidge shorter than I imagined it would be (I knew it was a crop fit as opposed to a tunic length fit) I still LOVED it. And yes, I did wear it three days in a row. Haha That's how much I loved it!!! Full disclosure each wear was only about an hour long to very different types of events so it worked. I wore it with jeans, a pencil skirt and wide leg trousers. So much versatility. I'll be renting this again and possibly buying it.

links_reviews_title: Cute top and ready to impress
links_reviews_text: Lovely top that I wore one day with a tank for work and another day I wore just a bralette underneath. Got completed on microphone in front a large group of women about how cute my top was. It's a winner!
This sheer top is adorable! It hits right at belly button level and the tie adds so much character. I wore a nude cami under and it was perfect. Runs true to size. Hated to return it.
the long tie, sheer material and short crop might throw you. But, throw in a black camisole/tank, and it's easy to wear! wouldn't recommend for work, but pretty much everywhere else :-)
This is my favorite shirt I've ever worn. I'm absolutely in love. I had to have it. I'm thick and crop tops can be intimidating, but not this one. So cute, so unique. My new favorite piece

links_reviews_title: Top was very comfortable and pretty
links_reviews_text: could have gone one size smaller but my regular size did fit. It is very sheer and looks elegant on.

links_reviews_title: Fits great. you can dress to up or down.
links_reviews_text: it is a crop top but I loved not with high waisted pants.
Runs small. Must be worn with high rise. Unless you want to show your belly.
The shirt is very flattering. Great for a night out!
Loved this top! Super cute and feminine!
This is a bit short, so I wore with a high waisted pair of jeans for work. Fun top that has an easy fit and comfortable yet stylish.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this top! I don't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: Everything is perfect about this top! Love the fabric, the fit, the look! Super flattering!

links_reviews_title: I loved this blouse and wore it out on a date night with my husband. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This is a great date night blouse. It was flattering and the tie in the front didn't hang down as far as it showed in the picture which I appreciated.

I wasn't sure at first about this top but within minutes, I received several compliments. It is not too cropped but some midriff definitely shows. I paired this with high-waisted black jeans and loved it. The tie in the front is pretty long but that didn't bother me too much. The elastic around the wrists is a little tight but over time, I got used to it. I would definitely rent again if not purchase!

This is the perfect top. I initially rented it to wear to work. I did (wore a body suit underneath) and received so many compliments. I also wore it for a night out with a bralette underneath. Will definitely rent again!
Great fit...true to size
The top is super cute and I hoped but going a bit bigger than I usually wear it might be bit longer. This was not the case and even with my high waisted pants it was just too short for me at 5'9"
I had to wear high waisted pants to wear this shirt, however I still would of liked it a little bit longer. Other than that I absolutely loved this top!

I love this crop top! So classy and chic. The neck part has a loose elastic ribbing so you just pull it over your head. A beautiful bra with the sheer top would be great for a date. Non-stretch fabric.

links_reviews_title: Excellent fit and very sexy. I paired this top with dark denim, black booties and black bra.
links_reviews_text: Falls right at lower abdomen. Fits well!
It‚Äôs sheer so you might need a camisole
Love this top. Wore a cropped tank underneath. Very feminine and pretty. Runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, and VERY flattering. Can easily dress it down or up
links_reviews_text: It is flattering for both work, and date nights. It is a slight belly shirt, and is see through, so those can be a bit of a hindrance for the office.

I wore this with a tank under and high-rise pants for work, then with a brallete for a night out. Everyone had something to say about it. Sheer and light, so comfy even in warmer temps. The elastic parts around the arm and neck were comfortable... I didn't experience any discomfort or annoyance at all. Great piece!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but not for Apple Shapes
links_reviews_text: Lovely high quality blouse. Wanted it to work, tried 3 different times with 3 different bottoms. Just didn't do anything for my large bust apple shape. Took a chance when I ordered via my unlimited and this is why I love RTR! Get to try shapes and styles and send it right back!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so unique and perfect for a Miami wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so unique looking and has so many details that you can't see from a photograph. It's super flattering and shows off your curves nicely. I absolutely loved it!

Color popped amongst a sea of black dresses. At 5'9" it hit a few inches above the ankle which was perfect for a black tie fall wedding. I'm typically a 6 top and 8 bottom and the size 8 dress fit true to size (a bit large up top as expected). I was surprised at the amount of stretch throughout the waist and legs which made it comfortable to sit and dance. The peplum ruffle is silky, a beautiful contrast to the lace. My only complaint was the short length of the rushed bust area.
I loved the way this fit and looked. Not your run-of-the-mill LBD. Great way to make a statement while still looking elegant.
Pretty color, easy to match shoes and accessories

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful affair with lovely decor.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I was worried that it was strapless and when I danced that the top would not stay on. None of which happened. I received many compliments including from my husband.

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable, flirty and fun to dance in the whole night.
links_reviews_text: It fit well and I was able to wear it without a bra. It has good structure and is very flattering. I am a size 2 and it fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: Color is more vibrant in person but still beautiful
links_reviews_text: Fit TTS and like a glove. I wore my TTS Dress size and it was perfect- didn't even need to wear a bra. I received so many compliments- you must rent this!

What I really loved about about this dress were the different textures. The top is a Sleek Fabric and then the bottom has like a lace overlay. The different textures were not obvious based on the model photographs. Also note that the color of the dress is a purple plum-- took this photo in the sun to show how purple it really is. Additionally, the peplum is very flattering for an hourglass figure. This dress perfectly hid a little postpartum "pooch" that I still have going on. This dress is not very stretchy but hugs your curves nevertheless!

Runs small, so I sized up. Wore this dress to a wedding and loved it! The color and the detail of the fabric are really pretty! The top around the chest is a little uncomfortable because it has wiring to keep it up, but that's how most strapless are. Very flattering if you want to hide midsection.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my quarantine at home photo shoot

links_reviews_text: Rented this for a barbecue which was canceled but no worries because the cut outs have buttons and are OPTIONAL! my mom said it looked like two tablecloths but I loved it. Snug at the bust and wider at the hips though.
Super cool dress!! I wore this to work and then opened the side cutout buttons for after work. Great summer dress. I received so many compliments in this. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I would marry this dress if I could!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a western birthday party and felt so confident! So many compliments
Fits great! Got so many compliments on this very different look!

Such a fun dress!!! Wore for my birthday party and got tons of compliments. The cutout is optional but made the otherwise bulky silhouette of the dress so flattering. I felt amazing and could eat, drink and frolic the evening away. Will definitely rent again
Love, love, love!!!!! So many compliments, so flattering, so comfy, so chic.
probably need to be on the taller side to pull this off, but its an amazing dress with the colors are very vibrant

I'm obsessed with this dress! The fit is great and comfortable, it falls beautifully, and you can chose to tie or untie as many buttons as you want at the waist (if your event is a bit more formal). It's super easy to dress up or down. Perfect!

links_reviews_title: Arrived damaged and more casual than expected
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately this arrived with multiple buttons damaged, so I was unable to wear. I did try it in anyway, and it fit true to size. I was surprised by how casual it seemed, with or without the cutout. The quality didn't seem as nice as I expected.
Wore it to my cousin's graduation. Super comfy. Can be dressed up or dressed down. Really unique cutting. Love it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous patterns and layers. Absolutely a standout piece!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit - super flattering and slim fitting yet not too tight at all and felt loose and airy on the body. Loved the beautiful layers and how you can button and unbutton where you like to play with the structure of the dress

Cute dress. Got so many compliments throughout the day. Dress is TTS and have no stretch. My only complaint is that once you button all the buttons up, it have like this weird gathering on the front and makes me look like I have a big pooch. Very cute when worn like as picture.

Seriously I have already looked online to purchase my own. It fit so well, but runs small. I sized up 2 sizes from my normal dress size. Also ordered a long... I'm 5'6" and was planning to wear heels-the long just hit my toes. I received so many complements!
Great fit. Note however, if you have curves, be prepared to turn heads.

Loved it! Wore it to a formal wedding. Runs a little small but it's form fitting so it was expected. Had some trouble with the zipper near the seam and needed my boyfriend to help me, he had some trouble with it too but with some patience and prayers he did it and I didn't need to use my back up dress. Was able to dance all night and stay comfortable, felt very classy in it. Would rent again 100% but maybe use spanx next time...after a couple cocktails the dress got tighter :)

links_reviews_title: This dress truly fit like it was made for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I got so many compliments in this dress and the detailing in the back was perfect. I am 5'2, so I was a little worried about getting a size 2R dress, but the height was perfect for 2in heals. No cons.

links_reviews_title: The draped back makes this dress a knockout!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress and I didn't wear it for the event, but I would have in a heartbeat if I didn't love my first choice just as much. It hugged everything beautifully and held you in snugly. The back was stunning. I have huge boobs and I still felt secure in this dress with a flimsy open back bra. Classy and gorgeous. Perfect for a curvy hourglass figure. Definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable even though it fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: The back of the dress is so classic and glamorous. I rented a 6L and I'm glad I got the Long. I'm 5'7" and the length was perfect with 3 inch heels. I didn't need a bra even though I'm a 34 DD. I felt comfortable and the dress hugged my curves perfectly.
The dress fit great! I could not zip the dress by myself though. It was comfortable and easy to wear. It must run short on length because it was perfect for me and I am only 5'2".

I ordered an 8 and a 10 and I could've worn either. The dress fit great the only issue is if you're getting dressed alone the zipper is hard to do with your arm at that angle. It gets struck near the seams, you really need someone else to do it for you unless your double jointed. I wore this dress for 15 hours & it held up! The slip is hard to get in place when you put the dress on but when it's on right it stays in place which is great! wear spanx underneath since you can see an underwear line

links_reviews_title: Amazing Dress! Fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous when I first received the dress. I definitely needed the larger of the two sizes and it hugged right at the tummy but with the right hosiery, this dress was perfect! It was so comfortable and looked terrific all night. I received many compliments and felt great whether kneeling at church or dancing at the reception. I would definitely recommend for a formal affair/cocktail attire wedding. I can't wait to rent from Rent the Runway again.
Loved this! Got so many compliments. Sized up one from my usual.
The size 8 fit me a little better than the 6. This dress is stunning and the reviews about the material being thicker are true. This dress was Amazing and got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved my dress and I felt amazing in it
links_reviews_text: True to size. Perfect for my 5"2 height. Stretchy and fit like a glove. Zipper on the side. Wore this for the Marine Corps Ball. I felt like a princess in it. I would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, elegant gown for a Marine Corps Ball
links_reviews_text: This dress was stunning! The material is great. It was soft/stretchable yet thick enough that I didn't worry about my stomach being too bloated after eating. It was form fitting white still giving an elegant look. I received compliments on the dress all night. The only "con" was that I had to keep tucking in the straps for the hanger under the dress's straps. It kept popping out throughout the night but that's nothing that a bit of fabric tape could fix for future wearers.

I'm 5'10", apple shape with 38-C bust. I carry extra weight in my belly and normally wear size 12 tall jeans. The 14L was too tight in my lower abdomen and just brushed the tops of my feet without shoes on. I loved this dress, but chose to wear my backup because it was too small. I would rent again in a bigger size. My advice is to order two sizes larger than your jeans size. It's a clingy dress but gorgeous!

I would give it more of a 4.5 stars. The dress material was thicker which was nice to hide imperfections and very form fitting. I wear a between sizes 12/14 dress and I am glad I listed to reviews. I could have gotten away with the 14 but the 16 fit better. Also it runs short! I am 5'10" and even with the long it barely came to the top of my feet without shoes. I did not wear a bra, but the top was snug enough I didn't need to.

links_reviews_title: The complements I received and the fact I didn't have to search for ever for the perfect dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 152 and usually wear a size 9 pant. This dress fit perfect, though was too short to wear with any heels. I chose to wear a very short heel due to the length. If you plan to wear any height I would order the longer version.

This was a back up, but once I tried it on I had to wear it. Incredibly flattering, I felt amazing and received a ton of compliments. It does run short and small. I'm typically a 4R. I wore a 6L and it was still snug, but it fit. The long grazed the floor perfectly; I'm 5'5" and wore 3 inch heels.

Really loved this dress! It fit snuggly but also had enough stretch to be comfortable. The low back and high neck was really gorgeous. However, it is quite tight at the bottom making it challenging to go upstairs and dance but still loved the dress regardless. I'm 5'6" 138lbs and received a size 4 and 6. They both fit. I ended up wearing the size 4 which was a little bit more snug but the size 6 came slightly damaged with a few holes so I didn't want to chance wearing it. RTR's customer service was great about the damaged item.

Loved this dress. I wore it to a black tie wedding. It was my first RTR experience and it was great. I highly recommend looking at reviews of dresses by women with your body type of you are worried about fit. I am 5'3" and 110 lbs. the 2R fit perfectly. The gown was form fitting but was pretty stretchy and very comfortable. The fabric was thick enough to not wear a bra, but somehow still breathable. I loved the drapey cowl back but don't have any pictures. The length was just right for me and I had about 3 in heels. The 4R has a similar fit but was bigger around the chest so I sized down since I have a smaller chest (32B).

links_reviews_title: The back of the dress is perfection
links_reviews_text: I just barely made it into this dress, with my husband‚Äôs help zipping me in. But a larger size would have been too big. Once i was in it, it looked great. Couldn‚Äôt eat too much! But everyone loved it.

This dress is just perfect. It runs true to size. I typically wear a size 2 dress, but this was only available in a 4, which fit but was slightly too big. Be mindful, the long is LONG. If you‚Äôre not planning to wear heels, reconsider. So many compliments. Can‚Äôt wait to rent it again

I'm 5'2 and I was afraid the dress would be dragging but as you can see from the picture, it was the perfect length. I normally wear size 2 or 4. Size 2 was way too tight and 4 fit just right.
