It is a tight fit to the body. Received many compliments on the dress and felt comfortable throughout the event. This was my first experience with RTR and I will definitely use them again for special occasions.

links_reviews_title: Runs small, cling fabric, didn‚Äôt end up wearing - not good for pear shaped
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 8R or 8L, but sized up to a 10R based on customer reviews. It was still really clingy and unflattering on me. I ended up not wearing this dress for the event because the other style was way more flattering. I do not recommend it for someone pear shaped. If you do order it, make sure to order a size or two up from your regular size! Perhaps it could be way better on a more straight body type. Length was good and the style is beautiful - just not on me!

links_reviews_title: Great choice for any formal event
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, it's very form flattering. The material is thick and stretchy with a left side zipper. I ordered a size up, I'm glad I read the reviews. The would recommend this dress to anyone.

I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and it was a great choice. The material is thick and smoothing, with stretch to keep it really comfortable. The silhouette is very classy and regal. I loved the higher neckline in combination with the low back. It is fitted through the hips and butt, so size accordingly and be aware if you are very pear-shaped. I am 5‚Äô7‚Äù and I wore 1.5‚Äù heels and the length was perfect with the long. I was worried about Long v. Regular length because I don‚Äôt like very high heels, so if you wear them high, you will definitely need the Long. These phots are from a try on session, because I forgot to take a full length shot at the wedding!
I loved this dress so much, it fit perfectly and was classic looking.
Fits snug, but the material is flexible so I was able to move all night! I loved it!
Runs small. I usually wear between and 8/10. I had to order a 12L. However, with the correct size this dress fits beautifully.
Gorgeous dress, got many compliments on it. Had to keep a small stride while walking, but otherwise, it was awesome! Got a size zero, I wear size 25 jeans, 32D bra and fit perfect.
This is the most beautiful dress I have ever worn -- however it runs VERY small. I usually wear a sz 0, this dress in 0 I could not get past my waist.

I loved how this dress fit me! It was forgiving enough and thick material which is perfect for colder weather. I liked how the back was unique, yet the dress was still classy for a military ball. I had a baby 6 months ago and used a spanx slip to smooth out the lines and baby bump, but it bunched a bit under my chest sometimes where I had to pull it down. I was able to wear a strapless bra that clasped lower than the back cowl neck. I do think it runs small where I am between a 6 and 8 now, but getting an 8R this dress was snug and I could have probably worn a 10.

links_reviews_title: Loves this dress - back was very pretty!
links_reviews_text: Normally I'm an 8 but the 10 fit perfectly so I would say this dress definitely runs small. It hugs your curves with a bit of stretch for a comfortable fit. I'm 5'8 1/2" and the long was just barely long enough. I would have preferred the dress to be grazing the ground with heels but it was a couple inches off the ground with my shoes. Still a very pretty, flattering gown.
This dress was incredibly comfortable and I got so many complements! I'm 5'5" and had to wear shorter heels as the length was a little short. Otherwise, great dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black tie event and it was perfect. I felt elegant and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: NOTES: I am pretty short (5 ft.) so the R ran long for me. I wore heals and the dress covered them just fine. I am B cup and the dress was a bit loose in that area. I will note that I did not wear a bra because you can see the bra in the open back. It also was quite restricting to walk in. HIGHLIGHTS: The neckline/down the open back stayed put the entire night and I did not have to worry about the dress slipping off. Overall I loved the dress and would rent again!

Comfortable, stretchy, holds you in up top a bit so no problem wearing sans bra for small/med girls. I would say runs a little short for my height doesn't quite go to the floor but almost. The size 8 was longer but was too loose for me. Definitely hugs curves and shows off your booty! For reference I'm about 5ft 5-6 in and about 135-140 lbs wear a 34c bra and wore the size 6R.
I typically wear a 4, but the 6 fit perfectly. It fit perfectly snug, yet the material has some stretch if needed. It is a beautiful dress and very classy.
I'm shorter and was worried about the length but it worked great with a little platform heel. Material hugged my body perfectly and was very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Love the cowl back!! Long was still too short
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a black tie gala. Simple but with a little jewelry and that cowl back I felt like a million bucks. I rented the 8L and the 10L. The 8L fit snug, but as I'm not usually the type to wear form fitting clothes I felt much more comfortable in the 10L. Unfortunately the 10L was too short for me and the dress rode up a bit as I walked making it even shorter. The event was a car show charity event which involved a lot of walking and getting in and out of cars. I didn't feel constrained with any of the movement, but I did find myself trying to pull the dress back down often (gave up towards the end of the night). Overall, it was a really nice dress, but I'm not sure if I'd rent it again just because of the length. Can we get some extra longs please??

links_reviews_title: Comfortable to dance in and move around all night while never losing its shape
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Thick, stretchy material felt like it really hugged me and held me in while still being comfortable enough to sit, move around and dance all night. It's a classic, elegant and sexy dress for any formal event. Received so many compliments! I wore a size 10R and am normally a size 6 in pants. I'm 5'6 so I thought the regular length would be fine but I probably could have used the extra length with my heels. Overall, a great dress!

This is a simple but sophisticated dress for a formal or black tie event. The style and fabric excentuate an hourglass figure and the low back makes the dress more than just a basic black dress. I added a statement earring for extra flare and got lots of compliments for the classic silhouette! I am normally a 6 and after reading reviews (glad i did!) went for an 8L. I‚Äôm also not too tall (5‚Äô6‚Äù-7‚Äù) but reviews helped with length too. Glad I sized up in size and length bc the 8L was perfect with 2‚Äù heels. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this style for anyone too tall that also wants to wear heels bc you would be stuck wearing flats.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove, understated sexy
links_reviews_text: Be warned: this has zero stretch! I had to wiggle into it carefully but once it was on it fit perfectly. I have a small waist but larger hips and this still worked for me somehow. Had to go braless and there wasn't much more room in the bust! I don't think this would work well for larger chests. The neck was a little tight but that was my only complaint! Perfect for a date night.

This dress is so sexy yet conservative! I wore it to a military event & it was a show stopper. Events like those are flooded by people wearing dark blue & black. The color & lace definitely makes a statement & it was very comfortable! I'm 117 pounds, 5'6 & I wore a small. The length hits me below my knees so if you're shorter, keep that in mind. I have a small bust & the back is all lace so I wore a sticky bra. There's very little stretch to the dress as well.
Perfect fit and very flattering! Got many comments ;)

links_reviews_title: Red Dress Ball for heart health
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. Im 5‚Äô2‚Äù 130 lb and a 36C - I chose a size 4. It was spot on. it was actually very comfortable. No pinching, rubbing. The neckline gives this dress a classy edge. the zipper was sticky but a little patience is all that takes. The length of this dress is perfect for a short person like myself
I love this dress. Pretty, different, and flattering
Im obsessed with this dress. Sexy yet still conservative, and super comfortable. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this red lacy sexy dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is true to size! It's gorgeous and it's very fitted! I rented it for a company party but I ended up using my other dress. However I did fall in love with this dress! Very elegant and sexy

links_reviews_title: Red hot and sweet at the same time
links_reviews_text: I'd definitely rent this dress again. The red was sexy and the lace made it sweet and sassy. Loved the fit. Needed help with the button at the neck but wouldn't mind owning this one. LOVE
This dress was stunning. It fit great and was very comfortable. The lining was perfect and I didn't need a bra. I definitely recommend this dress!
Medium was way too tight in the bust so went with the more comfortable large. Did not experience the slip riding up at all. Lots of compliments!!
This dress fit like a glove and made me feel so confident. I'm already waiting for an event where I can rent the black version!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I usually rent between a 0 and 2. I usually wear a small, but went with the XS based on RTR recommendation and the XS fit perfectly. The small probably would have fit as well. Great rental!
So many compliments - perfect dress!

This dress is a stunner! Super sexy without trying too hard. It was surprisingly comfortable-it's actually a bit stretchy. The material is not itchy as I feared it might be. Tons of compliments! Super rich beautiful color! I absolutely loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for American style Chinese Tea Ceremony at my Wedding!
links_reviews_text: We did a Chinese Tea Ceremony before my wedding and this was the perfect blend of American and Chinese QiPao that I wanted as a Chinese American Bride from TX having a rehearsal dinner tea ceremony at a bbq place/whiskey bar.. We poured sweet tea, for example, because it was so hot outside. Perfect fit, lots of compliments!

Fits true to size, perfect length for me (5'7") but a little snug in the neck. I danced all night without a problem. You cannot wear a bra so I used a sticky bra, worked ok. I will definitely rent again.

I ended up going with the XS because I wanted it to fit right - the dress has a lot of stretch. Only complaint echos others that the neck is tight and can get irritating toward the end of the night. Loved this dress overall!

I am typically a 4 and tried both the S and the M. The S was wearable but was very tight. The M was still form-fitting and flattering and was more comfortable, so I wore the M. The back is sheer, so would recommend a bra that sticks on and doesn't show in the back for the best effect. I felt beautiful in it and my fianc√© loved it. Definitely would recommend!

This dress was so beautiful in person and beautifully made, high quality. It was comfortable to dance and eat in. I wore the small, which was a bit tight, but the medium was too long on my frame (5'5"). I received compliments all night. Many people commented that it looked like a Cheongsam. I hadn't realized that the back is lace, so I needed to run out and order adhesive bra cups to wear with it. I'm glad I wore it!
This dress is amazing! I loved everything about it.

I got so many compliments wearing this dress at our friends wedding! I felt beyond glamorous! It was very sliming, classy but sexy, and just the perfect WOW dress. The only con was the neck line, it got to be VERY snug while sitting.

I'm 5'7", approx 130lbs and typically wear a size 4. I rented the small and the medium - the medium was too big and small fit like a glove. Lots of compliments all night. Very comfortable and a real show-stopper. Highly recommend.
This was my first experience with rent the runway and I will do it again. The fit was great. It was just the right amount of sexy. I loved it!!!

I loved every moment with this dress! It made me feel good in my body! I love the lace design and high neck to this! It was very comfortable and I didn't have to worry about it being ripped when moving in awkward positions. I thought this dress had a light lining, but it actually shows the skin. It didn't have the lining, so if anyone is planning to wear high spanx, it will show.

I wish I would have had the XS in this dress, but the small worked fine, too. Super great length (I'm 5'3" with 3+" heels on) to keep things classy. The neck got a little tight while sitting down but otherwise, it was a great rental!

links_reviews_title: The Lady in Red! Loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to an early summer wedding. I had re yes the same dress in the fall for another wedding in Black and loved it so much I went for it again in this gorgeous RED! Form fitting, but breathable. Felt like it ran a little small but nothing crazy...I just normally go with Mediums, but chose the Large in this dress. Got tons of compliments all night! Would def rent again!

links_reviews_title: Red dress for a Christmas party, and the people!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well, both sizes that I had would have worked. I was worried about my arms not fitting in the cap sleeves, but it worked out very well. I got a ton of compliments on the dress, and will definitely use this service again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit and hid all of my self conscious areas
links_reviews_text: Classic. Would order again in a heartbeat

Rented this for nighttime graduation ceremony and celebration after. The color was gorgeous and the threading had a little shine to it so it caught the light very nicely. I rented an xsmall and a small while the xsmall fit was stunning and squeezed in all the right places the neck was very tight and hard to breathe and move my head so I opted for the small so I could enjoy the night. The dress definitely felt a little bug all night but most people said they couldn't even tell if I didn't say anything. I really loved the sheer areas that were still modest and appropriate. I really did not want to return this dress

links_reviews_title: The perfect blend of elegant, sexy and tasteful.
links_reviews_text: I was a little apprehensive to wear red to a wedding; especially my best friend's outdoor wedding in Vermont! But I'm so glad I did. I can sometimes feel a little self conscious about my curves and how I'm photographed when wearing form fitting dresses, but I felt sexy and confident the whole night and it was super comfortable during dinner and dancing. I got a ton of compliments. I didn't need spanx and I managed to fit a strapless, backless nude bra to give some support and shape for the girls, too. :)

one of my favorite rentals to date! gorgeous bright red. very fitted and flattering. the only thing negative to say about this is that the lining was bothersome at times. i was worried about it riding up when standing after sitting for a bit. but other than that, it was a 10.

links_reviews_title: A bit too sexy for my event
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this but really loved it. It is tight, revealing, and the slip is way short. The appropriate venue is key for this. Was going to wear to a formal gala however it was a bit too much for that. An evening wedding, a holiday party would be perfect for this. Little bit of stretch, very form fitting.

links_reviews_title: What better dress to wear for a Wrapped in Red Gala?
links_reviews_text: It was my first RTR experience and I was worried about the dress not fitting. To my delight, the dress fit perfect! Playful elegance with just a hint of sass. Stick to the sizing chart and you can't go wrong :)

links_reviews_title: Loved the color of this dress, I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and the fit, runs a little small, I was able to wear it with no bra though.

links_reviews_title: Wore this in an elite crowd and felt like I fit right in!
links_reviews_text: Ok it was honestly PAINFUL to send this dress back! I will most definitely be renting again. It was so elegant and sexy and vibrant and beautiful. I loved the length and the sleeves while having the see through midriff and back. You can easily go without a bra and even though it's form fitting it's not super tight where you feel like you have to suck in all night. I went to an engagement party in California for two people from The Bachelor so there were many familiar faces there and I felt like this dress made me fit right in. No one knew I was a small town mom of two from the Midwest! So thrilled with this rental!!
Shoulders a little tight but otherwise perfect
Gorgeous Dress, amazing color, statement dress. I rented small and medium, small fit like a glove.
It's a body hugging dress for sure, but super flattering. I received so many compliments. Loved the length and the peep details - made it sexy without being too revealing. Top 3 rentals for sure!

Worn for a wedding, fit was spot on. It was fitted in all the right places but I could still dance and sit down comfortably. Due to the design I couldn't wear/didn't need a bra. The neck is high and was quite snug but didn't bother me at all. Fabulous dress, many compliments and it was fun, flirty but formal enough at the same time!

links_reviews_title: The color, texture and the way it fit
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to my husbands cocktail party in March. I loved the way it fit, looked, felt and the color. It's sexy yet elegant. I'd love to own it!
The dress has many ruffles which may make a maternity wearer look larger. I still loved the dress it was feminine and pretty. I wore with flat sandals and was a perfect floor length.
Only downside is the ruffles around your waste can make your hips look slightly wider, still really nice though!

links_reviews_title: Different and beautiful, but not particularly flattering
links_reviews_text: Overall happy with the rental but I do wish it was a bit more flattering - probably better for those a bit taller and with bigger boobs!
Because I am currently overweight due to a medical issue, I wanted a flowy dress that wasn't tight and had layers. This perfect fit the bill.
Perfect length with heels, ran true to size. Light material.

I rented this for a summer wedding . Didn't end up wearing. I am 5' 4" and it was perfect length on me with heels. Color didn't suit me nor the actual shape of the dress. It is a lot of extra fabric. Not for me but someone else can rock it !

links_reviews_title: Fit pretty much true to size, the top was top was too big but fit everywhere else
links_reviews_text: Really flattering. I'm usually a 6 or an 8 depending on the designer and I should've gotten a 6 in this one, the 8 was too big on top and actually kind of long. I'm 5"7' so usually dont have that issue. Other than that it was really pretty on and I would've worn it had it fit better on top.
I'm normally an 8-10 and went up in size based on reviews however it was gaping at the top
beautiful dress but ruffle around the hip can make you look wide(r than you are)
To big on top.

beautiful dress! Very flowy and the ruffles make it forgiving. The dress is a bit long if you're petite (I'm 5 ft and it dragged a bit, even with 4 inch heels), but otherwise a very beautiful style and I received compliments the entire time! Also, don't be thrown off by the sizing, 6R fit like a XS

links_reviews_title: This ran way too small. Was beautiful though!
links_reviews_text: Too mall to zip And no give but beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Only if you're a size 0 or 2!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an event after one my favorite bloggers posted about it. She is definitely a size 0 and I really should have taken note. This looked absolutely awful on. I looked wide and chubby and just felt terrible. If you are taller and thin this will probably look awesome on you, but If you have any curves...don't rent.
Fit perfect! Stylish and classy
This is an elegant outfit!! Super beautiful and classy! I'm 5'7 and usually wear a around a 2-4 ...and the 4R was too short so I went with the 6R for some extra length. Can't wait to order again!

This is, hands down, my favorite rental ever. RTR please let me buy this piece! This jumpsuit was classy, but had a little bit of edge, with sheer panels along the chest. I wore it for our son's baptism and it was perfect. The material is stretchy and thick enough that it hides all lumps and bumps. As everyone else mentioned, you need assistance in the bathroom, but other than that, this is just beyond amazing. For reference I'm 5'1, and about 165lbs.

I have never received so many questions and compliments about something I have worn before. This fit so well, and the top part is really intricate and beautiful. Like the other reviews say, you need a bathroom partner for this one, so choose wisely.
Literally only con: you need a bathroom buddy.
It's great ! Absolutely love - just the buttons in the back makes it necessary to have help to use the restroom

I wore this for our rehearsal dinner and received so maybe compliments. The delicate lace detail is breath taking in person. The waist was smaller than a normal 4R but was able to squeeze in it. Also the neck was a little tight but manageable for a few hours.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun jumpsuit! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my bridal shower in January. I wanted something a little non traditional but still made me look and feel like a bride... with the added bonus of keeping my legs warm! This did all those things and the some! It fit like a glove and made me feel amazing! I got high-waisted undergarments to wear with this and I would suggest doing that so you don't have lines. Overall fit was great, but as with any jumpsuit a little tricky to take on and off if you need to use the bathroom (it has buttons and a zipper!!)

links_reviews_title: It was great for the party
links_reviews_text: Fit as expected. The buttons are hard and you will likely need assistance to get in and out, so don't plan to use the restroom while wearing. I felt great! Very comfortable. It was classy and sexy at the same time!

links_reviews_title: Both modest & slightly risqu√© NYE attire
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 10 but had to wear the 12. But I have a wide torso/broad shoulders, otherwise 10 could've fit. But at 5'9" the pants length on the 10 was too short. I wore flats & wished even the 12 was 1/2" longer. It's not the easiest to get in/out of by oneself with the buttons up the back. Was very comfy, both modest & risqu√©.

This was an extremely comfortable jumper to wear. My two things I didn't care were (1) that the claps are in the back and while it's not impossible to clasp and unclasp, it was a little difficult. Would not recommend wearing out for a night of drinks because you will need all your concentration and motor skills to get out the jumper if you need to use the bathroom. Also, there is a pink camisole that is sewn into the garment but it dips pretty low and I was concerned it wouldn't provide any coverage so I ended up eating my own camisole underneath it. Not a deal breaker but it just took away from the look a little. I loved the look but I'm not sure I'd rent this particular outfit again.

links_reviews_title: It was beautiful piece ; lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is beautiful; I wore it for a speaking engagement The lace is fab! The one issue is you need someone else to help you zip It up
Very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Sleek, slimming beautiful jumpsuit. Perfect for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: Tight in the waist, but right fit. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù and needed VERY high heels in the size 4. Beware: pain to get out of to go to restroom, but totally worth it!
Loved this outfit. So glamorous

This jumpsuit was amazing. The fabric was soft and very comfortable. I received so many compliments. It was perfect for my husband's work holiday party. The only downside is that it buttons all the way up the back so going to the bathroom is a challenge. Also, I would size up if you have a larger chest size.

I wore this outfit for my engagement party. I recieved so many positive compliments. I am usually a size 2 which fit well but I have a bigger chest so I needed to go up to a 4 which also fit me very well. I am also on the shorter side so I needed to wear higher heels to make up for the long pants. I am sure you can also use double sided tape or pins to hem them. But overall, it was absolutely stunning and very comfortable. I will definitely be renting this outfit again in the future!

links_reviews_title: Classic with a twist. Elegant. People loved it more when they found out it was a jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: I loved the details of the top! I got compliments all night long. The only tricky thing is that I had to leave some buttons undone in the back for a keyhole effect so I could unzip for restroom. I normally wear a 6 but the 8 fit great, but I'm sure the 6 would work too

Super comfortable - only this is its tricky to button up without some help! Legs were nice and long. The waist is super small so it's perfect for an hourglass figure but size up if your waist has a lil extra tummy ;)

I rented this for my wedding rehearsal. I am normally a size 2 but ordered a size 4. It is true to size (I probably could have worn the 2 although the 4 was fine). I did not end up wearing it because there is a very deep "V" down the middle. You can see from the photos the nude lining is a "V" shape, but it is hard to tell how low it really goes. It is low. It was not appropriate for a rehearsal in a Catholic church and nice dinner. You cannot wear a bra (I tried on several different styles and none worked). I am a 32b. Also the length was way too short with 3" heels. I am 5'7". Taller women should plan on wearing flats.
Cute outfit but was way too short for my long torso.

links_reviews_title: Just didn't work for me and the backup size wasn't available.
links_reviews_text: Was a bit to tight especially around the neck so I just didn't feel comfortable. Was gappy around the underarm area, just didn't lay flat over my side boob area.
If your busty, this item fit better than the others I rented but I did have to size up..also you can‚Äôt go to the bathroom alone...

I would have worn the 12 because it also fit great but after two babies in two years it was a little unforgiving at the belly pouch so I went with the 14. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3‚Äù 165 lbs. and surprisingly in the 14 with a small heel it was the perfect length. It was the perfect weight of fabric. You will want to take a friend with you who is willing to undo you for some bathroom breaks but overall the outfit was perfect.
I'm tall, it was a little short but I paired it with high boots and looked great. I stupidly forgot to take a photo but it was fantastic. Lots of compliments. Feels very holiday, well made.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my company Holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Conservative but sexy overall a really pretty outfit received a ton of compliments Cons: I usually wear a 2/4 but this was SO tight - I was unable to zip it up all the way - luckily the event was outside so my jacket covered the back that was unzipped. I would probably order a 6 or maybe even an 8. I do have larger hips - I usually wear a size 28 in jeans but I have a smaller chest/upper body and that is where I was unable to zip/button the back. Zipping/buttons is a total pain when you need to go to the bathroom

links_reviews_title: Mostly wore this for work and out on date night.
links_reviews_text: I love this jumpsuit so much, and if the length of the pant legs were a little longer, I'd buy it in a heartbeat. But at 5'9", the pant legs were a little too short so I had to wear flats. Even with flats, the jumpsuit was a tad too short for my liking, but it made my body look fantastic everywhere else so I ran with it. I rented this as part of the Unlimited subscription, and I kept this baby for a few months, wearing it as much as I could until it was past its prime. The back button up detailing is beautiful, and I received so many compliments. Only minor issue from a work standpoint is that the top is a little revealing in the sheer areas around your bosom. I wore a black bra underneath so it gave the appearance of a black tank. Hands down favorite rental ever.
Fits true to size! You can wear a nude bra and it's not visible. Room to move and stunningly goregous (plus it's pants!)
Is a little on the shorter side, not meant for 5'9.

links_reviews_title: Very much in style right now. Almost everyone showed up in jumpsuits. It was magical.
links_reviews_text: Everything is as I expected it, except the waist is very small. I dislike how the top is stitched to the pant legs. It would be better as separate pieces. Then I could pick different size for the top and different size for the pants.
The top looked too matronly...it wasn't even an option!
Fit was tight but overall great. 5"8, 132 lbs. and 32B
Beautiful but was too large, the stomach area and crouch was too long. Possibly, a petite would of worked, but otherwise loved it. The smaller size wasn't available for exchange.
Loved it but just decided to wear something differently! It's pretty true to size but if you're between sizes, go up to be more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: Buttons are a bit hard to do but if you have a friend or SO they are no problem. Loved it and wish I could keep it!

This outfit made an impact! I received tons of compliments on it. I had never worn a jumpsuit but thought that renting would be a good way to try. I have a long torso, and I wore a 4 and it JUST fit. The 6 was not available. But, sitting in the car on the way to the party, I thought I was going to choke because the neck pulled very tight, so I had to pull on it the whole way there to give my self some breathing room. The top material is heavy lace, and has no stretch at all. It is also very sheer, with the heavy lace pattern covering the "necessary" areas. It does not really have sleeves (even thought the picture makes it look like it does). There are "flaps" of the material that cover the upper arm area. I think this design allows for freer arm movement. The material on the bottom "pant" part is very thin, and I'd recommend Spanx or similar, unless you have absolutely no body fat at all. The bottom is also high-waisted, which also necessitates some smoothing undergarments. But overall, it was comfortable to wear (while standing up!) and had the right combination of elegance and style for the Christmas party I attended. One more thing . . . you will not be able to go to the bathroom in this unless you have someone to come with you and unbutton the entire back.
Beautiful jumpsuit and very nice material but the jumpsuit was way too short for my 5'9" frame. I have fairly long torso so it hit me at a very unflattering spot

The top was beautiful, but the deep V cutout in the lace was too revealing for a small bust. I needed a 6 in the pants so it didn't ride up, which left the top a bit saggy. I ended up wearing a nude cami underneath and it worked ok, but wasn't ideal because you could see the differences in the lining. The neck was also restricting when sitting

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this style, but unfortunately could not wear it.
links_reviews_text: The bodice is fully lace, zero stretch, which leaves zero room for size forgiveness. I'm usually a 0 or a 2, but I would have needed a 4 for this to fit my bust and shoulders. I just couldn't get it zipped up past mid-waist! Beautifully made and would have been tremendously flattering to wear!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this jumper, however it was a tad tight in the tummy.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5" and 185 lbs, this was tight in my torso (which is my trouble area). I would rent this again as I continue my weight loss journey. The detail was impressive and it was heavy enough to wear to my daughter's Baptism in December. (with a jacket over)... I did not wear this cause I wanted to be comfortable and it was just to tight in the waist/chest area.
Loved this dress but it was so tight around my hips and knees

this dress is sooo beautiful!!! so many compliments. the only cons for me were the length of the dress, it was still hitting the ground with platforms on and i have pretty "thick" thighs and the fabric was kind of stretching itself out? but thankfully there is a little fabric behind the buttons so didn't reveal too much skin. overall very happy! i couldve possibly sized up due to my lower body.

links_reviews_title: This dress did not disappoint! Felt so beautiful and received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I tried the 4R & 8R and the 6R fit like a glove. Made my booty look great. I did a juice cleanse for the few days beforehand because it showed any bulge on my stomach. The buttons were loose on the 6R and the 8R was missing 1 button & 1 button loop so keep an eye out for any damages as this dress is a bit delicate.
Baptism

I loved this look and the feel was perfect for an outdoor barn wedding. It hugged my curves and was very comfortable. I'm between sizes 8-10 and I wore the 8. This was the first dress I rented where several people I didn't know came up to me to compliment me and said I had the dress of the night! It was so worth it! I am 5'3 and I wore pretty big wedges to keep the dress from dragging. I was worried about it being too narrow/restrictive on bottom to dance but it was totally fine. Great experience!
Great for hourglass body shape enhancement! Material gives a little throughout wear. Sexy and flattering. Compliments galore!

This dress is a statement piece and it also is super long. I am an amazon princess and it was long on me. So if you wear heels it works but if not the dress will drag and you will trip. Dont chip your smiles because you dont have heels on. Haha loved this dress and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for any body shape
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous. There are sweet flower shaped buttons on the front and an awesome embroidered ruffle off shoulder scallop. It hugs every curve and fits like a custom made couture piece. The only con: when you sit down the fabric separates at the buttons causing tension on the fabric and sneak peaks of flesh. Also purchased - HIGHLY RECOMMEND
I'm 5'11 and I had to wear it pretty low for the dress to fit right so I would say this dress is best for someone 5'9 and under. Gives a killer hourglass shape!
Loved this dress. Fun, unique, flattering and comfortable. I had the 10 but could have used the 8.
The 4 was VERY tight so didn't end up wearing, though thought it was very cute

This dress was amazing, it does run long. I was in heels 5 inches and still had a bunch to drag. But the fit is great. It was a bit tight on my lower part of my body. It made it a little hard to sit but still a great dress. Would definitely rent again but best for tall people.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a girls weekend in Nashville. I got so many compliments and felt like a celeb.
links_reviews_text: Love it but the waist is a little big, didn't look bad but would have been better with a belt

links_reviews_title: Sexy, chic and floral fun birthday outfit!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for my bday and loved it! Took a trip to vineyards - perfect floral design, and had a beautiful and sexy shape.

This dress is stunning. Every little detail is gorgeous and I usually don't go for embroidery. My husband was obsessed with this dress. I'm normally an 8, should've absolutely worn an 8 in this dress but it was only available in a 10. I was glad when I sat down in a tiny booth that I had the room, but it was unnecessarily baggy when I was standing. It could've hugged my curves a bit more but I should've gotten my true size. It does have some give. Fit my chest well and I was given so many compliments. Would absolutely rent again

links_reviews_title: Arrived to my house a day early and the return experience is insanely simply. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: THIS dress: true to size, insanely beautiful & fun. I've never gotten so many compliments. I'm 5'1, 130 lbs, pretty curvy and this thing fit like a glove and was beyond flattering. Would rent again in a heartbeat. Wore with strappy black heels and a pink clutch.

I absolutely adored this dress. I apologize for the bathroom pic but I saw a full-length opportunity and had to take it. The fabric, design, and details are all absolutely 5 stars. All hail an off the shoulder dress that stays put off your shoulders all night long at a concert no less!!! I'm a true 6 with 34C bust. The bust was a little tight but I didn't have to wear a bra and the ruffle covered up the majority of that area. The only reason I deducted a star was because it is difficult to walk and get in and out of cars in. The bottom bottoms, while pretty high up on the dress are a little restricting. The hips also had a little extra room which made me look like I had va va voom curves (which I loved in pictures) but when I looked down it kinda looked baggy at my hips- I stand by what one reviewer said when they stated this was made for girls with curves! Love that about it. My boyfriend loved it so much and I got compliments all night. Had to wear 4" heels with it. Rent this!!!

I rented the size 6, which is standard for me. I do not have curvy hips and it was too tight in the hip area but loose around my waist. The fabric is not flexible or forgiving at all. Basically you have to have a body shaped to fit the dress perfectly. It is really cute and summery. If it does fit you then it will probably be a favorite.
It's quirky but just look at how amazing this dress was when I put it on! Woo mama! Snug in chest but was loose in hips. If you're hippy-- get iiiiiiit!!!

Wore to Palm Springs and it was perfect. It wrinkles easily but not to the point where you feel like it's ruining photos or your night. The fabric is very light and breathable with a slight sheen to it. It was difficult (yet manageable with good posture) to sit down in but as soon as you stand up, all eyes are on you. It has a subtle va va voom aspect to it. True to size and has some stretch.

links_reviews_title: Everyone commented on the unique look!
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Deff made for a curvy body.
Beautiful in every way - so many compliments :)
Fabric feels a little cheap but doesn't look cheap
normally wear a M/6 in dresses due to my curves but this didn't fit over my hips. Ordering a size up.
Gave me a nice hourglass shape even though I don't have many curves.

Loved this look for late summer/early fall date night... however, I'm a shorty at 5'2 and there was no way this would work. The hemline is beautiful so hemming with tape was impossible. Really gorgeous and comfortable, perfect for the long-legged lady.

links_reviews_title: Such a great fit but too long 5'1
links_reviews_text: This was so flattering and comfortable. I wasn't able to wear it out because I am 5'1 and even with my biggest platform heels the embroidered bottom dragged on the floor. If you're just a couple inches taller I would for sure recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: beautiful dress but my waist is small and my hips are larger so was too tight on my hips
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress but my waist is small and my hips are larger so was too tight on my hips
Didn't wear, but plan to rent again in a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but too small on rib cage
links_reviews_text: Too tight to zip around the rib cage but gorgeous dress! Was so sad I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Not body con yet shapes the body perfectly
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress

links_reviews_title: Not flattering at all for me, didn't wear it
links_reviews_text: This was a beautiful dress with beautiful materials, but the fit was very odd. I am generally a pretty solid size 2, this dress fit me in the waist but was impossibly tight on my (small) chest and loose through my hips/rear. I would have to have it tailored to have been wearable for me. I returned it unworn after trying on once.
Order size bigger

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but don't recommend for petites
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this for a party but it was too long for me. It's gorgeous and flattering but was unfortunately too long.
This dress is beautiful however it was too big in the waist area. I would have definitely got a size 2.
Great for an hourglass figure. Loved it! I would buy it if it wasn't so expensive!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, but didn't work out for me.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, soft fabric and lovely details. I typically wear a 4 or 6 and ordered a 6. Unfortunately it was too narrow in my hips and loose in my stomach. No stretch, so this doesn't work for a narrow waist and wide hips. I'm 5'8" and the length was perfect with heels. Wish I could have worn it!

links_reviews_title: Way too big for petite person
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear on my honeymoon. I was very disappointed! The print was beautiful, but it was waaaaay too long for me. Even if I'd worn wedges, the dress would have been dragging on the ground. The waist was also too big. I rented a 2R. Maybe if this came in a petite, it would have worked for me!

This dress is gorgeous and special. Every detail is beautiful. However, it seems you must be the girl the dress is made for in order for it to fit. My usual size is an 8. First I tried the 6. It fit perfectly except for the chest which was approximately 5 inches too small. Next I tried the 10 which was too large all over and approx. 8 inchess too long. I thought the 8 would be the perfect fit but it was too large and about 4 inches too long. So I guess I'm not the girl for the dress. It is beautiful though. I wish I could have worn it!
Amazing fit, provided just the right amount of sexy for a fiesta!

links_reviews_title: Super Cute; Occassion Determines the Size
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a "fun cocktail" engagement party and I absolutely loved this piece. It does run tighter/snug so if for work I'd recommend size up, but if you're out for a night of fun, I'd say accentuate your curves! I did! ;)
I wore this for an Up themed wedding and it was perfect for what we were going for: "formal" aviator look haha It fits nicely and very comfortable!

I rented this for my goddaughters communion and it was such a great choice! So comfortable, and easy to move around in! I received so many compliments on how it fit me perfectly! I do suggest having a tank top for underneath, I am a 36B and I needed one to cover up! This was a great first rental and will definitely do this again!

I was very shocked to see this at my door 2 days before anticipated. I ran inside and opened it up to try on. It fit like a glove. Pros: heavy fabric for chilly temps, true to size, length perfect for the cropped pant effect, classy yet sexy, great coverage in the busy area (I wore a bra) Cons: belt had to be tightened throughout the night. Compliments all night... I'm keeping my eyes open for this to go on sale. Absolutely love this.

links_reviews_title: I wore this jumpsuit to a rehearsal dinner at PNC Park. It fit great and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The chest is a little open, so for anyone with a larger chest, they may want to wear a cami or something underneath. I ended up going without a bra and it was fine (as long as I didn't bend over too far!). The small fit great. The bride and groom were lucky that they got the only 75 degree days in August for their rehearsal and wedding, but I would caution against wearing this if it's going to be hot as the fabric is a little heavier than I originally thought. 10/10 loved it - would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Stylish, trendy jumpsuit that is definitely eye-catching.
links_reviews_text: The pros: It‚Äôs a great jumpsuit. I have a short torso and long legs and it fit well. I received several compliments. The fabric is thick so it will hide any fondness for cakes and pies your hips may show. Wear it with a pointy heel to elongate your legs if you‚Äôre short. The cons: It attracts lint like you wouldn‚Äôt believe so if you‚Äôre attending a luncheon, dinner or date with linen napkins, save yourself and don‚Äôt rent this jumpsuit for that type of event.. The fit is a little strange around the mid-section so if you normally wear a 4-6 go with the Medium. I thought it made me look pregnant. The belt is too short to be useful. I just folded it once and pinned it in place. The opening in the front bears off so I wore a body suit underneath to be more conservative.

Really enjoyed wearing this jumpsuit. I received many complements. Pros - comfort, breathable, navy blue. Cons - extra texture in lower belly area. Although I enjoyed wearing it, I would prefer not to worry about the extra texture, I used bobby-pins to keep it in place.
This jumpsuit has a great fit to it. Like other reviews said I did put a black cami under it to help keep it modest.

I love this simple, chic, comfortable, classic style jumpsuit by The Fifth Label! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra and a tank top with this jumpsuit. The v-neck cut is low if your bust is C cup and up. At 5‚Äô3 the length hit just above my ankle on me. I am very picky because of my body shape but this jumpsuit provided much comfort since the fabric had a stretch. Pair with nude sandals and Oscar de la Renta Bordeaux Filigree Necklace to complete your outfit!

Love how stylish and well tailored this jumper is! Got compliments from folks and felt very comfortable throughout the day and night! I've worn it to work, for a night out and even to church. This outfit is perfect for every occasion.

I am an attorney, but I hate wearing business suits every day. This jumper was a perfect alternative! It fit well and was very comfortable and and as the perfect balance of fun and professional. The length was longer than expected in the pant, but I actually prefer this length to cropped. I will definitely be renting this again!
I picked this jumpsuit because of the tailored cut on the collar and sleeves. The fit was great because of the stretch design. I felt comfortable and I felt amazing!
Loved loved loved this jumpsuit. Was a little tight in the chest but fit perfect everywhere else (normally wear a small/medium) was the perfect combo of chic/sexy.

The jumpsuit was ok, i was a little disappointed, though im not surprised bc jumpsuits dont usually fit me well. The cinched waist is what saved it, but the crotch was low and was big on my hips and butt which is not flattering. Made me look larger than i am. Also the shoulders are better for someone w smaller shoulders, i have broad and it again made me look larger. Prob wont rent again.
Very low cut, so wore a spaghetti strap tee under it. Legs look shorter on model's photo but pretty much fit like a regular pant leg on me (5'4"). Loved it!

This is a fun jumpsuit. You feel classy and posh all at the same time. It runs a tad bit bit, but not by much. I usually wear a 0 or 2. It was a bit small in the chest, but totally doable. Love it! The "wings" are lots of fun.
This was a great jumpsuit! I wore a lace bralette under it for work - pretty low cut. Lots of compliments :)

Ok If you have boobs you have to wear a tank under , i liked to match the color rather than a different color and itt worked perfectly!! IÔ∏èt was a little tight under my rib cage but wasn‚Äôt noticeable . Usually i wear a large and i needdd this in XL... the belt was great also really Was very flattering

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is fabulous! Looks super chic, but may need a camisole
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this jumpsuit. I was looking for the perfect one to wear on my birthday and this is it! I honestly chose it because the size is a smaller fit. As someone who is petite, it's hard to find a jumpsuit that fits well. This fit me perfectly. I ordered the XSR and it fit me quite well everywhere. Length was perfect for me, went down to my ankles. The waist was a perfect fit. The pant legs were a bit loose on me, I do wish they were a little tighter, but it didn't look bad on me. My only complaint is that the top showed a lot more cleavage than expected. The picture made it seem like it would cover my girls, but when I tried it on without a cami, I felt very exposed. Definitely need a cami underneath or some really sturdy clothing tape to keep everything in place.
Super soft and comfortable but is very low cut get the tape ready
Loved everything about it. The buttons and belt made my waist look a lot smaller than it is. Love! Love! Love!

This was my first jumpsuit. Maybe I'm just not a jumpsuit girl... I received some nice compliments from coworkers, but didn't love it. My biggest gripe was the cape-like wings. I actually pinned them into a sleeve so I wouldn't get carried away by a gust of wind.

links_reviews_title: I'm usually apprehensive renting and buying jumpsuits, but this fit perfectly and got lots of praise
links_reviews_text: It was a bit low cut and tight in the front, but it looked great and it got lots of compliments. It even fit my petite frame well, even though I struggle with most jumpsuits on length. Was super fashionable and would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Classy with an edge - compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a fall, mountain wedding in Vermont. Everyone kept telling me how great I looked and how much they loved this jumpsuit! The fit was great - a liiiitle snug in the waist, but the belt helps cover any potentially unflattering spots. Only con is that the V is VERY DEEP. I had to use tape, which got a little cumbersome when going to the bathroom. Also had to bring the tape with me to the wedding and reapply once over the 8 or so hours I wore the outfit. Overall, really loved this rental. 8.5/10 - would rent again.
Super tight everywhere except shoulders. And it's a deep v. My boobs are only 38C. I'm a 14 or curvy 12 but this was a no go
It was a little snug around the waist but it helped give my athletic body shape a little curve. The wore a beige one piece underneath making it perfect for work!

links_reviews_title: Dont rent this unless you are a pre-teen girl
links_reviews_text: I've rented from RTR for years and never had a fit problem. This jumpsuit was not made for a grown woman's body. I have a short torso yet it was painful to stand up straight and was so tight it was like wearing a preteen child's outfit. I couldn't wear it and it was a total waste. I don't even know if going with a significantly larger size would have helped because it was made for a child's body. Do not rent this.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear - back up rental for a college reunion.
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit runs small. I'm a size 10 and usually rent a medium and I could barely close the zipper. Definitely size up. The fabric was also a bit of a combo of cotton and felt. Even if it had fit, I did not think I would have enjoyed the fabric for an evening of wear.

links_reviews_title: Will try again in different size
links_reviews_text: Really sharp - going to order a size up.

links_reviews_title: This runs really small. Super cute and quality fabric.
links_reviews_text: This runs really small. I am 5'8 140 lbs and the medium was very tight. Super cute and I bet would have been incredibly comfortable. I usually wear a 4/6 so medium should have fit. I will be renting again but ordering a Large. Fabric great. Wish I would've gotten to wear it.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't get it on. My waist and bust couldn't fit in the garment.
The outfit run small and I was unable to wear it. The fabric was thick but not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit but sleeves weren't great
links_reviews_text: It was a cute jumpsuit with thick good quality fabric. the sleeves aren't really sleeves they are what I would describe as an "arm cape". For someone not wanting to cover their upper arms I'd say it would be stylish fit, but for those wanting more cover in that area it wasn't great.
I felt it ran a little small - snug in waist area. Very flattering though! I forgot to wear the tie and you couldn't tell! Got a ton of compliments.
Nice color.

links_reviews_title: Sadly, I didn't get to wear this. It seems it was medium for a youth!
links_reviews_text: Too small!
Loved and hugged my body perfectly. Wore for a bachelorette cold snowy night. Held its figure all night. The sides where the belt go through stick out a bit but made it work. Loved this piece.
Runs large, had to pin the front due to how deep the cut is but it still looked good.

links_reviews_title: don't rent if you have boobs larger than an A cup
links_reviews_text: this is the first time my RtR rental was a disaster. i have C cup boobs and it just wouldn't fit up top. i ordered the small and medium and went with the medium but it still looked terrible. i had to use a safety pin up top to cover up my boobs and basically kept my coat on all night. the medium runs very small and though it fit through the hips and waist, the chest area is super tight and probably intended for someone with an A cup. if you have a B cup and up, you will be showing A LOT of cleavage. this outfit may really be intended for a non work party or club environment. do not recommend this for curvy ladies

Never thought I would wear a jumpsuit, this one is perfect. If I had more events to wear it to, I would rent again or buy it. The length was perfect on my short frame and thought it was a little snug around the waist, I think the large would have been too big everywhere else. Loved it!
Was a complete hit a a summer bridal shower! I wish I had better pictures because I really thought it was perfection. Paired with kitten heel mules.

links_reviews_title: Cute daytime dressed down with sneakers or garden party chic!
links_reviews_text: Dress was super cute, wore the sleeves off the shoulder. I'm short (about 5'1) and this dress was pretty short- so dong suggest if you're taller or worried about it being super short.

Was excited to rent this based on reviews, but the XS was just too big all around. Looked a little cuter when belted, but maybe too much fabric for a petite frame. Pattern and colors were very cute, though.
Love this dress. It's def a lot of fabric, but is super cute and such a fun wear. I'm a 6 and the medium felt a little loose in the waist/chest, would size down in the future!

links_reviews_title: Adorable puff sleeves and perfectly fitted waist
links_reviews_text: Honestly my favorite dress I've ever worn, no exaggeration. Thinking about purchasing it because I loved it SO much!
Such a fun and loud dress. It's the perfect fall staple to any wardrobe this season

links_reviews_title: Cute, but a lot of fabric and a little long.
links_reviews_text: It is cute, but not 'special' - I'm 5'4' so it hit right at my knees and looked a little frumpy b/c it was too long. I didn't end up wearing it. I think it would work better on someone 5'7 or taller so that the fit is like the model.
There was so much fabric and the ruffles around the collar flared out a lot.

The silhouette is super cute & feminine. Makes your waist look tiny. I'm short though so I had to tuck the extra fabric at the waist under my bra (LOL) to make it shorter. Overall super cute, wish it came in a brighter color!

links_reviews_title: I flashed everyone on walking down the stairs in the subway. (Explain below)
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! So cute and comfortable. I received many compliments! At first I worried it might be too short, I'm 5'11", but it wasn't at all! I will say it takes to the wind very easily. Was not friendly in the subway as any wind can easily lift it right up... that was the only issue I had but would wear anytime where wind is limited. I'm a size 4/6 typically and the elastic waste was a little loose on me but it was so comfortable and the top fit my broader shoulders really well.
Over all the fabric is a good quality, pattern is very pretty, but the arm holes are elastic and just hug too tight and on my arm in a very strange spot.

I loved this dress from the moment I saw it and that didn't change when I got to actually wear it either. I love the huge collar. I thought I would get more compliments on it but maybe it's not everyone's taste? It's pretty forgiving bc the waistband is stretchy. My 38DDD breasts had plenty of room as well.
This dress is not very flattering... makes your shoulder look huge! Very odd shape. Returned without even wearing.

The fit was definitely a little tighter than I expected. The small was very snug and it rode up a decent amount as well. Other than that the fit was very flattering, it was comfortable and it was beautiful! The ruching at the center is a nice touch to hide any insecurities. Low back is sexy but you can still get away with a regular bra!

THIS DRESS! Fits like a glove and is so so flattering. There's enough stretch to it that if you're between sizes, you could size down. Also, the ruching in the front of the dress really helps hide the tummy ;) I got so many compliments that night! Would rent this again for sure, I am obsessed.
Comfortable!!! Short but snug. I am athletic build body type and it was a show stopper for the legs!!!

links_reviews_title: Short and fitted but forgiving...and FUN
links_reviews_text: Had to have my roommate zip me up cuz it was a tight squeeze but once it was on, I'm glad I went the size smaller for this specific dress. I got so many compliments and it was fantastic in pictures. It was really short so the opaque stockings were a must for me.

Overall this dress was great for my 30th birthday night out. It was sparkly and fun. There were a few issues though. The sequins fell off very easily and the fabric seemed to snag on anything. I was also a little disappointed that the large I ordered was different than the pictures. It had a black lace bottom which was not in the picture so I ended up wearing my second size choice the XL. I normally wear between a 10-12 and both the Large and XL fit.

links_reviews_title: I rented four dresses and this is the one that fit best and was the most comfortable for NYE
links_reviews_text: If you rub it, it actually changes colors! One side is silver sparkles, the other is gold and black cheetah print sparkles. The sequins don't irritate or chafe, super comfortable, not too hot or too cold, flattering before and after dinner, easy to dance in
This dress was amazing. Comfortable to walk, sit, and dance in. The sequins glittered and played with the flashing lights as I moved about! I would totally rent this for another event again!
Dress fit perfectly and everyone said I looked amazing.

I appreciated the length of the dress and its ability to stretch. You will definitely stand out in this and receive ALL the compliments so get ready! I was able to dance and walk comfortably in it. I would not be surprised if I ended up wearing this again.

links_reviews_title: It was a little out of my comfort zone being completely in sequins but I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: It fit nice and snug, showing curves but forgiving with the rouching in mid section! It was comfortable and didn't itch at all with the sequins. I got a lot of compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Was a hit during Saints football party
links_reviews_text: I got a lot of uses out of this dress. I used it for a date night and received a good amount of attention and compliments. In the picture posted I wore it again in New Orleans for a Saints game celebration.

This dress was a 5-star winner for a Vegas concert!! Tons of compliments all nite long and, most importantly, it was super comfy! I actually wore it backwards -- I highly recommend if you are comfortable with deep V. Just remember your double sided fashion tape!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress from the moment that I saw it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this AMAZING dress for a friend's daughter's quinceanera. It was a formal occasion! I love LOVE this dress! It was so fun! I'm 5'2", size 6/8 in pants, medium in tops. Dress hit mid thigh. If you're looking for something no one else will be in for an event, this is THAT dress!

I love dress the population so it's no surprise that I adore this dress too! The material is thick and not at all scratchy. The long sleeves even out the shortness of the dress. Also the pattern is subtle but sooo sexy. I loved this for our girls night out! It was perfect and fit like it was made just for me. I may be purchasing and keeping this one!

links_reviews_title: Liked it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Such a fun dress that hits all the right places and is just as forgiving in the spots you want to hide! Loved it so much that I bought it in a different color from the manufacturer! Can't wait to wear it again!

links_reviews_title: Such a fun sparkly dress for night out in Vegas
links_reviews_text: Super easy to wear and very comfortable
I got compliments all night long

I loved this dress. I got tons of compliments on the dress. I rented a small i am 5'7 and it was a little short but fit like a glove so i didn't mind that it was a little short. I wore it with booties to dress it down.
So many compliments! Show stopper sequin and animal print is a win win! This dress was not as stretchy as others and needed an XL to fit comfortably and be able to move and dance.

links_reviews_title: Way small, and very tight. Very short but stunning.
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 12 in jeans and weigh 200 lbs and this was way too tight. I rented an XXL, but it fit like a large. The back was low cut and the dress is really short. Like you'd have to wear tights unless it was a non formal affair or a summer event. I wasn't able to wear it, but will know what to look for, next time around with the fit and the dress maker. Pretty though!

links_reviews_title: Nice cut and side bunching to hide stomach area.
links_reviews_text: I had to wear opaque tights as I have wider hips. This dress was VERY short on me. But the arms had enough stretch and the sequins were beautiful.

links_reviews_title: The dress was a great cocktail party / wedding reception dress! Beautiful glam
links_reviews_text: The fit is very structured and does run small. I felt that a little bit of focus around the stomach area was there because of the design (not because of the tightness of the dress). Overall, I liked that it stood out and was "glitzy".

Cute dress but runs way small. I decided not to wear it. I'm 5'7", 185 -- it was pretty short (I can be prude, lol) but fit other than that. For an XXL (I'm usually a 12-14), it was still small. If you are not curvy, this may be a winner!

links_reviews_title: It is a beautiful dress, but runs small
links_reviews_text: I am an extra large in everything but there was no chance this was going to zip when I put it on. It does have some stretch but not tons. I wish I would've been able to wear it because the leopard print is amazing.

links_reviews_title: Men and women were both complimenting the dress. I felt like an Old Hollywood star!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, the sequins and moderate drape in the tummy area make this dress very forgiving. The sleeves were a little lose on me but I have skinny arms. Other than that, this dress made me like a celebrity
Gorgeous dress, fits great AND it's comfortable. Wore this for a girls night out and had strangers stopping me to compliment the dress all night.

links_reviews_title: A dress to make you feel like a bad bitch
links_reviews_text: The fit is very form fitting, a bit too long for a 5 foot tall lady even with 4 1/2 inch heels. Perfect for someone who's 5'4". Don't eat wear shape wear.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove. Husband loved it!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, Looks better in person than in the photos because you can see the detailed striped ribbon. Was a little tight --especially around the rib cage and pulling it on over my hips-- but was able to pour myself into it and the shape of it fit successfully with a good strapless push-up bra. I felt secure and comfortable in it and danced all night!

Gorgeous dress that fit like a glove, perfect for showing off your curves! I didn't realize it had a striped texture, but that made me love it even more. The material is super stretchy and comfortable, and the regular was long enough for me to wear heels with. I got a ton of compliments at the wedding I wore it to.

This was the most flattering dress ever. Got many compliments on it. I rented the 2r and 3r because the reviews all said the dress runs small, and it does. There is a tight band in the lining at the waist. I wore the 3r because the band on the 2 was just too uncomfortable. Definitely size up.
Tight fitting band about halfway down the bodice. But fabulous dress overall. Boyf was a biiig fan.
I absolutely loved this gown! I got so many compliments, and it hugged my figure in an incredibly flattering way. Only down side is it is teeeeny tiny! Definitely size up 1-2 sizes.
So many compliments but everyone is right with the "this runs small" i wear a 0 in every single designer and i had to wear the 1. Size up ladies!

I was worried because I found out last minute that the wedding was formal. I am also concerned buying longer dresses because I‚Äôm so short. But it was perfect with my heels. It has black pinstripes and is super flattering. Definitely recommend to a formal or winter wedding.

Loved this dress! I'm normally between a size 4-6, so I took the suggestions and ordered a size up. I rented both the 2R and 3R and I'm so glad I got the 3. The dress has stretch but it's tight, so the smaller size bunched around my stomach and pulled. The larger size fit better and didn't look like it was puckering on my body. The length was great; I'm 5'9.
Great for black tie

As others have said in the reviews, this dress is really tight with no zipper. It really does fit like a glove. You kind of just slide it on. It's simple so I was able to be a bit more dramatic with my jewelry and makeup!

I didn't end up wearing only because I liked another dress more but this made me feel super sexy and hugged every curve! Perfect black dress. There isn't a zipper so this would be difficult to get up if you aren't a true 0.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks! It showed off all my best assets.
links_reviews_text: Heads up...it fits as tightly as everyone says! But that was the reason I ordered it. I typically have to get most things altered to fit me, especially formal wear. And because I was on a tight deadline, I knew I wouldn't have time for alterations. I ordered the 00 because I wanted to be sure that it would fit snug to my body. It was perfect.
Tons of compliments. Fit perfectly and very comfortable. Length was perfect with my 2.5" heels
Listened to other reviews and sized up, which was a good thing. The dress was tight fitting but super comfortable and sexy!
wedding w/ bf
Rent size 2 and 3. The 2 was a little too tight, the 3 was nice. No belts or zippers to fuss with. Very classy and Elegant gown.

Form fitting but true to size. Very comfortable. Received a ton of compliments. Would recommend putting deodorant on after putting on the dress since it is tight and difficult to put on- only con. Highly recommend!
This dress was even more beautiful in person. Compliments the body very well, elegant but also sexy. I did find that it ran a bit small! Great length and beautiful material. Was sad to send it back!

This dress makes you really glamorous! I got so many compliments all night long. And my husband couldn't stop staring at me , He keeps telling me so sexy and stunning woman of the night. By the way my husband chose the dress for me. He was happy that his wife like by everyone. I stand out among all the women at the party. Just to let you know the dress is snagged and hug your body - which I don't mind for myself I am a petite person. Just want you to be ready for that when you rent this dress. Other than that excellent dress choice for a formal event. AAAAA+ üëçüëåüëåüëå

This dress was perfect for a black tie optional wedding. The style is elegant but the material is stretchy and ribbed, which seems to dress it down a bit. The slit up the leg didn't show too much, and was perfect to see a shoe if you have a pair you'd like to show off! This was actually a replacement dress that the stylist picked out for me, and I'm so glad she did!
Has a rubber band that sits around the middle of torso

links_reviews_title: Runs very small, but comfortable and classy
links_reviews_text: I got this dress in a1R and 2R as my back up size. I ended up wearing the 2R, but it was still too small. I pulled it off but would've been much more comfortable in a 3R! I'm 5'8.5" and 138lbs for context. That being said, it was comfortable considering the size, and the slit is just high enough without it being too sexy. The fabric is rubbed, which keeps everything where it should be and is very flattering. I felt very cool and elegant for this black tie fundraiser. For a black formal dress, I'd definitely wear it again!!
A lot of compliments ...

links_reviews_title: Best dress I have rented from RTR!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. I'm usually a size 4 but I followed the previous reviews and ordered a size up. The dress was still a little snug but The dress is meant to be worn tighter. I would 100% get this dress again for another event. I had compliments all night long on how beautiful and elegant It was, It was a show stopper.

Upon arrival, I did not like the material that much. This dress clings to the body as it has a slinky material feel to it. I needed to size up to 1R, good thing Rent the Runway provides a backup size. Once you put it on, it does look pretty good. I wore a leather jacket and some knockout heels to spice up the look. It worked well after all.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a charity and felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect. I felt amazing in it and had a lot of compliments. The fabric is very stretch so it feels very confortable and doesn't move at all.
This dress does run very small but it is incredible!!

links_reviews_title: On time service!! But I didn't receive my first choice dress, which I really wanted to wear.
links_reviews_text: PROS: The fit was perfect for me. I usually wear size 2 in dress but since this was some spandex material, I'm glad I went with the 3R. The length was perfect with my 2" heels. It was comfy to move in because of the material. CONS: The strap that hangs on arm was a little to long/loose for me and I had to keep tucking it into the chest fold. Maybe you can safety pin it if it's a big issue. I received lots of compliments and people said it looked like a red carpet dress!!

I wore this for my friend's black tie wedding in NYC. The material and fit of the dress were perfect. Very chic. One thing to be aware of is the material is fairly thin, so spanx or seamless underwear are needed. Would 100% rent this again!
Wore this for Halloween. Everyone was complimenting this dress and everyone wanted to buy it. It fit like a glove and was very elegant

I loved the way this dress looked and it photographed even better. However, it runs small so it was a bit tight, making me have to figit with it, pulling the top up constantly. I'm also pretty tall (5'9") and since there wasn't a long option it was just a tad short, mainly because of the riding up when I walked so that was a bit annoying as well (I wore 4" heels). I ended up wearing the larger of the two sizes ordered, perhaps if I had known it ran small I could have ordered a size up and been more comfortable. Definitely still a great dress though!!

I had a last minute dress emergency so went to the store and found this dress. I definitely did not want to wear black, because usually it can be boring. This dress was just the opposite. It's sexy but still sophisticated. I felt so stylish. This dress has a lot of stretch- but it is tight and not forgiving. I typically wear a 2-4, and rented a 1R, I could have gone up a size.

Very elegant and flattering. Shape runs minuscule to really elevate hourglass figure. The shoulder strap drape was too long and flaccid so I had to tuck it in more. For reference 5'2, 100 lbs, 32-21-36

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit! I felt great wearing it!
links_reviews_text: Fabric was stretchy enough to feel comfortable, but kept it's shape. Length was great with heels.
Beautiful dress, great fabric. I really needed a 2, but they didn't have one available. I figured I could try the 0 based on reviews... nope.

This dress was tight but complimentary of my 5'3 and slim, athletic build. The only issue I had with it was the inner/upper lining cut me off at an awkward point on my torso and made my stomach bulge. Luckily I maneuvered the lining up in the front and rid of the awkward roll before the event so that I didn't look like a snake that had just eaten a mouse. This dress was beautiful and flattering but be aware of how form fitting it is!
I‚Äôd recommend going up 2 sizes on this dress. I wore my back up but would have been more comfortable with a larger size. I‚Äôm typically a 4-6.
Simple flattering, elegance timeless dress. The fabric is beautiful. It is very tight, but has an elongating slimming effect.
Great fit/style for the occasion (black tie). Sexy but classy.
This is a really cute dress. I had to work with the straps a little bc they were really large. It's comfortable but the flows kind of make it a little unflattering.

Do not size up! This dress is only for large breast women. I'm a 34 D and still had to wear a sports bra just to wear it. Oh and the straps are too long for petites with no adjustments. By the end of the day it was falling of my shoulder.
Beautiful colors and unique shape. Got so many compliments! Perfect for vacation. The straps were a little long but I fixed it with a safety pin. Would rent again!
Flowy bright dress, great for vacation. The fit, however, was not right for me - it was too low cut/too large on top. I wish the straps were adjustable.

The bottom of this dress is really cute but the top requires way too much maintenance to wear. First the straps are at least 2 inches too long. I had to pin them to wear this and the pins kept showing all night. Then the white material under the dress showed at the top both of the back and front of the dress as well as the tag in the back. It's too bad the top is such a pain as the bottom is cute. I wouldn't rent again.
Flows super cute needs fashion tape for top

links_reviews_title: Very flowy and perfect for a Hawaiian vacation night out!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous and flowy, but way too big at the top. The straps kept falling off and hard for a small chested girl to fill it in. Overall, a great dress, just wish the fit was better. Would work if you have safety pins, which I did not have on vacation.
Overall fit was good I tend to have an issue with dresses due to wider back than my lower half overall was able to zip !

I needed a dress for a friend's post destination wedding reception. It was outdoors in a backyard setting with a tropical fiesta theme. This dress was perfect because it was light and airy with layers of flair that I could move around confidently and comfortably. The only con was that the top was loose fitting in the bust so I had to kind of rig it to stay put. I'm not small chested so I thought it wouldn't be an issue and chose the smaller of the sizes I rented to be a bit more secure up top. Other than that it was very flattering for my size and any other size!
Great color and got lots of compliments

This is a great, fun dress. The colors and texture are beautiful. I also had to pin the straps and the neckline is annoying, so I only gave it 4 stars. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner using Unlimited. It was great renting that way, but I wouldn't rent via Reserve.

links_reviews_title: The bright colors of the dress just screams vacation!
links_reviews_text: I rented a 2R hoping it would be a perfect fit for my growing belly (19 weeks when I wore the dress) and the roomy stomach area is very comfy. The top makes my already huge boobs even more pop out. Also, I think this dress is made for longer torsos, I had to safety pin the straps to make them shorter, otherwise the waist area ended up close to my hips.

This dress is so fun and I did enjoy wearing it, but the straps were way too long. I tied them in little knots in order to make it wearable. It wasn't even a cleavage thing, it was just loose and made the whole dress seem too big. I'm a true size 6 with a 36C/D chest and it just didn't work with or without a bra. Maybe size down? Or tie the straps in knots like me :)

Wore this to a party where I wanted to look and feel awesome and this dress did it! I had people stopping me in a restaurant and on the street to complement me on my dress. The only negative is straps are designed for someone with a bizarrely long distance from chest to shoulder. I am short in that dimension but honestly had to pin it up 2 inches. If I had any other event in the next year where I could wear this I seriously would have bought it. Happy dress!!
This was a very breezy dress. Perfect for San Antonio in summer. I was told that I looked like a "goddess" in this dress. I would def pack a tank top, the chest area is way too big to wear without.

Sorry in advance for the boob shot. This dress is so pretty, it's a bummer the top is so poorly constructed, the seam isn't great and the liner continually reveals itself right at the chest line. It's so annoying! I wouldn't rent again for this reason alone.
This was the perfect dress for my vacation in Tulum - breezy, flirty and colorful. Easily fit in both for a stroll down the beach and at a fancy dinner.

links_reviews_title: Loved this summer dress, so light and flowy!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It hit me in all the right places! Made my chest look great and ruffles covered my little belly just right! I wore it with a little wedge but would also be great with a flip flop! This dress is also great with a jean jacket! I would rent this again for any summer occasion, dress up or down!
So comfortable and flows beautifully. Very flattering for curvier gals.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, odd tie to figure out in front because it doesn't make dress snug
links_reviews_text: Loose in the chest and tie doesn't hug your waist. It was pretty and yet, for my body, not very flattering

I wore this on a vacation to St Martin and felt like this dress deserved to be wined and dined! It was so perfectly fabulous for the occasion. I am 5'2" so I needed to pin the straps so they would stay on and in the right place, but otherwise the fit was perfect. It's a beautiful, flattering, forgiving dress that blows gracefully in the breeze. Rent this!
