links_reviews_title: Fun colors, easy to wear, stood out from the crowd
links_reviews_text: This dress was a replacement for my original order, and I'm so glad I got it. I wore to an outdoor evening event for my college reunion and it was great. The top is a little big but I was able to make it work. (If you need a supportive bra this may or may not work for you.) The empire waist and flowy bottom makes it super comfy and easy to move, dance, sit, stand in. Would happily wear it again - might try one size down from my usual.

links_reviews_title: Overall TTS but the style of the bust area is not great.
links_reviews_text: I did really like this dress, it fit very comfortably and has such pretty fabric! Overall fit was good, definitely had plenty of room in waist and hip area. The rib cage/bust area had too wide of a cut which caused it to show my bra often but since it was a bright yellow with lace bra it didn't look too bad ;)

links_reviews_title: beautiful summer dress with a fun hemline
links_reviews_text: i loved the bright colors and interesting details on this dress

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress if it weren't too big!
links_reviews_text: It was a size too large. The correct size would have been flattering. Too large a size was just awfully baggy.
Really liked the cut and style of this dress - would recommend sizing down

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but did not wear.
links_reviews_text: Too low cut for me.
Couldn't wear this. Even when I sized down (and I am narrow on top) the ribs were tight and the shoulder straps sloppy and long :(

links_reviews_title: Rented for a vacation to the beach
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear it - should have read other reviews before I rented it. Straps are so long the front part was practically open to my belly button.

links_reviews_title: Cute beach dress, but the top doesn't fit well
links_reviews_text: I should have listened to other reviews. The bottom of this dress is beautiful. The top is constructed oddly. I tried several bras and going without. Nothing worked. This could be fixed by the designer by adding cups the the inside and making the straps adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, couldn't make the top work
links_reviews_text: Great dress, nice length. Colorful summer print. I didn't wear it because I wasn't comfortable with the top, just too much fabric and too loose; I was worried I would fall out of it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely colors, runs big in bust
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing it as it was too big on my bust

This was too large for me in the chest area, so i had to wear a shirt under it. It fit great in the hips and for me, being 5'2 it was long. I had to wear heels, which was fine,as that is how i planned to wear it, but it was to bottom of my ankles. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful dress, very very lightweight- longer straps and little baggy in chest.
links_reviews_text: Slightly longer straps for a shorter person and there is a real plunge so it must fit the right bra.
For some reason, I thought I'd be different and the straps and chest would be OK - I was wrong! The fit is just not right!

links_reviews_title: It was a fun day in the sun.
links_reviews_text: This was very comfortable for a hot day. I wore it to an outdoor festival, the dinner, and then evening cocktails. It was versatile enough for all three of these events.

Loved this dress! I was a little perplexed by the straps, but eventually just wrapped them around back and tied in front. I wore pasties with this, I think a strapless bra would also work well. I'll definitely rent again for another summer weather vacation!

True to size, just a tad large for me in the past but that wasn't a problem. I took this on vacation and wanted to a beach wedding and reception. It was cool temperature-wise, looked great, and fun to dance in. Just the right level of fun and dressed up for a small tropical destination wedding.
Very good fit! Really elegant and slowly - perfect for cocktails on a rooftop

I loved this dress but it was snug through the rib cage and then the straps were WAY to long for my frame. I have a large bust and the strap length made it impossible to even tape in place. Wardrobe malfunctions were gtd if I wore this one.

I rented this dress to attend the Ballet. It was elegant, graceful, and perfect for the occasion. The material was warm for the cold night but not heavy. The slit was the perfect length and the material flowed when I walked. I'm small chested and it was snug without any gaps. The neckline was very flattering

I wore this dress to a formal for my law school class and it was actually a replacement dress because the other ones I ordered didn't fit right. I really loved the way this dress looked and how I felt in it. I have broad shoulders and this dress made me feel okay about the way my arms looked. The client service person I talked to about replacing my original order said that it was their favorite dress, and it's mine now too. I would definitely rent this one or others like it again.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering and comfortable. I'm so glad I rented it! I felt so pretty and got so many compliments!

Soft and comfortable. But runs big. The last few dresses I have worn were size 8. But this was too big. It arrived 2 days late, just in time for my event, so I didn't have time to find an alternative. I had to do some creative temporary tailoring with some temporary tucks and made it work.

Loved the dress and got a ton of compliments on it, but sizing was a little weird, at least for the two I got. The 0 was super tight, but the 2 was way too big. I ended up wearing the 2 for comfort, but it would have looked better if it had been more fitted.
I wore this dress to a formal wedding and received so many compliments. The length with heels was perfect and I didn't feel it was too long on the dance floor.

The fit was perfect, true to size. I absolutely loved the slit it really makes the dress, but It is on the right side of the dress and I usually like to take pictures to the left, with my wedding ring hand showing and that's the side I wear my hair to,m. This dress is very simple and classy on its own so it was fun to dress it up, I wore red heels and a diamond necklace. When I received it I thought the inner liner was white online, but it is actually a light grey which is fine, just unexpected.
I rented this dress for a black and white event! It was perfect. I received a lot of compliments. It fit great. I was 5 months pregnant too!
He saw me in the dress and said "Wow". That is amazing to hear after 27 years!!

I felt good in the dress. With high heels, the length was perfect and you can wear a bra with this dress, which is a pro. It's easy to dance in too. On the negative side, the light colored fabric of the skirt was gray ( not ivory) and it's sort of mottled and stained. You can't tell when standing, but it is noticeable in the light when sitting.

Dress looked much better in the photo than in real life. It the photo the dressed looked to have white lining with some shape to the ruffles. When i opened the bag, the lining was more dingy grey than white. The seaming at the neck was off so on my right side the grey lining showed which to me was noticeable & disappointing . To top it off, another woman at the event was wearing the exact dress from RTR as well.

links_reviews_title: Breakfast at Tiffany's wedding attire, Hollywood Glam
Comfortable and seems fun but kind of meh
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress specifically to showcase these fabulous new shoes. The jersey fabric drapes comfortably. Dress is cut to be looser fitting through waist and hips - I still have a bit of a tummy after having a baby and despite that looser fit, this didn't hide it as well as I'd have liked. I was also a bit disappointed that the white fabric ruffle in the slit was a dingy looking, not as bright white as I wanted. The arm holes in the 10 were a bit big - a hint of bra showed there and more obvious than ideal as the entire dress is lined with the white fabric (so, black dress, thin white peekaboo of lining, black bra...) In the end, I wore it to my event, and it got a very positive reaction, but it wasn't as much of a WOW factor as I'd have liked.

This dress was very comfortable and fit true to size. I wore 3" heels as the dress runs pretty long and I'm 5'5". The slit was my favorite part of this dress and I loved it for a black & white wedding in New Orleans!!

I got the size 12 and 14. They both fit but the 12 was a little snug and I wanted to feel more comfortable. I got so many compliments and I was comfortable all night. I am 5'8 38C. I was sad to see it go!
Beautiful dress, got lots of compliments all night. A lot of room in the bust, which is necessary for me. And I love how the skirt falls and moves

I rented this for an awards gala event and it was perfect! I'm about 5'4" 130lbs and the 4R fit perfectly. It even arrived a week earlier than expected. I got complements all night long and it was even great for dancing the night away.

Wore this for a black tie wedding and felt absolutely gorgeous (at 24wks pregnant!). The material is stretchy and a thick so it has substance to it. Definitely felt like the best dressed! Would absolutely rent again

links_reviews_title: A sophisticated, elegant dress perfect for a fancy event. RTR was so easy to use!
links_reviews_text: I am 5‚Äô5‚Äù plus wore high heels & the 2L was still too long for me. The 2R was a perfect length.

Although this was a beautiful dress, it runs very large. I read the other reviews so I got the smaller size. I am 5'4" and 105 pounds and usually wear a size 2 or 4, so I got a 0. However it was still very large on me, especially around the hips and waist. I didn't have time to request a new dress. My husband had to pull the dress back in the pictures.
This was so comfortable and so beautiful! The white is such a fun touch and I got so many compliments all night!

I loved wearing this dress! I probably could have got away with a Regular as it was slightly long even with heels, but it didn't get in the way, just dragged a little. The top area was a little loose and like to believe a size 4 would have been perfect. But it was flattering still and perfect for my event. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was flattering and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up style, and it was more subdued than the other dress I had chosen. However, it won because it was extremely comfortable, and minimized my hips while showing off some leg! The length of the 6L was perfect, it just grazed the floor with my 1 1/2 inch pumps (I'm 5'10"). Not sure if you can tell from the pics but it was a touch loose around the waist and hips, which is why I said that it runs a little large. My hips are 38" and my waist is 30".
It fit perfectly. I loved the thick, boat neck style cut.
I'm normally at 12 but wore 14.

links_reviews_title: A fun experience searching for the dress and getting to wear it
links_reviews_text: A bit tight around my rib cage but overall a beautiful gown!

I was torn between two dresses. Even thou I liked the style of the other one more then this dress, it was just so comfortable I could not resist. The material was nice and soft and fell perfectly. Also, for those dancers... It was easy to dance in. The dress overall was an easy fit!

Really enjoyed wearing this dress. Very comfortable and very fun to walk in. I felt like a show girl! Only thing I didn‚Äôt like- it was a little baggy around the waist. Not form fitting at all, just sort of hangs. I even purchased new spanx to slim everything down a little and really didn‚Äôt need them. Otherwise, loved the dress!
This dress fit perfectly and was super comfortable! It was for a black and white themed auction and was a bit. Great to dance in as well! Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Felt sexy and sophisticated.
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit large in the hip area but I don't have much hips to hug so felt a tad loose for me. But otherwise it is a great dress with the sexy slit on the side. And modest top coverage so no adjusting throughout the night needed. I would rent this again.

This dress is super comfortable! It fits true to size. It has that little bit of wow factor to stand out from the average LBD crowd. It is a bit long though, I am 5'3" & wore 4" heels & it was dragging just a bit on the ground.
Love this dress. I am 5'5'' and wore 4 inch heels with the 6R and it was just the right length.
This dress was awesome. It fit perfectly and was extremely easy to move around and dance in. Was just a bit long with 3"-ish heels. Got so many compliments. Love love love this dress.

links_reviews_title: As soon as I walked into the event, someone working there said how beautiful my dress was.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! It was very comfortable, it was a little long in the back I should have ordered the petite. I just absolutely loved the dress and would order it again!

I rented this as a backup dress but the dress I chose to wear was just so much better. This dress didn't fit correctly in the hips and sagged some in the front. I might give it another shot in a smaller size, but this would need gang buster jewelry to really make it work.

links_reviews_title: This was my backup dress for a black and white Mardi Gras ball. I did not wear this one.
links_reviews_text: I read that this dress ran large so I ordered a size 0. Even ordering down from my normal size 4, it was still rather shapeless in the torso.
This was my back up choice and so glad I wound up renting it! Received compliments all night, very comfortable dress!
I loved this dress! I wore it to a #Gala that said we should come fun and funky. I felt so great in this dress and would totally rent it again

links_reviews_title: The dress fit like a glove!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was true to size, comfortable, & snug in all the right places. I would absolutely wear the designer and dress again.

links_reviews_title: First time using RTR and definitely not my last time! Loved the dress-received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove!
This is the dress if you want to make an impact! Love it! And it's RED. It's tight but very comfortable and allowed me to dance all night long.
LOVE this dress! Super comfy, fit well, great material and had a classic look! Wore spanx and strapless bra underneath and neckline of dress was favorite part!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the AHA Heart Ball
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove!! I will be using RTR for now on! So many compliments. The dress was very comfortable! I was worried at first bc I have a larger booty but it really fit perfectly everywhere
This is the second time I have rented this dress! Love the way it fits. Love the material. Love the shade of red! This is also a very comfortable dress while sitting, standing or dancing!!!

Felt like a million bucks. Dress was so comfortable and received so many compliments. Didn't get good picture of sleeve but was able to dance all night dressed never slid down . Want to definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Color really popped in the sea of black dresses.
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect being 5'10!

I got compliments all night long! And it was so comfortable that at the end of the night I didn't want to change for the after party! I did have to adjust it quite a bit as I am smaller busted and had a hard time holding it up, other than that it was great!

There's no way this was the regular length. At 5'7 it was dragging on the ground and with 4 inch heels it was just off the ground. But it's a beautiful fabric very stretchy and comfortable. The color is vibrant and lovely and you'll stand out in the best way

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my company's holiday party that was a formal, Masquerade theme!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was perfect. It was snug but I could also move my legs in any way, bend down, etc. because the material is very stretchy but not thin or see through or anything like that at all. I received a lot of compliments too! I am a 32G in bra size and did not need to wear a bra with this (thank God!) and it held up up there all night :) I had never worn a long, red gown before and I'm so glad I found this beauty!

This was not my first or even second choice. After some were unable to ship, customer service was great, sent me multiple (8) options and that was the last one I tried on. It was a little big, but at least I was able to eat and drink all night without a worry! I ended up wearing the sleeve up a bit on my shoulder that helped with it being a little large. Material was very nice and comfortable. As a tall girl at 5'11 I was still able to wear 2 inch heels and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It made me feel wonderful!
links_reviews_text: I originally ordered a 4 (6 back up) but I got nervous and ordered a size 2 with a 0 backup and ended up wearing the zero. The top was a little big and kept slipping down so I used body tape to keep it in place. The dress didn't breath but was very soft and it was a little stretchy.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I am 5'3" and about 118 lbs. I wore three inch heels and the length was right at the floor.

Tons of compliments all evening~ was told by many that I had the Pretty Woman vibe going! Dress is very forgiving/stretchy and I could've easily fit the 4L but the 6L worked. I'm 5'9" and the long worked nicely with 3inch heels. Super comfortable. I used safety pins to keep the black strings tucked in all evening with no issues.
Absolutely perfect fit and super comfortable. Wore it to a NYE gala & got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: The color was so fun and stood out!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a ball! The color really stood out and the dress was so comfortable, I was worried about dancing in it but you can actually slide the strap up and it doesn't look bad and had no issues dancing!! I wore spanx and you couldn't see them through but the dress does outline your figure a bit. I would definitely wear it again or recommend it! I have long legs but with normal size heels and with a 6L it as a perfect length even when I took my shoes off to dance!

links_reviews_title: I felt like royalty in the dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress I rented this past weekend was a winner! It fit me like a glove. I felt like a queen in the well tailored dress. I received so many compliments for the color and style.

I loved this dress SO much with two small exceptions. I'm 5'4, and the regular should've been the right length to wear with heels. This dress was almost 1.5 inches too long, even with platform heels! Thank goodness I had sticky hem tape, which ended up saving me! Also, the black hang straps were completely visible the entire time I wore the dress no matter how much I tried to tuck and stick to the inside of the dress. They're visible in all of my pictures. Lovely otherwise!

This dress was a show stopper and I received compliments all night. Im 5'3" and 115lbs and wore a 2R and probably could have worn a OR. The color was gorgeous! The fabric was thick, stretchy and comfortable. Although many reviews said the fabric/dress shows everything, I felt that it covered up my imperfections well. I wore a strapless bra and a pair of spanx-like boy shorts underneath and you couldn't see any lines. The down side was the length. I'm 5'3" and wore high heels and the dress was too long. I had to use hem tape to keep from tripping. The reviews warned me about the black hanger straps and they weren't kidding. Such a pain tucking those in all night. Overall I liked the dress and would consider renting it again.

I rented this dress in a 2 and 4 after reading other reviews that it was snug. I could have worn the 0 easily; I didn't find it to be as snug as some other reviewers said. Someone else pointed out that the hanger straps (black) kept popping out and I found that to be true too.. super annoying! I wore nothing underneath and overall loved the dress. I'm 5'3", wore 4" heels, and had to hem the bottom about 1" with fashion tape.

i'm 5'7, 180 pounds, it was a little snug but a size up would've been too big. it was just a smidge too short but i didn't want to wear heels so i got the regular instead of the long. overall i was happy with my dress and will be renting again.

The dress was absolutely beautiful and I felt insanely beautiful in it! It is made out of stretchy material and hugged all of my curves in the appropriate areas. It was easy to dance in as well. I will agree with everyone else that you must be selective of your shape wear underneath the dress because even panty lines will show! Otherwise it is worth the rent!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments with this dress!
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful dress and comfortable. I was nervous at first because it was a bit long but with the high heels was just perfect. I got so many compliments with this dress is so so cute!

I was looking for a res formal gown for a black tie wedding, did not end up wear this one only because I found another that was more fitted throughout the body. This dress was really comfortable with the off the shoulder and the fabric felt really luxe.
I loved this dress! A tiny bit loose on the top but other than that it was the perfect fit and length.

links_reviews_title: My sorority formal was so fun with all of my friends
links_reviews_text: the dress fit perfectly! I am 5'7 and weigh 130 pounds. I was worried about the length but it was perfect with heels

links_reviews_title: Elegant, sexy and comfortable all in one.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a stunner. I wore this to a benefit ball where I was sitting or standing most of the evening and felt extremely comfortable but without sacrificing any amount of elegance. It fit snugly but the material is stretchy. I wore a size 10L with heels and the hem perfectly kissed the floor. As others have said, be sure to wear seamless shapewear because the fabric is very smooth and will show any wrinkle or bump under the dress. I read previous reviews complaining about the black hanger straps popping out throughout the night so I taped those down with some double sided fabric tape - problem solved! They stayed put the whole night. If you're debating on this dress and wondering, "Can I pull this off?" I say YES and you should!

links_reviews_title: This was an event where my boyfriend was being honored and we walked a runway before thousands.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I wore a 10L and I am 5'8. The dress was still long enough with heels. I received compliments all night and all over social media. I felt very glamorous in front of the thousands of people who applauded as my boyfriend escorted me to the dais.

This dress was actually my back up to my first pick, but I instantly fell in love. I felt so incredibly confident and elegant. I wore it to a military ball and turned heads! Everyone was giving me compliments on it.

Great color and very forgiving. The off the shoulder detail gave the dress more character. Was easy to dance in and move all night. I hate when shoes show with formal dresses so the long was a perfect length.

Even though I ended up wearing the 2, I was disappointed that the 0R was very short (almost 9") and wouldn't have worked at all for the formal event. I am glad I ordered spanx to wear under it; I just felt more secure having that to hold everything in place. The dress would be better if the lining went at least to the knee. It falls just at the thigh and is visible through the fabric, and I wanted to keep pulling it down. The dress arrived very wrinkled so I had to spend extra money to get it pressed. Beware of this is your dress arrives the day before your event so you have time to address that issue.

links_reviews_title: Easy delivery and return for a dress I would never have been otherwise able to afford
links_reviews_text: Dress was super comfortable and easy to move in. I received so many compliments on it. Would definitely recommend this dress to anyone looking to make a statement at a formal event!!

This dress fit almost perfectly despite going up a size. I read the dress ran a little big and I could've gone with the 2. I wear 4 regularly. I received compliments on the dress all night and felt elegant. I thought the material was quality. Very satisfied with this dress and recommend it for anyone looking to be conservative with a little pop of color.
I chose this dress for a formal gala and it was perfect. The dense knit is comfortable and flattering and for once, at 5'11", the long was long enough!

I wore this to a black-tie awards gala and there is no way to describe this dress other than beautiful, classy, and glamorous. It fit my hourglass figure like a glove - was tight in all the right places without ever feeling restrictive or too sexy - although it was subtly sexy. I loved everything about this dress and would rent this again and again if it was acceptable to repeat gowns! As others mentioned, the fabric is a little surprising - like scuba gear - but to me, it was soft and so comfortable. I did not wear a bra with this dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress was fantastic, I received so many complements and the shade of red was absolutely perfect
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, but it is fitted at the waist, so you need to make sure to wear the proper undergarments.
Great dress. Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Attended a sold out gala of over 1K beautiful people, and not one person wore the same dress as mine
links_reviews_text: 5‚Äô10, 34DDD, size 6. The dress fit perfectly! It was long enough with 4‚Äù heels which is usually an issue for me. The bust stayed in place mostly, had to pull it up a few times towards the end of the evening, but I felt great in the dress! Received tons of compliments on the dress!

links_reviews_title: The experience is always so amazing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect. I'm a wider hip and skinnier waist and this dress fit perfect. The fabric was thicker so it helped suck everything in.

I wore this to an Army military ball. It's very simple, yet elegant, and has something about it that screams WOW! I received a lot of compliments. The dress material is very comfy but I was not able to lift my arms without having to readjust the dress after.
This dress is gorgeous, but it shows every single bump and dimple. I was a bit self conscious of how clingy it was, but it was very beautiful.

I wore this to a party with the dress code "boots and suits". This was dressy enough to seem like a cocktail dress but also was flirty and could go with cowboy boots. This could have also been dressed up or down. I loved how this dress moved when dancing.
I would definitely rent this again. Great for parties or a night out. It's comfortable and has enough stretch to not be annoying for a long night.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, got a lot of compliments. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It's a very beautiful and comfortable dress that was really easy to dance in. However the zipper in the back kept on unzipping throughout the night. I received a lot of compliments on the dress throughout the night and will definitely rent it again.
I absolutely loved this dress! I was worried it was going to be too small but it fit perfectly. The material is very giving and super comfortable. I got so many compliments all night.
I liked this dress a lot! My figure is very curvy, so it was kind of big through the waist but was still flattering! The material was thick, and it was very comfortable!
The ruffles are amazing for hiding things! Zipper was a little loose and I had to have two random guys in elevator help me out, don't think they minded . Wore this to a Christmas party
Rented this dress for a work Christmas party. Got the 8, which is my normal size, and it fit perfect. The shoulders are a little tight, but that's to be expected in an off the shoulder dress.

I love this dress and have rented it twice now (didn't get any pics the first time so I was able to wear again!) it is so fun and flirty, short but not too short (I am 5'10") and can be dressed up for a 5pm wedding. Fits true to size!!

Overall this fit very well. It‚Äôs slim fitting, super comfortable, and i didn‚Äôt have to pull it up once! The only con was that the lining underneath rode up a few times. But other than that it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: This was so cute!!! But the zipper in the back kept coming down. It needs a clasp at the top!
links_reviews_text: Love the layers to this dress!
I'm an off the rack size 6 that is a little on the fluffy side right now. Still fit awesome. No fidgeting. Wore strapless bra.
The color and fit were fantastic , beautiful fun and flirty style .

Extremely comfortable and fun. The color blue is bold and perfect for a summer day. I dressed it down with white sneakers to wear the dress out. Only cons are it kept unzipping a little (no top hook) and it's off-the-shoulder so your arms are a little restricted. Highly recommend this dress! xx Simply Gharib
Was long enough for me to feel comfortable dancing in, but couldn't really raise my arms. I got a lot of compliments on the dress and how fun and flirty it is. Great bold blue color

Extremely comfortable. The color is bold but perfect for a summer formal event. I received compliments all night. Not form fitting through the mid-section. Good length for formal attire. Only cons is the zipper fell down a few times throughout the night (no top hook) and there isn't much mobility for your arms...but what off the shoulder dress allows your to wave your arms up anyways. Highly recommend this dress!!

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner and loved it! Fun ruffles and fabric make it great for a more casual party. Fabric doesn't have a stretch which made raising my arms not so easy. And there wasn't a hook and eye with the zipper so it kept unzipping about an inch every time I raised my arms too high. It was annoying, but should be an easy fix for RTR to add. Overall great dress, with small but manageable annoyances.
Fit was true to size, material has some stretch and is comfortable, great dress
Beautiful royal blue color, very figure flattering for all types. The sleeveless never fell and stayed in place without any adjusting. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my son's graduation.
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a size 6 and rented the 6, and the size was perfect. There was a little bit of room around the bust and waist but it wasn't noticeable and still very comfortable. I loved the way it felt (fabric has some stretch to it) and loved the way it looked on.

links_reviews_title: Festive and fun, a little tight through the shoulders
links_reviews_text: Received so many compliments on this dress! I am usually a size 2 or 4 and the 4 worked, but I probably could've worn a 6 in this dress also. Snug in a good way across my hips but a little tight across the shoulders. Really fun, loved wearing it!

links_reviews_title: Epic and zipper is so annoying
links_reviews_text: Runs a little large. The 10 was a little big on me. The zipper in the back doesn't have a hook, I think I needed to be re-zipped 10 times the night I wore it out. Besides that beautiful color and comfortable.

Love the color and ruffles! Top is a little big so next time I would rent a medium. I'm 5'9, 32D about 165 lbs. it's such a fun dress! Had hoped to wear it for a May 5th party but it rained and turned casual.
Loved this dress! Fabric was thick and hugged every curve in a very flattery way. I did have to size up on this brand. I am typically a 0 or 2 in dresses and sizes up to a 4. Fit like a glove!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the way this looked but it is restrictive
links_reviews_text: Dress was super flattering but I wouldn't really dance in it, I couldn't lift my arms above a 75 degree angle which is an issue for me at weddings. The zipper also came down all the time, (probably) because I was dancing so hard.
Not tight, very comfortable, light, easy to dance in

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful dress, great color and fit! I received a ton of compliments in it & felt great!
links_reviews_text: Only con would be the zipper. It would not stay up, we had to pin it, and it still kept falling down throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: This was for Mardis Gras. I got so many compliments! Perfect dress for the occassion!
links_reviews_text: The top was a bit large.
Wore this out one night for my bachelorette party - fun little dress & the color is great! Runs a little big in the stomach/waist area. Overall, comfortable & great for a night out!

Rented this for my Carmen Miranda Halloween costume. I thought the dress was blue with yellow piping (appeared that way in the photo) but the piping is actually white. Was still perfect for the costume and very comfortable. Definitely an adorable dress - would rent again just to wear sans costume
I wore this for a halloween costume, but I would rent again for an occasion. I got both the 8 and the 6 and ended up wearing the 6. It fits true to size.
I am usually a 2-0 but in this dress it fit a bit tight in the bottom. 4 fit perfect. Great length for a 5'3 frame.

This dress was perfect for an outdoor wedding. It was very comfortable and easy to dance in. I normally wear a size 6, and ended up wearing the 6. Based on the other reviews I ordered a size up as well. The dress ended up being a little too big on me, so I would say order your normal size and a size down. Great dress overall I would definitely rent this again!
I was hesitant until I put it on. Very fun and flattering. I received compliments all night on the town in Chicago. Did size up as recommended.

This is a really fun and flirty dress for a wedding, date night or special event; it could easily be worn day or night, dressed up or down. I wore this out to dinner and drinks in Vegas. I loved that it was feminine and classy, yet still my sexy; my husband loved it! If you're curvy in the hips, I would recommend sizing up. I normally wear a size 6, but I'm a bit pear-shaped with curvier hips, and the size 8 in this dress fit my hips perfectly. That meant it was a little loose in the arms/sleeves, but that just made it all the more comfortable. The material is really nice, and the dress feels very well-made. The ruffles are flattering and accentuate your form. The black-and-white stripe trim accent is a nice touch too.

This is a beautiful dress, loved the color and details, HOWEVER the zipper has no hook so it kept unzipping with my every movement. Hugely annoying of course. My long hair got to help covering it most of the time and any one near me who I asked to zip me. I waited for my brother's grad ceremony to end, and run back home to put a safety pin, it really did the work. I could go back to his prom, have dinner, walk, dance and run after my toddler comfortably.
This dress was so fun! I rented this for an Havana Nights themed engagement party and it was perfect! The dress is so fun and fits very well. I would definitely rent again!

Rented this for a summer wedding in Florida. It was a semi conservative event, but I still wanted some style and not a sad sheath of a dress. I chose this and loved it. I felt comfortable, confident, and the cut was perfectly flattering. Usually wear a 6, got a 6 and felt fine. Shoulders didn't cut into me either. Wore sticky bra cups, gold jewelry, strappy heels.

links_reviews_title: so in love with this dress!
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress- the color is stunning and the ruffles are so fun. I was nervous that the dress was going to run really small, but I actually wore the size 6 instead of the 8. Ruffles can sometimes be tricky and unflattering, but I felt the exact opposite happened with these ruffles! Definitely rent this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: I got compliments all night! I read the other reviews and ordered up a size (wore a 4 and I'm normally a 0/2). It fit perfectly and was very comfortable--I danced for hours.

I was feeling a little anxious about having to put on a nice dress for a wedding, having fallen off the healthy bandwagon the past few months. This dress gave me that boost of confidence I needed. I absolutely loved it and would definitely rent it again! The fabric felt rich + luxurious and had great stretch. I didn't have to wear a bra & it was an appropriate length while still young & flirty. It's definitely not your average party dress.
Felt like wearing pajamas to the ball!! So comfortable but wears like a gown

Wow what a nice and comfy dress! I'm 5'2 and 130 lbs and 34B. I usually am a 4 or 6, but this was a bit larger and i went with the 4. This fit just right even length wise. I would think this would be short for taller girls. I got a ton of compliments for the subtle but sexy shimmer of the dress.

I got lucky and found this New Years dress on the first shot. I'm normally a 6/8 due to my curves, but shockingly the 2 fit perfectly (and lucky for me because it's the only size they had left). Absolutely love this!

links_reviews_title: Dress was super easy to move around in and super comfy.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size larger in dresses because of my wide rib cage and shoulders. This dress fit perfect because of the low back. I loved the adjustable straps too!!

This was my first time doing RTR and I was very impressed! I read the reviews here to figure out what sizes to get, I usually wear a 2, I ended up wearing the 2, but I could have definitely sized down. The fabric is very stretchy and forgiving. So beautiful on and I felt awesome in this!
Fairly long

links_reviews_title: It just did not fit me right.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but did not fit me right. Just haven't had good luck with my selections.

links_reviews_title: Felt so confident in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my backup option, but I felt much more confident and comfortable in this one so I chose to wear it for my grad school formal. It fit perfectly and felt sexy and classy. Loved it!

I love the look and style of this dress. However, the pink fabric is super unforgiving! The dress fit me really well (yay adjustable straps!) and I even had some give in the waist, but the pink part showed everything - including the outline of my belly button - which was less than flattering. The red fabric is thicker and I wish the dress was made entirely out of that kind of fabric. That said, I still really liked the dress. The color blocking is unique and interesting, and it was comfortable.
I love this dress and have rented it several times. Gorgeous, fun and sexy! TTS!
The dress fit like a glove. The color is beautiful, the material was comfortable. I worn it to a summer evening wedding and received so many compliments. I would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove - compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - the spaghetti straps are adjustable so I tightened since I'm likely not as well endowed as some previous wearers. I invested in some nicer shapewear to keep everything smooth and sucked in. And it paid off - compliments all night and I felt wonderful in this dress! Pink and red for the win!

links_reviews_title: Great colors and style! But showed every crease, even with spanx!
links_reviews_text: Great color, and fits true to size. The 3/4 length style makes it a bit more formal but the colors keep it young and fun. I felt a little self-conscious all night though because every crevice of my figure showed, including the outline of my belly button, even with spanx!
Cute dress! Flattering and sexy yet sophisticated! Runs small.
Very fitted dress, was in ok condition on Dec'18.
This one didn't go up to a 14 but it was a good fit. Without spanx it zipped at a 12. Would be a great date night look.
Very high quality fabric that stretches and smoothed all my curves. Will definitely rent again.
Loved the way this dress fit. The colors and pattern are super fun and bring a lot of attention
I rented this as a backup for an event, and didn't end up wearing it sadly. It is a stunning dress and hugs in all the right places! It has a little bit of give, and a very elegant silhouette.
This dress was soooo comfortable! The colors are really bright and fun and was perfect for a night out in Florida. I would rent again.
I loved this dress. It was comfortable and fit very well. I got a lot of compliments on it throughout the night. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Vibrant colored dress, on trend, perfect length
links_reviews_text: Wore this to brunch. Great vibrant colors and fit like a glove.

This dress was amazing- got it right as I was about to leave the RTR store. It must've just come out bc it was brand new with tags. The dress fit great, it was form fitting and I wouldn't have been able to wear shapeware had I needed to. I received lots of compliments on this little mama. I typically wear black, but this dress helped me add some color to my rotation! I paired it with a fringe leather jacket for a mountain cocktail wedding welcome party, with nude heels. I had such a good time we forgot to take photos!! This dress is gorgeous and I would love to wear it again!

I wanted to wear this for an outdoor event, but unfortunately even with a body shaper underneath, the thin material shows every little seam and bump. The bodycon silhouette highlighted too much tummy for me to feel good.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but so thin!
links_reviews_text: Love the design and cut of this dress. Colors are bright and pretty. Issue was the material was so thin that you could see pantylines and bra. I tried this with spanx on and you could see the seam. Otherwise this would have been great!
Dress was delivered very wrinkled so could not wear it at all.
The fit is perfectly snug True to size

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this, but a size up would be perfect for a spring/summer wedding
links_reviews_text: The straps were adjustable, which was great! But the dress was wayyy too tight and very thin material (so can't even hide spanx underneath)

Not a forgiving dress! It shows every imperfection and bumps in your figure! I ended up returning after I tried. It awkwardly ends below the knee and makes it look conservative the chest area is not showing anything...

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it, because it was too tight in my stomach.
links_reviews_text: I have a straight body, but it was too tight on my hips. Thin fabric felt more appropriate for a summer event. Probably would have been cute in one size up.
Super tight on hips and rides up when you walk, but passers by did not seem to notice. SO many compliments!

i usually love christian siriano's dresses but this one did not work. i'm pretty solidly a 6, but it bunched oddly at the hips and made my boobs look somehow both flat and vulgar. obviously not every dress works on every figure, but i would recommend this only if you're very straight and narrow.

links_reviews_title: My favorite RTR dress I've rented!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is incredible. Extremely comfortable fit. Color was fabulous.
Based on reviews I knew I probably needed the 12 but order the 10 anyways. I could have made it work, but it was just a tad too snug. Colors are gorgeous. Wish the fabric was slightly stiffer.

links_reviews_title: Loved it's a midi so expect the length
links_reviews_text: So I'm busty for my narrow body but this fit comfortably... it wasn't hip hugging but it laid on my hips and was stretchy.., it did not look baggy in the hips at all- it moved with my curves as I walked and the colors were stunning on my brown skin - I'm 5'4 so it was below my knees and the adjustable straps accommodated my bust- Sorry for not having a photo but please rent it!!! The length may not work for shorter girls and it'll be too big if you're smaller in weight and height than I am...

links_reviews_title: Great colors but too tight for me
links_reviews_text: The colors are beautiful in person. The fabric is lightweight and not very forgiving though. I didn't end up wearing this because it was too tight. I normally wear a 4/6 and ordered this in a 4 which was too small. I was able to easily get into the 4, but because it was so snug and the fabric so flimsy, you could see the every line, including my bellybutton. For reference, I'm 5'4", 135lbs, 32DD and usually prefer tighter fitting clothes.

links_reviews_title: I felt super feminine and stylish in this dress
links_reviews_text: No bra need. Seamless underwear recommended. Flawless fit with a sexy slit.

links_reviews_title: Cute but loose fit in the bust
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the fit in the bust. The straps were too long/loose and material gaped. The fit in the hips was good so I think that perhaps this dress is not ideal for small busted folks (can't adjust straps, etc.). Perhaps with a special (and very low) bra it might have worked.

Color was a standout for sure, but this didn't get a 5 star from me because it just didn't fit right. I think I'm just too short for it, but it was definitely too long on me and bunched in the waist area. I'm 5'5, so I don't consider myself to be "short", just average. Other than that super cute dress

links_reviews_title: Fit in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Fit in all the right places. Only negative thing I have to say about this dress was the straps were a little long and kept falling off my shoulders. Didn't mind it, just harder to dance!

links_reviews_title: Cute for a narrow hipped body type.
links_reviews_text: This was my back up option & I didn't end up wearing it. I liked the dress but I'm an athletic build with larger thighs. It fit well in the waist but is one size larger than I normally wear and was tight in the legs/hips/booty. Perfect for anyone with a more narrow build.
The fit was true to size, comfortable, snug... but still easy to dance & move in! Received a lot of compliments because of the pretty color & fit.

This dress was very tight on my hips (38 inches) and the inner liner kept riding up. But the size 6 was too big in my waist (27 inches) and bust (36inches). You kind of have to be a perfect hourglass to wear. The material is not stretchy. But despite my discomfort of the size 4, it still looked great and I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but did not work with my body type
links_reviews_text: The dress was too small in the hips and too big in the waist, so it looked bunchy and not flattering. It was a pretty color but just did not work with my body type so I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but unable to wear due to fit in bust
links_reviews_text: Dress was very pretty but seemed to bunch weirdly around the waist (possibly due to the lining). I was unable to wear this dress since it just looked very odd on me. It is very low cut and you need boobs to wear this dress. I ended up wearing another dress option I had and just returned this dress. The dress itself seemed nice, just make sure you have the chest to fill out this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but not for dancing!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to a wedding. I chose not to wear it because it's very fitted and not a stretchy material, so I didn't feel like I would move comfortably in it on the dance floor. The color was gorgeous, and the flare at the bottom was super fun. I rented a 2, and usually am, but I definitely needed a 4.

I couldn't get enough of this dress! The details were amazing from the lace on the skirt to the edging on the top. The fit was amazing and color even better than pictured. The shoulder straps are a little long causing the neckline to sit a bit lower than I had anticipated but it wasn't anything that would have prevented me from wearing this dress. Highly recommend!
This dress is absolutely gorgeous on. Runs large - I normally wear 12, sometimes 10, and even the 10 I wore was a bit big. Perfect for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Sexy red dress but not for large chested ladies!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing!! So flattering and loved the detail around the chest and bottom lace. This dress is definitely boobalicious though, I found myself constantly readjusting and making sure the girls stayed in and I don't even consider myself to have large boobs.

links_reviews_title: I got soo many compliments on this dress!!! I loved the color and the flair at the bottom.
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous, lightweight and easy to move around it. I usually fit a size 6 and it fit like a glove. However I have like NO boobs and if I had I would imagine feeling very out there. Even with my no boobs I used tape to keep the dress close to my skin so I didn‚Äôt give a free nipple show. I would wear this again it was one of the best ones I‚Äôve rented.

Beautiful dress and great for a summer wedding. Hugged my hips and back in all the right ways. However, as the other reviews say, I needed a lot of dress tape to make everything stay in place or otherwise risk a bad wardrobe malfunction! I am pretty small on top so wore sticky push-up cups and then used tape to keep the dress in place. I am also short-waisted and the straps were really too long on me- my solution was to use a nice thin silver necklace chain across my back to keep the straps from falling down- I actually got compliments on that, too :). Overall I felt beautiful in the dress but I did feel like i needed to constantly check to see I wasn't revealing anything!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress hated the straps
links_reviews_text: It was so beautiful but very uncomfortable and the straps were so long I had to pin it together

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous. So many compliments..
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for hot summer wedding.

I absolutely LOVE this dress. The color, the detail, the fit. I am 3 months post partum and this dress completely hugged all the right curves and was forgiving in the belly area. I did have to wear fashion tape to make sure the girls stayed in place. Very comfortable. Got so many compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the color - it really stands out! The top is kind of big, so if you don't have much up top to fill it out, you have to be mindful of nip slips! Other than that, it fit like a glove and was super flattering. Would definitely recommend renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color, nice details, too much boob
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wedding and wanted to wear a size 8 so it wasnt quite as fitted and maybe the chest would be a little more conservative, but RTR messed up my order and sent me horrible back up options. I read reviews that said it was a lot of cleavage and I thought I would be fine, but wow those reviews werent lying. The triangle pieces that cover your boobs are just a little too small. Luckily the dress is a bit longer, so the conservative length offsets the non-conservative cleavage. The dress fit nicely and the details along the bottom added a cute touch.

links_reviews_title: People kept complementing in how the fit and color were perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove and I absolutely loved the color of it. However, I chose this dress after looking and reading over everyone's review and the one thing that was never mentioned was how loose the top section was. I used endless amounts of tape to help the top from showing too much but in the end, I chose to take the dress off and changed into my second option from RTR. I kept trying to adjust the top so my breasts weren't showing but it got to be too annoying and such a stressor.

I am usually between a 4 and a 6 in dresses, but went with the 4 since I felt more comfortable in it. It's such a gorgeous color - I received compliments all night! I didn't expect to like it as much as I did, it's seriously the perfect dress for a wedding. It's definitely form-fitting though - my one regret is not investing in a pair of spanx beforehand. Overall I still loved the dress and would rent it again. My boyfriend even loved it so much that he asked if Rent the Runway would sell it to me! ;)

Loved the way this dress looked, but looks can be deceiving! Super fun and flattering and got tons of compliments, especially on the color. BUT - it is a bit roomy in the chest (even though I'm a 34C/32D) and required lots of tape. It also wasn't the easiest to dance in. Worth it though!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but definitely get some fashion tape
links_reviews_text: I really love Nicholas dresses. This dress hugs my curves and was still classy for a wedding rehearsal dinner. The only thing is the straps are not adjustable and the front is pretty low cut. I forgot tape and was almost flashed the party a few times. Women with larger busts might have a hard time wearing this, so be sure to tape accordingly!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: So fun and sexy, this dress has it all. I like that it's in between red, coral and orange so it's just the right amount of attention-getting. I am normally a 4 and found that the 4 fit true to size, just gapped a bit around my hips but I guess that's just me. The straps dug in a bit if I was sitting down but it felt like a small sacrifice for how awesome I felt in this dress. I definitely needed to wear an adhesive strapless backless bra (NuBra). A strapless bra might still show since it has a low back.
This dress was perfect for a memorial day weekend wedding. VERY form fitting but hugs in all the right places. Great length--hits right below the knee. Many compliments and would wear again!
Loved this. It is probably best for people with small chests like me because the neckline is fairly plunging. Made my waist look tiny and me look curvy. So many compliments. Loved, loved, loved.

Great dress - lots of compliments. Be prepared, it's pretty low cut. I used fashion tape to hold the dress in place. The fit was true to size although couldn't fill the hips. It laid okay still. Fun dress to wear to a wedding!

This dress was perfect for the tropical wedding in Hawaii I attended. So fun and I loved the floral lace cut outs around the bottom flare. Only down side was it was a little right around the thighs so kind hard to dance in and needed LOTS of fashion tape to keep the top covering my sticky bra.

I struggled trying to find a dress being on the bustier side and being self conscious of my mid section. This dress is extremely flattering and sexy. Got compliments all night. I typically wear a 12 and wore the 10. Straps are very long-I had to tie little knots in the back.

I loved this dress but was very stuck between the 4 and the 6. My breasts were swimming in the 6 and felt great in the 4 however the 4 was very tight on my wide hips. I ended up going with the 4 but felt dancing was a little difficult because it was so tight! None the less it was beautiful!
The dress fits true to size The straps could not be adjusted

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Mexico wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved how this dress fit my curves. Was pretty snug and really difficult to wear a bra without it showing. Was a little difficult to bend down at all but overall it fit me like a glove and I got a ton of compliments on it! Would definitely recommend.

I have an athletic body with big thighs and butt and very small chest. That said I'm still pretty curvy so finding a dress that fits can be tough. I can say I LOVED this dress with no reservations. I'll likely purchase it. I would say if you have a larger chest, it could be very sexy but it was just perfect for me. Keep your shoulders back and you'll have no problem with slippage as others have mentioned.

I wore this for engagement photos , and absolutely loved the dress, however I definitely would hav done a size up! Based on the reviews with girls with similar body type, I thought this would be the right size, but it was SO tight. I have broad shoulders and a small chest, so strap length fit fine. The dress did the job for pictures though, just no wiggle room. I would absolutely rent this dress again for a wedding or special occasion, but would definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a wedding and received compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Tight through the hips but overall incredibly flattering + I found it to fit true to size. Tape for the boobs is a MUST otherwise it will slip and annoy you ;)

I am rented the 4, and 6 as a backup just in case. I'm glad I did - the 4 fit but was really tight and uncomfortable, so I went with the 6 for the evening. However, the 6 was too big on me and the straps are not adjustable, so I felt like I was falling out of the dress all night and was really self conscious. I did get tons of compliments, the dress is GORGEOUS.. but the fit didn't work for me.
The dress is beautiful and color is fabulous. The only thing I have problem is the fabric. It's more suited for spring/ summer events.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a daytime outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for a day time outdoor wedding. Runs a bit big - I am usually between a 10/12 and I had to get an 8. Size down if you like a snug fit. Hugged my curves beautifully. Loved the bead-like detail around the neckline and the design on the bottom. Super comfy. The straps were a tiny bit long and neck line plunges so had to keep pulling up but nothing I couldn't handle. Loved this dress so much!
This dress is incredible. I wore it for a wedding and received so many compliments. I have a small chest and wide hips so the top was big and the waist very tight but it was worth it.

I LOVED this dress, wore it to my best friends wedding upon her request and could not have been happier. definitively attracts lots of attention but it looked great with my 34B small breast. you need to use tape and since I danced all night I had to re-taped several times. it fit me just right on the top but a bit loose around the hips.
Love this designer, super comfy and elegant-perfect for night of dancing

I found it to be very comfortable and flattering. I wore a size 40. (I am 5'8 and 132 lb) .It doesn't have a zipper so wait to put deodorant on! Overall a great dress. I would definitely wear it again.

This dress was a backup that came since my dress was no longer available. I am so happy it did! The color was stunning. I received numerous compliments and it fit like a glove. This dress is both sexy and classy and my husband loved it. Would recommend it!

links_reviews_title: It's just so easy and affordable
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! So many complaints I lost count
So comfortable! No bra required. Fabric is thicker but very breathable. Dress is form fitting but not strangling. Very stretchable fabric.
I needed something to wear as a wedding guest in July. I loved how this looked online and even better in person. The cut outs were subtle and i loved the bow on the shoulder! Would rent again!
The dress fit true to size and was flattering. I was worried the cutouts would highlight problem areas but because the material is stretchy enough it ended up being very flattering

links_reviews_title: The most amazing dress I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. The fit is perfect. It is true to size, maybe a little big. It's fitted but makes you look really good and hides flaws. Not like a typical body con dress. The cut outs and bow really add to the dress. Rent this dress, you won't regret it!!!
The only thing wrong was there was a little cuff or something at the bottom of the dress. Otherwise is was great

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments! Love it!!
links_reviews_text: It's stretchy material. It hugs your body and feels so comfortable. I think is very pretty and sexy at the same time. Hope it helps I'm 5'6 weight 150lbs wear 34C and on jeans 29

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy at the same time
links_reviews_text: Loved this look. Felt very confident in it and got tons of compliments on it. I worried the cutouts looked odd but they added interest so I guess it's okay.
The fabric was thick and stretchy, so perfect for a tight fit. The bow and cutout details jazz up a classy look.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments about this dress!!
links_reviews_text: The stretchy material made this dress perfect for a night of dancing & good food at a friends wedding!

links_reviews_title: Was easy to wear and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I loved the shoulder detail. It's a stretching material. I'm 6' tall, just so you have an idea of the length.

First time using RTR- dress was beautiful. I got many compliments and felt great in this dress. The fabric was thick, slimming, and smoothing. The cutouts make it unique... a little bit fun and sexy but still appropriate for this lady of a certain age. I am 5'9" with a very long torso. Many dresses fall too high in the hip and puff out in the wrong places on my body. This did not! Would have given a fifth star if it stayed put a little better while dancing. It crept up and I had to adjust frequently.
This dress was a great fit very comfortable and was great thick material. Lots of compliments and very appropriate for a summer evening wedding

I rented a 42 and a 44. I chose the 42 because I felt like my chest stayed in place better with the tighter size. Watch the hanger strings...they can slide through the holes. Received a ton of complements.

Great stretchy material. Side cut outs were a little odd - they just seemed to bunch a little bit. Length was good - and I'm short (5'3). I didn't wear a bra, but could be worn with a regular strapless. Wore to a cocktail attire gala for work.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Beautiful, comfortable and flattering. Perfect combo for a special event!
links_reviews_text: Very stretchy and hides all flaws. Wore 15 hours for a long day-evening event and was comfortable all day long. Definitely recommend!

I absolutely felt like a million bucks in this dress. It was classy with a hint of sexy, and felt like a dream. The material was soft on the skin, and it hugged every curve without being tight. I have an athletic build and am 5'6 and 130 lbs. I ordered the 38 (size 2) and 40 (size 4), and wore the smaller size. Wish I could own this one!!!

Great fit! Loved the bow on the shoulder. It was such a fantastic look! Just an FYI, only the lower of the two side cut outs were really visible on me, but I have a shorter torso so take that for what it‚Äôs worth.
Loved everything about this dress. The brand is amazing and fits so well.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress for a Gala in Nantucket with my husband ! Very classy and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and easy to wear. No zipper and hugs you in all the right places. One of my favorite designers.

I wore this dress to a wedding and received compliments the entire night...lots of love on my IG posts as well! I rented 4 dress options and I knew this was the one the moment I tried it on. It was so comfortable - perfect for dancing! It's stretchy - but thick - so it doesn't look or feel cheap. The side cutouts were just enough to be sexy without feeling overexposed. They were in a flattering place on me - I do not have a toned stomach and never once felt self-conscious. The length was perfect for a cocktail/evening wedding. I would seriously buy this dress if I hadn't already shown it off to the world!

Absolutely loved this dress. Fit was perfect and looks amazing on. So incredibly comfortable I couldn't believe it. A lot of the reviews said to size up but I found my normal size fit and if anything was a little big (a little too much fabric on the back). It is pretty long though - knee length. I got so many compliments. Will probably rent it again.

Love this dress!!! I loved the color, fabric quality and fit! It is also so comfortable. I received so many compliments on this dress throughout the night. I might even consider renting the same dress again! Such a great first Rent the Runway experience!!!

I rented this dress for a holiday party at a Napa winery and it was absolutely perfect. Form fitting but with super thick (almost scuba suit material) fabric to hold in all of the wiggly bits. Sexy, but still very classy this shows off all of your good curves. I will definitely rent this brand again.

links_reviews_title: Good fit, easy to coordinate, breathable stretchy material
links_reviews_text: #wedding #hostess

links_reviews_title: Thanksgiving weekend wedding at a country club made for a classy, fun weekend!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress. It fit very well and was surprisingly slimming! Very comfortable for a night on the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: The most amazing dress I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: Truly--no exaggeration. This is the most gorgeous, flattering, amazing dress I have ever worn. I am still getting compliments on it after wearing it to an auction three days ago. No spanx or bra needed. It truly fit like a glove.

I so enjoyed wearing this dress! It was tight and form fitting but had significant stretch so I was comfortable - almost fit a little like Spanx. The cutouts were eye catching as was the shoulder detail. Length perfect on my 5'10" frame. I agree with the recommendation to put your deodorant on after your wiggled into this stretchy dress to avoid marks!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to be wowed but was just okay
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding- I thought the cut outs would make it stand out but they seemed to get hidden a bit. Other than that, good dress.
Very pretty, unique, a little sexy. Got tons of compliments, and it was nice to be one of the few people not wearing black

Loved this dress! It fit great, and held everything in. The dress was super easy to move in, once I got it on. I sized up, since that's all they had in-store, and while I had plenty of room, it wasn't too big. I will definitely rent this brand again!

Loved this dress! The bow on the shoulder adds originality, whereas the open shoulder and cutouts on the other side make it sexy. The material is thick and dress form fitting. Would definitely rent again!

Wore this for a work holiday party. Got lots of compliments. Was super comfortable and the perfect amount of sexy. I wore a strapless bra for an extra lift but could be worn without. It ran slightly big but not enough where I would have worn a size down.

links_reviews_title: This dress is classy and sexy at the same time. I wore it to the firm Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: Perfect.

links_reviews_title: Prefect dress for my husband‚Äôs work Christmas cocktail party
links_reviews_text: I am 125lbs, 32DD and size 40 fit like a glove. Great fabric and well made. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress, loved the material. Stretchy and perfectly form fitting. Walked into the event feeling gorgeous, had so many compliments on this dress!

Fit well and great classy length. I probably could have even gone down to a 40. I usually wear a 6 from RTR which was the equivalent to a 42, and it was good but a little loose in the tummy area. I am 5'9" and 153lbs with an athletic/curvy build.

links_reviews_title: Love this skirt! Great fabric and really pretty details!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a Size up from normal size and it fit perfect! Great for work!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable skirt but kind of confused about the season
links_reviews_text: The skirt was very comfortable but it was big and I was surprised that the fabric was so heavy; as I could‚Äôve also worn it in the winter with tight. Thinking that the floral pattern would be fun for a summer rehearsal dinner, I lightened it up a bit with the white light top.

Very well-constructed skirt, fit about as expected which isn't totally ideal for my body type but it worked. Fairly short, stiff, not very forgiving - and does run small as others have noted so size up, although I had thought I might need to size up even more than I did (larger size was not available) and I was fine. Looks good with a tucked top but I thought it looked even nicer with a cropped straight top.

The stitching on the leaves really makes this a cute skirt. I love that it was high-waisted, but I had to size up to a 42 since it runs a bit small. It is already lined and the fabric is pretty thick, so great for winter and it looks good with tights, too!

This brand is amazing, everything I have rented from this thus far is impeccably made and fits like a glove. The construction of the material makes me feel pulled together at all times. I highly recommend you try any of their articles of clothing.

This skirt is really pretty! Got tons of compliments and was pleased with the way I was able to style the skirt to wear to work. I read the reviews prior to renting, so I did size up. However, I definitely could have gone up one more size and been fine- think true designer sizes, not more common vanity sizing (I wear a 4 or a 2 in most brands, wore a 6, but could have worn an 8).

I picked this for work and a rehearsal dinner. Used for work and got compliments. Lost luggage for rehearsal so could t wear it. I sized up according to all the comments. It was good for me. Just a little roomy in the hips, though it looked fine. I don't have much hips going on.
Beautiful high-waisted skirt. Like the reviews suggested, I sized up! Otherwise, it was perfect!
This skirt is very pretty but runs a little small and there is no stretch at all. The print is beautifully bold and the red detail has a little sparkle.

links_reviews_title: TINY!!! Be careful there is NO give to this!
links_reviews_text: Very cute, but runs very small. I usually run between a 2 and a 4 --- I should've sized up with a 6!
Gorgeous pattern but didn't fit. Size up Ladies

I ordered this for a dress rehearsal. Went up two sizes based on reviews. I am curvy but typically a 4/6. Loved the detail. Could be worn spring or winter. However It has no give. My hips did not lie. It zipped but I did not feel comfortable. Returned and continuing my quest.
Runs really small so it didn't fit and I could wear it. Bold print.
I am usually a size 0 and the 38 wouldn't even come close to zipping. I had rented for work and didn't love the look anyway... looks more appropriate for a holiday party or event.
Super cute but runs a little small, I didn't wear it
Fit well, high waisted which I like.
Such a cute piece but so small, definitely need to order 2 sizes up
I thought this skirt was quite small, I could not get it over my hips so never wore it. It is beautifully made, so I was sad it didn't work out. Size up!
Usually wear a 4. This was suggested in size 40, which I assumed was the correct conversion. Probably needed 2 sizes up. Too small to wear.

The title pretty much sums it up. I did wear this skirt all day long for work, but it was pretty tight around the waist, and as the day wore on it was more and more irritating. I actually unzipped it a little on the ride home and couldn't want to get there so I could take it off. I would suggest ordering one size up if you don't have a teeny time waist.
Wore a few times. Great for business meetings when coupled with a white Collared Shirt. Fantastic with a tank -+ heels.

I rented it for a party but it was too cold to wear and I had no tights that day. So I went out bought some tights and wore the skirt to church on Mother's Day. Then I needed something last minute to wear to work and although I thought it may be too short, it was fine with tights. I received so many compliments even from random women saying my skirt was really nice.
The design was not as pretty in person, kind of garish with the bright red thread running throughout. Was not impressed with the look.

links_reviews_title: High quality, cute skirt-did NOT need to size up!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a 2 in skirts, so based on others' reviews I sized up to a 4 to be safe. Unfortunately the 2 would've fit me better. My frame is slender, and I'm 5'4.5" .... If you're stuck between sizes I would say your options are: get your regular size and it will be form fitting/slightly short, or else size up and it will be slightly loose, but definitely conservative enough for work.

links_reviews_title: way too small, curvy girls stay away
links_reviews_text: I sized up when ordering this based on review and there was no chance of this zipping up with my hips and rear. It was even painful trying to pull up without fear of ripping. This runs way too small, not sure I would even try again because don't feel confident the largest size would fit.

As other reviewers have stated, there is no give in this fabric. I originally rented this in a 42 (which was the size RtR picked for me as the equivalent of a 6) and it came nowhere close to fitting. So I sent it back and rented it again in the next size up. It was an ok skirt, but I didn't like it enough to make up for how uncomfortable it was. It fit fine, but since there was no stretch, it dug in to my midsection a lot when I sat down. If I had liked the style more, I think I could have forgiven that, but it didn't blow me away like other items I have rented.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. Way too small.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size up and still it was way too small. I compared it to another skirt in the same size and it was a full inch smaller on each side. I may reserve it in another size because it was super cute.

links_reviews_title: Runs small but gorgeous if you can figure out your size.
links_reviews_text: Loved this - got compliments all day.. the red embroidery made it feel special.

This was a fun skirt to wear to work but beware that it is short and incredibly tight at the waist. I wore it with thick tights so it was still work appropriate. Thank you for all of the reviews that recommended sizing up. I usually rent a 0 or 2 but i rented a 4 due to reviews. I could have gone even bigger!

links_reviews_title: Itvwas beautifully pressed and i love the garmet baf!
links_reviews_text: Itty bitty waist. Heavy fabric. Beautiful but not for my shape:(

i'm typically a 4, but have a larger waist and read that this ran small so i went up 2 sizes. turns out, that was 1 size too many and i should've just gone with the 6! the print is very cute. what i thought was pink in the photos was actually a sparkly red piping, making it look appropriate for a holiday party. still cute, despite being surprised by the color. i wore this with a tucked in nude silk blouse and it worked well. i found it difficult to find a black that worked. hit a touch above the knee, very appropriate for work.
Runs a little small but overall very cute! Was almost too short for work though
Nice texture and great for the office. I normally wear a 6 or 8 in pants for reference I'm a size 28 and I wore a 10 in this skirt. I had read the reviews on it prior and sized up

links_reviews_title: Work & Tall Girls and/or Girls with a booty = bad combination
links_reviews_text: It was a probably my own fault for not checking the length of this skirt before renting it, however it defiantly not work appropriate... or comfortable to wear. I am tall (5'9) and slender and my booty is on the bigger size. I work at a desk all day and I had to ask a colleague for a sweater to lay over my lap because it was SO short when I sat down. Even when walking to work I felt a lot of baggage in the back in between my waist and bum. It was pretty and I received compliments. So if your body is anywhere around my dimensions I would measure carefully before renting. Also- this skirt sits high waist and does not have ANY room or stretch so I highly recommend measuring and probably sizing up!! Again- my own fault for not being more careful! RTR is always great with shipping speed, the quality of items, and they give great detail. I just wasn't paying close enough attention on this rental. I will not be renting this one again. For work related or non. Just wasn't the right fit for me. I will add pictures soon!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an important work meeting
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers mentioned, the waist of this skirt is very small. The fabric is a bit heavy for the summer, would have been better for fall or winter.

I read the sizes wrong so be careful! I should have got a 42 (I've rented this before and just didn't look this time - dumb). But when it fits it's really cute and work appropriate length!! Good day to night skirt.

Loved this skirt. Nice thick material the red thread is actually metallic. I listened to previous reviewers and sized up and the skirt fit perfectly. The hook closure looked like it's seen better days but I was able to zip up the skirt without it so it was fine.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was so cute! Lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I would size way up -- I only went one size up and it was a bit too small.
This skirt runs VERY small! I couldn't even get it up to my waist. The style is very cute though!

links_reviews_title: Worked perfectly for semiformal party. The lace panels made it less formal & more modern. Elegant!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly.
Nice fit, great for a work cocktail party.
LOVED this dress. A really eye-catching little black dress, the detailing is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves way too long and loose
links_reviews_text: Great comfortable dress but unless you have long arms the sleeves just don't work and no easy fix for the night of an event.

Another winner from this designer. Maybe the beat yet. I felt like a movie star and could still MOVE all night. I definitely needed the L with heels. Loved this. I did wear a strapless spanx slip to keep it all tight. You'll love this dress!
Fit wonderfully, felt very glamorous at the military ball, Hollywood glam. Loved it so much husband bought me this gown in navy blue.
It was perfectly perfect for a wedding! Extremely comfortable! Would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: I was comfortable, felt sexy, and I didn't want to take this dress off!
links_reviews_text: The material is almost wetsuit-like. This sounds weird until you put it on, and it seems to suck everything in without showing any flaws. I have a little "extra" going on in my midsection due to having a baby several months prior to the event, and this dress seemed to hide it well! The cutout in the top was just enough so that the (larger than normal) girls did not come out, so it was tasteful while still being sexy. This dress very much accentuated my hourglass figure that I thought I had lost after having a baby recently. I felt confident, comfortable, and sexy! One thing to note is that being 5'2", I planned on wearing 3 1/2-inch heels with this dress. That would have been perfect, except that due to a sprained ankle I had to wear 2-inch heels instead. With those, the dress did drag slightly, so I had to keep pulling it up to avoid stepping on the bottom. Not the dress' fault, but just a sizing/styling note to consider.

links_reviews_title: 1st time using RTR and won't be the last!
