links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress. Accentuated the body parts that needed it while very slimming at the same time! Received a lot of compliments!
Was a great dress. Loved the way it looked on. Usually 8/10 the 44r was perfect. Didn‚Äôt even need to try the back up on
Just fab night! Felt glamorous!

Rented this dress for a black tie Oscar gala, and can honestly say it's my favorite thing I have *ever* worn! The cut is extremely flattering for an hourglass figure, and the fabric is thick and forgiving. I rented the 40L, only bc the regular length was unavailable... but was able to make it work with 5 inch heels. I really considered buying- but it's not like I would get much wear out of such a formal gown, so I decided to let her go. Sigh.

amazing fabric, fits like a glove. Step into the dress to put on (don't pull over head). Work it into place and you are set for the evening. Was perfect for winter black tie wedding. A nice modern twist on a classic black dress.
They only had one size available and I was really scared it wouldn't fit! I'm 5'3" and 140lb. The dress made me look really skinny and everyone complimented!

I rented this for a winter wedding and received so many compliments. The fabric is stretchy, so it's great for dancing. The dress has great lines -- hit all the right places. I loved how I felt in it.
Awesome fit, great material and high quality! Felt almost like shape wear. Great dress for a formal winter event. The process was so easy - I will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I turned heads walking in the room, the dress fit so well. Tucked me in all the perfect places.
links_reviews_text: The length was too long for me at 5'4 with 3 inch heels but with the beautiful wrap I was able to disguise it as I walked. Needed the regular length.

links_reviews_title: HUGE who's who event.... compliments all night
links_reviews_text: Amazing evening- perfect dress! Fit is wonderful and dress is elegant RTR rocks. Ordered 4 dresses ALL were quality ....service is exceptional. Thanks

This dress was amazing. I felt like a movie star all night and received so many compliments. I ended up going with the 42L, I'm 5'8, 140lb, and 34DD. The 42L fit perfectly with a pair of ~3inch heels. The material is thick and sturdy - no spanx necessary! No zipper dress, so be careful with getting makeup on the dress when you are getting ready.
I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù and wore comfortable 2‚Äù heels. I was worried it would be really long but it wasn‚Äôt. Super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Stunning Dress! So comfortable and beautiful. Loved wearing it. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great for, comfortable yet sexy! Love love love

This dress felt amazing. Lovely material. Due to the shoulder exposure you will need a strapless bra. I wore 3" heels and the regular fit fine but I wish it had been about 1/2 longer. I'm a bit over 5'7".

links_reviews_title: Comfort and glamour CAN go hand in hand!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear an size 6 and this dress fit perfectly. It eventuates curves and I did not need shape wear and regret that I wore any. It would have been much more comfortable without it. I wore this for my company Christmas party. I received many compliments and while the dress was formal, I did not feel overdressed. The length was perfect with 4" heels despite being so short. I rented a couple options and this one did not disappoint.
So comfortable & fit like a glove! Thick enough I didn't need a jacket! Show stopper! I got tons of compliments! I love this dress! Thank you RTR!
I love this designer!
Perfect length & fit. Fits true to size. This is the 3rd event I've rented this a dress from this designer. Flattering & sexy! Would def it rent again. Was perfect for a Black Tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and comfortable to wear!
links_reviews_text: Really easy way to look elegant. Will need heels as dress hits the floor.
I received so many compliments. I wore it to a black tie wedding. The dress fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: I felt like I belonged in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fabric is heavy and stretchy so very form fitting. A truly beautiful piece.
This dress wasn't even my original dress but I'm glad it was in the end it fit so comfortably and I received many compliments on it! I'd definitely recommend for a formal outing!

Perfect fit. I typically wear size 8 pants but size 6 dresses, so true to size. Fabric is thick but breathable and the structured ruffle lays just perfectly giving this gown a unique, sexy, but not over the top flair. So many complements...I felt like the belle of the ball! Added plus- no necklace needed due to the gorgeous neckline.

I got this dress on accident because the dress I had ordered ended up not available. I got A MILLION compliments on this dress. Nice thick fabric perfect for a cold weather wedding. It is pull over so have some friends handy for putting it on.

After trying on what felt like 100 dresses this one just melted to my body in all the right places. Was form fitting, very thick material, stretchy, and forgiving! Felt amazing all night in this dress.
Great dress and very flattering. Planning to wear to a gala this week.
Dress fir true to size, but felt I could have went to a size 10. 158 lbs 5'2". Great fabric. Loved this dress.
Snug, comfortable, wears almost like a wetsuit. Warm for a fall or winter event. Super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Understated and elegant event at the Rainbow Room
links_reviews_text: SO grateful for sleeves...for warmth and coverage of aging arms. Incredibly comfortable and packed well.

I love the fit! No zippers, no lining. Hugs and contours your shape in an amazing way! It was the perfect, conservative look I needed for a church formal affair-not too much, not too little! I have zero complaints about this dress and now in LOVE with this designer!
Forgiving, sexy, perfect!

I loved this dress. Very easy to wear, classic design and flattering on my very hourglassy figure. It's challenging to find things that work around my busy and hips but still come in around my comparatively tiny waist. This had enough stretch to give where I needed it, and still showcase the best parts of my figure! Great dress.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to the opera with my husband. I felt like a movie star!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! I am 5'3" 160 lbs., and the 44R fit me like a glove. The length was perfect in 3.5" heels. The material is fairly thick and very stretchy, so it sucked everything in and hid my lumps & bumps. I also wore a body shaper underneath, which helped it fit even better. Definitely step into it and pull it up! I have large upper arms (the reason I wanted sleeves!) and the sleeves were a tad snug, but once I got them tugged up to where they belonged it was fine. I was even able to wear a bra; I just had to move the straps out towards my shoulders and make sure it wasn't showing in the corners of the neckline. Super comfortable, easy to sit & walk in, even easy to pull up to go to the bathroom in. My husband wore a full tuxedo, and I felt elegant and perfectly dressed next to him. Two of the venue employees even complimented my "beautiful gown!"

I absolutely lived this dress and am going to buy it! It has no zipper, so be prepared to protect your hair and makeup when putting the dress on. That being said, the dress fit like a glove after going down a size. I originally rented a 10, but it was too large, so exchanged for a 6 and it was perfect. No need for spanks underneath as the fabric does a great job of holding everything in place. It is on the short side, I'm 5'5", so you can wear a lower heel and be comfortable all night. I was wearing a slightly higher heel (CL 100cm) which is why you can see my red heels peeking under the hem. I lost count of the many compliments I received that night. Highly recommend.

I wore this dress to an evening wedding and received compliments all night. The fabric is incredible and so comfortable sitting as well as dancing. I highly recommend this designer and dress! 5 Stars... beautiful design, luxury feel, amazing fit, functionality and all around perfect dress to wear year round.

links_reviews_title: Lots of complements and super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and giving

I rented this dress for family pictures and it was perfect. It wasn't too low cut for the most part, but I did have to adjust the wrap a couple times. The slit isn't too high up or even super noticeable when standing, but in some of the sitting positions I was in, I was pretty exposed.

The fit was great. It was just slightly too big in the bust. I initially rented this for a rehearsal dinner in FL, but it's very easy to dress up or down. At home, I was able to add tights and an camisole for a work appropriate look.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for fall baby shower
links_reviews_text: Overall great fit and adjustable since it's a full wrap dress. I did have to pin the chest since I'm larger up there and wanted to be a little more covered. Would rent again if needed.

This was a last minute choice, one of my dresses that I had picked out weren't available. It has pockets! The cut is a bit too high so I do recommend putting a safety pin because it will open wide if it's windy

I ordered this as my backup to a laid back wedding. I ended up going with my first option, but I loved this dress nonetheless! When I first showed photos of the dress to family they said it wasn't the prettiest, but in person I received a ton of compliments. My favorite part was the high slit. Even though I didn't end up wearing the dress I would still recommend it. Very comfortable and pretty for a casual day out, date or a party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my spring bridal shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, comfortable, and flattering! I wanted a long dress with long sleeves because the forecast was rainy and cold. I felt warm and beautiful, which is what I was hoping for! I'm 5'9" and the dress hit just above my ankles ‚Äî looked great with my heeled sandals. The muted pink color and floral pattern was perfect for spring, and I think it would work well in the fall, too.

links_reviews_title: Perfect maxi length for petite people!
links_reviews_text: As other reviewers said - this dress is perfect for short folks. I'm 5'0" and the hem hit my ankles perfectly without heels. I wore heels with the dress as seen in the photo so I wouldn't be tripping up. The only downsides were the open slit in front - making it hard to sit/cross my legs. And I felt the neck was a bit low cut for my preference so I pinned it. I wore this to a bridal shower and I got a lot of compliments!

This wrap dress is the perfect choice if you're worried about sizing. You can adjust how it fits. Flatters the bust and accentuates the waist. This is a true wrap, so when the wind blows it will show leg. It was perfect for this wedding!

links_reviews_title: Perfect maxi dress for a daytime wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I found the other reviews about it running a little small to be true, but since it‚Äôs a wrap dress, it was easily adjustable. I did have to use some fashion tape to keep it from blowing open - it was breezy! But I would definitely rent this dress again.

I absolutely loved the design and style of this wrap dress! I wore it to a baby shower and it was the perfect spring dress. I am 5'2" and wore the dress with heels but I could have also worn it with flats and wouldn't have tripped on it. I loved it so much that I will likely end up purchasing this dress!

This was so chic and flattering. The arms were a little tight and the front clasp was a little weak so I had to button it several times but it is such a beautiful dress and worked perfectly for the occasion. Love love love.

links_reviews_title: This dress was super flattering and I loved the print!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a couples shower before my wedding. It looks really peach in photos but in person it's really a nude/neutral. I wore the large because the medium was too small in the rib cage and didn't wrap around the "girls" very well. It also has a helpful hook & eye in the front so there isn't too much cleavage (definitely recommend for my large busted friends!). It was a little tight on my upper arms/biceps but it fit comfortably everywhere else. One of my favorite rentals to date!

links_reviews_title: Short Girls Dream! Perfect for a fall September wedding
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved that I could wear a long dress, being only 5ft tall. It's rare for me to find a dress that works with my height. Easy to look more formal in this dress by pairing it with heels etc. The clip on the top worked great to keep the dress closed, didn't have to worry while dancing. And the slit was no problem, never showed more than a bit of ankle when I was walking. Sleeves were comfortable and stayed in place when i pulled them up higher. And I loved how you could tie the dress in the back either tighter or looser depending on preference! Showed off a small waist. Honestly it was like wearing a comfy kimono or robe! Material was not see through. Overall - favorite dress I've ever worn!

links_reviews_title: Perfect birthday dress for touring mansions in Newport, RI
links_reviews_text: I am between a small and a medium in dresses that are sized by letters. Usually a 6-8 in most dresses. The small fit well! I was actually worried and thought I should have maybe gotten a medium. I think the medium would have covered the front better since I am not truly small, but I still got a lot of compliments from strangers! :). This dress is lovely. Also, i'm 5'3" and its the perfect maxi dress length.

This dress is so comfortable and I love when I can get a beautiful dress with pockets! Loved the print and it photographs very well. The only reason I rated 4 stars was the other half of the clasp to secure the top was missing and I had to be a little more cautious with the bottom half. Felt like I needed a little more material to not expose my spanks :)

links_reviews_title: The wrap dress is a cute fit and the sleeve are an added touch.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. I'm 5'3 and the dress did not hit the ground with smaller heels!

I loved the dress and how it fit. I'm 5'1 and was able to use it with flats, it also hugged my curves in the right places. The only reason I'm not giving it five stars is that it opens in the front so make sure to wear spandex, shorts, or anything that will not leave you flashing your underwear to everyone around.
Great fitting dress and it hit right at my ankles so you can show off your shoes!

links_reviews_title: easy dress to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: I wore this for day time with flats but it could easily be dressed up with heels for a fancier event.
I adore this dress! Haven't sent back yet and am wondering if I should?!?

links_reviews_title: Soft floral for a Fall wedding
links_reviews_text: Yes there is a slit. Truly kimono style. The fabric is nice satin and heavy just enough so the wind doesn't pick up the edges for unexpected Marilyn Monroe moment. Very comfortable and true to size, and perfect for a garden wedding in CA mid-October weather.
Love love love this dress. It was the best shade of pink and lovely print. Only con was the sleeves because they were tight around my arm. So please be aware of this!
Not flattering for a wrap dress and runs large. Felt like too much material

I wore this to my cousin's bridal shower and absolutely loved it so much, I wish I could keep it! I'm 5'3", 120lbs, muscular/athletic, hourglass shape, with broader shoulders. It fits like a dream, but it is a little low cut, so wear a plunge bra. Even then, there's some cleavage on display (I am small-chested so it is never an issue!) Only issue is this is more like a midi dress and not a true maxi - which was great for me as a petite woman, because it was a maxi length! But on tall girls, it's going to hit you mid-calf like a true midi. Color is also more of a blush nude and not as peachy as it appears.
It was just a little tight in the shoulders, but fit great everywhere else

This was the perfect dress for a wedding in Mexico. The long sleeves protected me from the sun, while the light fabric was great for the heat. It is low-cut, but luckily it didn't call for any special undergarments.

The colors were pretty and the dress was very comfortable! But it was VERY low cut so I would have had to wear a tank top or bandeau. Nice length though! Was thinking about wearing for engagement pictures but I think it's too low cut so I will return without wearing probably!

links_reviews_title: didnt wear it, too cut for work
links_reviews_text: runs a bit small, if you are a 14 the L wont fit, if you are a 12, the L large will just fit but it will be revealing in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a chilly summer evening party in the mountains
links_reviews_text: Felt glamorous but sophisticated

links_reviews_title: Nice but not flattering for my body type
links_reviews_text: This dress is really pretty and it feels like quality fabric. I was hoping to wear it for a winter baby shower (in S. California) so it is nice that it is long and has long sleeves. However, I am very curvy/busty and not very tall. The wrap didn't cover well and I would have needed a cami for sure. The sleeves seemed bulky and there was extra material on the back so I looked heavier than I am. It was full maxi length on me. I didn't end up wearing the dress- wore my alternate. Probably would be great on someone taller and slim/less curvy.

I wore this dress to a fall engagement party and received so many compliments. It was comfortable and warm. I found it fit true to size, the length was perfect for someone who is my height (5'4") and does not want to wear heels. Usually maxi dresses drag on the ground for me, but this length was just right. I received many compliments and had so much fun in this dress, without having to worry about wardrobe malfunctions or eating too much!

links_reviews_title: I think this dress converted my coworkers to RTR
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, pattern was amazing, length was perfect to show off a shoe. I wore for work, the clasp was helpful to make it less scandalous. Would totally recommend. Might keep this one in the back pocket for future events

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a photo shoot. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: Low neckline and daring slit in the front. But yet classy. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect end of summer wedding dress
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments and super comfy! Pockets were a hidden gem and a nice surprise. Length is perfect (esp for petite girls). Will definitely rent again!

Pretty dress, true to size. Didn't end up wearing because I didn't like the pattern/color with my coloring (redhead). Fair warning: was expecting the fabric to be more satiny, so it wasn't as flowy as I would've hoped.

links_reviews_title: I received a ton of compliments. Very pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit.

I wore this dress to my sister's high school graduation and it worked out perfectly! The print is beautiful and the fabric was comfortable. I took off a start because the wrap dress part of it wouldn't stay completely closed. Granted this could be because I have bigger breasts so it could've been spreading out the dress.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and have something new in my work week
links_reviews_text: True to fit

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Easy to wear to public appearances and wedding rehearsals.
links_reviews_text: If you're a bit modest about showing off your legs, I had a few Marilyn Monroe moments walking down Madison Avenue & 5th Avenue with my dress blowing up.
This dress is amazing and perfect for a family day outing to see Lion King the Musical.

I loved this jumpsuit! I got tons of compliments. The only drawbacks are that the straps are not adjustable so it was a bit loose on top (I'm 34C and didn't fill out the top all the way), and the butt was somewhat tight! Overall, I loved this look. Very high quality material and made my waist look tiny!

links_reviews_title: I loved this Sleek black fitted jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: Loved the look and the feel but The straps were way too loose and zipping the zipper was a nightmare. I have a larger chest so it was also hard to find right bra for this.

It was a great fit, and the pants material was thick and slimming. However, the top straps were lose, I have a small bust, so we improvised and crossed them and held it with a string. Worked perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Love that this jumpsuit is a bit more fitted than most
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for a rehearsal dinner with some color block heels. The straps are a bit loose so I don't recommend renting it for events with lots of movement, but it fit great!

links_reviews_title: my first RTR and it was awesome!
links_reviews_text: awesome jumpsuit. it was slightly hard to zip and i was afraid to break it but it was just tricky and all was fine. straps on this are long and i wished i didnt have to keep pulling them up off my shoulders but still got sooo many compliments and i felt so trendy!!

SIZE UP! i has originally rented this in my usual size 10 and couldn't even get it on. Ended up renting it in the 14 (12 wasn't available) and that was perfect. Absolutely loved this style! It truly looks like it could be 2 pieces and gives you the look without the fuss of making sure your silk tank stays tucked. Also, it doesn't wrinkle! I had this in a bag for over a day and it was fine the second i hung it up. The only thing that I would change is that I wish the leg was more narrow at the bottom. These sort of fell in an odd area between a pencil and wide leg pant.
This romper is as described, low cut but super flattering and shaped for curves although it's not stretchy. I enjoyed it. I would rent again
I was so sad that I had to return this. Everything about this jumpsuit was perfect. Paired it with bright pink heels!

The only reason I couldn‚Äôt give this 5 stars is because of the ridiculously long straps. Unfortunately, they aren‚Äôt adjustable. Even with safety pins it was still literally falling off of me. However, one of our friends that works in fashion figured out a way to make it work! She just tied each strap in a little knot. PERFECT!

This jumpsuit was fabulous for a bachelorette party! The top is odd in that the straps are either falling off your shoulders or too tight to bend over. I wound up wearing the 4R because the 6R was way too big up top & in the legs. The legs on the 4R were snug but not too tight. Would certainly recommend especially for the price, but don't see myself renting it again.

Wore to a client formal party, just the 4R was available I thought it wasn't going to fit... I squeezed into it. I have large hips small waist it was amazing. Didn't want to sit down all night but it is so well made... it is large on top but I am 36A just wore a strapless bra and lots of tape it was fine. So flattering. Wore with cropped red fur

This jumpsuit by Black Halo is beautiful! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and has room at the hips. It works for A to C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this jumpsuit so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5‚Äô3‚Äù, the length hit ankle length on me. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Fun alternative to a winter LBD
links_reviews_text: Hits just above ankle, slight give to the legs, no give at the natural waist, ‚Äúflowy‚Äù top. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù, 140 lbs, 14 weeks pregnant with my third. Pre-pregnancy size is 4, but opted for the 6 so I‚Äôd be more comfortable sitting all night for a birthday dinner. It was nice having the pants to keep my legs warm. Fashion tape around the v-neck was mandatory! Received a zillion compliments!

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my sisters 21st birthday in AC.
links_reviews_text: The 8 fit but the 10 was more comfortable. The straps are very loose (like others have said in reviews). I am a 34DD and I had to pin the straps in the back so they didn't fall down.
This jumpsuit was so flattering and comfortable. I would rent again

The legs are very form fitting so if you have some muscle in your legs prepare for it to be super tight, also the zipper is soooooo hard to use. I loved the look of the romper tho and straps are very loose so I had to wear a bralette under

Loved this rental! Tons of compliments. I have a small bust and NEEDED to wear a cute bralette underneath (otherwise would have been a lil too much skin showing. Very comfy, paired with long necklace and heels. I might need to rent again in future!

This was a simple perfect outfit for a holiday party. Fit was great. Length was great. I loved how the top was more of a satin material. My only issue was the zipper. I was able to reach it, but it would get stuck at the mid seam every time-so I needed a helper.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit, runs on the short side
links_reviews_text: To be fair I needed the 6, but it was unavailable so I thought I would try the 4 and it was too tight for me. The straps were still a little loose and falling off even though the rest was too small. I really did not like the length on me. Maybe it was because it was a size too small, but I expected the length to hit right above my ankle and it was much shorter than that. Wish it came in long.
Fit really nicely! Only problem was the top didn't have adjustable straps and was too big. I wore a bralette under so my boobs wouldn't fall out while dancing :)

links_reviews_title: Can't believe more people don't rent this!!!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is amazing. Just like all the reviews, yes the straps are very loose and not adjustable. The bottom part of the jumpsuit was an awesome thick material that would fit any body type like a glove. Length really doesn't matter with this either. The top is gorgeous. Overall loved this jumpsuit and will rent again!
This jumpsuit is fabulous. It was the perfect length and quality was great. The straps fell a few times, they are not adjustable-it was not super easy to dance in with the straps.

I rented this for a rehearsal dinner- received lots of compliments, it fit me perfectly and I felt great in it, didn't have to wear a bra but could see how the non adjustable straps could be a problem for smaller busted women- I'm a big b/ small c I have a big butt and the bottom was a little snug but in a good way ! Could have gone up a size or maybe gotten an L instead of an R bc my legs are a little longer but I was super happy all in all !
Loved so much I purchased. Perfect for dinner in the city. Fits beautifully.

links_reviews_title: This piece changed my mind about jumpsuits
links_reviews_text: Love love love this jumpsuit. It is slimming and sexy and classy and it has pockets! Rented for a bachelorette party, then kept it to wear to cocktails and a date and a show. Every time I pull this up, I think maybe it's too tight, but then I pull it all the way on and it fits perfectly. A bit stretchy in the pants. Like other reviewers, I find the straps are waaaay too big, and nothing I did made them fit. If I bought this (and I still might) I would definitely get the straps shortened or replaced with something adjustable or stretchy. Shows a LOT of cleavage, which looks great standing straight and way too revealing leaning even a little bit or sitting down. But still love it, will rent again.
I got this romper for my bday/Beyonce concert. It made me feel soooo sexy and chic. I could also get down in this piece too because it was made with a somewhat stretchy material. Beyonce approved!

links_reviews_title: Bellow The waits perfect above is big
links_reviews_text: Thought it would be perfect for work with a blazer. Def great fit for size on the waist, leg etc. length of pant is perfect too. Only issue was top satin part is loose. Straps are not adjustable and they do dig in as well. I wore a strapless bra and still with my boob size it was big.
SO COMFY!! Fits true to size. Straps fell down a few times, and I'm a 34C and didn't wear a bra, but you could get away with wearing a cute lace bra or strapless. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering for curvy bodies as well
links_reviews_text: Straps kept falling off but very flattering

I LOVE this Jumpsuit. Arrived brand new with the tags still on. It is the perfect balance of classy elegance and sexy. It's a head turner, for sure. Bottoms were tight and fit true to size, the top was a little loose compared to the bottoms. Def have to do a strapless bra (or no bra if your brave). I will rent this again.

I usually wear an 8R, but went for the 10R since I'm busty with thicker thighs...great fit! I wore this to a company party and needed to use a bra strap adapter to hold the girls in, I did not wear a bra so I used it on the actual jumpsuit straps. This jumpsuit made my waist look tiny and the bottom part fit like nice dress slacks, could definitely wear to work with a blazer. Love, love, love!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a Christmas Eve get-together. It was cute and comfy!
links_reviews_text: This jumper was cute and comfy. The straps were long (as other reviewers have mentioned). It was a little plain since it's solid black but could be easily jazzed up with a belt, jewelry, or shoes.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear out, only try on.
links_reviews_text: This romper fit like a glove; fitted those the thighs and stomach and more flowing on the top as it is satin material. Unfortunately I cannot wear it, there is a hole at the start of the zipper right on the butt. Discovered it while trying it on. Sooo nice though!!

I'd hoped to be able to wear this to work with a blazer. It was wayyyy too low-cut for that, and the non-adjustable straps seemed really long, making it more uncomfortable to wear. The jumpsuit is cute and worked okay with a bralette underneath for a night out, but definitely wouldn't recommend for a professional event.

I so wanted to love this outfit. It's really cute but the fit is just odd. If you're on the taller side and you're thinking that maybe this one time a jumpsuit will actually fit me, this is not that jumpsuit. I'm sure it's adorable on shorter gals though!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my anniversary and loved it.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit - I have a long torso so it was nice that it didn't ride up. I'm 5'5" and the length on the pant was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Looks like it was put together by a committee
links_reviews_text: This thing fits totally bizarrely. I couldn't even stand up straight to get the straps over my shoulders. I am only 5'9 and never had this issue. It runs very short in the torso and the pants were sized more like a 12, maybe 14. Very disappointing because it was so cute and the look I wanted for my birthday party.
fit well straps a little long

links_reviews_title: Form fitting but very flattering jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: this jumpsuit was very cute and perfect for an occasion night out!
Perfect for an outdoor wedding. Comfortable and a great neutral color. Would recommend renting!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress dress was beautiful! I loved the color and the fit! My only problem was that it was a tiny small in the top so the button would clasp. But it didn't stop me from wear it! The fabric is a little different than pictures but still looks nice and elegant.
The dress was slightly big as I don't have the bust to hold it up..... but it worked and I received compliments all night. Dress was thick material so nothing shown through.
Great fit, strong stretchy fabric. I had zero issues with this dress and received a ton of compliments. Super easy to accessorize.

This dress is so simple but so chic! Definitely make sure you have a good tan/good fake tan if you're fair because it could wash out fair skin tones. The fit is a little tight on top, which is ok since it's strapless, it's a good sign it'll stay up-but size up one size! Elizabeth and James overall runs about one size small. You can definitely get away with no bra because of the ruffle so that makes it easy. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: kind of a weird fit, but fun dress!
links_reviews_text: i have never rented E&J brand before and read reviews saying the brand ran small.. I'm normally a 2 and rented a 4. It wasn't that it was too small, but it was a little more fitted in the middle than I would've liked and a size up would've been too big in the chest.. overall a pretty dress! just be aware of sizing!!

The dress stayed up all day and was flattering around my waist. The fabric is heavy enough that it didn't blow up in the wind when we were outside. I received compliments from people across all age ranges throughout the day- it was very cute and classy! The color had more of a pink hue than I expected, so the red accessories I had originally planned on didn't work. My green accessories ended up working well, and I think purple or blue would be pretty as well. I would definitely rent again!
Great material. Color was perfect. Stayed in place. Cut perfectly for my build.
There is no give in the bust so I recommend ordering based on that. Beautiful dress. Lots of compliments!

This dress was amazing, I wore it for a winter wedding and it fit exactly to size. The fabric is super comfortable thick and stretchy so would be great for any body type. 3 stars because of the fiasco of receiving the order. On Friday the delivery day It was sent to the wrong house and and saying delivered but was put back on the truck and lost at UPS for 24hrs and no one knew where it was. I called RTR Saturday morning (day of event out of town) and they told me that UPS had it out for delivery and said it would arrive by end of day (I was leaving at noon), I also called ups to see if I could go pick it up and they said they had it on a truck but the truck wouldn't deliver till the second of January (4 days after the event) and that no Saturday delivery was available. I sat for an hour and a half at UPS trying to get them to track it down just in time for us to leave for the event, after searching and searching they eventually find it. I go to open the package and I only see one size of the dress and then another romper that I had never ordered in a much larger size and no backup size of the dress ordered. Thankfully the size that was delivered in the dress I ordered was my preferred size. All to say whole process of receiving was extremely overwhelming but in the end all the compliments and the fit of the dress were worth it.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this dress! Beautiful color!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very flattering, although it's pretty tight around the waist/belly. I ordered both the size 4 and 6 and went with the 4 because I have a smaller bust, although I didn't notice a huge difference between the two sizes. I received many compliments on the dress and would recommend!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my friends wedding, and it was perfect!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was the perfect true nude/blush color and looked great even on my pale skin. I wore the size 0 and it does fit pretty snug (even I couldn't wear a bra and I am small chested). I had to wear seamless underwear to make sure you couldn't see it through the dress, but it looked very flattering and the fabric was thick. I also didn't have any real problems with it wrinkling until the end of the night, which was understandable. Highly recommend overall!
Wore this to a wedding and it was so comfortable and I got a ton of compliments! Went with the smaller size for a more fitted look

I loved this dress! My second Elizabeth and James rental, and the material and quality of the dresses is always perfect! I was worried about the wrinkling that some mentioned, but I didn't experience any of that. Maybe because it was freezing cold both inside and out, the dress didn't wrinkle? ü§îü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Stayed in place all night. Didn't have to worry about pulling at the top, etc. I really cannot say enough great things about this dress!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an engagement party at an art gallery and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It did have a bit of a crease in it that I had to iron out, but after that it was great! I'd definitely rent it again!

This dress was so cute! Overall, it fit pretty well. I didn't have to pull it up throughout the day. The zipper in the back didn't stay up very well or the button snap. I loved the color and would definitely rent it again!
loved the way the dress move, very comfortable, love the color and the fit. highly recommend renting this! or even buying this!

links_reviews_title: A little snug but overall I liked it.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for one of the outfit changes for my engagement photos. I also wore it to church. Overall it fit well but was a bit snug in the top to me. Otherwise I was pleased.

This dress was perfect! It was a little tight but not too uncomfortable. I was nervous about the tan color for a wedding but it was fine. Super easy to dance in and it stayed up so I didn't have to mess with it too much.
This dress fit perfect!!! I usually cannot wear strapless dresses because of my chest size, but this fit amazing. I got so many compliments on this dress.

I wore this dress to a wedding, the fit was nice, only a tiny bit snug in the midsection, and the color allowed for easy accessorizing. The top had no stretch, but allowed it to stay up while dancing. I chose to go bra-less but you couldn't notice because of the overlay. Only con is the stitching on my dress along the bust line, was pulled, but it wasn't very noticeable. Comfortable material, would recommend.

It's cute I loved the dress but not made for larger bust, I'm a DD and the size 2 fit me in the lower body but was nowhere near able to zip up at the top. I wore the size 4 but had to wear a bandeau that had absolutely no padding and even then it was a struggle to zip the last inch. But it did the trick and was perfect for the occasion.
This dress fit like a dream! I got so many compliments on it throughout the night and it was very comfortable. Would recommend this dress 1000 times.

I rented this for a summer wedding. Loved it! I ordered the 4 and the 6 and after reading the reviews, I went right for the 6 and it fit perfectly. Definitely does show every bit of your midsection so was more comfortable in the 6. I'm tall and thin but pear shaped and I didn't feel it was too tight anywhere or too short. Took this pic at the end of the night and you can see it wrinkled easily but what can ya do? Paired with a colored earring for a little pop of color. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! Perfect cut and style
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress. It was exactly what I expected and it was really flattering (as I saw on the other girls reviews). The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the size 4 dress was in noticeably bad condition. The zipper was broken and I had to mess with it to zip. The elastic was coming apart on the top of the strapless part of the dress. However, the 6 was in great condition and a beautiful dress overall.

links_reviews_title: Being able to throw this on with 10 minutes to spare and feel amazing
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much and was so happy when it arrived TEN MINUTES before I had to leave. I was comfortable, felt so good in it, and got compliments all night. Length was just right. Top stayed put. Such a fun dress. Would love to wear again.

links_reviews_title: Obsess with this dress! I got so many compliments on it all night.
links_reviews_text: Thought it fit slightly small. I usually wear a 4, but the 4 was slightly small while the 6 was a little big. I felt more comfortable in the 6. The fabric is amazing, it makes the dress feel very high quality. I wanted to keep this dress and wear it again and again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, classy dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous dress! I really enjoyed wearing it to a "semiformal" summer wedding. I was worried the tan/cream color would be too light for a wedding guest, but it was very pretty. I paired it with some long black tassel earrings and loved the final look! I do think this dress runs a bit small in the stomach, but it fit perfectly around the bust. I normally avoid strapless dresses, but hardly needed to adjust this one throughout the entire night. I would purchase this dress for future events if I could! You should get it :) My only complaint is that the zipper was misaligned/kind of broken on the dress I received, so I pinned the zipper tab to the dress once I got it fixed so that it wouldn't fall down on me while out on the dance floor.

Dress fits true to size! The material was different than I expected but I didn‚Äôt sweat through on a hot day at an outdoor wedding which was a plus. The top is snug but it was great because the dress didn‚Äôt come down all night that I danced and I didn‚Äôt need a bra. Would recommend renting this dress. Perfect for summer outings!!!

This dress fits perfect! Wore it to a VERY hot wedding and was comfortable in the material. Had no issues with the strapless while dancing, and I am small chested, but fits perfect all over. I did not have any trouble with wrinkles as some reviews say, just steamed it before. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: Classic elegant dress perfect for cocktail attire wedding.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. The length is perfect and the color is subdued enough that it is very easy to accessorize. The material was thicker than I expected, which was great because I didn't sweat through it on a humid 95+ degree day. I would recommend ordering a backup size up if you're larger in the chest because there is no elastic. I'm a 34B and the 4 was perfect for me.
Loved it!

I loved this dress! I love how simple it was, and the color. It was perfect for a wedding. I would say it was a little tight up top and I am flat chested so hard to imagine if you have a fuller chest. I was hesitant to order because I had reviews that it wrinkled easily, and I sat in this dress for a 2 hour car ride and had no issues with it at all. I would definitely recommend!

This dress has a lot of stretch so it's very comfortable. Color is gorgeous and it isn't too short, hit right above knees. Definitely conservative enough for formal occasion. You can see underwear through it so be prepared to wear spanx. Fits well around bust

links_reviews_title: Great wedding in Jersey City overlooking the Hudson River in April
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful! I usually were a 6, but had to go with the 8 because it was very form fitting. The dress fits perfectly though, I didn't need to pull it up at all throughout the night. It falls right above the knees, I got so many complements! Would recommend it and absolutely would rent it again!!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and unique color, fit great, awesome fabric!
links_reviews_text: Loved both sizes of this dress, the smaller one fit well ‚Äì just showed a bit more. Went with the larger size, and loved it. The fabric was beautiful, felt super high end. Got a ton of compliments. Beautiful blush-nude color

This dress was so pretty! I've realized that it's really hard to find a good quality dress in this color - this is it. I'd say it's a little snug in the top, so size up if you're bigger in the bust. I loved the "clean" look. Just loved wearing this one!
The dress is made very well. Fabric was thin enough for a summer outdoor/indoor event. But thick enough to feel supportive. Never had to yank on the dress to keep it up.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and great unique color
links_reviews_text: Both sizes would've worked but the 4 was just a title right around the chest and made my armpit fat show a ton. 6 was looser but just put on a strapless bra and that helped!

links_reviews_title: Nice color; not my favorite dress
links_reviews_text: The dress was for my wedding rehearsal and it was a great color - I didn't want to wear white so the tan/nude color was great - but the top was really tight and it was tight throughout the midsection... not the most flattering. I would guess perhaps for a smaller build it would fit better/look better.

I was complemented by both men and women all day in this dress. At one point I want to complement me twice and she didn't realize that once was when she saw the front of the dress she complemented the color the next she saw the back of the dress and complemented the detailing.
True to size, comfortable, head turner. Would definitely rent again.

I have broad shoulders and a long torso, the neck was a bit tight but a larger size would have been too big. I think my long torso made the dress fit a bit different but overall I would wear it again. The color is amazing in person and I had so many complements.

I'm usually not one to go for a bright pink dress, but I'm so glad I did. This dress is so lovely and fun, and I got a lot of compliments on it. The back detail is great, and it was comfortable enough to dance in all night.

links_reviews_title: Great color! Love the halter top- flattering for small chests.
The dress was beautiful and the color was great. I loved it.
links_reviews_text: The dress was alittle tight on my neck so if you have a thick neck size up. Under my arm pit it was aliitle loose but nothing to stop it from being amazing.

I ordered a size 2 and a size 4 as my free second size. Only the 4 arrived. The 2 would have fit much better. Nonetheless, the color is amazing! The open back is sexy but not too much. I wore this to a work cocktail and dinner party.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but showed too much belly fat
links_reviews_text: I was so obsessed w this to wear to a wedding! However it just showed off too my of my dissertation writing pouch. I have some light spanx but they didn't help enough I would have needed something w more compression to make it work. If I lost about five pounds I would feel better in this dress ! Sending it back and choosing something else for my event.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color dress for a summer wedding!!
links_reviews_text: The dress was so beautiful and I got so many compliments on the color. So perfect for a summer wedding! I normally wear a size 2 or 4 and the 2 fit perfectly with some extra room.

links_reviews_title: I haven't even been yet! Just proud of my pictures!
links_reviews_text: I should've gotten a special bra. The strapless wasn't low enough

This dress was amazing. The style is very pretty and unique and the color was incredible. I have never received so many compliments on a dress before. You do have to be caseful because any water spills will show immediately on this dress but it's so lovely.

Color and style were perfect. Wore it to a cocktail attire charity event. Received so many compliments! Can't wear a regular bra with this one so wore some sticky cups that hook together in the middle and that was perfect (I don't need much support). Absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: The dress was a little big and long but I think it still looked great. Color really stands out!
links_reviews_text: Need to wear a sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and comfortable - one of my favorites!
links_reviews_text: Other reviews said this dress fit large, but I thought it was exactly true to size (I am almost always a 4). The neck was not too tight and the cut was flattering. I wore a sticky bra, but probably could have gone without (its well lined). It's slightly more lilac than pink in person - but beautiful nonetheless. Sophisticated and stunning, would wear again. Also a great length for taller folks (at knee).

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Flatter cut and fit.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. A little right in the neck when sitting but overall loved the dress. The high neck and open back was a flattering fit. I would rent it again.
The color of the dress is beautiful. If between sizes, I would size down as it was slightly loose in some areas. I received compliments all night!

This dress is elegant and sexy. For one I was the only girl wearing this color at a wedding with over 200 people at it. It goes down just below the knee. You will need a sticky bra because of the open back. Will definitely rent again.

Love love love this dress! Reviews said it ran a little smaller but it fit me perfectly fine and i still had plenty of room to hit the buffet and desert bar. Pros: that color tho, even busty girls can pull it off with the right sticky boobs, elegant, comfy, breathable with the open back Cons: absolutely none! *I rented a pair of Kate Spade gold/bronze colored earrings and they complimented the high neck line and dress color so well!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and classy, but still sexy
links_reviews_text: The strappy back is so pretty!! I'm generally a size two, depending on the brand, but the four allowed for a perfect movable fit. Just enough stretch to be fitted, but not looking like a bodycon dress. Got so many compliments on this little number. The color is a head turner as well!

Absolutely loved this dress! Beautiful pop of color with a sexy, yet comfortable fit. I'm shy of 5'4 about 128 lbs and I wasn't sure about the size 2, but it fit perfect. So this dress definitely doesn't run small. I'd say if you're between sizes, opt for the smaller size. I'm between narrow and hippie, so the skirt wasn't tight, but it wasn't super loose. The back is strappy, so I had to "tape"up my girls with gaffer tape. By the way , you have to be comfortable with high/turtle necks. Loved it, loved it!

I originally rented a long dress plus a second backup dress in 2 sizes. The backup dresses didn't fit at all and the long dress felt too formal for the wedding we were going to attend, so I headed to a RTR store near my house. I found this dress and they swapped it out for my backup dresses at no charge, which was awesome. I had to buy a silicone pasty bra, but the top fabric fits more snug than it looks, so it worked well, actually. I wore spanx under and overall felt that it was flattering on my post-(third) baby body and I felt mature yet sexy. I got multiple compliments, but the one downside was that someone else at the wedding has rented the same exact dress! I didn't really care, but I do think that when you select dates for your event you should also select the zip code or city of the event so you know if someone else in your area has rented the same dress for the same timeframe and could therefore possibly end up at the same event as you. Just a suggestion! When you're renting a dress to stand out and not just be wearing any old dress from your closet, there should be some way to know that multiple other people could show up wearing the same dress. That being said, it didn't hinder my experience and I danced all night in this beauty!
This is a very classy and high quality dress. Very comfortable and thick enough to hide panty lines. The color is stunning and got many compliments.

The dress fit great! I have a large chest and it was not necessary to wear a bra - the fabric is supportive and lining covers any nips. I got a ton of compliments on the color and cut of the dress. May need spanx.
I wore for a bridal shower! Loved the color, very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: ‚ÄúRent the Runway‚Äù and one of my fav designers ‚ÄúHalston Heritage‚Äù, of course!!‚Äô‚ù§Ô∏è
links_reviews_text: The piece runs a bit large but is not designed for a snug fit. ‚ù§Ô∏è

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color. Perfect for a spring gala.
links_reviews_text: So chic!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable but did not end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: Fits great. But a little casual for formal affair. Did not end up wearing it.

Love this dress in that it's very flattering, nice length just above knee, great quality fabric. Back gives some interest but it's a little hArd to wear a bra (comes down low in back).. still manageable and highly recommend this dress!
Received tons of compliments. Warning only bra you can wear with this dress is stickies but so worth it. Beautiful color etc
This is one of my favorite rentals. The color compliments any skin tone and the dress is flattering yet comfortable. The back doesn't allow for bra but I solved it with some silicon pasties.

links_reviews_title: Great color, nice fit... professional yet fun for a business attire event.
links_reviews_text: Love the fit - beautiful and unique back.

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS dress! Wore sz 2 rather than 4--top loose and I'm 34A. Back straps sexy!

links_reviews_text: Awesome color and back detail. Can't wear Spanx bc of slit in the back unfortunately.
Loved this dress SO SO much!! It was sexy bc of the design - not simply by being too tight. Well cut, loved it, will wear again!

links_reviews_title: I wasn't the bride, but I could've been in the dress, all eyes were on ME!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect. made my figure look amazing.....
I wanted to love love love this dress but sadly it just did not fit correctly on me.

links_reviews_title: Did not like how it fit.
links_reviews_text: long and baggy
Pretty color and style, but I did not wear it. It was too sheer and revealing for a work event.
Very cute dress, but the fabric is just okay.

I was sent this gown when the gown I picked didn't come in on time. I didn't pick it so I was nervous, but I fell absolutely in love with it. I wore it to a military ball and I got so many compliments on how it looked good on me. Warning : the material rubbed my nipples a bit but it was worth it

links_reviews_title: Lots of complements on this elegant gown!
links_reviews_text: This dress makes you feel like a modern-day princess. It hugs your body in all of the right places and flows like liquid gold. The dress is fairly heavy, but I was comfortable in it on a hot summer evening. The only issue I had with the size was in the straps. They were too long for me and there was a bit of gaping in the back, so I had to tug at it throughout the night to keep it flat. This also resulted in the bodice falling pretty low and I had to keep checking to make sure my nubra wasn't showing. This requires a nubra or similar strapless/plunging bra as there is no support in the cups. Regardless, I received many complements on how elegant and stunning the gown was and how it made me look!

This style fit true to size, I would recommend sizing up for the backup because although the fabric has some stretch it is tight across the bust and midsection. It should be worn without a bra or with a NuBra and seamless panties or spanx wouldn't be a bad idea! This style is best for the following body types Hourglass, Athletic, Petite, Straight & Narrow. I am 5'7 wearing 3 inch heels and the regular length is hitting the floor.
Stunning dress, love it
Material is beautiful, lays gently over the body without clinging. Long torso is needed as the strip down the back needs length in order to lay flat.

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful but the zipper on the side bunches weird so i couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Great fit, very comfortable but seam of zipper puckers weird so I couldn't wear it
Gorgeous dress and true to size! No cons unless you are concerned about the deep plunge.
This dress fits so good, the strips where a litle too long, i have to keep puting the cups back in place, but while there, I look very good, strech so I think will fit a 6 or an 8, very nice
The front hangs down too low and need a lot of tape to make sure this stays G-rated. Decided against wearing it to the event cause I would have been hiking it up all night.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but runs very small.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous, elegant, very slimming. I wasn't able to wear it because it ran too small -- One size up would have been perfect.

This dress is beautiful and I really loved it. However, the dress was too low cut for my liking. If the straps were just a 1/2 inch shorter, this dress would have been perfect. At 5'2, the straps were just a little too long and loose. I ended up returning for another dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and high quality but not great for short torsos
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie wedding. I didn't wear it because the straps were too long on me (I'm 5'6 but have a torso on the short side). It was beautiful and high quality. It is pretty fitted on the midsection so be aware!
I didn't end up wearing this dress, but it will become my go to backup. It's the perfect amount of stretch and super flattering!

This dress ran big for me. I'm not tiny, but I wear a 34 B bra and was swimming in this dress. The waistline was loose too. Maybe I would've liked it more if it fit, but it was just so.... blah. It was unlined, so didn't seem that carefully made. I've seen dresses as pretty, and similar quality, at TJ Maxx/Ross. When I do RTR I expect to have something that I couldn't/wouldn't buy myself.

Wore this to a "beach formal" wedding! The material is great, comfortable, not too heavy, and feels of high quality. The colors look even better in person, there are yellows, oranges, pinks and turquoise in there and they all really pop! Very slimming at the waist too. I wear a 0 or even 00 in pants and this dress in XS was very fitting and not too tight!
Perfect dress for a California rehearsal dinner. Tight on the bust but it worked. Overall felt great in this dress!
Your typical cute summer dress. Liked a lot, but probably wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wasn‚Äôt my first choice, but great colors!
links_reviews_text: Slightly large in the bust, but fit me everywhere else. Comfortable and colorful! Felt like it should have had a lining of some sort, but wasn‚Äôt see-through. Not itchy at all. Would recommend!

The material was lightweight which makes it perfect for an outdoor event. The fit was great. I typically run 2-4 I wore the 2. I'm 5'2" 130 pounds 34C and it flared out to hide thighs or hips you may feel uncomfortable about! Straps were not adjustable but fit well. Was able to wear normal bra

This dress fits great and doesn't wrinkle. My boyfriend did say I look like a La Croix can which I think was super accurate- but still very cute and got a lot of compliments. Good for work or just every day.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfortable dress with pockets!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfy to wear to a day wedding. The length was perfect at mid-thigh, it had pockets, and it had a great pattern and texture. I filled out the top by wearing a sticky bra and didn't need any dress tape. Material was a little stretchy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, great fabric, very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Great fit. Very comfortable. Unique fabric. If you like a little color go for it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for Easter family dinner and everyone loved it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 6 and 8 and went with the 6. If it was available in a petite it would have been a perfect fit, for I do have a short torso. I was skeptical about the neckline, but it worked out. I loved the feel of the fabric and pockets were a plus. Successful rental!

I have found myself "hearting" a lot of Saloni dresses when browsing RTR. I rented 4 of her dresses, and this is by far my favorite. The fabric is perfect for the Spring and Summer, very airy silk fabric. But the texture and cut of the dress gives it structure, leaving you a gorgeous silhouette! Plus it has side pockets!!!

My first three dresses totally didn't fit so RTR rushes me three new ones in time for Carolina Cup. This dress could not have been more perfect! It's a seersucker material so it's super light and very flattering to those of us who are more curvy then a country road. The colors are brighter then pictured and the yellow is not as scary as it looks! 13/10 would rent again!!!
Great outside wedding dress. Fit was true to size, no bra needed and felt comfortable in it all night. Received lots of compliment. Highly recommend

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner in Montana during the summer with cowboy boots - a huge hit!
links_reviews_text: A little bit lose fitting because I have a small bust but made it work with tape etc. Nice silhouette and very vibrant color!
This dress was really comfortable and fabric slightly stretchy. I thought both the 6 and the 8 fit fine.
The material is a bit weird but nevertheless it was very eye catching and comfortable. Got lots of compliments and it has Pockets!
Rented for a bridal shower. It was a little lower cut than I would have liked. The print and pattern was beautiful. Would definitely rent again

I wore this dress to a friend's wedding. I love how unique the print is! The material is very light so perfect for warm weather. I usually wear anywhere from a size 8 to size 12, so I ordered an 8 and a 10. I wore the 10 to the ceremony but found it to be too big for me in the chest and straps (I wear 36C bra). I changed into the 8 for the reception and loved how it fit! I got so many compliments on the dress, plus IT HAS POCKETS! I highly recommend!

Light weight material and pretty pattern. Has pockets. Wore to a bridal shower. Usually this brand runs small and I would order a size 4 but in this dress a size 2 fit really well. I'm 5'5" 128 lb and 34b.

links_reviews_title: Nice, extremely comfortable dress (with pockets) to wear to a summer gathering.
links_reviews_text: As a wine professional (and I don't mean simply drinking it....regularly...), I occasionally get invited to menu previews for local restaurants in my city. I was invited to a fall menu preview and seeing as though it's still quite hot out and August, went with something nice and bright. This dress is SO easy and SO comfortable - and if you do a lot of social media work, photographs extremely well, too! It. Has. Pockets. That's a showstopper, y'all! I would definitely rent again. I didn't quite fill it out in the bust, but it wasn't too loose either.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color! Gorgeous pattern! Gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic. The pictures don't do it justice. The colors are gorgeous and the fit was that of a fit and flare style and was very flattering. The only area that bugged me a little was in the chest. I'm very busty and the dress seemed to push my girls up in some places and made them look sort of flat in others. It looked great though and I received a lot of compliments when I wore it!

I really liked this dress but the top was just a tiny bit too big so I had to adjust it all day. I enjoyed the fit very much - it was extremely flattering and the materials is light, great for summer. A unique print too!

links_reviews_title: Loved the backup so much I made a reason to wear it
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress I got in case my first choice didn't fit. I loved it so much that I made my boyfriend take me out to dinner so I could wear it before I had to return it. Would be great for a summer wedding. Very light material, flattering cut, and looks nice with a tan.

This dress was fun to wear! It has pockets and it's a fun, different pattern. I am small up top and bigger in my hips and butt so I should have ordered the 2 but the 4 was fine. It's a little low cut in the front but not inappropriate. Wore it to a rehearsal dinner and got many compliments

Perfect dress for a summer dinner date. The dress fit perfectly and the colors are beautiful. The material is kind of stretchy so the dress doesn't feel tight. And it has pockets!! Got so many compliments. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: I would Buy it if I could!! Loved it
links_reviews_text: Dress is low so I wore a Cami under. It is every color of the rainbow so you can always match it. This dress was fun and easy to wear and minimized "My Girls". Can't recommend this one enough. So Cute. No special undergarments required either.
Enjoyed wearing this dress. Material is a little heavier which keeps the skirt from blowing up and colors are beautiful and vibrant. Would recommend!
Lightweight but very well-made; this was the perfect dress for a hot summer day on vacation in Miami
I love the colors of this dress and it is very flattering! Great dress for any summer occasion

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors for a Summer Wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this at 19 weeks pregnant. Ordered a size up after reading some reviews, which worked well overall. The fit was a little strange, the top is wider and the straps are quite long so I did have to pin them to keep them up. I loved the fabric, colors, and the pockets were awesome. Overall it was good, I just wish the cut of the top portion of the dress was cleaner!

I rented this as a backup for a wedding, and it worked perfectly for the rehearsal dinner party. The material on this dress is very light and comfortable, not at all heavy as it appears on some pictures. The texture of the fabric is very unique--almost like looking at a painting on canvas. The color combination is very beautiful and unlike any I've seen. I liked that I could wear a regular bra with it as well. You can't quite beat a dress with pockets! My party was on a riverboat on a breezy evening, so I was wishing I'd remembered to pack my shorts to wear underneath. It was a struggle to keep the dress from blowing up, so if that's a worry for your event, remember to pack shorts! I really loved everything about this dress, and wish it was going back in my closet instead of back to RTR. I highly recommend this beauty!
I'm a true size 4 (as long as it's not a sheath). This dress fit perfectly. I wore it to one of the events at the Hawaii Food and Wine Festival. It was perfect for their "Resort Casual" dress code.

This was a backup dress and I'm so glad I got to wear it to my friend's countryside wedding! Like other reviewers, I found the straps a little long but not so much that I needed to pin the dress. Wearing a padded bra also prevented the top from looking too loose. The pattern and fabric are super luxe, the shape is perfect for a variety of occasions, and the sunny yellow color is perfect for the warm weather. Definitely recommend!

This is my favorite RTR dress yet. I absolutely loved the pattern and the elegant and detailed flowers. The color was super fun and flattering. Dress was comfortable and it was perfect for a spring wedding. The fabric is really nice and steps up the elegance a notch. It does blow in the wind some so wear spanks! Tons of compliments and super flattering!
This dress ran true to size and was comfortable to move around in. I had to use fashion tape around the bust, but that was the only con.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fits true to size
links_reviews_text: Cute dress! Loved everything about it but the straps were a bit too long. I should have pinned them up to keep my bra from showing

I ordered this dress for a spring wedding because a friend of mine had worn it but unfortunately it looked way better on her :( I'm normally a 0 but the dress was too big. My bra kept slipping out. Other than size, the dress is v pretty. The shape is flattering (you can eat whatever you want at the wedding and not feel bad about yourself) and the pattern is really fun. My bf liked that he had more options for tie color. Would be 5/5 except for the fit!

LOVED everything about this dress! If I could buy it I would in a heartbeat! The fit was great and long enough since I'm only 5'1. I did temporarily tack up the straps a bit because they were a little big but other than that it was perfect! Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Super comfy, easy material, love the pockets.
links_reviews_text: Material is NOT stretchy. Doesn't crush. Perfect amount of plunge to the neckline and just short enough.
Easy fit, no wrinkles, beautiful design
Love getting funky with my work clothes. This was such a fun, easy dress to wear. Def rent!

links_reviews_title: It was definitely the most colorful and fun dress. It's seriously exquisite.
links_reviews_text: The chest does run small. I'm 5'4", 115lbs, 34B, 26" waist. I did not wear a bra. I loved the dress. The butt has a weird bunchiness that other wearers have mentioned. I felt self-conscious about it. I think if you were 2+ inches taller it wouldn't be an issue, because the waist would be pulled up to ribs and the bunchiness would just look like a rad bustle. On me it looked not awesome, so I tried to keep moving. It was comfortable. The accompanying slip dress is super hot. I paired this with a huge overcoat, doc marten chelsea boots, and a hot date.

links_reviews_title: Well-made piece with a great weight to it!
links_reviews_text: Overall fit was true to size. Does run smaller in the upper body, so I might suggest sizing up if you have a large bust. Beautiful dress. Important to know it comes as two pieces with maroon/dark red slip that is necessary if you'd like cover your undergarments. Would rent again.

This dress is so fun. It has a comfortable slip dress and a a flattering lace over-dress. The zippers are hidden, which is nice. I wore this to a wedding, and received so many compliments on it. It's a good dress to dance in!
So beautiful, but very tight in the chest so beware large breasted ladies!

This was the perfect dress for a January wedding. The colors and fabric of this dress are beautiful and different and I loved the tea length. Overall it was very flattering. Some things to note about this dress: 1. The detachable slip was very tight and form fitting. 2. The dress required two people to get on and off because the fabric is very structured and does not have a lot of give. (It has a side zipper and two zippers from the neck to each shoulder. I needed help getting in on and off over my head.) 3. Because of the delicate appliqu√© fabric, there was some 'netting' to give the skirt some fullness and structure. Another reviewer had mentioned the appearance of a "bunchy butt" and I was able to fix this issue by pressing the dress with an iron so that the netting relaxed and laid a bit flatter. All that said, I would definitely rent this number again!

links_reviews_title: Great looking dress but hard to get out of
links_reviews_text: It was right for my nursing breasts but other than that the dress fit wonderfully. It was hard to get out of the dress; I needed someone to help me.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was difficult to raise my arms in the dress a bit when dancing, but the waist fit better in the xs than the small, so the small was much less flattering.

Although the waist is a bit tight, the dress was gorgeous and so unique. There is some bunching around the butt area, but the style of the dress made it unnoticeable for the most part. I received compliments all night on how lovely and unique this dress was. Absolutely stunning!
Loved this dress and got so many compliments. Had to go up my normal size due to it being tight around the bust.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for our family pictures. As you can see the colors were amazing!
links_reviews_text: I'd have my eye on this dress for quite some time. Since the large was the biggest size available, that's what I wore. It was snug to say the least. I ended up opting out of a bra because that only made it tighter. We took these pictures in June so it was hot. The fabric was heavy, but it really wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. There was 2 spots on the front that the seams were busted and so the circles didn't connect, but overall this was a great dress for my occasion.

I love this dress. The details and color are beautiful and received tons of compliments. Only complaint is dress is not designed for anyone with a chest. I went braless to fit and still felt very restricted. Dress is also very long and would recommend for taller women. Overall though happy with look.

I loved this dress as did every single person I met. I wore it for Mother's Day brunch and again for work. It's two separate pieces a slip and the lace that goes over it. The slip did have a tendency to ride up a bit but not a big deal. The lace is amazing and the SR was a perfect fit.

Amazing piece! It runs really small. I went with M/10 and it fits like a size 6. The chest area was super tight. Definitely size up. The design also makes your booty twice it's size due to the pleated layers but still recommend regardless! It's beautiful and got compliments all night long

links_reviews_title: Got compliments on the dress and there was definitely nobody else in the same outfit!
links_reviews_text: The dress could have perhaps been a cinch tighter, but overall the fit was good! Heavy and great quality fabric. As others stated, it does gather in the back in a way that accentuates the booty, which I welcomed! Comfortable enough to dance in!

This dress is gorgeous and the material is luxurious. Absolutley stunning in person! Loved the seperate slip under dress. Loved the colors and pattern. Can be dressed up or down. I wore to work a couple times and felt so pretty.
This dress is so cute but sadly I could not even zip it over my rib cage or chest. There is a separate slip that's very small and the bodice is as well for curvy girls.
Pretty from the front. Really weird bunching on the butt. Uncomfortable fabric. The butt was so odd I ended up not wearing it.
Loved this dress. Could be worn for many occasions. Highly recommend
Gorgeous dress! Tight on chest and hard to get on. Zips on one side and at the shoulders. Beautiful colors.

The many of colors of this dress were simply gorgeous, you will stand out. I love the high neckline but the dress is see through so having the red slip under it adds a hint of sexiness. I think it looks better on women with broader shoulders because of the construction so that is something to keep in mind.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this!
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress made for a beautiful family photo shoot
links_reviews_text: I ordered a small and medium because I'm always one or the other. The medium fit perfect like a glove! The red slip that was sent to wear under the dress was only sent in a small and it was really snug and the outside silk layer kept riding up! But thankfully you could not tell. Our pictures came out stunning!
Loved this dress- was so unique and had gorgeous detailing. It fits tight on the bust and flares out around the waist, which is not the most flattering for everyone, but I liked the way it fit.

This dress is so beautiful and stunning! I absolutely loved the pattern and colors. This is true to size, but there is no stretch so if you are curvier we recommend sizing up. It is fitted at the natural waist, but the full skirt allows for more room at the hips. There are zippers near the neck that make it easier to get into the dress as well, and the slip is very stretchy! This dress may be worn with a standard bra. Pair this with a simple clutch and you are will be a showstopper at your formal event!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous and original but tight in bust
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, but my husband said it wasn't flattering and I agree (and ultimately didn't wear it). I am a 34dd and the chest area smashed me so I looked like I had one huge yet flat boob. Also, the waist line seems short. But the lace and color is so gorgeous in person and it's such a unique dress. Such a shame...If the chest had fit better I would have worn it...but I don't think going up a size would have worked either because the waist would have been too big.

This dress is a truly unique piece. The quality is fabulous, and the fit was almost spot on. I received so many compliments on it at the wedding I attended, which always makes you feel wonderful. I am petite so I knew that the dress would be longer on me -- it hit about ankle length -- than on the model pictured so I wore heels to ensure I was wearing the dress instead of the dress wearing me. My only complaint, and the reason I docked the dress one star, is because when it arrived it was very stiff which made the pleats stick out from the sides and from the rear. About 20 minutes with the steamer corrected this issue, but it would have been nice to be able to wear it without all that work. I would most definitely recommend this dress, and I totally wish I could purchase it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this fun and feminine dress to a bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: The dress was not as heavy as I imagined it would be, according to other reviews. The slip felt well but rode up throughout the day. The dress was a bit oversized, and the waistline could have fit slimmer but I decided to wear it anyway as it was my favorite of the dresses I rented. The quality was very good, colors true to photos and the perfect look for a girly bridal shower.

I rented this for a photography session for a project I was affiliated with and it was perfect. The fit and length was great. The neck is a smidge scratchy but not so bad you can't wear it. Ladies, with large bust beware. The top is a little small but I could pull it off because of my small chest, the lining under the lace doesn't provide much coverage or support. However this beautiful details and color far outweigh any neck scratching or lining issues. Definitely worth renting!!

This dress was super pretty and flattering - got so many compliments on it! Super breezy and fun to wear, would definitely rent again for other occasions! Runs slightly small in the chest but otherwise fit very well :)

This dress is stunning on the hanger. The quality and detail are amazing. Then you put it on and t looks great. Then you take a picture and it looks like you are 6 months pregnant. From every angle the dress poofs out just below the waist. I had to hold it back for the photo.
This dress speaks for itself. I prefer pieces with more of an edge, but I absolutely fell in love with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Out of the ordinary & very pretty
links_reviews_text: A heavy dress to wear but fit well. Well constructed. Tons and tons of complements.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner in October (then again at a Christmas party), it is in my top 5 favorite rentals (I've rented over 100 different dresses). It is so unique compared to any other dress I've worn, I just loved it. The fabric is very stiff, which can lay odd at times on your bottom, but is worth it. The red slip has two layers, the bottom layer kept riding up so I kept having to pull it down, but agin worth it.

This dress was unbelievable! I wore it to a fall wedding in Connecticut and it was perfect. I received so many compliments throughout the night and felt comfortable and chic from the church ceremony through the reception. The dress comes in two parts - a burgundy slip and the multi-color portion of the dress goes over that (without the slip it would be see-through). I was astounded by the weight of the dress and the intricacy of design and colors - it was really beautiful and clearly quality. I am very petite and it was definitely longer on me than shown on the model, but I expected that and it still felt and looked great.
