The straps on the slip were not adjustable and that was the only area that I had a little trouble with, but I just tied the straps so that it didn't slip past my bra. I would definitely rent this dress again :)
So many compliments on this fun dress. It was different than my normal sheath dress look for work, but I loved it. Very very heavy and definitely snug in the chest but I would highly recommend it!

I absolutely loved this dress on RTR, and although I didn't end up wearing it to the wedding I got it for, I would definitely rent it again! Super fun, retro fit. I felt like I was in the 1950's! However, there were some issues; beware if you have a large chest, no give at all!! The dress ended up flattening my boobs in awkward places. Also, the back of the dress has interesting pleats that are not the most flattering :( That being said, beautiful dress, lux material, not like anything else I've seen. Would rent again!
This fit perfectly in the waist and the length was tea length. It comes with a slip underneath so that it's not see through. I loved this modern twist on s classic silhouette!

This dress is stunning Beautifully tailored Chic dress Very comfortable A bit heavy but it didn't stop me from dancing all night It comes with an under slip I didn't need to wear a bra Has a pleat in the back that bothered me a bit As it looked a bit like a bustle I received 3 compliments before I even walked into the actual wedding Rent it
Perfect for summer!
The material was thick which helped keep the dress in place as it was quite windy. Boob area big and I had to use boob tape. It fit everywhere else. Pretty color.
Loved the dress, tons of comments, chest area looks a bit funny if you have a bigger chest.
Wore this for a friends summer bridal shower. I received so many compliments. Loved the dress. It fit well all around except the top was a little bug but okay for a one time wear.
Easy breezy. Could be big in the chest if you are small. Fit me fine but I'm pretty full up there. Couldn't wear a bra. Wore wiry wedges and loved it!

This dress is adorable! So many compliments from men and women alike. It's very easy to wear and would fit lots of body types. I rented a medium and should have rented a small. It was still fab though! I wore it to a meeting with a fun client downtown and on a dinner date later that day.
This dress is very comfortable, and the material keeps you cool during a hot NYC night. It is also great for day time and into date night!

I rented this for a trip to Nashville to wear with my cowboy boots. It worked perfectly. I had more than one person stop me on the street to say how cute the dress was. Sweet pattern with a pretty low cut chest area.

links_reviews_title: chest didn't work out for me
links_reviews_text: i'm busty, but cldn't fill out the top of this. it made my boobs look saggy. everything else fit fine. not sure what kind of body type works for this, but definitely not mine.

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress. It was comfy yet sexy.
links_reviews_text: Must wear some shorts under because it those react like totally Marilyn Monroe

links_reviews_title: Cute but straps are on the longer side
links_reviews_text: It is a cute dress but the straps were a little long for me.

I rented this in hopes of wearing it on a cruise. The fabric and pattern of this dress are adorable, but that is where the pros stop. This is cut all wrong and just did not fit right. The top was gigantic and ill-fitting and I have a large chest so that was surprising. The straps are not adjustable and were several inches too long.

The top on this dress is very large/overwhelming, and you have to go braless (it does have structure to it, so this was ok for me). I found the overall proportion of the top half of this dress to be "off" somehow. LOVED the back criss cross, photographed beautifully!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, perfect for a summer day out!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, except for the front top. I have a small chest and the "straps" were a bit loose. Had to use some double-sided tape. Other than that, it was a beautiful and comfortable dress to wear, got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to the wineries with white sneakers & a wicker bag.
links_reviews_text: Waist and length were perfect however the chest area was way too large- if I bent over the girls were exposed.
So bright in person but photographs well. I got this for a baby shower but it was a little too bright so I didn't end up wearing it but it would be perfect for a summer date night or beach vacay!
I wore this to an outdoor wedding on July 4th weekend and was comfortable, cool, and confident in this dress. I hate that I have to return it.

I wore this at 30 weeks pregnant and I'm 5'5 , 174 pounds . The dress fit great around my chest and the elastic held up well . It was not uncomfortable around my bump . I did not need to wear wedges with this dress but it was still almost dragging on the floor . Shorter ladies will need a heel / wedge with this dress . I got a lot of compliments on this dress and would recommend it for maternity events !

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable at a 100+ degree graduation!
links_reviews_text: I don't usually wear strapless clothes but I loved the colors of this dress and thought it would be perfect for an outdoor summer graduation. The dress was light and breathable so I wasn't excessively sweating due to the garment material. The colors were vibrant. Just a perfect summer dress! The fit was comfortable. I'm typically a size 14 and have a larger bust - XLR fit great. I wore wedges - thought it was a little too long for flat sandals.

Super comfortable and lightweight. I wore this for my son's first birthday luau and it was a hit! The only thing that bugged me was the way it laid on my hips- I have very wide hips and it did look slightly funky for a maxi dress, but not funky enough for me to not wear it. Overall, loved the comfort, length and style and LOVED the colors!
It is bright, colorful and super comfortable! I had so many compliments on it!

I sized down based on the reviews, and was glad I did! I got an XS, but probably would have been okay with a Small as well. The XS fit perfectly! It was a great dress for this vacation! Picture taken for my blog, The Emerald Slipper Instagram: @theemeraldslipper www.theemeraldslipper.com

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, so much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a Mexico wedding and absolutely loved it. The small fit great (I usually wear small or medium) and was just slightly long. I wore high wedges and I am 5'2" so I expected it to be long. The colors were vibrant and perfect for the occasion. I got compliments all night! The fabric was nice, very high quality. Would love to wear this again!

links_reviews_title: Great for a beach get away
links_reviews_text: Easy and comfortable

Love love loved this dress! The only thing keeping me from buying it is that i didn't have anymore vacations to go on! Received tons of compliments and it was so comfy. Also perfect length to wear sandals for my height.
This dress is pretty. The fabric is thicker than I thought it would be but still comfortable. I like it and would rent again.
This dress I rented for a date night to go out in Miami Beach. It was a tad long and I am 5'4, however, I wore sandals with it. It really looked pretty because it flowed.
I ordered this for my baby shower and it worked wonderfully at 33 weeks pregnant. I highly recommend this dress! The bright colors were so much fun and I got many compliments.
Great dress. Hit at an awkward part of my waist but otherwise loved it and got many compliments!

I wore this dress for my baby shower in July. It fit my bump at 32+ pregnant and was super light weight and comfortable. My normal size should have been a large and it fit but ended up sizing up only to lay on the bump a little nicer. I got so many complements and was cool and comfortable all day! Would rent not pregnant too! Love the print!

links_reviews_title: My husband and I were in Savannah, GA. I wore this one night for dinner.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was a great length when parried with wedges. It was comfortable and airy since we did a LOT of walking around the historic district that night. It‚Äôs dressy enough for a nice restaurant, yet fun and summery!
Great dress, loved the colors. I typically wear a 6 or 8. I decided to rent the Medium, but I should have rented the small. It was perfect for dinner while at the beach.
This dress my so comfy! Loved the fit , loved the color, would def rent it again!
I love a great maxi and this one was flattering and comfortable!
This is stunning in person, and so comfy!!!! üíó

Great fit! The colors are gorgeous! I wore this for my reception back home (we had a destination wedding) and the tropical colors really popped! Compliments all night long! True to size, really light material, fit in all the right places and flattering!

links_reviews_title: Bright and comfy and received tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Super fun and flirty and perfect for hosting a spring baby shower. Fit true to size and would definitely think of purchasing!

This dress was absolutely adorable and I couldn't believe how light and airy it was, even on a hot day. It was so comfortable. My ONLY complaint is that it was longggg. I tied it up on the side so that I wouldn't trip over it. It didn't take away from the dress, it is just something to note if you're shorter and wearing it with flats. I wore the Medium and I'm 5'5" and it was long enough to drag on the ground and trip over (granted, I was in flip flops). Would rent it again though, especially with heels or wedges!

I love this dress so much! It was perfect for the bridal shower I attended and the light fabric was great for a hot day. I went with the size S although the XS also fit. I'm 5'7 and was able to wear flats with the dress barely off the ground.
Im 5'1" and the dress was VERY long, but it was grear material, comfortable and perfect for a wedding on the beach!
Great fit, beautiful colors and a ton of compliments. Would love to buy!
Love the colors and pattern-its so fun! Fits true to size-the XS was perfect. Plently of room in the waist and hips.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress at a beach wedding. It was AWESOME. I have a small bust, and the elastic was nice and tight (but not uncomfortable) and didn't need any tugging, even while dancing! I chose the small; I wear a 6/M in pants, but the small fit great, since it's flowy! It has hints of neon, which is a lot of fun. All in all, I would buy this dress if I could. I LOVED it!
Cute fit.

Fit great. Elastic is strong so it does not fall down. Long dress too, I'm 5'6" and with Tory Burch flip flops (no heels) the dress was clearing the ground and you could not see my feet. Would definitely rent this again!

So I was feeling all festive and embracing the culture so I rented this off the shoulder maxi. It was great for touring the cathedrals and warm weather. The fabric is a waffle weave but very light and flows very well. There is no support in the top so you need a strapless bra but I could have also gone without because the elastic did not move at all.

I wore this to a luau in Maui when my best friend and I were on our double babymoon. I loved this dress so much! It was light, breezy, colorful, fun and comfortable. I would rent this again in a heartbeat! It was perfect for our vacation. I wore the Medium Regular on my 23 week bump. I loved that the strapless top didn't cut into my underarms but still was tight enough that I didn't have to worry about any slippage. Love this cute dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a princess and received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Had to wear 1" heels and the dress was fine. Very flowy and stunning print. I actually wore this to work with a black blouse. I received compliments from upwards of 15+ people in my office! I would say the fit is snug but very comfortable. The bottom is super flowy like a gown. I probably will rent this again! Loved it!!

Rented this for vacation in Mexico and it was perfect. I loved the pattern and flounce on the top and bottom. It moves well when you walk. It is a heavier material like some other reviewers said. It also isn't super bright colors.

I wore this to my engagement party and loved it! I got so many compliments! It's actually flattering unlike so many Maxi dresses! I'm heavy chested (32DDD) didn't have to wear a bra. The dress was really long, and I would prob get the small if I wore it again!

links_reviews_title: This dress is SO COMFORTABLE, I didn't want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: I am holding onto a bunch of baby weight and I was hoping that this dress wasn't going to make me look like a tent. It was perfect, I received SO many compliments on it, and a few people told me to buy it! It was a perfect outfit to the garden themed baby shower I wore it to! for reference, I'm 5'10 and right now wearing a size 16

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments! Is definitely long.

I initially scoured RTR because I really wanted a breastfeeding friendly dress so I could take my infant daughter to a wedding. It became harder than I thought to find something and so I felt so lucky to stumble upon this dress. It was perfect for breastfeeding discreetly during the wedding ceremony! I had a full day of a wedding followed by a bachelorette party for different friends. This dress was great for both! I even switched from heels to flats and was able to adjust the dress to fit my different heights.

I've rented this dress twice. The first time was for vacation in Mexico and the second was for a birthday party. I love the light fabric and the bright colors. I received several compliments both times I wore this dress. I just might have to buy it!

This is my favorite RTR ever!!! It is not listed as a maternity or bump friendly and I have no idea why! It is stretchy, and runs large. It's is beautiful and fits my 34 week bump with no problem. I will probably purchase this dress. The colors are gorgeous and I received so many compliments. RENT THIS DRESS!

Loved wearing this. More a deep royal blue in person (thought it was purple from pictures), but still a gorgeous color. Love the weight of the fabric--it falls nicely and the asymmetrical hem is fun and swishy. Size down as this size is smaller than my usual and still felt a little generous. I fussed with bra options and ended up with a Lively bralette underneath--I tied the knot around it, put a little fashion tape on the straps and it was good all night! It's a little boobalicious but worked.

Somehow, I feel like the 0 is STILL too big for this dress (I am regularly a 2-4), but the cut-out is a sexy detail, and the way the skirt drapes is beautiful. It's a good quality dress that is very fun to dance in.
Wore in a cruise. Had not tried a style (with the bow by bust) before. It was fun and I got lots of complements!

links_reviews_title: Light enough for summer, still has nice weight and movement.
links_reviews_text: RTR did recommend I take the 2 on this dress but I stuck with 4 because I was nervous. It definitely runs big though! I had planned to safety pin it on the back of the waist to give it a better fit but I didn't have time in the end. I'm glad I left it the way it was, it was comfy and had room to expand with dinner, snacks, and cake. If I hadn't had a sticky bra handy to pull the ladies up a little bit, it would have definitely looked to big! I tied the bow through the center of the bra to make sure it wouldn't show through the keyhole at all. It's a BEAUTIFUL dress and it left me feeling fabulous.
I wanted this dress to work so badly but it is gigantic. The zero felt like an 8. Runs extremely large. Size down at least 2 sizes.

Absolutely loved this dress. The cutout in the front made it super sexy, and the hi-lo made it super fun. I didn't need a bra because the top was tight enough for me to feel good. Not sure if a bra would have worked though - you might need just pasties. I have the dress 4 stars instead of 5 only because it bunched a little bit on the sides, and I found myself readjusting throughout the night. Paired with open toed gold heels. Wore for a black tie LGBTQ+ Equality Ball.

One of my favorite rentals ever. Would definitely recommend for an hourglass shape because as others have noted it is a bit large in the top area. Otherwise it's comfortable and the fabric was thick enough to go without spanx and I also didn't need a bra.
I loved this dress. I wanted to wear a bra and was able to do so by tying the bow around the center of the bra to conceal it - it worked out perfectly!

I really like this dress. I did like it in the store better than once I get home however, mostly because of the need for special bra and my accessories did not work so well with it. Since I had rented another dress as well, I decided to go with the other. This dress is a very pretty blue more like navy than the picture looks. It's a little big in the top. The fabric is really nice and heavy hangs beautifully and I think the dress is very figure flattering.

I'm normally a 2 but most said to size down a smidge. The 0 was real snug but it worked! I tied the bow around my strapless bra and it covered perfectly! Spanks and no undies. The color is NAVY! Not purple. Wore this to a beauty pageant where we were being introduced on stage... everyone liked it! My mom wore a RTR outfit too! We will both rent again!!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so well made! Perfect cut for a petite girl.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, you can wear a regular bra. I'm a 36 DD and I love how I didn't have to wear a strapless bra with this dress. Beautiful shade of navy blue.
Loved that I could adjust the tie, will say The dress was comfortable overall!

The color was spectacular. The rope straps have a very Grecian feel to the dress. I have a very large chest (38DDD) and didn't have to wear a bra surprisingly! The tie on the front covered the cleave perfectly while still being sexy. The high-low hem added some slight drama and gave me shoes some spotlight as well. We were at. Charity event at The Porsche Experience. Drove a blue Porsche and felt like the blue belle of the "ball".
Loved the length , I am petite so having the high and low style was perfect. Would rent again.

Everyone loved this dress... It is beautiful, but it could be made better. The straps were pretty tight on me and I'm 5'2. Also, the boob area is huge for a size zero dress. I would reccomend wearing a sticky bra if you need help in the cleavage dept. I wore it in August and was hot, the material is kinda heavy. Would reccomend for a fall wedding. Don't forget to get fun shoes for this look!

Dress was worn to an formal wedding. It travels well and did not need to be pressed due to the material. It was stretchy for curvy girls like myself and I got compliments all night! Only con was straps had to be pinned up. Wish I could keep.

links_reviews_title: Not what the picture looks like
links_reviews_text: My husband loved it, I hated it. I looked nothing like the photo. It wasn't purple it was dark blue the top was huge on me even with a padded push up bra. I should of ordered a 0 since the 2 was slightly large and very large in the chest. Also that pretty bow in the picture...yeah not it was flat and when tied it just looked limp. The form of the dress was flattering but just not me.

links_reviews_title: Unique & hemline, great quality, flattering fit.
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect dress for a daytime wedding in London. Had so many comments on the dress from fellow wedding goers, even random strangers on the way to the reception! I would keep this dress if I could. Maybe my favorite rental ever. Classic but sexy. The cutout added interest and wasn't revealing.

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything!!! Comfortable. Great fit. Beautiful. So many compliments. Felt good on.
links_reviews_text: The ONLY con is it isn't exactly the blue you see on the model. But still fabulous!

links_reviews_title: LOVE THE STYLE-- RUNS LARGE & NOT THE SAME COLOR IN PICTURE
links_reviews_text: Overall the dress ended up being good enough for the wedding because I did love the style of the dress although the fit is extremely awkward. Overall the size 2 runs very large especially in the chest & waist. The straps are also slightly awkward and short. I could have definitely worn a 0 but I put on a push up bra and safety pinned it to the dress so I could help fill the top out. Also, the color is more of a dark blue not like the model photo.

I rented this for a work formal event and it was perfect. The material is thick so it's flattering and smoothing. The dress is also very comfortable. Only downside is it's hard to find a bra that doesn't pop out through the keyhole; I opted for sticky boobs. Loved the flair on the bottom and where it hits on the leg.

links_reviews_title: Cute, elegant, not purplish but dark blue and not fit
links_reviews_text: The dress color on the website is way off. This is color is called Midnight which is a deep navy blue not a violet-blue like I saw on my screen. It is cute though and would be elegant if fit properly. Like others have said the top is a bit odd. You could wear a small strapless bra but fashion tape might be better. I ordered a 6 but should have probably ordered the 4 or even a 2. And since it does not come in Petite, I recommend ordering a size down so it does not so much to the floor. Since it was navy and I already own a flattering navy formal, I did not end up wearing this one. But my husband did like it.

links_reviews_title: Showstopping dress for a wine release party!
links_reviews_text: This dress was fantastic for the wine release event I went to over the weekend! I ordered the 2 and the 4 and went with the 2. The dress is true to size but the bust was a bit big. Nothing a bit of fashion tape couldn't fix. I would highly recommend this dress if you want to wear something fun and flattering to an upscale event.

I'm usually between 4-6 and I wore the 4 and it fit comfortably but still gorgeous. (Not bodycon type dress). I was able to wear a navy regular bra with this and was easily hideable with the front tie. I'm 5'4" and I didn't feel like this was too long on me like a lot of the long rtr dresses. Got lots of compliments too! Definitely recommend!

Wore this dress for a formal winter wedding. It looks the same as it does in the pictures but a smaller opening in the front bust area. Fits pretty true to size, but is form fitting, so go a size up if you're in between. Fabric is pretty thick so you don't need to worry too much about spanx/lines showing through.

I ordered a few dresses to try for an upcoming wedding, this included. Tried it on and the armpits were SO UNCOMFORTABLE. straps are super short so the under arm part was digging in so bad. Also, the tie part in the front was too high, and also doesn't actually control the tightness of the front, it's just a decorative tie basically so you cant adjust that way. Bottom half is really cute, but just couldn't do it.
I don't have huge arms but the shoulder strap was a bit too tight - I guess if you have really fit arms it could fit well. Overall the dress looked pretty flattering
Bodice part of the dress had extra fabrics and looked sloppy when tied.

links_reviews_title: I actually didn't end up wearing this but it was really a lovely dress! I had two to choose from.
links_reviews_text: This fit beautifully and the little gap in the front was not as big as it seemed in the picture.

I loved the shape on me! I am 5' 6" and the length was perfect with heels. However, the waist was baggy and I would need to size down one or two. The cutout in the front wasn't obscene on my chest (I am a 34DD).

links_reviews_title: It was a wonderful dress, husband loved it.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size. The front key hole was a bit awkward, I could not make it work for the event due to this design. It was a replacement for a piece that was unavailable, I appreciated the selection by the staff, correct in picking his piece for the replacement. Thank you.

links_reviews_title: great dress for dancing the night away!
links_reviews_text: I ohad the 8 and 10 and wore the 10. The 8 fit but was a bit snug under the arms and wanted to make sure I could dance. The 10 was a bit big but still worked. Loved the fabric and the cut. Worked great for a black tie winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this style!
links_reviews_text: I'm tall and found the seams to hit me at the wrong spots. It was small on the straps (top came too high up) but loose on my body.

links_reviews_title: It was a great event and I received many compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well on the hips and through the waist, but was to big in the chest, so I had to safety pin the top part together so it would stay up.
This dress is so cute and could really give a curvy figure some nice emphasis on the hips. It was too big though and just made me look a little bit frumpy. I'd get it again in a zero.

I ended up not wearing this dress. I loved the cut and color, but it was way too big even though I typically wear a size 4. The straps, bust, and waist were too loose. I have an hourglass figure so I don't normally have a problem filling out the bust area!
Too much emphasis on my mid section- could not wear.

I rented this as a back-up if the dress I really wanted to wear didn't fit right. Most features about this dress fit awkwardly on my body. I ended up sliding the straps off-the-shoulder and it looked a lot better than on my shoulders! But I didn't like where the high low hit on my legs and overall didn't like the fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, comfortable, simple yet elegant enough for a black tie event.
links_reviews_text: Even though it is larger fitting in the bust, I think it is meant for small chested ladies. If I had a larger bust it would look much too provocative for black tie and perhaps fall out as it is very low cut and has zero support.

links_reviews_title: Just an absolutely stunning dress. Second time that I rented it.
links_reviews_text: Good for bustier people because bust has a lot of room. Otherwise, the fit is pretty slim to body, although I wore a 0 and had a little extra room. Stunning stunning bottom part of the dress. Beautiful, rich color. I will 100% rent for the 3rd time!
The bottom half was slightly loose on me. Loved the bright, vibrant color and lace detail.
Very short but hot and covered on top; gorgeous color

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, easy off and on
links_reviews_text: Some rompers are hard to get off and on, but this was not bad. It does have two hook and eye clips but they were manageable by myself. Loved it and the cut hid my chubby spots.
Wore this to a Christmas celebration with girlfriends. Received tons of compliments. I have a curvy shape, so I was pleased that it fit well. Would definitely rent again!

This is perfectly comfortable in size 10 I could have even gone 8 I think. I felt soooo sexy yet comfortable in this. I ate a lot at the holiday party and didn't feel like I had to suck in it anything
Wore to work holiday party. I'm usually a size 8 but I went with a 10 and it fit perfectly. Size up.
Love love love this romper , formal , fun and sexy ! Thinking of buying it

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and fit. Tied into the wedding nicely and lots of comments!
links_reviews_text: The size 8 fit perfect. Tough to zip the back and clasp alone but can be done. If lace isn't for you, might find sleeves a little scratchy, but manageable. Didn't think I could pull off the color red and a little outside my comfort zone but LOVED this outfit! Jumpers are my go to and RTR is my to go place!

links_reviews_title: Sexy without being over the top
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my 30th birthday and loved it! Got lots of compliments and would definitely rent it again. Only downside is the zipper and hook are in the back so needed help getting it zipped etc anytime I went to the bathroom- not a huge deal but slight inconvenience. All in all I would rent it again and probably would buy it if I could! I did get a size up from my usual

I loved this romper so much. So many of them are tight in the crotch area for me due to a long torso, but this was absolutely perfect! I've also had issues before with lace rompers being too fragile in the arms due to lifting weights, but no issue here. I'm 5'6", 142lbs.

links_reviews_title: Fun, sexy romper but very short!!!
links_reviews_text: High quality material. Stands out in a crowd. Very short. Size up - no stretch in the fabric!

links_reviews_title: This is a show stopper for any occasion!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6/8 but I knew this looked like It might be tight in the bust for me so I sized up. This was perfect and had POCKETS! Compliments all night, even got called out by the people in the show we attended.

links_reviews_title: Awesome looking romper for a girls night out!
links_reviews_text: Good fit and even with pockets!! The shorts are quite short.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Rented this for NYE and had compliments all night. Perfectly paired with tights and thigh high boots. Wish I would've gotten a full body pic. Would definitely rent again.

Comfortable, slightly stretchy, bright, and beautiful! Fit true to size and was able to wear a strapless bra with it. Difficult to hook/unhook for bathroom breaks but the legs were loose enough to offer an alternative option. ;-) Lots of compliments on this romper!

Rented this dress for my bachelorette night out and boy was it an amazing piece ! The zipper was a little tough around the seam of the fabrics but with the help of a friend easy to use. Great length on the shorts and perfect arm sleeve lengths

I can't think of a more appropriate thing to have worn to my company's holiday party! This piece was not only festive and work-appropriate; it was super comfortable, too! Loved the stunning bright red and intricate lace overlay. I added a boyfriend blazer and ankle wrap sandals to balance professional with fun. Not gonna lie - I felt like the hostess with the mostest receiving compliments all night long! And who doesn't love a romper with pockets? I am normally between a 4-6, but I struggled to zip the 6 passed my waist so I sized up to an 8! The romper is short so it probably worked out best for this occasion. Loved this!

This romper was definitely the hit of the party. I've never received so many compliments. Truly a unique piece. It runs very true to size and although it's lace I felt like there was still some give in the material. I absolutely adored this romper!!
Perfect fit - very flattering and it has pockets!!! I'm typically a 2/4 and this was true to size

links_reviews_title: Nice but short and hard to hook after bathroom
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty true to size and I liked wearing it while standing up but felt uncomfortable sitting down bc it was incredibly short. It was also hard to hook the top of the back after using restroom. Got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend proposed to me in this in front of the Rockefeller Center.
links_reviews_text: Looked great! Sleeves a little loose on my arms but other than that it was perfect.
I loved the fit. I didn't need to wear a bra, which was a plus! :)

Both the 4 and 6 fit, and would have preferred to wear the 4 as it was a better fit up top. However ended up wearing the 6 as the 4 seemed too short to wear to a winter work holiday party. The interior lining of the 6 was a bit baggy up top but the lace overlay largely hid that fact. Loved having pockets, always a plus. No issues with the zipper. I wore with a black ribbon belt and thought it needed a little something to define the waste-line.

So this ended up running small... for reference I rented two other rompers a couple of months ago from RTR, one in almost the exact same style, that fit perfect in a 6. And for this one, I had to size up to an 8. Unfortunately, the 8 was stained, so I couldn't wear it after all. But would probably try this again in the future!
Pros-Fit, color, comfort, eye-catching, pockets Cons-back zipper means you need a bathroom buddy all night.

Received so many compliments wearing this for an anniversary dinner. Gorgeous color, material. Fits comfy all over. Be careful with jewelry, metal on bags, etc. as the lace snags easily. At the end of the night I noticed the right arm had an extra metal clip from the back of the dress snagged on it and I couldn't get it off. Overall I loved this romper and will definitely rent again!
Loved this romper, wore it to my husbands holiday work party, the size 8 was perfect. I'm 5.6, 150 lbs, 34b.

This fun and flirty romper is a must rent for your next night out! I love the fit of this romper since it hugs in the right places. I would recommend this romper be best for A to C cups since it is fitted in the bust area. If you are curvier in the hips, I would recommend sizing up! Can't wait to rent this again!

This outfit was PERFECT for my 30th bday! I got so many compliments from friends and strangers that night. I was extremely comfortable in it and felt so sexy! Only issue i had was that the entire night i needed a "bathroom buddy" to help unhook and unzip me every time i needed to use the bathroom...other than that, i would rent this again in a heartbeat!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Valentine‚Äôs ball as it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: Loved the way the romper fit. I got so many compliments and it looked great in pictures!

links_reviews_title: Statement outfit for my bachelorette bash!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I have a long torso so the shorts were really short when sitting down. It helps to have a friend go to the bathroom with you to unzip and zip unless you have amazing shoulder range of motion! I felt sexy and classy in this outfit! I would absolutely wear it again! #bestbacheloretteoutfit

links_reviews_title: NYE 2018 Great friend's made it a memorable night!
links_reviews_text: This outfit was awesome! The fit a little snug (I wish it came in a 14), but that just meant I had to take a partner to the bathroom with me.

I dont have any complaints. It was the perfect fit for NYE party. It was classy, sexy and confortable. It doesnt get any better than that. I wore a red bra as with it and you couldnt even tell. I am 149 lb. 34 DD
This was my first time trying RTR. Material was perfect! Loved the pockets on the side! Recieved numerous compliments! Ordered another dress for an upcoming event!
Fits perfect! So comfortable, wish I could keep it! Perfect for a party! Was great for NYE!
This romper was lovely. It was difficult to get on because I had trouble with the zipper and i was solo. Nevertheless, my legs looked great and it was covered up sexy. Loved it!!

Overall, this romper was okay but not amazing. If you have a bigger backside, like I do, it looks great but can feel a little short for a company holiday party (which is where I wore it). The 4 fit but the 6 was looser in the rear and felt more appropriate. It is a very bright, festive red, and the lace is beautiful, but I didn't love the lining underneath - it kept moving around and getting jumbled, so I felt like I was adjusting it a lot. I'm giving it 4 stars because it did look beautiful, but it wasn't the most comfortable to wear. Just okay for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper. Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable. 4 is my usual romper size and it fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely perfect for a Christmas party
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, true to size. There wasn't a whole lot of difference in the 6 and the 4. Sleeves were a tad bigger, and there was more room below the waist. I'm 5'2 and 135lbs and am usually in between a 6 and a 4 in dresses, probably closer to a 4, and wore the size 4 in this so I would say it is pretty true to size. Got compliments all night, one of my favorite RTRs ever!!

I needed an outfit for a holiday party where I was part of the entertainment. This jumper did not disappoint! I got compliments from both men and women. I always go back and forth between a size 4 and 6. It honestly depends on the designer. I ended up wearing the size 6, though I would still say the fit is true to size. I would just suggest going up a size for your backup. This jumper was formal yet fun, and it was very comfortable to wear and move in! And bonus; it has pockets! I would definitely recommend this jumper!

links_reviews_title: Flirty and girly and hid all the right parts
links_reviews_text: I always get worries wearing too form fitting dresses to weddings because I love to eat and dance and not be restricted in either of those areas and because of the ruffles on the side it hid my little food belly quite well and the material was smooth on my skin and was very nice to dance in!
Ordered size 4 and 6....6 fit perfect, lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 4R and 6L. The 4 would have fit slightly better, but I ended up wearing the 6 for the extra length. I'm 5'6 and needed that extra bit of length with heels on. I loved this dress and got compliments all night!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this! It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a beach formal wedding. The only thing, was I wish I would have had the long version. It is snug on the hips!

loved it! it's hard to find a floral pattern gown that looks dressy (and not like a regular maxi dress). It was a great dress for a Summer wedding. Get more Amur brand to RTR so I can rent everything else :)

Loved everything about this dress!!! The colors, the style, the cutouts under the boob area, the dress.... obsessed! The only downside is the booty area was a little tight but I have a larger derri√®re than I would like, but it was fine. Overall I loved it!
This dress was very beautiful. I felt like a whimsical fairy. My only complaint was that it was too big in the chest and the straps kept falling down. Don't need a bra.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black-tie-optional wedding - it was so perfect! I got compliments on it all night.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is gorgeous, but not stretchy at all so the fit ended up being a bit small (which was fine bc I wore my back-up size). I wore smaller block heels and the regular length was perfect (I'm just a bit over 5'4). The ruffles were soooo flattering and even the cut-out was tasteful (just showed a sliver of skin, but also could pull it up so that you don't really see it). I could not recommend this dress more!! I felt gorgeous in it and the style was totally feminine and unique (After posting a photo, I also had multiple people message me asking where I got it and what brand it was).
I loved this dress. It fit quite well (though the zipper is tough to get up) and was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect and sexy. I got tons of compliments. I felt like a Goddess.
links_reviews_text: I loved it! The boob part is a little tight. Size up if your chest area is larger.

I was worried the first time I tried this on- it was a little bit TOO tight in the hips when I first tried it on and I was terrified I'd rip it on the dance floor- RTR was amazing and sent a size up to my location- which I (very surprisingly) was a bit too small for- so I risked the 4 and it had just enough give to look amazing all night long! So the moral of the story is- if you are concerned about the hips being a little too tight don't panic. I'm 5'4, 127 and athletic body type.

links_reviews_title: Feminine. flattering, fantastic! So happy with this rental.
links_reviews_text: Haven't yet reviewed an RTR rental yet but knew I had to for this one! Just as other reviews said - received tons of compliments and felt awesome in this dress. Choose a 4R and 6R and ended up wearing the 6, so may run slightly small depending on body type. Sleeves can be just a tad annoying to keep in place, but overall worth it for the sheer beauty + awesomeness of this dress! Loveeeeee.
Gorgeous dress- flirty, fun and fit was great. Tons of compliments and it was perfect for a hot summer night. I am 6' and the length of the 6L was just at the floor barefoot.

I am usually a solid 6, but needed an 8 in this. I had to pin the sleeves up because they were big but the rest of the dress fit like a glove. It was super flattering and comfortable. I highly recommend.

I LOVED this dress. I got so many compliments and it was perfect for the wedding I attended. I ordered a 4 and a 6 and I am usually a 4 but the 4 was very tight around my hips and a little short near my toes so I sized up to the 6 and the 6 fit perfectly. Although it looks flowy, the dress does have a tighter fit. The straps are a little lose around the shoulders just fyi. Overall would definitely recommend!

I rented this for a wedding and wanted to love it, but I returned it because the chest area was too big and my boobs were totally falling out. The straps were also way too long so they wouldn't stay up. I sized up to an 8 to leave more room for my hips, based on reviews, and that was the right call because it was comfortable and a good fit on my lower half.
Wedding is tomorrow and I'm so excited to wear this dress.

I'm pretty sure I say this about everything I rent from RTR, but I seriously think this might be my favorite rental so far. I loved the way it flowed when I walked and how flattering the fit was. If available I would have gotten a smaller size just because the sleeves were a little long and the cut outs gaped wider than they would have if I had gotten a smaller size. Other than that, no cons! Such a beautiful gown!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for my daughter, for her Junior Prom. She looked beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. The process very easy!
It's on the tighter side but gorgeous for the tropical weather.

links_reviews_title: Fun spring dress with lots of details
links_reviews_text: Very unique dress with fun print and cutouts yet wasn't over the top due to ruffles covering the right areas. Easy to move in and stood out against darker dresses.
I felt so beautiful! Can't recommend enough. Perfect for Mexican wedding. I went braless and felt held it all night

This was an awesome dress! I got so many compliments with this dress and it was so fun to wear for a Miami wedding. I felt very comfortable wearing it even though I'm personally not used to wearing lower necklines. It's form fitting but was still very easy to dance in throughout the night. Because I have a shorter torso, I did have to safety pin the straps so that they didn't keep falling down. Other than that, it's a great dress and I highly recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Dress is so flattering and was the perfect statement piece for a wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress fits well enough through the bust that you really don‚Äôt need a bra. Dress is long, I‚Äôm five feet two inches so I need a good four inch heel.

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing and I wanted to keep it forever
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie wedding and it was absolutely amazing. The ruffles hide "problem areas" - I regretfully went out the night before and snacked the entire next day. it's sexy with the cut outs and neckline but still flirty and cute. I got tons of compliments for how fun, and different it was compared to the rest of the guests in all black. I paired it with a dark purple lipstick which worked fantastically. Was really happy with this look. One thing to note- the dress definitely stretched out over the evening except where the cut outs were. I think I could have gotten a smaller size. It also wrinkled really easily.

links_reviews_title: Amazing backdrop in Jackson Hole, WY in late August for a wedding spent with great friends.
links_reviews_text: If you have any sort of a butt, know that it will fit a little tighter there. It's a lot more fitted with no stretch and you anticipate. Not "flowing" like you might imagine but still unbelievably comfortable. This was perfect for the wedding and location i was attending. Don't wear a bra, I attempted and it shows everywhere. There's a print though so don't worry about too much nipple anywhere!

I went a little out of my comfort zone with this dress and was so glad I did! This dress was so feminine and comfortable to wear for an outdoor/barn wedding in Kentucky, and several people - even guys! - complimented it. The dress runs mostly true to size except in the bust - I am a large C cup and had to size up to a 6 from my usual 4 so it would cover everything. I'm 5' 8" but I wore flats, so the Long was actually too long, but not enough to be problematic. I danced all night long in it!
Loved this dress! Fit true to size, but no stretch so tighter around the hip area. Shoulder straps were long and fell down a lot, but they work up or down. Length was perfect with 4 inch heels.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: A little low cut (I'm a size DD) but overall fit well!

The top was way too big on the 6. Probably because I'm not even slightly busty. Size 4 wasn't available & a 4 likely would've fit perfect. I had to tie the straps behind my neck. It would be difficult to wear a bra with this. All that aside, I love this dress because it looked & felt gorgeous. The side slits are a nice touch. Had lots of compliments, even from strangers!

I am 135lbs and I initially was unsure on the sizes I should have ordered but am glad I went with a 4R and a 6R. I chose the 6R due to the chest of the dress. I wanted to wear a bra and was able to find a low cut one that worked well. I had to pull both straps of the dress up because they often fell down completely, although, I actually prefer the look of the dress with both straps up. I wore 3 inch heels and am 5'3", this was the perfect length and I did not step on the dress or have to hold it up. Seriously my favorite dress so far!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous! The ruffle detailing and material are lovely. I received Non-Stop compliments all night long. It was light and airy, perfect for a formal summer event. I generally wear a size 6 but ended up wearing the 8. It fit perfectly when I sized up. If you have a larger bust size you may have trouble fitting into the dress. I am a B and if I were any larger I would have been falling out of the top of the dress. I was thrilled with the dress and had a wonderful first Rent the Runway experience. I will definitely be a return customer. I would highly recommend this dress!

Being my first time using RTR, I was a little hesitant and nervous about sizing and quality of the dress. I can be so in between sizes so I wasn't sure if I should get a 4 and a 6 or a 6 and an 8; the reviews said it was true to size so I went with the 6 and it fit perfectly! I rented this dress for my cousins August/ barn style yet elegant wedding and it was just PERFECT- I got so many compliments and what I loved most about this dress was that it really accentuated the smaller area of my torso and hid parts that I'm more self conscious about, so it made me look and feel smaller so that was a definite plus!!! The only negatives were the sleeves- I wasn't a fan of the double sleeves so I pinned them together and wore them both up and liked the dress so much better that way; the only issue with that was I had to use double sided tape to keep them up or they would fall down. I also opted to not wear a bra because it's a little low cut so wearing a bra made me look a little more bustier than I liked. Other than those two things- I absolutely loved the dress and so did everyone else!!!!!

links_reviews_title: Felt confident for the first time in months!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a formal country club wedding and received compliments galore! I am 5 months pregnant and haven't felt this amazing in anything in a long time! The fabric has absolutely no stretch, so I would suggest sizing up if you're between sizes. It definitely shows off the cleavage and I really can't see a way that wearing a bra would be possible; so you have to be ok with that:) Also, the long was not nearly as long as I was hoping. I wore an 8L and still wore flats in order for the dress to just skim the floor (I am 5'7). Overall, my favorite rental ever! Would live in this dress if I could!

For my big booty gals, there is not much give in that area so I opted for the size up and it was perfect. Very flattering on the bum and the ruffles make it more modest with the cutouts. Compliments all night!

The fit was true to size. I received so many compliments all night. The sleeves that naturally fell off the shoulder from time to time were so sassy but classy! Another design element that worked well was the high rib cage slits in each side. It showed just enough skin. One of the best looking dresses I've ever worn!
I loved wearing this dress to an outdoor summer wedding. I got so many compliments all evening. It was comfortable and was true to size. I would absolutely recommend this dress!

Length: I'm 5'8 and the 4L was a perfect length for flats. Fit: The mid section was a little loose but the 2L would have been way too small in the chest. Overall it was a great dress and I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Rented for wedding but wore to Sunday brunch
links_reviews_text: I rented this as a back-up to a wedding in Santa Barbara and decided to wear it to Sunday brunch at El Encanto instead. It's a beautiful, ethereal dress. Don't let the cutouts scare you! If you are petite and have a short torso like me, the fabric actually kind of folds over each other, and the ruffles cover the cutouts. If you are tall/have a long torso, this may not be for you. I did have issues with the straps - not sure if the dress was stretched or worn but the straps that were meant to be worn down seemed extra long so I decided to wear both of them up.
Tight around hips, and not super long- I'm 5'10" and wore about 5" heels. Didn't quite touch the ground. Overall, beautiful, comfortable, great dress!

links_reviews_title: 7 mons pregnant and it's a great fit!
links_reviews_text: I was worried about renting an 8 when I'm normally a 2-4 but at 30 weeks pregnant things are different. this dress fit GREAT. I'm 5'2" and the length, even w short heels, was great. The only downside was that the straps are not adjustable. So instead of wearing the straps down across my arms I had to wear them up otherwise they looked too big.
love this dress!
This dress kills for a night out
True to size. Body hugging but not tight. Loved the straps.
Wore this baby out for a burlesque date with my guy! Was amazing but could not wear any undergarments. It does not hide anything.

links_reviews_title: Received my dress earlier than expected. First time using this service!
links_reviews_text: Received lots of compliments. Dress fit was classy yet sexy. Material is flattering.
The dress fit well and was great for New Years. I wasn't totally in love with the way the color looked on me but it still worked out.

I rented this dress for a wedding when I was nearly 31 weeks pregnant. I sized up 2 sizes due to the bump and it fit really well. I probably could have gotten away with the 46 but I had plenty of wiggle room, which is nice being this far along. I love this designer and recommend most of their dresses, even pregnant!

The color is stunning in person and it‚Äôs SO comfortable. The only complaint is the fabric bunching around my waist. The hem was also a little strange...seemed unfinished? But overall the style was unique and the comfort couldn‚Äôt be beat.
The fit was amazing and it was the perfect mix of sexy and classy!
This dress is very sexy. But I felt a little self conscious in it. You can see any little bloat. Also it's not the color in the picture on the model. It's less pink, more of a dusty color.
Im not a fan of pink. I worn the dress for a pink party. Love the fabric. You can't wear underwear I worn a spank Very comfortable dress

I'm generally a 4-6 body wise but because I'm really busty I usually am a 6-8. I got the 8 because the 6 wasn't available. I would go smaller next time. Everything just felt pretty loose. It definitely is a statement piece.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely my favorite dress so far!! Wearing this in Israel next week for my 50th birthday!!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit.. gorgeous color.. feels spectacular on :)

I am usually a 10 or 12. I wear a 36DD. The dress was pretty and cool, but was super tight. I was having to suck in for every picture. I wore seamless spanx so I don't think you could see anything under the dress; it was pretty smooth. If I was in better shape I'd rent again, but I was not a fan of sucking in all night lol.

links_reviews_title: I fell in love with this dress.
links_reviews_text: The size is perfect, very comfortable. No cons, all positive throughout.

links_reviews_title: Romeo amd juliet Dress to Remember
links_reviews_text: I wore this to the ballet and everyone loved it! I thought the black belt looked nice and made the bodycon sillouette a little less sexy (i was going my mom and some other ladies). I am quite busty and did not have to wear a bra! I originally rented it for Valentines day but thought it was a little long for that:

I absolutely loved dress! It had a lot stretch and fits like a glove. Just be aware that you can not wear any type of under garments with it unless you want visable lines. I would 100% rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing it but hated the pictures, the dress rode up a lot making it look like fat rolls
links_reviews_text: Looking at this in the mirror I thought it looked amazing. Definitely a Barbie moment for my 30th birthday. I hated the pictures. The dress would ride up and create a lot of wrinkles which looks like rolls. Also the side straps were too loose which i didn't like. Still enjoyed wearing the dress, would't rent it again.

Wore this to my 42nd birthday party and everyone wanted to know where I "bought" it. This is the 3rd dress in this brand I've rented and they've all been hits. Nice thick fabric is flattering, fit is snug but holds you in and vert comfortable wear all night long.

Unfortunately we were too busy with my boyfriend's surprise party to take too many pictures but this dress was SEXY and fun! Showed off my curves in all the right ways, showed off the girls to perfection and the color was so fun and pretty. I loved it!!
Loved this dress, want to rent IÔ∏èt again to take better pics ;). Fit really well, has some stretch and the length is great to offset the sexiness going on up top!

links_reviews_title: flattering simple and suited for spring summer wedding
links_reviews_text: don't have to wear a bra, straps stayed in place shockingly

I was thinking this would be a bubblegum pink, but it's more of a flesh tone. That's okay! Not like I'm married to it - thanks RTR. Anyway, the fit is rally good if you have a bigger ribcage/chest area and small hips. It's usually difficult for me to get dresses to fit because I'm so top-heavy, but this worked perfectly in that regard. If I had more time this week, I would have "hemmed" the bottom with fashion tape, as it's a bit of a mumsy length for level of sass the straps have. I'm 5'2" which is another factor.
Be aware- even no see undes - dont work with this dress, other wise its beautiful stretch fabric, almost don't wrinkles, black straps add extra eye catching detailing,nice classy length

I was not sure about this. It was out of my comfort Zone for sure ! But the other dress I ordered was too big and this was my backup. A bit more revealing than I am used to. But it was fun and sexy and a great fabric to hold it l in!

links_reviews_title: Great off the shoulder flirty details
links_reviews_text: Wore this for an engagement party and the material was sturdy and comfortable, although heavier than it looks. Does show lingerie seams so choose carefully. Did not need a bra with the dress.
loved this classy yet sexy fit my chest nicely I'm short but loved how it was a little longer on me. wore spanx to feel more comfy but fit like a glove the fabric is not to thick and doesn't bunch.

links_reviews_title: Liked it but did not love it
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, very classy. But if you have something to hide - this is not the dress to wear. It shows everything! Your spanx and underwear lines, your bra and love handles. If you are anywhere between size 0 - 4 - Get it!

I was 18 weeks pregnant. Went braless- 36DD. Dress has no zipper. I was a 6/8 pre-pregnancy. I wore this in a 12. The 10 was a bit snug, and you can see it pulling in the bump area. The 12 fit perfect. It was not tight at all, and extremely flattering. There was certainly enough room for a bump a little bigger in the 12. I wore the dress to an afternoon bridal shower. I received so many compliments, and felt so sexy and confident in this dress. Some ladies have commented about the straps appearing to be "bondage" like- however, I viewed the dress as tasteful, worn the right way of course. I highly recommend this dress for all my pregnant ladies out there!!!! You'll be very happy.
I love the fabric of Chiara dresses. They fit so well and smooth out any imperfections. This pretty pink number has a hint of raciness with the straps, but the length keeps it classy.

links_reviews_title: What an amazing stunning comfortable sexy dress!
links_reviews_text: I love the fit! The material was so amazing high quality. There is no zipper so you have to put it over your head to get in it it is definitely true to size. I thought this dress was so comfortable and beautiful!

I couldn't even wear spanks because you could see the seams. My only real choice was to go without under garments. Super tight and runs small. You could basically count my ribs through this. Very sexy and good stretchy material. It I wouldn't recommend unless you don't mind leaving little to the imagination.

links_reviews_title: Sexy top! A little unforgiving at waist.
links_reviews_text: Top and length are perfect. Spanx may solve the somewhat unforgiving nature of it. No zipper to get in and out.
I stood out in a sea of black at a charity gala! Dress is very form fitting. I was able to wear a normal strapless bra, but need to be conscience of undergarments because of fit.
Easy to move in! Very comfortable.
This dress was classic, beautiful, and stood out in a crowd!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress- got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: A little tight fitting and more revealing at the chest than expected.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it more than I did
links_reviews_text: Liked this dress a lot in theory but something about it just didn't translate. The color is beautiful but I think maybe better suited for someone with a larger chest? All the padding and pleating and straps at the bust just drew attention to the fact that I have nothing to show. The dress otherwise is very pretty and would be a knock out on the right person, just felt like a "nice but I can do better" moment when I was wearing it.
Super cute but runs a little snug in hips.
So many compliments on this dress! So much better on and in person than just in the picture. The fit was true to size. Didn't want to send it back :)
Fit wonderfully, easy to dance in. Got so many compliments throughout the night
I rented this for a fall wedding and can't say enough good things about this! Gorgeous, bright color, comfortable, stands out in a crowd. Loved it!!

This was a perfect fit for an early fall wedding in the South, where it was still warm. The dress fit super well. I read the reviews about the hips and the dress is definitely fitted, but it worked great for me. I have wide hips so I went with the slightly bigger size.It's very comfortable and a unique dress that got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Just enough detailing in the dress to make it dressy and classy!
links_reviews_text: Incredibly comfortable and flattering dress. Beautiful heavy fabric. I am 5.4 and wore 3" heels and the length was perfect. I was also able to wear a strapless bra with it. Would rent again!

Loved loved loved this dress and it felt great on. I got a size 6 since it was the only size available when I normally wear a 4, and it was a little loose around the waist. With that in mind, I'd say this runs true to size and I could have gone for the 4. Regardless, it looks great and even gave me a little extra room for food + drinks :)
Loved how fitting this was yet still was easy to walk in and not tight around knees!
Fits true to size! Elegant, classy, and definitely catches the eye!

Fits true to size, not too tight or restrictive. I wore this dress for 14+ hours and was comfortable the whole time. It was also lighter than expected, which was great on a hot summer day. I was worried the dress would be too long, and would hit my calves at an awkward spot, but it looked great with heels. It is pretty dressy, so it would work for multiple occasions. The colors in person are beautiful. Loved this dress!

Loved this dress and received so many compliments on it! The fit was true to size. It's a form fitting dress which I don't normally wear. But it accentuated all the right curves and made me feel sassy and sexy!

links_reviews_title: My outfit fit perfectly. The dress made me feel special the entire time I had it on.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was the perfect weight. It was comfortable to wear.
Might be my favorite dress that I have ever rented!
Third time I've rented a Shosannah dress. It fit true to size. I wore spanx and strapless bra just to keep it all smooth. Felt like a million bucks! Great length for y'all girls. Highly recommended!

Hugs you in all the right places! High quality thick lace. Perfect for spring/summer wedding and can be cocktail or black tie attire. Got a lot of compliments and it was comfortable to dance in all night. A lot of the reviews said it ran small but I actually had to order a size down last minute. It's is true that there is no stretch though.

links_reviews_title: This was a garden wedding, first of May. The dress was perfect, color very nice
links_reviews_text: I am 5"3 and 110 lbs. It gave me curves, length was good and i wore tall block heels, the lower tier is see -thru so doesnt seem too long and fun for dancing. Lots of compliments

Dress is the most beautiful blue which is very complimentary to my skin color. Hits just below the knee. The under slip goes above the flounce at the bottom so you can see some leg and the top chest is unlined so you can see cleavage. Everyone complimented me, I felt beautiful!

I LOVED this dress! The color was even more beautiful in person than online. The dress has a very flattering fit- it was slim but comfortable and the hem was so much fun to dance in. I rented the 6 and had an 8 as a backup, the 6 worked perfectly. There was enough room in the dress that I think I could have actually squeezed into a 4, but the 6 was great considering I wanted room to sit, eat, and dance comfortably.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It was perfect for a spring, outdoor, formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. The size 8 was also comfortable with a little more room, but I liked the form fitting 6 better. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù 150lbs and usually a size 6 in dresses, so I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Great shape and vibrant colors. Feminine shape, elegant.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful colors and fit like a glove without being uncomfortable. The event photographer ran up to me wanting to take a pic of the dress.

Rented for a wedding in Portugal, and this dress was perfect. The color is bright and it has great texture. I'm 5'2" and had 4" heels on and it felt like the right length, which doesn't always happen.

This was my 3rd choice for a dress for my husband's holiday party at a country club. I'm glad I chose it because it was very flattering and I received so many compliments. Would recommend if you're looking for something conservative!

Wore to a fall New Orleans wedding. Was super comfortable and loved the flair in the skirt on the dance floor! I wore with a strapless bra & spanx. The dress fit perfectly but I did size up - the material has minimal give. Paired with black sandals and bag. Would definitely recommend!
Fit so well. Received tons of compliments. Very comfortable to wear all day.

I loved this dress!! It wouldn't normally be my typical go to style but I was thrilled with it. Usually I am an 8, unfortunately that wasn't available and I selected the 10. The 10 fit fine, left me some room for dancing/drinking/eating. I do feel like the 8 would have been a better fit, but the 10 wasn't noticeably big by any means. Colors and detail are so pretty and I felt beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Eye catching blue and beautiful details
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and feminine. The detail really pops on the bottom flair. Although formal, this dress can be worn at more casual events. I'm 5'9 and the length was perfect- might hit a little low on shorter ladies.
Paired with nice strapped Shoes and dangly earrings and called it a day. Very comfortable with a few compliments to booth.

Fit like a glove; thinned out my tummy (did wear Spanx) but got at least 6 compliments on the dress during the wedding events. Very comfortable to wear, great wedding dress length, and on a humid day was great to wear. I am sad to send it back.
I have had luck with every Shoshanna dress I have rented! AMAZING! True to size, very flattering, easy to wear, detailed designs and as beautiful as can be! Can't go wrong!

links_reviews_title: Too big for this petite woman!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress. Hard to see the details in the material online, so see pictures for close up view. I didn't wear it: 1. Too long. I'm 5'4" and even with heels, it just looked too long on me. 2. Too much extra fabric in the middle (see closeup photo where I used a clip to show the excess material). This is a size 0 on me, and that's the smallest size available; otherwise I would get a size smaller and probably love this dress! One last comment: The dress is lined except for the shoulders and the "flounced" portion at the bottom. So you either need a strapless bra, or clear straps or some other arrangement up top!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, fits like a glove with stunning colors, comfortable fit
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a family wedding and received compliments all night, and even in the following weeks! Such a flattering fit, with beautiful blues that pop (looks even better in natural light but don't have that pic, sorry). I strongly recommend it for women with curves!!
Love love love this dress!!! The color and detailing is beautiful. I wore this to a wedding in Mexico and it was absolutely perfect. I wish I could buy this dress.

I rented this dress for my mother, she loved it. This dress made her feel like a princess, it was very comfortable, she didn't need to tug or adjust herself anywhere. She loves RTR after renting this dress

Wore this to a city hall ceremony-low key brewery reception wedding. The colors are vibrant without being flashy, and the trumpet flare skirt is so fun! Tea-length is tricky for petite girls, but the peekaboo lace around the neckline and bottom skirt kept the dress from overwhelming me and made it extremely wearable for us shorter gals. I'm bustier and was stoked to see I could wear a regular bra with this too! Fit was great, and form-fitting enough to hold you in but still be comfortable. Definitely need a partner to zip you up tho! I got so many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: The prettiest lace dress in blue floral
links_reviews_text: Chose this dress for a wedding after ordering it as a backup style. This was slightly more formal than the others I had chosen and perfectly elegant for an early evening summer wedding. The lace was beautiful and not too heavy. I received many compliments throughout the night and the two tonal blue lace in this dress is a standout. I would highly recommend it for your next classy affair.
Wore this to a family celebration and got SO many compliments. Loved that it was both comfortable and flattering.

So many compliments! Very appropriate for a summer black tie optional wedding! Hugs the curves, but not too tight. The embroidery was gorgeous and the material, while thick, was not suffocating in the summer heat. I loved wearing it and I have a feeling a few of my friends will be renting this dress soon :)

I wore this dress to a summer wedding and received so many compliments! Very form fitting and flattering. Zipper was a little tough and got stuck quite a few times, would definitely recommend having a buddy to help zip and unzip. Would definitely rent again!
This dress was true to size--fit perfectly, very form fitting. It was perfect for my waist and chest and slightly snug on the hips. I love this dress.
Beautiful form fitting dress in vibrant color

I rented this dress for an autism fundraiser I was hosting and it was absolutely perfect. The colors were completely as they looked online (which was a big sell for me). The fit was true to size, but I have to say I had to have my husband zip it up and down, so I imagine it would be hard to get ready if I was alone. Also, the dress was clearly "worn". Definitely expected to a degree from this type of service, but the edges on the neckline were much frayed (I have long hair thankfully so no one noticed but me).

I rented this dress for a vacation to Mexico, but my trip was canceled due to Covid 19. Anyhow I decided to wear in our yard and on walks through the neighborhood. What I discovered is that the top portion kept inching up exposing the bottom of my bra. I think if you were able to pull it off no bra, but maybe pasties would be the answer. For that reason I gave it 4 of 5 stars. I will not rent again.
I loved the colors of this dress, I didn't expect it to be as vibrant as it was but still loved it. Perfect for a beach wedding.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so good, colors are amazing!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this to a fall wedding. I got a 2 and a 4 and decided to go with the 4 to give myself some room, but the 2 was maybe a slightly better fit.

I rented this dress for a date and religious event. The peekaboo in the front was small and relatively unnoticeable so I didn't feel wears wearing it to synagogue. Color is bang on! Floral pattern is beautiful, Rich feeling silk flows and moves well. Very comfortable fit. I styled this with white frontline heels and a grey metallic bag!
Flowy material makes you feel like a modern day goddess. I love how lightweight the dress was!

I rented this to wear for a baby shower - the weather ended up being rainy and gray, but I loved these vibrant colors brightening up the day. The dress runs a bit large - in the 0, I still had plenty of room. The cutout is right at the sternum, so it would be tough to wear a normal bra without having it peek through there - I went braless and it was comfortable, but definitely big on my small chest.
I LOVED this dress! I didn't get to wear it unfortunately. Will definitely rent for the spring. Cute cut out, light and airy. Will definitely rent again!

When I took one look at this dress I thought, with that bright color and floral pattern I could never wear this to a fall wedding. But it was such a great fit I thought screw it I'll give it a go. I am so glad I did! The color and pattern are vibrant and stunning. I got tons of compliments and I stood out in the sea of typical fall colored outfits. The little peep hole in the front adds a bit of sexiness and the skirt is nice and flowy which makes it super fun to dance on. The fabric is light but we'll made. I definitely recommend giving this dress a chance!

links_reviews_title: Great colors. Did not realize it had a "peep hole" had to wear a cami to wear to work
links_reviews_text: great fit. flows beautifully, beautiful colors
This dress is stunning quality and fit perfectly. I'm 5'5 and it hit the perfect length it was elegant, sophisticated and sexy! Would absolutely rent again!

This was such a special dress and I'm glad I chose it where the fashion game was top notch. It hugged my midsection a bit more than I expected, but the colors were vibrant and I loved the sleeves. Good fit for a larger bust, too.
Wore this out on a warm day. Lovely colors. Moved great. Looked super good in the wind. Fit great.
Extremely comfortable and very flattering for larger busts.

I rented this for welcome drinks for a friends wedding and was SO happy with the results. The fit is flatting and super flowy. It's technically a cold shoulder dress but I just put my arms through to give it more of a cape feel.
I wore this dress a couple of times. I love the look of the dress and it's so comfortable!

I liked (but didn't love) this dress. It was fun for a relatively casual event, and it fit well. I didn't need a bra with the top, which was nice, but I did feel like the dress was a little long. The fabric was also pretty thin. Overall, this wasn't my favorite, but I might consider renting it again.

links_reviews_title: I've never gotten more compliments in my life !! So obsessed with this one. It's a must rent.
links_reviews_text: Everything about this is a pro. So Obsessed.
I'm obsessed with this dress! I fully expected this dress to not be flattering on me but wanted to try it anyway but I was wrong. Everything about this dress is amazing!

I felt so great in this dress! I wore it to work in the morning, then on a train to NY to DC for a wedding rehearsal dinner and all along the way I felt confident and had so many compliments. This dress is amazing and so so flattering!

links_reviews_title: bright and bold on a rainy summer day
links_reviews_text: I really liked everything about this - + PROs: + flattering cut: kind of like a fit and flare but flowed through the skirt better, there wasn't the tightness in the waist so it was flattering at the stomach + great colors: so many compliments in the office about the color combo, very saturated and bright. this would be great as a patriotic themed dress if you're into that kind of thing - 4th of July if you wanna cover your arms? + nice fabric: the fabric felt good and was both light enough to be seasonally appropriate, but heavy enough to dress for work. - CONs: - side zipper was a bit pinchy under my armpit - fabric was a little sweaty at the top - use caution when going down stairs because the fabric at the top flies up and blocks your view :)
Compliments from those who you'd never think would compliment! This dress is so beautiful in person. The fabric is soft and flowy. I love this dress so much, I'm tempted to buy it.
Cute and Comfortable- his my mis section and created a nice figure. The colors are spectacular, i received many compliments even after I stuffed my face at dinner :)

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a nice dinner out with friends. Can go from daytime to night
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size
Most compliments on a dress ever. Love the style and fit.

I loved this dress so much. I am a size 38D busy and many RTR dresses are not flattering for that. I was so impressed by how well the dress fit. No issues fitting my chest and it didn‚Äôt feel tight or uncomfortable. Dress has a thin side zipper; wasn‚Äôt the easier to zip, but the dress was worth it. Great length. The sleeves are super fun, but I wore it with a jean jacket to dress it down for a baby shower I attended. Would definitely rent again.
I got so many complements on this little number. I love how it skimmed my figure without making me feel self conscious. I felt really sexy and fun bopping around the dance floor.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and print; dress up or down
links_reviews_text: This dress ran a bit large- if I rented again, I'd rent a size smaller. The colors and pattern are lovely and so unique without being too bold. I wore this to welcome drinks at a wedding weekend. Very comfortable and nice quality fabric. Easily dressed up or down.

I thought this was a fun dress to meet my boyfriends dad for dinner. Fall, cute and fun but still conservative. The fit was so pretty!!! I loved it but did size down two different sizes. I was lucky and found this on the floor to test out different sizes.
I really liked how flowy this dress was but still fitted in all the right spots so I didn't look bigger than I actually was. Numerous people stopped me on the street asking where I got this dress.

I'm considering buying this. It is a really special dress that is the epitome of day to evening. It hits just below the knee and has a sleeve so is definitely appropriate for work; but the fit is incredible, the sleeves are so fun and even a bit sexy, the print is unique. I can't say enough good things about this dress.

links_reviews_title: Good comfortable fit and felt great
links_reviews_text: This is great for a party or work. Got many compliments in the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect mix of comfort and style
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure that I would like this dress, but I ended up wearing it three times! It's a very light, flowing, comfortable fabric that glides over the body, so it's super comfortable. The cape top and slit on the sleeves give it some extra flare so it can go to dinner at a nice restaurant, or you can wear it more casually. It's the one item I'm keeping longer from my unlimited shipment.
Loved it! So many compliments. Super comfortable and flattering to any body shape.

Felt overwhelmed in this dress although the prints are nice. I'm 5'3 and petite so between the hem and the sleeves I felt swallowed up by it. Didn't end up wearing it, felt like a clown! True to size and nice material though.
I really enjoyed this dress. I wore it in very hot weather several times. It doesn't really wrinkle and it looks polished. It's also very comfortable.

So many compliments. It was perfect dress and I felt so pretty wearing it. I forgot to get a picture, but everyone complimented me and kept asking if I had lost weight. Love the material and the colors were vibrant.
It ran a little big, so I could have probably sized down one size but it was extremely flattering. The split design added a twist to my work wardrobe!
Interesting pattern felt a bit like a Joker but it fit well and was the perfect material for hot and humid nights! Many compliments per usual when wearing RTR!
I went with a size 10 based on other comments of people of similar size and it was just a tad too snug. I ordered the size up and I'm anxiously awaiting its arrival!
Orders this for a work event. Loved the play on colors and the way it flowed. Liigjter fabric than what i thought. Got a lot of compliments!
I didn't like the way this looked on me so I returned it unworn. Material is thin.
Very flattering
As another reviewer said, this fabric looked and felt costumey. I thought it would be fun to wear to a conference but I didn't like it enough. Returned without wearing.
