I rented this dress for everyday wear but it turned out to be a little more formal then I like to wear for the office. I ended up wearing it on a date and loved it. My best friend told me it had a "black tie Harley Quinn" vibe which we both agreed we loved.

I rented this for work, and got a million compliments! I did file a request with RTR because the sleeves of the dress were open and flowy, which may have been a quality issue...? So hard to tell from the photos. Overall, it was cute for one work day!

Wore this to work one day and got lots of compliments. It's very flowy and easy to wear. Loved the red and blue style. It was a little large on me, but that wasn't that big of a deal. I should have ordered a size down from what I got, but I'm never sure with European sizing.
Loved this dress! Tons of compliments, very flattering cut. Super flowy and comfy!
I loved this dress so much. Paired it with a blazer for work and could wear out after-hours. Worked well with 2nd trimester bump.
Runs large, frumpy. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Fits great, but not my style
links_reviews_text: My husband took one look at me and said I looked like "Business Casual Harley Quinn", and I couldn't disagree with him. It just was not my style and while the fit was great, quality felt brand new, I looked like a circus tent. I think it may be cuter on someone more petite.
The dress was easy to wear & had a cool 60s vibe. I paired it with cute RTR earrings.

Color and fit was perfect for my Easter weekend. It would also be cute for bridal/baby shower. Material is thick which is great if the weather is warm or cool. There is just enough room for a larger busted chest.

Such a beautiful fabric and fit. I knew it had been on RTR for forever, but it wasn't overwork or run down which was great. I found it fit very true to size, but I would size up if you are between sizes, especially if you have a larger chest!
Felt like a lovely multi tiered cake in this dress. Nice fit.

Loved this dress, super cute fit and very lovely blush pink color. My 12 yr old daughter said I looked like a cupcake (in a good way). The ric rak was a little bit of a pain as it could use to be tacked better or continually ironed but otherwise nice heavy weight fabric.

We threw a 50s Housewife themed shower, I wanted to look like I fit in but not like I was wearing a costume. This dress nailed it! The scallop detail added charm, the fit was perfect, and the thickness of the fabric was appreciated on a chilly Spring day.
Perfect for Easter Sunday
One of my favorite rentals. It was perfect for work then an event afterward. I received so many compliments. It's comfortable and you can wear a regular bra with it. Loved this dress

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my sister's baby shower!
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for my sister's baby shower, and the color was perfect for welcoming a baby girl to the family. I wore my usual size (6) and was comfortable. I loved the dress, but noticed some of the white scallops did not want to lay flat. Honestly, I'm probably the only one who noticed though. I got compliments throughout the day. According to my mom, the only con is that I had to send it back after the party!

links_reviews_title: I felt like a wedding cake!
links_reviews_text: The fit is great! The color is perfect for spring and i loved the scallops. I did feel a little childish in this dress but I got a ton of compliments!

This dress is just perfect! I was worried it would fall funny on my waist but it's really just great. Very comfortable, heavy fabric. You will have to steam out the white trim because it curls up in the travel bag.

I really wanted to love this dress: the dress is definitely heavy/ thicker, in terms of fabric (not ideal for the summer) - I was sweating putting it on (seriously). I rented the dress for a baby shower - I am a true 12 (ALWAYS) but this dress definitely runs very small, there is absolutely no give in the bust area; I have average bust size (36C) and this dress just pushed those bad boys down. It is flattering if you have a stomach - definitely hides the imperfections in the stomach area. The length is beautiful - I am a tad obsessed with blush pink, so the color was lovely! The white ruffles in the front DO NOT lay flat - which is driving me crazy - even after I ironed the dress. I wouldn't rent the dress again, it will do for the baby shower but it was a little disappointing.
Great dress, high quality. I don't love the wrinkles but otherwise, fantastic find!

This is a beautiful dress and the material is really thick and great quality. The torso was a bit long and the waist didn't sit as well as I would have liked it to but I still liked the dress. The cream ribbon wouldn't stay flat and I pressed it multiple times. Would rent it again. Its a pretty, classic dress.
I loved this dress so much!! The 4 actually fit perfectly but was a little short for work, so I opted for the 6 to add a little length. It was the perfect birthday dress!
I wore this sail to sable dress for my 23 rd birthday. The dress is thick and heavy and was a little hot for a May evening, but it still worked for dinner out with my family.
Loved this dress! It was flirty but not sexy. I felt girly and dainty all day :) the material is amazing and it's the perfect length for Work. No sleeves make it for the super hot weather as well

I loved this dress! It was perfect for the Kentucky Derby. So feminine and pretty. It was a little long on me compared to the model. I am 5'3". I rolled it about an inch at the waist seam to make it a little shorter and it was perfect. Also I don't see how this dress would work for the more blessed in the chest ladies, I'm pretty small and it was tight in the chest. The fabric is also thicker and heavier than I imagined. Overall 5 starts, will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute but it's not the same color pink
links_reviews_text: I liked it but it's a very pale pink... see photo.

This is definitely me least favorite dress I've ever rented on RTR. The dress was too small in the bust, so I couldn't wear a bra. It still sort of flattening them out. The way it's cut is really unflattering in the mid section, which for any plus-size girl is like a nightmare. I also read the cupcake commentary from a lot of people and thought it would be ok, but it felt a bit like a kids dress to me. I just didn't feel happy in this dress for a multitude of reasons.

Cute dress for everyday affair. Fits true to size. Had to go up to a size 6 because I'm 32 DDD and the size 4 felt tight (fabric has no stretch), and the size 6 was lose in the bottom but fortunately it wasn't that noticeable because it's a-line. Easy to dress up or down.
This dress was cute. The fit was nice and I liked the zipper detail on the back. The white wavy petal hems were bending up when I received but I used an iron to smooth them out.
This dress is super cute on. As others have mentioned, the armholes are a little small. The ric rac needs to be flattened out. Thick quality material. A unique, fun, and happy dress!

This dress is perfect for any day into night event. The fit and the quality were impeccable. I LOVE this dress. Even the quality of the zipper in the back is incredible. Very well made! Not to mention how much I loved the scallops!

links_reviews_title: Fit well! Perfect for a birthday!
links_reviews_text: The 6 fit me very well. Bonus: normal bra, no spanx needed as the material is very thick. I wore this for my Dad's 65th birthday party. It was beautiful blush color. I would highly recommend this dress.

I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it to a bridal shower. The material was beautiful and the fit was perfect. I did not want to return this lovely dress. This would be perfect for so many summer occasions.

Worn to a bachelorette party high tea, and loved it! Was a thick, high quality fabric (may be hot for some in summer months) and fit true to size. Beautiful gold zipper on back. Received lots of compliments!

I rented this dress for my birthday party and it was perfect for the occasion. Overall fit of the dress was okay- not ideal for body type with large chest and smaller waste. The 2 felt really tight in the shoulders and armpits but great in the waste . Back-up size of 4 fit well in the chest but baggy in the waste.
Loved, loved, loved this dress!!!! I want it! Rightly named "Cupcake Dress". Felt as sweet as a cupcake all night! So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: 5 stars It is a perfect summer dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my summer outdoor event. I received so many compliments. The material was high quality. Very thick but I wasn't too hot. I would definitely rent it again.

This Sail to Sable dress is beautiful. I got a lot of compliments at the party about the dress. The fit was perfect. I'm a 36C and it fit very comfortably across the chest. The only con is that the fabric is thicker than I expected. I wore this to a summer dance party and maybe it would be better for a summer party without dancing.
I wore this to work in the summer. I loved the thick fabric but I didn't feel heavy. I thought it was really cute, although I was compared to a cupcake several times a day. Haha

This dress is comfy and I got lots of compliments on it. It has a great shape for women like me with curvy hips. It's nicely tailored to be a flattering material as well. I was worried that it might be a little to out-there, but my coworkers loved it. I tried to tone it down a bit with a ponytail and simple accessories. Would be a great dress to wear to a shower or wedding as well. Gotta love Kate Spade! See more of my Rent the Runway unlimited outfits at @thehllw

links_reviews_title: I got SO many compliments. This dress was the perfect bridal shower dress. I wish I owned it!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect. Hit right above the knee.

This fit well, it would be a great dress for church or a garden party. The arms fit me fine, but those with broader shoulders and bigger arms might feel that the armholes are a little tight. I would say the biggest downside of this dress is that it wrinkles easily, especially in the back when you sit down.
Fit perfect. Loved the material. So many compliments
Lovely dress. Ran a tad on the small side so I would recommend sizing up. The fabric on this dress does NOT stretch. Any under garment can be worn with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Perfect! Wore to my daughter's college graduation! One of my RTR favorites!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove. Very nice quality material. Runs true to size. Not too short. Comfortable. Wore all day and very few wrinkles. Lots of compliments! My 10 year old niece said I looked like the perfect cake topper!! lol
Amazing dress! Nice weight material with beautiful details. Wore it three times!! Dressed it up with nude pumps and a white jacket and also paired with flats and a denim coat. Will rent again.
I LOVED this sweet little dress for cocktails and dessert with my girlfriends. Fabric was thick and forgiving. Very well constructed with a slimming fit. The ruffled neckline is tdf!
Wasn't able to wear. Ran way too big. Need to size down
It's flowy and fitted where it makes sense. So light and delicate looking and warm enough without the awesome pink fur I also rented! I paired with camel peep toes.

I loved this dress! I was a little curious to see if it was going to be matronly, but it wasn't. I felt so great in this dress! Material is nice, and it has a comfortable slip underneath/attached so it's not see-through I would say it runs true to size, I ordered a Large - and the waist is elastic, so I could see this dress running big on some people. I'm 5'5" and thought the length was great with heels.
Loved this dress! It was super comfortable and great for the transition from summer to fall. Got lots of compliments!

I was a little unsure about this dress because it's very outside my comfort zone and what I typically wear. I have never gotten so many compliments on an outfit before!!! It is difficult to get on with the under cami but looks great once it's on
Forgiving fit. Hangs well.

The dress was really pretty and romantic on. It fit great and was comfortable, good for work in a business casual environment. I got compliments on it all day, one person saying I looked like I walked out of a Jane Austin novel.
Lovely dress for hot weather would be ideal for going to summer wedding or date.
Beautiful dress with lovely colors. The top is flowy and the slip is a little more fitted without being too tight. Love the midi length. Fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous minimal dress for a formal event!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my law school's Barrister's Ball, and I felt so classy and sexy in it! I'm usually a 6 and the 6 was a good fit, but it was juuuuust on this side of being too tight. The regular length was perfect for my height in 2.5 inch heels. My arm movement was definitely restricted (you can see the strap digging into my arm when it's placed on my hip in the photo) but overall it was worth it for how beautiful I felt in the dress!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a black tie wedding. I got so many compliments! Normally I am a size 4 and ended up wearing the size 6. The dress is very form fitting but the fabric is stretchy which makes this dress comfy! I m 5"4 and the height was perfect for me as well.

Other than having limited movement in the arms, which was expected and understandable based on the style, this dress was fabulous. I'm tall (6ft) and still wore 3inch heels and the length was just right. Thicker fabric was very flattering. True to size

links_reviews_title: A little short in the long size
links_reviews_text: This dress was my first choice, and I ended up going with an alternative dress instead. I got a long size and even in bare feet the dress was too short for my liking (I am 5'11").
I'm 5'2, and wore 3 inch heels and it was perfect. The material is stretchy yet form fitting. The only difficult part was zipping it up, it took two of us. I'd recommend this dress!
This dress was perfect for the formal wedding I went to. It fit like a glove and I got tons of compliments. It's classic and understated and was just what I was looking for.

Wore this to a black tie wedding over Labor Day Weekend. I am 54 years old and this dress was amazing! It was classy and comfortable. Wore my regular size. Received so many compliments. Material is thick and substantial however the dress was not too hot for a late summer wedding - off-the-shoulder and high slit helped. Neckline was not restrictive for dancing as we danced the night away!

links_reviews_title: Formal dress for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great! The material is a little heavy for a summer wedding but overall a great dress! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to Ranger Ball. I absolutely loved this dress! Timeless and romantic <3
links_reviews_text: I am 5'3", 155-160 pounds and have an athletic build (small chest, like 32A-B depending on brand; small but short waist, and muscular legs and booty). I am normally a size 8. For this dress I chose a size 8R, with 10R as a backup. I wore the 8R and was very comfortable! The dress material is thick and stretchy, but do note that it hugs you, so if you like a looser fit I might go one size up. I worried that the low arms would be restrictive, but the material was stretchy so I didn't struggle to eat/lift a glass, hug people, and was even able to dance comfortably. Slit in the leg is sexy but classy; I am short though, so it didn't hit me too high on the thigh. On that note, being 5'3" I chose the Regular length, but was surprised that it did not reach the floor when wearing 2" heels. I was okay with this since I knew I'd be dancing, but if you want it totally floor length, I'd choose a Long (L) length. I LOVED this dress! I felt beautiful, classic, and COMFORTABLE! Thank you RTR for making this such a seamless and fun process!
Perfect for the hourglass or pear shaped; very forgiving; would look great on anyone

links_reviews_title: Simple yet elegant dress worn for a charity event
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 2R with the 4R as a backup. Both fit and were snug, but I felt much more comfortable int he 4R and it was still form fitting. Length was good, I wore medium height heels. My arms were a bit restricted, I couldn't lift them up very high, but I only noticed this as a problem if someone went to greet me with a hug or twirl me on the dance floor. The zipper did bulge out at the bottom, right around my butt which was a bit annoying but I don't think it was too noticeable. Not sure if that's a problem for all the dresses or just the one I wore. The dress is nice material and not prone to wrinkling. I would recommend sizing up for your backup size.
The dress was super comfy and it was a very thick material. It was fun to dance in and I received so many compliments.. it was the perfect choice for me for a military ball!

links_reviews_title: I love how classy yet super feminine this dress was. Wore it to a military ball.
links_reviews_text: Hugs all the curves... I got away with no bra (wore silicone pasties). Definitely need help getting it zipped and can't raise arms (not a good dress for dancing in) .., but totes worth it!
Absolutely loved this dress, the look of it was perfect! The only downside was the off the shoulder sleeves makes it a little hard to dance.

links_reviews_title: Form fitting, elegant, and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very comfortable and felt good to wear, very form fitting and quality material. I am 5‚Äô7 and I tried on the 4L too but the 4R length seemed to work best with the heel I was wearing. The off shoulder style gave the otherwise plane dress a nice sexy edge. The slit on the leg was a nice touch too, not too high for a wedding with grandparents :). I am 135lb and the size 4 fit pretty well, a little bunchy on the hips so I might suggest the size 2 but it was not available for my event. I received a lot of compliments on the dress and felt great in it all night!

This dress was one of the most comfortable I have ever worn. Has a bit of stretch but thick enough to be flattering especially with curves. I am 5 foot 2, and it was the perfect length with 3 and a half inch heels. Highly recommend.

So I definitely could have worn the 6, however, if you have wide shoulders like me, you are already screwed. Those things were so tight and despite the 6 fitting a little better I had to wear the 8 bevause my arms and shoulders could not move in the 6. In addition, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and lemme tell you, I should have ordered the long with those heels. It was very obvious my dress was not long enough. Overall it‚Äôs a stunner of a dress but order long and hopefully you don‚Äôt have man shoulders like me.

I typically am a 4 in clothes, but i haven‚Äôt ordered a dress for a while so i think this is pretty true to size? I don‚Äôt know i REALLY LIKED IT, THOUGH. i wore one of those sticky bras, but i think you could probably get away with just not wearing one, which is neat-o. The fabric was really thicc and didn‚Äôt show any underwear lines, even though it was form fitting on the tush;) would recommend, though (i‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and weigh 130lbs and ordered a 4R as my main, but went with the 6R)
This dress was snug but it fit in all the right places! The material was quality and heavy. The top stayed where it was supposed. I got a lot of compliments on it.

Overall: loved this dress and highly recommend! Comfy, classic, flattering and elegant! Easy to glam-up with accessories. I chose pearls & nude heels to keep it simple, but there are endless possibilities! Fit: This dress fit like a glove. I'm 5'6 and the 6L was perfect length w/ my 3" heels. Very flattering. Hugged my curves in all the right places! Initially wore shaper panties to hold in my tummy, but removed them, bc there was a visible pantry line. Found that i didn't really need shape-wear after all! Quality: Solid! Well made. Thick, stretchy fabric that felt similar to neoprene. The zipper is tricky. My husband had trouble zipping it up- not due to sizing-the zipper was difficult to grab. He ended up using pliers! Seriously. It was much easier to unzip, but you will definitely need help getting it on & off. Shoulders: i had no trouble lifting my arms up to dance! Didn't feel constrained either. Had to make a couple adjustments throughout the night, but no biggie. Bonus: the slit in the skirt of the dress made it so easy to move around & was both tasteful and sexy!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful deep navy off the shoulder gown with high slit made for an elegant night..and I'm short!
links_reviews_text: For being short, this dress was a great length! It was elegant and I felt beautiful. I wore three inch heels and never tripped on it. The fabric was thick and stretchy so it was form fitting but didn't feel tight. I got lots of compliments. I needed a lint roller when I took it out of the bag, but that's to be expected. Cons: you can't put your hands on your hips so don't expect to wave your arms in the air; the twist of fabric on the bust would unravel so I kept having to adjust it

Gorgeous dress fit like a glove! I loved the leg slit to add a bit of sexiness. Very elegant, sexy dress. I found the sleeves to be restrictive, as in I couldn't raise my arms very high, but I would still wear this dress again.

links_reviews_title: The dress fit so well and boosted my confidence at my first prom! Definitely recommend.
links_reviews_text: The fit sucked you in due to the type of fabric, which was awesome! The dress, however, ripped at the back during the night just a tad, and I wasn't even going too hard at prom, so be cautious. But boy oh boy, rent instead of buy. All of my friends are trying to sell their dresses from last year and they are regretting their purchase. My dress was sexy, fun, and fit me well!

links_reviews_title: Comfort and ease of wearing this dress.
links_reviews_text: The top could be worn on shoulder or off shoulder. A bit large for m for off shoulder, but still comfy. Length was good.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Perfect fit and material. No complaints whatsoever.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8.5" and with not even 3 inch heels the dress was still a little short. I ended up being glad for that because it didn't drag the ground or get stepped on/dirty. Stretchy material that is VERY flattering, just wear spanx for no lines and you're set!

SO perfect for an Army ball. I'm 5'9 and the long length worked perfectly with heels. I'm a true size 8 and hover around 155-160 lbs and the 8 was perfect. The material is thicker and super comfortable but shapewear is a must.

Loved this basic dress. I'm 5'9" and wore the long with a small wedge and it was barely was long enough. Definitely get the long if you are taller than 5'7"ish or if you plan to wear heals! LOVE THIS DRESS!
The fit of this dress was beautiful! Fit true to size, loved the slit on the side and the low neckline! Went perfectly with the earrings I also rented. Definitely recommend this one!
I rented several dresses and this didn't make the cut. I didn't quite fill out the hip section and the zipper was stubborn. The fabric was very soft but not forgiving on a post baby body.

links_reviews_title: Quality dress that was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Wore this for my sister's wedding and it was perfect. The material has a great amount of stretchiness to it so it stays in place and hugs all your curves. The arms were a bit restricting but not ridiculously so! Wish I had gotten the long instead of the regular, but that was my only regret.

This dress was absolutely stunning. It was simple and elegant but very sexy. I am 5'3 and wore 3 inch heels and needed the long. I typically wear a 4 but the 6 felt better. I was still able to dance despite the off the shoulder look.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: The dress has stretchy material but feels expensive

This dress fit my body perfectly. I felt so glamorous and sexy. It looks black in my picture, but it is really like the sites picture, navy blue. Although I couldn‚Äôt lift my arms all the way, it was not a problem like I though it would be. I was so comfortable and even danced in it. It has a lot of stretch. My heels were about 3‚Äù and worked perfectly. My husband couldn‚Äôt get enough. Would rent again.

It's a very elegant dress. Well made and felt thick. Perfect for the black tie winter wedding we attended. Only con was it was difficult to raise my arms. Fits true to size. Long enough to wear nice heals and not trip on the bottom of the dress.
The dress was beautiful!! Received so many compliments and fit true to size!

Love this dress! I ordered 8R and 6L and was a little unsure about the length on the 6L because I am 5'2" and I thought it might of been too long but it worked perfectly! (My shoes were only 3") I'm a little curvy so I would say it's perfect for that body type/very flattering. I'm a 34D up-top was a little tight but not unbearable. Overall very comfy.

I'm 5'6", 136lbs. Based on the ton of reviews I read, I thought a 4R would fit perfect. Ordered a 6L as a backup (they only had long available). I couldn't even zipper the 4, so went with the 6L, and it fit absolutely perfectly! And the long length ended up being better with my 4 inch heels. Dress was comfortable, and I didn't have to pull it up all evening- it stays in place.

links_reviews_title: The material of the dress feels amazing and the cut. The over all look of the dress is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Cons - unable to left your arms up

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress! Received numerous compliments and fit so well hardly anyone recognized me.
links_reviews_text: True to fit and the dress was super comfortable. Easy to move around in.
The dress was perfect for the event and beautiful. The size was exactly what I was expecting I'm size 2R, I recommend this dress it's comfortable and the length was good for me.
I should have brought safety pins and/or boob tape. It ran a little small but was a beautiful dress. Would recommend!

First dress I got didn't have the hole to thread the tie through and the clasp over the bust was ripped off, but it was replaced in time and was a winner! The slit is a little high for me so I should've pinned it closed a bit but it wasn't too revealing overall. Overall a win!
This was a beautifully made floral dress that had a flattering fit. The cap sleeves were so dainty and the color was gorgeous. Highly recommend!
Pretty dress, true to size and comfortable. My dress was a little worn out.

I typically wear a 12 but ended up going up a size here so that the bust would fit without pulling apart. Because of that the shoulders were a little loose and I had to be cognizant of not letting my bra show but overall I loved this dress and felt so confident in it! I loved the way it moved when I danced and was very flattering in the midsection. Would recommend!

I knew from reviews this was a deeper cut in the front and a high slit because it's a TRUE WRAP dress. The hook and eye was a little loose, but I simply threw a safety pin in where I was comfortable having it to feel extra secure and did the same with the slit. We were on a windy beach so the dress kept blowing but the dress has a good enough weight that it really added to the glam to have it blowing around! Perfect for an outdoor beachside wedding but could be pretty versatile. Very nice quality and super comfortable. Nice length with heels even though I'm 5'4 but barefoot was fine, too. Would rent again in a heart beat!!

links_reviews_title: Stand out fit for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! The colors and vibrant and the whole look is elegant with a hint of sexy. Similar to other reviews, it's a wrap dress so the skirt might flip open from time to time. I didn't mind, though, as I kept a well placed hand whenever I twirled in the dance floor. The top was a little small on the chest and I had to safety pin it together to avoid an awkward gap. Overall, I highly recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to wear with a bra, very pretty
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! I got may compliments and felt pretty and girly. The size 8 would have fit if it wasn't for my 34DDD. I had to wear my backup size 10. I am a nursing mamma (hence the photo) and felt a little exposed but because of the length and feminine print I felt comfortable. The dress is very long and only worked with 4" heels. I wore a wedge sandal from Zappos. I am 5'4" but overall worked out well. I did use tape to on top to make me feel more secure but was pleased I could wear a normal bra with a small center connector. Overall great!!

Received this as my overnight replacement when my original dress (both sizes) was way too small. I had my fingers crossed this would fit, seeing as it's a wrap dress, and it did for the most part except for the top plunged quite low as it wouldn't wrap any further so I purchased a lace camisole bra to wear underneath and secured the gaps with fashion tape which worked great! Received many compliments, as I always do with my RTR dresses :)
I loved this dress! It was so flattering and perfect for a summer wedding!

Loved the colors and length on this dress. I took away one star bc the bust was nearly impossible to keep together and I kept worrying I'd flash someone (even with fashion tape). The material was very heavy since the dress is fully lined. I wouldn't have minded if the dress didn't take up so much space/weight in my suitcase. And a warning - it is a true wrap dress, so the heavy fabric tends to fall between your legs when sitting. You'll need to take care not to flash anyone downstairs as well.

links_reviews_title: The slit is high but if your self esteem matches it... do it!
links_reviews_text: You will need apparel tape for the chest.. it appeared that someone sewed a little clip into the dress to accommodate for the low cut but it makes the dress fit poorly on smaller chested people, like myself. The colors are vibrant and the dress overall is stunning.

Loved the dress! Had to do some heavy safety pinning to keep the top in place so not ideal for small chests. Also had to pin the skirt closed - without it when walking it would fully swing open to my navel! Wouldn‚Äôt have been able to dance without finding a way to keep it closed.

The dress length and fit was almost perfect. There's a button on the chest that helps keep the dress together, but I have a bigger bust and it was pulling apart all night. Next time I would try the next size up.

links_reviews_title: Received tons of compliments and it was fun to dance in.
links_reviews_text: Because it was a wrap dress I was able to make it as tight or as loose as I needed. The neckline was lower than I'm used to but a little fashion tape kept me feeling confident!
I loved this dress. It's extremely flattering, especially in the tummy area. It has a nice weight to it where it doesn't blow around a bunch but is still twirly. I got so many compliments!
Loved this dress - it is far more formal than it looks in the pictures but worked out perfectly for a wedding I had coming up. Perfect for a summer wedding.
I wore this for my engagement photos, and it was perfect. It's a wrap dress, and fits true to size. The material is a little heavy. The pattern is really lovely.

I loved this dress! Went for the 10 because it sat a little more closed on the cleavage. The issue I had was the underarm openings were very large and so my bra could be seen- it wasn't a big deal for me but did love that. Also I did wear fashion tape to keep the cleavage in place for dancing. Overall a beautiful dress and I got tons of compliments!

Soooo pretty! Wore this in Easter Sunday but would also be perfect for a spring/summer wedding. I loved how it floated and had so much movement. Just beware: the front of the skirt can open up completely. I used a safety pin as a precaution!

links_reviews_title: Really fun dress to dance in
links_reviews_text: Fit is adjustable because it's a wrap. The chest is a little big/low so I did tape it closed with double-sided tape. It was so fun to dance in - it moves beautifully.

Super flattering and comfortable dress. It's a bit low cut and my chest did not fill out the dress completely, so I highly suggest fashion tape. I wore 2" heels and dress was a little short for my height. Overall recommend the dress!

This dress was AMAZING! I was so sad to have to return it. It is a wrap dress so it accentuates the waist nicely. The length was kind of long but I wore high wedges and it just barely skimmed the ground. It is low cut, so I had to tape the dress to me to make sure I wouldn't flash anyone. Beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: The flow of the dress was perfect for the beach wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit true to size and was beautiful. My only complaint is that it is very low cut on the front and was difficult to keep "the girls" covered, especially if a breeze came up. I used LOTS of fabric tape to try and hold the front together and finally resorted to 2 well placed safety pins. The length was a bit tricky with dancing as I had a few times where someone was standing on the bottom, back part of the dress but if I kept moving that was easily fixed.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful and well lined. Was able to wear a regular bra, needed a small safety pin to keep together in the middle. The 12 fit, the 14 fit also- but the top was a little more loose. Ended up wearing the 12. Would absolutely rent again!!

The material is heavy and the dress wraps beautifully around the waist; accents your curves! The neckline is low and I don't have much to fill it so I had to pin it together so I don't show my goodies! I'm also 5'3, so if you're not wearing 3" heels or more, the dress will definitely be on the floor dragging!
I felt so elegant even wearing this for every day. So many compliments from my husband and strangers alike. Very low cut so recommend either going without a bra if you can, or using fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, Comfortable to dance in
links_reviews_text: I highly recommend grooming tape to keep the top in place. The low plunge fits loose and the dress runs long so 2 inch heels are recommended as well, I'm 5'7". Easy to travel with and with stands major wrinkles.
Loved the fit and fabric of this dress. The color is vibrant too in person. It was super long but nothing a 4 inch heel sandals cant fix.

Dress is stunning, but is a lower cut so I wore a lace cami underneath to be more comfortable. If you are short this may not be the best dress for you, I am 5'6" and wore 4 inch heels with it and it grazed the floor. I wanted to buy this dress!

I wore this dress for a daytime summer wedding. It was semi formal/cocktail. This was not my original dress, but my original dresses did not fit, but this was a perfect back up! I am about 5'9, 200lbs and wore a size 12. I am a 46 D. I did not like how the front closure looked, so i opted to used fashion tape and have a low V look in the front. . Would recommend.

I loved this floral wrap! I wore the 10 because it's all that was available but the 8 would have fit better. It was fun to dance in and I got tons of compliments! Highly recommend for any spring or summer event.

I love this trendy dress by Fame and Partners! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted at the waist, and loose fitting at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5‚Äô7‚Äù, the length just sweeps the floor. The floral pattern and colors on the dress is amazing in person!

I love this floral summer dress by Fame & Partners! Running true to size with little to no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the bust, it works best for cup sizes A-C. You can wear a strapless bra or no bra with this dress. At 5‚Äô2‚Äù, the length hit floor length and the pattern on the dress is amazing in person and the split makes it flirty. A pair of nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit and you‚Äôr set.
Beautiful, flowy & fun dress. I wore it a few times on a beach getaway. I received multiple compliments. Dress fit great. It was a little small in the chest area, but overall a gorgeous dress.

I love this feminine dress by Fame & Partners! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend sizing up. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. Even though this works well with A-C cups, you can wear a cami and wear with a D cup. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'4, the length hit floor length on me. The colors are absolutely stunning in person.
Love the colors and the fit. Got ton of compliments. Small issue to note is that the side slit goes all the way up so you have to be careful sitting and walking to avoid flashing the world.

This dress was so bright and comfortable. I loved everything about it. I'm 5'4 so it worked great with a kitten heal but with flats it brushes the ground slightly which is fine as long as you're not on an NYC subway. I got nothing but compliments in this and debated keeping it.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in the dress
links_reviews_text: low cut and long for me - 5'3 and wore heels, still pretty long
I'm not sure if I was missing something, but I think this dress was missing the side hole you normally have in a wrap dress. I couldn't get it to tie! The color was beautiful though.
Wore to a floral themed gala. Very pretty and got a lot of compliments! The top was a little loose on me - may be better for someone who is larger chested.

links_reviews_title: The dress was smart AND beautiful. It is fitted and lightweight. It has a great slit, too.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and fit. This dress is so smart and sexy. It's a BLAST to wear. The black ribbon is so cute set against the colors of the dress. I highly recommend it. I almost didn't wear it because the material on the chest wasn't lying flat. Two-sided tape fixed it. Being in the bag made it not lie completely flat. This dress was a hit with my boyfriend.

This was one of four options for a black tie event. Ended up going with this one since it fit best (the others were quite tight) and was SO happy with my choice! I'm generally in-between a 4/6 for dresses (34B and 4/6 in pants as well) and this one fit perfectly. It sat a little weird since I have a shorter torso, but nothing that bothered me too much. I did have to pin it a bit to prevent my bra from showing too much and ended up just wearing a bolero to make it easier. Definitely need to wear a strapless (which I didn't plan well enough to have) or adhesive bra. There is a bit of an opening above the black sash that I didn't have a problem with but could be too open for some. At 5'3" wearing 3" heels, the dress dragged on the floor a liiiiiittle bit but nothing that made it too difficult if I walked slowly. It flowed so nicely in the wind and I didn't think the slit was too high - it reached about mid-thigh and nothing revealing about it. As someone else mentioned, it was a bit of a poor design to have the inside lining show when the slit is open. Honestly fell in love with this dress so much and am considering buying it!
Great dress, lightweight and lined. I'm 5'7" and I just needed a 2.5" heel. Elegant and perfect for a wedding. Fits true to size.
Fit perfectly. I needed a little dress tape to close the front.

This was a flattering fit at the waistline and chest/shoulders area. I did have a little issue with gapping below the cross straps of the dress but with a skin colored strapless bra it wasn't an issue. I probably could have even worn a regular bra with criss cross back straps. Lots of compliments on the dress itself - beautiful pattern that is even prettier in person. Worn for a black tie optional wedding.

I have no regrets about choosing this dress for a wedding but it did have it challenges. I love the crisscross top, but there is nothing to secure the 2 pieces of material that crisscross on your chest. I tried to pin it, but that was not great. It would still flop open a little. The slit is high, but not a problem for me. I wore a 6R b/c a long was not available. With heels it was a little shorter than I would like but when I changed into flats it wasn't too long and perfect for dancing!
Literally a fabulous dress. I am 5'10, skinny with white girl booty. 2L was perfect. Slit in the front of the dress goes up to mid thigh. Flows beautifully. Recommend to all!

I'm a good 6/8 in pants, but tend to wear a 4 in dresses. The first time I put it on, it fit well. The second time, it was snug. The day of the event I put it on and it seemed loose and comfortable. Perhaps it molded to my shape? The look of the dress was just "ok" to me and I almost didn't wear it because I have better prints/looks in my closet. However, the day of the event it was really hot and I was running late and wanted something breezy and easy. This was very easy/light to wear and wrinkle free. This dress was very remarkable to a few of the people at the event, including my partner. He is into high fashion (he's a model) and was WOWED when he saw me. Being an A cup, there was extra fabric up top. It just draped lower and wasn't a big deal. Sitting, the split was very "sexy momma". My godson surprised me and walked up to my car while I was sitting down before I exited the car. I felt "exposed" because of how much leg naturally hung out. The entire night I had to sit a certain way to keep the dress covering enough of my thigh. I didn't feel inappropriate in it, it just required a level of consciousness I wasn't expecting. It took the same level of effort as if I were wearing a miniskirt. I wore a strapless bra- a regular bra will require pinning. I wouldn't order it again, but it turned out to be pretty fun to wear.

I am 5'3", 125 lbs and typically wear a size 4. Based off of the other reviews, I ordered a size 2R (the 4 wasn't available to try) and it fit PERFECTLY. The length was also great with a heel. I received so many compliments on this and it was perfect for an outdoor, early summer wedding as it was light and airy. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: easy and fun for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie wedding and felt great in it. the comfortable, lightweight fabric was perfect for dancing and will work great in summer months.

The dress is light weight so it's perfect for warm weather. I had many compliments on the dress for the fun and pretty pattern. The slit comes up to mid thigh and when you sit you just have to pull it down a bit. I also pinned the crisscrossed top as you could see my bra but this was an easy fix!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Comfortable cool and flowy. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: Perfect for my figure. Some may find top snug but the bust has much room to give
Loved the end result, but had to put a bunch of pins in the front to hold it together over my bra
Light, airy, elegant, and surprisingly forgiving for my post-pregnancy body, this dress earned me lots of compliments and was super comfy to wear. Would buy.

I wore this to a black tie tropical wedding in Florida. It fit perfect and the fabric is really light. There is an opening in the front of the dress but I just pinned it together. I have really broad shoulders so this neckline was really flattering. I'm 5'6 and wore 3.5 in heels. The dress was the perfect length just barely touching the ground.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress - very unique for a springtime wedding.
links_reviews_text: Fits the bill for something between cocktail and evening. If you are tall be aware that the slit will be HIGH. It wasn't a problem but you probably want to have a napkin or purse to manage when you are sitting. Definitely runs large. I typically wear an 8-10 depending on brand and this was a 6R. Bonus - small busts don't need a bra!
I would have liked to get a 6L but the 4R is the closest thing they had to my size so I made it work. I definitely felt squeezed in the middle but that was my own choice!
I got this last minute for an event and it was amazing. Super lightweight, comfortable and elegant. Most importantly- the fabric does not wrinkle!
There was a slight gap that made the dress sit weird on top
This dress was great for a family friends wedding! Classy but sexy!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this showstopping dress!!
links_reviews_text: I was very pleased with the design and quality of this dress. It was a great option for standing out in a sea of monochromatic dresses - very colorful but not in a colorblind, tacky sort of way. As others have mentioned, there was no stretch to the dress but the fit was flattering and comfortable enough. I wore a strapless, self-adhesive, backless bra which helped keep the twins together, and I did a little bit of safety pinning to keep the top from spreading open when I sat down. The dress will probably be more comfortable for A or B cups where a bra may not be needed at all. I'm docking 1 star for the slightly annoying white lining that showed at the edge of the slit.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress!! In fact I got a "WOW" from my husband before we left! Always a good sign :)
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 10R and assumed I would need the 12R as my back-up, but I actually wish I had requested an 8R as a back up. The 10R was super comfy - fitted without being tight - and flowy, but the chest was surprisingly a little loose on me. Would have been curious to at least try on the size smaller. The dress doesn't have any stretch to it, but because it is flowy, it is very forgiving.

This dress is so light, comfortable, and flattering. True to size, and length was perfect for my height with 3 1/2 inch heels. May need to pin the opening around the chest if you‚Äôre worried about too much showing.
I'm 5'9" 135 and the 4R fit perfectly with heels. I had to pin the front to prevent my bra from showing but it was easy. I got so many compliments!!

Fit almost perfectly, but I tend to be more of a 6, so it runs a little big I think. The top portion had plenty of room, but I'm smaller on top and the bottom fit perfectly. It was also perfectly long with small heels!! I'm 5'10" and have a 34" inseam. There was small gaping in the front mid section when you moved, but didn't bother me.
I rent this dress right before my friend's vineyard wedding and I can't say how happy I was when I found this perfectly matched dress with the summery vibes and lovely design. Love love love it!
Great dress for an outdoor formal wedding. The fit was great and with 5' heels the long option was perfect! The only con was that I to pin the peep hole.
Lightweight material great for summer wedding. Gorgeous slim fit.

This dress runs huge. The dress waist sat about an inch lower than my natural waist, and there was a ton of excess material at the top which caused the dress to pucker and show my stomach (see last photo). Overall it was very baggy and unflattering, and I did not wear it.
Loved this dress. It is so flattering! For someone with a shorter torso, it was quite revealing, so I had to pin it up a little, but other than that this dress was a hit!

Loved this one! This dress was a dream for a very steamy, formal DC wedding. The L length was perfect with 4 inch block heels, and the slit is tasteful (it is lined as well). I received a ton of compliments because it highlighted all the best parts.

I'm normally a 4 in formal wear and this 2 was big on me. It's a great choice for a formal event in the heat. Very light weight. The slit shows a lot of leg. You can't wear a strapless bc the armpits cut low. I wore a sticky bra. The keyhole does pop open a bit. Fun pattern that isn't overwhelming. Looks best w black shoes.

links_reviews_title: Amazing floral pattern and great fit!
links_reviews_text: This dress managed to feel loose, flowy, and comfortable but fit and look sexy. It was perfect for dancing. Received many compliments. It would work well for cocktail attire through formal attire, spring to fall. Super versatile and well made dress! Loved it!!!

This dress is comfortable and fun! The slit does come up pretty high which had to be adjusted when sitting down but otherwise loved this dress. Got lots of compliments! I wore the 4R with 2 inch block heels but could have done the 4 long too.
The dress runs a bit big but beautiful, very spring. Had a ton of compliments throughout the night and easy to wear

links_reviews_title: You might just get engaged in this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress turned out to be pretty lucky for me! I rented it for vacation to the beach and was wearing it when my now fianc√© proposed :) Aside from any superstition that it may be lucky, the dress fit absolutely beautifully; it was very lightweight and a wonderful fabric. It was incredibly flattering on and I got many compliments on it. Not to mention it was very comfortable. I love this dress and definitely recommend it.

I wore this to a party and received compliments about the color and the spring look. I am a 4 usually but this was a 2 and it fit well, I think it runs a little big. There is a slit on the side that comes up to mid thigh and it's pretty sheer, but very pretty! I was in a warm room so I was comfortable but this would be a dress you'd wear only in warm environment, with light weight material you might feel cold if outdoors so bring a sweater!

One of my favorites! I did not have to wear a bra or spanx. I felt really comfortable and was able to run around my kids all night. The slit is high but nothing to worry about. I recommend this dress for size a/b cups. Perfect for spring or beach weddings.

This dress is so fun - the pictures don't do it justice. I rented it for an event, but ended up wearing it to work. It was comfortable to wear all day, and I got a ton of compliments. This would also be a great day dress with a cute pair of white tennis shoes. It's super versatile!

This dress is super fun. The cold shoulder and the fun print is perfect for spring! I wore this to a family member's graduation. It was a little tight in the rib cage and a little short for me but not uncomfortably short. Recieved a ton of compliments.
Silk hangs well and very flattering. The length was great too
I love this dress! It's so flattering and comfortable

links_reviews_title: Wore on vacation. Great dress to wear for an everyday look.
links_reviews_text: Felt like it made me look a little bottom heavy (which I am, so it doesn‚Äôt hide it well)
Perfect fit!
This was just a great fit. I felt so comfortable in it. The print was subtle but beautiful.
This dress was fun for a casual outing. Liked the cold shoulder detail. A little tight in the rib cage but not enough to stop me from wearing it twice before returning!
I loved this! This was perfect for a late summer Florida vacation. Will def rent again in the spring.

Sorry I don't have the best photo! I actually normally wear a size 4 and the size 2 actually ended up fitting. I thought the dress was very comfortable the entire night I wore it. I would recommend ordering your size that you normally wear. Color was great - highly recommend.
Wore this while on a tiki boat and wow was it perfect! Great for and pattern.

links_reviews_title: REALLY don't want to send this one back
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect dress for any occasion and I wore it to many! It was a great dress to wear to work, I wore to my boyfriend's company event, and a baby shower! The dress zips up the back and has a very fitter waistband with no stretch. It fits true to size but definitely rent based on your waist size because that is the least forgiving part. The material is great quality and the colors are beautiful. Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Sweet, comfortable - dress up or dress down
links_reviews_text: Wore this all day in TN heat and felt cool and cute! Could wear this again to work.
What you see is what you get. Extremely comfortable and easy to wear. You can even pull up the sleeves to cover your shoulders for a different look.
Fit pretty true to size. Loved the pockets. Nice color. Worked great for an evening out during a Caribbean vacation.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and perfect for a summer night
links_reviews_text: Fits is true to size. A great length to show some leg but not have to worry about your bum hanging out at every move.
This was my backup dress. I ended up wearing my first choice. It's a great dress just not amazing on me

This dress was the perfect, lightweight piece to dress up or down. I wore it at least 6 times. I paired it with a denim jacket and white sneakers for a daytime lunch on the cape on a chilly summer day. I also paired it with wedges and a nice clutch for a late afternoon party. I got so many compliments and I felt so comfortable and feminine in the dress. 100% would rent again!
I loved this dress for a day in Asheville. I wore with white sneakers and a hat and it was perfect for a hot summer day. Cute pattern, easy fit. Would be easy to dress up as well.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so fun! Hugs all the right places!
links_reviews_text: Love the fit!

This fit true to size and was comfortable all over. I wore it for a day of site seeing. I got compliments on this dress from strangers. I really liked it and considered buying it. I would recommend this as one of RTR's more casual options. It is appropriate for everyday and for daytime events. Thumbs up for more casual dresses like this one in the RTR closet.

Feminine and sexy. At first I wasn't sure about the pattern, but I really liked this dress. Wore it to a concert. The angle on this pic isn't the best, but the dress was comfortable and cute and I received several compliments.
I loved this dress! I didn't find it to be tight anywhere. I have a 36C chest so I'm always concerned and I'm 5'9 so things are sometimes too short. I loved his dress and felt beautiful.
Liked this dress a lot but wasn't wowed . Had pockets and the lining lays really well, it does not blow up in the wind which was nice.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Runs true to size
links_reviews_text: Cute/festive dress, runs true to size; fabric in the pocket areas creates a little extra curve so I didn't love that but it had a good fit otherwise;

I rented this for a Kentucky Derby party - it was perfect! Lots of compliments! This dress fits true to size. The straps are wide enough to wear a regular bra, which makes this super comfy. The material is lightweight, but the dress is lined, so it's perfect for late-spring early summer! The cold-shoulder detail is a nice touch and the a-line style accentuates the natural waist. I'll definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Easy dress to throw on and go!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. I'm either a 4 or 6 and the 4 fit great. I have a larger rib cage so it was definitely snug through the ribs but overall fit perfect.

I wore this to TPC Sawgrass in Jacksonville, FL. I felt great it in it! It wasn't too tight and the cut out shoulders were a cool detail. It was made of a nice silk but the print was what the event called for. I felt pretty in this dress and rented it twice ! Also love the ruffle on the bottom and felt like it highlighted my legs well.
The dress is true to size. Nice cool comfy dress great for work

I rented this for Easter Sunday service with my family. The sleeves were so comfortable, and because of the elasticity, I was able to pull them up for church, and let them down for the afternoon. I will definitely rent this again.
I wore this dress to my friends baby shower. I could comfortably fit in the 4 or 6. The 6 made me look too heavier though. It has pockets! Good rental
I wore it for a close friends babyshower...Recived many complements... rental went smoothly :)
Loved this dress! Of course IÔ∏è like any dress with pockets :)
Lovely dress! Cute and flattering cut and I LOVE the tiny print and bold color. Would rent again!

I wore this to brunch with the girls. Perfect dress for it. It did gap a little in the back but that's probably because I could have used a larger size. I'm going to wear it again before I send it back.

LOOOOOVE. Wore it work and loved it so much that I kept for the weekend and wore to a friend's birthday party. Got so many compliments!! The waist has zero stretch, so I'd recommend sizing up if you're nervous about fit.

I wore this dress wine tasting and it was an appropriate, flowy day dress. I liked the arm details. This dress has no stretch at all. Unfortunately my bust and waist didn't fit well - it was too tight across my chest so it bunched oddly in the back. I still wore the dress but it didn't fit as well as I had hoped.

When you and your friends have unlimited subscriptions and similar taste... you end up matching. Aside from the accidental twin moment, I loved this dress and got a ton of compliments on its fit. It was super feminine and flattering ‚Äî it's A-line but also cinches at the waist. I loved how lightweight it was for summer ‚Äî very on-trend. I would recommend sizing up as a backup size, as there's no give in the waist.

I loved this dress, super comfy and pretty, only complaint is that it was gathering on the back on top making me look like I have "hump" since the zipper is heavy and it is made for a taller person... this actually happens to me with most RTR dresses because my torso is short I guess so all of them end up being too long on top and gathering on top... my hair was covering that part so it didn't look too bad.
was super right in the rib cage for me, but fit everywhere else. wouldn't rent again but enjoyed it for the garden wedding!
Gorgeous dress. I felt really beautiful. I was worried it would be too small, but it wasn't too bad. I wish I could have kept this one.

I rented a 0 and 2 and ended up wearing the 2 for a little more room/comfort in the wast. The 3/4 length on the model hit just at my ankles, which was perfect. I received a ton of compliments and the style mixed well with the traditional Indian attire others were wearing. LOVED wearing this and would definitely rent again!

This dress is amazing. I had my eye on it for a long time and was so excited to rent this! It was perfect for a fancy photoshoot. I may rent it again for a gala, or fancy night out. I am a true 6 but this was a bit tight in the bust and waist. I think a 8 may have been more comfortable on!

links_reviews_title: Stunning! I received so many compliments
links_reviews_text: This dress is a piece of art and a showstopper. The design is so beautiful and all night I received compliments about my dress. The skirt is my favorite party and I think the length makes it so elegant. It definitely runs slightly small but I'm typically an 8 and it fit. It's also impossible to get on and off without help. I would recommend this dress especially if you want to stand out in a crowd.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress was AMAZING! I'm a size 4, 34DD so I ordered the 4 & 6. It runs small. I ended up wearing the 6 without any Spanx because it really doesn't need it. The dress was so comfortable although you are limited in your movement if you really want to get down on the dance floor.

This dress was gorgeous, fit well (I probably could have done a 4 but there were none left) but left scratches on my arms from the sequins! Thankfully I was enjoying my evening so much I didn't notice until the next day lol. Highly recommend, just be careful not to swing your arms too much against your dress.

I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit great, was surprisingly comfortable, and very easy to move in thanks to the slit in the back. I wore it to an Alice in Wonderland themed gala and it was perfect. This is a great choice for petite girls given the unique ankle cut.

Wore this to my friend's wedding and can say it was perhaps one of the most beautiful dresses I've ever worn. The dress fit perfectly and has such beautiful intricate details. Would recommend it to anyone!
I rented this for a formal wedding. Ran true to size - a little snug in the hips. So many compliments!!
Just the right amount of sparkle and lace. Sweet on top and party on the bottom. Perfect for a fall event or wedding.

links_reviews_title: Walking rainbow of sparkling joy that hugged in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. The liner on the inside was soft and was able to dance.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but just a little too snug in the chest to be comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress in so many ways. I ended up wearing a different option to my event because while this one zipped up, I felt very constricted in the chest area (I was a little afraid to even sneeze). Now, I am a super chesty gal, (36GG), so I'm sure for many women this would've fit true to size. Bottom line-- 4 stars for being a gorgeous dress. Just wish it had a little bit more give.
Perfect fit. Beautiful color scheme. Great for a black tie wedding. Wanted to keep it!

This dress is even more beautiful in person! It's very heavy and I did need help getting in and out of it because the zipper was tricky! I hated sending this back! It fit perfectly! I received compliments all night!

Beautifully made dress. Very flattering and comfortable. Absolutely a showstopper. The length was more flattering than I expected. The lining is substantial so undergarments don't show through. Compliments abound!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments all night on this amazing dress. I felt so beautiful.
links_reviews_text: It fit amazing! Normally I wear zero, but I chose to wear 2 to give myself more eating/dancing room :-) The lining in top was thicker than I expected so extra bonus points because I didn‚Äôt have to wear a bra at all.
Loved this dress!! Wore as a bridesmaid dress and it was outstanding. Received compliments all night! Didn't want to return it!!

This dress was perfect for an outdoor Art Deco wedding. Was a definite stand out that made me feel like a mermaid. I think a 0 would have been more flattering in the stomach area but still felt beautiful.

links_reviews_title: So unique, gorgeous and great for a black tie event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a fall black tie only wedding. It was so different from other dresses at the wedding (in a good way)! I opted for the 4R since I read some reviews on how the hips could be tight and I wanted to eat/dance at the wedding. It fit perfectly. Love that I could wear a regular bra with this. Wore with gold pointed toe pumps and it looked fabulous. The gold sequins are slightly rose gold more than yellow gold, but still matched everything well. Would definitely rent this again and recommend to others!

The 0R was great for me because I'm usually a petite at 5' but it was just a longer, ankle length gown for me which was perfect. The bust was a little large but not unwearable. The inner slip of the dress kept peaking from the bottom but really not an issue and didnt show up ok pictures. The sparkling sequins were fabulous for the outdoor, sunny wedding I attended.

links_reviews_title: Soooo many compliments! Not the comfiest of dresses and definitely runs small but so worth it.
links_reviews_text: Runs small

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this unique style!
links_reviews_text: The dress runs a bit small--I'm 5'7", 130lbs, long torso, pear-shaped, generally a 4--and I ended up wearing my back-up size 6. There's really no give at the waistline. However, it's a stunning dress! I received a lot of compliments (I wore it to a formal dinner). It's comfortable, and has a lot of detail so very few accessories are required to complete the look--I went with some fun earrings and a gold seed-bead clutch. I loved renting this dress--it's more adventurous than what I would usually go with, and the perfect stunner to wear once!

This dress is so gorgeous!! Absolutely loved how it looked for an evening party! It runs small. I was going to wear it regardless. It was a bit tight but it stretched a bit throughout the night. I decided on not wearing a bra as it showed. I wasn't comfortable with showing boob crack but my family encouraged me to go for it as the dress was gorgeous! Received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fit was a little too true to size
links_reviews_text: It looked too provocative for the wedding I was attending. My girls felt like they were in a push-up bra, but that was far from what I was actually wearing. Plus, the cute cut of the peekaboo top showed too much cleavage when I sat or bent over. The 14R fit, but I was too uncomfortable with the amount of skin and belly curve showing in the dress. As you can see, the dress perfectly hit around my ankles and some of the liner peeked through - nothing a little double-sided tape couldn't fix though. Overall, I still really like this dress. I'm just going to need to lose at least 10 pounds to make it work.

What a unique dress! I was constantly being complimented all night, and the colors in the skirt were beautiful. The mixture of fabrics was lovely (lace, velvet belt, sequined skirt) and period appropriate for my 1920s theme. Dress has little to no stretch and was a bit tough for wide hips, but was comfortable all night with eating and dancing.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a Vegas/Rat Pack-themed Arts fundraiser.
links_reviews_text: I‚Äôm a bit on the curvy side (busty, smaller waist, ample hips), so I rented a backup for this dress in case it didn‚Äôt go over my hips. It took a bit of shimmying and I wore Spanx underneath, but fortunately, the dress fit like a glove! The zipper was rather stubborn at the waistband, so a couple of my friends helped me zip it up. Totally worth it though, because I felt fabulous and sexy in this dress, and got so many compliments! Definitely one of the most unique dresses I‚Äôve ever worn. A word of warning to my fellow busty ladies though; the keyhole will show some chest! If you‚Äôre ample in the hips and want a bit more room, I‚Äôd recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: I had an awards Gala to attend and I wanted to stand out in a sea of black dresses and I did!
links_reviews_text: I am tall so I was worried that the length wouldn't work but it fell perfectly. The slip was a little loose under it so I just had to pin it up. I usually run an 8 but the ten fit me better, so I would definitely recommend ordering a size up as your backup.

Wore this to my mothers 70th birthday in Lagos which loves a good sparkle number. It was form fitting but comfortable and appropriate for church and the after party. Highly recommend. Size up! And if you can, highly recommend trying on in the store to ensure it fits properly.
True to size. Classy and pretty- not overly sexy or too flashy with the combo of sequins and lace.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Perfect amount of wow features. Lace, sparkles and velvet belt a perfect combo
links_reviews_text: I choose the 4 instead of the 2. Just felt more comfortable for me. The keyhole laid flat and was not revealing. The skirt was just stunning. The skirt was heavy, but i felt it allowed the dress to stay fitted and no riding up. The dress photographed well in all lighting. My cons were the zipper was tough to zip due to uneven belt attachment between sequins on the bottom and lace in top. The nude lining of the skirt was uneven and required safety pins to keep even.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress!! Lots of compliments !! Loved it üíó
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a 6 but an 8 in this dress but I am 64 and shaped different than 40 yrs ago
Dress has no give in the middle. Tight along the black/waist line. Lots of complements though! Very pretty & unique dress.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on this dress!!!!!
links_reviews_text: Wore for a Mardi Gras ball. I am usually a size 0-2 glad I ordered up a size. Runs small. The pictures don't do this dress justice. It's such a beautiful quality gown!

Loved wearing this dress and received a zillion conpliments. It does run a bit on the small side and i wore the larger of the 2 sizes i received. The bow on the top front is slightly odd, but on the size 2 (which i wore) the hanging down part of the bow had been cut off. Overall the bow is fine and should not scare you away from this amazing dress. Wish i could own it.

I rented this dress for my Rehearsal Dinner. The dress is stunning but the zipper is very tricky. Took several attempts to get it zipped up but once it was I was so pleased. The dress doesn't have a lot of stretch, especially up-top. But I liked the little bit of cleavage it gave me. I'd highly recommend!

Wore this for a black tie gala and was able to get away with the length because I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3. The dress was snug around my waist but not so tight it was uncomfortable (I‚Äôm 110 & 2R). I felt fabulous and got compliments throughout the evening. The skirt is not heavy but I did have to gather it up in order to go up stiars because there is not much give in the skirt. Overall it was great dress & true to size!

I was attending an awards show in Chicago without my husband - and looking for a dress that was high-necked and long-skirted. This did all that- and the length was perfect for my height. Not too sexy, but gorgeous detail and design.

links_reviews_title: Very unique and pretty - would recommend.
links_reviews_text: I loved how classy, unique, and ornate this dress is. The colors are beautiful. The lace is surprisingly NOT irritating. The only cons, which are not major, are that you cannot wear this with a normal bra (I used stick-ons), and the cap sleeves are a bit restrictive for lifting your arms up fully. Overall I would recommend it.

This dress was an absolute stunner !!! I wore this to an evening winter wedding and it was perfect! I ordered both the 2R & 4R because I'm tiny but have an athletic build. I've rented other Marchetta Note gowns & have struggled with arm fittings in the past. I'm 5'1 120llbs, C cup and went with the 2R. It fit perfectly ! The peep hole in the front was just enough to make this elegant gown slightly sexy. The sequins are GORGEOUS! I highly recommend this dress. It's not too heavy and the waist line is super flattering. Highly recommend:)!

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with everything about this dress!! Absolutely loved it.
links_reviews_text: A snug dress, not that comfortable but in LOVE. Colors, lace, sequins. Want to wear again!!
Needed a dress that I could accessorize for a themed black tie event and this was perfect. Great fit, simple and classic. I would buy this dress because it is so versatile!!!
I rented this for a work party. It was perfect! I'm 5'7 and got the long. Definitely recommend the long of you are my height or taller and want to wear heels.
I wore this dress to a black tie gala and it was great. Very comfortable and easy to dance in!
This was a great classic black dress with a deep back plunge. the zipper was a little challenging to manage on my own and the built in slip material underneath had a tendency to bunch.
Very nice classy dress and also comfortable

I loved this dress! Classic style. The front was modest but the back made it fun. Most importantly, I was very comfortable as it does have some stretch. I am over 5'7 and wore the 4L with 3 in. heels - the length was perfect. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful, but for a large busted woman, it was not easy to pull off. I knew the back had a V, but it was lower than I expected. I had to pin my bra (a sticky bra isn't an option for me), which made the shoulders not stay in place, so I was pulling at the dress all night (in one picture, you can see the shoulder doesn't stay in place). Overall, it's a great dress, but for large busted women, it's not perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect black dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! It was simple yet classic. Very elegant. I'm 5'8 and ordered the dress in long. Was perfect w 3" heels. Fit is flattering nice material not as heavy as i was imagining which was good. I would highly recommend this dress

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little big on top but was snug in the hips.
This dress was great for a black tie gala I recently attended! Very classy dress! The dress is a little on the heavy side, however, I liked this because I wasn't cold!
This is my 3rd B-M design I've rented through RTR and each time I am happier! Fit perfectly and got so many compliments! It fell beautifully and the neckline with the low back was so feminine!

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect except runs long.
links_reviews_text: Great fit but was too long
This dress was comfortable and so flattering! Glad I rented and a perfect go to dress for someone who is curvy

links_reviews_title: Got to share a fun evening with friends.
links_reviews_text: I was a size 16 at the time of this event and had to go with the 18 because it was too snug on my hips, however it was larger than I wanted on the top but not too noticable. I received lots of compliements and it really was comfortable.

This is a great black dress that I wore to a black tie optional wedding. I couldn't wear a regular bra with this, but it wasn't an issue because the material is thick and I didn't have to. Very simple in the front, but a beautiful scoop in the back gives it some fun and youth. Very pretty dress.

I rented this to officiate a friend's wedding - needed something classic and conservative from the front, but interesting and young enough in the back. The scoop back was gorgeous and this fit like a glove. I have a small waist and a true "hourglass" shape, and this was one of the few dresses I've rented that wasn't far too large in the waist. I'm between a 2-4 in dresses, and definitely couldn't have gone smaller than the 4, so girls with a wider waistline may want to consider sizing up. The 4L was perfect to a little long with 2.5" heels (I'm 5'6")

links_reviews_title: Prettyy Dress in the Wrong Size
links_reviews_text: I recently attended a gala and having heard about Rent the Runway I thought I would definitely try this out. Turns out my delivery was slated during the bad winter storm. Long story short, I was not able to receive the orginal dress (ordered in a short size) and was sent this as a last ninute backup. I got a lot of complimetns on it. My only complaint was he length as I tripped over it the entire night. Now I know to order a short size for my next order!

links_reviews_title: It was a formal work event, so I appreciated the modesty and classic design of this dress.
links_reviews_text: What a lovely dress! It was a little longer than expected, so I just wore higher heels. I got so many compliments and felt confident and comfortable all night. It‚Äôs super high quality fabric and was perfect for a winter formal event.

8 months pregnant for a black tie wedding Usually wear a 4 - 6R, but this dress (10R) fit perfectly. This was actually a backup dress as my original dress came damaged, but ended up working out. Top was a little big, and low back didn't make it possible to wear a bra- but I would attribute that to sizing up to fit the belly.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, classy without being frumpy!
links_reviews_text: I needed this dress for a work event, and it was perfect. Ran very true to size. It was fitted but not skin tight and the back was pretty but very appropriate. The material is thick so it lays very smooth. I am a DD and did not wear a bra but if you want one you should wear sticky boobs or a backless bra because the back is too low for a normal strapless bra. I am 5' 8" and wore flats and the length was just right to not drag on the ground.
Loved this dress after my appointment with RTR & Jocelyn. Was glad that the long version arrived without issue and was the perfect dress for my cousins wedding. Rent this dress!!

This dress was a dream. I have never worn this silhouette before, so I was afraid it would hug around the stomach. The lining and the thicker fabric really made the dress just fall in all the right places. And the deep V back was super fun. It breathed well on a hot day and was probably the most comfortable dress I've ever worn. I never wanted to change out of it even after the wedding! The fabric is stretchy, so I would recommend sizing down and have a size up as backup. The 18 was big on me, but worked. This dress was an emergency replacement after the 1st dress didn't work out. So I was sent a reg length and the long. I am 5'6 and wore the long with heals for the ceremony and wore the reg with flip flops for the reception (because why not wear both if I have them? Right?! Lol) and the length was perfect for both.

links_reviews_title: Recieved many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a gala for a work event. It was appropriate for work and I loved the back. It was a little loose at the top and the hips were a little tight. However it wasn't uncomfortable because it had a lot of give in it. I am 6' tall and it was a little shorts with my 1 inch heels. Otherwise, I loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: They have great customer service! They were late shipping the dress to our home, so shipped to hotel
links_reviews_text: It was very elegant! The back was my favorite part! I rented the 18, but should have gotten the 14 or 16. It was very big in the shoulders, but comfortable enough to wear to the wedding! Overall, I LOVED this dress and would rent again!

I ordered 18 and 20 instead of 16 and 18, because my arms are large (as you can see in the photo). The arms in the 18 were large enough for me, even a little too big but not uncomfortably so. I will rent this dress again. Mischka is a good designer for large arms.

links_reviews_title: This gown is simply elegant! It was perfect for the black tie gala that I attended.
links_reviews_text: The 12R fit perfectly and was very flattering. It was form fitting yet forgiving. I wore shapewear and a backless, strapless bra. The back of this dress is stunning! So elegant! This was one of the most comfortable dresses I have ever worn! I wore 2 inch heels with it and it just skimmed the floor. I'm about 5'6" so if you want to wear a higher heel, I'd recommend ordering the 12L. I got tons of compliments all night long!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a wedding in April.
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! I received compliments all night long!!! I did not wear heels so it was about an inch or two too long but it did not take away from the dress at all. The dress fit true to size but is made from that wonderful material that holds everything in! I would definitely rent this dress again! My measurements aren't showing up but I am 5'1", 150lbs, and normally wear an 8.
I wore this dress as a bridesmaid for my friend's wedding. It was a great dress to dance in and I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I had a of room to dance and eat!
