links_reviews_text: It did fit a little large and I wore a strapless bra with it. I'm 5'8 and I'm glad I went with the Long dress. The 10 was a little big and the 8 fit but I wanted a little more room to dance in.

links_reviews_title: I loved that my daughters rented dresses too and we all felt beautiful. Three cheers.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 10". 62 years old. The dress was exactly what I wanted. Simple and classic. I ordered the 16L and the 18L. I wore the 18. The top was big on me so I taped it down with fashion tape. The 16 fit me in the top but the hip area was tight. I normally wear a 16. My favorite part of the dress was that it was long enough. I wore kitten heels.

Material is thick and it is lined, so no need for a slip (which I wouldn't do anyway since the "V" in the back dips fairly low). Was able to wear normal bra but made sure the back straps were pulled below the back line. I'm 5'5 and wore 3 inch heels and regular size hit the hemline perfectly. I would definitely rent this again for any formal type event.
Wore this to my wedding couples shower and it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: The style of this dress was elegant, simple, sophisticated. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was PERFECT -- and I am hard to fit. For the top-heavy, this provided nice coverage in the front, and had a very flattering back. I felt like a queen in this dress! Perfection. True to size. Will rent again.

I wore this dress to a black tie wedding with a gold and quartz statement necklace. It was incredibly comfortable and easy to wear, and the fabric is thick, elegant and stretchy. However, the Long just touched the ground on me, so I ended up having to wear flats. Would definitely rent this in other colors for future events!

This was a great rental for a black tie wedding downtown Chicago. Just a note: I'm fairly short and this dress was just long enough with flats--I wouldn't have been able to wear heels with it so consider renting a long. (Worn with Lizzie Fortunado Totem Relief necklace). Also, I have a large bust (36DDD) and this dress was perfectly fine without a bra for me!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress- figure flattering, great weight, nice length
links_reviews_text: I got this dress as a stylist pick replacement for a dress I'd ordered that became unavailable unexpectedly, and seeing the pictures I was super unimpressed. I figured this would be my last pick, but I got it on and I LOVED IT! I'm 5'9" and 200lbs., and I feel like this dress was SO flattering, minimal, and elegant. I wore it to a 100th birthday gala for a vendor my fianc√© works with at the Museum of Science and Industry in Chicago, and it fit the event and venue so well. I wore the dress with flats and it was the PERFECT length, it just skimmed the floor, but I didn't trip over it or worry about others stepping on it. And being able to wear it with flats also meant I wasn't one of the many women I'd seen at the event who had taken their heels off by the end of the night. The material was heavy, but had some stretch and didn't get too warm, and the dress does have a liner. I wore a sticky bra (as it is backless), and a pair of slip shorts for my foundation layer. Everything laid so nicely and I felt amazing, and again so comfortable all night. LOVE it!!

This dress was perfect. I am 5'9.5", 135lb, fine boned, and while I usually wear a six on the top due to my shoulders being a little bit squarish and broader, the 6L was way too big. The 4L fit perfectly, not too tight, just right. I was especially happy with the length and was able to wear my 4-inch heels. This dressy is very classy and a simple backdrop to your evening accessories. I wore a brooch and matching earrings appropriate for the holiday gala we attended. The exposed back was just enough drama to make a statement without being too revealing. This dress was the alternate dress style and alternate size among the 3 dresses I had shipped. What a great service provided that allowed me find the perfect dress and the perfect fit the day before the big event.

This dress is subtly elegant, beautiful and extremely comfortable! Definitely would rent again. Runs true to size. It gave a little through the night, which was great because dinner was amazing. ;) I absolutely needed heels (4 1/2") as I'm 5'3" or it would have been stepped on all night. Loved!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a success.... everyone loved the simplicity and elegance of the dress.
links_reviews_text: The accessories were a perfect match.

links_reviews_title: Rent this dress! So classy & beautiful!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was one of the best dresses I ever rented from RTR! I was hesitant to rent because it is new to the site, and there weren't many reviews. So glad I did though! The 6L fit like a glove, very forgiving and flattering. The only thing I didn't LOVE was the bra situation. You would have to buy a special bra for this dress (very low in the back). I wore a bathing suit underneath, and it worked! I'm glad I ordered the long, it was a little too long but I feel like with heels the regular length would have not looked as glamorous. Rent this dress! you will receive tons of compliments, be comfortable all day or night, and feel like million bucks! Love, love, love this rental!
Wore this to college reunion. Fun to dance in, fitted but not snug.

This dress got lots of compliments. Loved everything about this dress, especially not having to wear a bra. Material is thicker, so it was a little hot on a summer day. But I would take thick over thin any day.
I tend to be between a 6 and 8 depending on the style and designer. I wore the 6 so I would say it's true to size. Beautiful, flattering, and comfortable for an entire day and night. Would recommend!

I love this dress. I was tempted to buy it., but I held back for one reason. The dress fit amazing all over except my chest. That was a little big. I ties the top as tight as i could abs it was still a bit loose. Other than that, I thought it was perfect. My date liked it too.
I loved wearing this, it hit in all of the right places - was slightly too big in the boobs but workable. Comfortable for walking around the city
Fun, flirty. Love the ruffles

The dress is very comfortable! I hate bras, but was able to wear one with one strap attached- it never showed. It's so flirty and light. I received so many compliments! Perfect for a noon ceremony and evening reception. If you're wanting something snug get a size smaller. I typically wear a 2 but I may have been able to squeeze "the girls" braless in a 0. I wasn't looking for super tight this time. It was perfect! Photographs well too.
Very pretty and true to size, but made me look bloated on photos - probably due to the stripes
This dress was darker than I expected. It was too big at the chest, long at the torso and tight at the hips.
Fit well and I loved the ruffles. It was a fun dress for a night out during vacation. Didn't need to wear a bra
Such a comfortable dress for a tropical vacation! It's lightweight and has great movement and it's so comfortable. I love it so much I might buy it!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for dinner on our cruise!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size
I would give this 5 stars if I didn't have to wear garment tape to keep it over my bra. Perfect fit other than coming too low there. Comfy fabric that looks like the fabric men's ties are made from.

links_reviews_title: Squeezing every drop of fun from the warm weather!
links_reviews_text: This was just a fun casual dress that happened to nicely match a fascinate that I‚Äôd recently purchased, so I put them together and spent a sunny Sunday afternoon at a winery with my husband. I need the 12 through the waist, but there wasn‚Äôt too much gap in the top with that size, which is always a concern for me. Light and comfortable, very easy going piece that can be dressed up or left alone depending on where you are heading!

links_reviews_title: Cute for dinner or date night
links_reviews_text: Love the cut of this dress and the texture. The dress is more grey than it appears in the pics, but it has good contrast in the stripes.
#party
A little tight on top. I should have probably ordered a 6 but I made it work

links_reviews_title: Loved the fabric, was sad it was too small in top for my chest.
links_reviews_text: Loved the style, fabulous dress, but the top did not have enough room for larger chests. It was comfortable otherwise and wish I had a chance to wear it.

I am 21 weeks pregnant and ordered my normal size and it accounted for my ever growing belly. It fit perfectly. I did this knowing others reviewed it saying it was lose in the waistline. If I wasn‚Äôt pregnant I would have sized down.
I could have worn a 2 but it was perfectly comfortable and cute
This was a cute dress. It wasn't my absolute favorite rental but it definitely fit well and could either be worn to a casual dinner or a fancier event.
Loved this one. Wore it to work. Got a bunch of compliments. Cute one shoulder style and super comfy.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, but don't size up
links_reviews_text: Was swimming in my size-up size, but otherwise would have been a cute dress!

I wear a 6/8 and ordered the 8. I needed the 8 in the waist (I don't have much of one) but it was roomy in the bust and bum. I had to safety pin the top so it didn't gap. Probably would fit better for someone a bit more hourglass than I am. The material is very lightweight - perfect for a hot summer night! - and not stretchy. I must say, a 70+ year old retired fashion designer with green eyeshadow came up to me and said she wanted to be my friend because she loved my outfit. That doesn't happen every day!

Such a great dress! Wore it for a fun night out w husband & friends...so comfortable and easy to dance in. I received compliments all night long! The colors are a bit darker than the RTR photos but still great. It runs a little big. I'm 5'10" hourglass and I had a hard time keeping the top up. I pinned the one shoulder and that worked.
Great fit, very comfortable. Great dress all around no complaints!!!
Fits well - very cute - love the flow!
Cute dress with flattering silhouette. Size 4 fit perfectly everywhere but at bust which was tight. Didn't wear a bra to fit the girls in. Color of stripes is much darker than RTR pics.
5'1" with relatively short torso and minimal chest and this dress is very cute but did not sit well with the one shoulder and short frame.

links_reviews_title: They were all impressed with your halaton dress
links_reviews_text: Looked good, but I wasn't a fan of the fabric type, a little uncomfortable and wrinkled easily. Not my favorite and yes the other reviews mentioned that odd fit in the top, agreed I wasn't a fan
Nip slips required dress tape as anticipated. Top still large despite long torso and 36 D chest. Loved the fit of bootom half of dress
My bust was to large to zip it up
Was a tad on the short side and because of that the ruffles made me feel bottom heavy.
Was a little tight.
The side with no strap came too far down. Half my breast was exposed.

links_reviews_title: Flowy & Fun! Was perfect for my friend's BBQ.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 8, which is the size I wore. The top was a little loose, but barely noticeable. The color is darker in person than the photos suggest.
This bugged my curves in all the right ways but was pretty tight. I decided to return it and hopefully reorder one size up.
no

links_reviews_title: Very cute but sizing is weird
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable and the fabric is so comfortable but it's cut large on top and so small in the hips! Could not make it work

This dress was adorable and so fun to wear. I was debating between the 0 and the 2.... the 0 worked great without a strapless bra underneath. The single strap was great - stayed in place and didn't have to tug at the dress to keep it up, despite dancing.

I like this dress a lot. It was perfect for a Miami party, with an open back and beautiful color! My only complaint is that it came a bit wrinkled and I could NOT get them fully out... I think it's wrinkle prone fabric. It still looked nice and you couldn't tell unless you were close up.

Wore this to my best friend's engagement party and cannot day enough nice things about this dress. I got so many compliments on it! The color is great if you have a tan. Form fitting without being too tight. It's short though so be prepared to show some leg if you're tall.
I loved this dress but was surprised by how short it was. It was flattering if I stood still but when walking/dancing I was constantly tugging it down.

I rented this stress for a girls dinner and it did not disappoint. You do you have to be prepared for some side reveal, I noticed it in a few photos. I am 5'4, 110 pounds, 32C. I was nervous about the length but it ended up being perfect even with the pumps. I do not think that it was too short.
This dress just didn't fit me right and did not end up wearing it. Loved the color and style but didn't work with my broad athletic body type. Was bummed it didn't work out.

Definitely need boobs for this dress. I could have worn a size 6 but I felt like I needed it to be extra tight in the bust area to keep me in since you can't wear a bra with this dress. The dress is tight so not very forgiving in the tummy area. Plus it's hard to wear some types of spanx because everything shows through. Lots of compliments though. Great party dress overall!

links_reviews_title: Easy to dance in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Fit great and stretchy enough to Dance and eat in !

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly, fabric is thick enough that you don't need a bra!
links_reviews_text: Super cute fit, very comfortable. The fabric is thick enough and cut perfectly in the bust area where you don't need to wear a bra and it keeps everything in place. However I think it would be loose on people with a small bust.

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress for night out!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a bachelorette party. Fun dress and it stayed put all night. Wasn't too short on me. But you must have a large bust. I wear a 32dd and wore a size 2 out and still had some room to fill in the top.

links_reviews_title: Having a quality dress that was affordable.
links_reviews_text: N/a
It was my birthday and rented this fabulous dress. The color was awesome and dress was comfortable. A regular bra does not work for this dress with the low cut back, but going braless was fine.
Loved the dress but as someone with small boobs it fit awful. So much fabric in the top area and nothing I could do to stuff it because it's backless

I rented this dress for a Bachelorette weekend. I loved the color of the dress. The top of the dress was loose, would need bigger boobs to fill it out. I ended up just tying the neck straps tighter instead of using the clasps, that helped. Next time I would size down for this dress.

I wore this to a friend's 21st. It was my first time renting from RTR and I have to say I was so happy!The color is great for summer and I got so many compliments! So comfortable and very true to size. Didn't need a bra because the lining is pretty thick, but you may need bandaids or petals!

links_reviews_title: Vibrant color but not the best fit
links_reviews_text: The color and fabric of the dress are great but it was too big on me. As other reviewers have mentioned, the top/ bust area was too big, giving too much side boob. The waist area was pretty lose too so it didn't look very flattering. As a reference, I'm 5'6", 123 lbs, 34C, hourglass figure.
This fit almost everywhere decently but had SO much extra fabric in the boob area. I'm a 34A so am small chested but you def need C+ boobs to fill out this dress even a little. :( wanted to love

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! I got so many compliments. The back is low and super sexy. No complaints
links_reviews_text: True to size. I am a true size 4. There is extra room for a little bit of hips or booty. I had extra fabric in the bust area but it was okay because it hangs perfectly around the neck.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for spring!! NEVER wanted to take it off and got soooo many compliments!!!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely looooved this dress! the zero fit me pretty well, it had a little bit of extra room but overall it fit pretty true to size. Great length, not too short but definitely not too long. i loved the open back! i wish it was a little tighter around the boob area as once i started swing dancing i felt like my boobs were falling out the side a little. otherwise, no complaints. it was a perfect change of pace for a girl who usually sticks to darker colors!
This dress for great! The color was amazing and the fabric was thick. It has an open back but I felt comfortable and secure dancing and sitting in it. I am 110 xs and the 0 fit great.

Man I wanted to like this but the dress was just WAY to short. Also, the fabric was not forgiving in hiding any stomach issues you may have AND there's no way you can wear spanxs because the back is SO low. I'm 5'7 and the front came to my high thighs and the back was even shorter. (I have an ample butt) No way sitting or bending would happen. From the waist up was gorgeous and sexy but below was a hot mess. The fabric showed all of my loose skin from birth and weight loss and there was no way I could wear a bra or spanxs to smooth anything out.

Cute dress! Runs slightly big. As others have said, you can't wear this with a bra at all so I recommend a backless or a sticky bra. I'm petite so I had to safety pin the halter neck to make it fit me length-wise and for it not to sag below my sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable! A perfect spring color!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 4 or 6 in dresses and this was huge on me. I ended up pinning the neck tighter and then it was perfect. It was a perfect length and the open back was a nice touch.
This dress runs big and did not fit
Fit was really off, did not look flattering at all
Perfect for Vegas night out, fit was true to size but you need a strapless backless bra

links_reviews_title: Great dress I could not wear
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of the dress. Very classy and age appropriate. You really need big boobs or a fantastic bra to wear it.
I really wanted this dress to work....unfortunately my 34B's could not fill it out enough & it still showed side-boob. It fit great everywhere else except the chest.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! BUT, you definitely need to be full chested to wear this. So comfy! Loved it
links_reviews_text: Super comfy, big on top, but no need for a bra.

links_reviews_title: Super short but cute. I had to tape the side of the dress
links_reviews_text: Super short but cute. I had to tape the side of the dress
Large fitting in top area and then very short. Looked odd in me so I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Soooo cute but not for A cups!
links_reviews_text: This dress is hot AF but I am a 32A cup and this dress has seams/darts in the boobs that are at leaaast a C cup. I wore a backless bra stuffed with socks (hey! I had to get creative when my push-up bra wasn't even enough to fill the dress!)

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. Due to the fact you have to be braless I could not pull this look off.
links_reviews_text: Fit fine across hips and butt. Puckered at top as I'm small breasted and old..lol. im too saggy in breast area to wear braless dress . I could maybe have found some type of sticky bra or cutlets but would be too uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Didn‚Äôt end up wearing it for my birthday
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and material but the top part of the dress runs bigger than what I expected for a size zero (I‚Äôm a 32B and the top was very loose). Also the clapse for the back of your neck is not adjustable so it‚Äôs set at one length only so that didn‚Äôt help.
The dress does not hug your body. Was very lose around the stomach so I ended up not wearing the dress.

links_reviews_title: Unable to wear due to sizing issues.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but it showed too much side boob for my taste. I sent it back without wearing.
This dress was so short I felt like it was rally meant to be a shirt.
Loved the style of this dress. Would not work for some one with smaller than a C cup. The color is more coral than orange in person.

Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing this dress. It fit so weird... very tight in the legs and butt (and I have absolutely nothing down there) and very large in the chest. Ended up wearing something else.

I love this edgy dress by Jay Godfrey! Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for a backup. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress, so you should wear a Nubra or no bra at all. At 5'3, the length hit mid-thigh on me.
Could not even sit down in this dress is was so short!
Material and color are great. Buttons seem a little stressed even though the dress is not to tight. There was odd bunging in the back that is not flattering
I wore this for my daughters first birthday. It was comfortable and skimmed the body just right. I'm 5'3" and 115, 34C, the size 2 fit perfect. Dress was also like new.

Wore this for a Rose wine party and received tons of compliments. Great color and no fuss. I have a larger chest and no matter the bra, the top button area always seemed to pull a bit, but looks like it might be a natural defect/construct of the dress itself.

I love everything Shoshanna that I put on! (I only wish she'd start including bra clasps at the shoulders ...) This dress was easy to wear w/ a regular bra (except that the straps kept slipping ... cue shoulder bra clasps!) and all around comfortable. The color is great!

The fit is a bit loose but perfect for summer. Very breezy. The neckline was too revealing for me so I added a lace camisole underneath. Overall this dress was beautiful and I got a lot of compliments on the color.
The color is pretty true to how it appears in the RTRW photo. Bright pretty dress, light breathable fabric. Could be worn with heels or flats. Was a hit at the office
This dress is great and flattering! Fits true to size. The magenta color is so pretty. It does wrinkle pretty easily.
So easy to style with some fun earrings! Color was a standout
So many compliments and super fun date night or casual party dress!
I wasn't sure when I rented if I would like this or not, but it was super cute on! I wore it to brunch and received many compliments. Would rent again for spring or summer events.

links_reviews_title: Stand out color. So so fit for petites
links_reviews_text: Overall fit well but the top moved around quite a bit-not ideal for those w short torso or small chest.
My niece named it the mermaid dress. It has a bit of stretch so comfortable. Would be cute with wedges but i wore with flip flops. I got lots of compliments.
I wore this dress multiple times because it was so easy and comfy on hot days. Definitely longer on me because I'm petite. Could dress up or down with heels and a belt.

I really wasn't sure about this dress but it was super flattering. I wore it to work, church and for lunch at our country club - it was really versatile. It is roomy for someone with a larger bust but still fits me in my smaller waist. The color is really beautiful.

O would say this dress runs a little big I belted it at the waist to give myself more shape it was baggy The top was fitted but I am busty Had a Spanish vibe which I digged Such a bright pink perfect for summer Wrinkles a bit throughout the day- be mindful of that Overall pretty summer dress

Not my favorite color on myself, but definitely got lots of compliments on this bright pink dress on a gloomy summer day! Very comfy and breathable fabric - unfortunately the top button left a little gap because of my bust; but this was a good rent.
Runs true to size. Very comfortable fit on a hot summer day. It did wrinkle easy after sitting down for lunch. Great for every day. Paired with Kate Spade Purse.

the color is beautiful, and so is the fit. however, there's something "old lady" about it...I tried to wear it with white sneakers but it was totally off. The dress I received looked old, very worn. It gave me goodwill vibes, and not in a good way.
That jazz is a perfect summer fabric. It is an easy dress and very feminine but not fussy!
Great dress
I can't even tell you how amazing this dress is! It fit like a glove and was gorgeous!!! I also had great pink Tory Burch sandals to wear with this. LOOKED FABULOUS!!!

links_reviews_title: This was a cute and comfortable dress!! I wore it a few times because you can dress it up or down
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Not flattering on a baby bump
links_reviews_text: This came up as a bump-friendly option for me and although it fit (I sized up) the buttons down the front make it unflattering for a 20 week bump. Will try again post baby. It's an adorable dress and a great length for petites.
Wore the dress to a weekend party and to work. The cut is really versatile and true to size, but the definitely a standout due to the bright pink color!
The dress was so nice, but yet ran so big. I'm an XS and I weigh about 114lbs. Didn't fit at all.
Loved. Glad I chose size 6 though I had to use safety pin at top of bust - but this is not uncommon. Very bright. Fun dress to dress up or possibly casual with the right shoes.

links_reviews_title: Amazing color, second time renting, so comfy and flattering
links_reviews_text: Awesome pink, doesn't gap at buttons, flattering cut
This dress is so pretty and fit perfectly. Unfortunately I couldn't wear it because the second button from the top was broken in half.

This dress was great on my shape (pear) and I was able to dress it up with heels for work and down with sandals for everyday. If you're between sizes like me, I recommend sizing down because there's stretch to the material. I would def rent this dress again!

Dress has potential and could be a cute summer dress, but did not look as fitted on me as it did on the model. I felt like it was really boxy and awkward around the bust/waist area. I sent back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but didn't end up wearing
links_reviews_text: My 14 yo daughter gave this dress the thumbs down. I ended up sending back despite thinking it was pretty cute.
Loved everything about this dress! The fit was so beautiful, flattering and feminine. Received tons of compliments at work!
Perfect summer dress. Great color, breezy fabric. Wore several times including out to dinner and to the pool.
Got a lot of compliments on this dress. I am between a 2 and 4, ordered the 4 but definitely could have gotten away with the 2.
Love the color and the fit and received tons of compliments
Loved this dress. Great color and details. Wore it casual with flats and more dressed up with heels. Felt pretty wearing this dress. Would buy if I could.

This dress is a beautiful, vibrant pink. It's very lightweight so perfect for hot summer days. I rented the 0 and usually wear a 2, but it was still a little large on me. I ended up cinching the waist with a scarf which helped a bit. Wish it came in petite sizes!
loose but flattering.
The dress fit large everywhere except bust when sitting there was a gap between buttons . The fabric is light , on a very sunny day it requires a slip. For a better fit I suggest a belt.
I really liked this dress. Super cute.

links_reviews_title: Color Block is Everything on this Dress!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress perfect for vacation. Fits true to size.

This dress is gorgeous and so different from what I usually go for -- the flowy ruffles and neon pastels are very striking and fun to wear. I sized up for my 24-week bump. I think I could have worn my usual 4, but it was nice to not have it too tight around the bump so the 6 was perfect. However, it is SO SHEER. Even nude undies and nipple covers showed through. Had to wear nude spanx and a nude bralette.
Very flattering fit. Flowy and comfortable - many compliments! May buy it!

links_reviews_title: I want to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for my sisters baby shower and I seriously want to buy it! Such a great, fun statement piece and I received so many compliments. The dress runs very large though, I am 17 weeks pregnant and wore the 2R and could have definitely gotten away with a 0R if the option was given. Amazing dress!
This dress is super fun and flowy, and I'm excited to wear it with big hoops for a sassy brunch look. Size down if you're concerned about volume, though I kinda like the drama of it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the colors and flowy fit.
links_reviews_text: I wore this at the beginning of my third trimester and loved how it fit. I think it could work through the entire pregnancy. I'm also quite petite and this fit my height.

links_reviews_title: Fun and flowing for spring / summer!
links_reviews_text: I loved the bright colors comfy fit. Tons of compliments!
Rented for Miami vacation! Could be worn to the beach or as a fun daytime dress with a denim jacket. You 100% need a slip for the dress so just keep that in mind

Rented for vacation to Mexico and decided to wear it for impromptu family pics. Definitely a showstopper of a dress, with lots of compliments received! The wrong angle can make the dress look very tent-like, so keep that in mind; also, I foolishly did not consider my undergarments very well, so I needed a tiny safety pin in the back to cover my strapless bra. Can't imagine who wouldn't love wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: Such a great dress! Ran a little bit big and probably needs a bralette but so cute!
links_reviews_text: So cute, slightly big, needs bralette because back is low, fun to twirl in!

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Be prepared for sheerness though!
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. The back is very low cut and the material is pretty sheer. I wore a colorful lace bralette that I was okay with showing through in the back. No sure how you could wear a bra without it showing. It was see through around the skirt as well, but nude boy shorts helped me feel comfortable wearing it in a hot, vacation climate.

I rented this for a trip to the Caribbean. It's the most gorgeous dress - floaty and breezy, but still flattering. I'm 25 weeks pregnant and wore the 6 and it fit with some room to spare, so I'd suggest ordering a size down so you don't get swamped. The back comes down very low, but I wore a bra with a pretty crochet back, and it worked well showing through the keyhole back. Definitely wouldn't work well with a regular bra though.

links_reviews_title: This Dress Gets Compliments from Everyone!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments in this dress! People were stopping me in public to tell me how much they loved it. I would never usually wear these colors but they worked so well together. This dress is super easy and breezy and perfect at the beach. I would definitely suggest sizing down so you aren't swimming in it. The only thing I didn't love about this dress was that it was hard to wear a bra with it-you could see my sticky boobs through it and I didn't want to wear a bandeau that would take away from the open back. I ended up wearing a nude strapless bra with it and just pulled the back strap down as low as I could so it wasn't showing. I also found the lower part to be a bit see through. I would have preferred a slip but ended up just wearing commandos and I think it was fine. Overall LOVE. Would buy.

I rented this dress twice over the summer and it traveled everywhere and looked fresh as a daisy. In order to keep the lines clean, sticky bra is required. Beautiful elongated keyhole In back. The movement of the fabric is over the top. I felt like royalty wearing it in Uz√®s, France. Roomy enough to enjoy all the food. Great dress. Tons of stop-you-on-the-street compliments.
Great vacay dress especially as a swim cover up. Light, semi sheer, pretty loose

links_reviews_title: Fun, sheer, better for taller women
links_reviews_text: Fun dress, but did nothing for my short body. I still wore it with a jean jacket which looked better than with just the dress plain. Also be aware the dress is extremely share and the back is open so you should wear a sticky backless bra
Really really wanted to buy this dress. It is gorgeous and super flattering. It is see through and very delicate, which was the only reason I didn't buy it. Got so many compliments.

This was my second time renting this dress and am debating on buying it! Wore to a summer party and absolutely love it. The colors are so fun and I got a ton of compliments all night. I wore a bandeau bra which worked out well, low back makes it hard to wear a real bra.

I adore this dress! It's flowy, comfortable, effortless, and so pretty. I wore it to a baby shower, and it was perfect for a spring day. Like many of the other reviewers - this runs rather large. As a reference- I am 5'8, and I am a pretty fluffy girl who is a solid size 8. I was able to fit comfortably into a size 6, and still had plenty of room to eat (talk about a confident booster ha!). I would highly recommend at least ordering 1 size down. This is why I love RTR unlimited- this isn't a dress that I would normally buy off the rack, but I took a chance with renting it.
LOVED THIS DRESS. Great light weight material. A little sheer. Recommend nude colored underwear. Runs large. I would size down. I'm usually a 4 and the 2 was perfect.
This dress is so cute! This runs large, so definitely size down. This is great for any cup size and fits loose throughout. Wear this with a denim jacket for a causal spring look!

I'm obsessed with this dress. It's light and airy and perfect for my height (I'm 5'9"). I paired it with a long sleeved blouse underneath, which it helped because it has a large keyhole in the back that would show a bra. This dress is quite sheer so I also wore a half slip underneath. I love how unique it is and I would definitely rent it again!
I wore a medium. It arrived NWT and was perfect for a spring Saturday gathering. Could dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was outdoors and informal and so much fun.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear the dress because it was see-through and I could not source appropriate slip/under garment in time.

I had high hopes for this dress and waited all Summer to rent. Alas, my petite frame combined with my 7-month pregnant belly, the ruffles and length of the dress - none of it really worked together. The dress is precious though. Will try again after pregnancy.

i love this dress and originally ordered it in the 4 but fortunately the 2 becaome available befoer the parrt so i swapped it for that, and very glad i did. for reference, i am 5'6, 125 lbs, 34B, fluctuate between 2-4 or s/m and the 4 fits but its definitely on the looser side. i'd recommend if you are in between sizes to size down. i personally probably could have even trued the 0 but it was too much effort
I rented this for a casual summer dress, but the material is chiffon, so it feels more formal. It fits really loosely, so the fit feels to casual for a more formal event. Love the color though!
This is my second time renting this dress! I love it, so light and airy and I get so many compliments.
Runs on the large size, I would definitely size down. I am 5 8, 170 lbs and wore the size 10 with room to spare. Loose fitting, comfortable and pretty colors.

links_reviews_title: The fit was perfect, but it is very transparent...
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" and 6 months pregnant. Before pregnancy, I wore size 2 or 4, so I sized up and ordered 6, and the fit was just perfect! My only complaint is, it's very very very transparent. I wore an undergarment which worked fine from the front, but because of the style of the back of the dress, it was showing a lot and made me a little uncomfortable because of that.
It definitely runs large, but not in an overwhelming way! Also, the cut is low in the back - even a strapless bra will still be visible in the back, so I recommend sticky boobs!

links_reviews_title: Pretty and flowy but see through
links_reviews_text: Rented for Easter brunch at a resort in Florida. It was flowy and flattering and hid my postpartum figure but it was pretty see through especially in the sunlight.

Cute dress but not for someone who's busty. The key hole in the back came down too far for me to wear any sort of bra. The dress is slightly sheer, but I think with spanx you would be fine. I didn't end up wearing because of the boob situation but would look great on someone more flat chested in my opinion.

links_reviews_title: SO cute, but WAY too big.
links_reviews_text: It was so big that I couldn't wear it without looking like it was a bed sheet. It is SO ADORABLE though. I would have ordered two sizes down. Do NOT order unless a smaller size than you normally wear is available!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous! However, it is sheer so not sure how to wear panties or a bra.
links_reviews_text: Too loose all around- bust, hips, arm pits
A little big
Great dress for the beach. Super flowy, comfortable, and unique. Runs big - glad I got the 2 but could have worn a 0, too.
This dress looks better on than it does in pictures. Overall, it runs large so I would recommend sizing down. It's really long, but it works as a maxi dress if you are petite (I'm 5'0).

links_reviews_title: I love the pastels but the yellow is too much
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but I wish they had gone with a pastel yellow instead of a bright yellow. You can't wear a bra because of the back and frankly depending on your nipple color you won't be able to wear this at all since it's pretty sheer or wear pasties

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, light and loved the slightly open back
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and easy to wear, however shouldve gone an extra size down. Drowning in the 2 the 0 wouldve been perfect. But overall liked this for a casual event
Wore to a wedding. Beautiful dress
I really loved this dress! I wore it to a NYE party. It fit perfectly and I got tons of compliments because, duh, it has a CAPE!
Love, love this dress. The front can be a bit low for work, but it is such a beautiful dress. I would wear it for special occasion like wedding or formal party next time

links_reviews_title: I got several compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress would probably be short on anyone over 5‚Äô4‚Äù. The color is like pepto bismal pink. I felt pretty in it and it was easy to wear!

Although this dress was a big snug around my middle I made it work because I loved the cape so much. I was careful when I sat down but the color and the cape made this a fun, playful dress to wear. I got compliments all night and I felt great (but I big snug in the dress and my spanx).

links_reviews_title: Stand out in this pink beauty!
links_reviews_text: Super cute dress that I wore to the theatre. Fit was good... Not tight across the back (I have wide shoulders), enough room in the hips, plenty of room in the bust. The dress is definitely short (I'm 5'11"), but it's not tight and not low cut so it was still appropriate. I got a bunch of compliments throughout the afternoon and at dinner later that evening. Definitely a unique dress... You gotta own it to pull it off!

links_reviews_title: Wish I had two events so I could have worn this one as well!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress! I wish I had two events that weekend so I could have worn this dress, but I chose to wear a different dress instead. It was a lot more snug on my belly than I thought it would be, but spanx helped and the cape definitely draws the eyes away from the belly. Will rent this one again!
Wore this to my best friend's rehearsal dinner. It was perfect! Great fit and super comfortable!

I rented this for a masquerade theme wedding. The color and style is gorgeous!! Spanx were a must for me. I wonder if the 8 would have been a better fit but the top was a little loose so it may have been too big. I would recommend sizing up for your backup just in case.
I loved the fit of this dress! I recently had a baby so I sized up to a 2 instead of a 0. This was my first big event post baby and I felt pretty and confident!!

It fit so well, the material was thick enough to smooth out my stomach, and was overall incredibly flattering. I loved the cape portion of the dress, it made it fun and different (but a little hard to wear my coat over when I was outside). This was my favorite RTR dress yet!

I can't say enough about this dress. It is true to size and stretchy/comfy without being unflattering. I have a little bit of a tummy and it was a close fit to my body without highlighting that. Also great if you don't like your arms. I didn't wear a bra with it and had a little coverage. Perfect for Easter where I wanted to look a little sexy/a little pretty. I'm a 36b. Bigger chests might need a bra.

links_reviews_title: This gorgeous blush-pink Halston dress drew compliment all day & night!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my friend's bridal shower, and went straight to a holiday dinner at my boyfriend's family's house afterwards. It fits true to size and is very comfortable. I especially love the cape detail! I'm small chested and did not need a bra at all due to the thick material. The color in the picture is pretty accurate, especially in natural light, but it an look more blue-pink in other lights. I highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I've never received more compliments on an outfit and felt beautiful :)
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, I'm normally between a 4-6 and the 4 zipped but was snug while the 6 had a little room. Fabric was high quality and extremely flattering and the cape part at the top draped beautifully. Low enough cut to be young & modern but still covered enough for a wedding.

Wore this to a business fundraiser. It was fun, flirty and still professional. Not too short and the color is a nice pop without being over the top pink. I'm busty so the girls were on display but not obscene. I will rent a size up this summer to make it a bit less boobalicious. I got compliments all night long from men and women. Love this dress and am considering buying it.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on the back of this dress. It was perfect for a spring party.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was a nice weight. I wore it for an evening party in early spring so the weather could have been hit or miss. The cape provided a little extra coverage. I usually wear a 6. I ordered the 4 and 6. I probably could've gotten away with the 4 but it was a little tight in the chest (I'm not lacking in this area). The color is pretty. I was worried it would be too Pepto-like. It was a nice pastel pink. This dress is a stunner. Rent it!

Loved the bubble gum pink color, especially for a spring wedding. The style was fun and something different. The cape aspect kept me just the right amount of warm for an April wedding in New England. Fits comfortably and true to size. Received tons of compliments!
This dress was true to size fit perfect and loved the way it fit.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to return this stunner ! Don't think about it, just rent it!
links_reviews_text: Rented for my nieces baptism. The color was perfection for a spring luncheon. Loved the back of this dress and the cape was such a unique feature. Will rent it again soon !
Loved this dress! I was a little worried about how it would fit because I am 5 months pregnant but it had the perfect amount of stretch for my tummy.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and hugged you in all the right places. Loved it!!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and the color was just perfect. Wore this for an outside S. FL and got so many compliments. I would definitely recommend it and rent it again!
This dress fit exactly as intended. Super comfortable, perfect length, love the cape and color is perfect for spring.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bridal shower/birthday event at my house.
links_reviews_text: Dress was comfortable and I felt like Jackie O!

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on color, cape sleeves - perfect for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was actually my second choice, until I saw it in person! Color - Amazing Fabric - Heavy/Expensive looking & did NOT wrinkle at all Fit - PERFECT & comfortable - Even having to hold a heavy 3 yr old the whole time!

links_reviews_title: Cute + perfect for a winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: Pros: Very warm, flattering style, and fun bold pink color. Cons: Top runs very low.
I got a size 6 and 8. My hips were a little too tight in the size 6, so I choose to wear the 8. I received so many compliments on this dress. Fit amazingly. I felt amazing. Night to remember.

This dress was super flattering, and the cape was so fun to wear! The crepe material is very forgiving, but I sized up so that the material draped on my body to match the draping of the cape. The only issue was bust was a little low, but easily fixed with a safety pin. Very comfortable and lots of compliments. Loved it and is honestly one of the only dresses I can't wait to rent again!
Overall beautiful dress. Short‚Äîaround mid-thigh on me. I was able to wear a regular bra despite the low cut. The color is very pink, as pictured.

I wore this dress for our engagement photos and I couldn't be happier with it! The fit was perfect and very comfortable, I also received a ton of compliments. It was flirty and girly and perfect for our photos!

This dress is beautiful, fave dress I've rented and I really considered buying it! So flattering and I got a lot Of compliments. I'm big busted and was able to not wear a bra but was supported...which makes me think a smaller busted girl might have too much room up top.
The fit was perfect. I loved the length on me. It fit like a glove.

Loved everything about this dress. It was flattering in all the right places. I liked the fit of size 8 since it was longer than the 6 . Got so many compliments and the color pink stood out! Definitely a good first impression of RTR!! Will be a regular customer now :)

links_reviews_title: I felt like a goddess and that doesn't happen -- EVER.
links_reviews_text: So, funny story. I forgot that I told my cousin I'd MC his wedding and ordered this dress thinking I'd be sitting down and tipsy all night, not standing for 5 hours in front of 200 people. When they reminded me, I thought to myself, "screw it, I'll get some fashion tape for roll with it." I'm *stupidly* glad I got that tape and kept the dress. I have a big tummy in relation to the rest of my body. I'm super self-conscious of it. I usually don't wear fitted dresses because of it but this one I couldn't pass up. Here's why I loved this dress: 1. The stunning cape - The only time I like drama is in my clothing. This didn't disappoint. I felt like a flowy goddess the whole night and totally forgot about my tummy worries. It draws the eye up and away and it was perfect for this event. 2. The color - Pink isn't usually my thing but when I do it I'm all in. She is more vivid in person. She's a happy medium between a pastel and bubble gum and I'm LIVING for her. 3. The material - I wore this on an 80 degree early September day in Washington, DC. It was thick enough where I felt like it kept me together but breathable enough where I wasn't sweating up a storm. 4. The neckline - What can I say? I want to flaunt them while I've got them. TIPS: -Fashion tape is your friend. Not the little strips, the roll. They sell it at Target for $12 I think. -I'm 5'0" and this bad boy was kind of high. You might consider wearing those cheerleading panties that are meant to be seen. -I had on Spanx. They kept Lolita (what I've named my tummy) in place all night. Get a friend to help you zip. Put her on. Feel like a goddess. Enjoy.

This dress is amazing! It's a gorgeous bubblegum pink & the design is so unique. It was perfect for my niece's bridal shower. I received many compliments. It seemed true to size & very comfortable. I didn't want to return it.

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The cape was very flattering and fun. Color paired well with gold jewelry and heels. The material is a bit thick so not the best for an outdoor event in hot weather even though it is short and loose. I would buy this dress, although it may be hard to wear to multiple events because the color is pretty conspicuous. Overall loved this dress, two thumbs up!

links_reviews_title: Ideal dress for a summer Vegas wedding
links_reviews_text: Best one I've rented here yet! Color is beautiful, hides my back boobs well also! Don't think, just rent it! Compliments all night, I wanna own it too! I wish it came in different colors. :)))
Perfect hand, compliments all night!
This dress was ADORABLE! I bought it for a girls trip and everyone loved it ‚Äî I felt girly, cute, stylish and fun. It was very comfortable, and breastfeeding-friendly! ‚Äî @sufeychen

Initially, I did not like the dress because the cape was a bit overwhelming.. however once I figured out not to do the "hand on your hip pose" for pictures, I found it very flattering. The color is beautiful, and I could wear a regular bra. I am 6 weeks postpartum, and felt confident and comfortable. I would recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Ordered as a backup option and didn't end up wearing.
links_reviews_text: Adorable in the pic and while trying it on, but the fabric in the V didn't sit properly on my chest. The stitching that would normally be inside the dress kind of rolled over on itself and showed. That by itself wouldn't keep me from wearing it for one night, but it did require constant fixing and I had a better option this time. ((32A/B, wearing a padded bra helped a little)) I also felt it was a little short for sitting down.
You'll want to go for a Long size if you're even average height for it to really work with heels.

Wore this for a night out in Vegas. The material is very soft and stretchy and felt like pjs. Loved the neckline. It was super form fitting but I felt confident in it. One thing that bothered me was the tan lining was separate at the bottom of the legs and was a little bit longer than the lace so it peeked out and looked unfinished. Otherwise it was a very wow outfit, I felt so good in it.
This fits like a dream and is awesome for a dressy night out or a party

links_reviews_title: Turning heads in this comfortable jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: I've tried on a number of jumpsuits and being 5'9 it's hard to find one that fits right. This is all stretch/no structure but still flattering. The pattern is forgiving and if you're smaller in the chest and not afraid of anything popping out, you won't even know you're wearing anything! I have broad shoulders so it was more flattering wearing it as a halter but the cross-cross back would provide more boob support if you need it. Wore 5inch heels as reference. I loved the extra length!

links_reviews_title: Wowza! Not for Faint of Heart - super comfy but super revealing!
links_reviews_text: I had a great experience with this jumpsuit! It is TIGHT, but the lining is a nice weight and stretchy, plus the lace pattern is very flattering/smoothing. It was definitely a WOW factor - I wore to a club in Vegas and probably wouldn't feel comfortable showing that much skin elsewhere. I do think this works better on a specific body type - I am tall/thin/straight with a small chest. Boobs were snug in place even through dancing with no tape needed. Fun!!
This honestly is so comfortable it felt like pajamas. It is a tad unforgiving in the tummy region.

Perfect in all ways! I have a long torso and didn't have any issues. Top stayed put and I didn't worry about wardrobe malfunctions. Can't help but feel super sexy in this one! Great outfit for our 15th wedding anniversary date night.
fit was great, adorable with the lace and classy with the black. has some nice beige suede on the inside under the lace which felt good.

links_reviews_title: It has a very revealing front but flattering on the right body.
links_reviews_text: i am 5'5 - 142 lbs it was a little too short for heals

links_reviews_title: So comfortable, perfect for dancing. I got tons of compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I loved how the entire jumpsuit was made from stretchy material. I danced all night long and was so comfortable. I ended up going with the Large as the Medium was a bit small, but would definitely recommend it.

This jumpsuit looked super cute and classy on the thin small-breasted model. I am a curvy size 6 and a full 34C and rented this for my anniversary date night. Did not have the guts to wear this in public. There was so much boob and so much flesh! My husband's eyes popped out of his head and mouth literally fell open with a gasp and a "WOW," but yowza. If you're a curvy girl, be warned. It's just straps covering nipples. So much boob . . .
I must to say that this thumper it's not for sizes bigger than 4. It's like wearing lace leggings with a triangle biquini top ... looks vulgar even for a night club . Sorry it's my honest opinion
I didn't end up wearing this but it is gorgeous!! Very sexy! Fit perfectly. It is a little long so if you are petite make sure you get the petite size. Very sexy for date night or night out dancing!!

links_reviews_title: Did not want to send this one back.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so comfortable. Although it‚Äôs sequined it has some stretch to it. I could also wear the medium but it was a little shorter than I was comfortable with. Received compliments all night.

Super fun dress for a holiday party. It fit true to size and hugs in the right places. The dress is lined on the inside and is very comfortable but over time, the sequin rubbed the inside of my arms a little. Highly recommend and would rent again.
I'm between a 6-8 and renter a medium and it fit perfectly. Not too snug, and not too loose. Simple yet glammy dress. I dressed it down with casual booties and went out for a date night in the city

I loved this dress and received so many compliments!! It runs true to size, maybe even a little large - I got both medium and large and wore the medium. Only complaint is the sleeves were a bit tight, but otherwise an A+ dress.
Super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Wore this in Vegas - so fun! Not a super tight fit, but I loved it.
links_reviews_text: Fun party dress!

links_reviews_title: Really wish I could own this dress!!! Perfect for the wedding and so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Although I needed to recruit someone to help zip up. The different shades of sequins (gold, silver, rose gold) really elevate this dress from other sparkly dresses. The bust was a little tight but I also had an XS. Being 4'9 length is always a concern but not with this dress. Highly recommend for petite women.

I wore this for a formal south asian soiree with some fancy pants (haha) and it looked great. Loved the colors in it. I am 5 months post partum and am nursing so my huge boobs need lots more room than usual and the Large delivered! very happy with this experience!
Perfect for a fancy birthday lunch for hubby in Venice!
Stretchy, sequins galore, ton of compliments, what's not to love?

I wore this dress for my office holiday party and it was a 5star! The dress is not too tight in the waist or the hips so it looked very flattering on me. I wore it with tights because it is kind of shorter for what I would pick for a company event. It looked so much better in person than in the pictures.
Wore it to the club in Vegas and loved it! Fits great and is not tight but shows off the right curves.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress. Wasn't too short for the Work Holiday party.
links_reviews_text: Great fit

I wanted a sequin dress to wear out for my 30th birthday. The original dress I had rented was unavailable at the time of shipping in both sizes so RTR sent me this and another similar style. This dress fit better of the two so I went with it. Normally I'm a true M across the board but this was a little large on me, I had wished it hugged my curves a bit more. As with any sequin dress, you're also very aware of it rubbing against your arms. All in all I felt great and would rent this style again but in a size S.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sparkle. Perfect for my gig. I got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Just like all the reviews said, it runs big! I normally wear S/M in dresses and I had to go with the XS for this. Perfect fit though. Not too tight in any place. Very comfortable. Not itchy from the sequins. And, the length short enough to be flirty and cute, not skanky! Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Standing out in a crowd! The sparkles take the cake, plus it was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Length was perfect with heels. It‚Äôs a modest dress but still a huge attention grabber. I never even felt the sequins rubbing. Absolutely great NYE dress!

links_reviews_title: Love the sequins for New Years Eve
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for NYE and loved all of the sparkle! I felt it was true to size and would order one size up as your backup if you want a looser fit. I ended up wearing the small and was comfortable dancing the night away. It is short as you can see in the picture. I also paired it with a leather jacket, tights and heels.
The dress was rented for a holiday party. The dress was in great condition, like new, and was easy to rent and return. Was a little tight on my arms. Absolutely beautiful!

links_reviews_title: You'll stand out in a crowd in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs large (I'm a 2/4 & wore an XS). Super comfortable though, has lots of stretch! Hubby joked I looked like a disco ball, but I got tons of compliments! ;)

I did get compliments on this dress; however, the fit was large, boxy, and not super flattering. Might be good for a modest work holiday party. And for 30$, I wasn't upset about it. I could see this working well for maternity or postpartum.
I loved everything about this dress. I am short and it was ACTUALLY a mini! I received compliments all night (and they next day on Facebook) :)

This dress was GORGEOUS! I loved it! Only reason for 4 stars is that I definitely could have worn a medium instead the large. I have a bigger chest and broad shoulders and am never in a medium but this was a little big.

links_reviews_title: speaking on stage at a 600+ person charity gala. the stretch in the material was great for movement
links_reviews_text: I could have chose one size down. I'm more of a boxey build and legs are the focal point for me as I don't have an hour glass shape at all. This dress was great. Would rent it again, but WHY, when there are so many great RTR options???!!!

Dazzling statement dress that is definitely an eye-catcher. This dress runs true to size and the stretchy fabric allows comfortable fit throughout midsection. At 5'0", this dress came to right above the knee. It was the perfect length for dancing all night long. This would go great with black tights and a great pair of heels.
I rented this dress for my 30th birthday party. It looked great and was very comfortable to wear. The short sleeves minimized the sequin arm chafing! I got loads of compliments on this dress!
Fit ran large. I'm normally a 2 or 2P and wore the XS. I'm 5'2 so the length hit above the knee, which was modest but still fun enough. Not scratchy at all. Loved all the sequins.

This dress was perfect! Needed something sparkly and affordable. Dress was fitted without feeling like spandex. Sequins were a little scratchy underneath my arms but i didnt notice intil the end of the evening. Looked great on stage (I'm a musician). I got a ton of compliments. Will totally rent again.

links_reviews_title: Worn for my work holiday party! Great dress to add a little sparkle!
links_reviews_text: I felt like it was a little boxy, but overall it was perfect for a fun work party... dressed it down a bit with a leather jacket and black tights and booties.

links_reviews_title: This is the perfect holiday dress! I received compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs big. I typically wear a size 8 or medium and ordered a medium and got a small as my back up size. I wore the small bc it just hugged in all the right places. The dress has some give to it so it won't show anything. I'm 5'3 so the length was perfect paired with a set of heels!

I went to the NYC store and found this stunner on the rack. I did not think it would fit since it was a L and I usually wear a size 16 and up depending on the dress. Definitely a body con dress so wear the appropriate undergarments to feel completely comfortable. The arms were a little tight and started to feel slightly irriatated. No biggie. I'm 5'7" and it did tun a little short but I was totally okay with that. Tons of compliments throughout the night. RTR never fails.
Sequins gave it lots of sparkle, but it was too loose on me and gave me no shape. I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: This was the backup they sent because they didn't fill 1st order correctly
links_reviews_text: Never even tried it on. The Medium was way too big
Loved it! Super comfortable, but the sequins were a challenge when hugging others- kind of abrasive.

I rented this for an NYE party and it looked great. I was worried about it being too short, but it was perfect for me at 5'6''. The sequins are a kind of satin finish so the dress wasn't too reflective. Also the sleeves cover just enough so my armpits didn't get irritated from the sequins scratching.

links_reviews_title: Great fit and multi-shade sequin pattern, love the dress.
links_reviews_text: Nice and short, not too tight. Unfortunately the dress I received had lingering body odor, which was not ideal. I know it's hard to dry clean sequins but it made it hard to wear the dress as received.
Such a pretty dress! Runs large so size down 1 size.

I was a bit nervous about wearing this dress as I am usually not a very flashy dresser; however, I didn't feel at all like it was an obnoxious sequenced dress and thought it blended in well with the night. The dress overall was larger than normal (wore a size small, usually wear a medium in almost everything), BUT!!!!! it was EXTREMELY tight and rather annoying on the sleeves. The sequences on the sleeves annoyed my arms all night to the point where I got a rash/brush burn on the underside of my arms. Other than the sleeves it was a very comfortable dress.
Fit exactly how I wanted it to. I loved it because it wasn't too short and I could definitely get pretty low with my dance moves without any fear.

links_reviews_title: Fun trying on but didn't workout
links_reviews_text: A little short for me and top of dress fit weird. Didn't wear.
perfect fit, wasn't too tight but hugged the body. great quality and really shiny
I liked that it could be worn bra-less (always a plus!). The neckline and tie strings were really cute, different details. Great date night shirt!

Fit was true to size, this shirt does have a scrunching tie in the middle so you can make it longer or shorter in the torso area. I think it looked super cute with high waisted jeans, scrunched up so it was more cropped. I did feel like could be a little tentish in the boob area if you have a bigger chest. Would look super cute with high waisted white jeans!
I liked the drawstring on this top, it's complimenting.

I like this shirt a lot. It was comfy, cute, and easy to wear. You can adjust the tie depending on how much belly you want to show. My only hesitation was that I thought the black tie at the bottom was a little awkward. Got a lot of compliments and was fun to wear once for a friend's bachelorette party, but probably won't rent again.
Really unique top - perfect with high-waisted jeans. Felt and looked more expensive that it actually is!

I rented this top and while I loved it, it was too cropped for anything other than really high waisted denim. I thought maybe the scrunch center can be adjusted (I have a top that does) but it cannot. The strings are sewn so you don't get more or less scrunch. I would wear it with high waisted shorts but in the fall it just couldn't work for me to wear. Usually a M and did the L to see if I could make the crop work as it would maybe be less cropped and I def needed the L either way.
I like that you can alter your scrunch level. Wore it to work with high waist jeans and a belt, wore on the weekend boat ride with high waisted ripped shorts and sandals. very versatile

I'm 5"2 and have a short torso so I'm always in the lookout for crop tops. The length on this was perfect plus the adjustable tie string made it extra flattering to hit right at my waist. Lightweight and breezy and easy to pair with lots of options. May purchase!

links_reviews_title: Every day, versatile top for summer
links_reviews_text: Nice & versatile top, wore to work mostly fully pulled down or it would show midriff ;-). But that look could be cute for a day date/lunch or night out with jeans & heels. Material is very light, so only rent this in summer! Not see-through. If wearing to work though you could add a black vest under. Only negative is the button at back is a little fiddly to do up, but it's fine if you leave undone.

links_reviews_title: Nice print, like the tie (less so the neckline).
links_reviews_text: This is a fun, lightweight shirt. I liked the print and tie, but didn't love the neckline and how the sleeves sat on me. Was cute with a denim skirt.
Wore this for a day time block party with ripped jeans and sneakers and I also wore at night with black leather leggings and heels, I loved this top!

This is a lightweight top with an adjustably scrunchy line running down the middle (you can make the cinch tighter or looser). I loved the pattern and longer sleeves as it it's good for hot weather and sun protection. This was a fun top to go out in and looked great with heels.
Totally adorable, love the top but for me my breasts felt too big in it and filled up too much and created an annoying shelf. Oh well. So cute though!!

Runs really small. I ordered my regular size 4 and a back up size 6 and I'm sure glad I got a back up. Even the 6 was really tight where the black band is then it's very loose on the top. Overall pretty dress and I got a ton of compliments but size up

links_reviews_title: Tricky fit, but ended up working!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. I'm a size 4, and I wore the 38. I have a pretty small waist, and when I say that this was tight, it was super tight! It's the black straps that have absolutely no stretch to them and make this a difficult dress. I wish I would've sized up, but I wonder if that would've made the top way too large. In the size I got, the top was so roomy that I almost needed fashion tape to secure the V-neck. The length was short, but I loved where it hit! The zipper was so difficult--almost thought I was going to break it because the black bands were so thick and hard to get over with the delicate zipper. The colors are fantastic in person, and I got several compliments. No regrets, but it was a close call with how tight the black bands were!
Big at the top
Definitely get a bigger backup size, this was really tight around the rib cage making the zipper very difficult to zip up. It's a very cute dress!

The fit was as expected, per other reviews, the black waist is unforgiving but luckily it fit perfect for me. The top is loose and as a smaller chest, with a black bralette it worked well. The dress is shorter and felt short but didn't necessarily look like a mini. It was comfortable and added a little something for the rehearsal dinner.

Fun shape and pattern! Waist is definitely small and I have a tiny waist. However I was surprised that even though I have a very large bust this dress still covered me well! Was perfect for a night out in Mexico!

I really loved the way the dress looked on me- I rented it for Easter dinner and received so many compliments! I ordered a size 40 and 42 - both fit me about the same but I ended up wearing a size 42 because of the belt. I have a wide rib cage and even though the top and bottom are super loose fitting and flowy, the zipper and the black belt around the waist is extremely tight and I almost couldn't get it zipped. Once it was on it felt great but the Zipper was definitely very hard to get closed. I would recommend sizing up for this reason. The top also is made for bustier women but it still worked for me as long as I was careful not to lean over without paying attention. It's a little bit on the short side but not too bad. I would consider myself an average-small woman and I had to wear the biggest size....

links_reviews_title: Wore this out to drinks and dinner with a friend. Super cute
links_reviews_text: Fits a little tight on waist and loose one the bust. I would recommend wearing a cute black lacy bra that you wouldn't mind peaking, or use fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Such a unique, beautiful dress! I've rented it a few times and always get tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a little short and smaller in the waist, but it fit fine on my. The delicate pleating and gorgeous print really make the dress special.

This dress is super cute but not very roomy in the stomach area.. the material makes it super hot when worn but the dress photographs beautifully and I love how it looked! I'd recommend to wear this to an indoor event if possible!

Luckily, I was able to try this dress on prior to renting it for a wedding (as I visited the Las Vegas store front during the July 4th holiday weekend). I'm so glad this dress was available in store as I'm not sure I would have chosen it off the website! The fabric and the color was what initially drew me in- but the fit was extremely flattering, as well (thanks to the cinched, tiny waist and flowing skirt). I would definitely rent this dress again for another occasion if I was sure not to run into anyone who had previously seen it! Only downside worth mentioning - the arm holes are quite tight (guessing due to the structured tailoring of the dress), and I had to pin the top to be sure my bra wouldn't show midway through the reception. I don't recall having this issue with the version I tried in store, and perhaps someone with a bigger, er, chest could fill out the top in a way that wouldn't require this minor adjustment. :) Overall, a great rental experience.

I loved the colors of this dress. The dress does run a little small. I am usually a size four but I am wearing a size six in the photo. I would recommend gong a size up for the backup size. The wait and hips of the dress were very fitted but comfortable. I recommend going a size up for curvier women. The midsection of the dress was also very comfortable. The dress is great for an cup size. I am a D cup and the top was little big on me but was comfortable. It can be worn with a standard bra. I am 5‚Äô9‚Äù and the dress was mid-thigh length on me. This dress would be perfect for any party or celebratory occasion. Pair with black heels and a big necklace.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful style and material but very weird fit
links_reviews_text: The dress itself is gorgeous. The design is beautiful and the material is really nice. I loved the length and style of the dress however I just could not wear this. The arm holes are TINY so I felt like I had material in my armpits and there is SO much material on the upper half that it flares out in odd places. I'm a 32D too, so I would think anyone would have this issue. It may work for really talk slender women who can pull the dress down, but then again maybe not.

links_reviews_title: Sadly could not get the zipper up
links_reviews_text: Really cute but couldn't wear
This dress was way too small. Couldn't zip.

When I read the reviews, a lot of people said the black straps on the waistline were ~unforgiving, but this was no joke!! Literally almost got stuck in this dress - largely due to the fact that the left sleeve (zipper side) is completely sewn to the dress rather than connected via zipper like most, so it made it scary to pull back over your head when the black waistline had zero give to it. Also, just runs super small to begin with. I'd order 2 sizes up for sure!

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear the dress.
links_reviews_text: Dress is weird. It is very short and hard to get on. The fabric is beautiful and wanted it to work as I love the dress. I'm 5'5, 120 , 34 B, and it was still too short and odd fitting.
I'm a true size 4 with a smaller waist and was shocked that this dress wouldn't come close to zipping. Definitely runs a size or two way too small.

links_reviews_title: Very tight around the waist. I would go a size up.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric, but it was very tight around the waist & a bit short.

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress as a potential going out outfit.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful but the sizing is very, very small - especially at the waist. I think ordering a size or even 2 up could work but then the top of the dress would probably be too over-sized.
But only if you have Barbie's measurements. The waist is tiny with no give and the chest area is quite roomy. I ended up not wearing it.

The dress is beautiful and the material is pleated and heavier than I expected which was great. The black waist band is unbelievably small! I rented a 36. While it fit (26.5" waist) it was incredibly tight, not comfortable and awkward looking.
In another Carven dress I wore a 38. I could not zip this 40.
Too boxy, proportions are off.

The fit for this was so strange - the black band was fitted but then there was so much extra fabric on top it made me look too fluffy. It was on the short side, but wearable. Sad it didn't work out for me! For size reference - I'm 5'4" 140lbs

links_reviews_title: Looks cute, but fit is off
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress online and wanted to love it. However, I should have listened to the other reviewers as they were right. Fit is off, short, and runs super small.

As other users mentioned - the black band across the waist is unforgiving and WAY too small. I'm usually a 6 and ordered a Large just in case. It was still too tight and was super unflattering. Don't waste a rental on this.

I rented this for work followed by an event at a women's social club. Super cute idea, but the other reviewers were right in saying that the waist is SO small! I am usually a 2 and wore the equivalent of a 6 in this, and it barely fit! The top half though seemed to be a normal 6, so there way wayyy too much fabric everywhere. Was fine to wear once, but wouldn't rent again.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small! Adorable and will order a size up in the future.
links_reviews_text: Runs very small! Adorable and will order a size up in the future.

I received a 36, I'm 5'5 130lbs it looked like it was going to fit, the chest area was a bit blousy with extra room but the waist was so tight I couldn't zip it up at all:( returned it, the fit seems way out of proportion I didn't want to take the time to get a larger size bc the chest was way too big

I am usually a size 4 and read the reviews so I sized one size up. It still didn't fit me. However, if I would have ordered one size bigger, the top would have been BIG. I didn't like this dress. Returned unworn.
I really liked this dress but I could not get it zipped up so I didn't wear it. Be sure to read reviews on size because the middle is smaller than I expected with zero give because of the ribbon.
waist is very very small.

This dress is gorgeous and would be the perfect length for me, but unfortunately it's way too small in the waist. It seems to be made for someone with a narrow torso. I recommend to order up larger than usual.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress, but way too short if you are 5'10" or above!
links_reviews_text: I loved the look and fit of this dress, except for the length. I am 5'10" and decided not to wear it because it was right at the bottom of my butt, and loose fitting to where any movement would have exposed me! I normally would be OK with wearing something considered "short" but this one was way past comfort. Beautiful dress overall, but just wanted to give a quick warning for those fellow tall girls out there.

The dress is beautiful, and the fabric is great. Unfortunately, it is SO SMALL! I have worn skirts and dresses from Carven, and the 36 always fits fine. However, there is no possible scenario in which I could have zipped up this dress - not even close. If you want to rent, consider getting 2 sizes bigger than your normal size.

Other reviewers weren't lying about it running small. I rented my normal size because there was another dress by the same designer people had said ran small and I didn't find that to be true. I was able to zip this one up, but it's tight. However, the dress is very cute, the pleats hold their shape nicely, and the hourglass given by the slim waist is nice.

links_reviews_title: The black band is very tight.
links_reviews_text: pretty dress but the fit is very plain.
Too big in the top, too small in the waist, which is unusual as I have an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: SO pretty but way too small :(
links_reviews_text: This dress is sooo cute! I would've loved to have worn it, however it was super small. I would recommend ordering at least 2 sizes up!

I rented this for an adult Prom fundraiser. I was able to dance the night away in style and comfort. Body runs true to size in waist but a bit short in length. I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô5‚Äù so not super tall. Overall, I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: A simple process that made the night perfect.
links_reviews_text: I ordered two sizes to ensure I had something for the evening event. The dress is very forgiving and stretched in all the right places. I received numerous compliments and my husband couldn't stop looking at me. This was a great experience and I will use RTR in the future.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to dinner to a birthday party. Excellent choice. No bra. Sleeves were tight for reaching.

links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful and comfortable. I am 5'4" and length was perfect with kitten heels. I could not tell any difference between the 12r and 12p.

links_reviews_title: Ok dress, didn't do much for me.
links_reviews_text: This was the "safe" dress but the other one I rented gave me the "wow" factor I wanted. It hides lumps and bumps ok, it just felt boring.

links_reviews_title: This dress screamed elegance! I received so many compliments. The entire experience was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit was exactly as expected. The fabric is a little stretchy so that makes it very comfortable. Also didn't need to wear a bra which was a huge plus! You DO need help getting it zipped and unzipped. I don't think it's possible to do it on your own!! But for this dress - if I didn't have a husband to help, I'd pay someone! It was THAT worth it! I will Rent the Runway for every special event from this day forward! Oh...and the train is spectacular! Everything about this dress was wonderful!
