Fit perfectly, was comfortable, covered all the areas I wanted. Snug fit but stretched enough to feel good all night long.

links_reviews_title: Definitely a show stopper and it felt flattering.
links_reviews_text: Ordered 6L, it was not long. I ended up in flats and it still felt a little short (I'm 5' 10.5", 150#). Not a lot of range of motion with the arms. Sticky zipper but once it was up, it wasn't going anywhere. The cinching details up the behind added great accentuation and the ruching felt flattering after just having a baby.
I loved the fit and especially liked the ruching.
Compliments all night long!! The fabric is fitted but very very forgiving.
This dress is so worth it! I felt dazzling in it and got TONS of compliments, even from random strangers. This dress is the ultimate reason RTR rocks!

links_reviews_title: Wow!!! This dress made me feel so glamorous!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a black tie event at 4 months pregnant. I got so many compliments. It was the perfect dress and I felt beautiful wearing it.
The dress fit like a glove and was super comfortable. Yes you will need help with the zipper, but it's a beautiful dress!
This was my 2nd time renting and wearing this gorgeous dress. It's stunning! Tons of compliments! It's my new fave!
Fits great! Wore for a #blacktie #gala. Recieved tons of compliments and it for like a glove. Highly recommend it to enjoy some old-Hollywood glamour.
Very flattering and comfortable and with a different enough silhouette that makes it stand out

links_reviews_title: Fit like a dream. Comfy! No spanx needed!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. So photogenic. So comfy. Slip on/slip off. I had so many compliments the entire night. It was an amazing party and this dress was a perfect compliment!
Fit true to size. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and 154lbs. I wore 6L with 3‚Äù heels. Length was perfect. I did not like that I could not lift my arms or reach very far in front of my with the sleeves.

I rented this dress for a formal sneaker gala and it was perfect! It was very comfortable and had great stretch. I probably could've went down a size as the top part was a little too big, but I worked with it. I usually have this problem at times as my top is smaller than my bottom portion of my body. Based off of the reviews of sequined dresses fitting a little tighter than usual, I went with an 18, but could've easily sized down.

links_reviews_title: A lot of compliments. The dress is so classy and comfortable specially as pregnant as me.
links_reviews_text: The fit is good. Comfortable for sequin dress. Look very classy and fits well specially that I am 6 months pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments and felt beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I think it runs mostly true to size but definitely clings a little (I'm a size 8-10 and I ordered the 10-12, and wore the 10). So if you're feeling self-conscious about your midsection, I would go a size higher. I got a ton of compliments and felt it was the perfect dress for the occasion and evening!

links_reviews_title: Wow! Perfect fit, extremely comfortable. Very flattering for my figure. Felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Once it arrived I tried it on and with heels, it fit in the length. It was on a hanger and the weight of the sequins stretched it a bit... a waitperson at the wedding said you always lay sequins, never hang it for that reason... now I know. I thought I shrank overnight... with that said, I would rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Elegant long dress with give, but tough to zip!
links_reviews_text: I regularly wear a size 4, but wore my backup size 6 because I couldn't zip up the 4. I think the 4 would have fit me better around the bust once the zipper was zipped, but the delicate size of the zipper fob just made it impossible. Wearing the size 6, I had to wear a padded strapless bra just to make sure it didn't slip :) That said, got plenty of compliments and would order again.

links_reviews_title: Not having to run around trying on dresses was priceless. I felt pretty, sexy, and classy.
links_reviews_text: I felt glamorous. Perfect stretch. I am 5'6 1/2 and I wore 1 and 1/2 in. heel and it was perfect height for the dress it's a bit longer in the back then it is in the front which I loved. I liked that it covered my arms. It wasn't itchy because of the sequence at all. I wish I could purchase it. This is my first time using RTR it was on time, the packaging was great, easy to send it back. The communication throughout the process was awesome. I will use them for my next formal event in December. I also rented earrings and purse. Which made it easy breezy.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for my glamorous event! I received compliments from every person I saw!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly and was true to size for me. I am 5'3" and it was a bit long - since I was wearing flats I had to lift it up while I walked to be sure not to walk on it, but only by an inch or two. I wore it to a glamorous work event, and every single person I saw gave me great compliments - it was very flattering for my curvy figure and I felt beautiful all night. I already want to rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, wearable and perfect for my need!
links_reviews_text: Material is lined and rather thick so it hides bumps nicely. The top fit me high enough that I felt well covered and elegant. For all of the sequins, it was pretty light and didn't creep down during the evening. Great dress but even better experience with RTR! Excellent customer service and support!

This dress fits like a glove, the material is a bit stretchy and forgiving in all the right areas ( think mom belly & arms). I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù with a long torso and shorter legs- I wore 2‚Äù heels and the lenght was perfect! My only issue was the back seam kept inching its way off center.
This was my first RTN experience and it was great. Fit easily into both 2 and 4 but found the 2 on the shorter side for me.

links_reviews_title: My date! But the dress helped!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a black tie; modest and glam at the same time. Regular was long enough for me at 5'8. Only chose w sizes if you are curvy/busty. I had to Google to find what "W" sizes were.

The gown fit amazingly better than some of the maternity dresses. Wore this at 25 weeks pregnant, I had to size up to make room for evening bloat, that made the chest part a little loose. Didn't need a bra though.

links_reviews_title: I loved that the dress had shirring in front and the back. The dress had some stretch to it, also.
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small, especially on the sleeves. I usually wear a size 8, so I would order a size 10. I'm 5' 2" and 130 pounds.
This dress fit like a dream. It has stretch and the sequins don't seem to rub anywhere or make it uncomfortable. Could wear this dress everyday if I could!! Definitely a show stopper!
Loved wearing this dress to a black tie gala and received many compliments. It was comfortable and I felt confident all night.

What a beautiful dress! Compliments all night long! Only con is that there were a few sequins that scratched my back in one spot. True to size, although I probably could‚Äôve gotten away with wearing a 10. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2 185lbs.

This dress!!!!! I went to a formal dance in this gown and waltzed the night away! It hugged all my curves in the right way, and I felt absolutely beautiful. Several people complimented the dress, said I looked like a movie star. Thank you RTR for helping me have a perfect night.
Ran a little big I'm normally a size 2 but probably could of ordered a 0

I LOVE this dress. I got so many compliments on it. It's flattering and forgiving in all the right places. Very comfortable too. I could've worn a smaller size but the bigger size fit too so I went for extra comfort. The sleeves are perfect because they protect your arms from rubbing against the sequins all night. Cannot recommend this dress enough. The shape would be flattering on any body type.

This dress fit true to size. I am 5'8 and with 3 inch heels the 12R fit perfect. There is give in this dress and I loved the way it hid my flaws. The way the arms fit in makes it difficult to reach for things and do a lot of dancing, but not a big deal.

This dress is truly glamorous! It is snug without being too tight. I was not uncomfortable the entire evening. I received so many compliments but my favorite was "I won't remember anyone from this night but I will remember you and that dress!" I am 5'9" and wore 1" heels and it was slightly long enough to cover my shoes. The dress does have a small train. It is lovely.

links_reviews_title: Fun and flattering dress for my mother's black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: This was my first time using RTR and I loved this dress! I liked the arm coverage and the ruched material in the front and back was very forgiving. It needed minimal shape-wear and just a regular strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Hot dress, great for a winter date night!
links_reviews_text: Fit well, it's a wrap dress so it's adjustable. Maybe a little bug in the chest (would have been perfect with a bra but I couldn't wear one due to the low v). I felt really pretty in it. My dress had a small hole in the sleeve, but that's my only complaint. The fabric is thick so it's good for living someplace chilly!

links_reviews_title: Love it! Too sexy for work. But not too sexy for werq
links_reviews_text: This dress is mini-skirt short and dips low in the front. I wore it on a date and had serious cleavage reveal. I wore it for work with a bralette underneath to hide the girls. I loved the way it looked -- it has a faint stripe pattern to it that feels sophisticated. The shoulders are puffy and modern. It's constructed of a thick wool-like fabric and was good in a very cold, air conditioned hotel meeting facility. Next time, I will wear it with black tights for work.
I was sweatingall day. Dress made me very warm.i loved it though. If it was cheaper, i‚Äôd buy it.
I loved the idea of this style, but its way too short, even for just a sexy night out. And there were no buttons to keep things in place, literally untie the wrap and you're a goner.

links_reviews_title: Sexy chic, great for the date
links_reviews_text: Super sexy and chic, a bit short with deep V so you need to be comfortable to wear this. Great for the date & party. Wore it with ankle boots, but knee boots would be a killer.
Fit great but I did have to pin the wrap to ensure I wasn't showing all night but that is typical for me with wrap dresses. The fabric was a nice thick cotton that was warm and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a James Bond villain in this.
links_reviews_text: There is nothing I didn't like about this dress. The fit was great, adjustable and hawt. I wore it for my wedding anniversary and felt like I could take on the world. I know I shouldn't rely on clothes to make me feel powerful but YO, I legit felt good.
Sexy dress, but runs small
The chest area of this is so gaping I could not wear this at all. I'm all for #freethenipple but I won't go quite as far as having them not covered by any fabric.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pinstripe and love the quality of the fabric. Definitely would recommend!
links_reviews_text: Runs small.
Runs very small

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for big chests.
links_reviews_text: I could not get this closed in the front. Way too open. Wearing shirt under would have been a must. Sleeve length was weird and nothing about this dress felt comfortable. I wanted to love it. But I returned without wearing.
Gorgeous dress fits perfectly ! Can run a little tight around the arms and a little too short to wear with no stockings but loving it !

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but to tight for broad tall shoulders
links_reviews_text: Super cute, i may try the bigger size, but it was tight in the shoulders and across the collar. The rest fit like a glove. I'm 5'10 and 165lbs, this fits small.
great shape and cut, but a bit on the short side for work. mind the slit!
Not a ton of room for movement, but looks so cool. Have never seen or worn anything like this! Go for a size up if you're second guessing.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress!!!!! I wore it as a MOH in a wedding
links_reviews_text: I love this dress again it was perfect! I am 5'3" and 115 lbs and a 0 fit perfectly. I have a larger chest but still made it work. My only negative is that the straps were about an inch and a half too long. Luckily the dress held itself up so I was able to tack the straps down on the inside or else I would have given this 5 stars!!

Perfect for my daughter's photoshoot! Simply stunning! Perfect fit. If she had been dancing in it or anything else- the straps were a little long for her but for our needs this dress was amazing. Don't worry- she's sitting on a towel so no harm done to the gown.

I rented this for a client's portrait session, and it was PERFECT. She's typically a 0, so I'm glad we ordered the 2 as a backup. It was flowy and delicate and romantic, and we both are in LOVE with it. We used it for a portrait session, but I think it'd be GORGEOUS as bridesmaid dresses. I'd 100% order it a million times again.

links_reviews_title: Romantic dress for an engagement shoot
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress for my engagement shoot! I agree with the other reviews though, the slip underneath is a bit tight so I recommend sizing up as a backup. I went with the bigger size so the straps were super long and kept falling off even though I had tied it up. Thankfully it was just for a photo shoot, so it wasn't a problem but would definitely be annoying for an event.

links_reviews_title: Made me feel like a princess!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. I wore it to a wedding in Asheville, North Carolina. As others said, the straps were loose / would fall. I have a large chest & it fit nicely. I have a small waist and I was surprised at how snug it was around the waist, so might not fit others who have a different body shape. Overall I loved the dress!!

Wore this for my engagement photos, it made me feel like a princess. I normally wear an 8 or 10 however the 10 for this dress didn't even zip all the way up. Dress still worked but I wouldn't have been able to wear it to an actual event. I suggest ordering up a size. Still loved it though!

links_reviews_title: Great fit and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this as a bridesmaids dress for a wedding and got tones of compliments. As noted in other reviews, the straps are too long but easy to pin. I'm have a bigger bust so I felt like the top portion was a snug fit but still comfortable. I'm only 5,2 so the biggest downside was I was lifting the dress up a lot so as not to trip over it and I was wearing 4+ inch heals. Nevertheless I would highly recommend!

I wore this to a wedding as a bridesmaid. Like other reviewers mentioned the straps are long. Luckily, the dress fit me really well (wore the size 10) and I didn't really need the straps to hold the dress up as the waist fit perfectly. I normally wear a size 8 but sized up which is common for gowns. I thought the 10 fit well.

I loved this dress. It is simple, but can be easily dressed up or down depending on the occasion. I liked the boning in the bodice area. Straps were long, but overall true to size. Length was perfect for me.

I got this dress to wear to a black tie gala. I revived a lot of compliments! I have a larger chest, so I sized up to get the fit I wanted. I also wore 5 inch heels and the length hit the bottom of my shoes. The straps were a little long. Otherwise, the dress was perfect and I felt amazing in it.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for my photo shoot
links_reviews_text: Beautiful
Comfortable and fitted in the rib cage busy area
Wore for engagement photos, light and airy. In person it is slightly lighter color than online.
Straps fell off my shoulders and bust area was very loose. Fit everywhere else. Was long for my 5'3 self even with stilettos.

I wore this as my bridesmaid dress for a wedding I was in. My original dress couldn't be shipped so I received this one as a back up and I couldn't be happier. It fits true to size and is so flattering. The long is super long and it's easy to trip on the tulle, so even if you're 5'7"-5'8", I would suggest a regular.

I love this pretty blush pink dress by AMSALE! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and room in the hips. I believe it can work for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5‚Äô3‚Äù, the length hit floor length on me. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I absolutely love this feminine dress by AMSALE! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips making it super comfortable. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a NuBra or strapless bra. At 4‚Äô8‚Äù, the length hit floor length on me and was sadly too long for me to wear. The blush pink color paired with the chiffon skirt give this dress a feminie and romantic feel making it the perfect summer wedding dress. Pair with nude heels to complete your look.

Fit well. Only problem was that the straps were very loose and kept slipping down my shoulders the whole night. Longer than it looks in the model photo so the length was perfect in my opinion (i'm 5'7")
zipper is hard to zip up, besides that it's great! Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Straps are way too big/loose and slip down constantly. The length & fit were great, couldn't zip up
Dress was beautiful! We rented it for formal family pictures.
links_reviews_text: The straps are really long! You can tell they have been pinned a few times. Thankfully my daughter's hair is long so a hair tie worked to secure the straps together & not be seen... All in all though, a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this dress, wasn't the wow factor I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: Dress is definitely a LONG, was several inches too long for me. The straps were also really long, 2 inches would have needed to be pinned down to make it work, unless my torso is especially short. I should have ordered a 6R.

links_reviews_title: So so so small around the bust!
links_reviews_text: Couldn't even wear the dress to my event. I ordered a 14 and a 16 because I‚Äôm usually a 12 and I know Amsale can run small. I was unprepared for just how small they run. The slip under the tulle was a struggle to get down my hips and it clung unforgivingly to everything. Then the bodice was so tight around my bust and wouldn't zip BUT somehow my chest swam in the massive cup of the bodice. A wild and wacky funhouse of a dress.
Youthful look for my teen daughter

links_reviews_title: I have never been so in love with a dress. It was everything I hoped for.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a grown up version of all your ballet dreams. The blush is perfect, the underskirt is slim but still worked for my ample backside. The tule overlay is just as elegant and lovely as it seems. It's not too much. It flows a little and at 5'9" touched the floor a bit in flats, but was perfect. It's a very deep neckline so I needed body tape and wore a slim leather jacket. It was more revealing than I would normally wear but it was fun! At 5'9" and a curvy 160 lbs. the size 10 was perfect.

This dress runs a little bit on the smaller side in the ribcage/chest area. I am between a size 2 and 4, but generally with gowns, I can fit into a 2 as long as the bottom of the dress is a bit looser. This one... nope. There's almost no give in the torso, so I couldn't zip it up all the way. That said, gorgeous dress.
Tight on the bodice unable to wear it. Very beautiful and romantic look.
Loose straps and too long.
Wore this for a wedding, the straps are way too long but I pinned them up. gorg color very flowy. Its long (wore with flats) so I had to lift as I walked but I didn't mind.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, under layer no give
links_reviews_text: This dress is lovely but the under layer was extremely small for me. I have large hips and the under layer wouldn't fit over them! The top runs a little snug as well. I couldn't wear either size I ordered.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like this dress!!! It was both too BIG and too SMALL!!
links_reviews_text: Some reviews said it ran small and some said the chest was big, so I ordered up with a 16 and 18. I'm really a 14 now, and have a decent size chest so I wasn't worried about the chest being too big. Omg was I wrong. The waist is SMALL, and the top is HUGE. I had to wear the 18 so I could zip it and we had to hard core pin the top so there want a 4" gap between my chest and the dress. It was so bad I ended up wearing a shawl over it... and I was a bridesmaid so not ideal at all: such a bummer. I can't even recommend how to size this for anyone.. while I'm not super thin, my body shape is one that typically stuff fits me at the right size, or sizing up. I literally can't imagine either the 16 or 18 fitting ANYONES body type. It was bizarre. I'm lucky my sister, the bride, didn't care what the bridesmaids wore
This dress was absolutely gorgeous. Runs small so I couldn't wear it and the straps were very long , but very very pretty. Princessy without being childish

I wanted to love this dress. The dress runs very small in the chest. I am a 36DD and I could not get this up to zip. Seemed roomy everywhere else. The material felt nice. This was disappointing as I love tulle! If you are busty and curvy, I would recommend renting something else.
This was sent as a back up but really just fit weird. I was afraid it would be shorter from the picture but it was a nice length. I did not end up wearing this dress.
it was very long. I am 5'4" I am between and 2 and 4. It is built for someone tall.

links_reviews_title: The dresses made all of us bridemaids look gorgeous from the front.
links_reviews_text: #1 con is that the straps are NOT adjustable.

Based on reviews I ordered a size 14, I typically wear 12 or 14s in dresses. Because the style of the bodice is fitted, the 14 ended up being too large for me. Straps were too long and my small chest did not hold up the bodice. I ordered the 12, and 10R as backup. I couldnt believe it, I actually ended up wearing the 10 as the bodice and straps of the 12 were still too big for me. The length was a little shorter than the 12, so I went with heels instead of flats, looked great and while the 10 was very fitted, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too fancy for the wedding I was to attend.
links_reviews_text: The dress is a beautiful pale pink and fit like a glove. Truthfully, wearing it made me feel like a princess . Ultimately I did not wear it to the wedding because I thought it would be too formal for the occasion.

The dress is a really beautiful blush. It was perfect for being a bridesmaid, and I received several compliments. I liked that it was simplistic, yet sophisticated and fairly comfortable. I only had two major issues with the dress. As others have mentioned, it is floor-length, which is much different from the picture where it stops at her ankles. I ordered a dress in long, just in case, but it wasn't necessary, because the regular fell perfectly with my heels. I wish I would have known that ahead of time, because I would have ordered the second one in a smaller size, rather than same size, but different length. Additionally, the bust was quite large. I have a smaller bust, so it felt as though I had to keep scooping the ladies up just so it didn't look weird. Overall, though, this is a beautiful dress and if you can work around some of it's quirks, I think it would work perfectly for any formal occasion.

It was a really pretty dress but the straps were way too big and non adjustable - I couldn't wear it. You definitely need a larger chest to fill it out, but for me personally it was way too bag up top. But other than that it was pretty and I would've liked to wear it.
Really loved this dress although I went with another because it was SLIGHTLY too long. It would have worked if I were a couple inches taller, as I planned to do tall heels.
Loved this dress! It's so classy but still fun. Wore to wedding and got so many compliments. 5'2 150lbs 36DD. True to size, rented 8 and for perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great fit very comfortable. Very pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: Great dress I had no complaints.

links_reviews_title: Amazing Gown! Great Fit! Simple but Elegant!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this style gown, I usually wear a size 10 but the dress runs large which I found out once I tried it on, so I sized down to an 8L. It fit like a glove, hugs the curves and is not too lose and not too tight. What I did notice that for the wedding I wore it too as I would walk the dress would twist on me and the high/low portion of the dress would be on the side instead of the middle. That was the only annoying part about the dress. But I got lots of compliments on this dress! It's so simple but elegant. I suggest ordering two sizes and go to your nearest rent the runway store to try it on like I did! They were super helpful and I had a great experience.

links_reviews_title: Easy to order. Received on time and the return process was easy.
links_reviews_text: It fit like it was made for me. The length was perfect and it was elegant and I receives many compliments. It was easy to move around and dance in. I absolutely loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Shocked how much I liked this dress on! It‚Äôs gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as a backup for a gala. The dress is perfect however loose around my torso which is usually never the case. I have unusually thick arms and did not have an issue with the sleeves however.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments, it felt amazing too.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, I'm normally a 4 and that's what I ordered. I'm 5ft 1 inch and I wore 2 inch heels and the length was perfect. Also it was a little chilly in the room and the top was just the right amount of coverage.

Loved the navy but overall a lot going on with this dress. The high low is fun as is the mesh, but seems to be too much once you have it on. Plus it was very large in the butt for me so went with a different option. I do like the length for us tall girls tho, I'm in 2 inch heels in this photo!

Wore this to a NYE party and it was beautiful. I'm a 38 DDD, 5'5", and usually wear 14/16. The sleeves were a little snug but it wasn't a deal breaker. My only issue was that it kept spinning opposite of my shaper so I had to keep running to the bathroom to move it back into alignment. I would suggest shorts shaper (if you require one) or wear it without the shaper because the fabric of the lining coupled with the material of shapers create fashion drama ;) Other than that I loved the dress and would wear it again.

I ordered this just a couple days before my event, so options were limited, but I was very happy with this dress. I am reliably between sizes- 8 on bottom, 10 on top and this was true for this dress as well. The 8 fit perfectly on waist and hips, but was tighter in shoulders and chest. I wore the 10 for comfort on top, even though it was a bit loose in waist and hips. The train of the dress just touched ground in 2" heels (I'm 5'9") could have gone with long, but was ok with regular length. Easy to move and comfortable to wear all night.

links_reviews_title: Great option for a formal event
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this one because I found another option I liked better, but this one would have worked fine. Fit was great, loved the bottom and nice details on the top. Sleeves were just a tad snug, but would have been fine.
The fit was small. I'm usually an 8 but the 10 fit like a glove! I felt so glamorous

What's great about this dress is how modest it is. I rented it for a work gala and I was never worried about pulling up a strapless top or where my bra straps were. It's gorgeous and very slimming. The only drawback is the mesh top really limits your range of movement so you won't be able to do any big reaching or moving. I would totally rent this again!

links_reviews_title: We had 3 formal nights on our cruise and it was so fun to get all dressed up!
links_reviews_text: The dress looked lovely on however it had some built in bra pads that were sewn in and not adjustable but they were creased with big wrinkles in them. I wore the dress anyway as I felt with the dark color the creases wouldn't be too noticeable but I was self-conscious. I think this was just an issue with this particular dress.
Wore this to a wedding, I‚Äôm pretty curvy and it hit me in all the right places. Lightweight fabrics with a tiny bit of stretch so it was really comfy all night to wear.

links_reviews_title: cute dress, lots of compliments, runs small
links_reviews_text: So I ordered this dress in an 8R and 10R. 8R is my primary size. However, they sent me a different dress in 8R and this dress in 10R for some reason? It ended up working out though because the 10R fit well. You could fit into your regular size but the 10R is a bit baggy which is perfect for someone like me who wants to hide a bit of tummy. Dress is great if you have a small bust. I've seen reviews complaining about it being too tight around the chest; fit perfectly for me (36A). It was a bit restraining; could not bend down or move arms too much. Dress did not drag on the ground with a 2 inch heel. Got lots of compliments, said it fit my shape well. Went well with silver accents and the very unexpected but amazing Homecoming Queen sash and crown!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my mom to wear at my wedding, worked perfectly. It looks even prettier in person.
links_reviews_text: Only con is that you need to wear a strapless bra. My mom was not into that so she wore tan & you could still see the straps a little.
I'm 5'10 so the Long was necessary. Little tight in the arms (but I'm very broad shouldered. Flattering and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This mermaid style is very flattering and the scuba fabric is sleek. The navy blue was a nice alternative to wearing black. I'm a little thick in the middle, but this dress hugged nicely.

links_reviews_title: I was the Mother of the Bride and this dress was perfect
links_reviews_text: I had imagined myself in a ball gown for my daughter's wedding. But it didn't work out. My back-up was a completely different dress and I was disappointed when it didn't all turn out as I hoped. Then I tried on the dress, the right shoes and hair and I knew that wearing this dress was meant to be. It is not a typical short front long back dress. I had it on for almost 12 hours and it was a perfect day and perfect dress.

Very pretty dress but runs small through top and arms. Also has sewn in cups that are very small. Not made for a large chested woman. I would have sized up in this one if I could have. But i made it work for my black tie event and received several compliments on my dress.

links_reviews_title: The dress made the event unforgettable
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove exactly for your figure . Super comfortable I felt like a princess . And it moves with you it stretches with your movements . The sleeves where a little tight but not a big issue.

The dress was a great length with heels it hit just above the ground that it was not dragging. The abdomen area was very bulky. This surprised me because the size I wore was a 2R and I usually wear a 2/4R. I liked the weight of the material it was not overly heavy for the amount that was at the bottom for the high/low effect. I was underwhelmed by the lace at the top. it was ok. I was hoping for something with a bit more detail but that is my fault for not looking closer. The dress itself if beautiful. My 4 star rating is because of the odd bulky middle but the dress fitting everywhere else.
This dress overall was beautiful! I got it as a back up dress and decided not to wear it. The arms were a little too tight for me and I wasn't a huge fan of the high-low in the front.

Was not the dress that I had originally ordered... but ended up being very pleased with what the stylist sent in its place. I am quite busty (34DDD) the 10 was a bit snug around my chest; however, the 12 fit perfectly. Very pleased with the dress overall. Wore this for a friends 30th birthday - masquarade ball.
This dress was a great fit and very comfortable. I got a lot of compliments. Great for my curves.

I rented this dress for my sons wedding. It was perfect for the mother of the groom. I rented the 10L and my backup was the 8L and it was like it was made for me. I was nervous as there were no reviews on this dress yet but I am so happy I didn't let that stop me. I have lost weight so I wasn't sure what size I would be but I feel like the 8L was true to size and length. The dress was classy but still sexy and fun. It was very well made and very forgiving. I danced all night.

I wish I had gotten my regular size plus one size smaller instead of one size bigger. The dress has a lot of stretch and I would have preferred a bit tighter fit on the hips and bottom, but it was still gorgeous and very appropriate for the occasion!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't even fit my arms in it
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress, ordered a 16 I'm normally a 14, figured that getting a bigger size would help with it fitting my chest as I'm biggest there. The arm holes were way too small for my arms to even get past my elbow. I couldn't even get the dress on all the way. If you want your feelings hurt by a dress, this is it.

This was my back-up dress choice. I did not choose it as my first choice was fire but would have been sad if this was my only choice. It was itchy up top, a tight 6, and the color was a bit drab. It looks way more royal in the photo than in person.

I found this dress to be the right type of conservative for my formal event. Very comfortable and stylish. The zipper stuck a little on this particular dress so you needed to be gentle with the zipping and unzipping. The dress is quite fitted so not sure how it would look on someone with more curves than me.

links_reviews_title: I would love it if it fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress was one of three options I ordered for a work holiday party and the only one that I couldn‚Äôt get on. It was tight in the hips but the arms were so tight that I couldn‚Äôt get it fully on at the top. The mesh part has no stretch unfortunately, and I ordered the largest size available (a 16L). The dress itself seems like it‚Äôs quality, but not convinced I would like it even if I could get it in the right size.

I loved the color, style, fabric, everything about it. This is my third dress from RTR. I wore it to a wedding and received many compliments! The only small detail was my hips weren't "enough" to fill in the hip area. It was either having a tight dress around the hips or a tight chest area, but other than that I loved the dress. Thank you RTR! You've done it again.
This dress was a heartbreak for me. I love how it looks on the model, so classy and elegant. My size 6R was too big and made me look like a mother of the bride.
Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so flattering to curves. Body skimming with substantial stretch yet forgiving fabric
links_reviews_text: Nipped at the waist and accommodating to curves (hips, and booty). I am 5'0 140 32DD hourglass shape and the fot was perfect with 3 inch heels. The only complaint is that it was difficult to zip over the waist seam. The arms were also quite tight. Beyond that, it was perfect for a benefit gala I attended.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to an outside wedding. The dress was comfortable and really pretty.
links_reviews_text: Fit nicely and true to size.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but slightly baggy in the top.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous form fitting dress, however I did not wear it because I absolutely loved my other rental style. I found this dress to be true to size, though the bust was a little loose on me. I rented a size 12 and I'm a 32C. I could see the arms being a little tight for some people as they do not stretch AT ALL.
I really liked this dress. I was the perfect length, I am only 5'3, and it wasn't too long. However it was a little too big for me in the top so I did not end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Interesting dress but I didn't end up choosing it for the event
links_reviews_text: The 10 was too small and the 12 a little too big
Truly my favorite dress I've ever worn to a wedding as a guest. Perfect summer and southern dress for a wedding in South Carolina!

links_reviews_title: Great for a classic brunch shower! Lace was so pretty!
links_reviews_text: Sheet up top so good with a strapless bra. I love the length, might be best for tall girls!

This dress is to die for! I'm a total yellow-lover and when I rented this dress for a wedding, I was keeping my fingers crossed that it would be as beautiful as it seemed in the pictures/reviews. It met and exceeded my expectations! The quality of the dress is very high--from the beautiful stitching & unique embroidery, to the weight of the fabric and length of the dress. Everything was as described, and I was extremely comfortable all day and night. I couldn't count the number of people who complimented the color (or dress in general). It's a rich yellow and it really stands out. I wore this Sept 14, and originally I worried the color would be too summery. But I didn't need to worry, the dress was so gorgeous and fit the festive day. I wore it with 3 inch heels and small freshwater pearl necklace & earrings. I didn't think the dress needed much, due to the great color and embroidery! Definitely would highly recommend!
Super comfortable and easy to dance in. Perfect dress for me since I was 10 weeks postpartum so it hid anything I was insecure about.

links_reviews_title: I felt like Betty Draper for an evening.
links_reviews_text: This dress was truly comfortable yet elegant. I felt like it fit the event perfectly and is a color I wouldn't typically wear or buy for myself. Great cocktail and dancing dress. And the perfect amount of 'dressy' for a September wedding.
Loved this dress. It's nicely made and perfect for a summer wedding. Lots of compliments.

I love this dress so so much! It's the perfect yellow and has a lot of volume! I'm worn it as is, with leather and with a denim jacket and it looks so cute with everything. It's beautifully ornate and can be dressed up or down (within reason).
Rented this for a friends Indian wedding. Great color and no spanx required. Very comfortable to wear. The material was heavy but was perfect for a summer day.

This dress did not look great on the hanger, but once I got it on, it was a stunner. I wore it to a wedding shower and considered keeping it. This dress is a heavy fabric and the structure makes it dressier than I thought. Probably too dressy and cumbersome to wear to work, but perfect for an event. I'm a B/C cup and the chest was a bit tight, if you are busty, I would go up a size. I'm 5'3 and the length would have been okay with flats, but much better with wedges.
Great fit, well made.

links_reviews_title: Nice formal dress. May be better for taller girls.
links_reviews_text: High quality material and felt quite formal. The yellow embroidery is very bright, which is fun for summer, but the thickness of the material made it a bit warm for a July wedding. It fit very well and was comfortable but I think it looked a tad long on my short frame. I am 5'2" and wore 3 inch heels. It was a little tricky for me to dance in (it felt like there was a lot of material to move around and I would often grab the skirt and sway it as I was dancing), but overall a good dress!

While the dress was a bit heavier and it was record heat in NY, this dress is still fabulous despite some of the mixed reviews. I loved the color and the fabric pattern, the pleating and the hemline being slightly higher in the front. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding and stood out in a sea of black, navy and gray. I would definitely rent again.

This was a backup replacement dress when my original order didn‚Äôt fit right. The dress fits PERFECTLY. It‚Äôs longer than I expected. I rented the dress for a beach wedding, so considering how heavy the material felt just on the hanger I knew this wasn‚Äôt going to be the dress to wear. Luckily I had the other replacement which also fit like a glove. This dress is beautiful, but I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs very flattering on me though. I personally took one look at myself in the mirror and felt like a little girl playing dress up. I would not wear this dress, but I would recommend it as a great spring dress when there‚Äôs a breeze and a slight chill in the air. I could barely keep it on for 5 minutes in my apartment and it‚Äôs only June heat right now.

links_reviews_title: This dress was summery and fun to wear! I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely on the tighter side in the bust. I do not have a large chest, but with a bra it was rather tight. You could probably wear it braless. I think overall it was flattering, although the material is a bit bulky and it kind of hides your shape below the waist. This could be good or bad, I suppose. I wish it has been a little tighter under the bust to give me a bit more of a figure but overall I was really happy with it. I got compliments all night!
Everyone loved it! It was comfy and perfect for dancing! Fit true to size and was able to wear a regular dude bra without straps being visible.
Lovely heavy material, well made and elegant. Beautiful color for a daytime bridal shower.

I LOVED this dress so much, I was so sad I had to return it! I got so many compliments on the fit and color. I have a very small chest, so I didn't wear a bra- it flattened me even more than I already am, but I was fine with that. Very fitted on the top and flairs at the waist, which is the fit I like best. I'm typically a 6, depending on the style (wider hips), but I was able to wear a 4 in this dress. I would highly recommend!! I hadn't had success with other RTR dress sizes, but this one was great!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments from total strangers!
links_reviews_text: I wore to a June wedding. Fabric was breathable and I bought silver-heeled sandals to wear with.

links_reviews_title: The fabric was great and I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, the length was perfect with my 3 inch heels- RTR has not steered me wrong!!

links_reviews_title: Fun color and so many compliments
links_reviews_text: I was totally scared to wear yellow, but this dress was a hit! A lot of compliments for an early summer wedding. Fit and quality were really nice. A little tight on chest if you are bigger busted. Wish it had pockets!

I rented this dress as a backup for a formal affair (depending on weather). I didn't end up wearing it to that event since it was rainy and overcast that day. The lace is beyond beautiful. This dress would've worked perfectly for the black tie optional event had it been sunny and 80. It was so pretty that I had to wear it somehow though... so I put a jean jacket over it to dress it down a bit and wore it to an event at the country club. Fits perfect - all the right places to be flattering. Super comfy too!

Size 2 wasn't available so I took a chance with size 0 and it fit great. You definitely need help with the zipper. I'm 5'7" and 34B breast. It was tight on the chest, but I prefer that to hold up a strapless bra. I wore heals and the length is long, but elegant. I like that it's not tight on the belly. It's a heavy fabric and didn't wrinkle during travel. The color and fabric is very pretty.
Awesome length with a little high-low action but not too much. Elegant and perfect for an afternoon wedding. I did not need a because of the lining at the top. Incredible quality.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for spring wedding, very comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for a spring wedding. I was worried it would appear too white to wear to a wedding but when it arrived the yellow was very vibrant. The 0 fit great. I was able to wear flats. Recommend wearing a strapless bra to keep some shape up top, particularly if you have a small bust.

Fit great & very comfortable. I liked that I was able to wear a regular bra with this dress. Very classic silhouette in a fun stand out color. I received comments all night. I typically wear an 8 or 10 in dresses and probably could've sized down to the 8 as there was extra room at my waist but it was fine.

links_reviews_title: The dress was delivered very clean and arrived fast
links_reviews_text: I felt amazing in this dress and didn't want to take it off. The yellow had a pop and it fit so nicely. I definitely contemplated buying it
I wore this dress for our engagement photos and LOVED IT!! Pictured so well. Really flattering. A little tight across the shoulders but I have broad shoulders. 10/10 would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, unique dress, but fits tight up top!
links_reviews_text: *PROS: This was such a fun, unique, artsy dress. Fabric is heavy and flowy, definitely doesn't wrinkle! Very flattering if you're not hot about your tummy or love handles, as it flares out at just the right spot. Yellow color is lovely, even worked with my pale complexion. Can get away with regular underwear! *CONS: I wouldn't recommend it for anyone under 5'6" as it could get awkwardly long. Warning ‚Äì fits tight up top, if you're broad-shouldered or large-busted. And there's zero stretch. I ordered the 8 and 10, and the 10 was tight! (Should've gone with the 10 and 12, even though size 12 is usually too big.) I ended up wearing a very thinly-padded bra and a Spanx smoother and got away with it. Barely. (I tried no bra, and holy smushville!) Accessorized with royal blue tassel earrings, tan strappy heels, fuchsia toes, and a white bolero for a spring gala. Received several compliments!
Hangs lower in the back. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Unique dress with a lot of detail
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove, was perfect for Easter brunch. Received a lot of compliments, I guess I need to wear more yellow!
Lined on the inside. Need strapless or light color bra as its not lined at the neckline. Heavier fabric!
Moving in this dress, it swayed like a bell. I loved the lace and the cut. Very comfortable, just darling. The zipper in the back sticks a little but overall it's a must rent.

This dress was a good quality dress. It had some weight to it which I liked but it's not for hot weather. It also hit about an inch from the floor wearing flats and I'm 5'7. If you are shorter this dress may not work for you even in heels. The top fit like a glove. Bigger top gals might have issues. Overall if I had an occasion to wear this I would rent it again.
The dress was a great color and well made. At 5'1'' though it didn't do much for me. Would recommend for someone a little taller.

links_reviews_title: Tight in the chest but beautiful
links_reviews_text: Loved this but uncomfortable due to chest being tight.
Fit really well. I really liked this dress!

I wore this dress for a traditional Hindu wedding ceremony on the beach. I absolutely loved the fabric but I do recommend sizing up if your large chested, it gave me a bit of squish boob. I still got lots of compliments and loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beach wedding! Great quality and comfy fit...loved this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a beach wedding. You can tell the quality of the material is high, while also being very comfortable and wearable. It fits true to size. The back falls slightly lower, creating a pretty hemline. The pleats on the front give it a forgiving and slimming look. I was afraid the back pleats would create too much bulk, but it laid perfectly. I was able to wear a nude bra with straps, but a strapless would have worked too, because the bust of the dress is very supportive. I received so many compliments at this wedding about the look and the beautiful color. One guest told me that I "won the night" with this dress! It was perfect and I would rent this one again!

It‚Äôs beautiful pattern, bright and thick fabric dress. For petite, it‚Äôll run long. Back of the skirt hit at the ankle but hi-low hem makes it worth it. It‚Äôs definitely conservative and lacking feminine or sexy looks. I was disappointed that to find undone seems. I think quality is important so it should‚Äôve been check to fix and send it out.
Such a beautiful dress, elegant and flirty. The only con was the zipper is a bit tough and took a couple people to help - once zipped the dress fits great and is super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So much better than the reviews say
links_reviews_text: I really like this one! Unique, great fit, edgy. I needed a tank under for work, but thought it still looked great!
I bought sneakers to wear with this dress because I loved the idea of it so much. Thankfully, it lived up to my idea of it! It fit so well and felt luxe. I'll rent this many more times!
Great fabric-- heavy/substantial and moves nicely . A bit tight in the torso but super different colors and the bright swish in neon green with thin silver line is cool. Had fun wearing this one!

Beautiful dress with a sporty chic vibe. Dress was snug in waist in hips. The deep v neck adds a sexy element to the otherwise conservative style. This one is worth giving it a try. I was pleasantly surprised. I received so many compliments.

I loved this dress! Very lux and well made. The colors were a great pop without being too over the top. Bodice and stomach are very fitted, so I would size up if those are concerns for you. My boobs were definitely a little smushed, but I liked the contained feel of the top with the flowing bottom of the dress. Decent amount of cleavage, but I still found it appropriate for work. Great, fun choice!!!

I love this dress! I don't know how I'm going to rerun it. I felt great in it and received several compliments. It is pretty tight around the an area, so be ready for that! The pattern is unique and gives the black dress a nice accent so that it's way more than just a black dress. The lower skirt flows and is very feminine. I really love this dress!

This dress is gorgeous! But the chest and waist are pretty snug. I ordered the French equivalent of the size 4 and though wearable, it was not easy to sit or even breath in. The fun athleisure vibe of the dress was perfectly appropriate for an evening baseball game but it would have been easier if I had sized up. No hotdogs or popcorn for me that night! I wore it with Stan Smith Adidas sneaks and it looked great.

This dress is a must for your wardrobe. Very feminine cut that's easy to dress up or down. By now I've worn it twice. For a theater matinee and then dinner, with a black high heel sandal and for work with a nude flat and a jean jacket. But beware the cleavage situation. It shows some cleavage so might not be for everyone. Got a ton of compliments both times. Im thinking I might keep it. That's how much I love this drees.
The v is a little low cut but in a sophisticated way.
This is a very cool dress! The fabric is gorgeous and it drapes well. I would have kept it to wear but the top was just too big for me (and a pretty deep v).

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Compliments all day. It made my not so perfect body look amazing!
links_reviews_text: I should have sized up because it really highlights the chest and unfortunately the girls were noticeably busting out. I'm a b cup and they were stretching the fabric to the max. I wear either a size 2 or a 4 and I should have gone with a 4.

Fit - I am skinny, so this dress gave me a bit of a hip and I loved it! It is super flattering Pros - Super flattering and comfortable Cons- I don't really have a con. It kind of came down on my shoulders sometimes Helpful tips - It's thick, so keep it on a cool day/office type of environment
Teeeeeeny. I couldn't zip it, it was so tight and I'm usually a size 4/6.
Did not wear
This brand runs a lot small! I just wore a dress from this brand and it was a little right in the waist. This one I couldn't fit at all! Size up!

links_reviews_title: The way the dress is cut accentuated stomach
links_reviews_text: Not a flattering design

This dress is great but runs super small in the waste and bust area. I have small boobs and it was still WAY too small even though the rest of the dress fit and looks great. Will size up and see if that works.
Rented it in two sizes. Loved the stripes that accentuate your hips, but even the biggest size wouldn't zipover my boobs.
A holiday gem!
Fit great, sleeves didn't fall down, classy, many compliments received
Fits well. Vibrant color love the sleeves
I received many compliments on this dress! This was a replacement and I got a large based on others reviews. I think I could have went with the medium. But it still looked amazing!
The dress fit perfectly, and the sleeves made it so different. Everyone complimented!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 30th Birthday dinner & I LOVED IT! Received so many compliments! Perfect red dress!
links_reviews_text: I had issues with the top staying secure. No nip slips so it wasn‚Äôt too big of a deal! I felt so beautiful, sexy & classy wearing this dress. Wish I could‚Äôve bought it!
Apart from needing to pull up the front of the dress quite often, I really love everything else about it.
The dress fit like a glove. I'm generally concerned about dresses riding up or sliding down, but this dress stayed put. I was able to dance carelessly and be free of worry. It fit me perfectly.

I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and 122 pounds and I found the XS to be a perfect fit. It was a little snug around the chest but I do have a larger chest for my frame. The fabric is super comfortable and stretchy so I think this dress could work for a lot of body types. Only con was the bodice kept flipping inside out to show a black seam. I did have to adjust that a lot. But would still rent it again!
Loved this dress. It was super comfortable. The only downside was that the black straps kept popping out. It was perfect for me, but especially since the name of the dress is my name :)

this dress was the bomb.com. as acting head of the itty bitty titty committee, i had my doubts about its ability to keep the very small girls in check, but it stayed up and in place better than probably any other strapless dress i've ever put on, even though my Elaine from Seinfeld jerk-dancing. the sleeves didn't shift around/impede upon my moves either. hugged in all the right places. i felt like freaking jessica rabbit.
Glamorous and so sexy. A little difficult to zip because there's no clasp so needed help but fit great
This dress looked amazing on. I had doubts about whether it would stay on and be comfortable, but it was secure through hours of dancing on NYE.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments while wearing this dress. I felt amazing in it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect for my shape. I got a size 10 and it was too big or baggy in certain areas. The only issue I had with the dress was the hanger straps kept coming out.

This dress fit like a glove but was comfortable to dance in all night! I received so many compliments. This dress made me feel both classy and sexy. I‚Äôd rent it again and again. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10 and weigh 150 and have a C cup bust.

I wore this dress to my husbands holiday party and thought it was conservative enough for work friends, while still being extremely sexy. I felt amazing in it and got compliments all night. Only 4 stars because of those darn hanger straps!!! RTR please listen to these reviews and cut those straps out of all the dresses! They were the only thing I was self conscious about and had to constantly be looking down to make sure they were not popping out. I didn't have the guts to cut them out myself. They really take away from this beauty!

Great for an hourglass. Can be tight on the arms, but helps stay up. If your inbetween sizes like I normally am i always get a smaller size with my back up being the bigger size. Which I'm glad I did.. the small was a little tight but hit is all the right ways and the M was way to big.

The dress fit generally well. It was loose in the waist and hip area, but fit great around my chest and arms. (In fact, the elastic kept my chest in place, even while dancing, and fit just right--meaning it wasn't too tight or too loose). I wonder if going a size down would've been better, but nevertheless I felt and looked amazing wearing it! Oh, and the fabric is extremely comfortable!
This dress fit amazing and kept me warm on this cold winter night.

I wore this for my birthday dinner and after party. It was perfect! Love the fit, especially if you have an hour glass body type. It was super tight around my body, but , looked awesome! absolutely recommend!

Let me start by saying, I have NEVER loved a dress more than this one!! Being a girl who's always been self conscious of her arms and bust, this dress made me feel fabulous. The sleeves were a great way to keep the strapless part from slipping, and even with no bra and 32G girls, I barely had to worry all night! I felt very supported by the stretchy but firm material that going braless was not a problem. The length was also great--not too short not too long, especially since I was showing skin on top. I did have to end up going up a size, but a medium would have still zipped up fine, I just felt more comfy in the large.
Very cute and stood out at a party.

links_reviews_title: This dressing is a head turner! It is very flattering to curvy girls :)
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! I opted to wear the M instead of the L for a more fitted look. It's an AMAZING dress. You will not go wrong with this one! Compliments all night!
Loved this dress! I wore it for my work Christmas party. I wore a S but felt like it could have been a little tighter. I would size down!

Loved the stretch in this dress, enough to be comfortable but kept everything in place. The sleeves stay up and weren't bothersome. Being a DD, I didn't have an issue with the dress staying up. I'm only 5'1 and it hit me at the calf. I felt extra sexxxxxy in this dress and my confidence showed! It's a must rent!

I rented an xsmall and small and was planning to wear the small because I thought it fit better around my chest. As I walked around my house a bit I realized it was riding up and there was a huge bump in my back. I switched to the xs and decided to deal with the tighter chest. I'm glad I did. It ended up being very comfortable and I didnt have to keep pulling it down all night. The length was better too. The dress has some stretch to it so it was easy to dance!

links_reviews_title: Classic and comfortable in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I rented fhis dress for a February wedding and it was the classic, modest look I was going for. Didnt need to wear a bra, but did find myself adjusting the top because the straps to hang the dress kept popping out (and I couldnt cut them off like I normally would with pieces I own). It has plenty of fabric and give around the waist and hips so I didnt feel suffocated at all! I took a risk and ordered a Small with no backup size and it was perfect. I am 5'4 and 125lbs.

links_reviews_title: Way out of my comfort zone, but with some tweaks a cute dress!
links_reviews_text: This was one of two backups I chose once my original dress option was unable to be sent to me on time. Not something i'd usually pick, I was lucky that RTR accidentally sent me a L when I had requested the M because the M was definitely not going to work between the sleeves being too tight and not being able to lift my arms at all. Although the L sleeves were still a tad tight, it wasn't unbearable, as I think i'm just not use to wearing dresses with the style sleeve in general. The black lining underneath kept rolling over which I was unsure was caused by excessive wear or my chest not able to completely fill the L, but it didn't look too worn and I was able to temporarily fix this with Fashion Tape. Since I was sitting most of the time for this dinner date I was still able to work with it by covering alot of the black up with my hair (lol) but overall it was a cute dress that worked for the occasions and my bf still liked it so i'm happy with it. Probably wouldn't rent again (again not my usual style and I try not to rerent to keep things fresh lol) but I would def recommend it to others if that want that subtle sexy look and to stay warm. P.S. Forgot to take a pic in the L, so the ones posted are of the M!
Very flattering fit; first I was afraid the arms would be uncomfortable, but they were not.

I felt amazingly sexy in this dress!!! The small fit perfectly. I typically wear a size 6. Great quality and lined. Has some stretch to it, but not a thin material. There was room for boobs and I wore a strapless bra. Totally recommend this dress !!!!
Comfortable dress. Easy to wear. Felt like a bombshell. Not very forgiving if you have a stomach (which i do) but i still felt gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I produce the Annie Awards, which is a black-tie awards show for the animation industry.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11, 165lbs, 34DD, 28" waist. The medium fit fine, but the sticky hold-up edging on the inside of the top of the dress was black and kept rolling down to reveal itself, so I ended up wearing the large--which worked out, except that the material at the back bunched up at the curve of my back. Despite my personal quibbles with the dress, I received loads of compliments.
I wear a size 6 Im 5' 10" and 147 and the M fit perfect. Arm length was long enough too.

As other reviewers have mentioned, the dress is very comfortable even with a tight fit. I wore the small with a strapless bra. The material was a bit on the thinner side, so unless you have no belly at all, I think it will show and as someone else said, almost emphasize it. If you know how to pose I guess this isn't a problem, but there are plenty of pictures where it looks unflattering ( in my opinion) on me even though my belly is not that big. I tried to choose a photo where it showed it but wasn't horrible! That is my only complaint, but I got compliments from other women (always more important than men I think!) at the yelp elite Christmas party fundraiser I wore this to. Also the head of our local yelp voted my fiance and I best dressed! The color is beautiful and true to the pictures. The arms were not tight to me, and I could put my hand on my hip and it would not tighten up like other dresses I have worn in this style. Fiance loved it. I would consider renting again especially with the great price point.

This dress is sexy and sophisticated!! Loved the red color and style of the dress. I liked that the dress went past the knees. The sleeves were also comfortable and kept me warm. I also have a small chest but it made them look a little bigger in pictures!! I got an extra small and it felt like a good fit but it stretched out a little throughout the night. But other than that i was happy with it.

I couldn't have made a better choice, this dress turned so many heads and I got so many compliments! I wore this dress with rose-red suede heels and the color was a match. The material is VERY good- thick, and it stretches. I am 5'7", 38DD-30-45, 180 lbs. Size L was a perfect fit
Wore this for my work holiday party and it was perfect! Color pops, fits snug and accentuates all the right places. Compliments left and right ALL night!

links_reviews_title: Knockout dress but had to tape it to me/itself!
links_reviews_text: My first choice size wasn't available, so I ended up with just the Large (and a backup dress in two sizes). I felt the backup was too formal so I wore the Large, which didn't quite fit. I had the same problem that LOTS of other gals had, that the straps for hanging are just in the WORST spot. I tried to tape mine down the best I could, and had to tape the sleeves up as they were too wide for my arms. Once I got everything taped though, it worked out quite well. I felt SO glamorous and sexy and got tons of compliments!
Loved the sexy sophisticated vibe! Loved the streachy fit. Thanks to the previous reviwers, I pinned the hanging straps so it was no problem for me. Kinda sad i had to send it back.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my birthday and was complemented on the dress many times!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove! I it has a bandu on the inside so a bra is not needed for smaller breast sizes like I. It was very confortable and the material was streatchy and flatering to my curves especially since I am pear shaped.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and flattering, runs small so size up!
links_reviews_text: Ordered for bridesmaid dress where bride wanted white dresses. Ended up finding another one for wedding but this one was still super cute! I'm usually 8-10 and the 12 fits just right so I would size up. Would be great for bridal shower or rehearsal or just a casual backyard BBQ. Very versatile. Excited to wear on a date night tonight!

links_reviews_title: Cool, crisp, and pretty summer dress
links_reviews_text: This dress is a good contrast in proportions. The fitted bust with wider v-neck straps shows one of the prettiest and most elegant parts of a woman's body - her clavicle (I know!). That contrasts nicely with the full skirt on this dress. The volume in the skirt doesn't add weight like some empire-waisted pieces do, but felt cool, crisp, and easy to wear to a summer party in an exceptional heat wave. (I'm at 170 now, so the sizing on this is off)
I was unable to close the top two buttons over my chest. The rest of this wrinkle-prone piece was large and shapeless. Back it goes with the tags still on!
This dress was so comfortable and perfect for spring. Not the mention it had pockets

I wanted a crisp white dress for our more upscale vacation occasions; and this dress was perfect. Just the right amount of casual with eye-catching detailing. Love the high-low midi length, front pleating, and hidden pockets. Can wear it more relaxed with designer sandals or dress up with heels. The ironing and wrinkling of the cotton fabric does make this a little high maintenance; but would love to wear this again in the summer.

I needed this for a 'white party' but could not zip it up. It was too tight in the chest. I'm not busty so I'm going to assume it was just the wrong size. Will try again in a different size as it seemed cute.
Lots of compliments, great fit and style!
Great dress, thick enough fabric that the white isn't see through, but unwearable due to how small and ungiving the bra line is. I'm a 34B and could barely button a 6R.

links_reviews_title: Why does this button in the back?
links_reviews_text: Am I expected to have a servant to button this up for me or something? I guess I could do the buttons in the front and then spin it around like a bra, but the bust is so tight I'm not sure if it actually will button all the way. Straps are too long anyway so back it goes.

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear! Great for work or for a night out. May end up buying it !
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. Loose and comfortable! Not too long either.. which is hard to find as a petite gal
I really loved this sheer top! It wears well with black or dark jeans. It had a fun pattern on it, and is my favorite color for the season! Would rent again.
Pretty pattern, great color, sheer- wear a shirt under if it's for work. Beautiful blouse. Would rent again.

I wore this shirt to Thanksgiving dinner and received tons of compliments! My boyfriend told me to keep this one he liked it so much, but it really is a fall top so I decided not to! The top it kind of on the bigger side so I decided to tuck it in. It was perfect tucked in! Very thin fabric but adorable! Would rent again.
Cute top but very shear but very short so kinda awkward fit to wear with regular jeans.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on the top.
links_reviews_text: The fit is just as expected for a billowy top -- I recommend wearing it tucked in to high-waisted pants/a skirt as the shape on its own is unflattering. The color and material, however, are beautiful!
True to size. I could have gone down a size

links_reviews_title: loved it, wore it multiple times
links_reviews_text: loose, a little sheer but not problematic because of the pattern
I liked the sleeves but the shirt was cut at a weird length. The fabric also clung to every part of me in a non-flattering way. I ended up not wearing.

Cute blouse! Wore with a beige bra and black high waisted jeans for work and with a black lace body suit for drinks after. The only issue I ran into was that because it's a polyester blouse it got extremely stinky after a full day of wear! Not sure how to remedy that...

I really wanted to like this blouse. I loved the pattern and the cut of it, the smocking is fun, it is perfect for fall. I wore it a few times and never felt like it really made sense. It was a little too sheer for me, I felt like it had to be tucked in because you could awkwardly see too much of my pants/skirt through it if it wasn't. It was fun but probably won't rent again.
I am tall so the sleeves were too short. The fabric is sheer but also held static.

This dress has the perfect amount of stretch. It didn't bunch anywhere for me (probably because I ordered a large) and I felt warm on a cold night in NYC. I wore this to a broadway show and dinner/drinks for my wedding anniversary. It had the perfect balance of class and sexy for date night. I wore it with patterned tights and booties.

links_reviews_title: Love this first shipment. Made me go out of my comfort zone!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit!

links_reviews_title: The print reminded me of a deep, dark, enchanting forest. Unique dress.
links_reviews_text: Great little lbd dress that stands out due to the interesting print. Thick material so it's great for a cool evening. Went dancing in this. Hugs the curves and commands attention in a subtle, understated way.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a charity event, and it was a hit! Loved the way I felt in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, form fitting, tight, which I expected from previous reviews. Recieved a lot of compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect date night or night out dress!
links_reviews_text: This sweater dress fits beautifully. I can wear an XS sometimes but the small was perfect even for my petite frame. It is a perfect length for short women like myself. It does hug and show all bumps, despite the thickness, so I do recommend wearing shape wear.

Wore this for a formal party and received compliments all night! Form fitting and showed off all the right curves. Comfy as well and did not ride up a lot at all. I'm small chested so just wore pasties but had room for a bra if you want. I'm 5'6, 142 lbs, 34B bra and wore size small.

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, comfortable and warm for a winter party. Very satisfied customer!
links_reviews_text: Not too short for me, my height is 5‚Äô5 and the length was perfect. Material is very nice and not stiff.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. Wish I could buy it!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric, print and cut of this dress! Highly recommend.
I wore this to an NYE party. Very flattering, fit snug and smooth - hold you in type of fit. I love the dual colors of the fabric. No complaints on the dress, it was great!

I thought this dress was tasteful and sexy all at the same time. The sleeves were a little long for me but I didn't think it was that big of a deal. All in all, I had room to eat and felt comfortable in it so it was a winner!!

The dress is very flattering and the material is very high quality. I typically wear a small but I went with the extra small because I wanted it to be a little shorter and more fitted. Would love to own!

links_reviews_title: Unique pattern makes it stand out among the many "Little black dresses ".
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a fancy dinner I attended in LA. After reading the reviews, I got the Large and Medium as my back up. Was expecting the Large to fit but to my surprise was too big, even with my big butt and curvy hips. But the medium fit like a glove. This dress has nice thick material and has a lot of stretch. The pattern makes it stand out among the many "Little black dresses" out there and the long sleeves gave it extra warmth for the chilly night. I received sooo many compliments. And felt so confident and pretty in it. It was one of my favorite RTR rentals.
This dress was very cute and kept me warm while looking fancy!

This dress was awesome! It was extremely comfortable and flattering. It hugged all the right places and I was not self conscious as the fabric was nice and thick. The details were great, it would be perfect for work, a date, holiday dinner, or a girls night! Very versatile style that will not disappoint. I would love to own this dress!

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite dress that I've rented
links_reviews_text: I love the pattern, but the dress fit me weirdly. I'm 5'10 and 170lb and definitely an hourglass shape. I wish I could have combined the L and the M dresses. The M would have been perfect for my waist and chest, but was WAY too tight in the arms, of all things. The L fit my arms, but was bunching up under my bust and was almost loose everywhere else. I did like that I could wear a normal bra and undies and it was comfortable to wear while sitting (a huge plus), but as much as I wanted to love this dress, I really didn't.

links_reviews_title: Great for a party at a winery on a cold night
links_reviews_text: Fits great.. hugs curves in all the right places!
Cute, comfy dress. True to size

links_reviews_title: Great for a holiday work party
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit- it was form fitting but the thick material made it feel more appropriate and flattering. It was short enough that it wasn't a boring dress but the long sleeves and thick material made it feel coworker/boss appropriate. I wore the XS just because it felt like it hugged a little bit more, which felt like the way the dress was supposed to fit- the small felt almost bulky.
This dress was super comfortable and flattering at every angle. It's a thick material so it keeps you warm but still flexible enough to dance!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous yet simple dress that showed my figure
links_reviews_text: Ordered this dress for New Years Eve dinner only to have it become the dress I got engaged in! This dress was perfect for a nice dinner at a fancy restaurant. I'm short and very petite, but have a larger chest. I got the XS and there was no bagging in the back and the sleeves weren't too tight because of my chest. It was super comfortable and I highly recommend this dress!!
Must rent. Perfect dress! Wore with leggings and boots.

links_reviews_title: Hugged my curves in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! It has a lot of stretch to it but is a thick enough fabric that it didn't become see through. I wore it on New Year's Eve, (and it was VERY cold) but I stayed warm the whole night. It is longer than I wanted, so I just folded the bottom under the dress and it stayed.

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Super sexy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Little tight especially for the big booty ladies! Order size up! Very beautiful.

The medium fit super cute. But it wasn't very forgiven of my mid section...Sooooo, I opted to wear the Large. Still super cute! Not very much of a difference in the fit! I loved the dress and I didn't want to return it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Winter Work Social
links_reviews_text: Terrific dress. I was worried the black-lace-over-beige would be too sexy for a work party, but this dress is classy. Since it was a winter social I wore it with calf-high boots, boot cuffs, and a chunky gold necklace (also from RTR). I had a baby a couple months ago and am still a little "puffier" than usual, so I wore a shaper underneath, but even without it this dress works. It is nice and thick with just the right amount of stretch. Very flattering and super comfortable. Would rent this one again.

I rented this dress for a holiday party at neighbor's home that was "cocktail attire". I rented the xs and small and the small was so perfect that i didnt even try on the xs. The material does have stretch but it is very tight. Loved wearing this.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a cold weather company holiday party. Received tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I am a street size zero, petite and it fit like a glove. I had tons of compliments from men and women, classy and sexy. Thick material but very form fitting. Loved everything about it. This was my first experience with RTR and it was a hit.

links_reviews_title: I ended up loving this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was my back up dress and I had to wear it because my first choice dress was too small and then the zipper broke on my size up dress. I was worried this dress was too tight on me but I got so many compliments! It's made from a lush thick fabric so that your panty line doesnt show. It makes you look curvy in all the right places. It is pretty true to size. I am 5'2" and 100lbs. The extra small was perfect.

I wore this to my husband's holiday party. Received lots if compliments. I felt very comfortable wearing this. As I walked the dress would ride up a little so i had to pull it down since it was a work event but otherwise no issues and loved it!

Wonderful LBD with a fun yet simple print. The dress is warm and fitted but the material is very flattering! IÔ∏è rented the M but IÔ∏è have no hips, so the material was a little stretched at the sides and IÔ∏è didn't fill it out so I ended up looking wider than IÔ∏è am. One of my favorite rentals!!

Perfect for fall and winter dressy events. You can wear a blazer with it and make it workable or accessorize with black stilettos and take it out on the town. This beautiful black dress with nude hints is fabulously comfortable and eye catching.
Loved this dress and received many compliments! The wrists are a bit tight but the rest of the dress was great and thick so no spanx necessary. It kept me warm for this chilly fall wedding!
It felt tight at first & then it hug the body in right ways, i was suppressed by how fabric wrap me. It was interesting design & attention grabber! Highly recommend to rent it

This dress fit like a glove and was so comfortable. The pattern made it extremely flattering to my figure, especially w/a bit of a belly bump. It fit conforms to your curves, so w/the right under garments the entire look is lovely. The only con was sleeves were a little long.
Super comfortable but feels really elegant.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully printed, long sleeve dress for date night
