links_reviews_text: I wore this on a date with my husband for an early Valentine's dinner. I loved this dress and received several compliments. It is a thick, stretchy fabric that accentuates curves and sucks in at the same time. I would highly recommend it and felt that it was true to size.

This dress was simply amazing! I rented the small and xsmall unsure of which would work best. I tried the xsmall on first and it fit like a glove. I didn't even try the small on actually. Pros: it was form fitting but extremely flattering. The material was thick but not bulky and it was the perfect length for me to feel comfortable. I lack curves that are generally needed to fill out body con type dresses but this one seemed to work! (I hope!) it was easy to dress up with a pair of earrings and I felt completely put together. Cons: and these weren't even that big of a deal but the arms were a bit tight toward the top but not bad and it did ride up a bit through the night. However, it did my stretch out on me as a couple of others mentioned. My husband really loved it and he doesn't have much to say when it comes to my outfits so that in itself was great! I would definitely recommend and will be using RTR again in the future!

The arms were a little long and it was a little loose around the shoulders, but nothing to really complain about. It fit nicely every where else. It was comfortable and warm. It was about 20 degrees the night I wore it! Perfect dress to look nice and stay warm.
This is a thick dress that definitely pulls everything in! :) I had numerous compliments throughout the night!! Runs true to size. I'm normally a 2 or 4, the small fit perfectly! :)

I rented this for a bachelorette party that ended up being postponed for weather, and since it was on my Unlimited account I just turned it into an everyday look instead so the rental didn't go to waste. Love the dress - only downside, it was a but different of material than I imagined and didn't completely love the feel of it.
This dress fit great and was so comfortable. I loved the high low. It wasn't too dramatic but it made it less likely for me to trip while walking.

This dress is amazing. Beautiful textured fabric, photos don't do it justice. Skirt has weight but also is light enough that it has natural flow when you walk. Pockets! Fit like a dream and was getting compliments the entire night.

links_reviews_title: LOVED the pockets and the dress was so comfortable!
So glamorous! Everyone's favorite dress, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! Hardy.

Completely love it! Wore 3 inch heels and it was the perfect length. I am starting to get fat and it hide the stomach perfectly! No spanks no sucking in all night! The hem gives a great accent to it. The blue pops like crazy I love love love this dress...and IT HAS POCKETS!!!!!!

links_reviews_title: Charity event - felt like a million bucks
links_reviews_text: True to size. Very comfortable and looked amazing on. Pockets were great. Compliments all night

This dress was a dream come true. Gorgeous vibrant 3D blue flowers pop on a black background. Lining and fabric are a bit thick giving this dress a unique and beautiful structure. It floooooows when you walk. I had compliments from coworkers and strangers alike and felt absolutely beautiful. A typical strapless bra worked great and with the full skirt it is nice and comfy (and doesn't require any crazy shaping undergarments). Very well-constructed and the pockets are a huge bonus. I felt beautiful in this dress and highly recommend it.

Love the color, thick quality material and length (tall length perfect for me in flats at 5‚Äô11‚Äù) - very flattering cut and pockets to boot, one shoulder adheres closely so you avoid the omnipresent side boob or spillage from other lower cuts. Didn‚Äôt end up wearing for my event because it was spring but would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Compliments galore! Comfortable dress and simple gorgeous
links_reviews_text: True to size...I have very large breast and with a strapless bra had good coverage.

This dress was so glamorous and perfect for my work's gala event. I wore 3.5" heels and they worked perfectly with the long length. The pockets were my favorite part. This ended up being a backup dress since my original option was only available in a too-small size and they had to ship something else instead. So glad I chose this instead of my original dress! Lots of compliments throughout the night and I felt like a celebrity walking the red carpet!

Such a lovely dress. Ended up not wearing it, because I loved my other dress even more. Only downside I would say is the "pucker that occurs often times when I wear strapless dresses or like this one ‚Äì one shoulder. Just don't like that it kind of pushes all of my fat up and so then it rolls over the top. Obviously a personal problem & not necessarily the dress's fault.
This was a back up dress but loved it. I was 14 weeks pregnant so things were starting to not fit just right. This was perfect and forgiving. Great for ladies with larger chest.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this beautiful gown.
links_reviews_text: I was able to wear a bra and zip it up easily.

Glamourous dress, picked 4 dresses to try on for my formal black tie gala. Glad I picked this one as no one else had the same dress, I felt glamorous. I love this dress as it shorter in front and it showed off my new Christian Louboutins perfectly. So if you have a nice pair of shoes and want to show them off then this dress is perfect.
Dress was beautiful and fit perfectly. I am 5' @ 110 lb, 32 D.
Size up if you have a chest. No give to fabric. Gorgeous dress. Great experience as always!

This was a back up dress but it was still lovely. It fit a bit snug but I didn't need to wear a bra which was nice. I'm normally an 8 but wore the 10. It has no stretch so size up. I'm 5'6" and wore the 10R with 3&3/4" heels. Got a ton of compliments.
This dress fit true to size. Love the detail of the shoulder- and the high low detail.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a black tie wedding for two college friends in New York City.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit incredibly well- it was very comfortable and flattering, and I received a ton of compliments! Honestly, I felt like a princess wearing it. I highly recommend this dress. For me it fit true to size - I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù and 150lbs.
Fit-true to size Brocade comfortable Needed a 2P/2R little to long

links_reviews_title: Easy process to rent and return!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress! I loved that the higher front cut was still low enough to cover the knees while sitting and the length in the back is perfect so that the dress just skims the floor without dragging. The blue/black color mix is also a perfect match for the Army Dress Mess uniform. The only negatives are that the dress runs 1-2 sizes small through the ribcage/bust area, but has a very flattering cut and is very forgiving from the waste down. Pockets are a bit shallow... not big enough for a phone but held my lip gloss without falling out. Overall, great dress and I would recommend it to others.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress it was so comfortable and I received a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: Beautiful!!!

links_reviews_title: Stunning! I'm obsessed! Felt like a princess.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5ft1 , 123lb bust size runs 32-34D-DD. I rented sizes 4R and 6R. The 4 fit me perfectly! I had recently lost a ton of weight and wasn't sure what size dress I would be so I choose two dresses closest to what I used to be. I want to start off by saying WOW! I'm actually obsessed with this dress! The color is so beautiful and fits so unbelievably comfortable. The pockets are also a great addition as I didn't have to always have my camera or phone in hand. when I moved the dress flowed behind me so elegantly. I got a ton of complements, and the dress made me feel like royalty. I would absolutely rent this dress again! <3

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a formal garden wedding.
links_reviews_text: Love the fabric, love the fit. Appropriate for a 5‚Äô10‚Äù with 34DD body.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fit on top was comfortable and snug, and there was room on the bottom to easily walk and move around. It was a perfect dress for a black tie wedding, with pretty details (textured fabric, one shoulder, high-low cut), and enough uniqueness to make me feel like I stood out. Got several compliments, would definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: The wedding was at a Scottish estate and I felt like a princess!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9", 190lbs, 34DDD. This was not my first pick, but I am so glad I ended up wearing this dress. The cut is very elegant and the dress is very flowy and is so much fun to dance in! There was plenty of room in the bust and I elected to wear a strapless bra with it just for a better shape. I can't get over how great this dress was. The wedding was in a historical estate and I felt like I walked right out of a movie with how beautiful this dress looked. The color is even better in person, brighter than the stock photo. I didn't want a long, but that's all that was available. With 2.5" heels the back of the dress just touched the ground. I guess it just depends how tall your heels are if you need the long or the regular.

links_reviews_title: A dress to make you feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The color, the pattern, the cut of the high low was just perfect and the fit... it was super comfortable all night and for my weight it was a little (just slightly) big on top but I'm not super busty. This dress also really hides any post pregnancy weight. I got a ton of compliments and it made me feel both beautiful and fun!
This dress is stunning! Very comfortable and easy to wear with pockets! Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Very elegant and I loved the texture of the material!
links_reviews_text: Very elegant and I loved the texture of the material! It has a beautiful, flowy back, but at 5'2" (5'5" ish with heels) it got stepped on a handful of times -- just something to be aware of. I also would say you may need to size up depending chest. I have a small bust, but this dress was still pretty tight under my arms and if I slouched at all, it cut in pretty badly. At least it's a good motivator for good posture!

Gorgeous. I wore this to a gala and it was perfect and was easily one of the prettiest dresses. It was classy, showed some skin but not too much, unique with its one shoulder and detailed fabric design. Highly recommend. Fit my body perfectly. If you order it make sure to get the clothes shoulder side out in pictures (bare shoulder near friends) for full effect.
Fit perfectly! Compliments all night and the blue was stunning.

The top is tight and has no give for us larger top ladies. I went with the 10L and it worked perfectly. I can notmally rock an 8, so size up! The long was fine especially sonce it is a high-low front. Will 100% rent this again, I felt amazing in it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and perfect for the black tie optional gala I attended!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. I sized down which was the right choice. Fabric was very elegant. Loved this one!

Im a small 34C so this was perfect. The fabric is a work of art and I received compliments from everyone, even though this was a NYE new york gala so you know everyones look was on point. My BFs face when he saw me was priceless. Could not be happier with the dress! I got stepped on the train a few times but totally worth it, i loved the train. Easy to dance in. A+

Fit tts, pockets and beautiful blue color! Loved this dress-I usually wear black but I'm so glad I choose this. I received so many compliments. Rent it, you will love it. BTW-if you are a little chesty, order a size up.

This dress fits so comfortably! I wore it to a black tie upscale wedding and had many compliments. The pockets are fantastic and comfortable. The top fit nicely though a bustier woman may be less comfortable in this style. I highly recommend this dress!
I am 5'6" and 145 pounds and pear shaped. I could have worn the 6 but the 8 was way more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Compliments on how beautiful the dress looked. The fit was very flattering and the fabric was unique
links_reviews_text: #glamorous

The dress fit well. It was much nicer in person than in the pictures and it was a little darker in person than in the picture. It was a little big on top. I wish I had some body tape. It was very comfortable. Zipper worked well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but beware tight chest area
links_reviews_text: Really beautiful material that glowed blue in natural light. For someone my height (4'11"), this dress had a fairly long train, but that was ok. Wore 4 inch heels... Front of the dress came up to ankles, and it billowed out behind when walking. I got so many compliments on it. Wore to a black tie optional wedding, but would have been perfect for black tie as well. Given the train, not the best for dancing but I made it work. Also -- pockets!!! In terms of fit, I wear 0P for normal clothes, and would have taken 0R in this dress EXCEPT that the chest was very tight right underneath the armpits. Ended up with armpit rolls and the material digging in at the top of my ribcage, so sized up to the 2R. It was a little loose in the chest and waist, but still fine just not as slim fitting. My measurements are 33-26-34 with a short torso

This dress is so beautiful and well made. I got a 6 because the 8 wasn't available, and it worked but I think I would have preferred the 8. It was still comfortable and cute, and I loved the shiny fabric.

Cute little dress! It was slightly tight on the rib cage, with no give in the fabric. The pattern is shinier in person than it appears in the pictures. Short but not inappropriately so on a 5'10" frame.

This outfit was so great for work. Paired with a long cardigan and black heels I felt like a super model. Really unique and comfortable. The way the dress is hemmed makes your waistline really flattering
Loved the details! Most flattering dress!

This dress was INCREDIBLE for a fancier rehearsal dinner. I have a longer torso and wider ribcage so I could have gone with the 10 in that aspect but every other part of the 8 fit great. I was nervous about the shoulder cuts but it worked amazingly for a more athletic build. I cannot rave enough about this dress! In pictures I thought it was a navy base but it's actually black.
Loved this dress for family wedding. I loved the metallic detail. Made it pop. Very comfortable too!
Wore this for a presentation and conference. Very comfortable and fit well.

Loved the material - thicker quality! The print was beautiful - has a nice sparkle to it without being overly sparkly. The only challenge with the dress was that it was a little big in the chest. Would rent again!

Wore this to my husband's high school reunion. Very comfortable though I wish it had pockets. Received many nice compliments. Wore it the next day to a church function. It ran a little big on top for me.

links_reviews_title: Amazing brocade fabric and comfy fit.
links_reviews_text: This dress is really a must-rent! The cut is classic and flattering and the fabric is really luxe and unique. I ended up finding a great deal on this dress after renting, so now I own it! I initially wore to an office Holiday Party and another time to work on a regular day by layering a cardigan over it. It is shiny, so it might be a bit much for some events/workplaces. It's so classy, though, that I've been able to wear it several times! Check out all of my rentals and my outfits on my YouTube Channel, I often talk about RTR-related topics! Channel name: Pointe Boutique.

links_reviews_title: Rich tapestry fabric is luxurious and beautiful
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a mendhi (henna) party the night before a wedding and it was perfect. Traditional dress wasn't appropriate for me, but this tapestry gave a little nod to tradition. A line is extremely flattering. I am large on top and the size 12 fit me very well. There is no stretch to this fabric so you have to pick the right size. I got compliments on this all night and I felt beautiful wearing this lovely dress.
It was pretty but shinier than I expected. I also ordered a size bigger than what I normally wear and it was a bit baggy but not unwearable
Super pretty. Probably could have worn a 14 but the fabric doesn't stretch so I am glad I went up.
I bought this two minutes after I tried it on! A Classic Kate Spade dress and so pretty.
This was a very pretty dress, it just ran slightly large in my waist. It still looked amazing though - so many compliments!

Absolutely stunning fabric and loved that you could dress it up or down. The only thing it was missing was a belt and pockets but I just put a skinny metallic belt with it. Adored it though and it runs true to size.
Wore this for Christmas Eve and the jacquard fabric made it feel festive! Def loose in the hips which felt like too much material, but I did like the dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for work Christmas Party
links_reviews_text: This dress worked perfectly for our office Christmas party. Material is thick, length appropriate and has a bit of shine to it to make it feel festive. Fit nicely for my pear shape although definitely needed a little extra bust to fill it out completely ( I usually do...hello bombshell bra!) The bra strap clips are a nice touch, I just wish this had pockets like other Kate Spade dresses.
It was true to size for me. Would for sure order this again. It would make for a very cute new years eve dress.

Rented this dress for a few holiday parties- the print is beautiful and festive, and the dress fit true to size. This dress would probably work best for ladies with larger busts and an hourglass shape given the way it's cut. The brocade print has some sparkle and shine, if that's what you're looking for!

This was my first go around with RTR and I was really impressed with how easy the website is to use and how nice it is to see reviews of dresses based on people's sizes and pics. I had to attend a semi- formal charity event last minute where the theme was to wear something with the color pink in it so quickly chose this dress in an 8 and a 10. I was right in between but opted for the 8. If you are large busted like me I recommend sizing up. I wish it could have been a tad shorter. The dress was in nice condition and I received compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: Was able to dress it down!
links_reviews_text: This was a great party dress! I was surprised I needed the 4 since I'm usually a 6 or 8 in sheath dresses, so I'm glad I read other reviews. I will say even in the 4 it was large in the shoulders so the jacket kept it from looking ill fitting.

When I first put this dress on I was not looking in a mirror. I told my boyfriend I didn't even care what it looked like, because it felt so great. I wore it for a photo shoot at a work event, where I also did a TV interview. The gorgeous fabric was perfect for the "kicking off the holiday season" theme and the fit was great; not too short and flattering without being tight. I loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress!! Received lots of compliments - Fabric design was stunning and fit well!
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric but was was comfortable - I would definitely rent this again!!!
This dress is even more gorgeous in person! My only complaint is that I am in between sizes, so the 12 gapped a little under the armpits. Small small thing, but I would totally order this dress again
#wedding

I wore this dress to a wedding that had fall cocktail attire. The dress is super cute and pairs well with a camel shawl and nude/black heels. Cute dress but I've loved other RTRs more. Probably won't rent this one again. The pattern is irredentist and I received a bunch of compliments. If you're looking for a great dress, this is a solid option.

links_reviews_title: Classic with a hint of sparkle!
links_reviews_text: Rented for a formal affair and couldn't have been more pleased! Classic, cute and perfect fit. Just the right amount of sparkle. I'm 5'3" and 110# and the 0 was just right. My BF loved this one and said it was his RTR favorite.

I tried one photo with flash (and heels) and one without (and flats) to try to capture all the beauty of this dress. It's very shimmery but not so much that it makes it less sophisticated. I wore it with the flats since it was raining out to dinner. My only complaint is that it has absolutely no stretch. I almost sized up to the 6 but it would have looked baggy when standing. It has plenty of room in the chest which I definitely don't need but it wasn't uncomfortably large up there. Overall a very lovely dress
I'm 5' 5", 138 lbs. the size 4 for perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Simple cut dress with fabulous day design
links_reviews_text: This dress really is all about the fabric. It's a bold pattern and has a bit of sparkle in there. A bold look, but the dress cut is very straightforward do it balances one another out. Overall a fun memoray look. Dress isn't too strety so make sure to size up if you're in between sizes.
Comfortable, just a little sparkle and unique colors

links_reviews_title: Worked great for an early spring event
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a work awards dinner where I was part of the event staff. It was comfortable, cute and appropriate. Looks prettier in person and has a beautiful shimmer to the fabric. It was a bit snug through hips & belly, so definitely size up if you are larger in those areas. One awesome thing about this dress is it has little snaps inside the shoulder straps to secure your bra straps...made it easy to wear a regular bra with out the straps showing.
Awesome dress! Super cute and flattering!

Another great kate spade. Couple of things to note - it is sparkly so be aware of that. Second i wore a strapless bra because even with the clips my bra straps still showed. Rented for work but could easily go out for dinner in it. Good length - will definitely rent again
Wore this dress to chaperone an event at school. The shape and colors are great.
Nice cut. Really enjoyed the sparkle and shades of pink!
Wore this dress for New Years Eve & I loved it so much! The cut is very flattering and the material is "stiff" so it doesn't show all of your flaws. I plan to rent it again!
Couldn't get this zipped. Good length and great material. Wish I could have worn it

links_reviews_title: Sized up 1 to 2 sizes and it was still too small.
links_reviews_text: This dress just has a weird fit to it. I'm usually between a 12-14 and the 16 was still tight through the hips and stomach and was unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but hope to rent again ‚Äî great quality
links_reviews_text: I rented this as an option for Valentine's Day. I ended up choosing something a bit more low-key, but I'm really looking forward to renting this again. It is such a well-made dress, from the zipper to the bubble hem. I found the top to be a little silly, as it's super revealing but partially covered by a long black sash-like piece of fabric, but overall a super cute and high-quality dress.

Dress was cute on and photographed well, ran on the larger side. Short, but with the full skirt (with pockets!) I didn't think it was too inappropriate. The material was comfortable, but don't steam it! Steam makes it more wrinkled!
This was my least favorite dress of all dresses I've rented with unlimited. It's so ridiculously open in the center.
Love the pattern and length. The check was too revealing. :(

links_reviews_title: Flirty and fun little cherry dress
links_reviews_text: The arms up top were slightly snug, but the rest of the dress fit so beautifully. The colors on the sleeves are on the wrist are a tad annoying unless you double knot them. The skirt is rather short, but just wear tights underneath it and you'll be fine. Like a lot of the other reviews have mentioned, if you're wearing this to the office you may want to wear a little tank top underneath or pin it with a brooch. The cut out right in the center of the bust area is extremely revealing. Luckily, I'm a bartender and I am able to push the envelope more than most. I highly highly considered purchasing the dress but decided on a purse instead. Maybe I will actually buy it next time I rent it!

I felt so pretty and feminine in this dress! It fit well in all the right places, but was a little restrictive in the arms. I wore it with tights and booties, but the length would have been fine without the tights. It was a little inconvenient trying to grab food from the table with the ribbons at the end of my arms, but it was definitely one of my favorite features of the dress otherwise. It is definitely revealing in the chest area if your boobs are larger, but I wore a black lace bralette that blended nicely. I definitely recommend, but wish I had gone a size larger.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments AND stares lol
links_reviews_text: Women with large bust be prepared to have the girls out. My bra was cute so I wasn't to pressed about it. And the bow falls in your cleavage which helps cover some as well. Loved the material and the overall cut/style of the dress.

I've never gotten so many compliments on an outfit. The dress is beautiful. Very well made and, yes, it has pockets! True to size. I wore a black tank underneath because the key whole top was VERY low cut. Overall, a great piece that I would recommend!
I loved this dress! Super fun and lots of compliments. The shoulder area was really small amd you cant wear a bra with it. If you have broader shoulders go a size up. I wouldve been more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliemnts! It fit well and was comfortable to wear!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. It was such a fun and girly dress!

links_reviews_title: Cute cherry print but too much going on with this dress
links_reviews_text: I wore the size 40 and it fit well. I'm between size 2 and 4. The sleeves are a lot! It was hard to keep the ties out of the way. Pretty short and low cut in the chest. I would not rent again
I had some much funny wearing this out on a dinner date. Material is on the heavier side, nice quality. I love the cherry print and the keyhole cut.
Sexy!!! Compliments galore. Head turner

If you have large breasts, be careful because it is VERY cleavagey. However, if you want to look super sexy, this is the dress. It fits like a glove, and hugs your body in the waist and flares out, it can be paired up or down. I wore in the winter with thigh high boots and a leather and it totally worked :) Debating buying this one, but def will be renting it again!

links_reviews_title: Katie , one of the stylist made me keep my relationship with RTR- I love her customer service .
links_reviews_text: Best dress ever - love the material as if it was made to order for me

Very pretty dress , fit and flare style . The fabric is quality . You can feel it the fabric that it's a quality garment . Ties at the wrists and neckline . The opening on the front of the dress is a little bit low , I wore a nondescript silk tank underneath and it was fine . So cute !

Like that there is at least some designer options on RTR. Print is a bit summery and will likely rent again for spring. The dress definitely runs short - I'm 5'1" with a shirt torso and it's a mini on me

I really loved the cut, quality, and print of this dress but had to wear a tank underneath as the front is very exposing. Also I wore this to dinner but it was hard to eat as the ribbons kept falling into my food. Cute for night out/ drinks only.

The print and cut of this dress is super cute. What isn't cute is the huge slit down the middle of the chest area that makes this dress impossible to wear without a flat chest. I wore a shirt and pinned it but wouldn't rent again.

Could have been a little tighter on waist, next time I will definitely be getting a size down. But that is just how I like my dresses to fit. The only thing I didn't like is that you have to wear an undershirt with it for the bust. It is an odd design how open the slit is in the front, maybe non busty women could get away without wearing an undershirt.

This dress looks so cute in the picture, but unfortunately that is not how it really looked on me. The front is wide open and even with a tank it just looked unflattering and messy. Would not recommend.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear but cute dress heavy material and large opening on chest area
links_reviews_text: Just didn't choose it, wasn't sure what Bra to wear

links_reviews_title: Wasn't able to wear the dress, as the fabric had ripples and I couldn't press them out.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very cute, but the fabric is strange. I couldn't seem to iron/steam the fabric to smooth it out, it kept rippling so I wasn't able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my engagement photos and it was adorable!
links_reviews_text: Fit was great, details were great but I highly recommend boob tape. There is a large keyhole down the middle and it absolutely needs to be tamed!
Too tight at the waist.

This dress is cute but the material, while very nice, is very heavy. also the "keyhole" in the front is more of an "eye of Sauron" which left me feeling really exposed. I sent it back without wearing.

links_reviews_title: so fun and frilly. really nice heavyweight fabric. this would be great for fall/winter.
links_reviews_text: great fit at the natural waist and lots of fabric around hip/thighs. this dress would be great for an hourglass shape or someone with some thighs. loved the sleeves and chest detailing.

links_reviews_title: lots of boob action. really cute with flats around town.
links_reviews_text: very forgiving

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Great for a daytime event.
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 6 so I ordered the size 42. I loved this dress! Wore it to a baptism and got so many compliments on it. I had to wear a black camisole underneath because of the opening in the front, but it still looked great. If you don't have a large bust, you might be able to get away with taping the dress down. All in all, love this dress!!

Cannot wear a bra. Whole chest shows. Halfway through the night my wardrobe tape failed and I had to turn the dress and wear it backwards. Nightmare! So sad because it has the potential to be adorable. Huge fail though
So cute. TTS and fabric has no stretch.

This dress is cute and appropriate for a night out, but the front has a huge opening that I was very confused about how to handle. It seemed impossible to keep my breasts covered without the use of fashion tape. Kind of annoying because the rest of the dress is so conservative, I wasn't expecting this. It is very pretty, but was too fussy in the end for me.
Fit perfect, hugged all of my curves and made me feel very elegant!
Loved this dress. It was great for a winter wedding and easy to dance in!
LOVED this dress! It is even better in person. So flattering and a definite head-turner. I've never had so many compliments on an outfit...and most of them were strangers!
So comfortable. Wore this to a charity event. Very classy. I ended up purchasing it.
This dress fit perfectly! It was so comfortable but still fitted and not too short to sit. The pattern is super cute too. Loved this dress

links_reviews_title: LOVED This Dress! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! The intricate details were stunning, and I felt great in it! I am tall (5'11) and thin, with very broad shoulders, 36C chest, and a long torso. I ordered a 4 and a 6, and both fit well. I ended up wearing the 6, because I was at a wedding and knew I'd want some extra room. :) It really did fit perfectly. I paired this with black heels and bare legs. I would buy this dress if I could!

What a fun dress! So classy, so comfy, the lace work on this dress was amazing and definitely an eye catcher. Received so many compliments and it is perfect for us ladies who have those bigger arms because it brings some softness to the physique.
Very unique and classy dress. The style was comfortable and loose. Loved it!

The fabric of this dress is very nice and feminine. The gold gave the dress a little something special for a holiday party. Not my favorite dress from RTR but that is because I have worn others that are fabulous. This was a great dress.
Loved this dress. Classy and conservative.
This has been my FAVORITE RTR dress so far! Fit like a glove, and really comfortable. Lace is soft, not itchy.

links_reviews_title: Way more beautiful in person than in the picture!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, perfect length (I'm 5'6")
So comfortable! I absolutely loved wearing this dress! I got so many compliments.
Dress fit like a glove, it was comfortable to both sit and dance in!

I had rented this dress previously but did not end up wearing it, so I was happy to rent again knowing how it fit. I'm usually a size 6 but it was a little roomy so I went with the 4 which was perfect. It fits like a glove and is the perfect wedding guest dress! Don't shy away from the color being too light, it's darker and very obviously a nude/tan color versus the off-white it appears in photos. Definitely love this dress, especially the high neck!

Nice fit, I wore a racer back bra and did wear shape wear for the tummy since it's somewhat fitted. You can't see the length in my photo but it was just above knee on me. Comfortable and received many compliments.

I wore this dress to a wedding. I loved it. It comfortable and classy. I received a lot of compliments. I usually wear a size 2. I ordered a 2 and 0 as backup because the reviews said it ran big. The 2 fit, I had space around the abdominal area. The 0 fit perfect. I never wore a zero, so I was shocked to get into it. It was happy with this RTR rental

links_reviews_title: RTR was an unexpectedly easy experience. From 50 dresses and hours in dressing rooms to one click!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and comfortable fabric. Generous cut on the style. Exceptional detail. Wish I owned it! Went with the backup size.

links_reviews_title: Everyone LOVED the dress, I received so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Dress fit like a glove for me
By far my favorite RTR rental, yet! So much so I tried to buy it and couldn't find it so I rented it a couple times. Fit like a glove. Compliments every time. Highly recommend.

This was my first experience with RTR and it did not disappoint! I had my first and second choice dresses in plenty of time. I loved both picks but my boyfriend liked the back up dress a little more so I wore this style to an evening wedding in upstate NY. The dress was elegant and very comfortable. It was a little snug across the bust area but I could wear a regular bra which was a plus. Some reviews touched on the color combo; I found it to be more tan in color than peach.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: dress is true to size without being tight and super comfortable. I am normally a 4-6 and the 4 fit perfect.
Very comfortable, cool and unique, lots of compliments!

This is the only full length photo I have of this dress, and it's not a great angle. But I LOVED this dress. I'm a 36F and it was great to be able to wear a real bra and not feel constricted in the chest. The detail was great and the dress is clearly quality. I regret sending it back.
RTR makes planning for special occasions so easy! This dress was perfect! It fit true to size. It was a little roomy so I was comfortable eating and drinking.

Absolutely loved this dress. If you're between sizes I'd go a size down, as it's a shift. The neck detailing was beautiful and the way it hit in my frame was so flattering! I would 100% rent this again!
This was my first RTR dress and it was perfect!! I had so many compliments with it! The fit was great and I cannot wait to rent again!
Figure flattering dress of your dreams! Great for formal events. Received tons of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Nice option for charity dinner with coworkers
links_reviews_text: I felt comfortable and confident wearing this to a black tie optional charity dinner. Received some compliments, but overall I've liked some other rtr dresses more.
Very comfortable and not too short for me at 5'8"!

I rented this for a wedding. I like the dark stripe down the center. I think it was slimming. I also liked the little lace that covered the chubbiest part of my arms. I never wear a 12 , I am usually a 14 to fit my top but this fit perfectly. I was very pleased.
Great dress!
Fit was totally true to size. Looked awesome on and was very comfortable!

I absolutely loved this dress! I ended up picking this dress with the help of a wonderful consultant from RTR because my first choice that I originally ordered was no longer available. It worked out better because I like this one so much more than my original pick. I am 5'3 and about 128lbs. I ordered a 4 and a 2 and wore the 2. The 4 fit better in length but was looser on top. I am narrow in the chest and shoulder area so the 2 fit better. It didn't look short but felt short when I sat or bent over, but overall it was perfect and so comfortable. If you are tall, you may want to size up for length. I would totally rent this dress again!!
Gorgeous dress with lace detail.. Stands out from your typical LBD.
I loved this dress. It fit perfectly and was easy to wear. It was a little tight in the neck area, but I lived with it.
The fit was perfect. Plenty of stretch and very flattering. I wore it for a winter wedding in Wisconsin, and I got so many compliments. Will probably rent it again!
I loooove this dress!! I wore this on my family friend's Christmas party and had so much compliments!(even from my two daughters:-)) Fit was perfect and even comfortable. Highly recommend it!!

What a unique dress! I received so many compliments from guests at the wedding I rented it for. RTR got many plugs that night! The dress fits true to size but is a bit loose fitting by design. I thought the lace made it classy and the length made it sexy. Win win. The lace is very intricate and pretty and the color is almost peachy. Loved it!

I absolutely loved this dress. I wish I could have purchased it. I'm 5'4", 135 lbs with an athletic build. I ordered the size 2 and the 4 as a back up, and ended up wearing the 2. It fit like no other dress I've ever owned. It hit about 4" above my knees, which was perfect. I've never received so many compliments and I was so comfortable all night long! I do not have one complaint, other than I had to return it. I'm a 34B on top and wore a stick-on bra and it was perfect. If you're larger on top, I would think it would get right across the chest and in the arm openings. There's no give in this dress. What a wonderful experience and awesome dress!!

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! It was very comfortable.

links_reviews_text: Tight around the arms
I absolutely loved this dress. I received so many compliments as well. Fit well, great quality. So happy I decided to go with this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress was AMAZING!!! It was so comfortable and light weight. I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: If you are looking to stun everyone, rent this dress.

First time doing RTR. Ordered week of event had to get the long vs regular made it work with heels. I'm a 34H bra size and this dress is great for busty people. Wear a 10 in most things 12 occasionally (large tops), I'm 173lbs. 12L dress still has a little give if I would've needed it as the dress is a little stretchy. It is a heavy dress so the one shoulder style works great for hold the weight of the dress.

I had tons of compliments and the dress was very comfortable and easy to wear a one shoulder bra with for added support. The only downside was that the sequins scratch you up under your arm. I'm 5'7 and was able to wear a 2-3" heel without the regular length size dragging the floor.
I order this dress while out of the country and was worried it wouldn't fit but it did! Great experience with RTR. The dress is fitted so spanx are helpful but it was great overall!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect fit, and I received compliments all night! Sad to send it back!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, was flattering and also super comfortable. It‚Äôs true to size, however, I do think it runs a little short and I was glad I ordered the long as a back up. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù and the regular with heels was a tad too short. It‚Äôs also more on the rose gold or blush side as opposed to champagne/gold (which is how it looks in the pics) so I wore silver accessories which looked great with it! I couldn‚Äôt have been happier with my dress choice! Highly recommend!
Overall, love this dress! I'm 5'6, 126 lbs and the 4L fit very well. Maybe could have done 2L but this gave room for a food baby lol. Definitely get the L if you're 5'6 or taller.
This dress was gorgeous! It fit great and was very comfortable. It was long, but some high wedges fixed that.

I rented this dress for a black tie affair and felt like a star in this head turner. Black tie does not mean you have to wear black just formal. Most of the ladies did wear black and this dress made me stand out. I received a lot of compliments. This is a great dress for most figure types and sizes.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, so fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a hit at my Halloween party. I needed something glamorous to go as Ginger from Gilligan's Island and this dress was perfect. Very comfortable and fun to dance in too. Flattering in all areas. I knew from other reviews that the long option would be better for me but went with the regular since I'd be at a party and didn't want to get the bottom of the dress dirty. Still looked super chic.

With formal dresses I find I have to go a size up, but this dress is stretchy enough that I was able to wear my normal size. I think wearing an undergarment underneath is a must as this gown will show all unless you smooth it all out. Very comfortable and I got a lot of compliments from other guests. Even got a shout out from a gentleman driving by about how stunning the dress looked. This made you feel sexy without exposing too much skin - very elegant. I'm 5' 9" and glad I got the tall.
This dress fit like a glove! I got so many compliments- wore it to my wedding reception after doing a destination wedding.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, super easy rental experience, very impressed!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" and around 140 pounds now (16 weeks pregnant). This dress is perfect for a formal event! Also perfect if you're pregnant. Super stretchy and not itchy at all! I would definitely wear this dress again. I wore flat shoes but if you're 5'9" or above the dress will be too short if you want to wear heels.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress, and loved that it matched my girls' dresses!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly, and had just enough stretch that it could be worn by a variety of body shapes. I loved that I could still wear a strapless bra with it, and the sparkle on the dress was gorgeous. I wore this for a "glam" red carpet party, and it definitely make me feel glamorous! The only downside was that I'm short (5'3''), so even with 3 inch heels, the dress was a little long for me.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove for my R+F Gala!!
links_reviews_text: Loves everything about this dress!! The sequins was sturdy and didn't stick on anything. You know how some sequins is just not properly placed, well that wasn't the case here. I got so many compliments and head turns in this dress. Loved it!!
Wore this dress for a wedding. I'm 5'0 190lbs and the 14R fit beautifully.

links_reviews_title: I loved that I had three diff style options to choose from.
links_reviews_text: Dress fit perfectly and was so beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The dress was a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: The dress was amazing! I attended a formal black tie wedding and it was perfect! The dress fit amazing and I felt beautiful! I highly recommend this dress!!!
Runs slightly small but I really enjoyed wearing it! Got so many compliments

This dress was big on me so did not fit right but as night went in seamed to form to me better as the heavy sequins began to hold down the top that wanted to roll funny. Even though it was sequins the lining made it very comfortable to wear. I had helped with and was vending my stuff at a disco themed party at a horror convention, and thought it was a great excuse to wear sequins, I added a fake blood necklace and felt tragically glamorous in a quick 10 minute change which helped so much since I ran late setting up. Someone also insisted I was Cher and took a photo with me continuing to call me "Cher", I took that as a compliment.

I wore this to my husbands military ball and received compliments on it all night. As one who has extra "fluff" I never got rid of after having two kids I was uncertain about it fitting to my stomach area to my liking but this dress was absolutely perfect and didn't need a lot of accessories.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a gala for work.
links_reviews_text: I rented this gown for a ball for work. My first two dresses didn't fit well, but RTR sent me replacements right away, and it worked out. I loved the dress and received many compliments. I had to go up two sizes, but you can expect that with some formalwear.

I absolutely loved this dress! I felt like a Star and received so many compliments. I would highly recommend renting this dress. The 10L was a little big but because of the stretchy fabric it hit all the right curves.

links_reviews_title: So pretty. Made me feel beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable. Sexy.

Dress was beautiful!! It has some nice stretch to it and fits true to size for the most part. I am a 16/18. The 16 was a little too tight. The 18 fit perfectly. I am 5' 7" and wore tall heels and the length was great. I received compliments on it all night!

Form fitting through the body. Fabric hung beautifully. Received many compliments. I initially had the 2R, but it was too short even with a kitten heel. I am 5'6"; 125 lbs. Thankfully, RTR shipped the 2L and it was perfect with a 3 inch heel. Great on the dance floor.
Super comfortable dress that looked great and got tons of compliments. It's rose gold/blush in daylight but photographs more gold.
The length on the size 16L was perfect! It shined so beautifully and I felt comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect accessory to my handsome date!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit was amazing! I'm 20 weeks pregnant and it fit in all the right places not only showing off my baby but accenting the good and hiding the bad. Loved the dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing for an expecting mother! 8 months pregnant and felt amazing in this gown.
links_reviews_text: It is hard to dress a bump, especially when the attire is black tie. I was a little worried how it would fit being 8 months pregnant but I was pleasantly surprised. I ordered a size up and got the L length to make sure it would still be a floor length gown after filling it out with my pregnant belly. I got compliments all night! It is a must have if you are pregnant!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, very comfortable. Glad I ordered the long because it was perfect with the shoes. Very fitting so you‚Äôll have to wear a ‚Äúslimmer‚Äù with it. True to size. Got many compliments.

I wore this dress for New Year's Eve on a cruise-it was absolutely spectacular! I has so many people stop me and compliment me on this dress. It is definitely a dress to wear when you want to be noticed. It was so comfortable and flattering. I wore it with Spanx, a strapless bra and double-sided fabric tape on the front to keep it flush with my chest. I am 5'6" and wore the R length, but would have preferred to have the L (it wasn't available). I wore it with 2" black wedges for most of the night, the shoes showed at the bottom. As the night got late, I put on black flat flip-flops and it was the perfect length. This dressed photographed beautifully and was breathtaking in every setting. I would definitely rent this dress or a similar one by the same designer again!

Loved this dress! So many people complimented me on it and said how amazing I looked! At 5 months pregnant, I couldn't find anything I loved in the store so I'm so excited I was able to find this stunning option in a matter of minutes online. This dress definitely did not disappoint! #19weeks #datenight #formalaffair

This dress made me feel like a princess! I turned heads all night and the fit was perfect! High quality and very classy for the Army Ball. The material was a bit thicker than I thought, which made it more forgiving of imperfections. I'm 5'8" with long legs... so glad I got the long with my 3 " heels it was perfect!
I didn't get to wear this dress, but it was one of my favorites. It is curve hugging, and very lightly lined, so shapewear is needed. I'm a true size 5/6, and it fit true to size.

For a separate order- my little sister wore this dress in our moms wedding and it was gorgeous! Thought I would share the picture for everyone to see. This is a must rent! The Bagdley Mischka gowns are stunning.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I received many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress on New Year's Eve and received many compliments!
Bust runs large. Very happy with this gown!
This dress was beautiful and also very comfortable. There is not much give with the shoulder detail but overall really loved this dress.
I love Jay Godfrey dresses! The fabric is elegant and great quality. This one ran a little smaller than usual, but still flattering with the one shoulder.

links_reviews_title: As soon as i walked into my event, i received compliments non-stop!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, enough room to dance and wiggle around. While others thought the one strap hand was restricting I thought the total opposite.
Pretty, red dress with elegant trim for the side straps. A little big in the bust and comfortable through the midsection.
No complaints about the dress. I am just short so ran a bit long on my frame. The one sleeve definitely limits your movement so maybe not best option if there is dancing involved.
Runs a little on the smaller side. Right arm is definitely limited movement-wise. Zipper was hard to get up on my own. 6 was too roomy in the torso.
Loved the color and the fun shoulder, but the dress is not a very thick material and seemed to accent all the wrong parts. The lining underneath was bunching and did not lay flat.

Loved this dress. I went to a wedding where folks mainly wore dark or muted colors. This dress stood out due to its true red color. Caution if you're shy haha. Dress is really fitted, size up if you want a little more give. When seated the split is not too revealing.
I liked the dress but did not like how tight it was on the stomach. Also the sleeve was very tight and did not allow for much arm movement.

links_reviews_title: Loved the red, just know what you're getting into with the arm!
links_reviews_text: Great dress and amazing color! I read the reviews and knew my right arm wouldn't be able to do much but it wasn't a huge deal. Fairly true to size, but I would size up for your backup and decide from there. Overall a huge fan of this dress and would wear it again

The only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because it was really difficult for me to find a flattering angle to take a pic in while wearing this dress. But maybe I am just awkward. Like the other reviews said, you can't lift you right arm while wearing the dress but I was able to dance in it just fine! I wore an unpadded strapless bra with the dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning. You will turn heads in it. Wore it for a wedding in Italia.
links_reviews_text: Yes, you cant raise one arm up but who cares. You will be absolutely stunning and wow everyone who sees you. This dress is absolutely beautiful.

This red dress fits very snugly. Be prepared to bear the bod. It does not allow for a lot of movement of your right arm and cutting my food was difficult! I consider it worth it. It is a head turning fancy cocktail dress. The length was conservative, but the slit was very sexy.
This dress is gorgeous but I ended up wearing another dress for my anniversary! I will rent this dress again for another event.

Gorgeous red dress, tons of compliments! The shoulder drape does make it a little difficult if you want to raise that arm completely up over your head, but it didn't prohibit me from dancing and having a great night!

This dress is stunning! Definitely be aware that because it is red, it shows every curve. However, it was beautiful! In regards to sizing, I typically wear a size 4 bottom, but dresses are size 6 because of my top half. I wore the 6 in this dress, so my midsection was actually a little loose. However, I was comfortable all night!

This fit like an absolute glove. It was trye to size and comfortable. The color was gorgeous I was complimented all night. Only con is that the body of the dress kept shifting and the slit would move as opposed to staying on the left. Other than that, amazing dress!

Pros - the color Cons- not the best dress if you aren't really thin. You will definitely need good undergarments if you are thicker. I wore the dress to a professional function. It was a tad too revealing for the event.

This dress is really cute but runs quite small. I am usually between a size 4 and 6, but was unable to wear this dress as the sleeve was too restricting. An 8 would have been much better. Very classy and chic. #wedding #bold

links_reviews_title: The red is gorgeous and the sleeves/detailing are extremely elegant. I looked and felt great.
links_reviews_text: Fit was amazing, a little bit bigger on the hips.
Loved this dress and received so many compliments on it, however I was very glad that I sized up!
This dress was perfect. It fit well and it was stunning. I received a ton of compliments
loved this dress. i was prepared not to be able to lift my arms up all the way after reading other reviews, but besides that loved this dress.
This dress was great for a wedding! It fit well and was fun to take pics and dance in.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved this dress! Received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely stunning. I received tons of compliments! I'm petite so it's usually really difficult for me to find dresses that fir me at the right length. This one was perfect! It hugged in all the right spots and the slit in the leg and shoulder detail were just enough sexiness. I'm pale so I usually avoid the color red because I don't like how it brings out the red undertones in my skin but this color was just right! It pained me to give this dress back but I hope someone else can love it as much as I did.
I usually wear a 4 and I had to go up to a 6 so it runs a little small. Great quality and comfortable, received so many compliments. Love the color!

I rented this dress for my graduation dinner. It was an evening, candlelit event. I am normally a size 10. I am a little "hippy" so the size 12 fit better due to the split. I was DEFINITELY the star or the party. Everyone was asked to wear black and white. Their attire complimented this dress WELL! GREAT CHOICE!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! I received so many compliments and felt great in it.
links_reviews_text: NA

links_reviews_title: I felt like a rockstar with this amazing red dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! I wasn't overdressed or underdressed for my event. It fit very well. I am short with a large chest.--it was a tad long but no one knew and no bra was needed. I felt sexy but also professional.

First off, it's a 2 and I'm a 4 so definitely go down if you are brave enough to wear this. I don't know how anyone did anything in this dress because the photo shows the exact extent to which I could lift my left arm. Meaning, you will not be able to do anything but a one arm hug. Or one armed anything. Certainly not for dancing or celebrating or having to move. If you have a photo shoot, go for it. If you plan on using your arm at all, don't.
Fit like a glove! Just be prepared for limited use of your right hand for the duration of your wear.
This dress runs true to size and the material has some good stretch to it. Great for dancing after the wedding.
This dress is very flattering! I wore it to a work cocktail party and it was a standout success. It fits very well, I ordered the 8 and the 10 and the 8 was too tight but the 10 was perfect.
I love this dress! I got so many compliments on it!! I'd definitely recommend this dress for any special occasion!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outside wedding!
links_reviews_text: The dress is true to size. The only con was the arm area had no give.

links_reviews_title: 1 out of 3 red dresses in a sea of black at a 460 person gala
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a benefit gala. I am 5'3" and currently 118 and usually wear a size 2, ordered a size 2 and 4, wore a 4. B/c of my height I would have liked the dress to be a bit shorter, but that's always the issue with the rent the runway dresses, the designer lengths are for someone more like 5'7." Very comfortable. Recommend wearing hair up to show the off the shoulder detail.

I got a million compliments on this dress! I felt like I was pulled from an old Hollywood movie set. I wore it to a cocktail party. dress code specifically said ‚Äúrebel against the little black dress‚Äù and it was perfect for it! My girlfriend wore a dress in sunflower yellow and we matched perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Super unique! Compliments from people all night long
links_reviews_text: So I read that this dress runs quite small so I rented a size 14, I normally wear a 10/12. The 12 might have fit though the fabric has some stretch. The dress is beautiful, great fabric and fit, color is stunning. Felt sexy but classy. Yes the slit comes up high on the leg, but it was still very classy. Would rent again!
It took me a hot second to figure out exactly where to wear the straps and the position of the slit. It's off in the pic. It should be on the left leg, not down the middle but I figured it out, haha.
I got so many compliments on this dress! I had lost 30 pounds and it really showed it :) Would recommend for sure. Super comfortable too.

Such a great dress! Super comfy, ran a little big but still looked good. I wore an XSR and loved the material very light and breathable not too heavy. (If your going to be dancing all night). Extremely pleased with my rental!

With the help of boob tape, this dress was a show stopper! It is long. I'm 5'3" and the dress was super long with heels. The material is flowy, which made it less formal. I don't love the color either but in a sea of dark colored dresses, this dress stood out. Hides the tummy well.

LOVE! I tried this on in the store, and there were two styles but had different sizes listed for the same "size". You definitely need some tape, or (I wore) the sticky bra cups, as the fabric is thin yet it is lined in the chest area! It was so flattering / received compliments all night. There are a few buttons on the back of the neck, so you can't adjust the collar tightness, which might be needed depending on the size of your chest - I'm a 34DD, and the fabric was so forgiving in all areas.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! And great material! Felt beautiful and received so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Material DOES stretch easily, so be careful when putting it on. Nothing a little fabric tape couldn't hide. #gala

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Midsummer Nights Ball
links_reviews_text: This dress was drop dead gorgeous!!! I wish I could buy it. It fit perfectly and I received so many compliments. The color has a shimmer to it and was perfect for the event.

I know the style of this dress is pretty obvious there will be cleavage but it was too much for me!! I didn't wear the dress. However the fabric is so flattering (especially in the tummy area) and bright pink color. Recommend to smaller chested ladies or those who do want to show em off!
This dress is so comfortable! It is the perfect amount of class and sass. I got compliments on it all night. The fabric shows up great in photos!

Pros: color, concept - love the halter, keyhole, slits, pleat... however it didn't fit as flattering as I would've liked. Sticky boob bras don't work for me so that was kind of difficult to work with. Turned out better than expected and got a lot of compliments. Would recommend but just know it's not super flattering!

Wore this to a formal wedding in France. I received compliments constantly, on the color, on the pleats, on the style. While I loved the dress, it was a bit long (I'm 5'2" and wore 3-4 inch heels), and there was a slip that was mid-thigh that sometimes you can see the outline and you can definitely feel it. The slip should have been longer or omitted all together. I wore no bra and I wear a 32C cup so while I did not fill out the dress completely I did not have tape and thankfully did not have any accidents. Only reason why didn't give it 5 stars was because of the length and the slip. Overall it was a very beautiful and glamorous dress and I would definitely rent again.

I saw this in store and wasn't sure I would like it. I tend to go for fit and flares, but after I put this dress on I knew I had to rent it. It runs EXTREMELY large and that's no exaggeration. I grabbed a medium and the top was too heavy, not even tape would have helped. So reluctantly I grabbed the only size they had left which was an XS - it fit like a glove. FYI, I'm no where near an XS. I did have to keep pulling down the inner skirt throughout the evening, but it wasn't too much of a nuisance for me - this dress is amazing. I'm small up top and with this size I didn't have to worry about any nip slip moments.

I love this trendy dress by The Jetset Diaries! Running true to size with some stretch to the fabric, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is formfitting but not too tight. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since it's a halter style. At 5‚Äô7‚Äù, the regular length worked perfectly. The dress is super flowly and very comfortable, it will work perfectly for any formal event. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: Loved having a beautiful dress I felt comfortable in!
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit, good length, lots of compliments üòä

very shiny, the pleats make the dress feel Grecian. the back is very low, bra options will be very limited.. I didn't end up wearing the dress, but I would also recommend tape to keep from accidentally flashing everyone the small regular is too long for me even in heels, petites probably want to pass

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty dress- deep center slit!
links_reviews_text: I had fun wearing this dress. The color is great. It doesn't fit as pictured - runs a little large through the torso, but beware of deep center slit!
Love this color! Comfortable and sexy. Rode up a bit. Tight around midsection.

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress for a party, but runs large on the butt
links_reviews_text: Love the upper side but the waist and the hip parts runs BIG! It felt like more than 1000 people already wore this dress and so it's not in its best condition and a little bit loose on the bottom part.

I wanted something fun for my birthday and loved this when I saw it online! I'm 5'5, 125 lbs and carry more of my weight in my tummy. I went for the small and the fit was good. The front slit goes dangerously high, so think ahead if you think you'll be self conscious about it. So happy I rented it!

I absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments on it. I think the color is the best feature. The fit was great and it was super comfortable. I wore the dress to a birthday party just after Labor Day weekend. I wasn't sure which way the weather was going so this dress was a good compromise for whatever weather we encountered that night. My only complaint is that the dress had some minor signs of wear and tear - the material on the back had a little bit of beading, but that was only noticeable to me.

links_reviews_title: Pretty in pink but something is still missing
links_reviews_text: This dress was okay. The color was faded and it fit loose in the mid section and snug in the bottom. Possibly meant for a more narrow shape? The slit is right in the middle, not om either side, which is not my favorite. It was fine to wear during the day.
The fit was snug and showed everything in my midsection. The slit up the front was big and too short for me to comfortably wear out
This dress fit perfect. IÔ∏è almost felt like I could of rented the small but it was nice to be in the medium and not feel like it was too tight. I was still able to enjoy dinner lol
This is such a fun dress!! Not too fitted - but with a revealing cut that made it sexy! It was a fun rental!

Very comfortable & has stretch where needed. I'm small with a flat butt so it puckered out in the butt quite a bit. It was a little tight in the chest but thankfully the material has enough stretch. Other than that it's a great easy fitting dress and loved the front slit.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for NYE Miami Vice Party
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Miami vice party on NYE. Super fun dress, bright pink color, it was perfect for the occasion. Very tight fitted and hugs all the curves and I didn't need to wear a bra which was great!
One of my favorite rentals. The color is gorgeous! The dress is small in the bust. I'm a D and the bust area is made for a size A or B,

links_reviews_title: A great dress for summer track season!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, with a splendid color! The slit in the front takes some getting used to, but overall, I was pleased with this choice to wear to the horse races. I did wear a strapless bra, and had no issues zipping up the dress on my own.

links_reviews_title: The color in the dress is stunning
links_reviews_text: This is a very classic yet sexy dress with the slit in the front. The color is amazing. Great fabric and fit perfect.
This dress fit like a glove. The fabric is thick and forgiving. I loved it so much I bought it offline. Color is great. I have an athletic body and it fit me perfectly

This dress was fabulous!!! The material was very stretchy and forgiving. The fit was perfect. I loved the way it was cut. It made my shoulders look great and my booty - well, bootylicious. The color was so vibrant that it made me actually look tan. I rented it for a summer "Glow Crazy" event. It was PERFECT!

I prefer my dresses fitted and this fit nice. I recently had a baby and wasn't sure what would fit right. This dress has stretch to it which was good. I'm 5' 125lbs. I'd rent it again. The color is very pretty

Runs a little big in the waist and the back of the dress. The color is gorgeous and received sooo many compliments. Felt like a million bucks. Only issue is the lining at the top of the dress. I tried multiple bras on and ended up wearing a strapless this helped a bit but the line that goes a cross the chest is very noticeable. Extremely comfortable - danced all night

links_reviews_title: All the compliments! Especially the color!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I have a large bust and it was supportive and comfortable! I could wear this dress all night! Very versatile and able to be dressed up easily!

This dress was very pretty but fit a little bit oddly.. most of the time, I'd choose a large when renting a dress, but based on other reviews, I went with a medium. The dress was very fitted up top - I'm not particularly large chested and it made my cleavage look wonderful - but it got a bit looser through the hips and thighs (for ease of walking I assume) which made it look a little funny on me, despite my fuller thighs and booty. Also, the slit in the front came up a bit high - even wearing the dress around the house, I was self-consciously pulling it down so I didn't have a wardrobe malfunction. All in all, the dress is okay, but I wouldn't rent it again.

Tighter on top, which I thought ended up more flattering, and loose in the middle which was comfortable. Be careful sitting with the slit in the front... a few pictures later showed more than I had planned!
Fit great in my hips and bust. It was a little baggy in my stomach area.

In person the dress was cute but it just didn't fit right. The dress was too big in the back and then the slit at the front I just didn't find flattering. The color was pretty and it was comfortable so I'll give it that but I just was not a big fan.

As everyone mentioned, this is a gorgeous dress. I rented it for a night on the town in Vegas. The only downfall was the stomach area was loose- not sure if that was the intention of the dress or I received a well worn dress. The slit in the front was not an issue, and I loved the fit in my shoulders and back at the top. Overall, I loved it and received many compliments. It's definitely more a red-pink but still really pretty. I would highly recommend renting this dress.

links_reviews_title: I loved the color of the dress.
links_reviews_text: Dress runs big, I usually wear a small, but opted for the XS. The dress is baggy in the stomach area. There was banding which went across the middle of my bust and seemed very noticeable. Overall the dress was comfortable. A strapless bra is necessary.
The fit was perfect. Great color!

links_reviews_title: A great fitting dress that's sexy without being over the top
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove and was sexy without being over the top. It was tight but still stretchy, I hate when dresses are too tight and it just looks unflattering so this was perfect. The color is a great shade of pink that stands out in the sea of black dresses. I got compliments all night, I even had a friend of a friend txt me when she saw the photo on fb asking where I got it from! Overall I would highly recommend!
I wore this out in Charleston for a bachelorette party. It's the perfect party dress! If you have a booty (like I do), it rides up a little in the front. Color is beautiful. Definitely recommend!
Wore for night in Vegas! Perfect dress! Comfortable and sucks you in, but fits true to size. I wore with spanks and smoothed everything out. Would love to rent this dress again!
Others suggested a size up however the smaller size fit me best. I loved this rental and wanted to keep it!
The color of this dresses definitely hot pink, but that's what I wanted. Fabric is stretchy which made it a good fit and the front slit was a fun detail.

links_reviews_title: Great night! Dress got me so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Wore it for a night out. Was a little loose at the stomach but that was good for being comfortable as it is form fitting everywhere else. Bust runs a little small. Overall! Great. Got so many compliments on the slit and the color.

links_reviews_title: Perfect birthday dress! Casual enough for a night on the town but dressy enough for the bday girl!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a small and occasionally an XS. I recommend going a size down for this dress as it does bunch in the stomach. Kind of tight in the chest but really accentuates the breasts!

I went between sizes. I went with the med. because it made me feel more comfortable about my stomach. But honestly the small fit better. I loved this color and got so many compliments thanks again to rtr for making a wedding expirence easy.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel pretty!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for an anniversary dinner date with the hubs. The dress fits like a glove, so you need to be careful with under garments. All in all I felt sexy and pretty!

links_reviews_title: Eye catching dress perfect for date night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a night out with my husband. I received the S and M. I'm usually a medium - but that one definitely ran a bit large, especially in the stomach area. It would have made me look way bigger than I am, so I opted for the S, which fit just fine (though was a bit shorter!). The slit IS cut pretty high ladies, so you need to be careful of how you sit. But I liked the material and weight of it and it was sexy but still classy and understated. It's more of a fusia-ish pink, which I loved. If not for the funny sizing issues, I would give it 5 stars.

links_reviews_title: The dress was gorgeous and fun for a party!
links_reviews_text: Normally I wear a small but this dress I had to go down a size since the small was swimming on me. Loved the color and the fabric was a thick material. Fun party dress!!
This dress can come off as a pinkish red. The slit is a little scandalous but I wore it for a bachelorette party and it worked great. It's a real stand out dress.

This dress is amazing! I would say it runs a little large. I ordered the small and extra small, and the small was quite large. The extra small fit like a glove and still allowed room to breathe and eat! The color is more hot pink than red but for a summer birthday dinner it was 100% perfect. I wish I would have been able to keep it!

I rented this dress for a bachelorette party night out and it was perfect! Definitely hot pink, and not red like it seems in the photo. The top kind of smushed by boobs, but still looked good. And the stomach does have extra room, which I certainly didn't mind. I just had to make sure I had good posture to keep it from bunching. Love the slit in the dress. The fabric is thick, and with the room in the stomach I didn't have to wear spanx.
Great color and fabric. Perfect for a fun beach wedding.

links_reviews_title: Felt pretty and fabulous for my birthday happy hour
links_reviews_text: Thicker material which felt great knowing undergarments aren't showing. Neckline is low cut but I wore a non padded bra and felt comfortable. Length was conservative with a low neckline. Wore with lower heels. Color was more coral on my olive skin. 5'4 height and felt true to size
Picture perfect! This is the perfect dress for a spring bridal shower! Love love love the bright sunny color! Very vibrant! Fit is great! Helps me hid the last ten lbs post baby number 2

Loved the bright color of this dress! The fabric is thicker and forgiving. It is flirty and fun! However, the fit is on the tighter side and would roll up all the time, so I had to constantly push it down. The skirt was pretty short but not scandalous. The bust is really low too (which didn't bother me too much as I have small breast). I had to wear sticky bra extra low so that it won't show. Regular strapless bra wasn't low enough and showed. Wanted to love this dress as I love Milly brand, but just wasn't my favorite. Wore it once as it wasn't comfortable enough to wear again.
Took this with me to Mexico. Fit was perfect! I'm full busted but small waisted so fit can be hard for me. This one fit in the chest and the body. Color is super bright!
I received a lot of compliments on this dress. Fit well and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Loved this dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect!

I loved the bright yellow color, but otherwise the dress felt a little prom dress style. It also ran a bit large. I am normally a 6 in Milly but this was big around the hips, probably would have been better in a 4

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, the color is more of a neon yellow, I received so many compliments wearing it!
links_reviews_text: It fit me like a glove, it runs very true to size, I do have a small bust but I'm petite so it was perfect on me. I ordered a size 2 and a back up size 0 which is the one I ended up wearing.

I'm obsessed with tennis. A fun dress the color of tennis balls *insert heart explosion* it was amazing. Is very easy to wear not much to say about it only that if you are on the shy side this dress is loud :D in my book that equals fun!!

links_reviews_title: Standout dress, very fun for summer
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and very cute! Great summer vacation evening look! Would consider buying if the one I received hadn't come with a stain on the bottom along the zipper.
This is a bright almost neon yellow. Very flattering fit, I loved wearing it.
I love the color on this dress. It was comfortable to dance around in all night. I definitely stood out with this dress.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! Cute, retro look.
links_reviews_text: Pretty cute, but not very shape enhancing. Cut out was very cute, and I did not need to wear a bra (pretty small chested, but fabric was thick). Tight around ribcage, so this is why I said it ran small but the rest of the dress was true to size. Pockets were cute.

I just loved how much fun this dress is: bright pop of color, cute ruffle at the hem, super flirty vibe. Material smooths imperfections, neckline helps to flaunt em' if you've got em'. I felt perfect in it.

Loved this dress wayyyy more than I expected! The fit was extremely flattering. My boobs were out a little more than I had hoped, but I was able to fit my chest into the dress, so I was happy! Color is VERY bright-- warning!! Would definitely recommend or wear again.

I wore it for a Baptism with turquoise and gold color accessories. The fabric is thick enough and with a great lining that no Spanx are required. The color is bright fluorescent yellow and it stands out! Beautiful cut that accentuates the curves, with a nice cleavage, but Keeping it classy. Loved it!! I would totally rent it again
The length worked well for my petite build. The top runs large so good for big busted girls. Dress was nice quality
Unfortunately this was just too big on me - I would've loved to have worn it for the event I have coming up.

I love this bright sheath by Milly. Running true to size with a lot of stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted and comfortable throughout the midsection and tight at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up for full hips. It works best for A - C cups sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5'5, the length hit knee length on me. This ruffled hem adds playful flounce to this sunny scoop-neck sheath dress that's both sultry and sweet with a figure-flaunting fit. I would recommend pairing this fit with cute strapped heels and large earrings.
Amazing fit for a curvy gal! If you're curvy and doing a regular rental, I would go with your normal size and a size up for the back up.

links_reviews_title: True to Size and Really Cute!
links_reviews_text: This dress was adorable and fit me really well! Unfortunately, the color was just a little too bright for me to wear for the event I rented it for. I would definitely rent this one again in the summer when I am a bit more tan!
