This color will certainly turn heads. It's a very acid yellow - reminiscent of the days of neon - but fun and updated. The little ruffle hem is just perfect. It's long enough to wear to work (with a long cardigan) and goes to a fun date or event dress in a flash. Definitely worth a try! The size 12 was a little roomy, but a good size for my bust.
This dress is super comfortable. It is very bright and fun, got plenty of compliments on it!

Wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner. The color is bright - more neon that I was expecting from the picture, but I actually loved it. I got a ton of compliments and loved the ruffle at the bottom. The four fit perfectly. Only problem was the ruffle would ride up a bit after sitting, so I'd have to pull it back down but otherwise great. And I loved that I could wear this with a regular bra. Would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: I didn‚Äôt wear it because it made me feel bigger than I am.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress but didn‚Äôt fit well in the waist line. It fit perfectly in the bust and hips but oddly loose around the waist line. Otherwise very cute.

links_reviews_title: So cute, I didn't get to wear it because it was a little too dressy for work.
links_reviews_text: The fit is amazing, looks great. The color is really bright so I didn't want to wear it to work. I'll rent it again when I can wear it somewhere out.
very short

Thought if I sized up two sizes it might work with a baby bump but I was way wrong! Milly tends to run small, no stretch in this and way short it looked silly. Also a material that wrinkles very easily

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but cute
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute, but unfortunately it didnt look great on my body shape. It kind of accentuated my belly which obviously wasn't what I was going for, but cute dress for someone with a smaller waistline.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress. It was not dressy enough.
links_reviews_text: The drop waist did not hit me right. The top fit fine but the bottom was loose on my hips, which are pretty average size. I probably would have fit a smaller size better but just had a baby so wasn't sure what size to order.

links_reviews_title: Material is slightly see thru. Hate dress you can see belly button.
links_reviews_text: Material is slightly see thru. Hate dress you can see belly button.

links_reviews_title: Was a little too big and long for me. I am 5'4" And was too long for my liking and a bit bigger
links_reviews_text: A little too big and long
Too Small

links_reviews_title: So comfy. I like a waist so tied a sweater over it.
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully
Great fit. Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear it.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear it. It fit great in the bust, the lower abs and hips didn't fit well. The color is a bit more yellow/green fluroscent looking in person, than yellow.

links_reviews_title: Loved the flirty ruffle. Wore it to a lunch date with friends.
links_reviews_text: It's a little low cut for daytime wear so I wore a nikibiki tank bra under the dress and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get the opportunity to wear it, but it's fit perfectly and the color is great.
links_reviews_text: I didn't get the opportunity to wear this dress, but if I had, it would have been a great choice. Easy to dress up or down, it works just as well in the office with a blazer or around town as is. I rented this for vacation, but it rained too much and I didn't want to risk ruining the dress. The color is vibrant and nice for a summer day or night!
Super flattering style! Wore for a rehearsal dinner for a wedding True to size
I am 5'7 and def needed the additional length with a 1-2" heel. A little more cleavage than I would have liked but overall very pleased!

Even though the skirt is brocade, it feels lightweight and overall very comfortable. Of course the pockets are fantastic. Received many compliments. Black tie appropriate, but not overly fancy/fussy. Limited downsides: I'm busty, but short, so the fit in the torso was a bit low/loose. Also, difficult to accessorize (photographs toward rose gold, but is more silver in person; lower cut makes necklace choice trickier too).

I received so many compliments on this dress! I wore it to a formal wedding, and it was perfect for the occasion. Complete with pockets, this dress was so comfortable and perfect for the evening. I'm typically a size 6, but sized down to a 4 and it fit perfectly. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and got lots of complete. And pockets!!
links_reviews_text: 5 stars for comfort, style and pockets but 4 for the length. I'm 5'4 and worse 3in heals and was almost too long still. If you are shorter then 5'4 maybe get the petite size... I got lots of complements. The photo does not do it justice. The pockets are great. This dress would be good for any of the four seasons summer or winter. I'm normally a size 4/6 in a dress but 4mo after having a baby so bust is bigger then normal and still 10lbs overweight and still wore the 4. Make sure to size down

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect for a black tie gala & so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit great and ran a little small. I would normally wear an 8R but wore a 6L. I loved it because you could still wear a normal bra too. I wear a size DD and there was definitely some cleavage but not too much. Loved wearing this dress and got lots of compliments!

Loved this dress! I got so many compliments, and I felt so comfortable and confident wearing it. The deep V neckline is no joke, but it was great! I didn't feel overexposed. I'm 5'3 and the hem length was perfect for a 2 inch heel, so it was nice not to have to wear a super high heel. The material on the top is thick with a little bit of stretch, which helped it fit perfectly. Would definitely wear again for a similar occasion!
Loved this dress. Got so many compliments. Super comfortable.
There are pockets! I wore this to a black tie event and got so many compliments. Could not have felt more comfortable and chic.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie winter wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and was so sad to have to return it. It fit true to size, I ordered a Tall (I'm 5'9 and wore 2.5 inch heels) and the length was great. My only minor complaints were it was low cut for my taste so I used some double-sided tape. The butt was also a little puffy but it kind of went with the look so that wasn't a huge deal. The color is also more champagne (pink gold) than gold, but it was beautiful. I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Arrived on time and super easy to drop off.
links_reviews_text: Reason I picked this dress was because I could wear my normal bra with it. I felt that it was a little low cut for my liking so I safety pinned and fashion tape a piece of lace. It turned out great! Super comfortable!

This dress was gorgeous! But it runs big. I'm usually an 8/10 depending on the fit through the hips and this was a 6. I ended up wearing a different dress because a friend was wearing something similar to this but will definitely keep it in mind for future weddings or formal events!

Overall the dress fit really well! I rented it for a banquet on New Year's. I loved the color of the skirt with the goldfish pink flowers. The bodice was a very comfortable material that did not feel weighed down after dancing for a long time. The cut was very flattering and worked great with a regular bra. I rented the regular length which was perfect with my heels. It also has pockets that were perfect for carrying small things around while at the banquet. I definitely recommend this dress!

This dress was wonderfully comfortable and flattering. I truly enjoyed wearing this dress and felt glamorous and beautiful. I normally wear size 8 and have a fuller bust and this dress gave me enough coverage.

This dress was incredibly comfy and has pockets! I will say it maybe ran a slight bit big. I usually wear a 2/4 but wore the 0P and with the style of the dress, the fit was perfect as well as length with my 3 inch heels. The top is stretchy so it was perfect for dancing and as an A cup, I didn't feel the top was too large. It was extremely flattering for my body type. (Small chest/petite/athletic build) It also was a thicker material great for winter. I felt like a princess! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Fit and flattered my post-baby body!
links_reviews_text: I just had a baby 2 months ago and am about 15 lbs heavier than usual, including a little belly and boobs that grow the longer I go without pumping. This dress was SO comfortable and flattering! Low cur, but I was able to wear a regular bra. It was a bit long even with heels (I am 5'6").

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and the pockets were the best. No clutch or purse needed!!
links_reviews_text: Was perfect for a last minute formal holiday party! The 6 was too big and the size 4 fit just right but was a bit long even with 4inch heels. Was glad there wasn't any dancing. Would definitely rent again!

I got so many compliments on this dress. It was really comfortable and easy to move around in. The bottom slip kept catching in my heel and I was scared I would trip but it all worked out. I must've been too short.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments all night long!
links_reviews_text: The zipper was difficult where the jacquard print changed to solid black--I would not have been able to get dressed by myself. The material near the rib cage was quite snug. In the website pictures the bottom of the dress looks to be silver but it is more of an iridescent blush champagne color. The skirt gave the appearance that I was floating on air when I walked or danced. I put my cell phone in one pocket and lipstick in the other and did not carry a purse.

Love love love. Prettier in person (this pic does not do it justice). This dress fit perfectly, was super comfortable, and had pockets! If you're taller than 5'7" and plan to wear heels - order the tall. The 4T was almost too short and I'm 5'8" - wore 2.5" heels.

I'm 5'7" and typically a size 8 in street wear. Ordered an 8 & 10, went with the 8. I might have even been able to go with a 6. The dress was the perfect length, has pockets, can wear a regular bra (with the occasional check that the bra straps aren't showing on the back of the shoulder) and was very comfortable. The v in the front was bordering on too low but with a black bra it was fine. The pleats in the back of the skirt portion made it a little poofy in the butt but only I noticed that.
I loved this dress! I feel like I'm usually so uncomfortable in most formal wear but this dress was so comfortable and it has pockets, so I didn't need to haul around a clutch all night.

For reference, I'm 5'5" and weigh about 160 lbs. I vary between a size 10 or 12. I originally had the 12 and it was way too big. RTR overnighted the 10 to me and it fit perfectly. It's lined nicely on the top, so I did not need to wear a bra. I got compliments all night!

I loved this dress. It was a replacement because my postpartum bod wasn't feeling my original rentals. Loved this. Felt so comfortable in it the whole night and received so many compliments! Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable. No special undergarments are required and I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a winner. The first two dresses I selected didn't fit at all so I was relieved by and grateful for the exceptional customer service that delivered this third option the day before my scheduled event. This was my first RTR experience and I'll try it again. I was comfortable and felt great.

This was my backup so I went with my original choice (gold sparkle for a specific event,) but I would rent this beauty again in a heartbeat. So comfortable & flattering! Plus, pockets! Perfect for a formal winter wedding.
Im 5'2" and size 2 was so long I would have been stepping even with my 5-in heels. If you are tall enough, rent it! Beautiful fabric and super comfortable plus it has pockets!

This dress was great! It was a tad snug around my rib cage, but I have a little extra cushion there anyway. The top is so comfortable and the skirt is gorgeous. It was perfect for a fall wedding, and very flattering for a chubbier girl like myself! It actually wasn't my first choice but I'm glad I got it as a backup. Definitely recommend.
Loved this dress. Tags were still on it - brand new. Runs large. Order a size down. Very full at the bottom.
So comfy, pockets!!, loved this dress. I do wish the top fit slightly tighter for a little more support, although I wouldnt have sized down. Overall, I'd definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress, was too big should have done 2.
links_reviews_text: I would say it fits TTS, should have ordered the 2 but the 4 fit.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, Looked great, and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, Looked great, and lots of compliments!
Should have sized down to a 6, which is my size but worked. Very comfortable. Hides the tummy and can wear a regular bra. Pockets are a plus.

links_reviews_title: fit great. 5'3 and length was fine. loved the dress
links_reviews_text: overall great dress!

links_reviews_title: The dress itself was beautiful but runs short large skirt.
links_reviews_text: The dress is not floor length which is cute in showing the shoes but looks like it runs small. I ordered the Long as I am tall and was short. Also at the stomach area, because of the thick material, is poofy. Very comfortable and love the neckline.
Loved the dress and it is easy to wear. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô0 and it was very long, even with heels. It also runs big. I‚Äôm usually 6/8 in formal dresses but wore the 4 in this.

Great dress. It stretchy on the top and I could have probably worn a size down but the 14R fit good. Unfortunately I ended up not wearing the dress because I chose another RTR dress but i would highly recommend it. Super comfy yet classy.
I didn't end up wearing this to my event but it would have been fantastic! Super comfortable and easy. It definitely runs big so size down.
This dress is super flattering and was great for a winter Saturday night wedding. The only thing I would say is I needed to wear a heavily padded bra to fill out the top. Would definitely rent again.

This was my second choice dress for a formal affair but it was a difficult decision. The dress is absolutely beautiful. I had been concerned from other pictures that the bodice may have been a bit low cut, but for this 44C bust it was not at all too revealing. The pockets are a nice added feature.

LOVED this dress. Not much difference between the 4R and 4L (actually had them send me an emergency back up b/c I was convinced the 4L they send was really a 4R. I had to wear kitten heels (I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù). I could have worn a 2, but they don‚Äôt offer a 2L. Not for very tall ladies. But a forgeries show-stopper, and very comfy. Loved the pockets, too!
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and it was PERFECT. Many many compliments.
At first I thought the 10 was too small but it stretched. Not too much- it was comfortable and I loved it!
This dress is everything! Gorgeous fit and color. A real show stopper

links_reviews_title: Chic and comfortable for a Fall wedding
links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly - not too tight or too loose. I did not wear a bra (and I always wear a bra!) but did wear some spanx to keep everything smooth. With a bra on, I could see a slight outline under the material. It does show lines easily even with the slightly thicker material. It was very soft and super comfortable all night. Nothing binding or to worry about with it at all. I loved the peek of the burgundy color of the slip around the hem and neck line. It's a perfect little pop of color on an otherwise elegant gold sweater-y dress. I would wear it again in a heartbeat. This was my second choice dress but after trying on my first choice (a tight sequined column) this one completely became the one. I wore it with nude heels and minimal jewelry.

I received so many compliments in this dress! It's slightly thick knit fabric clung to all the right curves (with the help of spanx). No one had a dress like it at the wedding. Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, a little over worn and small
links_reviews_text: I got constant compliments on this dress. I am 57, 138 pounds. I wanted to rent the size 6 but it was unavailable so I took a chance on the four. It was definitely tight. I could still get into it with some maneuvering and it looked fine, but I will rent us again in a six. And I will definitely rent again, an absolute favorite from RTR. This particular dress was a little overworn, the inner silk lining was falling out of the bottom of the dress. The second time I wore it I safety pinned the lining up to keep it in place.
Runs small so order up but I loved it!
I rented the 4 and the 6, but the 4 was way too small and the 6 was huge but my friend wore it and she really like it so it worked out well!
Great dress, very comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress ! I got tons od compliments !
links_reviews_text: Ran a bit smaller than i thought. Im usually an xs, but my second size (small) fit much better !
This dress was a great fit. The material was very comfortable. The only minus is the dress is like a dark blackish gold and not light how it is photographed on the model. Its still very beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Felt classy at a wedding but not attention seeking
links_reviews_text: The dress is absolutely metallic gold and looks knit without looking casual. I received many compliments during the night. The only issue I had was with the lining showing. I wore the size 6 because I was going to be dancing a lot but the 4 fit completely fine on me.

links_reviews_title: This dress was exactly what the other reviewers said it was: stunning but small. Many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The color captures & reflects the light, beautiful metallic .
The dress is gorgeous. The fabric/pleating stayed perfect all night. It does fit tight and hugs curves. I typically wear a 0/2 the 0 was very tight. I ended up wearing the 2.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Comfortable and easy wear, but very form fitting.
links_reviews_text: The dress is absolutely gorgeous! It's a great knit material with a deep red lining that is soft and heavy (not too heavy though). I received many compliments when wearing it! The only downside is that if you have curves this dress fits like a glove so make sure you wear your best spanks. Otherwise, the dress makes you feel beautiful and confident!

The dress fit like a glove! Does not allow much room for imperfections...may want to try spanx underneath. I didn't need a bra because it was very snug all the way up and the material was thick enough to hold me in too. I felt like a princess and the dress definitely made heads turn. Be prepared for the attention you'll get when you wear it!
Wouldn't recommend for summertime. Beautiful fit.

This dress fits so so well! Christian Soriano makes incredibly well-designed dresses that fit perfectly. This dress generally runs true to size. I wore it to my rehearsal dinner over New Year's. If you're on the fence, get off!

links_reviews_title: Wore for Glitz and Glamour Award Event
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size, it's a little snug putting on but material will stretch and mold to size perfectly. It's amazing in person and photographs well. Showstopper for sure !

I rented this with my unlimited subscription for my engagement photos! Needless to say, it was perfect. The knit was breathable and cool even on a hot April day. The only thing is the lining kept exposing itself and I had to continuously adjust it.

links_reviews_title: Eye-catching dress perfect for Xmas Party
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a work Christmas party during a snowy night in Denver. The dress is a knit sweater material with a red satin liner, so it is quite warm and the liner makes it very comfortable to wear. I ordered both a size 8 and a 10, but wore the 10. The size 8 fit, but the liner made it bunch in an unflattering way around the hips. Also, the dress is slightly small up top and the 10 didn't smash me down as much. I suggest ordering a backup size to ensure you'll get the best fit because it is beautiful on.
Loved this dress and got many compliments. Its defiantly true to its size and very skin tight but was comfortable all night!
Love this dress!!!! Color and fit was superb! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a friend's fancy 18th birthday. I got tons of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It fit really well, although it tended to slide up slowly so I had to keep pulling it down. Also, you can see the lining, which is actually a beautiful dark red. Overall, I loved it and felt great all night.

I received the size 6 & 8 but decided to go with the 6 because the 8 was a little too long. Loved the color of this dress & the little peek-a-boo of the deep red lining were cool! It was a thick fabric so it was nice for a winter party.

It fit nice and true to size. I used a spanx to try to smooth and flatter my mid area. I didn't need a bra because it kept it very tight on top and was a great fit. The back of the dress scrunched up slightly which I tried to pull down but it was gorgeous. It looks more like a bronze/rose pink than gold dress.

This dress was amazing! The material is much more sweater like than it appears in the pictures, so it's definitely a better dress for he fall or winter! It looked fantastic on and photographed really well! I wore the size 4 - I am 5,4", 130lbs, 34DD - it fit like a glove! I would definitely buy this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress is so beautiful and perfect for any formal event!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering and I got so many compliments! Fits true to size. I normally wear a 4 and it fit like a glove (I'm 5'7" and weigh 115lbs). The material is pretty thick so it's smooth and doesn't show any lumps and bumps. Would definitely rent it again!

I wore this dress for NYE and got so many compliments. The metallic knit was perfect and stood out against the backdrop of sequined dresses that comes with NYE. The material was a little stretchy which meant it hugged all of my curves but was still comfortable throughout the evening . Would highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Smokin Hot Big Lebowski themed Wedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this as the bride of a Big Lebowski themed wedding at our local brewery! It was amazing and memorable. The dress is Gorgeous! Everyone said I looked "smokin hot". It is comfortable to wear, I definitely recommend spanx. Covers in all the right places. Love! Love! Also, RTR was amazing. They sent 2 sizes of another gorgeous dress because they didn't have the 8. The packaging, the timing, the extra dress, the customer service is all top knotch and EASY!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but does run very small.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a NYE wedding. It was great! More of a thick, sweater-like material. Runs very small. I normally wear a 6, this was a 8 and was still a little tight. Def go 1 size up, and get your backup as 2 sizes up. Has a burgundy undergarment/slip that kind of shows, but it's pretty so it didn't bother me. Dress is more of a bronze, rose gold color. My fave part was the straps on the shoulders and the back. Would def recommend!!!

The dress is very comfortable and shapes you well. The length is perfect for a winter party night. It was thicker than I expected and got compliments in it all night. The slip inside was soft and fit well. I recommend this dress to anyone who wants to look glamours and be comfortable.
What a fantastic dress!! I wore it to a black tie optional NYE event and received a million complaints. It stood apart from all the other dresses in the room.
I wore the size four for a Christmas party. It fit like a glove. It's a gorgeous and comfortable dress!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper, but still conservative enough for my work event.
links_reviews_text: This dress is SUPER COMFORTABLE. It's made of a sweater style fabric, so it's heavy enough so that it doesn't ride up at all when you walk, but has really soft lining. There really aren't any cons, other than the fact that you may need some assistance zipping it all the way up.

Very pretty and unique. Wore it for a holiday party and definitely stood out from the LBDs and sequins. It fits true to size - has a bit of give but is somewhat unforgiving, given the form-fitting style and color. The color/material isn't as pictured on the model. I was expecting a flimsy sheeny material, and it is more of a sweater material that is gold in color.

links_reviews_title: Just couldn't have been any more perfect!
links_reviews_text: I chose this dress because is was tasteful, festive and glamorous - exactly what I needed for my company Holiday party. I tried on both sizes several times before I ultimately decided to wear the 8 because the lining kept poking out on the 6. Both were equally flattering and comfortable. Got compliments all night and felt like a celebrity :)

This dress fit me like a glove. I am straight and narrow, flat stomach but still wore Spanx because the stomach is truly unforgiving no matter what size you are. It looked more polished with spanx. Runs slightly small in the bust. No bra needed. Definitely pair this dress with a simple black clutch and simple shoes. The texture is a lot heavier in person. Also, the color photographs better than what it looks like in person. It's kind of a dull rose gold thick sweater material. The inside is a dark maroon silk lining. Would not wear this in warm weather.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and a unique color!
links_reviews_text: I am a 2-4, but usually a 2. and I needed help zipping the 4 up. Size up for your backup. That said, the dress stretches once on- I was comfortable the whole night. I felt special and sexy and received compliments by many at the California autumn wedding I attended. Length was perfect, just past the knees at 5"4. Bonus: no bra needed!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my birthday party and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and very comfortable. It was a tad bit warm so it is probably meant more for colder seasons.

links_reviews_title: It was a perfect night for a black tie with fireworks!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing! I am tall, so the long was a perfect length with a two inch heel. The material was very flattering, thick but not hot, with enough stretch to really hold everything where it belongs. I used a strapless bra and SPANX and I felt great. My night was filled with compliments. I would rent this again and in every color!
Loved the color, good fit, just a tad too long
Beautiful color and fit. Was a little long but okay with 4" heels.
I've worn this dress in 3 different colors and I love it every time. The length, the fit, the color...it was perfect!
Great dress perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Great formal dress for first/second trimester!
links_reviews_text: Wore this at 14 weeks pregnant with baby #2. Rented my normal size and it fit and looked great. Just enough room for my bump and was flattering. I'm 5' 9" and wore 3 inch heels, glad I got the "long" length, would have been too short otherwise.

I never wear long dresses but was nervous to be cold at a winter wedding. This dress was perfect! The material is nice and thick, and the blue color is gorgeous. The length was a little long (I'm only 5'4'') but with a tall heel it was perfect.

This was my backup so I didn't end up wearing but I've saved to rent again. The color is gorgeous. The bust area wad a tad loose so would have had to wear a bra or size down. It also had room in the middle so would order the 4. Length on the long was perfect for 3-4 inch heels. A little too simple for the deb ball but could be dressed up with fur, or bold necklace. Would definitely be a comfy and easy dress to wear!

links_reviews_title: Rented this dress for a black tie wedding in December & this dress couldn't have been more perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove, and was perfect for a black tie winter wedding. I didn't need to wear my spanx or use any dress tape. Probably could've worn a regular strapless bra, but mine isn't comfortable so I went with sticky boobs instead & had no problem with them not showing. The length was perfect & short enough in 3 inch heels for me to dance and be able to walk easily without having to hold up the dress. Couldn't be happier with this rental!!

Love this dress! Rented It for a black tie wedding and it did not disappoint. True to size, wore the 0 regular with 4" heels and it was perfect (I am 5'5"). It was comfortable to dance in all night. Would definitely recommend!

I wore an 8, it was pretty form fitting and I could have probably worn an 10 but it looked great still, just a little short if you want tall heels. I have curves, and not a flat stomach but the thickness of this dress made everything lay so nicely.

Loved wearing this dress! It was true to size in the body but quite large on top. I am a 34B, and I had to wear two push-up bras to fill out the top. Definitely meant for women with D cups and larger.

links_reviews_title: First time renting, got tons of compliments, process was so easy!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 2 or 4 depending on brand. Previous reviews said the main difference between regular and petite fit was length and I would agree. The 4 regular was a little baggy in spots, and the 2 petite was definitely tighter but fit great with Spanx. I wore ~3 inch heels without issue. You need a strapless bra as there is no padding. I did steam the dress a little bit was afraid to get fabric too hot- it could handle it if you have a few wrinkles.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my stepdaughters wedding!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was extremely comfortable and easy to wear. The fabric has some stretch and kept its shape for the wedding and late into the night at the reception. I would definitely recommend this dress. I am 6'tall and wore 2" heals.

Wore this to a black tie event. I was not in love when I tried it on in the hotel room but it ended up doing so well at the event. I got tons of compliments. The size was a little large but still seemed to cling onto problem areas, so definitely needed spanx and silicone coverups.

links_reviews_title: I could live in this dress
links_reviews_text: SO comfortable and incredibly chic. It's a thicker material so it hides tummies well. I still wore Spanx to smooth everything but I could have slept in it it was that comfy. Got so many compliments!

I rented this for my friend's 'black tie optional' wedding and it was a huge hit. So comfortable! I'm not usually a long in anything but I found the regular to be a little too short with heels. Dress was in great condition!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for the Air Force ball! It gave me room where I needed it and looked elegant.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Great length; I am 5'9" and I wore 1" short heels with the regular length dress. The dress was stunning without being too flashy. It was a little right around my neck/shoulders, but that's a common problem for me and it was not so tight as to be uncomfortable- just something I noticed when I first slipped it on. 10/10 recommend!

I chose "true to size", however I am large busted and the normal size I would have chosen was a bit snug across the chest. This size gave me the room I needed. This dress is bright blue. To date, this is my absolute favorite rental ever. A huge thank you to RTR for sending this to me a bit earlier than anticipated. As you can see, I was able to get my mans tuxedo to match w this extra time allowance. You will love this dress! It does have some flexibility in the fabric.

I am an hourglass shape and the dress definitely hugged it perfectly!!! I ordered an 8L & a 10R, the 8L fit better even though it was a little too long but the 10 was a little too big all around. Great dress it has full lining & I wore a strapless bra but no spanx neededü§ó #bluefits #septwedding #lovedit

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Fit me like a glove and was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The cobalt blue color was a hit at the gala I attended. LOVE Badgley Mischka!
Loved the dress- it was comfortable and fit great. It was too long but I'm 5'4" and prefer a shorter heel.

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful in this dress! The perfect length, great material, I didn‚Äôt need a bra or spanx!
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful and I received many compliments all night long! I have gained lots of weight recently but this dress is very flattering on curves.
Fit true to size, wore a strapless bra underneath which worked well. For the long, you definitely need heels (mine were 3‚Äù) if you are 5‚Äô9‚Äù.

I don't normally like anything to curve-hugging on my body, but after many (MANY) issues with my original order, this dress got sent to me last-minute. In a sea of black tuxedos, the blue definitely stands out! The halter neck makes it hard to wear a bra, but I used adjustable/clear straps and it was hardly noticeable while holding the girls in place. Also paired with shapewear around the middle (this dress will highlight your waist, but also anything else near your waist!) and this looked great. The length was perfect for me at 5'2" with ~3" heels. I really didn't want to like this one, but it ended up looking great and I felt like a model in a perfume ad - without feeling to "sexy" for work. Also, it's one of the lighter dresses that I can wear for a black-tie event in DC summers, most of them have been much heavier so that was an extra plus. I kept the accessories simple and let the color stand out.
Wore this to a wedding and it was perfect. Loved the fit and color. Felt great dancing all night long!

links_reviews_title: This dress was spectacular, and a total show stopper. Got tons of compliments on the color!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit great, and the nice heavy fabric (over Spanx) made me feel really comfortable and covered. I wore stickers instead of a bra, and it was fine, but you'll want some support. It was just *barely* long enough with about a 3" heel, in the long size. Now for the cons: I would have bought this dress from RTR in a NANOSECOND, except for one thing: it twisted all night long. I kept having to yank it back into place. The zipper would get out of alignment, at one point one of my stickers was starting to show, it just kept wandering around me like a cyclone. I'm crushed, because it looked and felt amazing, but that lining just wasn't well made. For one night though, so worth it.

I rented this dress for a wedding. It was a good fit, a little big in the top and a little long for me but a padded bra and heels just about fixed that. It was a great dress to dance in as well, everything stays in place and it doesn't show sweat.

I originally ordered the 8R as that's my everyday size and while it fit, it was snug where I didn't want it to be. The 10R was perfect! I wore three inch heels and it was perfect for the length of the dress. No bra necessary as the bust was snug enough to be comfortable without sacrificing form.

links_reviews_title: This dress will make you feel fabulous
links_reviews_text: I was *very* nervous when renting this dress. I am pretty curvy and have gained a fair amount of weight within the last year. I'm usually a size 8/10 in most things. I wear a size M in unisex shirts. This dress made me feel amazing. It was the perfect length for me with a 3in wedge and hugged all my curves just right (with spanx of course). I was able to wear a strapless bra with no issue. I did pair it with a large scarf, but the blue color was easy to match. I felt really glamorous and my husband joked it was "bachelorette night 1 dress" that would definitely get the first impression rose! Haha!

Went with the petite because other reviews said it was short. The 2P fit wonderful. Very nice color. I wore 2-3 inch heals (not sure exactly) and I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù. My backup size was 4P and I didn‚Äôt even try it on. Length was perfect. I needed to wear a slightly padded bra to fill out the bust, but my bust is on the smaller size.

links_reviews_title: I felt very elegant! I received so many compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding. I‚Äôm short so I was very nervous about the length, but once I put some heels on I felt great in it. The dress did drag a little but I loved that! Definitely made me feel extravagant. I‚Äôm very self conscious about my midsection and I usually wear spandx to smooth out my insecure areas. But I didn‚Äôt have to wear any with this dress and I felt the most confident that night. I did size up so that probably added to the comfort level but it fit like a glove, I looked great and felt incredibly comfortable. Highly recommended for an elegant night while still staying comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Stunning backup dress comes to the rescue
links_reviews_text: This dress was a surprise winner for me. The dress I had originally ordered looked horrendous on me, so RTR overnighted this and a different backup dress to me for a masquerade ball I was going to. I thought it was pretty true to size, if even the teensiest bit big. While I have a wider midsection, I thought it gave me decent curves. The bust was the roomiest, and even though I am a C-cup, I still used double-sided tape to make sure it didn't gap and stayed flat. A normal strapless bra worked well underneath. I'm 5'9" and wore 3-inch heels and the length was perfect. I could've gotten away with 2-2.5 inch heels too, but anything under that would've made it too long. The color was stunning, and the fabric felt nice but not too heavy for a very warm, summer evening. I would buy this if I could!
I received so many compliments about the color and style of this dress. I am normally size 4-6 in all other clothes but 8P fit me comfortably. Highly recommend for formal event

links_reviews_title: Hugged all the curves in the right places!
links_reviews_text: I was a little disappointed that I couldn't where my first choice. This was my backup dress and honestly it should have been my first choice! It hugged all the curves in the right places! It's beautiful and elegantly comfortable! This is an amazing dress to dance the night away on the dance floor!

This beautiful blue dress was rented for a military ball. The 4P fit perfectly with 4 inch heels and was snug and thick enough that I did not have to wear a bra. I am 5'2" 135 lbs with a booty and upper back/ shoulder muscles. The material did crease when shipped so have a steamer handy to release any creases. This dress made me feel confident and was very flattering on my mom bod. I loved this dress and did not want to send it back. Highly recommend.
Dress was perfect for a LA wedding. This was my first time renting and I will definitely be renting again. Dress fit amazing. I got a ton of compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: The flare on the bottom was unexpected and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: Definitely needed smoothing garments underneath.

I rented this dress last minute and got the 6R, I am about 5'9" and I had to wear flat sandals and it barely touched the ground. I wanted the 6L but it wasnt available. The fit was really nice, I have a larger chest (34D) and I didn't need to wear a bra with the dress and my chest was contained perfectly.

This dress is a beautiful blue color. I received several compliments throughout the evening. Very comfortable and flattering cut. Loved it. It was a little long, even with heels but it was not too long to where I wasn't able to dance or enjoy the evening.

The fit was perfect, hugged the curves but had stretch to move and dance. Gorgeous shade of pink and very versatile. The fabric was forgiving and avoided wrinkles, a plus considering the travel to the wedding was warm and a little long. Received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: First order from RTR and very pleased

links_reviews_text: Well made / good quality
It had a stain in the chest area, but other than that is was really cute.

I'm usually a size 4/6. The 4 fit like a glove. There was a little extra fabric on the hips, but it wasn't terribly noticeable. The dress holds your legs together pretty tight, so if you're a big dancer, this might not be for you.
Worn for a birthday party. Great fit, a bit long.

I love this dress, it's so understated but the detail on the shoulder and the fine tailoring made my hourglass figure look so good! This is a must rent! It does have stretch and it fits true to size. Fully lined yes not uncomfortable.

This was a last-minute back up after my choice was unavailable. While a bit snug for the typical size 8, once on it is soft, light fabric and a beautiful color. I also loved the neckline and fluttery sleeves. I highly recommend this piece!
Gorgeous dress but shows every bump and line. Ended up returning.
This dress was classy, chic and oh, so comfortable! Figure flattering and sweet. Perfect for a spring/summer event. Lots of compliments. Felt comfortable all evening long! A must have!

I ordered an 8 and a 10 as I am between sizes, and the 8 fit perfectly. I am about 5'10", 160 lbs and felt super comfortable in this dress all night. The straps were a bit loose even though I am a DD cup. I just had to adjust them for photos, but loved the dress overall! If you are in between sizes, I recommend the size down. One hundred percent would wear again! So many compliments!
Great option for a summer wedding. The length made it a tad dressier (in a good way). Great option if you have curves :)

This is a beautiful, understated, and classy dress. The ruffles on the sleeves give it a little bit of interesting detail. The below the knee length makes it appropriate for any occasion such as a graduation which is where I wore this. There is a little bit of stretch to the fabric, so it was very comfortable (we ate dinner and I didn't feel constricted sitting or after eating). I was able to wear a normal bra, but used fashion tape so the bra straps didn't stick out. The dress is not see-through, but it will easily show underwear lines, so Shapeware is recommended to hide it. It is a very pretty soft pink, so great for a light feel for a daytime event. Not overly in your face sexy, but sophisticated sexy. Very spring/summer. Overall I really liked the dress, felt great it in, and received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! So comfortable and easy to dance in - true to size!
links_reviews_text: The perfect length for any wedding - classy yet sexy - felt like a rockstar!

links_reviews_title: Recommended size was too big, couldn't wear it so I traded it for a size 2, fit perfectly. Great
links_reviews_text: Loved it. Very pretty dress, a little low cut so definitely better for a party than work.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It was form fitting but was easy to dance the night away in! I am a little shorter so it actually came down mid calf on me. However, this wasn't an issue and I never felt restricted in movement. I did feel like I was pulling up the front a bit. Reviews told me that it was a bit low-cut in the front, which was fine. I never felt uncomfortable, I just wore the wrong strapless bra and had to keep pulling it up to prevent my bra from showing. Looking back, I probably could have gone without a bra or some double sided tape to my bra would have helped. The dress is comfortable and easy to use the restroom in. I rented a 6 as an extra size, just in case, and never even tried it on! I would definitely rent this dress again.

I am a 6/8 on top and an 8/10 on the bottom. The 8 was comfortably snug and I wore a push up bra to help fill out the top and felt great in this dress. Only flaws were the lining would bunch some and show a wrinkle on the outer fabric. Also, I felt like the seams puckered some, even in the areas that weren't snug.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a summer wedding. I loved the color and the fit. Though slim, it's not restrictive.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit, wouldn't change anything about it.
I wore this to my sister's baby shower. I received plenty of compliments and felt amazing it in. I had enough room to sit, stand, squat , etc. Runs true to size. I would definitely recommend!

The original dress I ordered arrived damaged (lace overlay with a tear on the back of it) and they didn't have another one in my size so I chose this as a replacement. I loved it! Post-baby I'm 145 and was expecting to fit the size 6, but luckily they sent me 2 sizes because the 4 fit great. It was big in the bust though, every time I lifted my arms to hug someone the dress slid down a little and you could see my bra. Almost like it's made for a taller person, like the straps were too long. The wedding planner actually safety pinned them to my bra straps in the back to keep it in place. Other than that it was super comfortable and everyone loved it. Definitely recommend!
Fits like a glove. I wasn't a big fan of the mid-calf hemline, but I know that's trendy these days. Love how comfy the dress was on the inside and the femininity of it!
Beautiful dress. Gained some weight over the holiday but the dress had stretch so it still fit & hugged my curves in a flattering way.
Fit like a glove. Very flattering.
This was a beautiful dress. The shoulder details and ruffles were adorable. I really liked the fabric and the liner fabric. The length was perfect, not too high not too low.

The style of this dress is beautiful along with the blush pink color. The straps are a unique detail i loved. The length was also quite sexy. A bit tight in the mid-section. But i do recommend this dress to anyone
Super comfortable.
Wore for a fall wedding and received tons of compliments. Loved the length and classy appeal. Would definitely rent this one again!
Flexible and form fitting, true to size, danced all night. Received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This was worn to an exceptionally beautiful bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I felt gorgeous in this dress. This dress was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Elegant and sassy at the same time. Fit like a glove, yet comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Future daughter-in-law's bridal shower. Was a pleasure to wear - felt great in this dress. I'm a 38D and had no issues with the neckline. Shapewear for my tummy probably would have been a good idea since this dress fits like a glove. Jyst had to be vigilant about my posture. Received lots of compliments. LOVE RENT THE RUNWAY!

links_reviews_title: Hip-hugging, flirty look with a retro flair!
links_reviews_text: I'm a short woman with an athletic, hour-glass build and this dress fit like a glove! If you want to flaunt your curves then this is the dress to rent. It was comfortable and easy to dance in (most important at a wedding!) and I felt like a million dollars. It definitely had a Mad Men / 50's retro feel to it with the snug fit and tea-length cut. I wore short, thin spandex and a strapless bra which didn't show lines under the dress fabric.

links_reviews_title: Good for 5 ft tall with thickness!
links_reviews_text: At first I was nervous because when I received my dresses they looked too long. I'm only 5 ft tall and I was afraid the dress will reach my ankles when the model in the pic has her's up to her knees. I was surprised that size 8 fit so well. The bust area was a little big so I had to be aware of bra exposure but otherwise happy with the dress! Just be careful when taking a step up, the seems along the back area can rip!

Rented this beautiful dress for a wedding. It runs true to size and it is curves friendly. I'd suggest to wear it with strapless bra, I did. This way you don't have to worry about the bra straps showing. I had to order it a size up because of my hips, so the top was a bit big. I also don't have that much of a bust, or that would've helped. So if you don't have as much hips, order your normal size. The dress doesn't give you that much stretch, but it somewhat does. Overall, I loved the way it looks on me and I felt like a million bucks.

This dress was so fun to wear. It's girly yet sexy. The color pink is less of a nude-pink and more of a pepto pink but not in a bad way! I'm a pear shape with smaller boobs so I thought this dress worked wonders for my body type! Favorite RTR rental so far.
Fit like a glove and very flattering.
Everyone loved the dress. Fit wonderfully. Thought the six would be tight but it was perfect.

LOVED the color of this dress. Great quality, it has a wonderful satin lining. I wore Spanx to help smooth me out. I am petite, so the dress hit just below my knees and the shoulders were a bit too long so I had to pull it up a few times to keep my bra from showing because it is low cut. Overall I wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: The dress was pretty, but I probably wouldn‚Äôt rent it again.
links_reviews_text: My biggest complaint was that the top was loose and low-cut. I needed to pin the straps up and use some double sided tape. Other than that, it was a pretty color, received lots of compliments.

I LOVED this dress.. its simple and classy, but a little bit sexy due to how low cut it is. Beware does show a lot of cleavage, so don't rent this unless you're comfortable with that. I definitely felt like I was pulling it up pretty consistently.

Loved the dress! Got so many compliments! And the fabric was very soft and comfy. Love the flirty touch of the ruffle on the sleeves! I had enough room to breath and eat in the 4, the 6 was too big and my boobs didn't fill it. I wore a strapless bra with the 4, but really didn't need to if I didn't want to. Was comfortable all night!
Loved this for day time or night! Wore it 3 times on my vacation in Maui (babymoon). Was super comfy- wore the M and Im currently 28 weeks pregnant and 150 lb.

The dress was perfect for my Baby Shower!! It fit perfect with adjustable straps, comfy and flowy but still giving shape to baby bump!! I received a lot of compliments!! I wore a large at 33 weeks pregnant. May have fit in medium but got Lg and Xl as my two options. Would definitely re order this dress!!
I rented this dress for my baby shower and it was beautiful! I got so many complaints! Would consider buying it in non maternity size for the future!!
This dress was so comfortable for a summer wedding at 6 Months pregnant. I'm 5'3" and currently 161 lbs and this dress was PERFECT. I might look to purchase!
Loved this dress! Wore to maternity photos and bridal shower.

links_reviews_title: Great pregnancy option; could be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a special date night with my husband while 27 weeks pregnant. Shows a lot of cleavage, but as long as you're comfortable with that, it looks fantastic. Super comfortable and flowing elsewhere with adjustable straps. I felt great all night!

links_reviews_title: Too small in chest, so I threw a tee under it
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and really wish It didn't give me porn star cleavage because it was so darling . However, I threw a little tee under it and it made for a very cute daytime dress..I ran errands in and kept it on for a casual dinner party with friends. The medium fit my 32 week pregnant bump nicely.

Wore this to my baby brunch and it was so comfy. I'm 5' 10" so I was worries it would be short but the L was perfect and I even wore heels with it. Boob area is on the smaller side, if you're busty it may be revealing. Overall effortless and beautiful.

Such a fun and comfortable maternity dress. Wore at 37 weeks (175 lbs , 34E chest, normally a 6 in clothes) and got compliments from everyone. Warning: your girls will be out and proud, but if you're comfortable with that the dress is elegant, light for the summer, and doesn't make you look enormous otherwise. Best maternity rental so far!

I'm 25 weeks, but I'll probably keep this for the third trimester too! It's so flattering-- although if you are busty, you may want to size up. I'm a 34 B and it was perfect in my normal pre-pregnancy size, no need to size up if you are small chested.

Oh boy this dress made RTR maternity worth it all. What a STUNNING dress. I felt so amazing in this. The material is gorgeous and the pattern is so sunny and beautiful. I did rent it intending to wear it to the office and on the weekend but it's actually fairly sexy, so don't plan on wearing it to work at all. I also might have a hard time commenting on size fit because I rented the medium when I'm ALWAYS a small, but I'm 33 weeks in this and getting a little bigger. I didn't needs to unzip it to get it on, though but I'd say if you're between sizes just go up cause it didn't feel big on me one bit. Also the top is very low cut but oh so flattering for those pregnancy boobs. Girls, I know you've got them and THIS is the dress to show them off!! The length hit the floor PERFECTLY on me at 33 weeks in flats. I'm 5'9". So if you're less pregnant or shorter you might need a short heel but it's nice and long for the tall and very pregnant ladies. I'd wear this not pregnant if it's not unflattering without a belly (not sure). LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVEEEEE!! Rent this before it's gone!

links_reviews_title: It‚Äôs a really comfortable dress that fits my 8th month baby bump.
links_reviews_text: I liked it, and it was long enough for my 5‚Äô10‚Äù height (adjustable straps, wore with flats). The only hesitation is that there was a lot of chest showing, but that‚Äôd work for the right occasion. You‚Äôll probably want sticky boobs or some other support in addition to the dress; it‚Äôs a single layer of fabric.
I rarely wear things more than once and this dress was everything. I wore it 3 times. I felt confident in it and it was a beautiful material that breathed well.

I am 22 weeks pregnant and usually wear a size 6-8 dress. I rented the XLR thinking it would give me room to breathe. It fit perfectly, which was great, but not what I expected. It had adjustable straps that definitely needed adjusting. Overall it's a lovely maxi and still fit me, but there's no stretchiness in the material, so be warned!
It fit me perfectly and I received so many compliments. The top part is small but fit me.

Fun print in flattering colors, this dress is perfect for a shower or summer wedding! It felt a bit too formal for everyday wear for me. Fits well with lots of room for bump, but if your breasts have grown significantly during your pregnancy you'll find this dress doesn't provide a lot of coverage. It stays put, but there was definitely more of me out there than I'd normally be comfortable with.
I wore this everywhere. The stomach is super accommodating and the cut is flattering. I got a ton of compliments. Also took maternity photos in it. So pretty.

links_reviews_title: Great maternity but shows a lotta chest
links_reviews_text: Great to show off maternity boobs but wouldn't work for work as low cut , fairly tight on top with minimal give which seemed odd for maternity piece, but lots of room for the belly and comfy on the bottom half
I wore this out to dinner on vacation and loved it! The print is beautiful and it was comfortable to wear at 29 weeks pregnant. Highly recommend!
Worked great as a maternity option due to fit.
Mine came new with tags and is just beautiful in quality and design. Loved it but at 5'1" the SR was way too long even with a heel. Couldn't wear it.

Loved this jumpsuit! I wasn't sure about wearing this out for date night until my husband saw me and he had to pick his jaw up from the floor. He said I had to wear it. I got compliments from strangers and everything! It was so comfortable and is a really really bold statement. If I hadn't had the push from my husband I'm not sure I would have worn this, but I'm so glad I did!
Zip and go.. Treated like a celebrity wearing this sweet number!!

links_reviews_title: most stunning outfit i've ever worn
links_reviews_text: i mean absolutely the most gorgeous piece i've ever worn from rent the runway. i looked amazing and loved every moment in this jumpsuit. head to toe absolutely stunning.

I was afraid this would be unflattering, showing off all my secrets, but it was just the opposite. This jumpsuit is why you invest in high quality material! It was perfection. The material is thick, the jumpsuit fits like a glove and you don't need any shapewear because the jumpsuit looks so good on! My husband said I needed to buy this one and I agree. Hope it goes on a deeper sale at some point. I'm 5'9" and definitely needed the "long" length.
I'm 5'9 and between a four and six. I wish I could have gotten a long ... but they only had a regular. I made it work. Stunning color and ruffle detail. Amazing fabric!!! Rent this one!
This jumpsuit is amazing!! Love the color!! Material is amazing! Fit perfectly!
I loved the fit of the jumpsuit & how great it looked on me! The back is cut very low, but it was still fun. I got tons of compliments. Definitely will rent again!!

This outfit is smoking! Check out my stats, I'm not skinny but felt awesome in it! Def no underwear or bra can be worn. That kinda bugged me because I kept feeling like it was gonna give me cameltoe! Ha!! My husband actually asked me how much it was to buy it! Please forgive the pic from the dirty bar bathroom!

The color on this jump suit is amazing! I was surprised that the Regular wasn't too long on me since I'm short so I'm glad I didn't get a different size. You won't be able to wear a bra and be aware that any undergarments will show. The material is thick and comfortable. The only downside was that I felt like I had camel toe all night because it tends to ride up in the crotch area. Other than that, it's a gorgeous piece.

Had my eye on this for Valentine's Day and was constantly checking my hearts to grab it. So glad I got it ! Comments about size made me get a 4 rather than 2 which was spot on. While it's skin tight the material shapes the body incredibly well. Kind of like a giant comfy pair of spanx. I'm 5'2" and with heels the length was perfect. This is a must wear !!
This jumper fits like a glove....almost feels like a scuba suit. Absolutely love it. This was my second time renting this piece.
Wore this for my office holiday party and got so many compliments! Appropriate enough for a work event but still fun. Would definitely rent again

Like other reviewers mentioned it was short and no zipper. Very form fitting so you could see the pants pockets. Not sure I could have sized up because it was already falling off my shoulders as is. With all that being sad it was a fun outfit to wear out to the Nutcracker with my family.
The fabric was very stretchy, however, it showed every single thing. The back is really cute, but the front is really boring.
I felt glamorous, sexy, beautiful and comfortable in this jumpsuit. It sat perfectly. I am 5.6 and 112 pounds. I highly recommend it. #gorgeous #perfectfit

This jumpsuit was amazing. Although NO zippers and skin tight, it was a truly wonderful piece. So many compliments and the pockets were a wonderful addition. I have rented many pieces from this same designer and they are all beautiful. Would definitely rent again. Show stopper.
Super flattering got tons of compliments
Excellent for tall & curvy girls! Only thing I didn't like were the pockets (visible on an otherwise smooth and skintight outfit)

It fit really well and I could go braless! The reason for the 4-star review is that I received it stained, which really bummed me out, but thankfully it was not so prominent to ruin photos or my happy feelings about the jumpsuit.

This is a review for the Ruffle Jumpsuit. I had a lot of mixed feelings about this: Let‚Äôs start with the cons- I felt like the crotch area felt pretty exposed. You can‚Äôt really wear a bra, so be prepared to let the ladies be free. this jumpsuit is thick. I wore Spanxs shorts only because I wanted some belly control. Even though the jumpsuit is thick it still reveals panty/pastie lines. Pro-. I wore this while walking around in New Orleans, i did sweat but the jumpsuit breathed relatively well. I got a lot of compliments (random people on the street). The jumpsuit is cute. The pant length is pretty long too. As a 5‚Äô10, it was perfect.

As a curvy woman, it is really hard to find something that'd fit my top and my bottom equally. This jumpsuit is perfect with someone with small waistline and wide hips. As you can see from the pictures, it hugged me in all the right places and enhanced all my "assets"! I wore it to a work holiday party. It was a little bit inappropriate for the event, but I didn't worry too much since there way an open bar and everyone was very relaxed and comfortable. The material is stretchy, so it'll hug you were it fits and will stretch where it doesn't. I wish they had it in other colors. Overall, highly recommended for women with curves and love jumpsuits like me. PS. If you're short, make sure you have high heels on. The legs are very long and they'll drag on the floor if you don't have the right height.
Super comfortable! Stretchy and thick material Keeps everything in. Super fabulous!
Amazing material thick and stretchy.... very forgiving

Love this brand and LOVED this jumpsuit. The back is beautiful! It's long in the legs but I'm short and as long as I had on some higher heels I was fine. Highly recommend! There's some nice stretch in it but if you have a long torso, definitely size up. It's not forgiving in the crotch area. Otherwise - it's perfect!!! A real stand out look.
I can't believe I didn't take a photo from behind to show the back! I was comfortable all night and received compliments from everyone!
This jumpsuit fit amazingly!! So beautiful. I got so many compliments
This brand is amazing! The material is thick and lays perfectly. I am trying the blue jumpsuit next. Anything in this brand is amazing! I have tried 3 and will be ordering more soon.
Wore this on a music festival cruise and also to a work function. Big hit!
No zipper, slips on the body perfect and looks and feels great! A tad short on me for my 5'8 plus heels look

Everyone has already said this - great material - thick enough to smooth out all the lumps ! The color is very red and dramatic- I have never seen a aimilar outfit I love it very much - will rent again

links_reviews_title: I got a compliment from everyone when I wore this. It‚Äôs simple but unique.
links_reviews_text: I loved everything about the fit. I‚Äôm weary of one piece because I‚Äôm tall so I need the height (5‚Äô7‚Äù) yet I wear small sizes because I‚Äôm thin (120 lbs) but the 38 fit perfect everywhere. It was long enough so not too much of my heel or ankle was showing. I wanted to keep it!!

The fit was very tight much tighter than I am used to wearing, but the thick material smooths you out and just looks so sleek and beautiful. If you want to be the center of attention in a sea of black dresses this needs to be your top pick.

I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit! I would absolutely rent it again. This was actually a back up outfit that I wasn't too keen on when I ordered it. But WOW!! It is fantastic in person. I felt more comfortable with the sleeves off the shoulder as it was a tad tight on the shoulders as pictured on the model.

links_reviews_title: Valentines Day Perfection!! Love this jumper!!!
links_reviews_text: This literally just stretches on with no zippers or buttons or anything! The material is thick and flattering and didnt need a bra. My boyfriend was obsessed with it! Cant wait to rent again!!
H

links_reviews_title: The jumpsuit was amazing for my birthday! I received so many compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit fits like a glove. If you have a hips or a butt, order a size up.

I rented this red number for my birthday dinner using unlimited. I needed something sexy AND stretchy as we were set to dine on multiple courses. This jumpsuit totally fit the bill. Pros: scuba fabric is THE BEST, perfect stretch and support, no bra required (and my girls are substantial); cut is flattering, length was great with 4.5" heels; POCKETS! Cons: um.....there is one side angle that looks weird?! But who cares unless you're a model! I styled this with a (rented) floral embroidered clutch, nude laced valentino pumps and heavy gold jewelry.

links_reviews_title: I seriously felt like a million bucks in this jumpsuit. Everyone loved it
links_reviews_text: Nice stretch to the material but also hugs and holds you in where needed.
Shows flaws. But loved it. Have to have the long
Beautiful. Great material, stretchy. Amazing color. Back is gorgeous.
Pretty for a bridesmaid dress! I needed A LOT of fashion tape to keep the straps up. The top was big. Looked cute with a tiny baby bump. Loved the color

Wore as MOH in a wedding (right of the bride). It fit as expected and was such a lovely, beautiful and delicate dress. Would be a bit hard for someone with larger bust that needs a bra as the lay out of the gown really doesn't allow for it. I used some boob tape which worked great.

I loved how flowy this dress is and I was going to find a way to wear it...one way or the other. The top is sooo low and soooo big there's no way to wear it as is. I safety pinned both shoulders up and then sewed myself into the middle part. I loved how it looked walking and dancing but it wrinkled up fast. I'm just not sure it was worth all the hard work
I'm usually a small-medium but don't have a large bust so went w the small. It fit perfectly and you can adjust it since it's a wrap dress. Perfect bridesmaid dress!

Fit was as expected and petite length was perfect (which was a nice surprise). The fabric was more forgiving than expected, although it did wrinkle easily. Main flag: the ‚Äòstraps‚Äô on this dress are very loose which makes the front portion pretty revealing. I ended up using a piece of fabric to tie the straps together in the back, which worked perfectly. I added a bit of fashion tape as well and felt secure and comfortable dancing all night.

I rented this as an option for my engagement party and to scope out the brand as I am considering it for bridesmaid dresses. The skirt fit true to size but the top was too big for me. I love the dress but picked something else to wear.

links_reviews_title: Don't be fooled. You can't wear a bra with this.
links_reviews_text: love everything about this dress, except that in the photos it appears to have a back and when i recieved it, it did not. I tried multiple sticky bra options, or even strap extenders. Nothing would work to make this baby wearable. Not suitable for anyone with boobs.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful concept but wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen.
links_reviews_text: It was a beautiful concept and color but the top fits large. I wouldn't even be able to sit down without flashing everyone. I feel like it was a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen. Didn't end up wearing it.

XS - way too small for anyone with any boobs (not enough fabric to cover) S - there is enough fabric to cover the boobs, but lots of length in the torso (I'm 5'2", had to pin up the fabric on the shoulders and it looked weird) weird fitting. could work, but needs to be fitted. still required a good amount of fashion tape and safety pins...

links_reviews_title: The fit just did not work. straps/ sleeves were so loose I couldn't keep them from sliding down.
links_reviews_text: The straps/ sleeves were so loose I couldn't keep them from sliding down, but the skirt/waist was tight.

This dress didn't impress like I was hoping for. It was ridiculously baggy in the chest - the ruffles added too much bulk to the already baggy chest area - there was also about a foot of extra fabric on the bottom of the dress. Even if I had worn 5" heels, I would have been tripping over the dress all night long.
Beautiful flowy silk dress with asymmetric look. Only downside was that it wrinkled easily and was a little clingy.

I wore this dress with a pashmina to Dubai. The length was great and I could have taken the shawl off to show even more style. I loved how unique this dress was! Will probably rent again for an American event.

I wore this dress to a museum gala. From the moment I stepped out of the car, I received nothing but compliments. The dress is made of silk and was so comfortable to wear and dance in. It ran true to size. I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô2‚Äù so I definitely needed to wear 2.5‚Äù heels, which I already owned. As you can see from the photo, because of my (lack of) height, I didn‚Äôt have as dramatic a high/low effect as shown on the model. I had to be mindful going up and down stairs not to trip.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful putting this dress on
links_reviews_text: Not idea for breast enhancement but we made it work. If feels chic and elegant.
This dress was BEAUTIFUL!

links_reviews_title: This dress was such a pleasant surprise.
links_reviews_text: When I first tried this dress on, I wasn't sure about it. It fit a little tight in the bust, but the rest of the dress made up for that! Wore it out to dinner in Miami and it was perfect.
I am truly obsessed with this dress! So different and beautiful. Fits like a glove. Was worried the material would be clingy but it wasn't at all. Wish I could buy -- will be renting again!
#NCalworkation

I loved this dress! I was worried as it's that slinky satin fabric that can be very unforgiving but the bias cut and the black panel across the middle did wonders for this new mum who still has a bit of a tummy. I was also able to wear a strapless bra without it showing. It's light as air on and a dream to dance in. Perfect for a formal wedding and in colours that are great for cooler months.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric! But bust was too tight do couldn't wear. :(
links_reviews_text: I could get it on but with 36C it squished bust in a way that was unwearable. Wish I'd gotten a larger size. It's absolutely gorgeous fabric though!

links_reviews_title: comfortable to wear all day. Wedding was at 1pm, reception at 5pm and this dress transitioned well
links_reviews_text: con: the straps fell quite a bit

links_reviews_title: Really luxurious, boho silk dress, no support in the chest area.
links_reviews_text: The pattern of this dress was so interesting to me, and I loved the idea of an elevated slip dress. This is definitely a maxi dress on my 5' 7" frame. I didn't end up wearing it because I need more support in the chest area (I'm a small 34A) so it wasn't flattering on me, but it's a gorgeous dress nonetheless.

I got this as a backup and thought it would look terrible on me. I find strapless dresses tricky if not impossible because as a 36C bras are important. It fit and felt like a dream: floaty, unique, comfortable, danceable and gorgeous. No bra needed and everything stayed in place. Oh, and did I say slimming?? This dress magically takes away 10 pounds. I usually need a size 8 but went down to a 6. Highly recommend and I'm a little jealous to the person who gets to wear it!

The fit was fine but I did not end up wearing it out since it was a bit too formal for everyday wear. I was able to wear this without a bra and it seemed fine. I thought that one shoulder ruffle was a bit wear and if I were to actually wear it out, I would opt to leave the ruffle down rather than over my shoulder. I might re rent this in the future and wear it out... at least I know that this was the correct size for me! Also, the dress is quite long so if you're 5'4 and under, you WILL need heels.

links_reviews_title: Just okay. Not the most flattering dress, felt a little frumpy in it
links_reviews_text: Floaty dress but not the most flattering fit
Not as high-end feeling as I would have liked
Straps a big too big but perfect fit. Beautiful dress

links_reviews_title: Too wide in the hips, but a pretty dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very pretty, but it arrived to me smelling sort of like body odor - I couldn't get over it and therefore didn't wear it. It was also a little wide in the hip area - more of a flowy look.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty, well made. Longer than expected.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful. Loved the material and it fit true to size. The straps are a tiny bit long but it still fit fine. It is longer than I expected it to be and it wrinkles easily so you definitely want to have it out as and hanging up as soon as it arrives.

links_reviews_title: One of the prettiest dresses I have ever seen.
links_reviews_text: A little bit small...looking to get it again in a bigger side. It is gorgeous!
So this dress is a winner! Jason Wu can do no wrong in my opinion...a Heavenly work of art! Rent and enjoy the chance to wear a beautiful designer piece that is trendy and fun! True to size

Beautiful dress with interesting details, flattering - which is hard to achieve with my athletic build. Too long for my petite frame, even with 2" heels (I don't go higher) - it drags on the floor a bit. The length would be perfect for 5'7+ with heels, or someone more petite with very high heels. Fit is perfectly aligned with my usual size 4. My biggest concern is the insane static cling between the lining and the outer fabric. I will try a dryer sheet and see if I can keep it at bay, but this could be an issue if I wear it for my event. Wrinkles easily and if you sit on any surface that's not perfectly smooth (including my fabric car seat), the dimples will show up in the fabric.

Was so obsessed with the fit of this dress. I wish I had purchased it! Great for people with bigger hips/booties, just make sure to get a bigger size. I am a small or a medium, and I got the MR in this. Glad I did!
No complaints, the tie at waist gives you a good shape!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my bridal shower and felt absolutely amazing in it !
links_reviews_text: I loved how the dress covered my stomach and still kept my shape. Felt feminine and beautiful many girls said they didnt wear a bra I was able to wear a low back strapless bra. The slit was a little high when sitting but not too bad. I loved the adjustable straps. Honestly not enough amazing things I could say about this dress I wanted to buy it !!
Rented this for my "I do bbq".. fit perfectly! His all my problem areas and was super flattering! Fit true to size. Would rent again.

I LOVED this dress. I got this as a back up and couldn't resist wearing it for my bridal shower. I wore a sticky bra cause the back is a little low. Because it's a wrap dress it's flowey but flattering. Seriously can I buy it?
I wore this dress twice because it was so versatile. The straps are adjustable which was helpful in not making it as low cut. This dress can be worn with sandals during the day or heels at night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable with adjustable straps
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly--the wrap style and adjustable straps made tailoring it a breeze. Was perfect for outdoor summer wedding and so fun to dance in. cool and comfortable. Almost bought it. (Sry I didn't get a full body shot for photos)

This dress is perfect in every way, especially if you are on the curvy side. It fits tighter in the natural waist with a draped detail in the hips accentuating curves the right way. It does tie in the front so you can determine how tight you want it and the straps are adjustable as well. All around 10/10.
Stunning! Bright, beautiful colors and very well fitting. Might buy this one!
Usually wear a 6or 8 went with the MR -dress stretches a tad bit and fits like a glove! For this reason I say true to size !

Wore this for my bridal shower. It was a huge hit! Super comfortable and flattering. I'm curvy on the bottom and the skirt fit well. I could've probably worn an XS but the wrap/tie detail allows you to control the fit a little (even though the dress zips). Love the adjustable straps as well.

Super fun and light summer dress. I used sticky boobs because you can't really wear a strapless bra. Definitely adjust the straps otherwise it would be easy for a wardrobe malfunction. The slit was high but it was fine for me!
Loveddddd this dress! The fit was amazing, it accentuated my curves, it was accurately sized, and it was classy but sexy.

I loved the cut of this dress. Anything over a C cup breast size, I would suggest size up. The color, the flowers, it's was exactly what I wanted. The flirty style was perfect for a beach side dinner.
Great fit for bustier women without being tight or too revealing

I took this dress on vacation to Santa Barbara. I wore it to a polo match and it was the perfect dress to be worn there. It was sexy but classy and the material was light and breezy. I received so many compliments from men and women. I would definitely rent this dress again.

I ordered the dress for my bridal shower and got so many compliments! The straps are adjustable which helps if you have a larger chest. My only complaint is when you sit down the slit is pretty high. Had to be careful when opening presents in front of everyone.

This dress is flowy yet sexy!!! Be aware that it is a faux wrap so the hips are kind of fitted. The top is a little loose. My chest is rather small but I was still able to make it work. The slit is the perfect location. Not too revealing but you still get some leg. I would definitely rent this again!

Really flattering dress, material hangs nicely and the front wrap is adjustable so you can loosen or tighten depending on your waist. The tie did come a little loose during the dancing and the cut is low but rectifiable with a pin. Will definitely be renting again for another wedding. So many compliments!
This dress was so flattering. It is very form fitting in the waist and the length hits just right! I've thought about buying it!

Really great, fun, flow dress. The slit is quite high but manageable. The dress is very accommodating of any size - big or small- in the chest or bottom due to tie waist & adjustable straps. LOVED the low back. Wore for a yoga ceremony so bohemian was appropriate but would otherwise recommend for beach vacation or low key summer picnic type of outing.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fun and a solid rent!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit everything I was needing for my event! I wanted something longer in length that wasn't tight, but still had good shape to it and this was perfect. The wrap style is really faltering and the print was really pretty. It was effortless and comfy- I definitely will rent again!

Had to return the medium and swap for a large. The wrap allowed for me to tie it pretty tight since it was a little big. The length was also a little longer than I would have liked for my 5'2" frame but it was still cute!
This dress was so fun! no bra needed for your ladies that run a bit smaller!
Wore this to an engagement party. Enough fabric to wrap around body to not worry about a windy day. Straps are adjustable and fit very well without a bra. Would love to rent again.
The front slit worked perfectly so I never felt like I was restricted when walking. Do be careful when sitting down because the slit is in the front.
