I wanted to love this dress and it is beautiful in person, but that's all I really like about it. While it isn't see-through (nice surprise for a white dress), the big issue with this dress is that there is no "slip" underneath which is odd for a wrap dress. As soon as a small breeze came, the dress blew right open. I was so uncomfortable in this dress for that reason. Luckily I happened to have a jumpsuit in my car, which I ended up changing into after about 30 minutes (and one small breeze) of wear. It's also worth noting that there is no hook or snap closure for the chest. It would look fine when I tied the wrap, but 5 minutes later the fabric would sag down a little and show my bra.

The fit was great, I am a very busty girl, the straps and coverage was wonderful! I chose not to wear a bra, but if I did, you would definitely see everything, the slit is the perfect height. The print is wonderful the dress itself is great! Will probably rent again! :]
I ordered a XS but would have preferred a small. The XS was tight around my rib cage. This dress was beautiful for a night it in Brooklyn in the summer
It was a little to revealing with it being both low cut and a high slit. It would've cute for a more casual occasion

links_reviews_title: Not great for a second trimester maternity dress
links_reviews_text: So the dress was fine, but the waist was too low for anyone over about 18-20 weeks pregnant. It still showed up on my filters for maternity second trimester, but I'd steer clear unless you are first trimester or very early second trimester.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty dress. I wore it on vacation.
links_reviews_text: It fits a little large. I wear a size 10 and they sent me XLR which was bit too big.

links_reviews_title: Such a feminine, sexy, understated dress. Much prettier in person than pictured on model!
links_reviews_text: Adjustable strap lengths and side tie make it easy for this dress to fit anyone. Dress is lined which is nice.
Very classy dress! The slit and back are the best parts of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Get this dress. You will look amazing
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. Shows off all the right curves and is light and airy for the summer months.

links_reviews_title: This was an absolute perfect dress for a fun summer party.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments! Loved the fit and the pattern. It was just perfect.

links_reviews_title: The flow and color was remarkable.
links_reviews_text: Did not end up wearing this dress because I found a different style that I like better.

It's a really pretty dress but the fit was so weird. It was almost like the lining didn't match up to the exterior fabric. The hips were too tight and the bottom of the zipper bunched up. The top was nice and I have a bigger chest so it's rare to feel comfortable in something so low. I'd say this will only work if you're really narrow on the bottom and a little bigger chested on top.
Great for Mother's Day. size up if you are between sizes. Had to squeeze in but if my breast were any larger, I would not have fit.

links_reviews_title: The fit is lovely, and the print is gorgeous just like the photos
links_reviews_text: I didn't end up wearing this dress because the bow is sewn into the dress itself on the left hip region so it will always make you look wider than you are (or at least for me!!). I have an hourglass shape with wider hips than my waist so it was very unflattering.

I liked this top a lot. True to size. Very sheer and the keyhole is deep enough that anything you wear underneath will show through. Sleeve elastic a little tight. Love the pink with navy and would consider buying if it was slightly less expensive.

The fit and flow of this shirt is lovely, and it doesn't show wrinkles. It can be tucked in or worn out and dressed up or dressed down. I wore it with jeans and received compliments and look forward to pairing it with white pants as well. Thinking about purchasing!
No wrinkles so great for travel. Looks best with top button fastened for keyhole effect. Cami is a must. Thinking about purchasing.
Simple flowy floral top, I did put a navy camisole on underneath since it's sheer. Fits true to size.
This top was loose to the point of feeling frumpy. It required a tank top underneath to avoid flashing my bra when leaning forward or bending down.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. A little boxy and sheer. Will rent again.
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the arms. Need to be selective about undergarments

This top is super cute! It's a great work top. The arms are a bit tight due to the elasticity in the sleeves. The shirt is a thin material so you need to wear an undershirt. The color is pretty and overall the fit was nice!
This top fits well and looks beautiful. Can dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Love this! Pretty color. Nice for summer
links_reviews_text: Easy breezy
Great fit and worked well for me as a nursing mom
I should have ordered the M because the L was too loose. However the arms were still a bit tight. Looked very pretty otherwise.
This too was nice for work. The slit in the front is quite low so if you have big boobs it may not look appropriate for work. As someone with very small boobs, I wore this to work without an issue.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, great for a warm sunny day
links_reviews_text: Very pretty top, but runs a bit large around the waist. It was a nice and airy material foe the summer, no issues with wrinkling. Great work top for the office.
Easy to wear, flowing floral top. I'd rent it again
loved the pattern
It's ok. Very sheer sleeves are tight.
Flattering fit

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but sleeves are tight
links_reviews_text: This is a cute top, but the sleeves are very tight on the arms. I would not rent again.
A little right on the arms, but I thought it was very flattering.
Suitable to wear to work

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and very pretty too!
links_reviews_text: No Cons

links_reviews_title: Love this top! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Size up to M worked for maternity. Super cute.
The fabric, the fit, the print - everything about this shirt is great. It can be dressed up or dressed down - incredibly versatile. The fit is as expected. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very Cute but tight on the arms
links_reviews_text: Tight on the arms I could have used a M
I LOVED this top! It fits true to size. I think it is cuter in person. I received compliments.

links_reviews_title: Felt way too big and therefore i didn't wear it. It just hung on me
links_reviews_text: Perhaps it just wasn't a good shape for me. This hung terribly and looked matronly.
Size down on this top, I wore a Small and am almost 7 months pregnant. I normally wear an XS/S size top. Beautiful top although it is very sheer as other reviewers have mentioned.
Great color and print. The elastic on the arms is a bit tight but not unbearable.

links_reviews_title: Summery blouse fits well with jeans!
links_reviews_text: Pretty colors, quality material, a little tight around upper arms
It's a pretty blouse, and fit large. M was very loose and thus comfortable, but not quite flattering

The shirt was a little small in the chest area and short in the sleeve and completely sheer. Color is great and would have looked super cute with my denim slacks for work except the cut didn't work for me at all.

links_reviews_title: runs large and you need to wear an undershirt
links_reviews_text: runs large and you need to wear an undershirt
Super cute but a little baggy in the chest and tourso.

links_reviews_title: Fun for everyday. Paired it with back cropped pants instead of white.
links_reviews_text: Fit is full and drapey. I think you could size down or get your regular size (especially if you're arms are thicker: the sleeves would fit too tightly). One review said it made her look like a cupcake - which made be laugh - because it kind of does but not in a bad way. Nice details.
No "partial lining" to speak of...this top is SO sheer. (Is there an accompanying tank that went missing?) I couldn't wear it!
Runs large, was beautiful material but I felt like a cupcake. Order down, or try for 1st/2nd trimester in your regular size.
This dress is adorable, and really light for summer. Love the color!!! xxx

I had read other reviews about it being short but I was not prepared for this! I'm 5'7 so since I'm tall it was uncomfortably short like I would have flashed someone. It looked like I forgot pants. I was going to wear it for date night but just snapped this pic instead to show length. It's a beautiful well made dress which fit a little lose everywhere else if it was longer it would have been perfect
I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner. The back is open so a stick on bra was needed. I felt very comfortable in this dress.

I really loved this dress and received a lot of compliments. It's feminine and flirty yet bold in color. It range a little bit large in the waist but still very wearable. I am usually a 4, sometimes a 2 and I could have perhaps fit in the XS. The S fit well enough :) you can see other RTR looks of mine on IG @lawandlouboutins xo

links_reviews_title: Dress was so beautiful for a daytime winery Bachelorette brunch!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! So comfortable, the fabric is silky soft and flowy. However, I did have to steam it before wearing to get the ruffles unwrinkled. Had to wear a sticky bra as even a strapless bra shows since the dress is low cut in the back.
Loved everything about this dress. Back is open. Length is so flattering as is cut! Wore it twice and bought it!

links_reviews_title: This dress is light, comfortable, and fun!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a wine tasting weekend and it was perfect. I ordered a small and a medium and the small fit me with a little room. I am typically a 4-6 but in RTR sizing I usually have to go up a size, so I would consider this to run slightly large. I did not wear a bra with this dress because it's backless. If you can get away with that, it's amazing. Might not be ideal for larger chests though. The color and the ruffles were so much fun and I was comfortable in this dress all day long. I would absolutely recommend!
Adorable and sexy summer dress! Due to my height I had to loosen the back tie so the dress would hang a little longer. A lot of complements on the dress but a few side looks because it was short.
Wore this for a Kentucky Derby party in the FL heat and it was nice and light and very comfortable. Overall fit was great and everyone loved it.

I ended up not wearing this because I realized it would be too bare (it's very short, and backless) for the event for which I rented it. I can't wait to have the occasion to rent it again, though, because it was stunning!
I love this dress. It is very short‚Ä¶ But still manages to stay classy while sexy. It is very fun and the color is flattering on a tan. I definitely recommend this one!
This dress was so fun and moved so well! Perfect for vacation in Mexico!

links_reviews_title: Um all of my best vacation photos are in this dress
links_reviews_text: Um, okay Marisa Webb!! So I packed this for a vacation to Colombia, thinking I wasn't even going to wear it. I was so much more excited about my other rentals- this was just rented because I had one spot open on my account. Well what a pleasant surprise! My BEST photos from the vacation are all in this dress (which really creates such a dilemma for me - I try to only Instagram an outfit once. So narrowing down those photos was tough.) Anyway! This dress was comfortable and photogenic - and do I look for anything else in a review on here?! Fits true to size - and your bra will show because of the open back.

Love everything about this dress, very light makes you feel comfortable, specially in hot summers in Florida. Still playful and so much movement when you walk. Sexy low back, colors are simply beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Loved this brightness of this dress! Great for daytime event!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Def recommend!
I loved this dress so much!!! I would rent it again, i received so many compliments, it was super cute, flattering and confortable!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments!! Perfect daytime dress
links_reviews_text: I have more of a narrow waist and shoulders, and I could've def fit into an XS. It's roomy & a great color
Was perfect. Pictures do not do this justice. I'm buying this one.
It fit perfectly. Sexy at the back. Received lots of compliments on the dress. The color will definitely make you shine!

Wore this to a summer baby shower. I am between 5'5" and 5'6". Dress was beautiful! Got so many compliments, only downside is that it is quite short in the back if you have a bigger rear (definitely no bending over). I would recommend to anyone though!
I love marissa Webb!! Thank you rtr!!! I love this dress so much and I love how it just flows in the wind. Def a head turner and it'll make girls go crazy or go jealous!
The yellow color is very complimentary on tanned skin making it the perfect summer dress

One of my favorites! Sexy and lightweight. Perfect for a vacation. Fabric is amazing. Fit true to size. Very comfortable, somehow revealing and sexy but also very comfortable and forgiving. I loved so much I almost bought it and will rent again for sure!

Wore this to the start of a wedding weekend in Long Island. I wish I could keep this dress and trying to convince myself to buy it. It's a little short in the front so I wore spandex shorts underneath and the open back means no bra but the ruffles in the front made me feel comfortable. Beautiful and fun and size up if you have an athletic build

links_reviews_title: My favorite dress ever! Reordering it and buying it!
links_reviews_text: Fits amazing. Can dress it up or Down. Super sexy

links_reviews_title: Made for standing out in a crowd!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. Great color, super flattering fit. I got a ton of compliments. The tie-able straps allowed me to adjust to a perfect fit. Be prepared to show off your legs, it's definitely short!
I absolutely love this dress!! I got so many compliments. I paired it with gold wedges. It's super flowy and girly.

I wore this one twice and loved it both times! I got tons of complements! I wore it to dinner at our golf club and out in town for a dinner club ! It fit perfectly. The open back is sexy. It covers your tummy in all the right places. I rarely wear frilly because I worry I makes me look bigger. The reviews on this were right on! It's a knock out of the park!
Great fit with shorter front. Very sexy cut. Because of back, had to wear bra stickies
Light as air. Beautiful fabric. Very short so I sized up for a little more length. I wore this for an outdoor photoshoot and it was the perfect choice. Go braless or wear a stick-on bra.

I rented this for a bay shower brunch in spring! True perfection, feminine and pretty. Although if you have a larger bottom it may be tight back there. Def need someone to help tie the top strings in the back. Def love

Being 5'4", finding a mini dresses is hard-this was spot on! Because the back, you'll need chest stickies- but since it was adjustable it made the fit very very easy. The yellow is slightly brighter than in the sample photo, but I liked it more! The skirt has lots of layers and it flows really nicely with a lot of sass, and has great movement. LOVED IT!
Pro: beautiful color and style Con: A little big on me in the torso; thin fabric
Great dress!

links_reviews_title: Great summer dress for wedding, afternoon tea, baby/bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: Fitted with flattering ruffles and light weight for summer.

links_reviews_title: Prefect spring summer dress for wedding or outdoor event
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size. Back exposure was super sexy and the ruffles were feminine. Also helps conceal (no spanx necessary). I'm 5"4 and the length was still sweet and short on me just the way I like it. I love this floral print. Very pretty dress.
Super pretty , great fit but super short in the front and I'm 5'3"

links_reviews_title: Have rented this several time, it is fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Runs small so I ordered up, and very short

links_reviews_title: Super short. Didn't wear Very pretty if you can pull off the teensy-ness
links_reviews_text: Too short for me
I have long legs and this dress was incredibly short in me
Sized up 2 sizes and this dress was still extremely tight. Didn't love the color so returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: Love the cut out and the baby pink color!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy dress for going out on the town - the cut out was sexy and easy to wear with a bra which is a win!

If you have a curvy bottom half this dress might not be for you, or you better size up. The bottom seems to run a size smaller than the top. I wore the 0 and the bottom half fit like a glove. I had a little extra room in the top...so if you're bigger on top but have a tiny waist and behind this is your dress! Beautiful pale pink color. I received lots of compliments all night, people loved the cut out.

links_reviews_title: The perfect choice for a school formal.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit as if it was tailor made for me! It was simple, yet elegant. It was comfortable to sit and dance in. I'm very petite(5'2, 105 lbs) and I was surprised at how snug it was. I would recommend those who are not so pint-sized to get a size up.

As many others have stated, this dress runs very small. I am usually between a 0 and 2 and the 4 was definitely snug but wearable! I got so many compliments all night, and the cut out was flirty but not too revealing. The fabric was a heavy material and absolutely gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Dress for a birthday party in SF
links_reviews_text: This dress was unique, material was thick to really tighten everything up where it needed to be. The color was so soft and pretty but it was just so tight. I am 5'5" about 140 and the size 6 barely fit. It only zipped up with the help of 2 friends.. I could barely sit/move let alone dance. So please size UP at least 2 sizes. I'm normally a size 4 .. sometimes 6.. But I should have gotten 8 and 10 for this one..
Such a well made dress, felt like a million bucks. So many compliments. Be warned is short, but being I am only 5'3" it was absolutely perfect!!Rented a 2 ended up wearing my back up size of a 0.

links_reviews_title: Hugged curves in all the right ways.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my birthday. Received so many compliments from guys and girls! I will definitely be buying this dress! IG: @melissacefalu

Rented for a NYE event. Good quality fabric. Definitely form fitting. The cutout was in a good place and didn't show any bra. The dress did ride up a little while dancing but nothing serious, wore blackout tights so it was a non issue.
Amazing dress and color!! Wore it to a summer wedding and got a ton of compliments. Runs small so definitely size up. I typically wear a size 4 and wore an 8 in this dress

Wore this to a work banquet. It was the perfect amount of classy but sexy. I got so many compliments! Definitely order a size up as it does run small. I usually order a 4 and a 6 from RTR, but ordered a 6 and 8 since the reviews all said it ran small and I'm so glad I did because I wore the 8. This dress doesn't have much give and will definitely ride up when you sit down. Although it was still comfortable for a night of eating and dancing. I also had a wonderful customer service experience with RTR. My original dress came with a stain on it and after emailing RTR, they sent me another dress via priority overnight shipping to make sure I got it in time for my banquet. If you're on the fence about using RTR for your occasion, I would highly recommend them!!!

links_reviews_title: Sexy dress for a date...Not for the office Xmas party.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. But I have no idea how they rationalize the dress sizes on this dress. The pic you see is with no undergarments because there was no room. I'm 5'9" and an honest 10. I was holding my breath in the 12. I could barely sit down. If you have any curve, size up. Maybe even two sizes.

links_reviews_title: The little cut out on the side is a pleasant surprise. This dress made me feel sexy !
links_reviews_text: Very snug fit . Material is like bandaid fit . Size 4 hugged every curve and photographed well . Size 6 would have probably been more comfortable but probably would have looked too big .
Very tight on the butt and legs so I would definitely size up, because I have worn this brand before in the same style and was a 6, but I wore an 8.
E&J dresses always fit perfectly. Cut outs were fun. Rode up quite a bit while dancing.
Wore this to a concert. Great fit super cute details!!

loved this dress! I wore out for dinner and party innVegas. the color is a pretty blush pink and the slit in the side really shows off the figure. I was unable to wear a bra as the top portion was a little tight on my boobs but the size up fell off my waist. Definitely recommend true to size.

So many compliments and people asking where I got my dress. The fit was flattering and material though thick felt comfortable for an evening, outdoor wedding. I would definitely rent this dress again. Very versatile to dress up or down. Absolutely loved this dress, thank you Rent The Runway!
Dress definitely runs small, the top was perfect but the bottom was a little more snug than would have liked. My daughter has pretty athletic legs though so that factored in. Another great rental!
Rented this dress for a wedding in Sedona. I loved it! The fit, color, etc. Fabric quality is very good, so it will give a little stretch, but no worrying about wrinkling. Absolutely loved it!

Size up! Sized up from an 8 to a 12 and wore this to a club in Vegas. Loved the color and the subtle sexiness this dress has to it... while covering quite a bit. It had little to no stretch but the material was thick enough to not see every line and bump.

links_reviews_title: Unreal amount of compliments. The cut-out made this dress.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Small inner loops at the cut-out waist allow you hang the dress nicely so you're not creating wrinkles/you can steam it.

I read all of the reviews before renting this and I'm glad I did. It does run small so order one or two sizes up from your norm. The style is adorable but it is incredibly fitted, so be prepared to own it! Overall, it's a beautiful dress. My boyfriend wanted to buy it because he loved it. Just a little tight for my liking.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and Flattering, But Size Up!
links_reviews_text: I got this dress for a wedding (my boyfriend actually picked it out) - he was going for a Miami Vice theme :) While it was beautiful and flattering, it was not the best for dancing. The cutout was in just the right place so I could wear a regular bra with it. I got a lot of compliments on the dress! I normally wear a size 2, but sized up to a 4 thank goodness.
I usually struggle finding dresses that fit but this dress fit me perfectly! I felt amazing the whole night!

links_reviews_title: size up and better not be able to pinch any skin off ur side waist.
links_reviews_text: i sized up and still when i slouched or sat down my two inches of side fat spilled out the side. :( may swap out for my backup dress. Otherwise BEST color and length. I will rent again when i've lost 5 lbs. haha!

It was very fun wearing this dress! Wore it at an outdoor wedding and it was very hot, so it was nice to have a pretty, shorter dress. The material is thick and is very well made. This dress was tighter on my bottom half and looser on the top so I had to wearing a more padded bra to fill it out. Overall loved this dress! So pretty and simple!

I rented this dress for the second for my boyfriend's formal in San Diego. I also rented it to go out in PHX. The dress ran a little small and it's difficult to find a pair of underwear that doesn't show panty lines. I found that spanx aren't really an option with this dress and the dress is very tight so you need to be comfortable with that. However, it's a good length as I didn't feel uncomfortable in it and I'm 5'10. I would definitely recommend this dress.

The Elizabeth James dresses all run small, so I sized up from a 2 to a 4 and it fit well, though it's a very tight dress. The material is double-thickness, which means it is flattering on alot of body types. I did not wear a bra. I received alot of compliments. I did have a recent tan, which definitely helped me pull off this shade. Great dress, but size up.
Fit perfectly and was so comfortable. Classy with a little edge to it, made me feel like a million bucks.

I LOVED this dress!! I got so many compliments all night long! I hated sending it back. The dress does run small and has no wiggle room. I'm usually a size 4 or 6, after reading the reviews, I decided to order a size 6 and an 8. The 6 fit, but was very tight. The 8 fit like a dream! I definitely recommend ordering at least one size up.
I am usually a size 6 and had to size up to a size 10. Loved the dress, length was good and a very flattering cut.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for standing around in not dancing.
links_reviews_text: The reviews were no joke, this dress fits like a second skin. Probably not the best dress for a FL night because the material is so thick (super hot). Still very flattering since the material is thicker.

links_reviews_title: It was super cute with blush colored heels!
links_reviews_text: When I got the dress, there was a slight tear near the back seam in the cut out section of the dress- which was pretty frustrating. Although this was the case, I loved the dress and thought it fit pretty well. The bottom part of the dress runs small, but the top part of the dress is a little bigger (at least for me) so I couldn't go up a size!
This dress was amazing. Runs small so go one size up. Classy chic.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, classy look, and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I needed something that was sexy and fun but still classy, and this totally fit the bill! Wore it to a nice dinner in Vegas. I am very busty and was worried about the placement of the cutout both in term of my bust and whether it would cut in on my side, but it was perfect on both accounts and I was totally able to wear a normal bra with it, which is always a bonus! The thickness of the fabric is super comfortable and at least a little bit forgiving (so that I could actually enjoy my steak dinner without worrying about my stomach, haha). Highly, highly recommend!
Perfect mini dress! Shows a little skin without showing too much.

links_reviews_title: Classy yet sexy. Absolutely LOVED this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my bachelorette party and I'm so glad I did. It was form fitting but comfortable. The little cut out on the side plus the V in the front give it a little sass. I was able to eat and dance in this dress without any issues. I felt beautiful all night. I will definitely be renting this dress again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a homecoming dance and got lots of compliments! Definitely recommend!
links_reviews_text: It fit very snug. I usually wear a 00 & the 0 was a little tight. It was a little tricky to walk in but dancing was fine!
I wore this top for a nice dinner! It is a gorgeous material and the back is very cool! Very chic and cosmopolitan design. This definitely looks and feels like high fashion!

This was so much fun. Wore it to work and was honestly expecting some teasing since it's essentially a cape. It's dramatic, well fitting, and if you have a nice back you will adore walking around in this top!
I rented this for a party and couldn't have been happier. The cut made my shoulders look GREAT, and the back is super fun. It was the best kind of sexy (and comfortable)! I wish I could keep it!

It's the back that pushes this to "stellar". Lots of comments about how elegant and unusual it was. High neck doesn't strangle you. Thick but not too heavy fabric skins over any bumps. Very comfortable. Will rent again.

I wore this top out to an indie film festival: day to night event. I wanted something that would be hip but classy. I knew black would be timeless. And, yes, this shirt is not very exciting in the front BUT...it is very flattering if you like your arms and shoulders. The back is where the excitement makes a statement! I wore my hair up to show off the back (love the swing of the back material), dark wash jeans, suede high heel boots, and black/gold jewelry to give some flash. I will definitely rent this one again!
Compliments on the back!
Nice shirt. Unique with a little flare. Looked great with dark jeans and black slacks. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Kept this until I ran out of excuses to wear it!
links_reviews_text: Divine!!! Perfect sexy cut for busty ladies who need to wear bras with straps.

links_reviews_title: Wanted it to be more stunning
links_reviews_text: The back of this shirt was truly elegant and sculptural, but the front was very blah. I felt unflattered by the choker collar and cut of the sleeves, and would have been embarrassed to wear it with the way it fit. An interesting piece, maybe best on those with slim, toned arms!
Loved the shirt. So classy. Great for date night or night on the town
I wore this for a formal party and loved it! Great quality and style!

links_reviews_title: It was so beautiful and laid really well. It looked great.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great. The material was very nice and never wrinkled.
Fits great and a perfect understatement statement shirt. Only minor complaint is the clasp at the back of the neck is a little tricky, but once it's secure it stays put.
Wore to husbands work party. Really liked it but the power was out so people couldn't see it :-(
The material is really nice, the draping in the back is a great touch. Would totally have worn it but I have kind of a broad back and it was a little tight in the arms/armpit area.
It wasn't a showstopper from the front but had a fun back. It was a little boring if not for the back. Still a great top.
Beautiful top for the right person.

This was a beautiful top, but not right for the workplace! Wish I had somewhere to wear it- it would be great for a night out or date- needed my husband to take me out, lol! The fabric was heavier than I expected, which makes it seem expensive- I'd rent it again for the right event!

This top made me feel very elegant. It looks so simple in the front but the back is very different and modern. Loved the movement of the fabric at my back. This top is fitted but not tight,I thought it fit perfect with a little hourglass shape. Loved it and another piece from RTR that got lots of compliments.

I paired this with a Herve Leger pencil skirt and it was amazing. It was subtly super amazing but not too over the top for my work day schedule. Plus, when it was windy it was like you had a cape which was entertaining. :) overall, I liked it more than I expected I would.
Felt like silk on my skin !!!!
Loved this! Very heavy duty fabric; definitely for winter parties.
Stunning top! Highest quality of material. Fit like a glove. Great with leggings! Love it! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: This top is beautifully constructed and subtly feminine.
links_reviews_text: I'm a huge fan of this designer, and was so excited to rent this top. I tried it on right away, and was happy that it fit so perfectly. I frequently have issues with tops and dresses because I'm a 32DDD. I decided to wear it to a party with some skinny pants, but as I looked at myself closely in the mirror, I could see that the collar was cutting into my neck. Since I'm over 50, this was not particularly flattering. Regretfully, I placed it back into the garment bag to send back. Bottom line - stunning design, but may not work if you're a little older.
This top is elegant and fun. Super flattering fit and very comfortable. Would love to keep it forever!!!

links_reviews_title: fabulous top! Love the drape of the back.
links_reviews_text: Great on my hour glass figure. I'd say the 6 fit like a medium in other brands.

Nice, heavier fabric with very chic look. I would not have worn this to work but to an edgy glam event. I was planning to wear it to the Auto Show but didn't. Pair with leather pant or leather or moto jacket in black or gray. Some red shoes would completely work as well.
True to size, drop back is still modest. Very classy and appropriate for festive events with mixed attendance (work, family, etc.)

This is such a sophisticated and stylish top I was surprised that it did not have any reviews. It is conservative but still sexy thanks to the V-shaped opening in the back. The gray extensions that hang down are a real designer touch that makes all the difference in the world. I love it! Would consider buying this one but it's quite pricey.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, fun with a great back!
links_reviews_text: The coolest part is the back so wear it somewhere you will be able to take your jacket off!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, classy, and I felt like a million bucks!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my rehearsal dinner and absolutely fell in love with Christian Siriano. It was elegant, flattering, classy, absolutely stunning! My best RTR to date!

I'm so pleased I had rented this for a work event because if it had been for my wedding I would have been very disappointed by how many others had (evidently) worn this before me. The fabric was nice but still didn't hang well around the hem. Overall just ok.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my morning city hall wedding. I wanted something elegant and simple.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits like a dream! I'm 5'2", 115lbs, 34b. I ordered a size 2 and a size 0. The 0 was the back up size but I like the fit better. It is tighter around my ribcage, where I am the most narrow. I wore a padded bra but other than that the dress is designed to flatter. I have wide hips, which look great in this dress! Either size would have worked, either 0 or 2. Also, the length is a little longer on me since I'm size 5'2" but it looks great at this length too.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was a complete guess, but when I recalled that Siriano has dressed bodies of ALL shapes, I was excited to take the chance. The fit was perfect, and the draping made me feel like a goddess. I only lacked a sword, helmet, and sandals to make the warrior-goddess dream a reality. The dress did need a lot of steaming before wearing, hence my first dance partner of the day.

links_reviews_title: This dress made dancing at my wedding even more fun! I rented this for the reception.
links_reviews_text: I paired this dress with a unique statement necklace to give it a stand out look. I highly recommend this dress. After a full day of wearing my wedding gown, it was a relief to be in such a light and comfortable dress.

links_reviews_title: Drapes in all the right places
links_reviews_text: Figure flattering for curvy women. Thick fabric hides problem areas. I wore to my rehearsal dinner and got many compliments.

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS- and can wear a regular bra!!
links_reviews_text: Flattering, comfortable, forgiving, and sophisticated. Nothing to not love about this dress. It's def more Ivory than white (yay). I LOVE this dress.
Several compliments from women. Husband thought the dress was plain. I liked it a lot EXCEPT it has been over worn and the color had a gray tint. The hem line bubbled a bit bc/ it's old.

links_reviews_title: Elegant & refined, interesting yet not over the top
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, the 8 was true to size. Was snug on the bust (I'm a size c) so I wore a NuBra and it was just fine. Really substantial fabric, wearing it made me feel like a million bucks and it kept me warm. I'm 5'3" and it was a few inches below my knees. To make it look like I wasn't getting married I paired it with a black cardigan and a bright clutch. Doesn't really need a statement necklace due to the draping at the neckline. It is a lovely ivory color. Not a bright white.
Perfect understated elegance.

Love the design of the dress! The opening in the front makes it a little more fun. I normally wear a 2 or 4, and this dress fit well at a 6. One thing to note, the pictures from the side aren't flattering for A cup ladies

wore this to my civil ceremony at city hall in the morning, absolutely perfect for the occasion. drapes nicely and looks great in photos. nice weighty fabric that made the dress feel worthy of an important occasion. couple notes: there is a middle slit that isn't too visible in the stock photos. the skirt came a little wrinkled and was difficult to iron, but thankfully didn't show too much in photos. size 0 fit true to size and was very comfortable. loved it!
Perfect for an event too dressy for work

I rented this for a small daytime wedding that was primarily my parents friends. I wanted something classic with a little flair. I got so many compliments. I took it to my seamstress to see so she could create my fascinator in the photo. She was amazed at the quality. It is comfortable and stretchy. Fabric is heavy and it's lined. If I had anywhere else to wear it, I would buy it.

Nice thick luxurious fabric! Flows beautifully! My pic doesn't do it justice! I'm short and hippy and have a mommy pooch, but this dress made me feel comfortable and perfect. I steamed before wearing. Just beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Stellar for work with a black blazer
links_reviews_text: I got allllll the compliments and felt amazing. Super flattering in real life. Fabric has some stretch- but I would size up if in between sizes, as the waist is fitted and has a seam- which makes it hard to zip at that point. Small slit at the front, so for tall ladies it might feel short. It was winter, so I wore black tights and it was fine.
Beautifully cut w luxurious fabric. Draping is very forgiving but form fitting. Wore it twice. Too numerous to count compliments on each occassion.

links_reviews_title: The event was a benefit in NYC that called for "festive attire."
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous, fusing a Grace Kelly elegance with a bold modern flare. It is a classic winter white. The material is heavy and drapes beautifully. I am always between a size 4-6, and this 6 fit perfectly. Flattering and elegant and could be dressed up or down. Loved it! Would rent again.
I didn't wear the dress because it was just too tight. The fabric also layer in a strange way. I think this would look great on a smaller woman though.
Runs small weird slit in front

I like the drapyness of the fabric, but there is a TON of fabric and if it doesn't drape right it can look a little frumpy. Ultimately didn't wear it because it is FAR too hot for the wedding I had rented it for.

For some reason I expected this to be a light cotton dress. It turns out this a thick fabric, but I ended up really liking it anyway! The gathering of the dress is unique and adds to a great dress for work.

links_reviews_title: Was not bump friendly. Truly plan to size up at least two sizes.
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a size 8, 5"10, but this dress did not work for my first pregnancy, second trimester. I'm still not showing much but with growth in chest and some in belly, this didn't fit at all. If renting for a bump friendly dress, highly recommend sizing up at least two sizes because I doubt a 10 would have fit. Not really a bump friendly dress at all for me.
Didn't wear
top is gorgeous but something is wrong with the cut at the bottom.... inside is flipping outwards and the sides flare out too much

This dress is quality hands down a beautiful piece of work. The craftsmanship is exquisite and the fabric is super soft. Great design but when I was trying it on it appears the zipper was broken before it was shipped to me and now I have one day to find a dress. So extremely disappointed that RTR is not checking the quality when people return their items!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, so many compliments when I wore it to a party
links_reviews_text: Very fitted waist

This dress was beautiful and had a lovely thick velvety lining to it. I really wished it had fit. The chest area was just a hair too small and I didn't feel comfortable trying to force it. Maybe after losing a few pounds I can try again.

I really like this dress but it fits more like a 10, which I normally easily wear. I got a 12 but I couldn't zip it up the back, my boobs won the battle. (Also im newly single and holy crap it's hard getting myself into my back zip dresses!) This dress is great for creating curves on girls who don't have many curves. But it you are already curvy, it for sure runs small. It is beautiful and the draping is top notch. Wish I could get that damn zipper up.
High quality design!

links_reviews_title: Even celebrities lived this dress on me! It was perfection
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. Length was a little long, but it didn't bother me

First, I love this brand because the materials and craftsmanship are first rate. This dress was beautiful. The material is heavy and it is fully lined, stretchy and super comfortable. It was fun to wear
The first time I put it on, i thought it was sort of boring, but I wore it and seeing it on it fits amazing and is beautifully cut! Try it! Does have thick fabric but was fine even in warm weather.
Not stretchy enough for baby bump

links_reviews_title: Overall, I loved this dress. Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. It drapes in such a lovely way and you definitely feel (and look) like you are wearing a high end / expensive dress! Two things that are helpful to know: 1) It's definitely a darker ivory color (has a bit of a brown tone in it rather than just a slightly off-white ivory color) and 2) It's very formal. The dress is a heavy material which lends to pretty draping but it is more formal looking in person (due to the fabric).

links_reviews_title: This is a well made, gorgeous, goddessy dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was mostly true to size, although i'd say runs a little small in the chest area and there is not much give so I'd size up if between sizes. Would definitely recommend! The fabric is thick so could be warm for summer.
Beautiful dress, but if you carry any weight at all... this dress makes you look way larger. It was not flattering on me. Sad!!!

links_reviews_title: Very flattering piece but more formal than I expected
links_reviews_text: This is such a flattering dress but I didn't end up wearing it because it's heavy. Thick material and it just wasn't the look I was going for. Especially with tights and a sweater or coat it would just be a lottttt of fabric going on. This would be so nice for a spring garden party where you didn't need tights and could wear a sandal but also wanted a little warmth to the dress
The dress was a bit poofier than I anticipated and the slit was not flattering.

links_reviews_title: This is such a gorgeous dress, you have to wear it to know.
links_reviews_text: Would you like to look like Grace Kelly? This is the dress. It is classy and stunning beyond words.

links_reviews_title: A very fun and sexy dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress knowing some reviews have mentioned the bust area problem. Every one is unique and are comfortable differently so I took a chance. We took engagement pictures in Greece in this dress and this outfit was literally my absolute favorite pictures we took! However... yes.. if you're busty... you will be ALL OUT THERE! Depends how confident you feel with your girls out for the show of course, but the fit is great and it was a very fun dress.

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I think it's better for smaller chests. You also can't wear a bra. This dress was so beautiful though and I loved every minute in it!
Im usually between a 2 or 4. The 4 was big. I had to safety pin it and i couldn't wear a bra but Once i did that i felt great. So comfy!

links_reviews_title: Runs big and is boobielicious (prego rental)
links_reviews_text: Runs big and since it's so low cut you can't get away with the size because your belly pushes up the dress and it kinda flays open. I ended up not wearing it.

Rented this for a ballet in NYC at the flagship store in NYC. It was the only item in my size, got a ton of compliments. The only thing I would say is if your bigger in the chest, it is quite revealing. Other than that, light fabric, can easily dress up or down. If you are short, heels/wedges are a must. I am 5'3 & wouldn't be able to wear flip flops with this as it would be too long (although that's my issue with most dresses/pants). Great dress overall!
Very low cut. I needed a safety pin. Pretty material.

links_reviews_title: Flow and comfort of the dress was great!
links_reviews_text: Spilled out a bit but I'm personally comfortable with this. Loved the dress, fit true to size. But the model in the photo is likely an A-cup, so be wary for my fuller-chested ladies that you might fill it out a bit :).
Runs a bit large on top. Can be worn forward or backward
I had to use dress tape for the top and it was a bit revealing but overall flattering

links_reviews_title: Tried on the only size in store, going larger in size meant an extra deep V but I think it worked!
links_reviews_text: Lightweight fabric, very comfortable even in 85+ degree heat!
Dress was very petty but I'm jot busty so the top was loose. Fabric doesn't do well with tape. My rib cage sticks put a bit so it made me look pregnant.

So I got an L because the RTR store only had L in stock but it was so long!! I wanted to wear sneakers but that was out of the question. I'm also usually a 12-14 and the 12 was big uptop! Recommend sizing down!

I love this feminine dress my Cynthia Rowley! Running true to size with some stretch. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up size. This style is fitted through out the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear no bra or NuBra. At 5ft, the length hit floor length on me. I love how comfortable the fabric is against my skin. I felt amazing while wearing this dress. Pair with silver accessories and a black heel.

links_reviews_title: Received compliments all night! Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fabric was comfortable and the style was flattering. Perfect for a summer wedding. However, it ran a little big for a petite person. I'm 5'2" and even with 5" heels, I was still stepping on it. Additionally, I wear a 34DDD bra size, and one size smaller (8R) was too small for my bust area. 10R was slightly loose, but I could make it work with the lace and lots of tape. Given the fact that it's usually very hard for me to find a perfect fit, this dress was as close as it gets for someone with my body type. ;)
Wore this for a night out in Dubrovnik. It flowed beautifully, I felt great, and was able to eat! Highly recommended!

I wore this to wedding and am 7 months pregnant, so I was definitely looking for a more loose fitting, elegant look. The cleavage in front and side slit added a touch of tasteful sexiness. I love the floral print and ethereal vibe it imparts! The only complaint was that the particular dress I received had a very small tear/rip in the back, but it was small enough that it didn't deter me from wearing the gown to the wedding.

Always read reviews!!! Its really helpful, fabric looked good & photo for this dress, but all reviews was bad, i thought may be they wrong.... no they was correct! Dress does make it puffy on the stomach ( probably should put it to maternity category ), & tie was sticking out, i did come up with solution- wrap it around itself- like a twist. We didn't go to event- so i cant say how it worked fir wearing our, sad that beautiful fabric , have not so flattering design

links_reviews_title: Felt like I was wearing lingerie.
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this dress. It was so low cut. The material is also very formal. Not the casual maxi I was looking for.

Top is large and it's a pain to wear without a cardigan. I m large chested and wearing this dress without a bra is not an option for me so I wore a regular bra, a cami to cover up the spillage and because of this, had to wear a denim jacket. This is a flowy dress and while that's beautiful it can make you look larger or pregnant.

links_reviews_title: beautiful material, great color, lots of compliments but too long for 5"6
links_reviews_text: beautiful material, great color, lots of compliments but too long for 5"6

links_reviews_title: Terrible fit in the boob area
links_reviews_text: My entire chest looked like it was going to pop out the dress. It's a nice dress and good quality but I have no idea how anyone can wear this with the terrible boob area cut. I'm also a 32B so I have pretty small chest and I felt over exposed.
Very chest centered. Made me feel like I could fall out at any moment. Slit on side didn't look correct. I went with another dress.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous but too low cut for me. Didn't wear but would have it if hadn't been so low cut.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and flow. The tie was a little wonky as it didn't seem to fall where it should on the upper waist.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a Mother's Day brunch. Very comfortable dress - formal great for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is really lovely (silky, very high quality). The fit though is very big! I'd suggest going down a size. I did receive quite a few compliments!
Not for those of use with small busts. Slit down middle was very deep. A lot of fabric to fill, so as a B it looked awful
Could not wear - runs very large.

links_reviews_title: Not for average or large boobs
links_reviews_text: I wanted this dress to work so badly. It was the perfect combination of colors and looked like it would be comfortable - everything you want for the dress you wear to your sister's wedding. But as you can see - the top is a bit of a disaster. It's just way too revealing for anyone with a B cup or higher - unless you want to be revealing of course, in which case - get this dress. It was too much for me, and I don't own any bra contraption that would have made this functional. Otherwise, the length and fit worked.

I did not try this one because I could tell immediately that I did not like the fabric. Based on the photo on the website, it looks cotton, daytime ish, slightly dressed down. But it's very synthetic feeling fabric that i do not like. Color scheme is pretty, fit is cute, but the fabric ruined it for me.
A little low cut. I had to put a camisole with it. Beautiful fabric.

links_reviews_title: So much more formal than it looks in photo!
links_reviews_text: Too formal for my occasion -I thought this would be a maxi I could wear wine tasting but it was a more heavy shiny material. Better suited for a wedding

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but doesn't cover well.
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but doesn't have enough fabric to cover your bust. I got the dress a little bigger because I wasn't sure how it would fit, being that the fabric was a silky material. I ended up not wearing this dress because I felt very exposed up top. I tried using double sided tape too, but the fabric is so shear it looked ridiculous! I have a size C cup so I would recommend B or smaller to fit the boob area better.

The dress is super cute and faltering if you don't have boobs. The top was cut was too low with not enough fabric to cover with or without a bra. Bummed i didn't get to wear it, highly recommend for those with smaller chests.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to the Cynthia Rowley SS19 Show!
links_reviews_text: Runs very large everywhere and was wayyy too long on me. Agree with everyone else, it's very low cut, I wore a tank top underneath.
Loved this dress. Wore it multiple times to various types of events. It was a bit long (I'm 5'7) but with wedges, it was perfect. I'd rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress. Length was great for me, 5'10".
links_reviews_text: Bow in the front is much larger than I thought it would be.
No idea how this dress would fit anyone, can't wear a bra, the tie doesn't make sense. Runs very large. Very disappointed in this dress.

links_reviews_title: Busty but SO comfortable. Perfect for a beach wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit well through bust. Flowy throughout the rest of the dress.

Fabric is beautiful, but the dress is oversized and very long - I ordered the smallest size and am average height, and it was still dragging on the floor. Definitely deep cut, and the way it's cut at the waist makes it look borderline maternity.
I am all about showing off this asset- but this dress is really revealing, especially for someone with a large chest. I couldn't wear it to a wedding and feel comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Too big - didn't do my research before adding it to my cart, not my style.
links_reviews_text: Ended up not wearing this - size ordered was way too big for me. Also didn't realize what type of material it was and wasn't interested in the dress.
Stunning dress, was receiving compliments all night! Fits like a glove and the detailing is beautiful

links_reviews_title: Chic and Sexy dress to impress
links_reviews_text: The fit was tight as I usually wear one size up but I wanted it be a little tighter then normal. Fabric was very luxurious and I loved everything about this dress! Can't wait to rent it again!
This dress is really pretty and holds everything in, I never had to adjust anything throughout the whole night. It has a sturdy heavy feeling so it might be a little too much fabric in the summer.
beautiful dress, feels expensive, but really tight. i got it zipped but may have passed out if i wore it too long. i got a large, the largest size available, but didn't end up wearing.

Overall the dress was very pretty, sexy and unique. I did receive many compliments. However, it runs very small! I am usually a size 8/10 depending on the dress. I order a medium and large and wore the large, which is the biggest size for this dress. It was tight and just fit. Ok to stand in, sitting not so much. Definitely not for curvy women. Probably wouldn't rent this one again.
This dress was so beautiful and comfortable at a summer wedding I attended. Added bonus it has pockets! I received compliments all night.
This was a big risk for me, yellow isn't something I typically wear. Worn to a large summer wedding, it was cheer and original. POCKETS!!! I styled with turquoise statement necklace & earrings

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that is sure to impress
links_reviews_text: Love! The fabric felt luxurious and was a beautiful color. The dress has pockets, and the length was quite long in the back, which made it feel a bit more upscale. I had to go up a size in the fit because it was quite tight around the rib cage. Also, if you have a small bust like me, be aware that you'll likely need a strapless bra to give some dimension (a common problem for this style of strapless, so I wasn't surprised). It does have a built-in bra though. I got tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail attire wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a slightly more formal wedding. The color is beautiful and I got so many compliments. I could have worn one size smaller but it still worked with a strapless bra to help fill it out. The pockets in this dress made it perfect for carrying around my phone to capture moments from the day.

Very pretty dress but I liked my second style better. Slightly big in the chest but I have a small bust. Would be perfect for a summer outdoor wedding. I felt like Belle from Beauty and the Beast which turned me off a little

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an outdoor summer wedding in New Orleans!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect and made me feel great! If you have a big rib cage, this dress will be tight in that area, but no bra was needed as it had one built in so that saved some space! The length was great - I'm 5'5 and wore 3-4" heels and the back of the dress hit me on the mid- to lower part of my calf. It might drag on the floor for someone who is more petite. It is lined, so you couldn't see sweat stains which was perfect for an outdoor wedding in hundred degree heat! You will get a lot of comments that you look like Belle :)

I was super nervous about finding a dress that fit since I'm pretty petite but this fit perfectly. The top was pretty snug so i didn't spend the entire night pulling up me dress and the length was perfect as well. The color was beautiful and I am very glad i rented it
Beautiful color and fabric. Had to lay down for my partner to zip up because it was so tight! Would size up.

links_reviews_title: A spot of sunshine at a "festive summer" black tie!
links_reviews_text: I'd give this 5 stars for the cheerful color, the material, and the length for us shorties out there! I'm 5 feet tall and have a hard time finding a dress that fits without hemming. The only reason for the 4 stars is the top ran small for my wider top frame -- I couldn't get a strapless bra in there. I'm a 34B or 36B.

links_reviews_title: Great dress - love the high-low style. Beautiful color, Only deducting one star because of size
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress - so much prettier than I thought it would be. It‚Äôs more golden than yellow. You‚Äôll get hella compliments on it. The top bodice is significantly smaller and I sized up from my regular size 2. The back paneling did leave two marks on my back from rubbing against it. I would absolutely wear it again. It‚Äôs heavier though so while ideal for summer definitely doesn‚Äôt make it breathe-able.
Great fit! I was worried I'd be pulling it up all night while dancing, but it stayed in place.
I loved this dress! I needed help with the zipper but everything else was perfect. Definitely true to size. I would absolutely rent this again.

Much more comfortable than expected for a strapless, there was no digging and I didn't have the need to constantly tug it up. The color and fabric were perfect. The hook and eye clasp in the back was a little uncomfortable when sitting back but that was only a problem in the car and not a huge deal. Pockets were a cool addition but I didn't end up using them.

links_reviews_title: Felt like an absolute princess in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This is such a beautiful dress, one of my favorite rents to-date! Very structured, but comfortable enough to dance the night away in. Wore it to a Disney-themed wedding, needless to say - the Belle look-alike comments / compliments were non-stop!
This dress runs SO small. Normally wear a 6. Thankfully took the only back up size available, the 10. It was a little loose, but not by much. Very comfortable. Nice dress

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful and the color really popped!!
links_reviews_text: Small in the bust so order a size up then what you normally would go for if in between sizes!

I wore this for a July wedding and received compliments all night. Loved that there was a built in bra! The mid-section was a little tight on my ribs but other than that it was comfortable. Im usually an 8 but went with the 10 for this one. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress and unique color.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, wore to summer wedding with pink heels and accessories. Runs small.
Elegant and form fitting.
Fit well and got compliments but the bottom had a weird lining. Not sure if it can be ironed out.
This dress is incredible! It's so unique and a great summery color. The top was just a little loose but I wore a padded bra and it does have hooks which is nice. Wish I could keep it!
Fit very well

I've rented a lot of great dresses from RTR, but this one takes the cake. I felt like Belle at the Ball x1000. I paired it with magenta lipstick for an extra pop, but red would look good too. Don't hesitate, this is the dress you want.
I loved everything about this dress: the pockets, color and fit! I got so many compliments and felt like a star- would rent again!

links_reviews_title: The color was beautiful! Got compliments on it all night.
links_reviews_text: The strapless top stayed up well all night (size 34B) and the length was just right for my height (5'6") with heels. Quality was perfect and elegant. Would highly recommend this dress. It was so hard to send back!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding! Got so many compliments on the color too!
links_reviews_text: I squeezed into the 6. It ran a little small at my bust. If you're 34D or more, size 8 will be perfect!
Many compliments on this dress and felt confident. Has built in bra support which was bigger than dress itself, so zipping was tricky. Other than that...amazing dress

links_reviews_title: won an award while wearing this dress. the color was fab against my dark brown skin
links_reviews_text: very comfortable for a 4+ hr event. pockets were large enough for my iPhone X. really great dress all around

links_reviews_title: Eye catching princess! I felt like Belle from Beauty and the Beast!
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and you will definitely stand out! Very nice fabric as well. For size D breast or larger I highly recommend going up one size in this dress. It fit me but I so wish I got a 8 even though I don't usually wear an 8 this dress had a corset in it and was very fitted around bust. No one noticed but when I was sitting down it was a bit uncomfortable.

Tight across the chest/ribs recommend sizing up at least 1 size, there is no stretch in fabric. Pockets are nice. Length was good even with lower heels. Wore twice in one weekend to wedding and then charity event. Got compliments at both events. Was perfect for an outdoor spring evening wedding in north Florida. Wore with a cardigan for indoor event.

links_reviews_title: Many Beauty and the Beast comments!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a Navy ball, and it was definitely formal enough for the occasion, considering the high/low cut rather than a traditional ball gown length. It's a well built dress that I wasn't having to hike up constantly. My biggest complaint is that the dress had a bit more wear and tear than I hoped for. The coloring wasn't as vibrant, the material was wrinkly rather than textured, and the bottom billowed as if it had been dry cleaned too many times. However, the backup size was in great shape and looked like a brand new dress.
Love this dress! It didn't have as much body/didn't flare as much as it did in the pics of it on the model, but still loved it and got so many compliments.

Dress arrived wrinkled and needed to be steamed but i think it's just the nature of the fabric. I got both the 4 and 6 because others said it ran small and I'm typically a 2 or 4 in dresses. The 4 fit perfectly. Also the 6 definitely showed more signs of wear (fabric pulls and missing hook on the back). Overall a beautiful dress. And it had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Feeling like Belle from Beauty and the Beast
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs small; heavy, structured material, which I loved for an early spring wedding. Looks good with almost any shoes!

links_reviews_title: This dress is adorable! Plz excuse my socks
links_reviews_text: Love the lining in the dress. Very well made, color is amazing. Like every other review, I felt like Belle in this dress and I loved it.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun to wear and dance in! I received several compliments on the color and fabric
links_reviews_text: As others have suggested it was tighter up top than a lot of dresses, but I appreciated the security. It stayed up better than most strapless dresses I have worn. If you are more full chested I would size up.

Wore this for my brother's wedding in England at a very conservative church. So I had to cover my shoulders and found a gorgeous pashmina that coordinated perfectly. I am 5'3" and added to my curves this year and currently stuck at 150lbs, with 36DDs. I went up on my normal size based on the reviews and thankful that I did! It is quite narrow in the rib cage but held everything together beautifully. The easy mustard yellow was stunning and I got a TON of compliments. I felt like Belle! Consider the sizing when renting...you won't make a mistake in wearing this gorgeous dress!
Was PERFECT for an August, outdoor summer wedding. Only complaint is the underwire was becoming exposed inside and poked me anytime I leaned too far right. Was worth the poking!!!
Perfect fit although quite snug. I was 7 months pregnant so this was a bigger size than my usual, but it fit perfectly. No one could even see my bump! I got so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Bright fun color, nice thick fabric. Ended up loving the hi-low hemline.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my sister's wedding where we we all chose a color to wear head to toe. The yellow shade was really pretty and is very true in tone to the photo. I wore a 0R, but could have probably done with a 2R. The fit around the ribcage was definitely snug. The dress was definitely not brand new, and needed to be steamed and ironed to get it into the proper shape (particularly along the hemline), but overall it was very well made and was a lot of fun to wear.
Wore this on my trip to Napa. It was fun, fit perfectly & I wanted to buy it!!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't have found a more perfect dress for my tropical theme bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Thick lace, heavy material
Loved this! Comfortable, but not too short. Had a little more give than most Lily dresses I've worn, so I didn't need to size up for it to fit my hips (which I tend to have to do with this brand).

Pretty summer dress, got lots compliments! Quite tight in torso but ok. Only thing is the two spaghetti straps dig in to collar bone adapter a while, feels like they could snap, in which case dress would be ruined. So prob wouldn't buy but would recommended renting.

I wore this to my engagement party and received so many compliments! This dress runs true to size and was very comfortable to wear the whole day. The only thing is this dress material is much heavier than it looks and was very warm for an outdoor party in July. Besides that, I would definitely rent this dress again!
I rented this for a bridal shower brunch during my bachelorette party in Charleston. It was a perfect compliment to the setting and I got tons of compliments. This dress beautifully hugs curves!
This dress is perfect for work and then heading to drinks after. I paired it with wedges. I'm normally a size 0 in a dress but I wore the 2. It was a little snug in the arms but it worked!
Rented this for my bridal shower and it fit perfectly. Lots of compliments.

I rented a 2 for an outdoor party. It was perfect and very one loved it. The bright detail on the side made the dress look more slimming. I have wide hips and it definitely fit over those. The only issue was the top section. I had planned not to wear a bra (because the top is sheer) but had to wear a strapless bra instead to make the top not be baggy. The fabric is stretchy too which is a plus.

I rented this for my daughter's college graduation in SC and ended up buying it. Very structured, comfortable, and flattering! My husband loved it, "smoking hot" is his description. Photographs beautifully. Length was perfect and I'm 5'8. Bust was perfect on 36D, and with the built in structure I was able to go braless. Rent this, you won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my taco themed bridal shower and got compliments on compliments!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous bright colors on the sides! The material was thicker but still comfortable. I have a big booty and thighs and it fit great! I loved the high neckline!! Highly recommend this dress!!!
Dry good quality and fits great. Loved this and wish I owned it. True to size all over.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a fun night!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. I found it fit very true to size. After reading other reviews that it was more formal than they expected, I found the opposite to be true. It is a great quality dress, but the mesh overlay kinda reminded me of a swimsuit coverup with a lining. Super cute though and tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress - it photographed so well that I decided to keep it!
links_reviews_text: So overall this is a comfy dress and is supposed to have some space. I didn't wear a bra with this one but i could have worn a strapless (I just forgot one in my suitcase). A regular bra would show straps. It is a little short, but I loved it. I think it is the perfect vacation dress
I rented this dress for my Hawaiian themed bridal shower and it was perfect! It's white and bridal, but with the perfect bright tropical accents to make it fun and festive.
The fit was nice! Great fabric and the embroidery on the side is super pretty. Perfect with a strapless bra
This dress fit perfect! It's beautiful and thick material so very flattering. I felt comfortable and confident. It was perfect length on me, but I'm 5"1 and it might be too short on someone taller
Great dress! I was actually able to not wear a bra! The fabric is thick and provided great support! It had a little stretch. The embroidered Flowers were gorgeous!

Wore this for a day of bridal festivities including hair/makeup trial, dress fitting, and shower. So comfortable! It is a little short for sitting long periods of time in front of people so just need to be mindful of that. Easy to wear with strapless bra and virtually any shoe.

I wore this to our wedding reception pool party. We asked everyone to wear Hawaiian shirts, but I wanted to stand out a little as the bride. This dress was absolutely perfect! I wore it with a strapless bra (the shape of the dress means a nude bra won't work), but was still comfortable throughout the day. The fabric was beautiful and thick, and the embroidery on the sides was lovely (and in-theme!). It was short enough that I looked okay in flats, but not too short for a family function. So many people asked where I got it from. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: LWD with a pop of color
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a white party and was so happy with a little pop of color. Totally fit to size and was very flattering. Had never worn lily Pulitzer but an instant fan!
This was such a fun dress to wear! Everyone loved it and I danced for HOURS in it with absolutely no issues!

I rented this dress to wear for my engagement party barbecue. The colors pop more in person than in the photos, which made it really fun for an afternoon event. It did run a little small/short, but overall was very comfortable.
Wore for golf tournament. Already rented again

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a night out on my bachelorette weekend at the beach.
links_reviews_text: Typically where 6 but ordered an 8 as a backup and ended up wearing the size 8.
Fit great it was sexy but classy!

links_reviews_title: Great quality and beautiful dress but runs large
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a baby shower and it was the perfect dress. Beautiful dress and well made. It did run quite large on me on the top so wouldn't recommended for us small in the bust women

links_reviews_title: Wearing a cute dress. Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: For great. Perfect dress for the baby shower I went to.

links_reviews_title: Perfect graduation dress! Had strangers complimenting me!
links_reviews_text: This dress was AMAZING! There's a layer of fabric under the lace that really helps smooth out your body. The dress was true to size but it was tight around my arms. I wore this dress to my college graduation and I had at least 5 different strangers come up and compliment. Highly recommend this dress for a summer or spring event, especially for other red-heads!
Slight stretch makes the dress fitted and comfortable. Came to my knee at 5'2''. Compliments all night. Great summer party dress.
Short but cute

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a pink and white and receive many compliments It was super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove. I dud not even need a bra and I and a c cup.

Rented this for my daughter's college graduation party. Took a photo with someone else wearing Lily Pulitzer as well. (I'm obviously on the left. :) It was blazing hot outside, and this dress was about as cool as I could have chosen. So fresh and summery looking. Lots of compliments! Love this designer and her winner-dresses.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is forgiving and felt so comfy
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 10/12 due to my breast size. The dress was pretty loose for a 12 do I would recommend a size down. The weather was a nice sunny 95 degrees and still felt super comfy in this dress. The fabric is forgiving so no spanx necessary! I may rent it again for a beach vacay.

Loved this dress! The 14 fit but decided on the 16 for a little more room. The dress fit great and very comfortable. The only down side would be that the fabric was thicker than I anticipated. The colors are very vibrant!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I'm short with a long torso so finding things that are the right length (not too long) is difficult for me. The 6 was the best length and fit perfectly though my hips. It was pretty tight across the chest (due to my freakishly large rib cage) and I couldn't wear a bra with it, but it has a built it lining so it wasn't an issue. Overall, recommend it and would defiantly rent again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the perfect for me!
links_reviews_text: The fit, length, and color is flattering for my size and shape. It was the first dress I bought. I had so many events I wanted to wear it to this summer. I've worn it to a couple events, already. The compliments just keep coming.

links_reviews_title: So much sophistication, but fun and carefree at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Rented another dress which truly didn't look right for my frame, so RTR came through with allowing another choice within 24 hours. So lucky and mucho kudos to RTR's AMAZING customer service
I absolutely loved wearing this. It looks incredible on and feels so fun with all the bright colors. It is rather short so I wouldn't really wear it outside of vacation. Perfect summer dress
Love the dress and the fit was perfect. I wish it was mine!

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, very light material
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but definitely too cold for winter and I wish I would have gotten an xs

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly and will absolutely rent again!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit my narrow yet busty frame so nicely! Might buy it if I rent it again!
This was RTR choice to send since the dress I wanted wasn't available to ship. I didn't really like it till I tried it on!

links_reviews_title: @thanksitsrtr - loved this! Wore 2 days in a row haha!
links_reviews_text: This dress was right up my alley - a perfect fall transitional piece that I paired with flats one day, and boots the next. I love a floral midi dress & I love ASTR. The fit is very TTS. I'm anywhere from a L to an XL and the L was a little snug in the ribs but comfortable. The material is lightweight and moves so beautifully! I'm drawn to dresses like this - so if you're looking for more, check out @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com!

I loved this floral Maxi by Astr. Such a cute and flattering shape! Styled it with star earrings , black booties and a black felt hat for a super cute fall/winter look. It does have a deep breath in the front. You either need a plunging bra or none at all.

links_reviews_title: Overall really pretty dress- felt great. Paired it with an army jacket. Perfect for Spring/Fall.
links_reviews_text: Great fit throughout the body. Two things to note-- 1) lower neckline than I expected (aka more cleavage) and 2) I'm 5' 6" and had to wear 3-4 inch heels to prevent it from dragging.
I got so many compliments on this dress, the dress runs true to its size.

A beautiful & unique floral print reminiscent of a vintage dress. Fitted at the waist with a blouson top and alines down into a handkerchief hem. More of a maxi dress on me than a midi, the hem just grazed the floor. Paired it with knee high boots. I want to keep this!

links_reviews_title: Top runs a little big but otherwise loved this beautiful maxi!
links_reviews_text: The top was too big for me to wear the dress with nothing over it but I loved the pattern, boho vibe and sheer sleeves so much that I put a sweater over it and belted it! This is a great tip for any dress that is too big on top that can't be altered! Was sad i couldn't wear it as a dress but happy I did get to wear it at all. Would def size down if you can. Could definitely be dressed up when worn by itself too. Check out @luxeandlouche for more RTR styling ideas!

I loved the see-thru sleeves on this dress as well as the print. I had rented this dress for engagement photos but unfortunately when I ordered the next size up was not available. I had to cross my fingers and make hope the one size I usually wear FITS. Sadly, my chest was too big to be zipped up all the way. I wish I could've been able to get the next size up!
Hated the way the top fit, Also this is not a midi. I am 5'6", and this was hitting my ankles. Not the most flattering unfortunately.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing because it was way too big

links_reviews_text: Very feminine, flowy and easy to wear

I usually am between a medium -large. I tend to rent the large so it's roomy. This was super tight and the arms were droopy and awkward. They would have gotten in the way regardless of how the dress fit!

links_reviews_title: easy and breezy. lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: long for my petite self so recommend wearing with wedges. loved that it was flowy and very low cut
Dressed this both up and down for a work trip! Looks great; appeared nicer than expected based on the "retail price".

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Loved the fabric and pattern but wasn't quite the right fit.
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and pattern and loved the style. I am very petit and the shoulder fell a little wide on me and there was some extra fabric in the back so I had to return it.
Fit as expected, very flattering - but does hug you in the middle section. Got so many compliments!
Made a few heads turn. Didnt really like the pattern up close but overall a nice dress
The dress was extremely overpowering for someone short like me (I kind of knew it would be but wanted to check it out). Didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: girly and you can twist to many ocasions
links_reviews_text: this dress is beautiful and flowy. Has a nice neckline and back. You can wear it with different jackets or on its own. Boots, sandals... endless ways to dress it up or down. Almost bought it!!
Love this dress. Flowy and feminine, a little low cut but appropriate.

links_reviews_title: great fit, very beautiful, floral, spring summery
links_reviews_text: fit was good, much tighter around the waist and flared, was able to wear without a bra
