I felt like I was a couch cushion. The print was a little much for the long sleeves/long length. I am 5'7" with a booty, so the length itself was great. But, the lower band/stitching made the fit very old-school. Combine that with the print it was a dress way too kitschy for me to pull off.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress but runs small!
links_reviews_text: The fit is small around the waists but perfect everywhere else
Didn't end up wearing. I'm 3 months postpartum and this dress hugged all the wrong places.
I wore this for a night out and it was super cute paired with a leather jacket and heels. All my friends were in love with it and tried to convince me to buy it.

links_reviews_title: Wore from day to night and got compliments at work as well as the party!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, feels feminine and fun

wld look better on someone taller. even with heels it swamped me a bit. i'm typically a 4/small and the small fit well. there is no stretch around the waist and i'm larger in that area, but this was still fine. i didn't like the pattern in person as much. it was a bit muted and reminded me of something my grandmother wld wear. reg bra is fine. plenty of room on top, but needed cami because it was quite low and loose

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but sadly didn't wear...
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the idea of this dress. I am pretty tall (5'9") with long limbs and the length was perfect. However, I'm also busty (34DD), so there was just way too much cleavage for my comfort, so I would never wear this out of the house. The material was really flowy, with a slit up the front... super cute. I was planning to wear this with knee high black leather boots, but unfortunately couldn't swing it... sigh.
This dress is perfect for layering with tights and boots. The fitted waist means you don't feel like you're drowning in fabric. Floaty, pretty and fun. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric, but too big in all the wrong places.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress, but it was oddly sized, at least for my body. The waist fit and the length was fine, but the neckline and shoulders were baggy. I can't tell if it would fit better with a larger or smaller, chest, but it certainly wasn't doing anything for mine. Sending it back unworn.

This was my back-up outfit. After reading all the reviews, I felt it would work well if I needed it to. And it did! This was for my company holiday party. I received SO many compliments. Loved wearing a jumpsuit. Was able to dance like there was no tomorrow! Like all the reviews say, it is hard to zip all the way up by yourself, so do ask a friend to join you in the bathroom. I was alone trying to get it off which was hysterical, but I managed! I highly recommend this outfit.

I rented a jumpsuit to live out my Bachelorette fantasies for a Halloween party, and while I didn't order this jumpsuit, I'm so glad RTR sent it to me as a backup! There was an order mix up, and I was lucky that this jumpsuit out of four options sent to me was the only one that fit. It kept me warm on a chilly October night, and got me a lot of compliments.

This jumpsuit was perfect for this all black wedding. Comfortable and classy enough to turn heads. I was the only one in pants and I received so many compliments. I danced my butt off. Only one con: you need help unzipping when you use the restroom.
I loved this jumpsuit. It was sophisticated and fun and extremely comfortable. Others recommended sizing up, so I did and it was the perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: I felt like money in this jumpsuit
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit looks expensive. It is flattering and I felt pretty good in it. My only complaint is that it is tight around the neck. You do need help with unzipping it and snapping it back after using the restroom. Other than that I was happy . It runs a little bit small I think a bigger size may have worked better it does run long and I am 5‚Äô7.
This outfit was FIRE! It made me feel extremely sexy! The only thing is if you need to go to the bathroom someone has to unzip you lol! Luckily I'm not shy and made a friend to help!

links_reviews_title: Loved this jumpsuit! Classy, sexy and fun to wear, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly

I loved the way this outfit fit me and i received tons of compliments. It flattered my figure perfectly. My only negative was i had to have my husband go w me to the bathroom to unzip and zip it back.
Runs smaller but very nice fitting and comfortable. Easy to wear and dress up or down. Perfect for night out or fancy gala!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an elegant event. Comfortable and classy.
links_reviews_text: I could have worn the 20 but the arms were a little tight. Definitely hard to get in and out of by yourself. I would not recommend for someone tall as the length for me was just right I am 5'6".

links_reviews_title: I rented this jumper for my engagement photoshoot in Paris and I felt great!
links_reviews_text: It fit well, but looked better with Spanx. It was impossible to get on without help or go to the bathroom without help and you cannot raise your arms very high. With my fiance in his black suit and me in the black jumpsuit, I felt like we could take on anything- as long as I didn't have to reach too high. While I probably would not rent it again with so many other similar things out there, I loved that this one was more modest and I could wear it anywhere. Also my butt looked gooood.

Nice jumpsuit. Wore 12 usual size 10. Some reviews said order 2 sizes up but I think one size up is more appropriate. It also stretched a little throughout the night. Like other reviewers said, IT IS SHORT! I'm 5'7" and could have worn flats. Or a kitten heel... which I don't own. If you want to wear heels I'd recommend for 5'5" and below. I knew it would be short and still rented it... and wore b/c I loved the jumpsuit itself.
Super flattering fit, but someone has to unzip you to go to the restroom.
This is a gorgeous piece! I added a black sash that I already had. Keep in mind you need a girlfriend to help you in the restroom. ;)

links_reviews_title: loved the idea behind, but if you have bigger boobs like me, a little snug up top
links_reviews_text: length a little short

I wore this jumper to a concert‚Ä¶ Probably not the most concert friendly outfits, but I felt great in it. I am normally a zero or two and I rented the four based on other reviews. I do have small arms and the arm holes were pretty small on the size 4 so I would definitely recommend sizing up one or two sizes. You will need assistance in the restroom with that zipper, but it's not a big deal.

I kept trying to justify buying this amazing outfit! This was my backup after another outfit did not fit. I ordered a 14 & 16 and while both fit, the 16 was longer and was a bit more comfortable. I wore this to a wedding one night and a formal dinner the next! It made me feel sexy and sophisticated! While yes you will need some help going to the bathroom, it's not impossible to zip/unzip by yourself. I LOVED this outfit!!!
I love this jumpsuit. You can dress it up however you like. I didn't have to wear a bra and the girls were secure. I'm normally a size 10-12 and sized up to a size 16 for extra room.

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. It was a back up sent to me after the first option didn't fit so I was very nervous it also wouldn't work but I couldn't have been happier! I ended up loving it even more than the first option and got complements all night! Being bustier (38DDD) I am always cautious as to what I rent, I pour over reviews and size charts- though this was a little tight through the bust I didn't have to wear a bra and felt so comfortable all night! I will say at 5'4" it was a bit short. I wore 3" heels and wished it was an inch or two longer so if you are much taller I'd suggest renting the long length. I can't recommend this jumpsuit enough and will definitely rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Jumpsuit but Can't Lift Your Arms
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit fit like a glove. I generally wear a size 0 and size 0 fit perfectly. The jumpsuit was absolutely beautiful and I got so many compliments. But, that being said, I would never rent it again. I could barely lift my arms at all. The cut outs on the arms prevent nearly any movement of the arms.
This was my first time using RTR and I loved it! It was like this was made for me!

I depend on reviews prior to ordering items. I read every review and decided to go with YOUR recommendations... Sorry I had. Recommendation 1. Size up.. I normally order 12 to 14 I ordered 16 (too big) I read a review from a lady who claimed to be 5'9 ...Great because I'm only 5'8". Well if I was going for the "high waters" look this jumpsuit would have been perfect as you can see from the picture this jumpsuit was way too short. Ladies do me a solid... Please if you can't be honest about your measurements and just want to post a picture because you think the picture is cute... Just post the picture dont give feedback. It's an inconvenience to those of us who rely on these review (especially) since very few of us have the height and shape of models on the site. Btw... the jumpsuit was super cute and great material. I would definitely recommend, however do not rent if you're taller than 5'6"
Tight on the arms and tough to get out of but absolutely loved this jumpsuit!

The jumper was super flattering and the sleeves were a nice embellishment! I wish I could've worn a 6L as this size was just a bit short which caused the neck to pull which was slightly uncomfortable. I felt very classy and pretty but as with most jumpers, you will need help in the restroom! ;)

I received so many compliments for this jumpsuit and the sleeves gave me life!! It fit me perfect and was super comfy yet classy. The only down fall to this outfit is that if you need to use the bathroom you def need a friend to help you!
Very nice if your curvy like me. The zipper is a beast. Needed help in the bathroom every time. Not for practical clothing wearers.

I usually wear a 14 or 16 and both fit, but the 16 gave me a little wiggle room and was more comfortable. I am 5'6 and the length was perfect for 2 inch heels. A strapless bra is necessary and you'll need help using the bathroom because the zipper is in the back, but don't let that stop you from renting this super flattering elegant black jumpsuit! I got so many compliments, it was perfect for a work Christmas party!

links_reviews_title: They told me they loved it!
links_reviews_text: This is my second time renting this jumpsuit...I love it so much I wish I could buy it! The fit is amazing, however someone really tall may think the legs are too short. Wish it came in a tall version. Short waisted might find the torso a bit long.

I loved this jumpsuit. I didn't want to take it off not only because I loved it, but it's nearly impossible to get in and out of without help. I did, but it was a struggle. The zipper is difficult. However, it was worth all the "oohs" and " aahs" I got.

links_reviews_title: Amazing rental! Got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: Another rental that blew me away! The jumpsuit was comfortable and had a semi-thick material that kinda hides everything underneath and gives you a nice silhouette. I sized up because I have big hips, so the larger size worked better- but the smaller one was fine also. Def would recommend this. It is true to size- but if you're curvy- you may want to size up.
I am 5'3" so it was a bit long for me, but wearing 6" heels made it perfect!!!! Loved the fabric!!

links_reviews_title: Terrible fit for my hourglass body shape and 5'8" length.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was a terribly fit for my body (hourglass shape; 5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and made me look dumpy. Since I am 5'8", I ordered one size up (12 instead of my usual 10) to have more leg length. The jumpsuit has an odd fit: too short in overall length, correct size in the chest, too long in the torso (crotch was 2" too low), too large at the waist and hips, and too tight in the arms (cannot raise my arms). I sent it back right away without wearing it. Not meant for this body :-)

This jumpsuit is amazing. The fabric is heavy and warm while being very flattering. The long sleeve and high neck add Modesty. Cut out shoulders were a nice fashionable add. The pants could be longer. I was only able to wear a 1" heel.
Very comfy and classic

links_reviews_title: I lobed the way this jumpsuit fit. I felt amazing in it. Love it!!
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit, i will rent it again!!!!

links_reviews_title: Had an amazing time dancing in this jumpsuit! Comfortable and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Had a little room to move, which felt great. Need to wear a strapless bra with it. Also, just know you need assistance if you have to use the bathroom since you can't get out of it yourself! ;-)

In a world of LBDs, there is this. I rented this jumpsuit for a wedding and it was fabulous. For tall girls, its a little short-- but still doable. Super flattering and it would be perfect if it were about 3 inches longer in the torso.
I got alot of complimens on this. It was really comfortable too.

This jumpsuit was a nice surprise as i rented it not expecting it to fit. It was my runner-up pick of my four dress options. It requires a great pair of colorful shoes for a pop and i didn't have time to go shop for a new pair.
NYE 2018! My bff wore this (so ignore profile size & age) she loved the fit, fabric and the overlook of this jumpsuit.

My husband said the top look a little messy- but I felt trendy and cool so whatever MR!! I rented the 10 and it was roomy so maybe size down if you want your boobs to be supported otherwise it didn't look bad with a relaxed fit.
Love !

links_reviews_title: Innocent gingham with a sexy twist
links_reviews_text: Ladies, this top is everything! A very sexy cut, flirty sleeve details (I wore twice - once by tying the sleeves with bows and once just double-knotting). It's a snug fit with no stretch but true to size. No special bra needed and an absolute hit on date night. My man even had someone come up to him and tell him how beautiful his date (me) was. Maybe I'll just keep this.

I really loved this top! It showed off curves i didnt know i had and felt really flattering. The only problem i had was the neckline: it was way too low. I had to wear a bralette under it because no bra would work and going braless isn't an option with D breasts
I love this top. It does run a little small. But was very comfortable.
Fit well, dresses up jeans.

Love this top! This is definitely not your grandma's gingham. The cute details on the sleeve and the plunging neckline make this top next level. It was the perfect daytime top for the Bachelorette party in Nashville I was attending. It runs slightly small, so I would suggest sizing up if you are in between sizes.This top is a must rent!

This top is super cute for a weekend trip! It does run small, so I recommend going one size up. This works best for A to C cups since it is fitted at the bust. This should be worn with a NuBra or no bra at all. The fabric has no stretch. Pair this with black pants and statement heels!

Don't be fooled by the sweet pattern; in true Nicholas form, this shirt is VAMPY. Low cut, tailored in all the right places... you'll be turning heads. I didn't even need to wear a bra with it. It's very well made and it is perfect for a night out or a weekend day party.

material is high quality, it isn't too cropped, works with a mid rise jean. found it difficult to zip up and tie the sleeves solo, needed to ask for help! great for the weekend, but too low cut for the office. www.kayleighharrington.com

links_reviews_title: Festival ready with this amazing top!
links_reviews_text: Went to a day time festival with this top and it was such a hit! So comfortable and cute, the fabric is thick but you can still breath. I was so impressed by the quality and look/ feel from the top. I would rent it again, loved wearing it
Only wore this once. Liked better on the model than on me. Great pattern.

links_reviews_title: Not my style, but it's cute
links_reviews_text: Rented this for my bday bbq, and although it was cute, it wasn't my style so I didn't end up wearing. The bust fit great (I'm a 32G), you might need a little help zipping it all the way. The tie on the arms are fully adjustable so you can tie the bows how you want. The v in the front did dip a little low for my liking, but that depends on the person.

links_reviews_title: Great top for a day at the shore.
links_reviews_text: I have a small bust so it was a little big, however this top is VERY low. If I did have a full bust, I would have been fully exposed. The style was great, just beware of how low this top really is.
This is a super cute top but it's SO low cut it's almost ridiculous. Couldn't even wear it out to dinner without feeling like my chest was the focal point

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my YouTube Channel LadyLuck HQ. It was such a cute shirt
links_reviews_text: This shirt runs true to size- it really is beautiful. You can dress it up or down depending on what you rent it for. Only downside is you can NOT lift your arms over your head.
I love the style of this top and was drawn to its flirty attitude. However it is a little low cut for every day use unless you wear a tank or brallette underneath
Didn't fit and didn't like it. Went back the same day
The pros: so cute! Loved the gingham. Cons: Couldn't wear it. Fit was strange, I am 5'8" and it was too cropped for me. Also I am a B cup and this top looks much better on more voluptuous women.

links_reviews_title: Much fun, but little lose on waist
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly on bust, but waist could've been a little tighter to be more flattering.
The neckline is lower than I expected so I had to wear a shirt underneath. But other than that it was cute!

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear it out- too low
links_reviews_text: V neck was very low

links_reviews_title: Nice top, a little more low cut than expected
links_reviews_text: Beautifully cut. Was a little large in the bust (34b)
Sadly I couldn't wear this. Both the small and the x-small were too snug in the girls. :(
I couldn't wear this because it was much too low cut.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear as it was too small...
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit

links_reviews_title: I loved this SO much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: It runs true to Nicholas sizing (which is about 2 sizes small), so I'm normally a 2 so I ordered a 6 and it fit perfectly, especially if you are on the larger side in the breast area, SIZE UP.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this top. It's really flattering!
links_reviews_text: Better for someone with a smaller chest.

This is definitely more stylish and fashion-forward than I'm used to wearing, but I figured it would give it a shot. It ended up looking cute with jeans. The front is extremely low cut and it's almost impossible to wear a bra with it. It's also very short in length, so you might need high waisted jeans.
Adorable top! Slightly difficult to wear with a fitted jacket because of the sleeves, but worth it. I sized up to the 2 and it was still very fitted.

Wore this for my birthday mimosa crawl, its cute and very trendy so i would only wear it once. its a little loose fitting and way lower cut than you think it'll be. It can be a little clunky esp if youre not a petite person, was cute for the one occasion.

I loved the buttons down the middle--super cute. Unfortunately it was bad weather the day i wore this so i wore a jacket over it which his the fun ties on the side. It was low cut, which i liked..it gave it a sexy feel. I thought it was a cute choice for a fall day with the checker print. Definitely a unique top--if i were able to wear it in better weather, and show off the whole thing, I'm sure i would have gotten a lot of compliments.

I love that you can tighten the sleeves or tie them loosely for two different looks. It's very flattering, fun, and flirty! Cotton fabric makes it breathable and perfect for sunny weather. A great way to dress up a pair of comfy jeans! Definitely need to wear a tank top (or black sports bra, bandeau, etc) underneath if you're trying to avoid cleavage.

I loved the overall design. Fabric is cotton and not stretchy but the design is well tailored. I wore a black tank under it because it was too low cut for my taste. I liked the look with the tank. It felt true to size.
Doesn't work for anyone who is not completely flat chested. It's cute but I didn't really feel comfortable wearing it out - and I usually wear low cut stuff.
I definitely recommend this for flat chested girls cause this top is very low cut. I didn't wear a bra with it. However, its very flattering and was so fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: the cut and fit were amazing. Got so many compliments. great with white jeans!
links_reviews_text: Very low cut. I had to wear a bandeau to cover all the cleavage this top revealed. Very flattering, feminine fit.

First off, I did not wear this top. However, I did Love this top and would have worn it if I were much younger! The fit was great although very low cut. If you do not mind showing off the girls, this top is for you! My biggest complaint with this top was the fact that I could not zip it up by myself. The sleeves limit your ability to get your arms where they need to be to get dressed solo. Not a problem if you have a husband, boyfriend, roommate, friend ... This top really is lovely and well made, just maybe for a younger lady than myself! ;)

links_reviews_title: Could have been great but not
links_reviews_text: Very very low cut - couldn't bring myself to wear it in public. Sleeves are a little awkward, a little short if you're long waisted

links_reviews_title: Loved this top, it was girlie and preppy but still could be styled with a little edge too.
links_reviews_text: Like the other reviews mention, this is very low cut. I didn't wear a bra with it. As long as you are ok with a low cut and a little cleavage it's really cute.

I LOVE this jumpsuit. I'm normally a 2, but sized up after seeing how it fit others with similar body types. I'm glad I did because it's a perfect fit! It's super comfortable and the front zipper makes going to the bathroom way easier than most jumpsuits!

This jumpsuit was exactly what I was looking for. I wore it for a work function. Fit like a glove and I got compliments all night long. This picture really doesn't do the outfit justice. Will definitely rent again!

Love, love, love Black Halo jumpers. The fabric is thick yet breathable and the jumpers are really structured. The simplicity of the design makes them really versatile. I work this to work and business meetings and again later in the week for a dance recital for my niece. Later in the day I rolled up the pants and threw on some flip flops for a play date with my kiddos. Doesn't get better than that! Would rent again.

This jumpsuit is perfect. Length was perfect with a great taper at the lower leg. The zipper dictates the appropriateness of this jumpsuit. For date night, I lowered the zipper a bit more than usual and zipped it up completely and realized I could wear it for work (paired with a white blazer and nude pumps). I almost bought this piece. High quality with great attention to detail.

This jumpsuit was flattering and made me feel like one badass bitch! Loved!! I have a bigger butt (no problem, fit!) and I'm shorter and this one of the only jumpsuits their really fit my build. I am a 4/6, went with the 4.

I rented this jumpsuit for my birthday Brunch. It was super comfortable. I loved the pockets. Being 5'4", the legs hit my ankles in a weird spot, but I single cuffed the bottoms & it fixed the length perfectly! The front zipper made it really easy to get on and off.

links_reviews_title: Overall this is a dream jumpsuit. I may purchase it!
links_reviews_text: I got the 8 thinking I'd have a lil room. Nope. It's snug but I think that's the way it's supposed to be. LIKE A GLOVE. I'm so glad it did too bc everyone that evening made sure to compliment on it.

links_reviews_title: It was a fancy dress up halloween outfit party
links_reviews_text: Fit was honestly perfect which is sometimes hard for jumpsuits...

Glad I sized up on this one. Almost didn't think I could get it on and then thought it might be too tight but it loosened up. I wore it with a stretchy black belt and soft blazer (Blaque Label). Felt awesome and received a TON of compliments. Would purchase if I had the money!

I'm usually a size 2, sometimes 4. I read the reviews and went with the 4. The fit is perfect, I'm 5'1 and 133 lbs. The fabric is thick enough to hide all the imperfections. I did not wear it because the zipper got stuck with the waist stitching, I was afraid I'll have to use the bathroom and that I won't be able to zipper it up at work. I didn't take May chances, I reported the malfunction and got a replacement. If I knew for sure that the zipper wouldn't give me problems, I would rent it again.

The material of this jumpsuit is thick and structured so it's great for an office or event where you'll be in air-conditioning but while it's still the time of year to go sleeveless. definitely runs a size small so size up. Love the top and the collar but I wish the pockets laid more flat on the bottom and on me the length of the pant was neither full-length or crop kind of weirdly in between.

links_reviews_title: So cute and well made.. smoothing imperfections
links_reviews_text: I am 5'5" and 165 lbs right now. The 12R fit very formfitting. I am thicker on the bottom and have a long torso. It was good for standing up but when I sat down it was a little uncomfortable. I would have sized up if they had A 14. But thats all they had available. Will rent again when the post baby bod is Worked on a little more. ;)
Classy with just the right about if sexy. Very well made. I WILL be renting this again!
Great pant romper. It fits great and is tailored perfectly. I paired this with a waist belt and brought it together! 5'3" 147lbs 34ddd I rented a size 6

I originally got a 2R and had to return for a 4R. It does run small. I am so glad I did try again, because this jumpsuit is fantastic. It is very fitted as you can see from the picture. I received compliments all day long. Sophisticated yet sexy. I want to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Hugs curves in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color and the fit! It's true to size and maybe a little snug, but in a good way. The material is comfortable but thick in a way that hides pantylines nicely.
Wore this to a work holiday party and was complimented. Would recommend.
Loved it. Great thick material. But, didn't zip up over busy. I'm pretty busty and decided not to wear it with a camisole underneath.
This sucker runs small... or I've put on some weight. Honestly not sure, but would've been awesome if I could zip it.
Great quality. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: Not meant for long torso - cameltoe
links_reviews_text: Wanted this to work but too tight in crotch
I'm a tall gal, 5'10" and it was a bit too short in the torso, but a great fit otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but not for busty girls
links_reviews_text: A little tight on bottom half and wouldn't zip up over 36G bust, which might be the issue, not necessarily the jump suit

links_reviews_title: It's very plain and if you are 5'1" or under, take a pass.
links_reviews_text: The pants were full length on me and not flattering at all. They looked more like gas station coveralls or some sort of uniform on me.
This jumpsuit was great for my petite frame - it was a nice ankle length on me and fit correctly in the torso. I wouldn't recommend for taller women.
If you want to be able to breath, go up one size. If you want to be able to move comfortably, go up two sizes.
Since I'm super short this went down to my ankles, which is the perfect length for me, which i really liked and appreciated since it is so hard for me to find pants my length.

links_reviews_title: didn't wear it - too tight in waist and midriff...not comfortable
links_reviews_text: absolutely beautiful...it it had fit me...looks better on ... i should have gotten a backup size....but i'm usually a 2 or 4, rarely a 6...

Very tight fitting. I am normally a 6 and I ordered this in an 8. Once I finally got it zipped up, it didn't look bad and everything was held in but it was tight. I have curvy hips and a large top. If you're looking for form fitting then this is it! But if you want a little breathing room then this isn't it.

Loved the cut of this jumpsuit, gives you curves for days. I'm not especially curvy but it really accentuates in the right places! But does run small size up. I'm a 2 or 4 and think a 6 would have been perfect.
Loved it!
Gorgeous jumpsuit with a nice thick material. Runs very small, so was unable to wear.

I wore this for a work party and feel like this is the perfect occasion for this style. I originally rented it as an option for a rehearsal dinner in Miami and this felt too conservative. It definitely ran small in the torso and thigh area so I would recommend sizing up. I'm 5'7'' and the 4 worked but I would've liked to have a little more room.
Very flattering. Perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Maybe a lil too sexy for work
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit but it is too form fitting for work i think

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. Hugged in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: Being that I am short, I was concerned, but it was the perfect height. I read the other reviews so I went a size up. Got a lot of compliments.

Cute jumpsuit for the price. Comfortable and flattering. As other reviewers have stated, the torso length might be a problem for taller renters. I'm 5'7", 124 and 4R was wearable. I probably could have fit in 2R, but it was unavailable at the time. 6R too large.

Wore this to a James Bond themed semi-formal affair. It was statement making. Really stood out from the many LBDs and generic sequined numbers. Many compliments. Giving it 4 stars because it was a bit short in the torso for me (I am 5'8" but not especially long on top -- my height is more in my legs). The fabric has no stretch so this was a challenge getting it on and off - but once it's on it's a stunner. Just pray no bathroom breaks needed!

links_reviews_title: High quality, but runs VERY small.
links_reviews_text: Very nice jumpsuit, but runs at least 1 (maybe 2) sizes small. Size up. Also, do not rent if you have a long torso. Lines of it do not permit a long torso.
Was really pretty and nice quality but way to short torso for a tall person. I couldn't even put it on, it was so short!!
Rented this for rush and loved it! The choker was very loose so I just safety pinned it and it was fine.

Wore this to my school's holiday gala. I'm usually an XS/S, 0-2. I wore the small- probably size up if youre in between! Length was perfect on me when I wore 2 inch heels. Its really comfortable! Its hard to go to the bathroom but thats the only con! Definitely a good rental for any formal event.
The neck part is loose, but easy to fix with pins (just don't plan an updo on your hair)
Fit very well. A little play in the neck strap but nothing too annoying.

The length was perfect (I'm 5'7'' and I wore 3 inch heels, I wanted the legs to hit the floor). The distance between the waist and the neckline was too long which led to weird bunching, but I solved that by rolling the top a few times and it actually made the neckline into a cool necktie-fold vibe. Huge fan, loved it, one million compliments. I got it a little big (they were out of my size) and I found it to be very comfortable and still flattering.
I received more compliments on this jumpsuit than anyone in my family in their formal gowns. Showstopper

links_reviews_title: No dress needed to still feel elegant and dressed up!
links_reviews_text: As the other reviewers said, this needed to be safety pinned at the neck. Not a big deal--fortunately I had friends at the wedding willing to re-pin when I had to use the bathroom. It was a little bit big around the crotch area--baggy. I got away with it because it is black and the legs are wide. Overall, it was very comfortable. It did zip fine, so I think an XS would have been too small. I do normally wear an XS though--so I think this does run a bit small. Wore this to a black tie optional and felt like I made a good choice with this piece. Will def do rent the runway again.
Loved this jumpsuit. It's long but I made sure I had heels that were tall enough and it was fine. Had to safety pin the neck part because it was way too big. Good fit true to size.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this jumpsuit and felt comfortable all night long
links_reviews_text: The neck length was a little long and I had to flip it to fit more comfortably. Also don‚Äôt forget the struggle of going to the bathroom in this outfit. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4 and the petit length was perfect in heels

Loved the jumpsuit. Was complimented tons! The top was a little big and the bottom was a little snug. It was a little uncomfortable to sit for long periods of time (awards banquet) if I was standing I was perfectly comfortable

Previous reviewers are right...the neck is the only drawback to this outfit. I was able to pin it and it still looked great. Im 5'8" and wore the longer length and was still able to wear a good sized heel with it. This was the perfect outfit for my husband's work Christmas party

links_reviews_title: It was a Dress to impress event with my gym family. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äô and have an athletic build and 34 A
links_reviews_text: So let me start off by saying this jumpsuit was so much fun to wear!! I wore the Medium long and it was a great fit everywhere except for the neck. It was too slouchy so I had to safety pin it up and cover the safety pin with a broch. I also have to add that it requires the help of another person to take off and put back on when you go to the bathroom. The clasps on the neck are impossible to close on your own. I received many compliments on it!!

This simple romper looked amazing, but super tight in the rib area. I measure 32 inches and it was TIGHT! I managed to make it work, but wished I had ordered the next size up. All in all great dress, lots of compliments. Wish I could have kept it!

links_reviews_title: I am exchanging for another item b/c this jumpsuit did not fit.
links_reviews_text: The jumpsuit looked great overall, but the front by the breast area was wrinkly and this jumpsuit runs small.
Loved it but definitely need help getting in and out of. My poor teenage son had to help me.

links_reviews_title: Great looking jumper. Comfortable and sexy, but still classy.
links_reviews_text: As most of the reviews said, the collar is huge and needed to be pinned. The outfit also runs a bit small and very long. I am 5'3" and 115#, I wore the SR. The XS fit, but was snug. I had to wear very high heels to not drag the pants on the ground. Thanks to many honest reviews of other women, I knew about these issues and was still willing to rent for such a cute outfit and a great price. I got TONS of compliments and felt fabulous all night.

links_reviews_title: Fit was perfect super elegant and a total hit!
links_reviews_text: So glam!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit that would work at any level of formal to party occasion. Runs a bit small.
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit but unfortunately the Medium was too tight, and I didn't have a larger backup size. I bought shape wear when I saw how this fit me and that allowed me to at least go out in public... but the jumpsuit was still extremely tight and made me very self conscious. Like many other users I also found that the neck loop was too loose, and had to pin it closed on a tighter setting.

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: While the dress was awesome, getting it on after going to the bathroom was a bit tricky. It took a few tries to snap the neck piece and zip up by myself! The pants are super long, so you definitely have to wear taller heels in order for the bottoms not to drag on the floor. But overall I really liked it and would rent again! I am 5'5", 132 lbs, 34D and the MR was a great fit! The SR was too small (couldn't zip).

links_reviews_title: I was the best dressed guest at this wedding!
links_reviews_text: I decided to rent this jumpsuit after seeing other petite girls review it. I wore this to a formal wedding in Miami, where I needed to be dressed up, but wanted an outfit that was a little funky and appropriate for the location. I am 5,3" and the length worked perfectly with a pair of 4" pumps. The jumpsuit fit like a glove- the only part of the garment that was a little "off" was the size of the neck collar. All I did was use a safety pin to tighten the collar and nobody was the wiser. This jumpsuit was super comfortable and checked all the boxes- perfect fit, super flattering, and easy to dance in. I LOVED it and hope I have an opportunity to rent it again!
It fit just right in all the right places. Extremely sleek and chic.

This jump suit was incredible.... I decided to dress it down a tad with belt and bandana. However, it was classy and sexy without. I will rent again. I went with a xs and regretted not doing the small. It was very tight but I made it work.

I wore this to officiate a wedding and I would say it fits true to size, maybe a little snug, if anything. I wore the Medium Reg and it was form fitting (My backup size Large was more loose fitting, but looked a bit too big on me). I wore Spanx underneath to ensure a nice smooth look. I thought the top around the neck, fit a bit weird (a little saggy on the front), so I had to adjust occasionally to get it look "right." Despite the fit, I was able to sit, eat and able dance comfortably during the evening. I wore flats with the Reg length. At 5'5", it would have looked odd with heels. I would probably have needed the Long length for heels. As with any jumpsuit, using the bathroom is a mission, so keep that in mind. I received lots of compliments from both people I knew and didn't know!

First let me say, the jumpsuit was a hit!! I'm 5'5" and 137lbs . I have long legs and the length of the jumper was perfect. It was a little snug around the midsection as others have described but on one noticed but me. The torso must be a little long because their was a little extra fabric at the neck. Having said all of that, I LOVED THIS JUMPSUIT!! Overall it fit well, looked amazing and I received many many compliments. This was my first rental, I will definitely be back for more.

Rented this outfit for a non-profit gala. The fit was a little bit big on the bust, and I had to tighten the neck piece with bobby pins. However, this jumpsuit was so comfortable to wear and I got a ton of compliments; it was perfect! The other ladies who attended the gala either dressed in long gowns or mini dresses, so this outfit was the perfect medium, and I felt confident all night long!

I rented this in a M and ML - I went with the long and It was the perfect length with 4 inch heels! The fit was very odd however! It was snug in the waist and breast area with NO give - it worked fine for me but my boobs looked a bit squished and there was no room for a bra! The neck part tho was SO BIG! I contemplated returning it and getting another dress because of it! I ended up pinning it up and making it look much better - and after 4 safety pins in just the neck part I had myself a great outfit - no one could tell I pinned it and I received compliments all night long!

It was perfect length but the choker top was a little tight around my neck. The back was beautiful and dipped low. I wore this to a work conference for a formal dinner and it was perfect. I'm usually a size 2 or 4 and probably could've worn a size 2 so it wasn't so tight but it worked just fine!

links_reviews_title: Classy, sexy jumpsuit that received lots of compliments-Not made for short people but adaptable!
links_reviews_text: I rented this jumpsuit for a Gala I attended. I was going to go with my backup dress because this jumpsuit was way too long in the legs and too big around the neck, but the waist fit. I ended up tucking up the bottoms with rubber bands and safety pinning the neck. After that I was SO happy with how this jumpsuit turned out. I felt mature and sexy. It was comfortable and fun. It is definitely not made for short people, though, so prepare to adjust if you're short like me! :)

I rented this for a night out in NYC and it was perfect. Only complaint, as with any jumper, is with drinking and having to completely undress to use the potty :) not fun or easy. The dress is sexy and elegant at the same time. I wore a black strapless bra and it was perfect. I rented a regular and the pants are long. Definitely perfect with heels, but I only could wear flats. Lots of compliments and I would definitely rent this again.

Loved this jumpsuit for a girls night out on the town. It fit great, except the neck area was a little loose so I just pinned it to make it tighter. Very cute alternative to the normal little black dress

I got so many compliments on this outfit y'all night! It was the perfect style for a NOLA wedding. While it was a bit long, it was a different take on a wedding outfit and I loved it. Having it be a little longer actually made for it to look more fancy than it actually was :)

Wore this jumpsuit for a fundraiser and it was a great outfit for the night. The fundraiser was for my job and I was working the event, the jumpsuit was good for movement and the fast paced night but also a great look for the event. The only reason I gave 4 stars was because I'd hoped the jumpsuit woul be a bit longer for heels. I'm 5"11 and I got the long and it was good for flats but I wished it had an inch or two for when I put on heels.
LOVED this jumpsuit, so many compliments!

I love how this jumpsuit seems simple at first, but it has this really cool neckline! The neck part isn't so tight that it feels like it's choking you either, which is awesome. The jumpsuit does definitely run small though and doesn't have any stretch, so I'd recommend sizing up. I think a Large would have been perfect!
Tight in the torso makes it near impossible to zip up by yourself. If you're not quite thin this will be too small. I'm 130lb and 5'8" and it fits quite snugly.

I wore this to DJ on New Years Eve and it was beautiful and i got a lot of compliments. Only downside was, I'm a 32A and it was a little baggy in the bust area but it wasnt actually that noticeable. Also had to wear my tallest heels to make sure it didnt drag. Those things aside, i LOVE it and would wear it again.

This was a replacement jumpsuit. Customer service dept. you guys are awesome. The jumpsuit I originally choose didn't fit right. They recommended this and sent it over night. Loved it for a New Years Eve party. I wore the medium and so glad. It was a perfect fit. I usually wear a S/M (4-6) so it can be tricky picking a size. If your renting this i would go with the bigger of the 2. It was very comfortable and make sure to wear heels. I'm 5'6" and it was hitting the ground without shoes.
Fits true to size, almost too short in the torso on me but just right in the ML. Got lots of compliments! Great for a work holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dancing all night long.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments. Perfect fit
Ordered the MR and the LR. The medium was a tad too tight but still comfortable. The large was entirely too big. Gorgeous jumpsuit, however, the neck part was way to big in both sizes.

RTR stylist recommended this dress to me. I would have never picked out something so bold and body conscious! I usually hide my curves, not flaunt them. She gave me permission to flaunt and here we go! Woo hoo. Many compliments!

This dress fit perfect and the best part was that any bra and panties fit underneath. I just had no idea how to stand to take photos in this dress to show off the arm detail, but I received compliments.
This dress fit incredibly well in all the right places. Thick, forgiving fabric that was really comfortable and I felt incredible in it. I would definitely rent it again!

This dress does not have a zipper and really hugs your curves. This was a back up dress and was a little tighter than I would have liked but they did not have my size in stock. Received lots of attention and compliments all night.

I wore this for a wedding at 14-15 weeks pregnant - the stretchy material is scuba/ponte-like and very comfortable and accommodating to a bump, even in 92-degree weather. It's also very flattering for a smaller chested woman. I typically wear a 8 or 10 in dresses and would have sized up to a 46 normally (to skim over my stomach aka problem area), but b/c the pregnancy has canceled out my issues with my midsection, a 44 was a perfect bodycon (but not too tight) fit. Wear a seamless bra/stickies!
This dress is so comfortable‚Ä¶ You really don't need your Spanx...Hot to trot!
Really fun details and great fit! Note the dress has no zippers so keep that in mind when you're getting ready as you'll have to pull it over your head.
Loved it (especially since you could wear a regular bra) and was comfortable all night. I'm between a 6 & 8 and went with this size so it would fit close to the body, but not cling to the body.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect, color, material, size. I received a lot of compliments. Wish it was mine.
links_reviews_text: Went to a wedding, would definitely use it again.

links_reviews_title: Glad I chose to wear this dress on this day!
links_reviews_text: So many compliments and I was in a very public setting receiving an award, great dress to wear that day! Love this designer and the use of the "suck in material"! What a wonderful pop of color too!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit very well, it's stretchy so it's very comfortable, I'm very short , so it was a little long, but otherwise I loved it and truly recommend it.

It arrived completely wrinkled and I couldn't have it pressed on time in the hotel. I hung it overnight and when I slipped it on (no zipper), it smoothed out over my body. Thank goodness. It was a thick material so no spanx needed. Lots of compliments on color and style

Major wow factor! Got this one as a back up and ended up absolutely loving it! Used a tiny tack stitch to keep the sleeves up in place. Preferred that look over the drop sleeve. Either way you'll get lots of compliments. (High-quality thick fabric will camouflage flaws but make sure you've got a pair of spanx for this one.)
A little stretch. Loved the dress

links_reviews_title: The amount of compliments I got wearing this beauty
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this dress! Wore it to The Kentucky Derby and was told many times that it was the perfect dress for me. My only regret is forgetting my spanx but with this material everything was still held together perfectly. The color on the model and what is was in person were different in my opinion. Very much a purple hue. With the lighting it looks more pink.

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfy black tie optional
links_reviews_text: Flattering and easy to wear. I am normally a 0 but the smallest size worked. Was very fitted when I first put it on but quickly stretched out. I realized half way through the night I was wearing the sleeves wrong, but left it sleeveless and I don't think anyone noticed. Would wear the designer again.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. The color and design really stand out.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a funraiser cocktail event. The dress is really well constructed and held everything in place all night. I was able to wear my regular undergarments with it, which is huge for me in terms of comfort. I wore it shorter by using TEMPORARY (very important) hem tape. Easily removed immediately underward with no residue. I received so many compliments all night.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress and the color!!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove (thank you spanx), and I loved the color! I got lots of compliments. The sleeves are so pretty and can be used to cover arm imperfections.
Size was perfect for me. I'm between a 10 and 12. Stretch was great! Loved it more in person than in pics!
Cute vacation dinner outfit.

links_reviews_title: The compliments were flowing all day. I wore this dress to a Mardi Gras luncheon.
links_reviews_text: It is true to fit. Beautifully made and spanx are barely needed.
I love la petite dresses! They hug your curves in the right places! This dress fits true to size and is a beautiful pink color.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Fit, fab color, insanely flattering!
links_reviews_text: This dress looks small but it's very stretchy after you get it on. The fabric is like a thin scuba and really nice. Very well made, you can tell this is an expensive dress because of the extra tailoring. I'm busty, so without a zipper it was a tad challenging to get over the "girls"... however, the waist fit like a dream so it was worth a little bit of writhing to get into it. Very comfortable, classy, got compliments all night long. I may have to buy this dress! I have a hard time finding dresses that have room for my chest but fit snug in the waist. This is good for an hourglass figure and I think it would also work for the more voluptuous gals! LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
This dress was the perfect color and fit like a glove. No zipper - just slip it in. It was so comfortable and I received so many compliments!

I loved the dress even though was not my first choice I got to love it and totally recommend it! I felt like a celebrity, received lots of compliments all night long! A very good quality dress I give it five stars. I'm very pleased! Thanks rent the run way!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous fun dress that feels and fits as great as it looks!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress in August to my cousins wedding. I was a bridesmaid and when the original dress I ordered become unavailable 2 weeks before the event, a RTR rep helped me choose this one and I was not disappointed! I received so many compliments on the fit and color all evening. The dress is thicker material but not too thick and is stretchy and allows movement. I ordered in 2 sizes: 46 and 48 and found the 46 fit better. The dress felt awesome all night long.
I rented this for a wedding when I was 6 months pregnant. It was so flattering and comfortable over my bump - stretchy but still kept its shape. Got lots of compliments!
Fun, fitted and flouncy. Very slimming. Will rent again.
Fit like a dream!

links_reviews_title: Not my first choice, or my second choice... BUT!!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was not my first choice, or my second choice. I was informed the day before delivery that my first choice dress was no longer available and that I could pick a replacement dress free of charge. I picked this dress because it looked fun. The day of the event (wedding) it came down to my 2nd choice and this dress. I went with this dress because it is STRETCHY!!! Pictures don't do it justice! I thought it would be a body-con style dress with SOME leeway, but I was mistaken. Y'all!!!!!! There was so much leeway with this dress! I ended up wearing this one because I knew I would be dancing the night away with my sweetheart, the Best Man. I received so many compliments on this dress, from the flattering style, to the neck line to the fun sleeves. I'm almost 6ft y'all and weigh roughly 175lbs. This dress was a DREAM!!! I never felt constricted at all that night. Best part is, my honey swooned when he saw me all dolled up. Things happen for a reason, even if it is your "first choice" dress is no longer available. The picture with the model makes the dress seem like a very VIBRANT fuchsia color, when in fact, it's more of a berry color. I would wear this dress over and over again for that night. My only wish was that I wore spanks with it so my tummy and hips would've "stayed put" better, but I was still very pleased with the overall outcome.
Loved this dress even though the fit in the waist was not perfect for me. I am on the taller side and have that problem a lot. I liked how you can put the sleeves up or down.
Wore this to my daughters college graduation! Beautiful color, comfortable fit, and sexy sleeve details!

I wore this for my twin's sprinkle at 27 weeks and the fit and color were perfect. My normal dress size is 4/6, but given my bump, I ordered size 46. It fit like a glove and I was comfortable for the hours I wore it. Length was ideal and thickness of material was nice to make you feel snug without feeling uncomfortable. I would definitely rent again even after giving birth.

My mom wore this dress to a formal event we both attended. The material has just the right amount of stretch and is very comfortable and light. She received tons of complements on the dress and was very happy with how it looked and felt on her.

This dress - like all Chiara Boni dresses - is simply fantastic! The signature scuba-like fabric conceals all evils, the color is a gorgeous fuschia, and the neckline and flouncy sleeves make it flirty and fun. This dress is sexy on an hourglass shape and super comfortable. Sleeves can be worn over or under arm. Length is more tea length on average height (I'm 5'5"). Many compliments all night, including "best dressed guest" from one particularly forthright gentleman. Please forgive the lighting in the photo, as it doesn't accurately show the dress color... and please ignore the sunglasses, too (they were DJ swag). This dress is great for a wedding guest and cocktail functions -- RENT IT!
I loved this dress! The color is even more beautiful in person. I received complements all night. It's very comfortable and easy to dance in. I wish that I could keep it!
Wore this to host a gala...so flattering like all Robe dresses. Stretches and moves with you...got so many compliments on this one!

I wore this to the wedding of a family friend and got tons of compliments! The color really complimented my skin tone and the sleeves hid arm fat. If you have a belly, I highly recommend a strong set of spanx...the dress really accentuates curves. Also if you are busty, this dress will amplify the cleavage. All in all...a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, super comfortable, such a great shift from a typical little black dress
links_reviews_text: Perfect in every way! Received so many compliments and felt great!
This color was gorgeous! This dress is surprisingly stretchy yet tight at the same time somehow?!

links_reviews_title: It ok for one time rental
links_reviews_text: I liked the cut, color and design of the top. The biggest drawback of the top was the material. It's synthetic material which does not breathe, after a few hours of wear - I could not wait to take off.

Wore this shirt out to dinner on my birthday. The waitress complimented it and wanted to know where I got it. It is a little sexy but not overly revealing. I normally wear a small in tops but I have rented from this designer before and found that the clothes run a little small so I ordered a medium which was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Cute but I only wore it once.
links_reviews_text: The top had all the right elements. Color was rich and beautiful and the peak-a-boo threading at the top however I wore it once and returned it. The top needed to be an inch longer for me and the front kept tapping open, which I did not like. Nice but I would not rent it again.

I ordered a medium, because Im not comfident about ordering a small when there were zero reviews about this top. Big mistake--a small wouldve been perfect. This is TRUE to size. BUT still loved this top. Received many compliments.

Fun shirt to wear for a night out! It does run small and is fitted in the bust - it works best for A to C bust sizes. I would size up for your backup. There is a comfortable fit throughout the midsection. I did not tie the tassels at the wrists but I would recommend doing so!

links_reviews_title: Flattering top that got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I wore this top for a Thanksgiving party at a friend's house and received so many compliments about it. I loved this top so much that I ended up buying it! After that, I wore it again for a date night and then again for a work Christmas party. The only annoying thing is that the ties on the sleeves do get in the way if you are doing things like cooking, etc. I had to tuck them in when I was doing some cooking on Thanksgiving, but when I was at the party I had no problems with them getting in the way. You have to wear a strapless bra or wear the pasties like I did because of the lace cutouts. I loved everything about this top!
I would have loved this shirt but unfortunately it is not made for women who have large breasts.

I wore this photo for family photos as well as to work. This shirt is such a beautiful shade of red and really pops in the photos. I was afraid the keyhole in the front would be to exposed but it was fine.
A pretty top with unique details that make it feel more special. I am busty and found it wasn't super accommodating the the girls, so size up if you have a larger chest.
I usually wear a size 4-6 or small but got the medium and it fit perfect! Got so many compliments at work and wore it out with jeans & boots - both looked great! Amazing quality too!
Cute top with jeans, but didn't think it was anything special. A little boxy at the waist and a little short to tuck in, a bit of an awkward length on me.

This runs small, very small. And it has an inner sheath that was super tight, like a size 31 bust. I am usually a 2 on the top and I got stuck in this trying to get it off. No give or stretch to the fabric. And it is a heavy polyester. Would not rent again.
Flowy fit, great color. I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I got a number of compliments on the ties on the sleeves and the overall cut/fit.
links_reviews_text: The slit in the front is a little lower than i would typically like because I have a large chest but it wasn't very noticeable. I love the detail, cut, fit. The color was perfect for the December months as well.
Not my favorite
Didn't love the tie strings on wrist
Love the color but the style is just not for me. I didn't end up wearing because it wasn't flattering on me.
The material is heavy and hangs funny. The peephole in the front is also very low. I am 5'8" and the top was almost too short to wear with pants.

links_reviews_title: Needed something fun for a date night out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! Sleeves were a little hard with ties, but overall very cute!
Great fit in the shoulders

What a lovely blouse! I wore it to a party and received tons of compliments, throughout the night. I recommend wearing it with a strapless bra- I did not and spent a lot of time adjusting and readjusting. The peep-hole shows a little cleavage but nothing insane. I wore it with a drop down necklace and it was perf! Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Cute top. The underlayer has no give but the top layer has a loose fit. Overall, I really liked it
links_reviews_text: Pros - great color, loose fit overall, cute sleeve details Cons - underlayer with no give and tighter fit (makes it a little difficult to take off)
Rums very small with short sleeves for my long arms p

links_reviews_title: Wore it to the office with black slacks and it was very cute
links_reviews_text: This is my first shirt from rent the runway and it fit amazing! It is so cute and feels like it was tailored made just for me. Only thing that bothered me was that I have to tie the sleeves and the strings kept coming loose. I then made two knots and it stayed in place. Highly recommend

Great top to pair with jeans, leggings, skirt. Just about any bottom will look great with this top. I received plenty of compliments. RM clothing is of good quality and this one is no exception. I might just purchase this one.
Pretry top, but why does it need long strings with tassels hanging from the wrists? They come untied. So don't pick this one to go to Ethiopian food, I guess.

This was a cute top with a great design and I loved the color, but I should have ordered it in a size small rather than an XS. I had a hard time taking it off. It also had tassels at the wrist which was cute at first but became a nuisance when I was eating dinner and trying not to have it touch my food. If it didn't have the tassels I would rent it again in a size S.
Cute top. Top is lacy, so need tank or strapless bra underneath.

I could not even get this top on over my head, so I did not wear it. And, for reference, I am a flat-chested, no shoulders woman. So this must run small. It is beautifully constructed and an excellent color. I was disappointed to send it back.

links_reviews_title: The bust was too tight so I could not wear it. Very pretty. Wish it would have fit.
links_reviews_text: Very nice color. Acurate oucture color on website. Unfortunately the bust was way too small. Unable to wear.
I love this top because my husband loved this top. he couldn't stop telling me how great it looked. was a little on the small side but its fitted so its supposed to be that way

links_reviews_title: Great color, nice details, well made.
links_reviews_text: Wore this for Thanksgiving , a party, and a Christmas concert. Rich cranberry color is perfect for the holidays! Dress up or down.
This top is garnet colored and does run small
I really loved this top, I received many compliments and the color is a deeper red than the picture, its perfect for fall.
I liked this blouse, but not something I'd choose again. I normally wear a medium, but the large fit perfectly so I'd say it runs a bit small. Nice color for fall.

links_reviews_title: Great quality but off color and fit.
links_reviews_text: Different color it person and very boxy fit. Runs small in the chest- I'm a 32 dd and it was way too tight.
Odd if on me.
Cute top. It is a little short, but stylish. I wore with a cami underneath. I probably would not wear it out, but it was fun for work.

Rented the Medium and Large. Medium was too tight in the chest area, but fit better through stomach/mid section. Ended up wearing the Large since it was more comfortable in the chest, though the midsection was a bit big. But overall comfortable and cute for a birthday party on a saturday night.
Love. Love. Love this top! Wore it for a work meeting & received so meant compliments on it!
Loved this dress, my only complaint was the sequences being scratchy and catching on things easily.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful gown. It just didn't work well for me.
links_reviews_text: I needed a Rose Gold dress for a Mardi Gras ball. Since this was the only one that actually said Rose Gold, I initially ran with it. I typically wear a 14 but usually end up in a 16 in these formal gowns. However, neither size was available so I chanced an 18. It was slightly big, especially around the arms, but if needed, I could have used some pins to make it work. In the end, I did not wear this dress because I found one that had a better fit. I would consider renting this dress again.
I am short. 5'1". With a small heel the 6P was great. 4P would have been better but not available.
I wear a 10 in regular dresses, had to use 14 in this formal. Fit excellent. Many compliments. Great material, no creases with sitting, comfortable with dancing

I really liked the way this dress fit. I'm 5'2 and it was perfect with my 2 inch heels. My only complaint is that it had quite a bit of loose frays and looked "fuzzy". The sequins would also get stuck on the frays and would bunch up, especially at the feet. Overall a beautiful color and great fit.
As a petite girl, renting a full length dress is risky. But the petite size was perfect! Also, it fit great and it gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing!! I was able to eat and dance comfortably all night!
links_reviews_text: Glamourous, comfortable, Gatsby, formal, wedding, beautiful

I ordered the 10R, but it was snug. So I went ahead and put on the 12R it fit perfect. The dress felt very comfortable through out the night. Only thing it kept snagging on my bracelet. It is a beautiful dress, I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Needed a dress for a formal b-day party
links_reviews_text: So happy with the fit and style of this dress. It was my second choice and by far the best! Got so many compliments. Will definitely be renting from here again! ‚ù§

I rented this for a friend's wedding. It was a lot lighter than other sequined dresses that I've worn. Great weight for summer. It's a bit on the short side, definitely couldn't have worn heels with the regular length. I'm 5'9" and I wish I had ordered the long instead. As it was, I wore flats and it worked out. Pretty comfy, not scratchy as sequins so often are. Got lots of compliments!

Great dress and received many compliments. However, I was told (I went to the flagship store to try it on) it only comes in petite so the length did feel a little short for me (I am 5‚Äô4‚Äù) when paired with heels. Regardless, would recommend!

I used RTR for a wedding and you always want to look the part but money can be an issue. RTR is the answer in those times. I felt effortlessly gorgeous. I'm 5'6" and length was exactly what I needed on 3" heels and I'm athletically built and I felt that the dress accentuated what I needed without being provocative. I initially wanted to rent 6R but that size east not available for the date needed, so I ended up ordering both 8P and 8R and although both fitted me, I decided to go with 8R to have a little more wiggle room for comfort. The dress was just the right amount of glamour!!! I always recommend RTR!

I wore this at a wedding, and it was gorgeous. The only issue I had was that the length was substantially different between sizes, so I ended up wearing a larger size even though the smaller fit better, because the smaller dress was a good inch shorter.
Wore this to an auction fundraiser. TONS of compliments- everyone loved it! However It is sequined so be prepared for some minor irritation on your arms and near your armpits!

I wore this for a photo shoot and wouldn't consider renting it again for an event. I felt like the rose gold color wasn't flatting for my skin tone and the overall fit/cut didn't do anything for my figure. I was also really annoyed by how the sequins kept catching on each other and getting stuck together. I also got strong bridesmaid dress vibes from it. My sister said it looked like a prom dress to her. Very meh all around.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a charity ball at the Kennedy Center
links_reviews_text: Very happy with this rental, got tons of compliments. The dress is stretchy and comfortable, and shows curves without showing tummy. I loved the high neckline, which allowed me to wear a normal convertible bra. I'm not that tall but I'm glad I went with the Long rather than Regular, it was just floor length in 2 in heels.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: It's usually hard for me to find dresses that fit me length wise online, but this dress fit me perfectly length wise! It was a tad big around the bust (the zipper cinched up in the back when I sat down) but overall it was really comfortable! I would definitely rent it again. Perhaps I'll try the sizer lower next time though.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. I only wore the 2P because I have a larger bust and the 0P was a little snug under the arms. Length was just hitting the floor with a large heel and it hugged my figure in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: It was great dress. I received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was TTS. I ordered a 6Pand 8P and went with 6P.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, elegant, perfect for a spring wedding event!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly! I was able to wear flat sandals with this gown. This was perfect because I am having back issues and unable to wear heels for a long period of time.

links_reviews_title: Perfect length for this shorty!! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect, fit was comfy and it was super flattering!

This dress was totally amazing! I feel I always try to hide my stomach or feel comfortable through any celebration I attend. I was a bridesmaid and this dress was totally perfect! I am tall, the length was great, I was able to wear small heals with it. The color is a beautiful true rose gold as well. The straps on top gave you the more sophisticated look as well. I just felt amazing with this dress, totally recommend it!
fit perfectly and was the perfect length. It was also very comfortable

I wore this for a black tie Gala and it was comfy and very pretty! I got the 8P even though I would be a 6R since my size was sold out. So it was slightly big and short but the short part was nice because I hate tripping on dresses and I just made sure to wear a small heel.

links_reviews_title: I felt beautiful in this gorgeous dress
links_reviews_text: The fit was really nice and I appreciated that it didn't hug my problem areas. The petite length was perfect for my 4'11 height. I didn't notice that the straps were spaghetti and since I'm a middle aged mother of three I needed more than a strapless bra could help with, so I went with an amazon purchase of tape for support underneath. It was a little scratchy when my arms rubbed the sides but i barely noticed. I would DEFINITELY recommend this dress, the color is stunning. I received nothing but compliments.

This dress was not flattering at all. It had a lot of extra material on the top, but fitted in the mid-section. I really wanted it to work because the color is very pretty, but the material was too lightweight to hang nicely...it didn't do my tummy no favors. Also, as a heads up, I'm only 5"1' and notice how short the petite length is on me. 5"1', 145lbs, 32DD- this picture is an 8P.

I think it fit true to size ultimately but very form fitting. I worn spanx for some problem areas but even that wasn't enough in my eyes. I wish I had worn the next size up for my own comfort level. Make sure to have a good strapless bra or cuplettes. I felt like I was pushing up my strapless bra all night! Also with heels, it was not floor length on me. Even with flats it did not quite hit the ground. It was a pretty dress and went With the color scheme of the other bridesmaids but I wish I'd worn a size up.

links_reviews_title: This was my first time at the Peak Gala for Autism Research.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! I was most worried about the length, due to my height, but the petite was exactly the right length. It didn‚Äôt drag on the ground like other dresses can.

links_reviews_title: Many compliments the whole night at a Gala!
links_reviews_text: Length was great with a pair of heels but petite length would have still been too long for me being 5‚Äô1‚Äù if worn with flats. Fit everywhere else was perfect!

The dress fit well, and the length was perfect, considering I'm 5'3". The sequin rose gold pattern was gorgeous. I received multiple compliments on the dress as well as the fit. I got a spray tan because the color made me look washed out without one because of my fair skin. I would suggest wearing your hair up with the dress because of the high neckline. Fair warming--the fabric picks very easily. Bracelets, rings, purse straps, buttons, and more can catch the fabric easily. Overall, I'm so glad I wore this dress!
It was very comfortable. I wore spanx under it to help with trouble areas. A little long but I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù & wore flats. This was my 2nd time trying RTR & I‚Äôm glad it finally worked out for me!

I love the color of the dress. I was going to wear it to a black tie optional event but it's a little too short when I put heels on, so I used it in a photoshoot instead. I am 5'2", 123lbs, 32D-28-36 and wore 6P. It hits the ground perfectly barefoot, as you can see. The fit is very comfortable and forgiving. I would still wear shape wear for a nice shape because the fabric tends to show lumps because of its shine and the way it drapes.

This dress was a show stopper. I'm 4'11, curvy it was stunning. I wore 5 inch heels. The Length was perfect, the top straps were a little big so I just pinned it on top to pick up. The blush/pink color of the dress stood out in a sea of black. Comfortable to dance all night. Highly recommend .
Beautiful dress! Prettier in person than in photograph. Does not have "giraffe" print that it appears to have on website. It's comfortable and not scratchy at all. I'd definitely rent it again.

Be aware that petite in this dress is only for 5‚Äô2 and under. At 5‚Äô4 I wear petite a lot so ordered 10P w/out looking at fit notes. I had to run out and find flats. Sizing down might‚Äôve helped the very very blousy top. I took a pic to show that. Between feeling short and the very poofy waistline I felt dumpy not fabulous. On the plus side the fabric is unique and gorgeous. When I first tried it on I thought it looked terrible and washed out, too flesh tone for winter pale and untanned skin. But when I got makeup on it was much better. A serviceable dress but not as dropdead as several I‚Äôve rented

I loved my gown choice. The rose gold color was a perfect complement to my husband's tuxedo. I felt so elegant and classy that I'm going to rent a gown for my wedding! I have been pleasantly surprised with all of my choices and will continue to use Rent the Runway for all my fancy affairs.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful dress that really made my daughter stand out.
links_reviews_text: I felt like it was simple enough to fit her personality but different enough to make her shine on her big day.
#gala

This dress was amazing for my work holiday party! I received so many complements and felt gorgeous in this dress, especially in my post pregnancy body. Even though I ordered the petite size, it was still fairly long so I wore my platform shoes (3 in) and it worked perfectly. And it didn't feel scratchy unlike my other sequin dress that I wore last year. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVED this dress. Wore to a gala and got compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: #glamorous
Perfect for any occasion.

I have always loved this color on my skin tone. It is such a great fitting dress and it came out awesome in our pictures. I would definitely rent again for an event! I was worried it was going to be too long on me, but it came out perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and got many compliments! Comfortable and adjustable because of how it straps up. Ordered a smaller size than I typically would based on reviews and this was perfect.
True to size and comfy. Could be dressed up or down. Fun back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is unique and has a beautiful cut in top. It is backless with the straps holding it up. The straps started to pinch through out the night but I just loosened it up. It is kind of short under the top layer but I didn't feel uncomfortable with the length.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments and was able to dance it up!
links_reviews_text: My one complaint was the straps by the neck. I chose not to wear a bra with it so I had the straps tied tight since they were the only thing holding up the top of the dress. They were definitely digging into my neck. Maybe you won't feel it necessary to tie them so tight so I would recommend this dress for an event. The color is stunning. And the shorter underlayer adds a cute look I got complimented on.

links_reviews_title: I loved how easy the process was!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved my first experience with RTR. I needed a dress for a charity gala and this was perfect! I received many compliments and the dress was very comfy and flattering for my curvy body. I will def be using this site again for future events!

I love the backless element to this dress. I felt feminine and sexy without overdoing it. It was so easy to dance in. If you're comfortable going braless it's easy cause of the thick lace. I'd wear this one again!

The 0 for me perfectly, and I loved the dress and color. The 2 was really weird and had an odd band around the bottom of the skirt in the inside that made the outside layer stick out. There was no way I could have worn it because it looked so weird, so I was thankful that I did a backup size and that the 0 didn't have that band. The 2 was also too big and that's what I typically wear.
Bold color. Great for a summer wedding!

This was perfect for an outdoor, casual affair. The boneing does poke you and I could tell these dresses had been in the program for a long time. They were a little shabby around the edges. But, it worked for what I needed!

I loved this dress! The color was gorgeous and I thought it was very flattering! Wore to a black-tie wedding in New York. Many of the comments talked about the bottom hem, but that didn't bother me. The straps were a little itchy/uncomfortable/stiff, and that bothered me much more than the hem. Didn't keep me from having a good time though and I would definitely rent this dress again!

Super cute! Wore the 8 - that's all they had available but it worked well. A bit snug in the hips but roomy up top. I found the straps in the back to dig into my skin. Had to tie pretty tight since i am 36DDD and couldn't wear a bra. Lots of compliments but may not have been the best choice for my body type.
The fit and color are super flattering. Would definitely recommend.

Awesome dress! The color is so pretty! Very easy to adjust it to fit your body with the back straps. I rented a 2 and a 4 and could have worn either but wore the 2 because it fit better at my waist. Got so many compliments. Really unique!

links_reviews_title: Great color and length, with an unique back. Some unfortunate gapping fabric in the back, though.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7", size 4, 32D bra size. This dress fit very well, and the color is beautiful. I wore it to a premiere party with celebrities in attendance, and I felt like I fit right in. My only issue is that on the back part of the dress near the strings, the overlay fabric gaps away from the underlay fabric in certain places, and it looks a little ill fitting on the back. From the front it looked great, and you couldn't see the gaps from a distance. But up close, it's like it needed more stitching back there to keep the 2 pieces of fabric together. Other than that it was a great dress- love the tea length!
Fit perfect. Light and airy material. Only complicated part is the crisscross back- definitely need a friend to help tie it up

This was a super fun dress for an intimate wedding ceremony and reception. The fit was great- very true to size. Color was a nice contrast to to a room full of black dresses. The sheer bottom gave a classic silhouette a contemporary feel. My only complaint is that the underneath slip is very short. Also, you will need someone to tie you into it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and a stand out dress!
