links_reviews_text: I usually run between a 6 and an 8. When I ordered the dress the 6 wasn't available so I got the 8 and a 6 in a different dress. Had trouble figuring out the string tie in the back for a moment but that does make it adjustable so I was able to tighten it up and it fit me well. The skirt was kind of curved in some spots which I'm not sure if that was how it was supposed to be designed or if that was from the shipping. Overall a fabulous dress and a fun back!

Perfect! Elegant with the high neck line, yet a little sassy with the open, lower cut back. It fit perfectly as well. I put my build as athletic, it kind of is. But since having my daughter it's more skinny fat (it's a thing I swear) and this dress did not have my self conscious of my little stomach pouch. Just great!
Tons of compliments all night! Great for dancing!
I loved the open back! The straps are pretty thin and it is open down to your low back so I didn't wear a bra. For those reasons you have to cinch it down pretty snug. It was comfortable and classy.

Beautiful lace dress in royal blue with gorgeous tie on the otherwise open back. Lining is stiff at the bottom (intended to add volume to skirt) and was twisted when dress arrived. However, was able to steam it straight so it no longer twisted/flipped up. Would rent again.
I ordered the 0 and 2, wore the 0. The dress fit true to size. I was worried about the length of the dress being short (5‚Äô2‚Äù) but the length looked great! Loved the dress and hated to return it.

This dress is a little tricky to get on because of the tie in the back but it is so cute! No bra was necessary and the length was perfect on me. I am 5'5" and 150ish lbs and the 6 was great! Both the 6 and 8 fit me, the 6 just hugged my chest and waist a little more comfortably. I received so many compliments on this and the color was absolutely amazing. I wore it for a wedding rehearsal dinner but definitely think it can be worn for a variety of occasions!
Great length for someone 5'4, nice enough for a formal affair!

I absolutely loved this dressed! I received many compliments on it and it was so comfortable to wear! The back tie did not adjust at all after a night of dancing at a wedding! Highly recommend for a summer wedding!!!

Great fit, comfortable, easy to dance in. Perfect for a summer wedding & can go tighter or looser with the strings in the back. Didn‚Äôt need a bra as a B/C cup, if you‚Äôre ok with a little side boob. Loved it!
The color is stunning. The dress was a little big overall but could easily be tightened by the ace up back. So fun to dance in- breathable but flattering.

This dress was so great!! Bright color and very comfortable. It is not possible to get it on by yourself because it laces up the back but as long as you have help it's great. My only wish would've been for it to have pockets. Other than that it was a huge hit and I got tons of compliments.
The fit was perfect! A little tricky getting it on, but well worth the struggle. So many compliments on the dress!

This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended. The plastic around the bottom of the dress was a little wrinkled and unfortunately, I didn't have an iron with me to straighten it out. However, it wasn't noticeable or bothersome for me. The dress fit great and was comfortable to wear all day & night. I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I felt so beautiful and confident in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! I wore it all day and night and was comfortable in it for over 10 hours. I was nervous about ordering a backless dress as someone with a larger chest but I was able to go without a bra and felt supported with the dress tied nice and tight. Some digging from the straps throughout the night but nothing that caused major discomfort. Would definitely rent again.
The dress fit like a glove with its lace up back. It stayed comfortable as I danced and enjoyed the wedding festivities. I let's very flattering, I got a lot of compliments on it all evening.
Loved this dress! I got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a size 2 or 4, depending on the brand. In this dress, the 2 ended up fitting me perfectly. I got so many compliments on it! The only downside was at the end of the night the strap left a bright red mark on my shoulder- the shoulder straps tie at the lower back, and I had it tied pretty tight. Definitely a one of kind, unique dress though with a sexy back!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, good fit for a partially outdoor wedding, vibrant color without being distracting.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, was pretty comfortable/easy to move and dance in, and great temperature and tone-wise for an outdoor/barn spring wedding on the more casual side of cocktail. As you can see from the pic, on a shorter-ish person like myself it came much closer to my ankles than on the model, so be prepared to feel more like you're wearing something of a maxi vibe. It has a strappy back so you can't wear a bra with a back - I wore stick-ons and no bra and the top fit snugly enough that that was comfortable.
Great fit! Received so many compliments!!

I'm 5'5 with broad/athletic shoulders and this dress accentuated my arms and back very nicely. For my proportions it was a tad long (maybe an inch or two?) but honestly it was so comfortable and overall so pretty I didn't care that much.
Beautiful dress runs a little large and a size down would've fit perfectly. Has Vibrant colors & lighter fabric - very comfortable to wear and had slimming cut.
Got lots of compliments at work. I wish I could afford to buy this dress. It fit like a glove, but appropriate for work. Beautiful colors and I just love the styling!
I was surprised that this doesn't get more positive reviews. Truly a beautiful dress.
I liked this more than I thought I would. Fabric was perfect - easy for travel, no wrinkles. Flattering design with interesting details. Great for pear shape.

links_reviews_title: Easily the most expensive dress I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: The fabric of this dress is amazing, kind of textured with no stretch! I'm a little small chested so it ran large in the bust for me... might have been able to size down. Love the knot in the middle! The buttons on the bottom were such a cute feature... able to button it up or down to the amount of slit you want. Love the length of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern, kind of strange cut
links_reviews_text: This definitely required a belt and safety pins on my body, and even then it wasn't super-flattering. I think it runs a whole size large. Still, the pattern was pretty and the v-neck and button-up slit (left mostly unbuttoned in this photo) were sexy and flattering on an otherwise sack of a dress.

links_reviews_title: Really beautiful. I wanted to keep it!
links_reviews_text: Pros: GORGEOUS, body flattering, comfortable, well-made, can wear regular bra. V-neck depth and leg opening can be modified for personal style Cons: material gathers around stomach, which was great for my mummy tummy, but others might consider sizing down.
This dress is really nice and you can tell that it's very high quality. I don't know if it is supposed to fit loose but to me it was too baggy so I paired it with a belt to give it more shape.

So comfortable and beautiful! Fit is a little large and somehow the silk is a little stretchy, so size down. The knotted front doesn't lie as flat as it looks on the model, but still a flattering shape.

Really loved this dress. The pattern was interesting, the sleeves were that perfect just more than capable sleeve length and the tie knot in the middle make the dress interesting and hide all tummy issues. I felt Chic and comfortable in this one, and think the look is really versatile for so many things.

Honestly, I thought I was going to HATE this when I opened it, but I was So, so wrong. The color and print are so vibrant and the fit is really flattering. Was worried that the length would be awkward, but it actually hits in just the right spot. The 2 was a tiny bit snug in the bust (that happens a bunch) and the eye was missing from the hook and and eye at the neckline (rugged it with a safety pin) but it'll pain me to send this back.
Loved the style, the fabric and the sleeves

links_reviews_title: Love this designer but not this dress
links_reviews_text: Runs large on top. Material is not of the highest quality. Was so big, I couldn't wear it.
Hated it. Rough fabric. Looks cheap. Knot in the front was placed right above my belly which made me look squat not svelte. Nope.

Most comfortable vacation dress-up dinner dress I can imagine. Length was perfect maxi for me at 5'3". The dress is easy to slip into and comfortable in hot weather while still looking very polished. I brought it on a 2 week beach vacation and wore it out to nice dinners several times. It has several subtle details that really make the fit look great and can wear with a normal bra. The material is forgiving and doesn't wrinkle. I threw it in the drier on low to freshen it up. I felt totally at-ease but also appropriately dressed up for fine dinners out.

links_reviews_title: Slimming dress that is super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Runs large in the chest and stomach, just a bit loose with folding material, but lovely.
Fit was good, loved option of the buttons for the slit so you could choose how high you wanted it , comfortable breathable material , detail of back is pretty - wish it came in solids!
Appreciated the fabric and the length.
great fit, so was ok

This dress ran a smidge large, so order a size down for your second size. It has a v-neck with a hook and eye closure that can make it a shallower v-neck, or undo it for a deeper-v for a night out on the town. The length and cap sleeves were nice for work

links_reviews_title: Loved the print, not so much the fit.
links_reviews_text: I should have listened to the other reviewers. The fit at the top is very odd and very big. It's made for someone much taller than I am, so all the extra fabric just looked around my chest and waist. Too bad, as I thought the fabric and print were perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: An evening filled with friends, wine and dancing in a perfectly comfortable dress!
links_reviews_text: I liked this for a VERY hot day. The fit was slightly blousy but very comfortable and stayed cool through a summer evening in DC.

I thought it seemed frumpy out of the bag but once I put it on, it was so cute. The buttoned slit in the front gave it interest along with the interesting fit of the under and outer layer. It was flirty but covered up, which made it great for work. It seemed a little roomy in the middle so I may size down. I'd rent it again.
Too low cut

There is another Jackie dress by Prabal Gurung that fits like a dream. Get that one. This one was huge and the fabrication is completely different. It felt matronly while the other felt sexy. I really love this designer and this was a real disappointment.

links_reviews_title: Cute but fit is not great
links_reviews_text: The sleeves and the upper part of the dress run really large- feels though I have wings. The knot or design in the stomach area would give anyone a stomach. Pretty pattern but the material and fit are less yah ideal.

links_reviews_title: Nicest house dress you'll ever wear.
links_reviews_text: Not sure I loved the silhouette--the knot in front didn't drape that well, but the material was gorgeous and it was super comfy. I could probably have sized down one.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully constructed; was too spring-ish for the weather of the event I was attending
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly and the cut is great. Pattern is a little old-school (I had something very similar in the mid 90s) but it's clearly a designer dress.
The gathering of material in the front turns this into a quasi- maternity dress. Not flattering.

links_reviews_title: Pretty in pink ... and blue and black and green and white and
links_reviews_text: Such a fun, springtime dress. The colors were brighter in real life than they looked on the screen, but I didn't mind. It was a flattering cut, and there were several features that I appreciated, like the buttons at the bottom to create a slit and the extra fabric under the arm to prevent sideboob. I received lots of compliments and felt very confident in this.

links_reviews_title: Gapes in front and bra shows
links_reviews_text: Gapes in front

links_reviews_title: Cut makes a large bust look huge
links_reviews_text: Cut makes a large bust look huge

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to work.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little large around the bust.

This is a very well constructed dress with lots of details. The fabric will not wrinkle so it makes it great for warm weather and travel. I wore it to a weeknight event and it was just dressy enough. I would think it would be great for a wedding. The detail in the front seemed a bit much at first but I grew to really love this dress.

As other reviewers said, this is much better on than it looks on the hanger. The colors are really bright, but work well in a hot climate. I took this on vacation and got tons of compliments. Added bonus: it didn't wrinkle!
Didn't like the print or the fit.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for a different girl
links_reviews_text: Pros: easy to slip over the head, cute shoulder/cape leg style, fun print, nice material, fits well Cons: weird details on the front including a deep V front with hook and eye closure that might be fine if you are a small chested woman, but creates a weird gap where you can visibly see your bra in the front if you have a larger chest. Also there's buttons down the bottom of the dress so you can make the dress open higher or lower on the leg line. I just thought it looked confusing when there was already a lot going on with the bright print. I could see how it would be a great dress for someone else but it wasn't for me.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but runs a size too big
links_reviews_text: Lovely

This dress was great! Worn to a bachelorette for dinner and dancing. I was complimented all night. This is definitely a dress that is looks questionable on the hanger but is awesome on. Flattering around the waist, fits a large bust and also minimizes it a bit. P.S.- the dress worn by the other woman in this pic is also a RTR dress.
The lace is so pretty and the fabric had a bit of metallic in it that just made it glow. Perfect dress for a 50th Anniversary celebration. Tons of compliments.
The dress was beautiful in person. It had a slightly weird fit being a little snug around the belly and bigger around the hips and butt, however it was adorable.

Loved the fabric, flowers are a gold and gold rose hues. Really liked the lace on top that added a flirty touch but conservative enough for the type of event were at. It is short, keep in mind, even for my height wearing a size 8. Would rent again

This dress was incredibly flattering and unique. The lace detail at the neck was high quality and looked great on. It was a little tight at the rib cage but otherwise fit true to size. I definitely would rent again.

The floral print on this dress is subtle and beautiful. The lace on top of the dress really dresses this up even more and makes you feel absolutely stunning! I wasn't sure if a style like this would look good on my figure, but couldn't be happier with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Super fun dress; not formal enough for event
links_reviews_text: The fit of the 10R was perfect on me. The neck isn't as high as it looks in the model photo, which was good for me. This was a backup dress for a semi formal charity gala. The fabric on this dress seemed formal (think with metallic shine) but the length was a bit short for the event so I went with my original dress. This would be perfect for wedding guest attire!
Loved the fit of the dress on me, very flattering. The fabric with the floral design looks very pretty but is a little rough and could create snags. But overall, very happy with this rental!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so flattering! I got tons of compliments! :)
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a wedding, I was even able to wear a nude color regular bra and you couldn't tell!

I wore this to a movie premiere and felt super glamorous and elegant. The lace detail on the neckline is beautiful and I was able to wear a nude bra underneath without the straps showing. There's also a lace slip detailing on the inside of the bottom hemline which was a pleasant surprise. The fabric is beautiful but has absolutely no stretch to it. If I could do over I would have sized up to an 8, as I was sucked in pretty tight in the 6. I'm a true size 6, petite and curvy and my waist wanted to explode! I paired this with pewter strappy heels and gold earrings.
This dress was great! Didn't end up wearing it to the wedding but it was beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Felt good and was the perfect amount of sparkle.
links_reviews_text: Accurate fit. Worked well with silver, gold or bronze accessories.
I am usually a 4-6, based on reviews and a full bust, the 10 fit great!

links_reviews_title: Flattering cut and colors-surprisingly easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Given the mixed reviews about sizing, I was nervous about this dress. It was perfect! The structure and details made for a flattering outfit that was unique and stylish.

links_reviews_title: Not a fit for the event, but super cute!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and high quality. A little too short for a formal event, but highly recommend for a cocktail party.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments throughout the night how unique and beautiful the dress was!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly! It was fitting around the waist, flared out a tiny bit around the thighs, and the embroidery on top made for a very sophisticated/elegant look for the evening. The embroidery was not itchy or uncomfortable. I also didn't have to wear a bra with the dress -- huge plus! I'm 5,1 and petite and it was the perfect length on me.
lace is pretty

A little tight at the waist, but I'm much wider there in general. Overall great dress. You don't see the shimmery thread and detail from pics but such an exquisite piece in person. Great for holiday parties, dates and cocktails.
Fit like a glove & received many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great fit, perfect for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: Loved the lace detail on neck.
Wore to a charity event but felt like it made my hips look larger then they are? Maybe good for straighter figures but not so much mine...
fit perfectly. length was spot on. wore it to a black tie optional wedding dressed up with black/metallic heels. danced all night in it! everyone loved the pop of color of the flowers!

Perfect dress! Tons of compliments! The lace is beautiful and the flowers really pop and give it a bit of color! There is a lace slip under the skirt that shows a bit when you sit, but's it's pretty too. No pockets- only down side.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress for a wedding
links_reviews_text: If it were not for my baby bump, the size 6 would have just fine. I just did not want to be obviously pregnant when we still had not announced my pregnancy. With that being said, it was a beautiful dress. Wish I did not have to return it.

I wore this for a fundraising gala. The dress was very flattering. I have wide hips but the straight cut of the dress seemed to minimize them, while still accentuating my waist. The length was shorter than what I'm used to, but not too short that it was uncomfortable or inappropriate. Loved this dress!
Fit well, very flattering to give hour glass shape. Got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! The metallic embellishments and lace made it really unique.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! The metallic embellishments and lace made it really unique. Fit true to size and complemented my curvy figure.

A stylist at my local RTR store helped me pick this dress for a NYE out. It was perfect - comfortable, stylish and crazy flattering. I paired it with a chunky bracelet and felt fabulous all night long!

Loved wearing this; was sad to send it back. I was torn between wearing the 8 or 10. Ultimately went with the 10 based on no stretch in fabric and length, and was happy with that choice. I am an hourglass figure and i think it worked great for my body type! Wanted to wear strappy black heels, but due to winter in MI had to opt for tights. It still looked great. You'll need a strapless bra for sure. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Has a little bit of everything :)
links_reviews_text: Very flattering. Got so many compliments at a work holiday party. I loved it because you can wear a regular bra. So comfortable!

This is perfect for an hour glass body type. The detailing is beatufiul and the pattern and colors are less vibrant in real life which i liked. A little more muted. The collar didnt go up as high as i thought which was good too. Im going to wear it again to my work holiday party. Great dress!
Loved this dress! Fit true to size. Got lots of compliments.

This dress was so flattering. I had originally chosen another dress for my event and it was not available. IÔ∏è chose this dress as the replacement and I'm so glad I did! IÔ∏è received so many compliments and felt comfortable the whole night. I paired it with a thin black belt and black tights.

links_reviews_title: My husband told me to buy this dress!
links_reviews_text: My husband loved this dress so much he told me he doesn't care how much it is, just buy it! I was initially a little worried about the fit...it was fairly snug across the chest and diaphragm. But it was never uncomfortably so throughout our anniversary shenanigans. I got so many compliments and had a great night out!
I paired this with leggings to make it more work appropriate. It's a bit more fitted through the hip than I expected. The fabric is beautiful, but it has no stretch!

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on my dress
links_reviews_text: It fit great and was very comfortable and classy dress

Fit well. Definitely unique. The material was thicker but still comfy. The only downside- the cut emphasizes any bit of tummy (even seen on the photo of the model). Ultimately it was fine but might be something you'd want to consider based on your shape.

I'm normally size 8, and it was fitted to the t for me but opted to wear the 10 because the wedding I attended was at a fancy steakhouse restaurant. I needed a bit more room, as the material has no give! Luckily the top fitted perfectly still and I was comfortable the whole night. The neck lace is gorgeous! And there is a lace trimmed slip underneath that is stitched to each side so it won't drag up. The print is on jacquard like fabric with copper tones that gave a bit of shimmer so the whole dress didn't seem to come off too dark. A great fall dress pick for a semi formal affair.
Perfect dress for a fall wedding. Fit was true to size. The inner hem has a lace lining, so should it show while sitting, all you see is beautiful black lace.
Loved this dress. V flattering.

This is even more beautiful in person! I'm normally a size 4 but it wasn't available. I rolled the dice and was surprised the size 2 fit as well as it did. Though it was right after a big meal! Wore to a very nice dinner date with my husband.
great dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented another dress and this was the backup.
links_reviews_text: I felt like a million bucks! In a sea of black dresses I stood out. Plenty of looks but no one I knew said a word. One complete stranger commented on how beautiful my dress was. Kind of made laugh...I'm hooked on RTR. I ended up buying two dresses and I was so impressed with them!
Great dress! True to size and comfortable

Note has been my favorite designer thus far. The dresses fit so perfectly that there is no need for a bra. And I‚Äôm large busted. This dress was comfortable, not itchy. The arms were not too tight. Easy zip up. And I felt super pretty! PERFECT!

links_reviews_title: Guests at the party who didn't even know me came up to compliment me on the dress.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9, 147 pounds, usually wear a 6 or 8. I chose the 8 this time, and it seemed perfect. The sleeves run a little tight, but not uncomfortably so.
Great dress for cocktail party or fun formal affair. The embroidery reduces the need for a lot of jewelry. Earrings will do. Strapless bra is better than flesh tone bra straps.
Loved this dress so much! Got lots of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: I got soooooo many compliments on this dress! I felt amazing in it. I would love to buy it.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little snug through the hips, but otherwise fit great.

This isn't my first time renting a Marchesa Notte dress, it was truly gorgeous and fit perfectly since I knew my sizing of the other Marchesa dress I rented a couple years ago. The embroidery is absolutely gorgeous!

Worn for a wedding & received many compliments. Sophisticated and romantic. Very nice quality and the embroidery detailing is lovely. I could have worn either size...1 a bit more form fitting and 1 a bit roomier. I went with the smaller size and felt great. I don't love strapless bras so I used pasties & they worked perfectly. Easy to accessorize.
Such an elegant dress. It was really comfortable and fit well.

I selected this dress because of the two necklines - it's both modest and a little sexy at the same time. I'm a little thicker in the torso and bust. There was plenty of room in the bust, but waist was a bit tight. But this dress is so elegant, it was totally worth it! With some supportive shareware, you'll be good to go.
No cons to this dress. Wore a strapless bra. Good length on me, slightly below the knee. Would rent this dress again.
Great dress, pretty comfortable! Perfect length.

I ordered a 6 and an 8, and ultimately wore the 8, which fit my hourglass frame like a glove. It was so snug that I didn't have to wear a bra, which is an unusual treat for a busty person, though I would order this designer in an 8 and 10 next time. The dress definitely hugs the pooch area, but it fit so well that it didn't draw undue attention. I loved the details, especially the moths and insects embroidered on the gown - perfect for the formal party I attended at a natural history museum.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful conservative but fun cocktail dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my office Christmas party in Miami and it was perfect. It's fitted but the sleeves add a bit of modesty which I appreciated around my coworkers. The details are stunning and even more beautiful in person.

The dress I wanted became unavailable so I chose this and one other dress for my office's black tie optional holiday party. I never wear form fitting dresses, so his was a shot in the dark with very little time to spare. I'm so glad I took a chance on it! It was the best of the dresses I rented BY FAR. So many compliments all night! It fit in well with a mix of gowns and cocktail dresses from the rest of the crowd. The dress has very little stretch, and the mesh at the top can gap a bit, but I filled out the bust and it turned out fine. The pattern lends itself to match many reds for accessorizing. I wore a strapless bra and shapewear shorts and had no issues. Great rental and I wish I could have kept it!

I rented this dress for a formal affair and I absolutely loved it. I wore a size 0. I am 4'11 and 112 pounds. So fit perfectly. It's very classy, elegant but at the same time it's perfectly for holidays season.
Happy with entire rental experience

Elegant with a hint of sexy with the sweetheart neckline and sheer top. Absolutely loved the detailing and felt like a million bucks in this dress. Length was perfect on me. Paired it with a faux fur wrap, which kept me warm but also helped the outfit pop

I love this dress so much I rented it twice. It's so pretty in person. It fits great. And it's relatively comfortable. I got tons of compliments. I didn't need a bra either. Which is rare for me. The dress fits snug enough to hold it all in.
Beautiful attention to detail, so many compliments!! Very comfortable and perfect for a November wedding.
Beautiful details! Tons of compliments throughout the evening.

This review is based solely on the dress (as for shipping and dealing with customer service, that is a different story!) I ordered this dress for November wedding and it was perfect! The detail, fit and color of the embroidery with the details of flowers and butterfly were absolutely stunning. The dress fit like a glove in all the right places and I felt so elegant the moment I put it on. I ordered a size 6 and 8 expecting to wear the 8 due to other comments but I found the size 6 to be perfect. ( I'm on the shorter side with a full bust and the dress still fit). I wouldn't second guess this dress, I received comments all evening! I matched my lipstick and handbag to the colors in the embroidery and it worked perfectly. There is only one thing I would nit pick about the dress and it is throughout the night, the lining kept coming out about an inch at my knees, and would stay lined up with the overlay, but it wasn't so bad!

This dress worked out well for a November wedding. I wore the 6, as the 4 was snug around my waist and rib cage. It was very comfortable when sitting, eating and dancing. Got a lot of compliments on it too-
Loved this dress. I ordered a size 4 and 6. The size 6 fit me like a glove. 5 3 and 127 pounds and 36 C. I would rent it again.

I rented this dress for a semi formal charity gala and received a bunch of compliments. The detail is amazing. While there were a few spots where the thread had pulled from past wearers, it was overall in very good condition. The fabric has some give, but not a ton, so I'd order up for your second size. I am small chested and have narrow shoulders and thin arms. This might not be the best choice if you are larger up top because there is not a lot of room to spare in the shoulders and arms. Overall, I highly recommend.

Sleeves were kinda scratchy and the fit was snug. I probably should have ordered a 6. Once I got it zipped, it was fine though. I was glad to see it wasn't too terribly long on me since I'm a short girl.

I wore this to an outdoor, fall wedding in Eureka Springs, AR. The dress was classy but also fit right in with the quirky and unique qualities of the town we were in. It fit perfectly and I received tons of compliments.

This is a lovely dress and extremely well made, but left me rather shapeless. I do not have a tiny waist and I feel this dress made that obvious. The 2 was a little loose but the 0 was just a bit too tight to wear for six-plus hours.

I am absolutely obsessed with this dress! I wore it to a black tie optional wedding, and definitely received a lot of attention while wearing this dress! I would say it fits a little small, I'm anywhere from a size 4 or 6, and wore this dress in a size 8 - fit snug but not comfortable - easy to dance, sit, and bend in the dress. I would definitely rent this again

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous! The fit was exceptional and that's why I'm RTR Unlimited now!
links_reviews_text: #fallwedding #wedding

links_reviews_title: Fit like a dream, received many compliments. Love this dress!
links_reviews_text: Fitted around torso, loose enough around hips for comfort. Worn to a museum gala

links_reviews_title: Beautiful embroidery on the dress. Perfect for a fancy night out. I received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: I liked the length and colors. It was a bit large through the waist and top for my petite frame.

It's a beautiful dress and I felt very pretty wearing it! Only issues are that it runs very small, it is hard to zip up on your own, and it does not give much so choose your size wisely...maybe go up 2 or 3 sizes from your usual.
Definitely unique with the overlay of embroidery...hard to zip but I managed (if you help it will be easy). The overlay fits well without any loose parts ...

links_reviews_title: Nice option for something other than a plain black dress for a cocktail party.
links_reviews_text: I got this dress as a backup when the original dress I ordered wasn't returned on time. I probably could have used one size down. It is definitely true to size. The shoulders were slightly large, but my hair covered the awkwardness. I also wore a black tank top under it since it is very low cut in the front and back- it definitely would not have been appropriate for the affair I was going to. The black shell worked fine and did not take away from the details of the dress. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to my Bridal Shower - loved it. It's elegant and the colors are so rich and pretty
links_reviews_text: I am 5'11" and 190 pounds, with big hips and butt. The length was perfect for tall ladies, and I was able to sit comfortable. The sleeves could be a bit itchy if you wear it for a long period of time, and not a lot of wiggle room. Overall, I thought the dress was stunning and I felt great wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a black tie optional wedding and received a ton of compliments throughout the evening
links_reviews_text: The dress is very good quality with good lining. Some of the embroidery was starting to fray probably due to multiple wears but it wasn't very noticeable.
Really cute. Fit well with unique and fun asymmetrical cold shoulder detail. Loved it and wore it twice over holiday with velvet leggings. Would rent again.
I loved wearing this top to work today. Dressy enough and stylish. The only issue is the shirt arrived with a small tare on the tight bottom side. I was able to patch it to be able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Unique fun top in a gorgeous rich color
links_reviews_text: Loved this blouse. Found it a little tight around the shoulders (i have broad shoulders) and it was right getting it on, but once it went on it was fine. A little tight around the hips too, but that just meant the side opening was a tad bit wider than i would have liked.

Such a gorgeous color & style. But being petite, cut-outs and length with semi-tunics like these can be tricky. Definitely recommend a racer-back bra for petite ladies, since the cut out exposed my straps (and exposed a lot in the underarm area - learned to work my angles :). Also hit a bit long like a tunic, but the material and cut is very forgiving. Women of any size should note one side is shorter than other, so you'll need to check it once in awhile to make sure no skin is showing (unless you don't care, and I wish I would't :)
Rented for a wear to work piece. Didn't even get out of the house with it on. Definitely size up as it runs small and has little to no stretch.
looked very worn. Did not wear.

I wore this top twice - once to work, and once to my son's school holiday concert. I received several compliments, from both men and women - the most memorable being from a male graphic designer who liked the "interesting detail" of the top. I was slightly skeptical of the top at first. There's not a lot of stretch so it was a little challenging to get on at first. Once that was sorted, it was super comfy and easy to move in. Would probably have purchased it but it's way too expensive!

I am 5'5" and weigh 135 with 34B chest and based on reviews, I ordered a 6 which along with a size 4 is the normal size I wear. It fit like an xxs or a size 00. I could only get one arm in, that's how small it was. Really disappointed.
Great fit, great look. Nothing but compliments. Everyone was asking me where I got it, even random people at saks. That's a pretty big achievement to impress fashionistas in nyc!
Great color! Loved the asymmetrical details (eg, open shoulder, buttons). Only thing that didn't work out was the fit... bigger and longer than expected.
This is quite fitted for a tunic. Not bad, but not what was expected. I did like the side slit, but felt constrained in it.

links_reviews_title: Was a bit snug for the size
links_reviews_text: It was too tight. I didn't wear it

links_reviews_title: Cute shirt but not for curves.
links_reviews_text: Size 4 was too small for me. The shirt has no stretch so even though I got it on I was unable to move well and the hem didn't fall nicely. Size 4 is for someone with no curves I would think. Also, there is weird armpit cleavage in the back where the shoulder is cut out. It didn't look flattering to me.
Like the arms, but little tricky to navigate into; after some adjustments they were fine.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous red color, chic and flowy while slimming
links_reviews_text: Beautiful red color to help you stand out. Got many compliments on how chic yet fun and classy it was
Getting very worn out- buttons and seams are showing quite a bit of wear.
true to size
Unusual fit. Very tight. I'm a size 4 and could t wear this. Was uncomfortable.
the cutout sleeve limited the arm movement and I didn't like the back looking like a tail.

links_reviews_title: No give and doesn't fit well for hourglass shape, with broad shoulders
links_reviews_text: I hated it. I'm hourglass, so it was bulky in the middle and didn't lay flat over my butt (looked almost tight). But the dealbreaker was the shoulder. It was actually super tight up top. In a size up, it might work, but the middle would be huge then. Sent back without wearing.
Thought this would be cute but it's just wierd. Material is thicker than I thought.

links_reviews_title: Great bright color and I loved the buttons.
links_reviews_text: I have long arms and a long torso. This did not fit me well. I really loved the shirt. Would look great on a tall and slim person.

links_reviews_title: True to size. Fun for work, everyday, or date night when paired with a skirt.
links_reviews_text: Great color and styling
Very cute top - appropriate for work or weekend. My biggest complaint about this is that it wrinkles quite easily, especially if you're sutting doen and/or layering.

This fit fine, although the sleeves were a bit long on a short person; nothing unexpected. The style, however, is just a little too dissonant. Although the one-shoulder asymmetrical cut flirts with modernity, the buttons on the shoulder and the somewhat flouncy fabric used for the asymmetrical ruffle make it awkwardly precious. As my husband said: "You look like a high-fashion Raggedy Ann." That's about right.

links_reviews_title: Chic and distinctive - get ready for compliments
links_reviews_text: This top was spectacular. I wore it for two different work events and it was a big hit for both. My one comment is that if you have a larger bust, it might not fit as well.

This is a beautiful top but I could not wear it because of how tight it was in the bust. I am a 32 DD so not that large but the bust was far too tight to be comfortable. It is too bad because it is a beautiful top.
Very nice fashion top fabric is very good quality and the cut is great. I got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Looked great on. I got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Fabric was wrinkled, I had to iron it.
Wore this to a conference with black skinny capris and heels- compliments galore from strangers. Plus I could wear a normal bra and still be trendy with a peek a boo sleeve
Fit was a little large. Long and baggy in the arms but overall super fun and cute

This top is wonderful. I love the color and the sleeve style, however it's nearly impossible to hide your bra strap on the side with the cutout shoulder, and the sleeve can be a bit long. Overall, it's a great shirt. Perfect for work to night out transition.
great color and came brand new but way too small
The top is unique and a gorgeous color red. A bit tight in the chest (I'm busty, though), but it looked and felt great.
Pretty, comfortable, I'm a size 6-8 and the medium fits perfect, not too short, if I wasn't wearing a coat over it I would wear spandex
Absolutely loved this form fitting dress. It hugs all your curves in the best way and you can wear a regular bra!! Wish I could have kept it. Rent this dress!!!
This dress hugs you in all the right places. It held me in, warning please wear a plunging bra...luckily I had one. You really can't go wrong with a Herve Leger dress in my opinion.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, perfect fit, very flattering!
links_reviews_text: The dress is exactly as advertised: same color, same fit. I have tried the brand on in a store, so I knew exactly what size to order and it is the same size I normally wear. I got the dress for a New Year's Eve party and it was very comfortable to be in all night, from dinner to dancing! I told everyone about RTR at the party because I was so impressed with the concept and customer service! It was my first time using RTR and I would definitely do it again. I highly recommend the dress for a formal/semi-formal affair and would rent it again.
It's a very snug dress but I felt amazing in it! I received so many compliments...from celebrities! It was so much fun and I felt great in it. Definitely a Vegas dress.

Rented the XS and Small. Decided to wear the S bc I couldn't get the XS over my hips! I am 5'2 and 122lbs with an athletic build. It is thick fabric yet stretchy. It hugged all the right places and felt great in it! Nice details throughout the dress. It was also very easy to dance in as it did not ride up at all. I would rent this again, I loved it!

links_reviews_title: Very snug bandage dress in taupe. Can be worn with regular bra. Wish it came in XL!
links_reviews_text: This dress sucks you in at all the right places and really shows of your curves. I have never worn anything this body-skimming before and still not sure if it isn't too much. I am usually size 10 on top and size 8 on bottom. This dress in size L was very fitted and I wouldn't want to eat a large meal wearing this dress. If it came in XL, I would have sized up. For reference, I am 5'8", 154 lbs, 36C. The color of this dress is taupe, not gold, and there is no metallic in the fabric (contrary to the description). The design on the top reminds me a bit of a gladiator outfit :-) Can be worn with a regular bra, which is always a plus.
I love everything about this dress. It was perfect for our anniversary dinner. Will rent again for sure.

Rented this for my "golden birthday". It's definitely more bronze than gold, but fit perfectly it highlighted all my assets. My chest is a 32G so I usually have to size up, but if it weren't for that I probably could have gotten away with a size small.
Loved this dress!! Very comfortable and cute! It was heavier that I expected it to be.

links_reviews_title: Flattering on the curves, but color isn't quite as pictured
links_reviews_text: This was super flattering and structured, but the color didn't seem as pictured for me. I'm not sure if it's my skin tone but I felt like it washed me out and just looked kind of flat and brown on me. I didn't end up wearing it and while I might try Herve Leger again, I wouldn't rent this one again personally because of the color.

Rented for a friend's bachelorette in Vegas. This dress fit true to size and I really enjoyed wearing it. Snug and hugs the curves, but super flattering overall and very comfortable. The color was nice, didn't stand out too much.

links_reviews_title: Jaw dropping dress that stood out in a crowd of " little black dresses!"
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove! Initially I wasnt sure Id wear it because it is SOooo form fitting. The fabric is very supportive, almost feels like a Spanx dress! Its very comfortable, more of a taupe color than bronze,and the detail of the dress is stunning. Got lots of compliments and definitely turned some heads. Nice to wear something other than black... this was very out of the box for me! Cant wait to try one of Herve Langer's gowns for a formal affair!

links_reviews_title: Really flattering, show stopping dress. Tucks and hides in all the right spots. Very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This is the ultimate, body hugging, formal party or wedding dress. Highly recommend!

Loved the gold fabric of this little number, it has a little shimmer but not too much. The fit is super flattering, and so is the placement of each and every strap. Have always loved this dress and designer, but not the price tag. I can't justify spending that much! This dress is the reason I love Rent the Runway!

I rented this dress for my birthday celebration. It was fantastic. Kept all of my rolls in and I felt amazing in it. It does run a little large so size down. You can't go wrong with bandage dresses. I am 5'6" and I weigh 160 pounds. I wear a 36C in bra size. So you can get an idea of what size to order. Just a beautiful dress.

I got a lot of compliments on this dress. The fabric is really thick so it stays in place. Really flattering on the boobs (with bra). The zipper is tough so you need help with that. Fits true to size. I wore it in 90+ Fahrenheit (30 Celsius) weather so there really isn't anything you can do to not be hot but when it cooled down at night, I felt really comfortable. You do have to accessorize so it's not too washed out depending on your skin tone. My husband said it reminded him of GOT haha but everyone agreed it was stunning.
Loved wearing this dress for an anniversary dinner. It looked and felt great. Highly recommend.
C
Color was a bit bland - comfortable to dance all night. Typically a size 27 or 4. Wore medium as dress is super structured. thick and stretchy.
Its a very hard to match color. I ended up wearing thin strappy black scandals.
True to size. What more can I say. This dress was very lovely. Would rent again

It was tighter than I imagined it would be. It was still beautiful on, but hard to comfortably dance in or sit for long periods of time. It's definitely not as metallic looking as it is in the stock photo. The color is still beautiful, but because it wasn't as shiny looking, I was able to wear it with crystal encrusted heels to dress it up.

This dress is phenomenal! I received SO many compliments. Not to mention it turned my B cups in to C cups. Made the gals look amazing! I had no issues with the dress other than the zipper can be difficult, you'll need a buddy. The fabric is very sturdy but doesn't breathe well, so if it's an outdoor wedding bf you will be hot! Other than that I LOVED this dress and would definitely rent again!!

This was originally my back up dress but I ended up loving it! The medium was a little loose in the chest so I wore the small but really probably could have worn either size as it does have a bit of stretch. I agree with other reviewers you will need tape if you want to keep the collar straight and it is not a true shiny gold like in the picture. I think because it has been washed so many times. It was a gorgeous dress and I'm still getting compliments from people on it!
It looked pretty hot but too sexy for the event I was going to. A bit tight and form fitting - so I went with another option.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, but short and low cut
links_reviews_text: This dress is SHORT, and if you have a bigger bust, your bra is going to show over the course of the evening. I was fiddling with it all night; pulling the dress down towards my knee when it rode up, and then yanking it up trying to conceal my cleavage. It was a never-ending cycle of discomfort and unintentional revealing of some unsavory bits. It fit so beautifully and snugly otherwise. It showed off my curves nicely, but I probably wouldn't rent it again.

Beautiful dress, fits perfectly and is ultra flattering. Like the other reviews said, more tan than copper or metallic, maybe it was metallic at some point but now it's more tan. The color now makes it more work appropriate when paired with a nice fitted blazer.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! The color is not the same - but till gorgeous! Wonderful fit! Overall GREAT DRESS!
links_reviews_text: This dress is outstanding! It has a wonderful slimming effect, the bandage makeup of the dress holds your body well. The color is different from the stock photo (I assume from being cleaned multiple times) it is a darker/duller bronze, STILL BEAUTIFUL, honestly I almost liked it better, when it got here! I ordered a small and a medium and ended up wearing the small, as the medium was so large it was almost baggy on me. I felt great in this dress, and received so many compliments--I had a baby less than a year ago, and was worried and self conscious, but this dress made me feel phenomenal!

The fit was great & held me in all the right places. I have a large chest (38D) and I did not feel exposed at all. Just the right amount of cleavage. I received several compliments and felt great all night.

links_reviews_title: Sharing this time with my husband, no kids! üòâ
links_reviews_text: Great quality dress, I loved it. Size small did fit on me but I felt more comfortable in a size medium. Classy and sexy dress :) I'm 5'4, about 125 lbs
Perfect fit! Sexy! Fun and fabulous! Definitely rent if you want a fitted dress! Felt beautiful and classy

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable for dining and dancing
links_reviews_text: This was a bit snug in the bust but fit everywhere else quite well. It's a really flattering cut and the bandage style holds everything in in just the right way.
Beautiful and sexy! So many compliments. The dress fits beautifully and is very comfortable.
This dress is amazing! The thick stretchy material flatters curves. Super comfortable and very classy. I got so many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Love the design, color was bland.
links_reviews_text: Great Leger fit and interesting details. The color was a lot less metallic and more matte wood toned... my hubs said "It looks like bamboo." This was my back up for the electric blue cage-hemmed dress, so it was an easy choice to go with the blue. This color just was blah for me. Maybe better on blonde or redhead, or someone with dark skin, but it just made me feel washed out.

I wore this to a friend's birthday at a casino and it was the right about of feminine and sexy without being too much for a night out. It definitely holds everything in! I got compliments from so many women! I'm definitely thinking I'll rent this again for the NFL Awards in February!

Dress is gorgeous; fabric is a greyish brown with bronze foil details. It's shimmery, but subtly so. The dress is stretchy but really sucks you in. I am only 5'1" so it went sort of mid-knees on me, which made it a little difficult to get in and out of the car (but dancing was fine). Only drawback: there is a detail at the neckline which I needed to use tape to hold down. Not a big deal, but you should have Hollywood tape on hand, otherwise the corners of it curl up. Wore with bronze shoes and a camel colored wrap. Lots of compliments!

I got this dress and the color is not the same as pictured. It was more tan and without the gold embellishments. Still a great dress however it was a back up dress I got. With my tan skin I felt that I would look washed out so had to go with another dress.

This dress was beautiful. It is definitely more of a bronze color than the gold it looks in online picture, but it was stunning. I got compliments all night! It definitely is supposed to fit snug, but it is still comfortable and hugs in all the right places. It also made my boobs (which are normally non existent) look great! I would definitely rent this again.

I really loved the color and pattern of this dress. I thought the neck with the buttons on the side were a beautiful touch. It was kind of a weird fit around the bust though...it kept gapping and I had to adjust it a lot. I thought the length was nice, and it was fun how it was shorter on one side. Had a little bit extra room in the stomach area. If it wasn't good enough to give it five stars- I would have bought it otherwise!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved it!!! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Great for a curvy girl. I wore spanx to keep everything in place and felt sexy all night. I am a 10 and wore a 10 and it fit like a glove. Didn't need to wear a bra
Loved the dress! Not stretchy and rubs small. I usually wear a size 6 and the size 8 fit me just barely. The colors and quality of the fabric are great!

Wore this for a fundraiser supporting Asian charity. Beautiful and unique piece. A little loose in the chest for me. I'm short, so I used fashion tape to shorten the hem which looked much better on my petite frame. After receiving a compliment, I mentioned it was RTR and that I'd probably only wear it once in my life, but was urged to rent it again!
Fit well

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but it didn't fit as well as I had hoped. I might have been able to go down to the 2.
links_reviews_text: The 4 was too loose in my waist so it wasn't as flattering as it could've been. I was afraid if I went down in size then the top would be too tight though. For reference my measurements are 38,25.5,35. I'm a 34 DDD with a small waist so sometimes it's a little hard to find something that is flattering and fitted enough. The color is really so gorgeous it's hard to do it justice in photos but some of the embroidery looks like it's been snagged before so they stick out a tiny but but honestly it's not very noticeable and didn't bother me. I wore this to a cocktail party in Beverly Hills for the Lunar New Year and I felt like it really went with the theme.
I loved how fun and flirty this was. Fit like a glove.

This dress looks great on. I thought the neck would annoy me but it was perfectly comfortable. The length was perfect. The band around the waist is a little tight but makes the dress flattering so it's worth it.

links_reviews_title: Unique dress got lots of comments
links_reviews_text: The size 6 was a little snug but it didn't look bad at all. The cut is totally cute and the style and pattern was so unique that it drew lots of comments. It feels very high quality. Definitely recommend.

I rented this dress for a birthday party and I received tons of compliments! I would agree that it runs a little small. I'm on the small size of 12 and this was very fitted on me. I have a very small chest and imagine a person with boobs may have issues. I wore no bra and probably could have used some fashion tape to keep the top in place. It was fitted around the hips and butt. The detail on the dress was great. I dressed it down a little with a leather jacket, black tights, and engineer boots.

I wore this to a formal night on a cruise ship, which is probably one of the only places in my life I could ever wear this adorable but very bold dress. I had a short internal debate about cultural appropriation before renting this dress, but came to no conclusion other than I really wanted to wear this one time. The dress is very form fitting on the bodice, with a bit of a flare in the skirt. It fit as it should, true to size. I enjoyed wearing it to formal dinner and the casino afterward.

The dress is just beautiful! The red is stunning and the fit is weird for some but it is the traditional cut of a cheongsam dress. I normally wear a size ten and I ordered a size up due to the previous reviews and it worked out. The length is good as well. I thought it would be shorter but it is still at a conservative length. The material is not stretchy at all. I am overall satisfied with this dress.

What an incredible interpretation of the tradition Chinese Cheongsham dress! I wish it fit perfectly but the dress is so beautiful despite it being not as fitted on my petite frame. Such a tribute to Asian culture with the couture flair of runway fashion. Stunning. Sophisticated. Artistic. Beautiful!

links_reviews_title: This dress is outstanding! It was my back-up choice, but was the clear winner.
links_reviews_text: This dress is just stunning. The red is rich without being too flashy. The embroidery and button details are outstanding and the ruffle at the leg is super flirty. I am a fairly solid 6 in dresses and pants, and this dress fit me like a glove --- with no room for error. I actually tried on the 8, hoping for a little give, but it was way too big in the chest. The 6 was a bit roomy for me in the chest too, but I was able to use fashion tape to close the gaps at the side and underarm. The material has no stretch, so I'd go up a size on your back-up size. I love the cut in at the shoulders - it really shows off your arms and back in an attractive and classy way. I received compliments from strangers all night long in this dress!

This dress was a perfect fit for curves. You have to have a C cup or more for sure due to the shape in the chest area. Totally comfortable. I wore spanks underneath to help keep everything in place. Received a lot of compliments and paired it with black chandelier earrings.

links_reviews_title: Unique and fun dress to ring in the New Year!
links_reviews_text: I loved the unique style of the dress! But the fit wasn't so great. Most reviewers noted the dress runs small, so I ordered sizes 2 (my regular size) and 4 as my backup. I have curvy hips and the size 2 was very snug in the hips. The size 4 was more comfortable in the hips, but too loose in the top, so I wore the size 2. The dress had no stretch, and I had to pull it down throughout the night since it would ride up and hug my hips. If it had some stretch it would have been more comfortable and would have been the perfect dress. I still received compliments throughout the night and was able to dance in it.
The color and style of this dress are perfection! The hem is artsy and really different. Would buy but a little pricey sadly. Elegant, very wearable and flattering.

This dress was so lovely! The fabric has no stretch at all but it didn't need any, it fit perfectly everywhere. I think it might be best for women with smaller hips and larger chests, though. I was worried that I'd be too short to pull it off (I'm a smidge under 5'2") but the asymmetrical hem worked very well and I think would be flattering for pretty much any height.

I loved this dress. Orded it as my backup, and thabk goodness I did. My other dress didnt do my non-flat belly any favors. But this was very flattering. I got a ton of compliments, and I love that it was kind of fun and different. You can tell the dress is well made too. It nips in at the waist and runs slighly small. There is no stretch or give - I sized up and it was a perfect fit!

This dress ran small, I wear a US size 8 but thankfully got the back up in a 10 since I read a review saying that if you had curves you should size up. It may just be in UK size. I wore it to a work holiday party and loved the fit and got compliments all night.

I rented this for an afternoon December wedding at a luxury hotel. Was able to wear a strapless bra, with tape at the armpits. The color is a very bright rich red. Couple of things to note - the fabric is super lightweight w no liner, which I was surprised about for the cost of the rental, I thought the dress would have more structure to it. Second - be wary of the slightly odd armhole cut - instead of going straight from the neck to the armpit the fabric is cutaway, not hugely flattering. Lastly I have a super short torso, the 8 didn't fit at all because from the waist to the neck was too long. I'm sure it would be fine for normal length torsos. I wore it, it worked fine, but I didn't get any compliments on it which is rare for a RTR dress.
The fit was amazing - plenty of room to dance, sit down, drink and be merry throughout the evening. The material is high quality and extremely soft.

Very detailed pattern and unique style! This dress is fitted from the waist up - I would size up for your backup since there is no stretch to the fabric. There is not much room in the bust - this would work best for women who have A to C bus sizes. A racerback bra should be worn with this dress due to the way the back of the dress is cut. The dress comes to about knee length on a 5'4" person!
Fit was perfect and it was very comfortable. I am kind of sorry I didn't buy it.
I danced the night away in this pretty number and got tons of compliments!
Great fit. Very sexy. Hugs curves.
I rented this dress for a dinner party. The fabric and color are gorgeous but the cut on top is weird. It also runs small.
pretty dress, i didnt wear it because i found somethin i like better

The dress runs a little small, I'm usually a 4 or 6 but ordered an 8 in this. I'm pear shaped, so a little fuller in the hip area, so I was glad I ordered an 8. It was a little loose on the top but I pinned one side and it worked perfectly. But this dress is really gorgeous and unique. Love the asian influence.
I rented this for a holiday party but did not wear it. The bust is quite loose and if you are a B cup or smaller, it kind of gapes open at the armholes.
Too big on the chest
I loved this dress. beautiful and light. So pretty!

links_reviews_title: Didn't fit at all. Too tight. Didn't like the color.
links_reviews_text: Didn't fit my hourglass body shape.
Really wanted to wear this dress, but it was a tad tight. Will reorder a size 4.

The top is a very strange cut. I wear a 34D and the sides showed half my boob. It was very unflattering, if you have large boobs, this is probably not for you. The waist and hips fit well, and the fabric is nice.
It's super unique! It's a bit big in the hips, but not noticeable enough to not wear! Color really pops too.

links_reviews_title: great dress!! load of compliments. I rented three and this was my favorite
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2" and muscular. fit great. very classy with an original and unique look.

links_reviews_title: Was not able to wear it since it was too small on top
links_reviews_text: I ordered a bigger size and it still did not fit on the top so I was not able to wear.
Unique and flattering. Fun different thatn usual.
Definitely needed to order a size up as the material did not have any give but the fabric was beautiful and my husband loved it
This dress is a dream. Gorgeous floral pattern. Hugs curves but is not tight or heavy. I wore it to work with red birdcage pointed toe heels. Tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great colors and pattern, weird fit
links_reviews_text: Overall a good rental, the dress was very pretty for the wedding I attended. However I wasn't comfortable since the slit in the back kept riding up for some reason. The fabric kept shifting which made me nervous about a wardrobe malfunction.

The dress looked great!! It was stretchy and forgiving in all the right places. I did have to pull up the front a lot because it was plunging and I'm large chested. I'm 4 months postpartum and this was a very flattering dress while still practical for carrying my son.

This is one of those dresses that surprised me with how much I enjoyed wearing it. It was the right length, had the right coverage, good fabric, and didn't make a nuisance of itself at any point. I don't quite have the chest to fill it out; there was a little extra material along the v-neck, but it still didn't gap or do anything else unfortunate. Would rent again!
If you have a booty, slit comes WAY too high. Perfect fit minus that though

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner. It had a bit of stretch, which enhanced the fit. It was comfortable. I sized down after reading reviews, and the 4 was perfect. Loved it, and got plenty of compliments.

I needed up wearing my back up dress because I felt that this dress was too bold for the event I was attending. I would rent this for a garden event. I like it's fit and colors stand out and get you noticed. Not the dress if you don't like your tummy region.
Nice dress, soft lined material. However, the neckline significantly plunges and I will need a camisole under which isn‚Äôt ideal.
Too loud and low cut for work but fit was good and I liked fabric. Good for cocktail party if you want to stand out. Very bright.
It is a true size 14, I'm a 12 so it was big, but the dress was structured enough I could still wear it. Very low in the front. Colorful and lovely.

links_reviews_title: Ok fit- a bit big on the top
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress- had some pilling on the sides of the dress but not noticeable- just could feel it. A bit low cut and had to make sure I didn't flash anyone but I have small boobs so bigger boobs would help. My husband LOVED my butt in the dress though!

Rent this!!! Curvy girls, you will be happy with this one. It's comfortable and fun but looked fresh all day. Beware, the neckline is a little low. I paired with a black cardigan and chunky heels. Lots of compliments

I wore this to a kentucky derby auction/gala and it was perfect. I got lots of compliments and i felt great. Its fully lined and a nice thick stretchy knit material. Its very forgiving and flattering. The top is made to fit a little more loose and is quite low cut. I had to adjust a few times to make sure my bra was not visible. I think this dress would be awesome for someone with a very large bust or someone with larger upper arms. the arm openings are big and give lots of room for moving. I was a little worried about the length being too long but it worked well due to it being fitted. Both sizes fit fine but unfortunately the hem in the size 8 was falling out so i had to wear the 6. It was a comfortable dress to wear all night and i would definitely rent again.

The floral print is fun without being over the top. The material is thicker than expected but not heavy - form fitting but stretchy. It definitely shows off your figure - the good and bad. I have a bit of a belly but some spanx helped with that. The odd part was the top - I'm a 32F/G yet it was baggy up top on me which never happens. It was low cut but not too much.

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern - great garden party dress
links_reviews_text: The top runs big, so I enlisted some double stick tape for the cleavage. Overall great pick though. Super comfortable and flattering. Fun pattern

links_reviews_title: Don't be scared of the print!
links_reviews_text: On the hanger, this looked too loud for my usual taste but, once I put it on, I completely changed my mind. It was very flattering and very well-made. It's a great Silhouette and covered with even in my most industrial-strength shapeware. I suggest getting your usual size and one size down.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely pops when you need to make a statement.
links_reviews_text: Though this dress may not fit the full pear figure, it somehow worked for me. It was flattering on my big arms, and definitely the right amount of cleavage. Since I was on camera, I used tape to make sure it didn't get out of control. Super comfortable to wear during a long day.

links_reviews_title: 2019 MAMGA Mardi Gras Royal Court this dress I chose was for the Queens Royal Tea My son Knight JT
links_reviews_text: This dress fit in all the right areas I received many compliments. It was a perfect choice for this event. #LoveIt

links_reviews_title: Nice pattern, but a bit low cut!
links_reviews_text: I had to wear a cami under this, but it was comfortable, and nice for work.
I rented this dress for a cocktail event at The botanical gardens. I received so many compliments. The colors are vibrant and really stood out. This dress was also very comfortable.
A bit low cut, pair with a tank for modesty. Stretchy fabric is a three season dress.

links_reviews_title: Total stranger Came up to me at theater
links_reviews_text: Very sexy and the colors are brilliant. Too low cut in front for me for a work dress but perfect for a special date. The material is stretchy and forgiving. Hugs in all the right places. The shoulders are a little big and bust area if you're smaller (I'm a 34c). True story..I wore this to a dinner and then theater to see a play. Was waiting in line for a drink at the theater when a gentleman behind me said "do you want to hear how beautiful your dress is?" I turned and thanked him and he said he was actually at the same restaurant I was before the theater and noticed it there!! Now that's a dress to remember!!!!
A little low cut but I was able to manage. Great fit!

I love this floral printed sheath by Alexis Admor. Running true to size with a lot of stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and comfortable room at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this versatile dress. At 5'8, the length hit knee length on me. You can wear this style to work, for cocktails, date night, or anywhere. You can pair this dress with a neutral color pump or colored ankle strap to play off of the vibrant colors in the dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress is great! It's VERY low cut, but I fixed it with fashion tape and a pin :)
links_reviews_text: It's a very cute dress that shouldn't be so low cut!
Fantastic fit and the fabric has stretch so it is super comfortable
size I order was too large I am usually a trie 4/6. I could have worn a size down.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress but I loved it. will rent again.
links_reviews_text: very flattering fit.

This dress had a bit of a blousy chest/shoulders, which was attractive but also gaped every now and then. Comfortable and bright print. I didn't feel it was the most flattering thing I'd ever worn but I enjoyed it.
It was too tight in the waist area.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print and colors and stretchy fabric.
links_reviews_text: Chest area was too big for me and I had to keep pulling it up. Not sure if it was cut or style.

I wanted to love the dress and ultimately ended up wearing the dress because I loved the print. However, the top is so big (I don't have big boobs) and the vneck is very low. The bottom is more form fitting but the slit is so high (I could see my underwear and it's a gaping slit so very weird) I used 4 safety pins to close it up
Great material that does not wrinkle and stays in place. Very flattering fit. Loved this dress.
It was way too busty for me to wear.

This dress is really beautiful and comfortable. The challenging part for me was getting the right size for the neckline and the slit in the back. I ended up using the 12 and pinning the necklace. The slit went pretty high, so it could be an issue for a tall gal who is curvy like me. I'd recommend also having a great pair of Spanx to smooth everything out.
The hem was unraveling when I received it.

links_reviews_title: nice maternity dress, 36 weeks pregnant and wore 2 sizes up
links_reviews_text: nice for work

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print. High slit in back.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print, but the slit n the back was too high to wear any Spanx underneath.

This dress is so festive! I tried it on for a Portuguese themed party. It would have worked quite well but I ended up going with another one. That being said i still would have been happy with this one. It fits like a glove, so it's not forgiving of any unwanted lumps but it is very comfortable. It also is a super deep v so be comfortable with that or plan to wear a cami under it. It has some stretch but not a lot so recommend ordering g true to size.
Had to wear a little cardigan with it to cover the fact that the top was bigger than the bottom.
Worn to a fashion show. The bottom fit great but the top was a bit big for my body type so had to adjust frequently. Nice, thick material.

links_reviews_title: I wore to Vegas for my husbands 50th Birthday party! Loved it, great fit.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, a little long, 3 inch heels.
Loved this jumpsuit. Got lots of compliments and I felt so sexy without showing too much skin. Don't think I've ever seen a cut like this. Highly recommend
Rented this for a 70's Disco Party. Perfect. Sexy. So many compliments! Highly recommend!!
Sexy and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Hunny, are you ready to have a good time?!?
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was a stunner! Rent it immediately! I decided to wear it not as suggested with the neck crisscrossed but left it open, it made it slightly baggy in the arm but trust me it doesn't matter. Rent the runway suggested that I size up which was fine but I would've preferred it a little tighter and could've stayed true to my size 2. I wore it with a long pendant necklace and super high stilettos. The fabric is light and flows nicely. Vet ready for all the compliments. #SEXY #girlsout

I rented this for an "all-black" outfit night in Vegas (Bride wore white). It photographed well but it runs SMALL and I was UNCOMFORTABLE. Especially after I ate dinner! It got really tight around the stomach and there is NO give. Even before dinner, it felt right around the ribcage so definitely not good if you have a wide torso. Also, you cannot wear a bra (I'm a 36b). Bring boob tape! The halter strap also really dig into my neck. Looking back, I liked the way I looked but was so uncomfortable the whole night. I wouldn't rent again and I usually like Jill Stuart. P.S. I know it's not the best photo but it's one of the only full length ones I have.

links_reviews_title: What a hit, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very sexy jumpsuit, got so many compliments. Had to size up, but loved the fit. Only downside is that the sleeves really restrict your arm range of motion.

links_reviews_title: It looked great and I made it work, but it could've been more comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The bottom half fit great even without shapewear (and after just having a baby I was worried). The top gapped everywhere it could gap. I ended up using some duct tape and chicken cutlets to make it work since I didn't have time to order the right boob accessories. The band around the arm was lower on my arm than it should've been so I couldn't really lift my arms properly. I think it would fit someone who is shorter and bustier than me better. The length of the pants was great though!

It was a tad loose in the back, for me anyway. Be prepared to show off your girls because it is revealing and sexy in the front but just the right amount. The length of the legs was great when I wore my heels that were at least 3 1/2 inches along with my 5'8 height. Do not expect to stretch your arms out wide in this. Try to limit going to the restroom because it is a hassle getting in and out of this jumpsuit. Overall, I felt so sexy and elegant and I'm glad I wore this to the Ball that I attended.
I have a bustier top, so once I was zipped up and ready to go everything was in place and no slippage. Pant legs were a little long so I wore super tall heels. But got so many compliments!
Looks chic on! Loved it, little weird on my arms but oh well.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a concert or evening event.
links_reviews_text: Runs large on top.

This was such a beautiful jumpsuit and I got so many compliments on it. It hugged all the right places and I felt super sexy in it. Giving this a 4 because I needed help getting in and out of it, especially when going to the bathroom. It was also hard to move my arms up and down. Nonetheless, great rental and very pleased!

Loved the overall look of this jumpsuit- but it was a bit snug. If you're standing a lot, I'd recommend, but if you plan on moving or dancing, I'd find another option. The way the arms are made make for limited mobility

links_reviews_title: It was very pretty‚Ä¶ I got a lot of compliments‚Ä¶
links_reviews_text: One thing‚Ä¶ I had to use a pin because the opening was a little too open for me

links_reviews_title: Unique and flattering, but too big!
links_reviews_text: Loved the style, but the fit was off. It was baggy on the sides of the torso and loose at the waist. I had wanted to wear the top open, but I had to cross it because it was too loose. Even with the top crossed, it was quite baggy. I am notorious for having long legs, but the pants of this jumpsuit were so long I had to wear 5 inch heels to keep them from dragging on the floor. I received a lot of compliments, but remember to size down!

links_reviews_title: Perfect when you want an alternative to a dress
links_reviews_text: Pros: instant class, subtly sexy Cons: boobs staying in place, could be a bit more fitted around the waist area

Wore this outfit for date night in Las Vegas. It was great....i felt super sexy. The open back showed off my tattoos and the key hole in the front was a dramatic sexy look that my husband loved!! The fit and design made me feel secure and comfortable without wearing a bra (I always wear a bra!!) The only issue with the fit was that my torso was a little too long so the pants part was tighter than I wanted in the crotch area. This made it slightly difficult to sit down comfortably. I ordered the regular size and think I might have been better with the 12 Long. I loved the look so much though that it didn't matter.

links_reviews_title: Deceivingly sexy- amazing fit in waist and legs
links_reviews_text: Too sexy for the event i hoped to use it for- great for a night out, club/ Vegas type venue. I didnt fill out the top great but fashion tape would have been fine for me. I LOVED the fit in the waist and legs, however! Just falls beautifully off your behind and grazes the very top of the hip in front and cascades to a beautiful bell bottom. Tailored and flattering. 3in heel in pic Will rent again for a different event !
Fit great, almost too short in body. I have a long torso though. Length was great. Im 5'8 and could wear 5" heels. Very lowcut. Elastic sleeves made it easy for me to take on and off by myself.
Fits snug get ready to show the girls off

This outfit was a huge hit! I got so many compliments and asked where I got it. Of course I plugged Rent The Runway! As for the fit...I mentioned that it runs large because of the neck strap. It was WAY TOO LONG. I had to pin it for it to be the correct length. If you are 5'7" like me get the Tall so it hits the right spot with your heels. Its a bit snug in the waistline so you may need spanx if you have a waist bigger than 30". I wore a deep U bra with this top along with double sided stick tape to keep it in place. If you dont have perfect tatas no worries! Just get yourself a deep U bra and you are good to go!

links_reviews_title: The fact that RTR can get me an outfit overnight!!!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my holiday party, and it made me feel incredibly sexy. Tons of compliments! It was true to size, however it had no give what so ever, and i used tape to keep eveything in its place! I would totally rent this again!! Thank you RTR

I marked true to size on this jumpsuit ONLY because its both tight and loose. I have a true hourglass shape and feel this will only work for someone with a small waist. I'm normally a size 10 and went with the 12L so it could fit at the waist. (28 inches and there is NOOOO stretch at all in the waist) The top is loose and will definitely have your girls out. I am a perky 36C and used safety pins to keep everything in place or I'm certain there would of been a show. The bottom is tight and loose. At the hips/buttocks (again, hourglass shape reference) it was snug but did stretch a VERY little bit. From the thighs on its a loose and flows amazingly when you walk. I'm 5'6 and wore 3 inch heels and the LONG hit the floor but did not drag. Hope this helps. Xo.
