I really loved this jumpsuit! It fits great in all areas and is really flattering among the curvy ladies! I used some boob tape to keep the girls secured in there. If you are smaller chested this part of the suit might be too loose on you, so keep that in mind that you will absolutely need boob tape to make sure there's no nip slippage! Great for dinner or going out dancing. I received compliments all night! Wish I had a better full length pic but this hopefully should do!
I'm usually a 10 and everywhere else the suit fit like a glove and was super flattering. But with a 36DD bust, I should have ordered a 12.
Although did not fit me, i'm ordering a size up. Perfect for date night. Makes your girls look FAB!
I wish I would have ordered this in a size 8 because it was snug but I got so many compliments on this outfit. It hugged in all the right places. I was turning heads all night.
Didn't wear the jumpsuit because I couldn't sit (tight in hips) or raise my arms (short sleeve length) but was large in the stomach area.
If you have a butt go up at least one size.
A tad short in the torso area. It was borderline cameltoe. BUT very sexy and I got amazing compliments all night. I am debating on buying this!!!

links_reviews_title: Great outfit for a fun event!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit- was comfortable and fit well. Was very unique!
Looked like it could be cute for a formal dinner or something similar but the fit was all over the place! The bottom fit fine but the top was huge and kept falling off. Never ended up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Would not recommend if have curves.
links_reviews_text: This looked like it could be an amazing outfit. However, I should have listened to the reviews where it said it was tight in the hips. It was extremely tight though the hips and short through the torso. Once I pulled up to put the stamps on it was incredibly uncomfortably in the crotch area and very unflattering. Also if you have wider spaced breast this does nothing for your appearance unless you want to use some sort of tape.

links_reviews_title: Terrible fit. I ordered the long and the torso/rise is so short I could not even fasten the collar.
links_reviews_text: Too short in the body, too long in the legs, and too tight for the size. I would not ever order again.
a little tight in my butt.
Looked frumpy on me. Did not fit well.

The jumpsuit looks amazing on but it was completely uncomfortable. The criss cross neckline made me feel like I was choking and the arms were very restrictive in movement. I have a long torso for my 5'2" body and the crotch was also very high up. I wish I could've worn it because it was exactly what I was looking for, but I couldn't wear it for 5 minutes, let alone an entire evening.

links_reviews_title: N/a didn't get a chance to wear it. Didn't fit properly
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear.
Loved this dress and all my friends were wowed by it on our ladies vacation in Aruba. Fit perfect, low cut but no complaints. I found it very comfortable. So many compliments!!
Loved this dress ! It was a little long, but the colors were vibrant and beautiful! Received so many compliments
Comfy, cute, no bra needed, and looks good with a tan. All you need. :)

Loved this dress. So comfortable and easy to wear. No bra needed. Only complaint is that I think this particular dress has had enough love.. it definitely didn't feel new. That's my one hang up on RTR. Otherwise I 100% recommended this rental! So easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress! Love the colors & print!
links_reviews_text: The dress was long on me so if you're my height or shorter then you'll need to wear wedges or shoes with some heel. Also, no need for a bra but it did take me some time to realize that the folded pads were supposed to be like that. Overall, comfortable dress for a warm day.
Loved the colors and fit. There were pads in the boob area which was good. It was very comfortable, but a little long on me even at 5'7".

Loved this cozy comfortable dress for my gender reveal party! My only complaint is the built in pads for the bust kept folding in half and made for a lumpy top with no slit to remove or straighten out. Otherwise overall was great!

links_reviews_title: A pleasant surprise with a great fit!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure I loved the print when I saw the dress online, but after reading all the positive reviews, I decided to give it a try. The pineapples are actually abstract enough that it's not an overwhelming pattern. The fit and flow of the dress is perfection! The dress is lightweight, so it doesn't overwhelm in warm weather, and the neckline is extremely flattering. My boobs looked so great! I would rent this one again for sure!
Rented for our vacation in Maui. I wore it for a beach dinner one night. It was very comfortable and loved the pink pineapples!
Comfortable & cute. No bra needed. I'm short so I had to wear wedges

I typically don't like Lilly Pulitzer but I knew this would an exception and I did love it. As per usual with American brands, it runs very large so size down. The dress was quite worn and didn't have the original color I know it came with. Also like others have said, the padding in the bra was all folded over and I had to smooth it out. In general I didn't like that there was padding - made my boobs look too big and unnatural.

The dress fit perfect. I would say it runs true to size. I didn't have to wear a bra which was nice ( the pads were folded in half so I did have to unfold them) I wore 3 inch heels and the dress just hit the floor so it does run long, as I'm 5'6". Lot of compliments on fit and style. Would definitely rent again!!
I got so many complaints. It runs a little big- I had to size up one size. The color is awesome!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fabric to throw on after the beach!
links_reviews_text: The only thing I didn't like about this dress what the padded bra that was included. It took my awhile to get it adjusted
I wore this on vacation. It was a great travel dress. It didn't wrinkle in my luggage, it was comfortable to wear in the heat, and I loved that it had built in cups. I also loved the colors!
Loved this dress. Long enough for me being 5‚Äô9‚Äù. The front was lower than I expected but I am not super busty so it was fine. Received many compliments and felt great in it.

This dress was the absolute perfect choice for my future SIL's bridal shower. The fit was completely perfect, the fabric is super soft, and the built in bra cups made getting dressed so easy. I 100% recommend this dress, and was SO sad to return it. High likelihood I wind up buying it!
Amazing. My favorite dress I ever wore. Wish I got a better picture in it.
The material is pretty stretchy cotton, so it fit very nicely.
Very pretty, lots of complements. I couldn't wear a bra. The straps could have been tighter for a better fit.

links_reviews_title: Terrific fit, perfect dress for a garden party! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: No need for a bra, but I was glad I had 3-inch wedges to wear; it's a long dress and I'm only 5'2".

The dress is a bit lower than expected but since it does have light padding, a bra wasn't required. I got a lot of compliments and was able to take it from Sunday brunch, to a baby shower to a casual night out at a outdoor patio.
Amazing fit and loved the bright colors. There is a built in bra and it fit like a glove. I'm 5'10 and it was still a little long on me. Would rent again!

I wore this on a trip to Charleston and on Mother's Day. I received a ton of compliments. It felt true to size. It was comfy and flattering. No bra needed, but I did wear a Nu Bra with it one time, which worked well.
This dress is awesome! I wish I owned it. I felt gorgeous. Everyone thought it was beautiful. The material felt so good!
Fit top was exposing
This dress looked beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a Lilly Pulitzer summer "Pinknick" party and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful and flattering, that I bought it! I am usually a 6 and this ran true to size. I did however tie the back straps together with some pretty pink ribbon to make it more of a cut in-snugger fitting halter.
Fit perfectly! Got multiple compliments.
beautiful dress great fit but did not wear mine because it looked a little to worn for me , will try to rent again.

Super comfy dress but it runs a little big. I weigh about 170lbs and ordered a 10 & 12. Both fit but I could have used a size 8... I contacted RTR about a smaller size and heard back from them over a week later. Oh well.... I ended up wearing the 12 because I felt it covered bore of my bust area... speaking of the bust area.... YOWZA!! This dress is very booby for all you busty gals! Like the girls are on display and I heard about it a couple of times during the night... which made me feel a little uncomfortable. Other than that the dress was comfy and easy to wear.... would probably not rent this dress again.
Fit great, loved it so I bought it!

The size 6 in this dress looked great and fit well. I was disappointed that the size 8 had a large faded area in the middle of the skirt and the hem was very dirty. Luckily the 6 worked, but the 8nis my normal size. The bonus dress was very pretty and fit great!

links_reviews_title: Way too big in the bust
links_reviews_text: This neckline in this dress was SO deep and large that the girls were completely exposed. Couldn't wear it.

I rented this because I thought the bust padding would make it wearable, but the pads were folded over and off-center. Between that and the slightly-too-long straps, I looked super saggy and sad. Did not wear.
Light weight and easy to wear. I decided no bra was necessary and it looked great with a tan
Lovely summer maxi dress, be advised it is very low cut, I was adjusting a lot to make sure I wasn't falling out! Very comfortable to wear all day.
Perfect maxi for a casual event or for everyday summer life. Runs a tad large, I normally would wear a 4 in a maxi like this, but rented a 2 and it fits perfectly. I received so many compliments!
Did not wear it. Was way too long even w high wedges. Also the bust had a strange fit. Not flattering.

I wore this a couple times out and about during the day. It is a bit long so I had to lift it while walking to avoid dragging (I'm 5"4 and I wore a 2 inch heeled sandal). The material is suuuuper soft/comfy stretchy jersey, but the way it falls makes it feel much more on the fancy rather than overly casual side. It could work for either a casual out-and-about errand run, a day on the beach, or an afternoon party. Big plus - the top is lined with soft cups so at least for a small-chested girl like me, you don't need a bra (yessss please!) I'd definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very pretty! Back gaped a bit and no stretch.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress and color! I loved the length on me, which is hard to find. It has zero stretch, so order a size up if you're getting a back up. It did gape a little bit in the back since my torso is small - could have fixed that with some fashion tape. Would rent again!
The lace was not very forgiving, but luckily I had the next size up. I loved the dress, I got so many compliments, would definitely order again.
I love this dress so much i've rented it twice! Fits perfectly on petite frames. I love the fabric, fit, and color.

One of my favorite Rent the Runway Rentals. Love this dress so much I now own it! It's more of an orange red than a red with bluish undertones, so it's that true fire engine red. It's short on my 5'9" frame, but it's so figure flattering that it somehow elongates my legs. I also love the back details and how comfortable it is to wear. See more of my Rent the Runway rentals @projectrenttherunway!

links_reviews_title: Fabulous Dress! If you are on the fence, rent it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I am usually a size 4, but after reading the other reviews, I sized up, and was glad I did. It was such a comfortable dress, and I felt fabulous in it! I wore it to a wedding at a vineyard, and felt it was appropriate for the occasion. Compliments were a plenty:). The color was also fantastic. I have a large bust, so I wore the stick on bra, since the back is open. I loved this dress, and would rent again. It was my first rental, and it was a success!

I have full hips but a small chest, so the small was a little snug in the hip but looser up top. I'm 5'2" and the length was about mid thigh, could dance comfortably, although I had to pull the slip down a few times. The color was a very warm red almost orange, which was great for an end of summer wedding.

Fit well, the small was a bit too tight but the medium was perfect. Slip under the lace was really short, but the lace overlay fell to a perfect length. Received lots of compliments all night. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments on this dress. The wedding was outside, it was hot but I was comfortable
links_reviews_text: The only con is the bottom of the skirt is short. The under layer kept sliding up. Thankfully I am short and it covered my butt.

links_reviews_title: The dress matched perfectly with my earring and shoes
links_reviews_text: Dress was really comfortable and beautiful, got so many compliments on it. Loved it

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments but tricky to wear
links_reviews_text: This dress was a nice quality dress and very pretty, but I'm 5'2" and it was very short on me! Part of the issue was the slip which as other reviewers said, rode up right away and would look kind of bunched in the front. I used fabric tape to keep the slip down on either side of the dress. That kept me more secure that the slip wouldn't ride up TOO far, but it was still something I had to think about throughout the night. It photographed well though, and I received lots of compliments. I would say this would be a better dress for girls without hips - I'm not super large in that area and I did have trouble so if you do have larger thighs, I'd skip this one.
I loved this dress! I received so many compliments and it was comfortable for a long day at the races!

links_reviews_title: The color & it fit just right!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly, I'm 4'11 & it fit great every where! Love love love.
This was my backup for another event but i was able to wear it to a friends party at a winery! Loved the fit and the back is beautiful! Got lots of compliments, dressed it down with a leather jacket.

Pretty lace with lining cutout in the middle and bodice -still lace covered so not too revealing. The lining on the skirt definitely needs fabric tape to stay down. Very form fitting with not any stretch. If not sure, order up. Really pretty, standout dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a fun night out! Got compliments all night
links_reviews_text: The medium fit like a glove. I dressed it up with a nude heel and matching lipstick. Wearing a nude bra wasn't an issue - safety-pinned it in the back.

Wore this for a valentine weekend getaway with husband. Fit perfectly and felt amazing. The only downside was I forgot pasties and only brought a strapless bra which I didn't realize wouldn't work so I went braless.

links_reviews_title: Comfort, class, confidence in this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit: perfect, true to size, bottom red fabric under the lace was a bit short but no flashing front or back. total movement in arms. Lace was not itchy and didn't snag. Pro Tip: Put earrings and any hair accessories on AFTER the dress, otherwise it will snag. I wore it braless and think that bustier ladies may want to order a size up for chest room.

I got this dress to wear on a valentines dinner date. True to size and flattering. I'm currently breastfeeding and have 34d and the top was lined enough to make going braless totally comfortable. Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, not great for limbo
links_reviews_text: Loved the color of this dress and the cutout on the back. Based on other reviews I used garment tape to secure the slip to the lace and was glad I did as the dress crept up while dancing. Probably best fits someone not curvy from the waist down.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a fundraiser event.
links_reviews_text: I initially rented a medium, but the fit was too tight. I normally wear a size 6-8. The large was a little loose but fit better than the medium.

links_reviews_title: A hit dress at an August wedding!!
links_reviews_text: The color is a bit more coral than red, which really stood out. I ordered the S and the XS. The S was too big, but the built in slip in the XS was uncomfortably short. I ended up going with the XS because it gave me more shape. I had to keep pulling it down while dancing, but it ended up working out okay. Overall, I really liked this dress, great for shorter girls!
As a size 8/10, it's always hard to know whether I'll need medium or large. Both fit, but I ended up going with the large for a little extra length :-)

I actually rented 2 dresses so I ended up wearing the other one but it was such a hard decision!! I only chose the other one because it was long sleeved and it was very cold. Love this dress-- slip underneath is definitely short though so you probably couldn't get low on the dance floor in it.

The XS fit much much better, but I opted to wear the S because I felt like it gave me a little more length and I was feeling self conscious about the length for this particular wedding. I felt HOT all night in this dress. It was comfortable to dance in. It breathed well. I would rent this again in a heartbeat.

Loved this dress! The color is beautiful and its definitely a statement dress. I paired it with some nude heels and gold hoops. I'm petite - about 5'2", typically size 0/2 or 26 in pants and the small was a tad big in the waist. Would rent again.
Fit comfortably on myself and sister who is a similar size, gorgeous fun red lace. Wore on NYE and got a lot of compliments!

I loved the length and cut of this dress! My chest is a bit large so you could see the bottom of my bra (the panel didn't fully cover it) but I wore a red lace one so you could barely tell. This dress doesn't have stretch, but runs true to size. I felt super cute all night! Best part is that it is actually short, even on a short girl like me.
This dress fit perfectly as described. However, It was a bit short and had no stretch so i would be careful with the size you order. Received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The party was a disaster but the dress was amazing!
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully! This was my backup dress and I‚Äôm so thankful I got it! I‚Äôm pretty short so I was worried it would be long and awkward but the underneath was the perfect length and the lace made it classy for my work event. It‚Äôs not a body con so it doesn‚Äôt feel super tight, which I liked. The cut outs and places where there was just lace were enough to be a little sexy but totally appropriate. Got a ton of compliments!

Very fun dress - Perfect for a work holiday party. As other folks have mentioned, it's a bit short but I was standing the entire time so it didn't become an issue. I will say this - I didn't realize how much skin you could see in the midsection until someone took a flash photo! I still think it looks classy, but something to keep in mind :)

links_reviews_title: This dress was comfortable, beautiful and unique. Wore it for my 30th birthday party.
links_reviews_text: No cons!

This dress was one of my favorites from RTR! Paired with some bright earrings this was the perfect dress for a wedding in Mexico. I ordered a small and medium and ended up wearing the small. It was a touch tight around my hips, but the medium was too big on my chest and you cannot wear a bra with the dress since it has an open cut out in the back. It photographs great and I received compliments all night!

If you're even sort of considering renting this dress, do it now! It's stunning. Fits true to size, has awesome detail, especially the back, and the color is awesome. And I don't normally even like red.

Gorgeous red dress- a real head turner. As other reviewers mentioned, the lining is super short, so need to be careful when moving and sitting. It's not my usual style, but I was very happy with it for the wedding. It got a ton of compliments and looked great in photos.

I loved everything about this dress. Fit perfectly and wasn‚Äôt tight at all around the waistline. It was a very comfortable dress to dance in as well. Received tons of compliments and absolutely recommend this dress for a holiday party or wedding!

Lots of compliments. Very flattering and attention grabbing. Skirt lining is very short if you are taller, but it's disguised by the lace detail being longer. Didn't want to take it off! I wish I could wear this everyday.

I wish I could have kept this dress. It's so gorgeous, and I got many compliments on it. My only complaint is that the skirt underlay would ride up when I walked which caused a wrinkle across my thighs. I did have to pull it back down throughout the night. Overall, it's super comfortable and fit like a glove. The sheer areas and open back are a great touch as well.

links_reviews_title: Had so many compliments on the color and lace! Loved this dress will rent again.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear a bra wear a 34dd, I didn't find it to be too short or slip riding up as I had read on previous reviews. Get this dress!!!!

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I was nervous this was going to be RED RED bc that's not great on me, but it was more of a bold burnt orange/red in my opinion. The lace overlay was thick/high quality, not flimsy - I danced all night without worrying it was going to rip anywhere. It's not padded but with the overlay, was "bra-free friendly" if you know what I mean, my favorite part other than the steal of a price! The XS was like a glove, the S was a tad too big. Love it and got so many compliments!

This dress is awesome. I definitely felt very. sexy. I am 5'5 with a long torso. It was pretty short on me especially when I was sitting. The color is gorgeous. I would say stretch is minimal. No need for a bra which is always a bonus.
